40001001	Yiesu Kristo yaajanm sana n ne: u tie Dafiid yaabuonn i, g Dafiid mɔ tie Abraham yaabuonn.
40001002	Abraham bo mal Isaak, k Isaak mal Sakɔb, g Sakɔb mal Suuda yen u ninjanm,
40001003	g Suuda mal Faarɛs yen Saara, k b naa tie Tamaar. G Faarɛs mal Ɛsrɔm, k Ɛsrɔm mal Aram,
40001004	k Aram mal Aminadab, k Aminadab mal Naasɔnn, g Naasɔnn mal Salmɔn,
40001005	g Salmɔn kuan Rahaab g mal Bos, g Bos kuan Rut g mal Obɛd, k Obɛd mal Sese,
40001006	g Sese mal bad Dafiid. G Dafiid tug Uri ŋaapuo g mal Salomɔn.
40001007	G Salomɔn mal Robuam, g Robuam mal Abiya, k Abiya mal Asa,
40001008	k Asa mal Sosafat, g Sosafat mal Soram, g Soram mal Osias,
40001009	k Osias mal Yuatam, g Yuatam mal Ahas, k Ahas mal Esekias,
40001010	k Esekias mal Manase, g Manase mal Amɔn, k Amɔn mal Sosias,
40001011	g Sosias mal Sekonias yen u ninjanm. L youg u, g Babilɔnn yab baal g suol Suude yab g kun yen’m b doug n.
40001012	L puol po, g Sekonias mal Salatiɛl, g Salatiɛl mal Sorobabɛl,
40001013	g Sorobabɛl mal Abiyud, k Abiyud mal Eliakim, k Eliakim mal Asɔr,
40001014	k Asɔr mal Sadɔk, g Sadɔk mal Akim, k Akim mal Eliyud,
40001015	k Eliyud mal Eleyasaar, k Eleyasaar mal Matan, g Matan mal Sakɔb,
40001016	g Sakɔb mal Sosɛf, Mari sal. G Mari mal Yiesu yua k b yi’ug Kristo.
40001017	Lann, lan cil Abraham saa yen Dafiid, b tie yaajanm piig yen banna i. Dafiid youg saa yen ban bo suol Suude yab yaa youg g gad yen’m Babilɔnn mɔ, b tie yaajanm piig yen banna i. Babilɔnn youg saa yen Kristo youg mɔ, yaajanm piig yen banna.
40001018	Ban mal Yiesu Kristo nand n ne: u naa Mari bo tie Sosɛf sikpenŋ i. B daa bo g kuan lieb mɔno g Mari yen suol puol Foŋanm paalu po.
40001019	Sosɛf bo tie nimɔn i, lan te k u bo g bua k u fiɛg Mari niib n, g ji mali k wan wuon g yie’og.
40001020	Wan bo mali nnyan g Yonmdaan malɛg baal danŋd n ninŋ g maad’o: « Dafiid yaabuonn Sosɛf ! Big nba g Mari pil’o ne tie Foŋanm paalu po i. Daa jie yen ŋan gaal Mari k wan te a ŋaapuo kaa.
40001021	U bu mal bijabg, ŋan pul’o Yiesu, wano n tan bu nyan u buolu niib b biid n ninŋ. »
40001022	L yaa bona kul ne bo tien g Yendu sogni n bo maad yal siɛnyoug ń fid g tien yen mɔni.
40001023	U bo maad g sipaan nba g ban jua tan bu suol puol g mal bijabg ban gii yi’ug Emanuwɛl. (L sann niimn n tie g Yendu be yen’ti.)
40001024	Sosɛf n guan g find, k u tien nyan Yonmdaan malɛg n bo maad’o nand nyan, g gaal u ŋaapuo Mari k b taan g be.
40001025	B yen g bann lieb saa yen daal nba k u mal bijabg. G Sosɛf pul’o Yiesu.
40002001	B bo mal Yiesu Bɛtlɛm i, Suude doug n, g sua k Erod n tie bad. Yiesu n mal, g banda nne nyiɛ puol g baal Serusalɛm
40002002	g bual niib k b mal Suif‑nba bad lɛ buol i ? K b la u ŋmaabig k u pud puol, k l po n te k b baal k ban pug’o.
40002003	Erod n gbad nnyan k u yam ŋmad, wano yen Serusalɛm yab kul.
40002004	K u tigl Suif‑nba salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda kul, g bual’b ban bo bu mal Kristo naan.
40002005	K b maad’o k u bu mal Bɛtlɛm i, Suude doug n, g Yendu sogni mɔno bo diɛn Yendu lanbona g maad:
40002006	« Fin, Bɛtlɛm, Suude tinŋ, fin kaa nyid g cie Suude dogbenŋa kul, g dugn bad tan bu nya a ninŋ i, gii kub n niib, Israyɛl buolu. »
40002007	Erod n gbad nnyan k u wuon g yiin banda ŋann g bual’b g fiid, k wan bann ŋmaabig ŋann n cind g pud yaa daal, k b ŋɔn’o.
40002008	L puol po k u sun’m Bɛtlɛm, g maad’b: « Gad man g daan ŋanm g bual g bann big ŋann n be naan. I gii la’ɔg yin guan g maad’n, k n mɔ ń gad g daan pug’o. »
40002009	Bad n maad nnyan g gbenn, k b nyiɛ g paan g saa, b sua ŋmaabig nba k b bo kpiɛ g la nyan biɛ be b liig. Ban la l ŋmaabig k b pala manŋ g pend. K l ŋmaabig ji be b liig g saa saa g daan pund big n bo be naan Bɛtlɛm doug n g sed.
40002011	K b kua ŋaag n g la big yen u naa Mari g gbaan g pug big, g biɛ nyan b tiɛd n ninŋ wula yen ŋubl yen tilaali nne k b yi miir, g tie’og.
40002012	L puol po i g Yendu ji maad’b danŋd n k ban ji daa gɔ Erod buol. Lann i k b tɔgn sɔnfanu g kun.
40002013	B lebd g kun yo, g Yonmdaan malɛg baal Sosɛf buol danŋd n, g maad’o g bad Erod kpaan big k wan biɛn’o. K wan fiil g juab big yen u naa g san g gad Esipt doug n, g daan gii be saa yen youg nba k u biɛ tan bu maad’o k wan kpen.
40002014	G Sosɛf fiil nyiɛɔg n g juab big yen u naa g puod Esipt,
40002015	g ji be l po saa yen Erod n tan kpe. L bo tien nnyan g Yendu sogni n bo maad siɛnyoug yal ń te mɔni. Yendu bo maad: « N yiin n bija k u nyiɛ Esipt doug n. »
40002016	Erod n bo bann g banda ŋann bɔnd’o, k u pal bie g pend, k u ŋanm g dugn ŋmaali nba g banda ŋann bo ŋɔn’o, g sun Bɛtlɛm doug n yen l dokuni n, k ban kpi bijabi nba mɔg bina ŋanle yen yab daa g la bina ŋanle kul.
40002017	Nnyan i g Yendu sogni Seremi n bo maad yal siɛnyoug ji baal. U bo maad:
40002018	« B gbad nil bubuul Rama doug n, bubuul yen finfabni. Rasiɛl n buud u bid po, g yie balmi, g dugn b ji g be yen’o. »
40002019	Erod kpe, g Yonmdaan malɛg baal Sosɛf buol danŋd n Esipt doug n,
40002020	g maad’o g yab nba daan kpaan k ban biɛn big miɛl nyan kpe o, k wan ji fiil g juab big yen u naa gii leb Israyɛl doug n.
40002021	G Sosɛf fiil g juab big yen u naa g lebd Israyɛl.
40002022	Ama wan gbad k Arkelawus n gaal u baa Erod kog, g ji tie Suude bad nyan, k u jie jiwaani yen wan kun l doug n. G Yendu ŋɔn’o danŋd n k u gad Galile doug n,
40002023	g daan kal dobig nne ninŋ k b yi Nasarɛt. L bo tien nnyan g Yendu sogni‑nba n bo maad yal siɛnyoug Kristo po ń fid g tien yen mɔni. B bo maad g niib tan baa yi’ug Nasarɛt jua.
40003001	L youg g San Nyunwultua baal. U bo be Suude tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i, g muand Yendu laabaal,
40003002	g maad: « Ŋaa man i tuonbiid g lebd i binbem. Yendu bal nag o. »
40003003	Yendu sogni Esaayi bo maad wano i g tua: « Nil kpaand tinkuonŋ n ninŋ g maad: “ Ŋanm man Yonmdaan sɔnu, sond man u sɔni. ” »
40003004	San bo liɛ liɛdl nne i k b lug yen yuoyuoug kobd, g lol gbanmɔunŋ gbann siɛg n. Lankpand yen siid n bo tie u jied.
40003005	Serusalɛm yab, Suude yab kul yen yab nba bo kua Suurdɛn bɔnkunŋ kul bo saa u buol i,
40003006	g maad niib kul nunŋ n b biid, k u wuul’b nyum Suurdɛn bɔnŋ n ninŋ.
40003007	Wan la g Farisiɛn-nba yen Sadusien-nba bonciɛnn baad nyunwulu nyan, k u maad’b: « Yinm waalaba ne, ŋmaa n maad’i k yin nya Yendu mutuol nba baad ne ninŋ i ?
40003008	I yie k i tien yal ŋɔn k i lebd binbem o,
40003009	gii kal g tua k Abraham tie i yaaja. N maad’i faa, Yendu nuan bu fid g te tana ne ń kpand Abraham yaabuona.
40003010	Piɛg ji dua tiidi nyaga n i. Tiig nba g luon luanŋana kul, b bu cua’ɔg u g lu muu n ninŋ.
40003011	Min nuan wuul’i nyum n i, lann n ŋɔn k i lebd binbem. Ama yua baad mɔg paalu g cie’n. N g dagd yen k n pid baa u taacaaɔg mɔno. Wano tan bu tug Foŋanm yen muu i g wul’i.
40003012	U diɛ u dilennŋmantonn g saa jalg n, g bu lenn u dii. U bu wod diŋani g ŋuun u bunbual n. G nyaan tug feonŋ g lu muu nba kan ban g junn n ninŋ. »
40003013	Lann i g Yiesu nyiɛ Galile g baal Suurdɛn bɔnŋ n San buol, g San ń wul’o nyum.
40003014	G San yie g maad: « L bo bual k fin i ń wul’n, k a mɔ biɛ ji baal n buol k n wul’a nii ? »
40003015	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Tien min bual yal mɔlane o, g dugn l ŋan k tin tien Yendu n bua yal kul i. » G San tien Yiesu n bual yal.
40003016	Wan wul Yiesu nyum g gbenn yaa youg, k u nyiɛ nyum n, g polu po luod, u sua g Yendu Fuom jiid nyan lanjelg nyan u po.
40003017	K b gbad g niɛlu nne nyiɛ polu po g maad: « U ne tie n bija i, n pal kɔn u po bonciɛnn. N tug n buam kul g tien u ninŋ. »
40004001	G Foŋanm gad yen Yiesu tinkuonŋ n ninŋ, g Sitaan ń bign’o.
40004002	G Yiesu lol mɔb yentuna piinna yen nyiɛd piinna g kom ji tan suol’o.
40004003	L youg g Sitaan ji nagn g maad’o: « A gii tie Yendu Bija ŋan te tana ne ń kpand jied. »
40004004	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Yendu Kadaaɔg maad g jied kua kaa bu te g nil ń gii mɔg miɛl, maam nba nya Yendu mɔb n mɔ be. »
40004005	L puol po g Sitaan tug’o g gad yen’o Serusalɛm g daan don’o jaanddeciɛɔnŋ yul po,
40004006	g maad’o: « A gii tie Yendu Bija, ŋan yug g jiid, g dugn Yendu Kadaaɔg maad g Yendu bu te u malɛg‑nba ń tebn g gabl’a, g daa ŋaa baa a tital ń tuud tann. »
40004007	G Yiesu maad’o: « L kadaaɔg n i, k l biɛ diɛn k a kan bign Yonmdaan, a Yendu. »
40004008	G Sitaan biɛ tug’o g gad g don’o jual nba kped po, g ŋɔn’o ŋanduna doi kul yen lan yab g biɛ ŋan nand,
40004009	g maad’o: « N bu te’a l kul ne, l gii tie k a gbaan g pug’n. »
40004010	Lann i g Yiesu maad’o: « Sud ne, fin Sitaan, g dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: “ A baa pug Yonmdaan a Yendu kua i, g biɛ dond wano kukua. ” »
40004011	L youg u, g Sitaan sied g ŋaa’ɔg. G Yendu malɛg‑nba nagn Yiesu buol g tien wan bua yal.
40004012	B bo suol San g luon’o. Yiesu n gbad k b suol San, k u nyiɛ l doug n g gad Galile.
40004013	U ji g kal Nasarɛt. U gad g kal doug nne ninŋ k l be mɔgl kunŋ, k b yi Kafarnawunm, Sabulɔnn yen Nɛftali tinŋ n ninŋ.
40004014	L bo tien nnyan g Yendu sogni Esaayi n bo maad yal ń fid g tien yen mɔni:
40004015	« Sabulɔnn yen Nɛftali yab, yab kua g kpiɛ Galile mɔgl Suurdɛn bɔnpuol po, yab g tie Suif‑nba n kua naan po.
40004016	Yab nba daan be bunbɔnn n la yinyiem nba yab ; yinyiem baal g fand yab nba daan kal kuum bunbɔnn n. »
40004017	L youg u g Yiesu ji cil g muand g maad: « Ŋaa man i tuonbiid g lebd i binbem, Yendu bal nag o. »
40004018	Yiesu bo sonm Galile mɔgl kunŋ i g tan la nil yen u ninja, lan tie Simɔn, yua k b yi’ug Piɛr yen u ninja Andre k b lunn janbaaɔnŋ mɔgl n. B bo tie jansuola i.
40004019	G Yiesu maad’b: « I ŋua’n man, n bu te yin ŋaa jansuolu g ji gii taand niib i, ban gii ŋua’n. »
40004020	L youg mɔno k b ŋaa b janbaaɔnŋ g ji ŋua’ɔg.
40004021	Yiesu n sonm g gad liig waam, k u la jalua yen u ninja, lan tie Sebede bid, Saak yen u ninja San, k b be ŋadunŋ n yen b baa Sebede g ŋanmd b janbaand. G Yiesu yiin’m.
40004022	L youg mɔno k b mɔ nyɔl b baa yen ŋadunŋ g ji ŋua’ɔg.
40004023	Yiesu bo waa Galile dingbana kul g tund niib b tintaann died n g muand Yendu bal Laabamann, g paagd yiɛnbuoli kul yen cicagdanm kul.
40004024	K u sann duo Siiri doug n kul. K b baad yen u buol niib nba yiɛl yiɛlbuoli kul, yab g sanpola ŋua’b, yab baa tinŋ yen yab k b gbannand kpe, k u paagd b kul.
40004025	G niib bonciɛnn ji nya Galile, Dekapol, Serusalɛm, Suude yen Suurdɛn bɔnpuol g ŋua’ɔg ban ban ban.
40005001	Yiesu n la l niwulug, k u duo jual po g kal, k u ŋuantieb nagn u buol.
40005002	K u gaal maam g ji cil g tund’b g maad:
40005003	« Yab jiind b kua, g biɛ dug Yendu po, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn banm n tie Yendu diem yab.
40005004	Yab kal yen ninsiid pamann tie b yal i, g dugn Yendu tan bu fiɛl b ninsiid.
40005005	Yab mɔg panyiil, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn Yendu tan bu cab banm i tinŋ.
40005006	Yab pala kɔn k ban gii tuag mamɔni sɔnu, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn Yendu tan bu cab’b sɔnu.
40005007	Yab jie niib ninbaaɔg, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn Yendu tan bu jie b mɔ ninbaaɔg.
40005008	Yab tie papiendanm, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn b tan bu la Yendu.
40005009	Yab kpaan laafiɛ yen dɔnnu niib po, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn Yendu tan baa yi banm i u bid.
40005010	Yab tuag mamɔni sɔnu k b yen ŋɔnŋ’b fala l po, pamann tie b yal i, g dugn banm n tie Yendu diem yab.
40005011	B gii sugd’i, g ŋɔnŋ’i fala, g fa faaɔg g maad mabiid nba kul i po g dugn n po, pamann tie i yal i.
40005012	I be man pamann n, gii kpanm, g dugn i nyuad tan baa yab Yendu ŋaag. Yab bo liid’i, g tie Yendu sogni‑nba, b bo cagn’m nnyan i.
40005013	I tie nyan yaalm nyan i, ŋanduna niib kul po. Yaalm manu gii gbenn i, b bu tug bɛ i g guan g manŋ’o i ? L ji g mɔg siɛl yaa buam. L tie k ban lu’ug cincann i niib ń gii ŋmaad l po.
40005014	Yinm n tie ŋanduna yinyiem. Siɛl kan fid g legn doug nba be jual po.
40005015	Sua mɔ kan son fidl g cibn bobl n. B tu son fidl g tuan’o naan k l baa so g fand ŋaag yab kul i.
40005016	I mɔ yaa yinyiem ń gii fand niib, k ban fid g la i tuonŋana, gii dond i Baa nba be polu po.
40005017	Daa mali man k n baal k n piin Moyis kadaaɔg yen Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg kaa. N g baal k n piin kaa, n baal k min ŋanm g ŋɔn lan bual nand i.
40005018	Yen mɔni, n maad’i. Polu yen tinŋ gii bua lan wai nand Moyis kadaaɔg n nuan, baa diɛnbig kan piin, k ban bo diɛn bona nba kul g tien.
40005019	Yua g cɔln Yendu Mɔmaam ne ninŋ bonyenn, baa bonbig, g ŋɔnŋ lieb k ban mɔ ń daa cɔln, wano n bu juod Yendu diem n. Ama yua cɔln Yendu Mɔmaam kul, g ŋɔnŋ lieb k ban gii tie nnyan, wano n baa tie nigbenŋl Yendu diem n.
40005020	N maad’i, i bontitied gii g ŋan g cie Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Farisiɛn-nba, i kan kua Yendu diem n.
40005021	I gbad k b bo maad t yaajanm: “ A kan kpi nil. G nil gii kpii u lua, b bu gad yen’o buuddanm buol. ”
40005022	Min nuan maad’i: yua gii ben pal u ninja po, l danŋ k ban gad yen’o buuddanm buol. Nil gii sugd u ninja k u tie fam b bu gad yen’o Suif‑nba buuddanm buol. Nil gii maad u ninja k u tie yukpienn, b bu lu’ug muu nba so g kan junn n ninŋ.
40005023	A gii baal salg binbindl buol g bu yid Yendu salg, g tiɛd k a ninja mɔg maam yen’a,
40005024	ŋan ŋaa a salg l binbindl buol, g gad fin yen a ninja ń daan manŋ o, ŋan fid g guan g yid Yendu salg.
40005025	Fin yen nil gii mɔg maam, k i yeg g saa buuddaan buol, ŋan tuod yin gbad i lieb maam g sua k i daa paa sɔnu po, wan tan daa gad yen’a buuddaan buol, k wan te sijenm ń luon’a.
40005026	Yen mɔni n maad’a, a gii ŋaa k b luon’a l buol, a kan nya saa yen youg nba k a bu pa l kul, g kan tenn baa kuug.
40005027	I gbad k b bo maad: “ A kan dua yen nil ŋaapuo. ”
40005028	Min nuan maad’i: Yua gii nyuand puo k u yam kua l puo n ninŋ, u dua yen’o u pal n ninŋ n nyan.
40005029	A nuujendu ninbinn n gii te k a tie biid, ŋan kpigd’o g lu g dugn a gbannand bɔgyenn gii g be, lann n su yen a gbanu kul ń gii be, ban tan lu’a muu nba kan junn n ninŋ.
40005030	A nuujendu n gii te k a tie biid, ŋan jiɛl l nuu g lu, g dugn a gbannand bɔgyenn gii g be, lann n su yen a gbanu kul ń gii be, ban tan lu’a muu nba kan junn n ninŋ.
40005031	B biɛ bo maad: “ Jua nba nyan u ŋaapuo, wan te’og kadaaɔg nba ŋɔn k u nyan’o. ”
40005032	Min nuan maad’i: Jua nba nyan u ŋaapuo k l g tie cunconm po, l puo gii gad g dua yen jafan, u kuan u ŋaapuo cunconm n ninŋ n nyan. Jua nba kuan puo nba k u sal nyan’o, u mɔ tien cunconm n nyan.
40005033	I biɛ gbad k b bo maad t yaajanm: “ A kan maad maam g pol Yendu g ban k a fa faaɔg. K a gii pol Yendu k a bu tien yal ŋan tien. ”
40005034	Min nuan maad’i: Daa polg man palb. Daa polg man polu yen tinŋ, g dugn polu tie Yendu n kaal naan g bu buud i,
40005035	g tinŋ mɔ tie u taa‑ŋmaa-buol. Biɛ daa polg man Serusalɛm sann po mɔ, g dugn Serusalɛm tie Yendu Badciɛn doug u.
40005036	Biɛ daa puon a yul g pol, g dugn a kan fid g te baa a yuyeonŋ ń penn g bual lan bɔnn.
40005037	I maam n ninŋ, i gii ban g yal tie mɔni, yin yed k l tie mɔni, i gii ban g yal tie faaɔg mɔ, yin yed k l tie faaɔg, yin ji maad yal g pugn kul nyiɛ Bonbiildaan buol i.
40005038	I gbad k b bo maad g nil gii kpigd u lua ninbinn, l dagd k ban kpigd u mɔ yaa ninbinn ; g nil gii pua g fegd u lua nyinn, l dagd k ban pua g fegd u mɔ yaa nyinn.
40005039	Min nuan maad’i: Daa kɔn man yen tondanm. Nil gii peb’a nuujendu kpiɛnu, ŋan cab’o nuuganŋ kpiɛnu mɔ wan peb.
40005040	Nil gii bua bu yen’a g fiel a liɛdbig, ŋan cab’o a liɛdgbenŋl mɔ.
40005041	Nil gii niin’a k a tug tugl g sonm g gad naan, ŋan tug g sonm l fagnu munle.
40005042	Yua miɛl’a ŋan te’og, yua bua k a kpend’o bonn ŋan daa bel’o.
40005043	I biɛ gbad k b bo maad: “ A baa bua a buolu n yab, g daa bua a ninnanda nublu. ”
40005044	Min nuan maad’i: I bua man i ninnanda. G biɛ gii miɛd Yendu bonŋana yab tie’i tonu po.
40005045	Nnyan i k i bu fid g ŋɔn k i tie i Baa nba be polu po bid, wano nba te g yendu pud tondanm yen nimɔnm po, g te g taag baa mamɔnmaada po yen nibiid po.
40005046	I gii bua yab nba bua i kua, i bu la bɛ nyuad i ? Yab gaan lonpo mɔ g tie nnyan kaa aa ?
40005047	I gii ŋanm g fuond i ninjanm kua, n liɛ yin tie yal nba k l cie lieb i ? Buolfanu yab nba g ŋua Yendu, b mɔ g tie nnyan kaa aa ?
40005048	Lann yinm ń daa mɔg siɛl yaa biid, nyan i Baa nba be polu po n g mɔg siɛl yaa biid nyan.
40006001	Suol man i kua, g daa ŋɔnŋ i kua niib nunŋ n k yinm n ŋua Yendu. I gii tie nnyan, i kan la siɛl yaa nyuad i Baa nba be polu po buol.
40006002	Lann, a gii pii taladdaan paab, ŋan daa waa g muand kaannaa kul. Munafigidanm n tie nand n nyan tintaann died n yen sɔnjala po, g niib ń gii pag’b. Yen mɔni, n maad’i banm la b nyuad n nyan.
40006003	Fin nuan gii bu pi talg paab, a nuuganŋ ń daa ban a nuujendu n suun yal ;
40006004	a Baa Yendu nba nyuan k a wuon g pii’ug nyan tan bu ŋmiɛn’a.
40006005	I tu gii jaand, yin daa tie nyan munafigidanm nyan. Banm tu bua ban sed tintaann died n, lann i kaa sɔnkadtaana n i, gii jaand, niib ń gii nyuan’m. Yen mɔni, n maad’i, banm la b nyuad n nyan.
40006006	Fin nuan gii bua jaand ŋan kua a dieog n g luon a gann, g jaand g miɛl a Baa Yendu nba be l buol. Wano kua nba nyuan’a nyan bu gaal a jaandi.
40006007	I tu gii jaand yin daa maad maam bonciɛnn nyan buolfanu yab nyan. Banm mali g maam bonciɛnn n bu te ban la yal k b miɛd.
40006008	Yinm ń daa tie nyan banm nyan g dugn i Baa Yendu tuod g ban yin bua yal k i daa g miɛl’o mɔno.
40006009	Yin tu bu jaand nand n ne: T Baa nba be polu po, A sann ń do.
40006010	A diem ń pund. A buam ń tien tinŋ n nyan a ŋaag n nyan.
40006011	Te’ti dinne yaa jied.
40006012	Di sugl t biid po nyan tin mɔ n di sugl yab nba biil’ti nyan.
40006013	Daa ŋaa tin baa bignn n ama nyan’ti bonbiil n.
40006014	Yen mɔni, i gii di sugl niib po, i Baa nba be polu po mɔ bu di sugl i biid po.
40006015	Ama i gii g di sugl niib po, i Baa Yendu mɔ kan di sugl i biid po.
40006016	I tu gii lol mɔb yin daa ŋmid nunŋ nyan munafigidanm nyan. Banm n tu nyɔl b kua, g kan ŋanm b nunŋ g niib ń bann k b lol mɔb. Yen mɔni, n maad’i banm la b nyuad n nyan.
40006017	Fin nuan gii lol mɔb, ŋan ŋanm g cad a yud, g ŋanm a nunŋ po,
40006018	g daa ŋɔnŋ niib kaa k a lol mɔb, a Baa Yendu kukua nba nyuan’a nyan bu ŋmiɛn’a a mɔlolu nyuad.
40006019	Daa kpaan man mɔgm bonciɛnn g kulg i kua tinŋ po ne, naan g kuutuul yen ninnani bu mua, naan g naayiga bu jan.
40006020	I bilg man i mɔgm Yendu ŋaag, naan g kuutuul yen ninnani kan mua, g naayiga mɔ biɛ kan jan.
40006021	K l maa a mɔgm n be naan nba, a maalm mɔ be l buol i.
40006022	Ninbinn n tie gbannand fidl. L gii tie k a ninbinn ŋan, a gbannand kul baa be yinyiem n ninŋ i.
40006023	A ninbinn gii g ŋan, a gbannand kul baa be bunbɔnn n i. Yinyiem nba be a ninŋ gii te bunbɔnn i, l bunbɔnn ji baa tie nle ?
40006024	Sua kan fid gii ŋua canbaa‑nba banle. U baa bua yend maam i, u kan gii bua lua nublu. U bu tug u kua g cab yend i gii nund lua. I kan fid gii ŋua Yendu g biɛ ŋua ligli mɔ.
40006025	L po n te k n maad’i: Daa tun g mali man i miɛl po, yin baa di yal, g nyu yal ; biɛ daa tun g mali man i gbannand po yin baa liɛ yal. Miɛl g cie jied ii, bii gbannand n g cie tiɛd i ?
40006026	Diid man nuani. I la k b buul bii b yend i, bii b ŋuund dii bunbual n i ? I Baa nba be polu po g dinŋ’b ii ? I g cie’b ii ?
40006027	I ninŋ ne, ŋmaa i, k u maalciɛnm po, u bu fid g te u miɛl ń fagd baa waam nne g pugn i ?
40006028	Bɛ po i k i mali tiɛliɛkad po i ? Diid man muaɔg n tiidi n tien puug k l ŋan nand. B g suun tuonn, b biɛ g luug tiɛd mɔ.
40006029	Ama n maad’i, g bad Salomɔn nba bo mɔg bonciɛnn mɔno bo g ban g liɛ tiɛd k l ŋan nyan tiidi ne ninŋ baa tiyenŋ nyan.
40006030	Yendu gii lanŋ muaɔg n tiidi nba be dinne g wonn k b won bu cua g kuun muu n ninŋ, bɛ po i k u kan lan yinm nifoi i ? I dindann g yab baa waam nne.
40006031	Lann daa fabn man g tua t baa di bɛ i, t baa nyu bɛ i, lann i kaa t baa liɛ bɛ i ?
40006032	Yab nba g dug Yendu po n mɔg l yanbani. I Baa nba be polu po ban k l bona kul ne tie payiɛnu i po.
40006033	Yinm nuan ń cind g tuo Yendu bal gii tuag u mɔmaam sɔnu u, g yal nba tenn kul, u bu pugn’i.
40006034	Daa fabn man wonn po. Ŋaa man wonn ń baal yen u finfabni. Daal kul yeg yen u fala i.
40007001	Daa jalg man sua, Yendu kan jalg i mɔ.
40007002	Yin jalg niib nand, b tan bu jalg i mɔ nnyan i. Yal po te k i jalg lieb nyan, l po n bu te Yendu ń jalg i mɔ.
40007003	Bɛ po i k a nyuan muanu nba be a ninja ninbinn n ninŋ, g yen g la daaɔg nba paan a yal n ninŋ i ?
40007004	Lann i kaa, a bu tien nle i g maad a ninja, k wan ŋaa k a nyan muanu u ninbinn n, g daaɔg yen paan a yaa yal n i ?
40007005	Fin munafigidaan ne, daa pand daaɔg nba paan a ninbinn n ninŋ o, nnyan, a bu ŋanm g nyuand g fid g nyan muanu nba be a ninja ninbinn n ninŋ.
40007006	Daa tugd man bona nba tie Yendu yal g tien sangbanni, i gii tien nnyan b bu jun’i ni. Biɛ daa tugd man i laani nba k b tag yen wula g lunn duoli nintual n. I gii tien nnyan b bu ŋmaa ŋmaa l po i.
40007007	I miɛd man, b bu te’i. I kpaan man, i bu la. I kuog man gann, b bu luod i po.
40007008	K l maa yua nba miɛd kul, b bu te’og, yua nba kpaan kul bu la, yua nba kuo gann, b bu luod wan kua.
40007009	I ninŋ ne, ŋmaa i k u big bu miɛl’o kpanu wan te’og tann i ?
40007010	Lann i kaa k u bu miɛl’o janŋ, wan te’og waaɔg u ?
40007011	Yinm nba tie nibiid gii ban k yin te i bid bonŋana, l bu tien nle i, k i Baa nba be polu po ji kan te yab miɛd’o i ?
40007012	I gii bua g niib ń gii tie yal nba i po, yin mɔ ń gii tie’b lann. Moyis kadaaɔg yen Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg n yed yal n nyan.
40007013	Kua man dimɔb nba yiɛb buol, g dugn dimɔb nba yaln yen sɔnu nba piɛ, saa g kua tudm n i. Niib bonciɛnn yen tɔg l sɔnu i.
40007014	Ama dimɔb nba yiɛb yen sɔnu nba nyid n saa g kua miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn buol. Yab yen tɔg l sɔnu g yab.
40007015	Suol man i kua yen yab fa faaɔg k b tie Yendu sogni‑nba. B tu nagn i buol g tie suoo nyan pebid nyan i, ama b pala n, k b yen biɛ nyan fuabɔjad nyan.
40007016	B bontitied n bu ŋɔn’i ban tie yab. Kunkontiig ban g lon sinsaba aa, bii kunkonbɔnn n ban g lon kinkana i ?
40007017	Tiŋanŋ n luon luanŋana g tibiiug mɔ luon luanbiid.
40007018	Tiŋanŋ kan fid g lon luanbiid, nyan tibiiug mɔ ń kan fid g lon luanŋana nyan.
40007019	Tiig nba g luon luanŋana kul, b bu cua’ɔg u g lu muu n ninŋ.
40007020	Lann b bontitied n bu ŋɔn’i ban tie yab.
40007021	L g tie yab nba yi’n Yonmdaan, Yonmdaan kaa bu kua Yendu ŋaag n. Yab nba tie n Baa nba be polu po buam, banm n bu kua u ŋaag n.
40007022	Buud daal niib bonciɛnn bu maad’n: “ Yonmdaan, Yonmdaan, a sann po kaa k t daan sɔgn Yendu maam ii ? A sann po kaa k t daan biel sanpola aa ? A sann po kaa k t daan tien yaalidug bonciɛnn ii ? ”
40007023	L youg u k n bu maad’b: Sud man ne, min g ban’i palb, yinm tuonbiiddanm ne.
40007024	Lann yua nba cenŋ lanbona nba k n maad ne g tug g sun yenn tuonn, wano tie nyan nil nba bo ceg g maa u ŋaag tantiɛɔg po nyan i.
40007025	G taag tan baa, g nyunmɔna yen faalu baal g yil ŋaag po, l ŋaag yen g baa, g dugn u fiɛgl bo sie tantiɛɔg po i.
40007026	Ama yua nba cenŋ lanbona nba k n maad ne, g g tug g sun yenn tuonn, wano tie nyan nil nba bo g mɔg yam, g maa u ŋaag tanbiini po nyan i.
40007027	G taag tan baa, g nyunmɔna yen faalu baal g yil ŋaag po, k l ŋaag baa sa‑la‑la-la g g tenn baa dikpinyenn. »
40007028	Yiesu n maad maad l lanbona g gbenn, k l yaa g lid niwulug nba bo be l buol nyan.
40007029	G dugn u bo g tund’b nyan b Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda nyan kaa. U bo diɛ u yul po yikod i g tund’b.
40008001	G Yiesu nyiɛ jual po g jiid, g niwulug ŋuan’o.
40008002	G gbaadl nne nagn g gbaan u nintual n, g maad: « Yonmdaan, a gii bua, a bu fid g paag’n. »
40008003	G Yiesu tand nuu g sii’ug g maad: « N bua, paag ! » L youg mɔno k u gbaadm gbenn, k u paag.
40008004	G Yiesu maad’o: « Suol a mɔb, g daa ŋaa sua ń gbad. Ama, gad g salg-yidkua ń la’a, k a te’og salg nba g Moyis bo maad g gbaadl gii paag wan te nyan, k ban bann k a paag. »
40008005	G Yiesu kua Kafarnawunm doug n, g Rom doug n sijenm ciɛn nne nagn’o, g balm’o,
40008006	g maad: « Canbaa, n tuonsunn yiɛl g dua ŋaag, g lebn g kan fid g fiil. »
40008007	G Yiesu maad’o: « N bu gad g daan paag’o. »
40008008	G sijenm ciɛn ŋmiɛn’o: « Canbaa, n g dagd yen ŋan kua n ŋaag n ninŋ ; maad lanbonyenn kua, n tuonsunn bu paag.
40008009	N mɔ mɔg canbaa‑nba g cɔln’m, g mɔg sijenm nba cɔln’n mɔ. N tu maad yend: Gad, wan gad, g maad lua: Baal, wan baal, g maad n yonm: Tien ne, wan tien. »
40008010	Yiesu n gbad u maam, k l yaa g lid’o k u maad yab nba bo ŋua’ɔg nyan k nne: « Yen mɔni, n maad’i, n g ban g la nil Israyɛl buolu n mɔno, k u dug n po nne.
40008011	N maad’i faa, niib bonciɛnn tan bu nya hal puol yen nintual, g baal g kal g di jaanm yen Abraham yen Isaak yen Sakɔb Yendu ŋaag n.
40008012	Yab g Yendu yen bo kpiɛ g lugd’b k ban kua u ŋaag n, b bu lu banm i cincann po bunbɔnn n ninŋ, naan k b baa buud g ŋman nyina. »
40008013	G Yiesu ji guan g maad sijeciɛn ŋann: « I kun, k lan tien nyan a dindann n bual nand nyan. » L youg mɔno k u tuonsunn paag.
40008014	L puol po g Yiesu gad Piɛr ŋaag, g baal g sua g Piɛr ŋaapuo naa dua g yiɛl k u gbanu ton.
40008015	G Yiesu sii u nuu k u gbanu sɔnŋ, k u fiil g gaal’o, g cand’o.
40008016	L daal daajuoug k b baal yen niib bonciɛnn g sanpola ŋua’b. G Yiesu bel g yaan l sanpola yen u mɔmaam paalu g biɛ paag yiɛnm kul.
40008017	K l tien nyan Yendu sogni Esaayi n bo maad nand nyan: « U nyan fala t po, g gaal t yiɛli kul g tug. »
40008018	Yiesu n la g niib bonciɛnn kaan g lind’o, k u maad u ŋuantieb: « T puod man bɔngbanliel po. »
40008019	G Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanband nne nagn g maad’o: « Canbaa, n baa ŋua’a ŋan saa naan kul. »
40008020	G Yiesu maad: « Nantantoba mɔg fali, g nuani mɔg tedd, Nifosaal Bija nuan yen g mɔg wan bu kpagn yul naan g fuod. »
40008021	K u ŋuantieb siign jalua nne maad’o: « Yonmdaan, cab’n k n daa kun g daan pii n baa o. »
40008022	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « I ŋua’n g ŋaa g kpienm ń pii b kpienm. »
40008023	Yiesu n maad nnyan k u ji kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ k u ŋuantieb ŋuan’o.
40008024	Ban saa, g faalu nne kpid mɔgl po yen paalu, g nyunguona tenn waam nne yen lan yil ŋadunŋ po. L sua g Yiesu nuan guand i.
40008025	K u ŋuantieb nagn u buol g find’o g maad: « Yonmdaan, fiel’ti g nyum bu di’ti. »
40008026	K u maad’b: « Laabaal k i jie jiwaani i ? I dindann g yab baa waam nne. » G fiil g tiɛn faalu yen mɔgl po. K l kul te silb.
40008027	K l yaa g lid’b, k b ji maad: « Jua ne tie ŋmaa i, g faalu yen mɔgl mɔno cɔlm’o i ? »
40008028	Wan puod bɔngbanliel po, g kua Gadara doug n, l sua g niib banle nne be g sanpola ŋua’b, k b be kakula n. L niib bo biɛ paaa. L po n te g nil bo g paand pal g tɔg l sɔnu. Ban yaan la Yiesu k b nyiɛ kakula n g cend’o.
40008029	K l niib ji yign g maad’o: « Yendu Bija, bɛ n be tinm yen fin siign ninŋ i ? A baal k ŋan ŋɔn’ti fala yaa aa, g youg daa g pund mɔno o ? »
40008030	L sua g duoli be l buol g yab, g waa g ŋman muaɔg, g g ŋanm g fag yen’m.
40008031	G sanpola ji miɛd Yiesu sugl g maad: « A gii bel’ti ŋan ŋaa tin gad g ŋuan duoli ne. »
40008032	G Yiesu maad’b: « I saa man. » K b ŋaa niib g ŋuan l duoli. L youg, baal g diid, g duoli kul nyiɛ jual po g san g jiid g baa mɔgl n, g biɛl b kul nyum n.
40008033	G yab bo kpaa duoli san g gad doug n, g maad niib ban la yal kul, yen yal bo tien niib banle nba g sanpola bo ŋua’b nyan.
40008034	L youg mɔno g doug n niib kul nyiɛ g togi Yiesu. Ban yaan la’ɔg k b balm’o k wan nya b tinŋ n.
40009001	G Yiesu kua ŋadunŋ n, g puod mɔgl, g lebd g kun u doug n.
40009002	K b baal yen jua nne u buol, g yiɛlu kua’ɔg, k u nui yen u titala kul kpe k u dua liɛnŋ po. Yiesu n la k b dug u po bonciɛnn k u maad l jua: « N big, daa jie siɛl, a biid piin o. »
40009003	L youg g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda nne ji mali: « U ne sugd Yendu i. »
40009004	G Yiesu bann b maalm, g bual’b: « Bɛ po n te k i mɔg l maalbiid i ?
40009005	Lanbona nle ne ninŋ, n liɛ yal maadu paa i, a biid piin bii fiil g sonm i ?
40009006	N bu ŋɔn’i, k yin bann g Nifosaal Bija mɔg paalu tinŋ po ne, g bu fid g piin niib biid. » L youg k u maad yua k u nui yen titala bo kpe nyan: « Fiil, tug a liɛnŋ gii kun ! »
40009007	K u fiil g kun.
40009008	Niwulug n la nnyan g jiwaani kua’b k b ji pag Yendu yen wan tie nifoi yaa paalu nba ne.
40009009	Yiesu n nyiɛ l buol g pend g la jua nne k b yi’ug Matieog, k u kal u tuonn n, ban pa lonpo naan. G Yiesu maad’o: « I ŋua’n ! » K u fiil g ŋua’ɔg.
40009010	L puol po i g Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo kal Matieog ŋaag g di, g yab gaan lonpo yen biiddanm bonciɛnn baal g kal yen’m.
40009011	L sua g Farisiɛn-nba mɔ be l buol. Ban la nnyan k b bual u ŋuantieb: « I canbaa di yen yab gaan lonpo yen biiddanm, l ŋan ii ? »
40009012	Yiesu n gbad l buali, k u maad: « Yab mɔg laafiɛ kaa kpaan dogda, yiɛnm n kpaan’o.
40009013	Gad man g kpaan Yendu maam ne niimn lan diɛn naan g maad: “ N bua niib ń gii jie b lieb ninbaaɔg u, n g bua ban gii yid’n salg kaa. ” » G Yiesu ji guan g maad lann i: « N g baal k n yiin nimɔnm kaa, n baal k n yiin biiddanm i. »
40009014	Lann i g San Nyunwultua ŋuantieb nagn g bual Yiesu: « L tien nle i k tinm yen Farisiɛn-nba paa g lolg mɔb, k a ŋuantieb nuan g lolg i ? »
40009015	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Yab nba k b yiin’m puokuanu jaanm bu fid gii kal yen pabɔnn, yaa youg nba g puodaan daa be yen’m ii ? Yen bann man g youg baad g puopaanŋ sal tan kan gii be yen’m, l youg u k b baa lolg mɔb.
40009016	Sua kan tug cabpaann g lib tiɛdudunŋ. U gii tien nnyan cabpaann ŋann bu te tiɛdudunŋ ń ŋanm g pad g pugn i, lonn n biɛ ji ŋanm gii yab g cie cincinn yal.
40009017	Sua biɛ g piɛgd dikaam gband-lenkpela n ninŋ mɔ. Lann i kaa daam tan gii bie, l gband-lenkpela bu pud i, daam ń yad, l lena mɔ ń biɛl. B tu piɛg dikaam gband-lenpaana n ninŋ i, nnyan, siɛl kan biɛl. »
40009018	Yiesu n maad’b nnyan, g nigbenŋl nne baal g gbaan u nintual n g maad: « N bipuo daa l kpe mɔlane i ; a gii baal g tug a nuu g maan u po, u bu guan g fuod. »
40009019	G Yiesu fiil yen u ŋuantieb g ŋua’ɔg.
40009020	L sua g puo nne wuul faad k l g kɔlg piig yen bina ŋanle n nyan. Yiesu n saa, k l puo nagn u puol po g sii u liɛdl mɔgbann,
40009021	g dugn u bo mali u pal n, k u gii sii baa u liɛdl, k u bu paag i.
40009022	G Yiesu gbeg g la’ɔg g maad: « N bipuo, daa jie siɛl, ŋan yaan dug n po nyan, a la laafiɛ n nyan. » L youg mɔno k l puo paag.
40009023	Yiesu n pund nigbenŋl nba bo yiin’o nyan ŋaag, g la yelpieba yen niwulug k b nyɔgl,
40009024	k u maad’b: « I nya man, sipaanbig ne g kpe kaa, u guand i. » K l niib ji cil g laa’ɔg.
40009025	Ban bel g nyan l niwulug, g Yiesu kua g suol l sipaanbig nuu, k u fiil.
40009026	K l laabaal yad l doug n kul.
40009027	Yiesu n nyiɛ l buol g paan g saa, g juanm banle ŋua’ɔg g ta g maad: « Dafiid Bija, a kan jie’ti ninbaaɔg uu ? »
40009028	Yiesu n pund ŋaag, k l juanm banle nagn u buol, k u bual’b: « I mali k n bu fid g te yin nyuand ii ? » K b tuo, g maad: « Ɛɛn, t Yonmdaan. »
40009029	L youg k u sii b ninbina g maad: « Lan tien nyan i dindann n bual nand nyan. »
40009030	K b ninbina nyuand. G Yiesu ŋanm g kpaa’b k ban daa ŋaa sua ń gbad.
40009031	Ama ban nyiɛ yaa youg, k b waa g muand l laabaal l doug n kul.
40009032	Ban bo nya yaa youg, k b baal yen muug nne Yiesu buol g sanpola ŋua’ɔg.
40009033	K u bel l sanpola g muug ji fid g maad. K l yaa g lid niwulug nba bo be l buol k b ji maad: « T daa g ban g la yal ne Israyɛl doug n ninŋ. »
40009034	G Farisiɛn-nba nuan yen maad k u diɛ Sitaan paalu i, yua tie sanpola bad, g biel sanpola.
40009035	Yiesu bo saa dociɛnd n yen dingbankunkogi n ninŋ kul, g tund niib b tintaann died n, g muand Yendu bal Laabamann, g paagd yiɛnbuoli kul yen cicagdanm kul.
40009036	Yiesu bo tu la niwulug, ninbaaɔg n suol’o, g dugn b pala bo wad, k b naan nyan pei nba g mɔg pekpaal nyan.
40009037	K u tan maad u ŋuantieb: « I la ii ? Bonkukuod bie g yab g tuonsunna yen g yab.
40009038	Lann, miɛl man kpaabdaan, k wan sun tuonsunna u kpaab n ninŋ. »
40010001	G Yiesu yiin u ŋuantieb piig yen banle g tie’b paalu k ban gii biel sanpola, g paagd yiɛnbuoli kul, yen cicagdanm kul.
40010002	Yiesu n bo sun u ŋuantieb piig yen banle nba sana n ne: Cincinn yua n tie Simɔn, yua k b bo yi’ug Piɛr, yen u ninja Andre ; Sebede bid, lan tie Saak yen u ninja San ;
40010003	Filiip yen Bartelemi ; Toma yen Matieog yua daa bo gaan lonpo ; Alfe bija Saak, yen Tade ;
40010004	Simɔn, yua nba bo kɔn u doug po, yen Suuda Iskariyɔt yua nba bo tan kuad Yiesu.
40010005	Piig yen niib banle nba g Yiesu bo sun’m n nyan, g maad’b nne: « Daa saa man yab g tie Suif‑nba kuann n, g biɛ daa kua Samaritɛn-nba doi n.
40010006	I saa man Israyɛl buolu n niib po, banm n tie nyan pei nba bod nyan.
40010007	I gii saa, yin gii muand g Yendu bal nag o.
40010008	I paagd man yiɛnm, gii yied kpienm, gii paagd gbaada. I biel man sanpola g yaand’b. N pii’i ni, i g daa kaa, mɔ ń gii piin man g daa gaan siɛl.
40010009	Tuonsunn kan luol u jied, lann, i gii saa yin daa kpaan wula, g biɛ daa ŋuun siɛl yaa ligli mɔ. Daa diɛ man liɛdliel, daa bal man kɔl, g daa kpaan taacaad, g biɛ daa kub lanbann mɔ.
40010011	I gii pund dingbanbig n lann i kaa dingbanciɛɔnŋ nba ninŋ, yin bual g la nimɔn ŋaag, g gad gii be l buol saa yen daal nba k i bu pend.
40010012	I gii kua l ŋaag n yin gaal l ŋaag yab mɔgaalŋani.
40010013	B gii tie nimɔnm, i mɔgaalŋani ń gii be yen’m. B gii g tie nimɔnm mɔ, i mɔgaalŋani ń guan i po.
40010014	B gii g gaal’i, g biɛ g cenŋ i maam yin nya l ŋaag n lann i kaa l doug n, g pid pid i titala po tangulunŋ.
40010015	Yen mɔni, n maad’i, Yendu n bu bu niib kul yaa daal, Sɔdɔm yen Gomɔr yab yal baa su yen l doug n yab.
40010016	Ŋanm g cenŋ man ; n bu sun’i nyan pebid nyan i fuabɔjad sinsiign ninŋ. I ceg man nyan wai nyan, gii tie suoo nyan lanjeli nyan.
40010017	Suol man i kua yen niib, g dugn b bu gad yen’i buuddanm buol, ban suol’i g pua’i yen naapuna b tintaann died n.
40010018	N yaa po i k b bu gad yen’i dougdanm buol yen batieb buol yin kun mɔni n po, banm yen yab g tie Suif‑nba nunŋ n ninŋ.
40010019	Youg nba k b gad yen’i, yin daa bual yin bu maad nand lann i kaa yin bu maad yal kaa, i kan luol yal k i bu maad l youg mɔno.
40010020	G dugn yinm kaa bu maad, i Baa Yendu mɔno n bu ŋɔn’i yal nba k i bu maad.
40010021	Nil tan bu kuad u ninja ban kpi’ug, bibaa ń kuad u big. Bid tan bu fiil g kɔn yen b danm g te ban kpi’b.
40010022	Baa sua tan kan gii bua i nublu g dugn n po. Ama yua bu mind saa yen juog, Yendu bu fiel wano i.
40010023	Doug nba ninŋ k b ŋɔn’i fala, yin san g gad dofanu n. Yen mɔni, n maad’i: I kan waa g tii Israyɛl doi kul g Nifosaal Bija g baal.
40010024	I ban g yua banŋ tuonn kan fid gii cie u canbaa, yonm mɔ kan fid gii cie u yonmdaan.
40010025	Yua banŋ tuonn gii tie nyan u canbaa nyan, g yonm mɔ tie nyan u yonmdaan nyan, l dagd. B yen yiin ŋaagdaan Bɛlsebuul o, b ji bu yiin u ŋaag yab nle i ?
40010026	Lann, daa jie man l niib, g dugn siɛl g wuo g tan kan wuod. Siɛl biɛ g tie ŋasiil g sua tan kan bann.
40010027	N gii maad’i yal nba bunbɔnn n ninŋ, yin maad yensiig n. N gii sɔb g maad’i yal nba, yin maad niib kul ń gbad.
40010028	Daa jie man yab bu kpi nil, g yen kan fid g kpi u nalnŋ. Jie man Yendu, wano n bu fid g te nil nalnŋ yen u gbannand kul ń biɛl muu n ninŋ.
40010029	B g kuad nɔnbid banle g gaan ligli waam nne ii ? Ama b ninŋ ne, baa yend kan baa tinŋ n, l gii g tie i Baa Yendu buam n.
40010030	Yinm nuan, u ban i yud mɔno n ja nand.
40010031	Lann, daa jie man siɛl, g dugn i cie nɔnbid kul.
40010032	Yua nba maad niib nunŋ n, k u tie n yua, n mɔ tan bu maad n Baa nba be polu po nunŋ n k n ban’o ;
40010033	ama yua nba yie k u g tie n yua niib nunŋ n, n mɔ tan bu yie n Baa nba be polu po nunŋ n k n g ban’o.
40010034	Daa mali man k n baal yen manu kaa niib siign tinŋ ne po. N g baal yen manu, n baal yen kunkɔnn i.
40010035	N baal k n paad bijabg yen u baa i, bipuobg yen u naa, puo yen u sal naa.
40010036	Nil naataani mɔno n tan baa tie u ninnanda.
40010037	Yua nba bua u baa lann i kaa u naa g cie’n, u g dagd yen wan te n ŋuantua. Yua nba bua u bija lann i kaa u bipuo g cie’n, u mɔ g dagd yen wan te n ŋuantua.
40010038	Yua nba g tug u dapunpɔnn g ŋua’n, u mɔ biɛ g dagd yen wan te n ŋuantua.
40010039	Yua nba kpaan k wan fiel u miɛl, u bu buon l miɛl. Ama yua nba lu u miɛl g dugn n po, u bu guan g la l miɛl.
40010040	Yua gaal’i, u gaal min i, yua gaal’n mɔ, u gaal yua nba sun’n i.
40010041	Yendu sogni gii baal g nil gaal’o, g dugn u tie Yendu sogni, u bu la Yendu sogni nyuad i. Nimɔn gii baal g nil gaal’o, g dugn u tie nimɔn, u bu la nimɔn nyuad i.
40010042	Yinm, n ŋuantieb, i g tie nigbenŋa kaa, ama yua bu kabl baa nyunsɔnŋm, g te i ninŋ ne yend g dugn u tie n ŋuantua, n maad’i mɔni i, u kan luol u nyuad. »
40011001	Yiesu n ŋɔn u ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann nnyan g gbenn, g fiil g kua doi nba bo kpiɛ l buol nyan g tund niib g muand Yendu Laabamann.
40011002	L youg l sua g San Nyunwultua be dansaldieog n i. Wan gbad g niib maad Kristo tuona po, k u sun u ŋuantieb Yiesu buol k ban bual’o g liɛ,
40011003	wano n tie yua bo bu baal bii, b daa baa guu sua i ?
40011004	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Guan man g daan maad San yin gbad yal g biɛ la yal.
40011005	Juanm nyuand, g wabi sonm, g gbaada paagd, g tuukpaa gbiɛ, g kpienm yied, k b muand tali Laabamann.
40011006	Yab nba kan buon b dindann g dugn n po, pamann tie b yal i. »
40011007	San Nyunwultua ŋuantieb n paan g saa, g Yiesu ji maad niwulug ŋann San Nyunwultua n tie yua: « I gad k yin diid bɛ i tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i ? Galgulnn nba g faalu mign ii ?
40011008	Bii i bo saa g mali k i bu la jua nba liɛ tiɛŋand yaa a ? Yab nba liɛ tiɛŋand be batieb ŋai i.
40011009	I yen gad g bua n sun bɛ i, k yin la Yendu sogni ii ? Yen mɔni, i gad g la Yendu sogni i, ama yin la yua nba nyan, u cie Yendu sogni mɔno.
40011010	U po i g Yendu bo maad u kadaaɔg n: “ N bu sun n tond k wan gaal liig g ŋanm a sɔnu g sua k a baal. ”
40011011	Yen mɔni n maad’i, puob n mal niib nba kul tinŋ n ne, nil daa g be g cie San Nyunwultua. Ama yab tuo Yendu bal ne, b siign yua g tie siɛl mɔno cie San Nyunwultua.
40011012	Lan cil San Nyunwultua youg o, Yendu kaand u bal, ama saa yen mɔlane, jaddanm gbaa k ban bel lieb yen paalu k ban daa tuo l bal.
40011013	Yendu sogni‑nba kul yen Moyis kadaaɔg bo maad Yendu bal po yo, g San tan fid g baal.
40011014	I gii bu tuo g gbad n maam, yin gaal k wano n tie Eli nba bo bu baal.
40011015	Yua mɔg tuba g bu gbad, wan gbad.
40011016	G mɔlane niib ne i, n bu maad bɛ i b po i ? B naan bid nba kal daag n i, g yi b lieb g maad:
40011017	“ T pieb naagbaag, k i g ŋɔ siɛg. K t yin kuyani, k i g mɔ kumɔni. ”
40011018	San baal g paa g lolg mɔb, k b yed g sanpola n ŋua’ɔg.
40011019	G Nifosaal Bija baal g di, g nyu, k b yed k u puol man g kand, k u tie dinyuul i, k u tie lonpogaala yen biiddanm dɔnn i. Ama Yendu yanfuom tuona n ŋɔnŋ k l yanfuom tie mɔni. »
40011020	L youg u g Yiesu ji fu yen niib nba k u bo ŋanm g tien yaalidug bona bonciɛnn b doi n, k b yen g lebd b binbem.
40011021	U bo maad g tua: « Yinm Korasinn yab yen yinm Bɛtsayida yab, fala bu gbad’i. Yaalidug bona nba tien i doug n ne, l bo gii tie Tiir lann i kaa Sidɔn doi n ninŋ i yaa aa, man b liɛ kpalpiɛd, g pug fantam hal youg, g ŋɔn k b ŋaa b tuonbiid o.
40011022	L po n te k n maad’i, buud daal Tiir yen Sidɔn yab yal baa su yen’i.
40011023	K yinm Kafarnawunm yab i, i mali k i bu fid g te i doug sann ń do polu po yaa aa ? Yendu bu jiin i doug hal tinkpiiug n. G dugn yaalidug bona nba tien i doug n ne, bo gii tien Sɔdɔm i yaa aa, man ne l doug daa be yen mɔlane.
40011024	L po n te k n maad’i, buud daal, Sɔdɔm yab yal baa su yen’i. »
40011025	L youg g Yiesu gaal maam g maad: « N Baa, polu yen tinŋ Yonmdaan, n dond’a g tiend’a balg yen ŋan ŋɔn yab g ban siɛl bona nba k a g cab g yanfodanm yen ninfandanm ń bann.
40011026	Ɛɛn n Baa, a buam n i k l tien nnyan.
40011027	N Baa Yendu tie’n paalu bonn kul po. Sua g ban Yendu Bija, u Baa kua i kaa, sua biɛ g ban Baa mɔ, Yendu Bija kua i kaa, yen yua nba g Yendu Bija tuo g ŋɔn’o Yendu.
40011028	Baal man n buol, yinm nba sun tuonpaala, g tug tugkpiɛga g cɔg, n bu gaal’i yin fuod.
40011029	Tuo man g gaal n tugl g tug, g biɛ gaal n mɔmaam tundl, g dugn min n tie pasiɛddaan g biɛ jiind n kua. Baal man n buol, i pala bu sɔnŋ,
40011030	g dugn n tuonn man, n tugl mɔ biɛ g kpai. »
40012001	L bo tie Saaba daal i, g Yiesu pend kpaab n ninŋ g sua dii bie o. G kom suol u ŋuantieb k b ji togd dii g pind g ŋman.
40012002	Farisiɛn-nba n la nnyan, k b maad Yiesu: « Diid, a ŋuantieb suun tuona nba k l g cab g nil ń sun Saaba daal. »
40012003	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « I g lii Yendu Kadaaɔg n, naan buol nba k l diɛn g ŋɔn kom n bo suol Dafiid yen u yegni k b sun yal nba aa ?
40012004	I g lii k u bo kua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ n, g tug salg kpanu k wan yen u yegni ŋman, k l yen bo g cab k wan yen u yegni kul sua ń ŋman ii ? Yab yid Yendu salg kua n bo bu fid g ŋman l kpanu.
40012005	Bii i g lii Moyis kadaaɔg n ninŋ, g Saaba daal, Yendu salg-yidkab nba suun tuonn jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n mɔno tu sun tuonn l daal, k l biɛ g tie k b tien biid ii ?
40012006	Yen mɔni n maad’i, siɛl be ne g yab g cie jaanddeciɛɔnŋ.
40012007	Yendu maad k u bua yab jie b lieb ninbaaɔg u, k u g bua yab yid’o salg kaa, i bo gii gbad maam ne niimn, i bo kan jalg n ŋuantieb k b tien biid, k b yen g biil siɛl.
40012008	Saaba be Nifosaal Bija nuu n i. »
40012009	Yiesu n nyiɛ l buol g gad b tintaann dieog n.
40012010	L sua g jua nne be l tintaann dieog n k u nuu kpe. Ban bo bua k ban jalg’o nyan, k b bual’o: « L cab k ban teb nil Saaba daal ii ? »
40012011	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « I ninŋ ne, ŋmaa n baa mɔg peyeonŋ kua, l pieog ń baa buoug n ninŋ Saaba daal k u kan jiid g nyan’o i ?
40012012	Nifosaal g cie pieog uu ? Lann l cab g nil ń tien ŋanm Saaba daal. »
40012013	L youg g Yiesu maad jua ŋann k wan tand u nuu, k u tand, k l nuu paag g guan g tie nyan nuulieog nyan.
40012014	Farisiɛn-nba n nyiɛ, k b taan g kal g bobn ban bu tien nand g kpi Yiesu.
40012015	Yiesu n bann nnyan, k u nyiɛ l buol g gad siɛl po, g yiɛnm bonciɛnn ŋuan’o, k u paag b kul,
40012016	g kpaa’b k ban daa ŋaa sua ń gbad,
40012017	g Yendu sogni Esaayi n bo maad Yendu lanbona nba ń fid g tien yen mɔni:
40012018	« N tuonsunn nba k n lugd’o n ne, min bua yua, k u mɔ sɔnŋd n pal n nyan. N tan bu te’og n Foŋanm wan ŋɔn niib kul mamɔni sɔnu.
40012019	U tan kan kpaan maam, u biɛ kan gii maad g tand. Nil kan gbad k u maad sɔnjala po.
40012020	U gii la tibil nba jɔl u kan kɔnn’o. U biɛ kan junn fidl nba g ŋanm g so, saa yen youg nba k u tan bu te niib kul ń bann mamɔni sɔnu.
40012021	Niib kul tan baa daan u ninŋ i. »
40012022	L po n pend k b baal yen jua nne Yiesu buol ; sanpola n bo ŋua’ɔg, k u juan g biɛ muu. G Yiesu paag’o k u ji fid g nyuan g biɛ maad.
40012023	K l yaa g lid niib nba bo be l buol nyan kul k b ji maad: « U ne kaa baa tie Dafiid Bija ii ? »
40012024	Ama Farisiɛn-nba n gbad nnyan k b maad: « U ne nuan kub Bɛlsebuul paalu i, yua tie sanpola bad, g biel sanpola. »
40012025	G Yiesu bann b maalm, g maad’b: « Doug nba ninŋ g niib g taa mɔb, b tu tan juod g yad i. L doug g be, lann i kaa l ŋaag g be, g niib baa kɔn yen lieb lan fid gii sie.
40012026	L gii tie g Sitaan n biel Sitaan, lann Sitaan guan g kɔn yen u kua n nyan. L bu tien nle i u ŋaag ń fid gii sie i ?
40012027	I gii yed k min nuan diɛ Bɛlsebuul paalu i g biel sanpola, i ŋuantieb diɛ ŋmaa paalu i g biel’b i ? I ŋuantieb mɔno n bu ŋɔn i biid.
40012028	Ama l gii tie k n diɛ Yendu Foŋanm paalu i g biel sanpola, l ŋɔn g Yendu bal pund i buol n nyan.
40012029	Nil kan fid g kua jua nba mɔg paalu ŋaag g fiel u tiɛd, l gii g tie k u liid g lol l japaalug yen ŋui i kaa. U gii lol’o nuan, u bu fid g kua g baan u mɔgm kul g yaad yenn.
40012030	Yua g taa n po, u tie n ninnand i. Yua g tod’n k n taand mɔ, u yad i.
40012031	L po n te k n maad’i, nil gii biil Yendu, lann i kaa nil gii sugd Yendu, l daan bu fid g la sugl. Ama nil gii sugd Foŋanm, l daan kan la sugl.
40012032	Nil gii maad mabiid Nifosaal Bija po, l daan bu fid g la sugl, ama nil gii maad mabiid Foŋanm po, l daan kan ban g la sugl baa yaa youg.
40012033	I gii tuo g tiŋanŋ n luon luanŋana, yin tuo g tibiiug mɔ luon luanbiid. B band tiig u luana buol i.
40012034	Yinm waalaba ne, i tie nibiid i, i bu tien nle i g maad maŋanm i ? G dugn nil pal n gbie yen yal, u mɔb maad lann i.
40012035	Nimɔn n nyanŋ u pal n bonŋana g dugn u pal ŋan. G nibiiug mɔ nyanŋ u pal n bonbiil g dugn u pal bi.
40012036	N maad’i, Yendu n bu bu niib yaa daal, yua kul bu dugn mafinfam nba k u maad, yen yal po k u maad l maam.
40012037	G dugn l daal a maam n bu te ŋan la mɔni, a maam n biɛ bu te ŋan luol mɔni mɔ. »
40012038	L youg g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Farisiɛn-nba nne gaal maam g maad: « Canbaa, t bua k a tien siɛl g ŋɔn k a yaalidug bona nya Yendu buol i. »
40012039	G Yiesu guan g ŋmiɛn’m: « Nibiid, yab nba kpiɛd Yendu sɔnu kal g miɛd yaalidug bonn. B yen kan la siɛl yaa yaalidug bonn, l gii g tie Yendu n bo tien yal u sogni Sonas po i kaa.
40012040	Nyan Sonas n bo tien yentuna ŋantaa yen nyiɛd ŋantaa jankpel tug n ninŋ nyan, nnyan i g Nifosaal Bija mɔ bu tien yentuna ŋantaa yen nyiɛd ŋantaa tinpual n.
40012041	Yendu n bu bu niib yaa daal, Niniif yab bu te yinm mɔlane niib ne i biid, g dugn Sonas bo muand’b Yendu Laabaal k b lebd binbem o. Yua nba yen be ne cie Sonas.
40012042	Yendu n bu bu niib yaa daal, yanbaɔnŋ puobad bu fiil g te yinm mɔlane niib ne i biid, k l maa u bo nyiɛ hal banfagl i, g baal k wan cenŋ Salomɔn yanfomaam. Yua nba yen be ne yab g cie Salomɔn.
40012043	Sanpol gii ŋua nil, k b tan bel g yaan’o, u tu gad gii waa tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i, g kpaan naan k u bu fuod. U gii kpaan kpaan g luol,
40012044	wan maad k u bu lebd g ŋuan wan daan kpiɛ g ŋua nil nba i. U gii guan l buol g sua g siɛl g be g bu pan’o,
40012045	wan guan g lebd g daan yiin u lieb banlile, yab biɛ g cie wano mɔno, b kul ń guan g ŋanm gii ŋua l nil. L youg, nil ŋann binbem ji baa bi g cie lan daan kpiɛ g tie nand. Yinm mɔlane nibiid ne, i binbem tan baa tie nnyan i. »
40012046	Yiesu biɛ daa bo maad yen niib i, k u ninjanm yen u naa tan baal g sie cincann g kpaan k ban la’ɔg.
40012047	G sua nne tan maad Yiesu k u ninjanm yen u naa be cincann g bua’ɔg.
40012048	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Ŋmaa tie n naa i ? B lɛ n tie n ninjanm i ? »
40012049	Lann i k u tand nuu u ŋuantieb po g maad: « N naa yen n ninjanm n nyan.
40012050	Yua suun n Baa nba be polu n bua yal, wano n tie n ninja, wano n tie n niipuo, wano n biɛ tie n naa mɔ. »
40013001	L daal g Yiesu nyiɛ ŋaag n g gad g kal mɔgl kunŋ.
40013002	G niib bonciɛnn tigl u buol, k u tan gbal g kua g kal ŋadunŋ n ninŋ, g ŋaa’b k b sie mɔgl kunŋ.
40013003	K u pua’b makpanjam bonciɛnn g maad: « Tanbuul nne n bo nyiɛ g bua n pag bonbuoli.
40013004	Wan pagn yaa youg g binyena baa sɔnkunŋ, g bonyugda baal g dii.
40013005	G liel baa tantiɛli po, naan buol g tanyom g yab, g piɛ g gbaa g fiil g dugn l buol tinŋ bo g nyua.
40013006	Ama yendu n siid g cua l bonbilug yaa youg, k l yid g kuol g dugn l jiina bo g fid g jiid tinŋ.
40013007	G liel baa kunkoni n ninŋ, g kunkoni fun g luon l po, k l jug.
40013008	G liel mɔ baa tinŋ n ŋan naan g piɛ g kped g lon luana. Yenn‑nba lon luana kobg kobg, g liel lon piinluob-luob, g liel lon piinta-taa.
40013009	Yua mɔg tuba wan gbad. »
40013010	K u ŋuantieb nagn g bual’o: « Laabaal k a pua’b makpanjam i ? »
40013011	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Yendu ŋɔn yinm i u bal ŋasiil, g yen g ŋɔn banm.
40013012	G dugn yua mɔg, b tan bu pugn wano i wan ŋanm g mɔgd. Yua g mɔg mɔ ban fiel wan mɔg yal mɔno.
40013013	L po n te k n pua’b makpanjam. G dugn b nyuan i, b yen g laad, g biɛ cenŋ g yen g gbiɛ.
40013014	Yendu sogni Esaayi n bo maad yal ji baal’b n nyan. U bo maad banm i g tua: “ B tan bu ŋanm g cenŋ, b yen kan gbad siɛl ; g ŋanm g ligd ninbina, b yen kan la siɛl.
40013015	G dugn buolu ne mɔg nangbanm hal bonciɛnn. B nyal b tuba g pii b ninbina, g dugn b g bua ban la yen b ninbina, g gbad yen b tuba, k lan kua b pala n k ban lebd binbem k n fid g paag’b. ” »
40013016	G Yiesu ji guan g maad’b: « Yinm ń gii be pamann n g dugn i ninbina nyuan, k i tuba gbiɛ.
40013017	Yen mɔni n maad’i, Yendu sogni‑nba yen mamɔnmaada bonciɛnn bo bua ban la yin nyuan yal ne, g g la, g bua ban gbad yin gbiɛ yal ne, g g gbad.
40013018	Yinm ń ji ŋanm g gbad tanbuul makpanjam ne niimn.
40013019	Nil gii cenŋ Yendu bal Laabamann, g g gbad l niimn, Bonbiildaan tu baal g nyan ban bul yal l daan pal n i. Wano n tie sɔnkunŋ nba po g bonbim baa nyan.
40013020	Tintantiɛli nba po g bonbim baa nyan tie nil nba cenŋ Yendu maam, g gbaa g gaal yen pamann.
40013021	L maam yen g ŋanm g kal u pal n. U tie nil nba g mɔg juunn i. Fala lann i kaa mabl gii baal’o g dugn Yendu maam po, u bu buon u dindann i.
40013022	Kunkoni n tinŋ nba ninŋ g bonbim baa nyan tie nil nba cenŋ Yendu maam, g ŋanduna maalm yen ŋalman buam yen nyagn l maam po k l kan fid g sun tuonn.
40013023	Tinŋanŋ nba ninŋ g bonbim baa nyan tie nil nba cenŋ Yendu maam, g gbad l niimn. L nil tie nyan bonkukuod nba luon nyan i. Yenn bu fid g lon kobg, liel ń lon piinluob, liel mɔ ń lon piintaa. »
40013024	G Yiesu biɛ pua’b makpanjam liel g maad: « Yendu diem n tie nand n ne. Nil bo bul dibuolŋani u kpaab n.
40013025	G niib tan duan g guan, k u ninnand baal g pag naaniidi g ŋmad yen dibuolŋani g yaad.
40013026	Dii n piɛ g tan maal yaa youg, naaniidi mɔ fiil n nyan.
40013027	G kpaabdaan tuonsunna tan baal g bual’o: “ Canbaa, a daan g bul dii kaa a kpaab n ii ? Naaniidi ne mɔ nyiɛ lɛ i ? ”
40013028	K u ŋmiɛn’m: “ Ninnand n sun l tuonn. ” K u tuonsunna guan g bual’o: “ T gad g ŋabl l mɔbiid ii ? ”
40013029	K u yed k “ ɛn ɛn, daa ŋabl man, g dugn i gii yed k yin ŋabl, i bu ŋabl g yegn yen dii kul i.
40013030	Ŋaa man l kul ń taan g kped, g pund diyendu youg. L youg tan gii pund, n bu maad n tuonsunna, ban cind g cua naaniidi g lol baba, g juu yo, g ji yuand g yend dii g ŋuun n bunbual n. ” »
40013031	G Yiesu biɛ pua’b makpanjam liel g maad: « Yendu diem tie nyan kpinbuolg nba k b yi mutard nyan bii i, g nil tug g bul u kpaab n.
40013032	L nyid g cie bonkukuod kul bii ; l yen gii piɛ, l tu kped g cie kpinbuoli kul. L ji tu te tiig mɔno i, nuani ń gii baad g jagnd u benda po. »
40013033	G Yiesu biɛ pugn’m makpanjam g maad: « Yendu diem tie nyan dibina nyan i, g puo tug g buun yen kpanu yom nba yab, k l kpanu yom kul tan fid fid g gbie tadd. »
40013034	Yiesu bo pua makpanjam i g maad niib l bona kul. U bo g maad siɛl k l g tie yen makpanjam ;
40013035	l bo tien nnyan g Yendu sogni n bo maad yal siɛnyoug ń tien yen mɔni: « N tan baa pua’b makpanjam i. N tan bu maad’b bona nba wuo hal ŋanduna n cil yaa youg. »
40013036	L puol po g Yiesu ŋaa niib l buol g kun ŋaag. K u ŋuantieb ŋuan’o g nagn g bual’o, k wan ŋɔn’m naaniidi makpanjam niimn.
40013037	K u ŋmiɛn’m: « Yua buul dibuoli nba ŋan tie Nifosaal Bija n nyan,
40013038	g kpaab tie ŋanduna. Dibuolŋani tie niib nba tuo Yendu mɔmaam g tie u diem n yab, g naaniidi tie niib nba ŋua Bonbiildaan.
40013039	Ninnand nba pagn naaniidi tie Sitaan n nyan. Diyendu youg tie ŋanduna juodyoug u, g tuonsunna tie malɛg‑nba.
40013040	Ban ŋab naaniidi g juug muu nand nyan, ŋanduna juod daal mɔ baa tie nnyan i.
40013041	Nifosaal Bija tan bu sun u malɛg‑nba ban wod biiddanm yen janmidanm kul g nyan’m u ŋaag n ninŋ,
40013042	g lu’b muu nba so g kan ban g junn n ninŋ, naan buol k b baa buud g ŋman nyina.
40013043	L youg, yab tuag mamɔni sɔnu baa be b Baa Yendu ŋaag n i, k b yinyiem tie nyan yendu n tu siid g tie nand nyan. Yua mɔg tuba wan gbad.
40013044	Yendu diem tie nyan ŋalman nyan i, g pii kpaab n ninŋ. G nil la l ŋalman g guan g ŋanm g piin g lebd g kun yen pamann g daan kuad wan mɔg yal kul g guan g daa l kpaab.
40013045	Yendu diem biɛ tie nyan kpinkpendl nba waa g daa laani nba ŋan nyan i,
40013046	g tan la laanu k l daaɔg paa, k u kun g kuad wan mɔg yal kul g guan g daa l laanu.
40013047	Yendu diem biɛ tie nyan janbaaɔnŋ nyan i, k b lu mɔgl n k u baan janbuoli kul.
40013048	Lan gbie yaa youg, g jansuola dad g don bɔngbann, g kal g lugd janŋani g tien kpancubd n, g lu yal g tie bonŋmankal.
40013049	Ŋanduna juod daal mɔ tan baa tie nnyan i. Malɛg‑nba tan bu baal g nyan nibiid nimɔnm siign,
40013050	g lu’b muu nba so g kan ban g junn n ninŋ, naan k b baa buud g ŋman nyina.
40013051	I gbad l kul ne niimn ii ? » K b maad k ɛɛn, k b gbad.
40013052	G Yiesu guan g maad’b: « Lann n te k n maad’i, yua n ban Yendu Kadaaɔg g biɛ gaal tundl Yendu ŋaag po, tie nyan ŋaagdaan nba nyanŋ u ŋalman n ninŋ bonpaana yen bonkpela nyan i. »
40013053	Yiesu n pua pua l makpanjam g gbenn, k u nyiɛ l buol,
40013054	g kun u doug n, g daan tund niib b tintaann dieog n. B bo gbiɛ u tundl k l yaa g lid’b, k b ji maad: « U yanfuom yen u yaalidug tuona ne kul nya lɛ i ?
40013055	U g tie kanpinda bija kaa aa ? U naa kaa k b yi’ug Mari ii ? Saak yen Sosɛf yen Simɔn yen Suude g tie u ninjanm kaa aa ?
40013056	Tinm yen u niipuob kaa taan g be ne ii ? K u la lɛ i l bona kul ne i ? »
40013057	Lann i k b yie k b kan gaal u maam. G Yiesu maad’b: « Yendu sogni doug n yab yen u ŋaag yab n tu l nund’o. »
40013058	L buol nuan, u ji g tien yaalidug bona bonciɛnn g dugn b bo g dug u po.
40014001	L youg g Galile bad Erod gbad ban maad yal Yiesu po,
40014002	g maad u naasenm g Yiesu tie San Nyunwultua i, k u yied kpienm siign i, k l po n te k u mɔg paalu g tie yaalidug bona.
40014003	Erod bo te k b suol San g lol’o, g luon’o, g dugn u ninja Filiip ŋaapuo Erodiad po i.
40014004	L bo tien nnyan g dugn San bo tund g maad Erod k l g cab yen wan fiel u ninja ŋaapuo g kuan.
40014005	Erod bo bua wan kpi San g yen jie niib g dugn bonciɛnn bo tua g San tie Yendu sogni i.
40014006	Erod mad jaanm daal, k Erodiad bipuo ŋɔ siɛg saanm nba baal jaanm nunŋ n, k Erod pal manŋ u po,
40014007	k u puon’o, k wan bua yal kul wan maad’o, k u bu te’og.
40014008	K l sipaan naa tud’o k u maad bad: « Jagd San yul g kpien tadg n ninŋ mɔlane mɔno g te’n. »
40014009	G Bad Erod pal biil. Ama wan bo puon g pol, g saanm biɛ be nyan, k u gbal g maad k ban te l sipaan wan bual yal.
40014010	Lann i g sun u sijenm dansaldieog n, k b gad g daan jagd San Nyunwultua yul,
40014011	g kpien tadg n, g guan g tie l sipaan, k u gaal g gad g tie u naa.
40014012	G San ŋuantieb baal g tug’o g gad g pii, g yuand g gad g maad Yiesu.
40014013	Yiesu n gbad nnyan, k u tug ŋadunŋ, g bu puod mɔgl g gad u kua muaɔg n, naan buol g nil g be. Niib n gbad nnyan k b nyiɛ b doi n g sonm taatinŋ g ŋuan’o.
40014014	Yiesu n nyiɛ ŋadunŋ n g la niwulug, g ninbaaɔg suol’o k u paag yiɛnm nba bo be l buol nyan kul.
40014015	Daajuoug n tan baal k u ŋuantieb nagn u buol g maad’o: « Tin be naan ne tie muaɔg n i, nyiɛnn g kɔb ne, youg mɔ biɛ pend o. Te g niib ń gad doug n ninŋ g daa jied g di. »
40014016	G Yiesu maad k ban daa saa, k u ŋuantieb mɔno ń kpaan jied g te l niib k ban di.
40014017	K u ŋuantieb maad’o k b mɔg kpanu ŋanmu yen jani yinle kua i.
40014018	K u maad k ban tug nii.
40014019	G gaal g te g niib kul kal tinŋ n. K u tug l kpanu ŋanmu yen l jani yinle, g yaad g diid polu po, g tien Yendu balg, g jend jend kpanu g tie u ŋuantieb k b biid biid l niib.
40014020	K b kul ŋman g buo g biɛ tenn bonjena, k b wod g gbien kpancubd piig yen ŋanle.
40014021	Niib nba bo dii l jied bo g luol jab tuda ŋanmu, g puob yen bid be g pugd.
40014022	L puol po g Yiesu maad u ŋuantieb k ban kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ, g liid bɔngbanliel po g sua k u cab niib nba bo be l buol nyan.
40014023	Wan cab l niib, k u duo u kukua jual po, g daan bu jaand. L tan bɔnn g sua u daa l be l buol u kukua i.
40014024	L sua ŋadunŋ nuan ji be nyunsiign i, g fagd yen bɔngbann o, g nyunguona pua g piɛd’o, g dugn u bo togd faalu i.
40014025	Siŋaafaani g Yiesu ji sonm nyum po, g baad u ŋuantieb buol.
40014026	U ŋuantieb n la k u sonm nyum po, k b yam ŋmad k b ji maad g ne tie finfandug u. G jiwaani kua’b k b ji yign.
40014027	L youg mɔno g Yiesu maad’b: « Sɔnŋ man i yam, min i, daa jie man siɛl. »
40014028	G Piɛr maad Yiesu: « Yonmdaan, l gii tie fin yen mɔni, ŋan te k n sonm nyum po g tuog’a. »
40014029	G Yiesu maad’o k wan baal. G Piɛr nyiɛ ŋadunŋ n, g sonm nyum po, g saa Yiesu po.
40014030	Wan la g faalu paa nyan, g jiwaani suol’o, u sua g nyum bua n di’ug k u yign g maad: « Yonmdaan, fiel’n. »
40014031	L youg g Yiesu tand nuu g suol’o g maad: « Fin i, a dindann g yab baa waam nne, bɛ po i k a pal wad i ? »
40014032	Ban kua ŋadunŋ n yaa youg g faalu te silb.
40014033	G yab bo be ŋadunŋ n kul gbaan u nintual n g ji maad: « A l tie Yendu Bija i yen mɔni. »
40014034	Ban puod mɔgl g gbenn, b kua Senesarɛt doug n i.
40014035	K l buol niib la Yiesu g bann’o, g kpaand l doug n dingbankunkogi n kul, k b baal yen yiɛnm kul Yiesu buol,
40014036	g balm’o k wan ŋaa k ban sii baa u liɛdl mɔgbann. G yiɛnm nba bo sii u liɛdl mɔgbann kul paag.
40015001	L puol po i g Farisiɛn-nba yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda nyiɛ Serusalɛm g baal Yiesu buol g bual’o:
40015002	« L tien nle i k a ŋuantieb g cɔln t danm bogda i ? B g cɔln g dugn b tu bua di g kan nid. »
40015003	K u ŋmiɛn’m: « K yinm i, l tien nle i k i ŋaa Yendu mɔmaam o g cɔln i danm bogda i ?
40015004	Yendu maad: “ Cɔln a baa yen a naa, g yua maad u baa lann i kaa u naa mabiiug, ban kpi’ug. ”
40015005	Ama yinm nuan yen tu yed g yua sad g maad u baa lann i kaa u naa: “ Min bo bu tug yal nba g tod’a, n tug g tie Yendu u, ”
40015006	g yua nba maad nnyan, l ji g tie mabl kaa k l daan ń tod u baa lann i kaa u naa. I ŋaa Yendu mɔmaam n nyan g ŋua i danm bogda.
40015007	Yinm munafigidanm ne, Yendu sogni Esaayi bo maad Yendu lanbona ne i po i:
40015008	“ Buolu ne niib dond’n mɔb n i, b maalm fag yen’n.
40015009	Ban suun tuona nba g donŋ n sann tie fam i, g dugn mɔmaam nba k b tund tie niib maalm i. ” »
40015010	Lann i g Yiesu yiin niwulug g maad’b: « Ŋanm g cenŋ man ne, g gbad l niimn.
40015011	Yal nba kua nil mɔb n kaa biid’o Yendu nunŋ n, yal nya u mɔb n n biid’o. »
40015012	Lann i k u ŋuantieb nagn g maad’o: « A ban g Farisiɛn-nba gbad a maam ne k b pala biil ii ? »
40015013	G Yiesu maad: « N Baa nba be polu po n g bul tiig nba kul, u bu ŋabl’o.
40015014	Ŋaa’b man, b tie juanm i g dadb juanm. Juan mɔ gii dadb u juanlua, b kul daan bu baa buoug n i. »
40015015	G Piɛr gaal maam g maad: « Ŋɔn’ti l makpanjam niimn. »
40015016	K u maad: « I mɔ biɛ daa g gbiɛ bona niimn ii ?
40015017	I g ban ii ? Jied nba kua nil mɔb n kul tu jiid u tug n i, g gad g nya.
40015018	Ama nil n maad yal nya u pal n i, lann n bu fid g biil’o.
40015019	G dugn maalbiid, nikpinu, cunconm, naayigm, ŋalaaci yen mabiid nya pal n i.
40015020	Lann n biid nil. Ama nil gii g nid, g dii l kan biil’o. »
40015021	L puol po, g Yiesu nyiɛ l buol g gad Tiir yen Sidɔn doi n be naan po nyan.
40015022	L sua Kanaan buolu n puo nne kua l po. K l puo baal u buol g yign g maad: « Yonmdaan, Dafiid Bija, a kan jie’n ninbaaɔg uu ? Sanpola ŋua n bipuo, g ŋɔnŋ’o fala bonciɛnn. »
40015023	Yiesu g ŋmiɛn’o baa lanbonyenn, k u ŋuantieb nagn g maad’o k wan lebn l puo k wan daa ŋua g yign b tuba n ninŋ.
40015024	G Yiesu maad: « Yendu sun’n Israyɛl niib po kua i, banm n tie nyan pebid nba bod nyan. »
40015025	Lann i k l puo baa g gbaan u nintual n g maad: « Yonmdaan, tod’n. »
40015026	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « L g ŋan k ban tug bid jied g lu sangbanni. »
40015027	K l puo guan g maad, k lann tie mɔni i, ama g sangbanni yen di jeyiyola nba ŋmad ŋaagdaan nuu n mɔno g baal tinŋ n.
40015028	Lann i g Yiesu ji ŋmiɛn’o: « Puo ne, a dindann yab paaa ! Lan tien nyan ŋan bua nand nyan. » L youg mɔno k l puo big paag.
40015029	Yiesu nyiɛ l buol g gad Galile mɔgl kunŋ g daan duo g kal jual po.
40015030	G niib bonciɛnn baal yen diɛni yen juanm yen wabi yen muudi yen yiɛnlieb bonciɛnn u nintual n, k u paag b kul.
40015031	Niib n la g muudi ji maad, g wabi sonm, g diɛni paag, g juanm nyuand, g yaalidug suol’b k b ji pag Israyɛl Yendu.
40015032	Yiesu yiin u ŋuantieb g maad’b: « N jie niib ne ninbaaɔg. Daa ŋantaa n nyan k b be yen’n, b g mɔg siɛl g bu di. N g bua min cab’b ban kun g g dii. Kom bu fid g gul’b sɔnu n ninŋ. »
40015033	K u ŋuantieb bual’o, k b bu la jied lɛ i tinkuonŋ n ninŋ ne, g din yaa niwulug ne kul i ?
40015034	G Yiesu bual’b k b mɔg kpanu ŋanŋaa i ? K b yed g kpanu ŋanlile yen janbid waam.
40015035	Lann i k u te g niwulug kul kal tinŋ n ninŋ.
40015036	K u gaal l kpanu ŋanlile yen janbid ŋann, g tien Yendu balg, g jend jend g tie u ŋuantieb, k b biid biid l niwulug,
40015037	k b kul ŋman g buo, g biɛ tenn bonjena k b wod g gbien kpancubd ŋanlile.
40015038	Niib nba bo dii l jied bo g luol jab tuda ŋanna, g puob yen bid be g pugd.
40015039	Lann i g Yiesu ji cab niib k b kun, k u kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ g gad Magadan doug n.
40016001	Farisiɛn-nba yen Sadusien-nba nagn Yiesu buol. B bo bua ban bign’o i g bual’o, k wan tien yaalidug bonn, g ŋɔn k u paalu nya Yendu buol i.
40016002	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Siŋaaɔg n polu po gii fan, i tu maad g dinne daal baa ŋan ;
40016003	tawalgband gii be, yin maad g dinne taag bu baa. I tu yaad g diid polu po, g ŋɔn daal n baa tie nand, g yen ji kan fid g bann bona nba tie mɔlane niimn ii ?
40016004	Nibiid, yab kpiɛd Yendu sɔnu kal g miɛd yaalidug bonn. B yen kan la siɛl yaa yaalidug bonn, l gii g tie Yendu n bo tien yal u sogni Sonas po i kaa. » Lann i k u ŋaa’b l buol g paan g saa.
40016005	Yiesu ŋuantieb bo puod bɔngbanliel po g sunn g g tug kpanu.
40016006	G Yiesu maad’b: « Ŋanm g suol man i kua yen Farisiɛn-nba dibina yen Sadusien-nba dibina. »
40016007	K u ŋuantieb ji mali k ban yaan g tug kpanu nyan i k u maad nnyan.
40016008	G Yiesu bann b maalm g maad: « I dindann g yab baa waam nne, bɛ po i k i mali nnyan i, k yin g tug kpanu po i ?
40016009	I daa g gbiɛ bona niimn ii ? I g tiɛn kpanu ŋanmu n daan din niib tuda ŋanmu k l tenn kpanu jena k i wod g gbien kpancubd k l ja nand ii ?
40016010	Bii i g tiɛn kpanu ŋanlile n daan din niib tuda ŋanna k l tenn kpanu jena k i wod g gbien kpancubd k l ja nand i ?
40016011	Bɛ po n te k i g ban k l g tie kpanu po kaa k n maad i ? N maad’i, jie man Farisiɛn-nba yen Sadusien-nba dibina. »
40016012	L youg u k b ji gbad, k u bo g maad k ban jie dibina nba k b tu tien kpanu n ninŋ lan fiil kaa, k u bo maad Farisiɛn-nba yen Sadusien-nba tundl i.
40016013	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb pund doug nne ninŋ k b yi Filiip Sesaare, k u bual u ŋuantieb: « Niib maad g Nifosaal Bija tie ŋmaa i ? »
40016014	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « Yenm tua k a tie San Nyunwultua i, lieb tua k a tie Eli, lieb mɔ tua k a tie Seremi lann i kaa Yendu sogni‑nba nba tenn ninŋ yend. »
40016015	K u guan g bual’b: « K yinm i, i mali k n tie ŋmaa i ? »
40016016	G Simɔn Piɛr maad: « A tie Kristo i, Yendu nba fo Bija. »
40016017	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o g maad: « I be pamann n, Simɔn, Sonas bija, g dugn yal nyiɛ a mɔb n ne g tie nifosaal banm kaa, n Baa nba be polu po n ŋɔn’a.
40016018	To, min maad’a, fin Piɛr, a tie tantiɛɔg u, l tantiɛɔg po i k n bu sen n Tintaanu niib. Kuum yen u paalu kul kan fid g tien’o siɛl.
40016019	N bu te’a Yendu ŋaag gann pieni. A gii yed g yal tie kual tinŋ po ne, l tie kual i Yendu buol, a gii cab yal mɔ, Yendu mɔ n cab l bonn. »
40016020	Lann i g Yiesu kpaa u ŋuantieb k ban daa ŋaa g sua ń gbad k u tie Kristo.
40016021	L youg u g Yiesu ji cil g ŋɔnŋ u ŋuantieb k l tie k wan gad Serusalɛm, g doug n nikpela yen Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda ń daan cagn’o bonciɛnn, g tan kpi’ug, k wan yied daa ŋantaa daal.
40016022	G Piɛr yiin’o b banle buol g ji fu yen’o g maad: « N Yonmdaan, Yendu ń wuon, l yaa bonn kan ban g baal’a. »
40016023	G Yiesu gbeg g maad Piɛr: « Sud ne, Sitaan, a panŋ n sɔnu, g dugn a maalm ne g nyiɛ Yendu buol kaa, l tie niib maalm i. »
40016024	Lann i g Yiesu maad u ŋuantieb: « Yua bua wan ŋuan’n, wan sunn u kua po, g bug u dapunpɔnn gii ŋua’n.
40016025	Yua nba bua wan fiel u miɛl u tan bu buon l miɛl. Ama yua lu u miɛl g dugn n po, u bu la miɛl.
40016026	Nil gii mɔg ŋanduna bona kul g yen buon u miɛl, n liɛ l nyuad i ? Lann i kaa nil bu tug bɛ i g guan g daa l miɛl i ?
40016027	Nifosaal Bija tan bu guan yen u Baa yudand, yen u malɛg‑nba, l youg u k u bu pa nil kul nyan u bontitied n bual nand nyan.
40016028	Yen mɔni n maad’i, Nifosaal Bija bu baal g kal u badkog po g sua g yab nba be ne siɛb daa g kpe. »
40017001	Daa ŋanluob n pend, g Yiesu tug Piɛr, Saak yen u ninja San g piɛd yen’m k b gad g duo jual nba kped po.
40017002	B yed k ban nyuand’o g sua k u ninnaɔnŋ lebd o, k u nunŋ n nyili g tuud nyan yendu nyan, k u tiɛd penn pai pai pai.
40017003	K b la g Moyis yen Eli baal g pag yen wano Yiesu.
40017004	Lann i g Piɛr gaal maam g maad Yiesu: « Yonmdaan, l ŋan yen tin gii be ne. A gii bua, n bu pua jond tintaa. Yenn baa tie a yal, g liel tie Moyis yal, g liel mɔ tie Eli yal. »
40017005	Piɛr daa bo g maad g gbenn mɔno g tawalgbanpieonŋ nne nyili g tuud, g jiid nyan ŋunn nyan g libn b po. K b gbad niɛlu nne nyiɛ l tawalgbaɔnŋ n g maad: « U ne tie n Bija i, n pal kɔn u po bonciɛnn. N tug n buam kul g tien u ninŋ, i cenŋ man u maam. »
40017006	Yiesu ŋuantieb n gbad l niɛlu, g jiwaani kua’b bonciɛnn, k b baa g fabn.
40017007	G Yiesu nagn g sii’b g maad: « Fiil man, daa jie man siɛl. »
40017008	K b yaad g sua Yiesu kukua n ji sie.
40017009	Ban bo nyiɛ jual po g ji yaa youg, g Yiesu kpaa u ŋuantieb g maad: « Daa maad man sua yin la yal g Nifosaal Bija daa g yied kpienm siign. »
40017010	K u ŋuantieb bual’o k l tien nle i g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen maad k Eli bu baal yo Kristo ń fid g baal i ?
40017011	K u ŋmiɛn’m g maad: « L tie mɔni k Eli bu baal g ŋmagd bona kul yo,
40017012	ama n maad’i, Eli nuan baal o, b g bann’o i, g sun’o ban bua nand. Nifosaal Bija mɔ bu la fala nnyan i b nui n. »
40017013	L youg k u ŋuantieb ji bann k u bo maad San Nyunwultua i.
40017014	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb n pund niwulug buol yaa youg g jua nne nagn g baa g gbaan u nintual n g maad:
40017015	« Canbaa, jie n bija ninbaaɔg, u baa tinŋ i. U laad fala bonciɛnn ; u baa muu n yen nyum n youg kul.
40017016	N baal yen’o a ŋuantieb buol k b yen g fid g paag’o. »
40017017	G Yiesu maad: « Yinm nibiid buolu ne, i g mɔg dindann baa waam nne. N biɛ baa be yen’i saa yen bɛ youg u ? N biɛ bu di sugl i po saa yen bɛ daal i ? Baal man yen l big nii. »
40017018	G Yiesu tiɛn g bel sanpola nba bo ŋua big nyan. K b yaad g ŋaa’ɔg, k u paag l youg mɔno.
40017019	Lann i g Yiesu ŋuantieb nagn g bual’o b kua n ninŋ, k l tien nle i, k banm yen g fid g bel g yaan l sanpola i ?
40017020	G Yiesu maad’b: « I dindann n g yab. Yen mɔni n maad’i, i dindann bo gii yab g pund baa dibinyenm, i bu fid g maad jual ne k wan figd g gad g daan sed siɛl po, wan figd. Siɛl bo kan gii paa i po. [
40017021	Yaa sanpobuolu ne, jaandi yen mɔlolu i kaa, siɛl kan fid g bel g yaan’m.] »
40017022	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo taan g be Galile doug n i, k u tan maad’b: « B bu kuad Nifosaal Bija,
40017023	niib ń suol’o g kpi’ug. Daa ŋantaa daal wan yied. » K u ŋuantieb kul pala wad.
40017024	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo gad Kafarnawunm i, g yab gaan jaanddeciɛɔnŋ lonpo tan baal g bual Piɛr: « I canbaa kan pa lonpo ii ? »
40017025	G Piɛr yed k u bu pa. Piɛr n kua ŋaag n g Yiesu liid g bual’o: « Simɔn, a la nle ? Ŋanduna ne batieb gaan b lɛ buol i lonpo i ? Bad ŋaag yab buol bii saanm buol i ? »
40017026	G Piɛr yed g saanm n pa lonpo. G Yiesu maad: « Lann bad ŋaag yab g be l n.
40017027	Ama l g ŋan k tin biil b pala. Lann gad mɔgl n g daan lu janpienu. Janŋ nba k a bu cind g suol’o nyan, ŋan yaad u mɔb, a bu la liglb l n, k a tug g pa min yen fin lonpo. »
40018001	L youg g Yiesu ŋuantieb nagn g bual’o: « Ŋmaa tie ciɛn Yendu diem n i ? »
40018002	Lann i g Yiesu yiin big nne g sen’o b sinsiign g maad:
40018003	« Yen mɔni n maad’i, i gii g lebd i binbem g guan g te nyan bid nyan, i kan kua Yendu diem n ninŋ.
40018004	Lann yua jiin u kua g tie nyan big ne nyan, wano n tie ciɛn Yendu diem n.
40018005	Yua nba gaal big k u tie nyan u ne nyan, k l tie n sann po, u gaal min i.
40018006	Ama yua nba te g bid nba dug n po ne ninŋ, baa yend tud Yendu sɔnu, b bo gii tug naal nba kpai g lol g jɔn u tulu n, g lu’ug mɔgsiel n ninŋ lann n bo baa su u po.
40018007	Yubɔnn ŋua ŋanduna g dugn niib be g te k b lieb tud Yendu sɔnu. Niib nuan baa l be g te g lieb tud sɔnu i. Ama yab te k lieb tud sɔnu nyan, yubɔnn ŋua banm i.
40018008	A nuu lann i kaa a tital gii te k a tie biid, ŋan jiɛl l nuu lann i kaa l tital g lu fagm. A gii kua Yendu ŋaag n yen nuujenn lann i kaa taajenn, lann n su yen ŋan gii mɔg a nui nle yen a titala ŋanle ban lu’a muu nba so g kan ban g junn n ninŋ.
40018009	A ninbinn gii te k a tie biid, ŋan kpigd’o g lu fagm. A gii kua Yendu ŋaag n g tie ninfiɛɔg, lann n su yen ŋan gii mɔg ninbina ŋanle, ban lu’a muu nba so g kan ban g junn n ninŋ.
40018010	Daa nund man bid ne ninŋ baa yend, b malɛg‑nba be n Baa Yendu nintual n youg kul. [
40018011	G dugn, Nifosaal Bija baal k wan fiel niib nba bod i.]
40018012	I la nle ? Nil gii mɔg pei kobg, g yend bod, u kan ŋaa pei piinwai yen banwai nba tenn jual po, g gad g kpaan yua bod ii ?
40018013	U gii kpaan g la’ɔg, yen mɔni n maad’i, u pal bu manŋ u po gii cie pei piinwai yen banwai nba g bod nyan.
40018014	Nnyan i k i Baa nba be polu po mɔ g bua g bid ne ninŋ baa yend biɛl.
40018015	A ninja gii biil ŋan gad g daan la’ɔg i banle buol. U gii tuo a maam, u guan g te a ninja n nyan.
40018016	U gii yie a maam mɔ, ŋan la niyend lann i kaa niib banle g pugn a po k ban te sieda‑nba k yin fid g ŋanm l maam.
40018017	U gii yie b maam, ŋan maad Kristo tintaanu n yab. U ji gii g cenŋ b yaa maam, wan gii tie a po nyan yua g ban Yendu nyan, lann i kaa nyan yua gaan lonpo nyan.
40018018	Yen mɔni n maad’i ; i gii yed g yal tie kual tinŋ po ne, l tie kual i Yendu buol, i gii cab yal mɔ Yendu mɔ n cab l bonn.
40018019	N biɛ bu maad’i bonliel g pugn. I gii tie niib banle tinŋ ne po g taan g miɛl yal, n Baa nba be polu po bu te’i,
40018020	g dugn niib banle bantaa gii taan naan n sann po, n be b siign. »
40018021	Lann i g Piɛr nagn g bual Yiesu: « Yonmdaan, n ninja gii tun g biid’n, n bu di sugl u po g daan dagd taal munŋaa i ? N bu di sugl g daan pund hal taal munlile ii ? »
40018022	G Yiesu maad’o: « N g yed g taal munlile kua kaa, taal munlile g daan dagd piinlile.
40018023	Nyan min maad ne, Yendu diem tie nyan kpanjam ne nyan i. Bad n bo be g tan yiin u tuonsunna, g yab mɔg u pann kul ń baal g pa.
40018024	Wan cil yaa youg k b baal yen u tuonsunyend nne k u mɔg u pann tudbanm.
40018025	L jua bo g mɔg ligli g bu pa l pann. Lann i g bad tie mɔb k ban kuad’o, g kuad u ŋaapuo yen u bid yen wan mɔg yal kul g pa l pann.
40018026	L youg, k u tuonsunn baa g gbaan u nunŋ n ninŋ g pugd’o g maad: “ Abaa, miɛl sugl, l gii sud waam n bu pa’a l kul. ”
40018027	G ninbaaɔg suol bad k u cab u tuonsunn k wan gii saa g daa pa siɛl.
40018028	L tuonsunn n nya nne g tuog u lua. L sua u lua ŋann daan mɔg u pann yal g tie ligciɛnŋ. K u ceg u lancinŋ n yen paalu g maad k wan pa u ligli.
40018029	K u lua ŋann baa g gbaan g pugd’o g maad: “ Abaa, miɛl sugl, l gii sud waam n bu pa’a. ”
40018030	K u yie g tug’o g gad yen’o k b daan luon’o, k u gii g pa u ligli g gbenn ban daa luod’o.
40018031	U lieb n la nnyan, k b pala biil bonciɛnn k b gad g dugn bad wan tien yal kul.
40018032	Lann i g bad sun g yiin’o g maad: “ A tie nibiiug u. Diid yaa ligciɛnŋ nba k n cab’a ne kul g dugn a miɛl’n sugl po.
40018033	A mɔ bo kan fid g jie a lua ninbaaɔg nyan min jie’a ninbaaɔg nand nyan ii ? ”
40018034	G bad pal bie g pend, k u te k u sijenm nba tund dansali suol’o g luon, k u gii g pa g gbenn ban daa luod’o. »
40018035	G Yiesu ji guan g maad lann i: « N Baa nba be polu po mɔ tan bu tund’i nnyan i, l gii tie k i g di sugl i ninjanm po yen i pala kul. »
40019001	Yiesu n maad maad l lanbona g gbenn, k u nyiɛ Galile g tɔgn Suurdɛn bɔnpuol po, g gad Suude tinŋ n ninŋ.
40019002	G niib bonciɛnn ŋuan’o l po, k u paag yab bo yiɛl kul.
40019003	G Farisiɛn-nba nagn g bua bign’o g bual’o: « Yendu Mɔmaam cab g puo gii biil yal kul, k u sal bua u bu fid g nyan’o oo ? »
40019004	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « I g lii Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n ninŋ g ŋanduna cilg youg, Yendu bo tag jua yen puo oo ?
40019005	G maad k lann n te g jua bu nya g ŋaa u naa yen u baa g taan gii be yen u ŋaapuo, ban ji gii tie gbannanyend ii ?
40019006	Nnyan i, b ji g tie niib banle kaa, b ji tie niyend i. Lann nifosaal ń daa paad Yendu n taan yal. »
40019007	G Farisiɛn-nba guan g bual’o, k l tien nle i g Moyis yen bo maad, g nil gii bel u ŋaapuo wan te’og kadaaɔg nba ŋɔnŋ k u bel’o i ?
40019008	G Yiesu maad’b k b kangbadm po i, g Moyis bo cab’b k ban gii nyanŋ b puob. G cilg youg l bo g tie nnyan kaa.
40019009	« N maad’i, nil gii nyan u ŋaapuo, k l g tie cunconm po i kaa, u gii guan g kuan puolua, u tien cunconm n nyan. »
40019010	K u ŋuantieb maad g jua yen puo binbenu n ninŋ gii tie nnyan, jua gii g kuan puo lann n su.
40019011	G Yiesu guan g ŋmiɛn’m: « Niib kul kaa gbiɛ l maam niimn, Yendu n cab yab k ban gbad l niimn i kaa.
40019012	Yenm g kuand puob g dugn b tu mal’b k b g tie jab. Lieb mɔ niib n tu biil b jatiɛd. Lieb mɔ g kuand puob g dugn b bua ban ŋanm g sun Yendu tuonn i, u bal ń tand. Yua bu fid g gbad wan gbad. »
40019013	Lann i g niib baal yen binyidi Yiesu buol k wan maan nuu b po g jaand. K u ŋuantieb fu yen’m.
40019014	G Yiesu maad: « Ŋaa man bid ban baal n buol, daa biel’b man, g dugn yab tie nyan banm nyan, Yendu diem tie b yal i. »
40019015	Lann i g maan nuu b po, g pend g saa u sɔnu.
40019016	L youg g naasen nne nagn g bual Yiesu: « Canbaa, n bu tien bɛ i k l tie bonŋann g fid gii mɔg miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn i ? »
40019017	G Yiesu guan g bual’o: « Laabaal k a bual’n bonŋann po i. Yendu kua n ŋan. A gii bua miɛl nba kan gbenn, ŋan gii cɔln u mɔmaam. »
40019018	K l naasen guan g bual’o g mɔmalanm po i ? G Yiesu maad: « A kan kpi nil, a kan conm, a kan jan, a kan kun mɔnkunninkpind,
40019019	Cɔln a baa yen a naa, gii bua a lua nyan a kua nyan. »
40019020	K l naasen guan g maad k u tien l kul ne o, g bɛ n biɛ pɔd’o i.
40019021	G Yiesu maad’o: « A gii bua siɛl ń daa panŋ’a, ŋan gad g kuad a ŋalman, g te tali ligli, lann i k a bu la mɔgm Yendu ŋaag n. A gii tien nnyan, ŋan baal gii ŋua’n. »
40019022	Naasen ŋann bo mɔg ŋalman bonciɛnn. Wan gbad nnyan k u pal biil k u paan g saa.
40019023	Lann i g Yiesu maad u ŋuantieb: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, l paa yen ŋalmandaan ń kua Yendu diem n.
40019024	N bua ŋanm g maad’i yin bann i. Lan paa yuoyuoug po nand k u kan fid g kua kpalpienu bonn n nyan, ŋalmandaan gii bua kua Yendu diem n, l baa paa u po g cie nnyan. »
40019025	U ŋuantieb n gbad nnyan, k l yaa g lid’b k b bual’o k l gii tie nnyan ŋmaa bu fid g la fielu i ?
40019026	K u yaad g diid’b g maad g nifosaal kan fid, g Yendu nuan yen g gbal siɛl.
40019027	L youg u g Piɛr gaal maam g maad: « Diid a, tinm nba ji ŋaa tin mɔg yal kul g ŋua’a ne i, t tan bu do yen bɛ nyuad i ? »
40019028	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, Nifosaal Bija tan bu kal u yudand kog po, ŋandunpaann nba baad ne ninŋ. L youg yinm nba ŋua’n ne, i mɔ tan bu kal kogi piig yen ŋanle po gii bu Israyɛl cuga piig yen ŋanle nba be ne.
40019029	Yua ŋaa u ŋaag, u ninjanm, u niipuob, u baa yen u naa, u bid lann i kaa u kpaand, n yaa sann po, u bu do nyuad nba yab g cie wan ŋaa yal. U biɛ bu la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
40019030	Yab nba gaal liig mɔlane, bonciɛnn tan bu juod. Yab nba juod mɔ, bonciɛnn tan bu gaal liig. »
40020001	Yendu ŋaag n tie nyan makpanjam ne nyan i: « Jua nne n bo nyiɛ siŋapanpan g kpaan paadiila k ban ko u kpaab.
40020002	Wan la paadiila nba, k wano yen banm dii daaɔg. K u yed k u bu pa’b yentunyenn tuonn ligli, g sun’m u kpaab n ninŋ.
40020003	K u tan nyiɛ kud munwai po g la lieb k b kal g g suun siɛl.
40020004	K u maad k ban mɔ ń gad u kpaab n ninŋ, k u tan bu pa’b lan bual nand.
40020005	K b mɔ gad u kpaab n. K u tan guan g nyiɛ piig yen kud munle g gaal lieb, g biɛ tan nyiɛ kud muntaa, g biɛ gaal lieb.
40020006	Kud munmu po, k u biɛ tan nyiɛ g la lieb k b sie, k u bual’b: “ Laabaal k i sie ne yentunmunn, g g suun siɛl i ? ”
40020007	K b maad g sua g gaal’b u kpaab n. Lann i k u maad k ban mɔ ń gii saa u kpaab n.
40020008	G daajuoug baal, g kpaabdaan maad u naasen nba pa tuonsunna, k wan yiin paadiila g pa’b b ligli. K wan cil yab juod g baal o, g pa g daan juod yab kpiɛ g baal.
40020009	Yab bo baal kpaab n kud munmu nyan, k u tie’b yentunyenn tuonn ligli.
40020010	G yab nba bo cind g baal nyan ji mali k banm n bu gaal yal baa cie nnyan. Ama k b yen tie b mɔ yentunyenn tuonn ligli.
40020011	K b ji buln g fu yen kpaabdaan,
40020012	g maad: “ Yab juod g baal ne tien kudyeonŋ kua i, k tinm nba sun yentunmunn g yendu cua’ti, tinm yen banm yaa ligli kul biɛ ji ja ii ? ”
40020013	G kpaabdaan maad b siign yend: “ N dɔnn, n g bua di’a kaa. T bo g dii daaɔg k a tuo k a bu gaal yentunyenn tuonn ligli ii ?
40020014	Gaal a bonn gii saa. L bo tie n buam n ninŋ i, k min te yua juod g baal ŋan gaal nand.
40020015	N kan fid g tug n ligli g tien min bua yal ii ? Bii a pal g man n po k n tien ŋanm i ? ” »
40020016	G Yiesu ji guan g maad, k nnyan i, g yab juod tan bu gaal liig, yab liid ń juod.
40020017	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb piig yen banle bo paan g do Serusalɛm i, k u piɛd yen’m g maad’b:
40020018	« I la ii, t do Serusalɛm n nyan. B bu kuad Nifosaal Bija, Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda ń suol’o, g bu’ug, g jiɛl u buud k l tie k ban kpi’ug.
40020019	B bu tug’o g cab buolfanu yab, ban laa laa’ɔg, g pua’ɔg yen naapuna g kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po, wan kpe. Daa ŋantaa daal wan yied. »
40020020	L puol po i g Sebede ŋaapuo baal yen u bid banle g gbaan Yiesu nunŋ n ninŋ k u bua miɛl siɛl.
40020021	G Yiesu bual’o k u bua bɛ i ? K u maad: « N bua k a te n bijabi banle ne, yend ń tan kal a nuujendu, lua ń kal a nuuganŋ, a tan gii kal a badkog po yaa youg. »
40020022	G Yiesu maad’b: « I g ban yin miɛd yal. I bu fid g cagn nyan min bu cagn nand nyan ii ? » K b maad k b bu fid.
40020023	K u guan g ŋmiɛn’m: « L tie mɔni k i bu cagn, ama yal tie n nuujendu po kinkaanu lann i kaa n nuuganŋ po kinkaanu nuan, l kan nya n po kaa. N Baa n ban wan bobn l kinkaani niib nba po. »
40020024	Yiesu ŋuantieb piig nba bo tenn n gbad nnyan, b pala bo g manŋ Sebede bid po.
40020025	G Yiesu yiin b kul g maad’b: « I ban g dougdanm ŋɔnŋ b yikod, g paalu n be yab nuu n mɔ ŋɔnŋ b paalu.
40020026	Lan daa tie nnyan i yaa siign. Yua bua wan te i kul ne ciɛn, wan gii tie i tuonsunn.
40020027	Yua bua wan gii tie i kul ne liig yua, wan gii tie i yonm.
40020028	L po n te g Nifosaal Bija baal. U g baal k wan gii kal g niib suun u po kaa, u baal k wan gii suun niib po i, g biɛ yid u miɛl salg g fiel niib bonciɛnn. »
40020029	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo nyiɛ Seriko g niib bonciɛnn ŋua’ɔg.
40020030	L sua g juanm banle nne kal sɔnjakunŋ. Ban gbad g Yiesu pend nyan, k b yign g maad: « Yonmdaan, Dafiid Bija, a kan jie’ti ninbaaɔg uu ? »
40020031	G niib gaal jad b po, k ban suon. K b biɛ ŋanm g yign yen paalu: « Yonmdaan, Dafiid Bija, jie’ti ninbaaɔg. »
40020032	G Yiesu sed g yiin’m g bual’b, k b bua wan tien bɛ i b po i ?
40020033	K b maad: « Yonmdaan, t bua t ninbina ń nyuand i. »
40020034	G ninbaaɔg suol Yiesu k u sii b ninbina k b nyuand l youg mɔno, g mɔ ji ŋua’ɔg.
40021001	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb n nag Serusalɛm, g tenn waam nne yen ban kua dobig nne ninŋ k b yi Bɛtfaase. L doug bo be jual nne po i, k b yi Oliif tiidi jual. Lann i g Yiesu liin u ŋuantieb banle
40021002	g maad’b: « I saa man doug nba be liig ne. I gii pund yaa youg, i bu la bonnaanŋ daag, k u bonbig sie g kpiɛ’ɔg, yin dagd’o g guan yen b kul nii.
40021003	Nil daan gii bual’i yin maad g Yonmdaan n bua, k u bu ŋmiɛn mɔlane mɔno. »
40021004	L kul ne bo tien g Yendu sogni n bo maad yal ń te mɔni i:
40021005	« Maad man Siyɔn yab nne: “ I bad n baad nyan, u jiin u kua, u jag bonŋ i, bonbig, bonkobg nba tug tuga yaa big. ” »
40021006	Lann i k u ŋuantieb gad g tien nyan wan bo maad’b nand nyan,
40021007	g guan yen l bonnaanŋ yen u bonbig. K b land b tiɛd g maan l boni po g Yiesu duo g jag.
40021008	G niib bonciɛnn land b tiɛd g lieb pad pad tiidi faad k b lad lad sɔnu po.
40021009	G niib nba bo be u liig yen yab bo ŋua u puol po ji yign g maad: « Osaana Dafiid Bija, yua baad Yonmdaan sann po, Yendu ń yad u yedŋanm u po. Osaana, Yendu sann ń do hal polu po. »
40021010	Wan kua Serusalɛm doug n g niib kul ji siɛn g bual k u ne tie ŋmaa i ?
40021011	G niwulug nba bo ŋua’ɔg nyan maad: « Yendu sogni Yiesu i, yua nyiɛ Nasarɛt, Galile tinŋ n. »
40021012	Lann i g Yiesu kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g bel g yaan yab nba bo kuad yen yab nba bo daa bona l ninŋ kul, g tud yab nba bo cend ligli tieba yen yab kuad lanjeli kogi g lu lu.
40021013	G maad’b k b diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « N ŋaag ne baa tie jaandi ŋaag i. » Ama k yinm yen ji tug g tien naayiga tintaanbuol.
40021014	G juanm yen wabi nagn wano Yiesu buol, k u paag’b.
40021015	Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda n la yaalidug bona nba k u bo tien, yen bid nba bo yign g tua Osaana Dafiid Bija, k b pala bie.
