41009002	Daa ŋanluob n pend, g Yiesu tug Piɛr yen Saak yen San, k b sud g fagd yen niib, g duo jual nba kped po. K b la g Yiesu ninnaɔnŋ lebd,
41009003	k u tiɛd cil g penn pai pai g nyili g tuud ninbina n ninŋ. Nil g be tinŋ po ne, g bu fid g ŋuul tiɛɔg, lan gii pien nnyan.
41009004	K b la k Eli yen Moyis baal g pag yen Yiesu.
41009005	Lann i g Piɛr maad Yiesu: « Canbaa, l ŋan yen tin gii be ne. T pua jond tintaa, yenn ń gii tie a yal, liel ń gii tie Moyis yal, g liel mɔ ń gii tie Eli yal. »
41009006	Piɛr bo g ban wan bu maad yal nba g dugn jiwaani bo kua wano yen u lieb.
41009007	B sua g tawalgbaɔnŋ nne jiid nyan ŋunn nyan g libn b po, g niɛlu nne nyiɛ l tawalgbaɔnŋ n ninŋ g maad: « U ne tie n Bija i, n bua’ɔg yen n pal kul, i cenŋ man u maam »
41009008	L youg mɔno, b yed k ban diid nne b ji g la baa sua. B la g Yiesu kua n be yen’m.
41009009	Ban nyiɛ jual po g ji yaa youg, g Yiesu kpaa’b k ban daa daa maad baa sua ban la yal, saa yen daal nba g Nifosaal Bija tan bu yied kpienm siign.
41009010	K b tug l maam g bil b pala n, g yen ji bual b ŋmiɛl n g « yied kpienm siign » niimn tie bɛ i ?
41009011	Lann i k b bual Yiesu: « Laabaal g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda maad k Eli bu baal yo Kristo ń fid g baal i ? »
41009012	K u ŋmiɛn’m: « L tie mɔni i, Eli n daa bu kpiɛ g baal g ŋmagd bona kul. L yen tien nle i, k l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ g Nifosaal Bija bu cagn bonciɛnn k ban yie’og u ?
41009013	Ama n maad’i, Eli nuan baal’o, b sun’o ban bua nand i, nyan lan bo diɛn u po nand nyan. »
41009014	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bantaa ŋann bo pund u ŋuantieb nba bo tenn nyan buol, g la g niwulug gob g lind’b bonciɛnn, g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda sie g nai yen’m.
41009015	Niwulug n l la Yiesu yaa youg, k l lid’b bonciɛnn, k b san g baal g fuond’o.
41009016	G Yiesu bual’b: « Yinm yen b ne sie g nai bɛ i ? »
41009017	Lann i g niwulug n ninŋ, jua nne maad: « Canbaa, n baal yen n bija a buol i. Sanpola n ŋua’ɔg, k u muu, g kan fid g maad.
41009018	Naan buol kul l sanpola tu fuun g lu’ug tinŋ n ninŋ, u jiina kul ń sed, wan gii dua g ŋman nyina g mɔsankpinkpaaɔnŋ cuud. K n miɛl a ŋuantieb k ban bel g yaan l sanpola, k b g fid g bel’b. »
41009019	Lann i g Yiesu maad’b: « Yinm nibiid buolu ne, i g mɔg dindann baa waam nne. N biɛ baa be yen’i saa yen bɛ youg u ? N biɛ bu di sugl i po saa yen bɛ daal i ? Baal man yen l big nii. »
41009020	K b baal yen’o Yiesu buol. Sanpola n la Yiesu, ban fuun big g lu’ug tinŋ n, k u dua g bindl g mɔsankpinkpaaɔnŋ cuud.
41009021	G Yiesu bual big baa: « Bina ŋanŋaa n nyan k l tie’og nne i ? » K u ŋmiɛn g hal u bim n ninŋ yo.
41009022	G yenn youg, sanpola tu kpaan k ban kpi’ug u, g tud’o wan baa muu n lann i kaa nyum n. « Ama a gii bu fid, ŋan jie’ti ninbaaɔg g tod’ti. »
41009023	G Yiesu maad’o: « Laabaal k a yed k n gii bu fid i ? A g ban g baa siɛl g paa yua mɔg dindann po ii ? »
41009024	G bibaa tand g maad: « N mɔg dindann ! Tod’n k n dindann ń pugn. »
41009025	Yiesu n yaan la g niib bonciɛnn siɛn g baad g pugd nne, wan tiɛn yen paalu sanpola po g maad: « Yinm sanpola nba ŋua big, k u g gbiɛ g biɛ g maad ne ; ŋaa’ɔg man, g biɛ daa ban g ŋuan’o. »
41009026	G sanpola yign lem lem lem, g nyɔg big yen paalu, g yaad g ŋaa’ɔg. G big dua suoo nyan u kpe nyan. G niib nba bo be l buol nyan, g siɛb ji tua g big kpe o.
41009027	Lann i g Yiesu suol big nuu g fiin’o ; g big fiil g sed.
41009028	Yiesu n kun ŋaag yaa youg, k u ŋuantieb ŋuan g bual’o b kua n ninŋ: « Canbaa, l tien nle i k tinm yen g fid g bel g yaan l sanpola i ? »
41009029	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m g yaa sanpobuolu ne, jaandi kua i kaa, baa siɛl kan fid g bel g yaan’m.
41009030	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo nyiɛ l buol g tɔgn Galile doug n. Yiesu bo g bua g niib bann k u be,
41009031	g dugn u bo tund u ŋuantieb g maad’b: « B bu kuad Nifosaal Bija, niib ń suol’o g kpi’ug. U gii kpe, l daa ŋantaa daal u bu yied. »
41009032	Ama u ŋuantieb bo g gbiɛ l maam niimn, g yen jie yen ban bual’o.
41009033	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo pund Kafarnawunm doug n. Ban tan be ŋaag yaa youg nba, k u bual’b: « I bo nai yen lieb bɛ i sɔnu po i ? »
41009034	K u ŋuantieb ŋmin g g jiin siɛl, g dugn ban bo paa sɔnu po, b bo nai yen lieb g bua ban bann yua tie ciɛn i.
41009035	Lann i g Yiesu kal g yiin u ŋuantieb piig yen banle g maad’b: « Yua bua wan te ciɛn, wan gii tie nyan big nyan, g biɛ gii suun lieb kul po. »
41009036	G yugl big u ŋuantieb sinsiign ninŋ, g maad:
41009037	« Yua nba gaal big k u tie nyan u ne nyan, k l tie n sann po, u gaal min i. Yua nba gaal n mɔ, u g gaal min mɔno kaa, u gaal yua nba sun’n i. »
41009038	San bo maad Yiesu: « Canbaa, t la jua nne k u biel sanpola a sann po, g yen g tie a ŋuantua, k t bel’o k wan daa tie nnyan, g dugn u g be yen’ti. »
41009039	G Yiesu maad: « Daa biel’o man, g dugn nil g be, g bu tien yaalidug bonn n sann po, g biɛ guan g biil n sann l youg mɔno.
41009040	Lann, nil nba g kɔn yen’ti, u taa t po i.
41009041	Nil gii kabl nyum g tie’i k yin nyu g dugn i tie Kristo yab, yen mɔni n maad’i l daan kan luol u nyuad. »
41009042	« Yua n te g bid nba dug n po ne ninŋ, g baa yend tud Yendu sɔnu, b bo gii tug naal nba kpai g lol g jɔn u tulu n, g lu’ug mɔgl n ninŋ lann n bo baa su u po.
41009043	A nuu gii te k a tie biid, ŋan jiɛl’o ; a gii tie nuujenn g mɔg miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn lann n su yen ŋan gii mɔg a nui nle k ban yen lu’a muubuoug n ninŋ, naan g muu so g kan ban g junn, [
41009044	naan buol g nanguba nba kan kpe be, g muu nba so g kan ban g junn mɔ be.]
41009045	A tital mɔ gii te k a tie biid, ŋan cua g jend’o ; a gii tie taajenn, g mɔg miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn lann n su yen ŋan gii mɔg a titala ŋanle k ban yen lu’a muubuoug n, [
41009046	naan buol g nanguba nba kan kpe be, g muu nba so g kan ban g junn mɔ be.]
41009047	A ninbinn mɔ n biɛ l gii te k a tie biid, ŋan kpigd’o ; a gii kua Yendu ŋaag n g tie ninfiɛɔg, lann n su yen ŋan gii mɔg a ninbina ŋanle k ban yen lu’a muubuoug n,
41009048	naan buol g nanguba nba kan kpe be g muu nba so g kan ban g junn mɔ be.
41009049	B tan bu pag nil kul yen muu i nyan yaalm nyan.
41009050	Yaalm tie bonmɔnn i ; ama yaalm manu gii gbenn i, b bu tug bɛ i g guan g manŋ’o i ? Yaalm manu ń gii be i ninŋ, yin biɛ gii man man yen i lieb. »
41010001	Yiesu bo fiil l buol, g tɔgn Suurdɛn bɔnpuol po g gad Suude tinŋ n ninŋ. G niwulug yaan tigl u buol k u tund’b nyan wan tu tund’b nand nyan.
41010002	G Farisiɛn-nba baal u buol g bua ban bign’o g bual’o k l cab g nil ń nyan u ŋaapuo oo ?
41010003	K u mɔ guan g bual’b: « Moyis bo diɛn g maad’i k yin gii tie nle i ? »
41010004	K b jiin’o: « Moyis bo cab g nil gii bua n nyan u ŋaapuo, wan diɛn kadaaɔg nba ŋɔnŋ k u nyan’o g te’og g fid g nyan’o. »
41010005	G Yiesu maad’b: « I kangbadm po n te g Moyis bo diɛn l yiko i po.
41010006	Cilg youg Yendu n bo tag ŋanduna, u bo tag jua yen puo i.
41010007	L po n te g jua tu bu nya g ŋaa u naa yen u baa,
41010008	wano yen u puo ń taan g te gbannanyend kua. Nnyan b ji g tie niib banle kaa, b ji tie niyend i.
41010009	Lann, nifosaal ń daa paad Yendu n taan yal. »
41010010	Ban tan kun ŋaag, k u ŋuantieb guan g bual’o l maam po.
41010011	K u maad’b: « Nil gii nyan u ŋaapuo, g guan g kuan puolua, u tien cunconm n nyan puo nba k u nyan’o nyan po.
41010012	G puo nba mɔ gii nyiɛ g ŋaa u sal, g gad g kun jafan, u mɔ tien cunconm n nyan. »
41010013	Niib bo baal yen bid Yiesu buol k wan sii’b. G Yiesu ŋuantieb fu yen l niib.
41010014	Yiesu n la nnyan, k u pal bie u ŋuantieb po k u maad: « Ŋaa man g bid ń baal n buol, daa biel’b man, g dugn yab nba tie nyan banm nyan, Yendu diem tie b yal i.
41010015	Yen mɔni, n maad’i, yua g tuo g gaal Yendu bal nyan big nyan, u kan kua u diem n ninŋ. »
41010016	Lann i g lɔn lɔn bid, g maan nui b po g yad yedŋanm b po.
41010017	Yiesu bo nyiɛ g tug sɔnu g saa nne i, g jua nne san san g baal g baa g gbaan u nintual n ninŋ g bual’o: « Canbaa, fin nba mɔn, n bu tien bɛ i g tan la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn i ? »
41010018	G Yiesu maad’o: « Laabaal k a yed k n mɔn i ? Baa sua g mɔn, Yendu kua i kaa.
41010019	A yen ban Yendu mɔmaam ne: “ A kan kpi nil, a kan conm, a kan jan, a kan kun mɔnkunninkpind, a kan bɔnd g di a lua, cɔln a baa yen a naa. ” »
41010020	K l jua maad’o: « Canbaa, n cil g cɔln l kul ne g daa tie naasenbig i. »
41010021	Lann i g Yiesu diid l jua k u pal siɛd u po k u maad’o: « Bonyenn kua n pɔd’a, kun g daan kuad ŋan mɔg yal nba kul, g tug l ligli g biid tali, nnyan i k a bu la mɔgm Yendu ŋaag n. A gii tien nnyan ŋan baal gii ŋua’n. »
41010022	Ama l jua n gbad l maam, k u nunŋ po biil k u paan g saa yen pabɔnn, g dugn u bo mɔg ŋalman bonciɛnn.
41010023	Lann i g Yiesu nyuand u ŋuantieb, g maad k l paa yen yab mɔg ŋalman ń kua Yendu diem n.
41010024	K l maam yaa g lid u ŋuantieb. G Yiesu biɛ guan g maad’b: « N bid, l baa paa yen nil ń kua Yendu diem n.
41010025	Lan paa yuoyuoug po nand k u kan fid g kua kpalpienu bonn n nyan, ŋalmandaan gii bua n kua Yendu diem n, l baa paa u po g cie nnyan. »
41010026	K l ŋanm g yaa g lid u ŋuantieb, k b ji bual bual b ŋmiɛl n, k l gii tie nnyan ŋmaa n bu fid g la fielu i ?
41010027	G Yiesu nyuan’m suoo g tan maad: « Lann paa nifosaal po i ama l g paa Yendu po, g dugn siɛl g be g paa yen Yendu. »
41010028	Lann i g Piɛr maad’o: « Diid a, tinm nba ji ŋaa tin mɔg yal kul g ji ŋua’a ne ii ? »
41010029	G Yiesu maad’o: « Yen mɔni, n maad’i, nil gii yaad g ŋaa u ŋaag lann i kaa u ninjanm lann i kaa u niipuob lann i kaa u naa lann i kaa u baa lann i kaa u bid lann i kaa u kpaand, k l tie min yaa po yen Laabamann po,
41010030	l daan bu la nyuad taal kobg tinŋ po ne: ŋai yen ninjanm yen niipuob yen naa‑nba yen bid yen kpaand. Ama fala mɔ baa be. G youg nba baad mɔ, u bu la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
41010031	Yab nba gaal liig mɔlane, bonciɛnn tan bu juod. Yab juod mɔ, bonciɛnn tan bu gaal liig. »
41010032	Yiesu yen yab bo ŋua’ɔg nyan bo paa sɔnu, g do Serusalɛm, g Yiesu be b liig, k b yam pu. Jiwaani bo kua yab bo ŋua’ɔg nyan. G Yiesu yaan biɛ yiin u ŋuantieb piig yen banle k b baal u buol, k u maad’b yal nba bu baal’o:
41010033	« I la ii, t do Serusalɛm n nyan. B bu kuad Nifosaal Bija, salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda ń suol’o, g bu’ug, g jiɛl u buud k l tie k ban kpi’ug. B bu tug’o g cab buolfanu yab,
41010034	ban laa laa’ɔg, g sii mɔsand u po, g pua’ɔg yen naapuna, g kpi’ug, g daa ŋantaa daal, wan yied. »
41010035	Sebede bid Saak yen San bo nagn Yiesu buol g maad’o: « Canbaa, t bua k a tuo g tien t po tin bu miɛl’a yal. »
41010036	G Yiesu bual’b: « I bua min tien bɛ i, i po i ? »
41010037	K b maad’o: « T bua k a tan gii kal a yudand badkog po, ŋan te g yend ń kal a nuujendu, g lua ń kal a nuuganŋ. »
41010038	G Yiesu maad’b: « I g ban yin miɛd yal. I bu fid g tuo g gaal fala nba k n bu gaal ne ii ? Bii i bu fid g kua cicagm nba ninŋ k n bu kua ne i ? »
41010039	K b yed k b bu fid. G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « L tie mɔni k i bu gaal fala nba k n bu gaal ne, g biɛ kua cicagm nba ninŋ k n bu kua ne.
41010040	Ama yal tie n nuujendu po kinkaanu lann i kaa n nuuganŋ po kinkaanu nuan, l kan nya n po kaa. L kinkaani mɔg ban bobn yab nba po i.»
41010041	Yiesu ŋuantieb piig nba bo tenn nyan n gbad l maam, k b pala biil Saak yen San po.
41010042	Lann i g Yiesu yiin’m g maad’b: « I ban k yin diɛ g yab tie dougdanm nyan ŋɔnŋ niib b yikod, g paalu n be yab nuu n mɔ ŋɔnŋ niib b paalu.
41010043	Lan daa tie nnyan i yaa siign. Yua nba bua wan te i kul ne ciɛn, wan gii tie i tuonsunn.
41010044	Yua nba bua wan gii tie i kul ne liig yua, wan gii tie i yonm.
41010045	G dugn Nifosaal Bija g baal k wan gii kal g niib suun u po kaa, u baal k wan gii suun niib po i, g biɛ yid u miɛl salg g fiel niib bonciɛnn.»
41010046	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo pund Seriko doug n. Ban tan nya l doug n yaa youg nba, g niib bonciɛnn ŋuan’m. L sua g juan nne kal sɔnkunŋ g miɛd. L juan bo tie Time bija i, k b yi’ug Bartime.
41010047	Wan gbad g Nasarɛt Yiesu n pend, k u yign g maad: « Dafiid Bija Yiesu, a kan jie’n ninbaaɔg uu ? »
41010048	G niib bonciɛnn gaal jad u po, k wan suon. Bo ! K u ŋanm g yign yen paalu: « Dafiid Bija, jie’n ninbaaɔg a. »
41010049	Lann i g Yiesu sed g maad k ban yiin’o nii. K b yiin’o, g maad k wan paan u pal g fiil g baal, g Yiesu yi’ug.
41010050	K u feg g lu u gaalug, g kud g fiil g gad Yiesu buol.
41010051	G Yiesu bual’o k u bua wan tien bɛ i u po i ? K u ŋmiɛn: « Canbaa ! N bua k ŋan te k n nyuand i. »
41010052	G Yiesu maad’o: « I saa, a paag n nyan g dugn a dug n po. » L youg mɔno g juan ninbina luod k u nyuand, g mɔ ji ŋua Yiesu.
41011001	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo nag dobid nne k b yi Bɛtfaase yen Betani g ji g fag yen Serusalɛm. L dobid bo kpiɛ Oliif tiidi jual i. G Yiesu sun u ŋuantieb n ninŋ banle,
41011002	g maad’b: « Gad man doug nba be liig ne. I daan gii pund l doug n, i bu la g bonbig daag, g baa sua g ban g jag’o, yin dagd’o g guan yen’o nii.
41011003	Nil daan gii bual’i g laabaal k i dagd bonbig i ? Yin maad’o g Yonmdaan n bua, k u bu ŋmiɛn mɔlane mɔno. »
41011004	K u ŋuantieb gad g daan la g bonbig daag sɔnkunŋ g kpiɛ yen dimɔb. K b dagd’o.
41011005	L sua g niib nne be l buol, g yenm bual’b g laabaal k b dagd l bonbig i ?
41011006	K b ŋmiɛn’m nyan Yiesu n bo maad nand nyan, k b cab’b, k b lebd yenn.
41011007	Ban pund yen l bonbig Yiesu buol, k u ŋuantieb land b tiɛd g maan l bonŋ po, g Yiesu jag.
41011008	G niib bonciɛnn land b tiɛd g lad sɔnu po, g lieb kua kpaand n ninŋ g pad pad bendbid yen faad g mɔ lad sɔnu po.
41011009	G niib nba bo be u liig yen yab bo ŋua u puol po ji yign g maad: « Osaana ! Yua baad Yonmdaan sann po, Yendu ń yad u yedŋanm u po !
41011010	Yendu ń yad u yedŋanm t baa Dafiid bal nba baad ne po ! Osaana, Yendu sann ń do hal polu po ! »
41011011	Lann i g Yiesu pund Serusalɛm doug n, g gad g kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n. Wan diid bona nba kul tie l n ninŋ g gbenn, l sua g youg pend o, k wano yen u ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann gad Betani doug n.
41011012	L fann g Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb nya Betani doug n, g kom suol Yiesu.
41011013	K u la g kinkanŋ sie fagm g mɔg faad. Lann i g Yiesu saa kinkanŋ buol, g mali k u daan bu la kinkana l po i. Ama wan tan pund kinkanŋ buol, u la faad kua i l po. G dugn l bo g tie kinkana youg.
41011014	Lann i g Yiesu maad l kinkanŋ: « Baa sua ń ji daa ban g mua a yaa luana. » K u ŋuantieb gbad wan maad yal.
41011015	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo pund Serusalɛm g Yiesu kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g bel g yaan yab bo kuad yen yab bo daa bona l ninŋ kul, g tud yab nba bo cend ligli tieba yen yab kuad lanjeli kogi g lu lu.
41011016	G yie g niib ń daa tugd tuga g pend yenn jaanddeciɛɔnŋ lijɔug n.
41011017	G tund’b g maad: « L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: “ N ŋaag ne baa tie jaandi ŋaag i, ŋanduna yab kul po. ” K yinm yen ji tug g tien naayiga tintaanbuol. »
41011018	Salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda n gbad nnyan, k b ji kpaan ban bu tien nand g kpi’ug, g dugn b bo jie’og, k l maa u tundl bo manŋ niib pala bonciɛnn.
41011019	Daajuoug n tan baal, g Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb nyiɛ l doug n.
41011020	L fann siŋaaɔg n, g Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb pend g la g kinkanŋ ŋann kuol yen u jiina kul.
41011021	G Piɛr tiɛd yal nba won tien, g maad Yiesu: « Canbaa diid, ŋan won luul kinkanŋ nba mɔtonn nyan kuol o. »
41011022	G Yiesu gaal maam g maad’b: « I dug man Yendu po.
41011023	Yen mɔni n maad’i, nil gii maad jual ne, k wan figd g daan baa mɔgl n, g g mali munle-le, g yen daan k wan maad yal bu tien, u kon bu la, lan tien yen mɔni.
41011024	L po n te k n maad’i, i gii jaand g miɛl Yendu yal nba kul, yin gii daan k i la u, Yendu bu te’i yin miɛl yal nba.
41011025	G youg nba k i sie g jaand mɔ, g tiɛd k i mɔg maam yen nil, yin di sugl l daan po, k i Baa nba be polu po ń mɔ ń fid g di sugl i biid po. [
41011026	Ama l gii tie k i g di sugl i lieb po, i Baa nba be polu po mɔ kan di sugl i biid po.] »
41011027	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo guan g lebd Serusalɛm. G Yiesu tan waa g gɔd jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Suif‑nba nikpela nagn u buol,
41011028	g bual’o: « A diɛ yikod lann i g suun tuona nba ne ii ? Ŋmaa n cab’a yikod k a gii suun l tuona i ? »
41011029	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « N mɔg bonyenn kua i g mɔ bu bual’i. I gii guan g jiin’n, n mɔ bu maad’i yua nba cab’n yikod k n diɛ g suun l tuona.
41011030	Maad man’n, ŋmaa n bo cab San Nyunwultua k u wuul niib nyum i ? Yendu bii niib i ? »
41011031	K b maad maad b ŋmiɛl n k nne: « T gii yed g Yendu u, u bu bual’ti g laabaal k t bo g tuo g gaal San maam i ?
41011032	T biɛ kan fid g yed g niib mɔ. » (B bo jie niwulug g dugn niib kul bo ban g San Nyunwultua tie Yendu sogni yen mɔni.)
41011033	Lann i k b maad Yiesu: « T g ban. » G Yiesu maad’b: « N mɔ kan maad’i yua cab’n l yikod k n suun l tuona. »
41012001	L puol po g Yiesu cil g pua’b makpanjam g maad: « Jua nne n bo ŋuun dimɔunŋ tiidi u kpaab n, g pua gɔglug g lind. G gbiil buoug nba k b baa ŋmaad dimɔunŋ tiidi luana g nyanŋ l nyum, g maa defagdug nne g niib tu bu do l po gii guu kpaab. G tug l kpaab g guun tuonsunna, k l tan gii bie ban bɔgd u yal g te’og. Lann i g fiil g gad sɔnu.
41012002	Dimɔunŋ tiidi luana n tan bie yaa youg k u sun u naasen, tuonsunna ŋann buol, k wan gad g gaal u tiidi luana biinu nii.
41012003	G tuonsunna ŋann suol’o, g pua’ɔg bonŋann, g bel’o g g tie’og siɛl.
41012004	K u biɛ sun naasenlua, k b suol u mɔ g pua pua u yul, g sugl sugl’o.
41012005	K u biɛ guan g sun naasenlua b buol, k b suol wano g kpii’ug. G kpaabdaan ŋann biɛ l sun u naasenm bonciɛnn u tuonsunna ŋann buol, k b suol naasenyenm g pua’b, g lieb mɔ k b kpii’b.
41012006	K l tan tenn’o u bija nba k u ŋanm g bua’ɔg kua. K u ji juod g sun’o g maad: “ B daan gii la n bija nuan b bu cɔlm’o. ”
41012007	Ama tuonsunna ŋann n la u bija, k b maad b ŋmiɛl n: “ Yua tan bu di faal n nyan, baal man tin taan g kpi’ug g yend faal. ”
41012008	Lann i k b suol u bija g kpii’ug, g nyan’o kpaab n ninŋ, g lu’ug siɛl po. »
41012009	G Yiesu ji bual’b: « Kpaabdaan ŋann ji bu tien u tuonsunna ŋann nle i ? Kpaabdaan bu gad g biɛn tuonsunna ŋann kul, g tug u kpaab g guun nifanm i.
41012010	I g ban g lii Yendu Kadaaɔg n, naan k b diɛn g maad k nne ii ? “ Tann nba g tanmaala bo yie g lu nyan, lann n tan guan g te dieog fiɛgl tanjal.
41012011	Yonmdaan tuonn n nyan. K t la, k l ŋan t po. ” »
41012012	Yiesu n maad nnyan g gbenn g Suif‑nba yudanm ji kpaan ban bu tien nand g suol’o, g dugn b bo bann k u pua banm i l makpanjam. Ama ban bo jie niwulug nyan, k b ŋaa’ɔg g paan g saa.
41012013	Suif‑nba yudanm n bo bua g Yiesu maam ń guan g suol’o nyan, k b sun Farisiɛn-nba yen Erod cagl yab u buol,
41012014	k b baal g bual’o: « Canbaa, t ban k a tie mamɔnmaad, g maad g g jie sua, g dugn a g nyuan niib nuni po kaa g maad, ama a tund niib g ŋɔnŋ’b yen mɔni Yendu n bua ban gii be nand i. Maad’ti, l cab k tin pa Sesaar lonpo bii, l g cab i ? Tin pa bii tin daa pa i ? »
41012015	G Yiesu bann b maalm g maad’b: « Bɛ po i k i bua n bign’n i ? Tug man dibayenn nii k n diid. »
41012016	K b tug dibayenn g tie’og, k u bual’b: « Ŋmaa ninnaɔnŋ yen ŋmaa sann n be l po i ? » K b yed g Sesaar yal i.
41012017	Lann i g Yiesu maad’b: « Te man Sesaar, yal nba tie Sesaar yal, g te Yendu mɔ yal nba tie Yendu yal. » K l yaa g lid’b yen Yiesu n jiin’m nand.
41012018	Sadusien-nba, (banm nba bo g tuo g kpienm tan bu yied nyan), bo baal Yiesu buol g bual’o:
41012019	« Canbaa, Moyis bo diɛn yiko ne g tie’ti, k l gii tie g nil kuan puo, g kpe g g mɔg big, u ninja ń tug u pekual g mal’o bid.
41012020	To, jab banlile nne bo be g tie ninjann. G ciɛn po kuan puo g kpe g g mɔg big,
41012021	g yua tua u po, tug l pekual g mɔ kpe g g mɔg big, g yua tua u po mɔ k l biɛ tien’o nnyan.
41012022	G saa saa g daan biin l jab banlile, g baa sua g mɔg big yen’o. K l puol po g puo mɔ yuand g kpe.
41012023	To, kpienm yiedu daal, b gii yied kpienm siign, ŋmaa n ji bu yend puo i ? K l maa banm banlile kul kuan’o g la. »
41012024	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Yin maad nand ne, i tud sɔnu u. G dugn i g gbiɛ Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni niimn, i biɛ g ban Yendu paalu n ja nand.
41012025	Bann man g kpienm yiedu puol po, jab kan kuan puob, puob mɔ kan kun jab. B kul baa be nyan malɛg‑nba nyan i, Yendu ŋaag n.
41012026	G kpienm yiedu po i, i g lii Moyis kadaaɔg n Yendu n bo maad Moyis yal tuntuug nba bo so muu nyan buol ii ? U bo maad’o: “ Min n tie Abraham Yendu yen Isaak Yendu yen Sakɔb Yendu. ”
41012027	Yendu g tie kpienm Yendu kaa u tie fuodb Yendu i. I kpiɛd sɔnu paaa. »
41012028	Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanband nne bo la k b nai yen lieb. Wan gbad g Yiesu ŋanm g jiin’m nyan, k u nagn g bual’o: « Yendu mɔmaam n ninŋ, mɔmalanm po n cie liel‑nba kul i ? »
41012029	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn: « Mɔmaam nba cie liel‑nba kul n ne: “ Israyɛl buolu, i cenŋ, Yonmdaan t Yendu kua n tie Yonmdaan ;
41012030	a baa bua Yonmdaan a Yendu yen a pal kul yen a munn kul yen a maalm kul yen a paalu kul. ”
41012031	Liel nba tua n ne: “ A baa bua a lua nyan a kua nyan. ” Yendu mɔmaam ji g be g cie lann bona ŋanle ne. »
41012032	Lann i g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanband maad Yiesu: « Canbaa, l ŋan, a maad mɔni i g Yendu tie yeno kua i, sua g be, wano kua i kaa.
41012033	L tie g nil ń gii bua’ɔg yen u pal kul, yen u maalm kul yen u paalu kul g biɛ gii bua u lua nyan u kua nyan. Lann n cie bonkobd nba k b tu kpi g juu g yid Yendu salg yen sali nba be kul. »
41012034	Yiesu n la k u jiin yen yanfuom k u maad’o k u g fag yen Yendu diem. L po n pend, baa sua ji g tuo g bu bual Yiesu buali.
41012035	Yiesu bo gaal maam g tund niib jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n g maad: « L tien nle i g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda tua g Kristo tie Dafiid yaabuonn i ?
41012036	Foŋanm paalu bo te k wano Dafiid mɔno maad Kristo po k nne: “ Yonmdaan Yendu maad n Yonmdaan: Kal n nuujendu, saa yen youg nba k n tan bu te a ninnanda kul ń gbaan a nintual n. ”
41012037	Dafiid mɔno gii yi Kristo k u Yonmdaan, l bu tien nle i u Yonmdaan ń biɛ guan gii tie u yaabuonn i ? » Niwulug nba bo be l buol bo cenŋ Yiesu maam yen pamann.
41012038	Yiesu bo tund niib g maad: « Suol man i kua yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda. Banm n bua ban tu liɛ liɛdfagd gii waa, g biɛ bua k b tu gii baal naan niib n ninŋ, niib ń gii fuond’b.
41012039	G bua ban gii kaal liig kinkaani po tintaann died n yen jaanm n be naan kul.
41012040	Banm n fe pekɔa ŋalman kul, g tu jaand lan wai bonciɛnn g niib ń la’b. Lann n te g buud daal Yendu bu ŋanm g dad b tubl lan gbad’b. »
41012041	Yiesu bo kal g kpiɛ ban kpiend ligli naan g nyuan niib k b baad g kpiend ligli. G ligdanm bonciɛnn baal g kpien ligli k l yab.
41012042	G pekɔtalg nne mɔ tan baal g kpien dibala ŋanle nba g mɔg fuom.
41012043	Lann i g Yiesu te k u ŋuantieb nagn u buol k u maad’b: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, pekɔtalg ne n kpien ligli nba yab g cie nil kul n kpien yal.
41012044	G dugn b kul kpien ligli nba kan wad b mɔgm i. Ama pekual ne nuan tond wan mɔg yal g baa di kul n nyan g baal g kpien. »
41013001	Yiesu bo nya jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n k u ŋuantieb n ninŋ yend maad’o: « Canbaa, a la ban tug tana nba g maa jaanddeciɛɔnŋ uu ? A la ban maa’ɔg k u ja nand ii ? »
41013002	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « A la ban maa’ɔg k u ja nand a, l kul tan bu bed g duan tinŋ n sa‑la‑la-la, g baa tanyenn kan tenn gii tua liel po. »
41013003	G Yiesu tan kal Oliif tiidi jual po g tuol jaanddeciɛɔnŋ, g Piɛr yen Saak yen San yen Andre bual’o b kua n ninŋ:
41013004	« Maad’ti, youg nba k l bona kul ne tan bu tien yen yal tan bu ŋɔn, k l youg pund. »
41013005	G Yiesu ji cil g maad’b: « Suol man i kua, g daa ŋaa baa sua ń bɔnd’i.
41013006	Niib bonciɛnn tan bu baal gii kub n sann g tua k banm n tie Kristo. B bu bɔnd niib bonciɛnn ban tud sɔnu.
41013007	I tan gii gbad g niib maad tɔb maam lann i kaa g tɔb bu baal, i yam ń daa ŋmad kaa, l bual k l kul ne n tien yo, ama l daa kan gii tie ŋanduna juodu kaa.
41013008	Buolu tu tan bu fiil g kɔn yen buollua, doug ń fiil g kɔn yen dolieog. Tinŋ tu tan bu jeg dingbana bonciɛnn n ninŋ, g kom mɔ ń biɛ baa. L bona kul ne daa tie madyiɛlu cilg i.
41013009	Suol man i kua. Niib tan bu kuad’i g suol’i g gad yen’i g te buuddanm. Niib tan bu pua’i gbana tintaann died n. B bu gad yen’i dougdanm yen batieb buol g dugn n po, yin kun mɔni n po.
41013010	L tie k ban cind g muand n Laabamann ŋanduna buoli kul yo.
41013011	B gii suol g saa yen’i buuddanm buol, yin daa mali yin daan bu maad yal kaa. Youg gii pund yin maad yal nba kua i pal n l youg mɔno, g dugn yinm mɔno kaa bu maad, Foŋanm n bu maad i po.
41013012	Nil tan bu kuad u ninja ban kpi’ug. Bibaa mɔ ń kuad u big ban kpi’ug. Bid tan bu fiil g kɔn yen b danm g te ban kpi’b.
41013013	Niib kul tan kan gii bua i nublu g dugn n po. Ama yua nba juun saa yen juog, Yendu tan bu fiel wano i. »
41013014	« I tan gii la bonbiiug nba ŋmad niib yam baal g be naan buol nba k l bo g dagd k wan gii be, (yua nba lii kadaaɔg ne wan gbad l niimn), l youg, yab nba be Suude doug n ban san g kua jɔa n ninŋ.
41013015	Yua n be deliɛkaɔg po, wan daa yed k u bu jiid g kua dieog n g tug u tiɛd.
41013016	Yua n be kpaab n mɔ ń ji daa yed k u bu lebd g kun g tug u liɛdl.
41013017	L dani n ninŋ, fala bu gbad puotinpunma yen sanpandi naa‑nba.
41013018	I jaand man k lan daa tuu yen sabɔunŋ youg.
41013019	G dugn l dani n ninŋ niib bu cagn cicagm nba k b g ban g la hal Yendu n tag ŋanduna o. Nil biɛ ji kan ban g cagn l cicagbuolu liem.
41013020	L bo gii tie g Yonmdaan g wad l cicagm dana, baa nil bo kan ciɛl. Ama u nigannkab po n te k u wad l dana.
41013021	Lann nil tan gii maad’i g Kristo be ne, lann i kaa k u be ne po, yin daa tuo k l tie mɔni.
41013022	G dugn faaɔgdanm tan bu fiil g yed k banm n tie Kristo, lieb ń yed k b tie Yendu sogni‑nba, b tan bu tien palug yen yaalidug bona bonciɛnn, l gii tie k b bo bu fid, ban bɔnd Yendu nigannkab mɔno.
41013023	Suol man i kua yen bona nba bu baal. N tuod g maad’i l kul ne n nyan. »
41013024	« L dana n ninŋ, l cicagciɛnm po gii pend, yendu bu bɔnn i, ŋmaalg mɔ biɛ ji kan gii pien.
41013025	Ŋmaabid bu ciel polu po g baa baa, bona nba be polu po g mɔg paalu kul ń sag g ŋmad yen liel.
41013026	L youg u, k b bu la g Nifosaal Bija be tawalgband n, g baad yen u paaciɛnu yen u yudand.
41013027	U tan bu sun malɛg‑nba, ban taan u nigannkab nba be yaanŋ yen yanbaɔnŋ, puol yen nintual, ŋanduna n cil naan, g daan juod naan nba. »
41013028	« Gaal man tundl ne kinkanŋ buol. Youg nba k u tɔ bendmaana k u faad cil bundu, i ban g kpanyil nag.
41013029	Nnyan, i mɔ tan gii la k l bona tie, yin bann g Nifosaal Bija nag o, k u ji be i dimɔi n i.
41013030	Yen mɔni n maad’i, l kul ne bu tien g sua g mɔlane niib nba be ne, g siɛb daa g kpe.
41013031	Polu yen tinŋ kul bu pend, ama n maam nuan kan ban g pend.
41013032	Baa sua g ban daal, g bual youg nba k l bona kul ne bu tien. Malɛg‑nba nba be polu g ban, Yendu Bija mɔno g ban. N Baa Yendu kua i kaa.
41013033	I ceg man i kua po g daa guand man, g dugn i g ban youg nba k l bona kul bu tien.
41013034	L tan baa tie nyan nil n tu bua n gad sɔnu, g tug u ŋaag g guun u tuonsunna nyan i, g ŋɔn yua kul tuonn nba k u bu sun, g maad yua guu ŋaag nyan mɔ, k wan ŋanm gii guu dimɔb g daa guand.
41013035	Lann daa guand man, g dugn i g ban ŋaagdaan n bu kpen yaa youg. U bu kpen daajuoug uu, yɔugsiiug uu, kuutonmɔni ii, siŋaafaani ii, sua g ban.
41013036	K wan tan daa kpen g sua k i guand.
41013037	Min maad yal ne l nyuan sua kul i. Lann, i nyuan man g daa guand. »
41014001	Suif‑nba fielu jaanm yen dana nba k b bo tu ŋman kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan bo tenn daa ŋanle i, g salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda ji kpaan ban bu tien ninfanm nba g suol Yiesu g kpi’ug.
41014002	G ji maad b ŋmiɛl n k lan daa tie jaanm dani n, k lann i kaa niib tan bu kpid wounŋ.
41014003	Yiesu bo be Betani doug n i, Simɔn nba bo tie gbaadl nyan ŋaag n. G puo nne tan kua g sua g Yiesu kal g di. L puo bo kub tilaali nne k b tien yen naar kukua k l be kunkɔnŋanŋ nne ninŋ. L tilaali daaɔg bo paa. K u luod l kunkɔnŋ, g bud tilaali Yiesu yul po.
41014004	Niib nba bo be l buol n la nnyan, g yenm pala bie, k b ji maad b ŋmiɛl n, g bɛ yaa tilaali biilu n nyan i ?
41014005	K b bo bu fid g tug l tilaali g kuad, g gaal dibala kobiintaa g biid tali. Lann i g ji fu yen l puo.
41014006	G Yiesu maad’b: « Bɛ po n te k i kɔn yen l puo i ? Ŋaa’ɔg man, u tien bonŋann i n po.
41014007	Tali nuan baa l be yen’i youg kul i. Yin bua youg nba kul, i bu fid g tod’b. Ama min nuan kan gii be yen’i youg kul.
41014008	Puo ne tien wan bo bu fid g tien yal n po i. U tuod g seln n kuum i g tien tilaali n gbanu po.
41014009	Yen mɔni n maad’i, ban bu muand Laabamann ŋanduna n ninŋ naan buol nba kul, b bu maad puo ne n tien yal, g tiɛd u po. »
41014010	Yiesu ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann ninŋ yend, yua k b bo yi’ug Suuda Iskariyɔt, bo gad g la salg-yidkab ciɛnm g bu kuad Yiesu.
41014011	Ban gbad nnyan, k b pala manŋ k b puon’o k b bu te’og ligli. G Suuda Iskariyɔt ji kpaan wan bu tien nand g suol Yiesu g te’b.
41014012	Dana nba ninŋ k b tu ŋman kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan, l dacincinn daal i, k b tu kpi pebid. L daal i g Yiesu ŋuantieb bual’o: « A bua tin gad lɛ i g bobn Fielu jaanm a po i ? »
41014013	Lann i g Yiesu sun u ŋuantieb n ninŋ banle g maad’b: « Gad man doug n, i daan bu tuog jua nne, k u tug sual yen nyum, yin gii ŋua’ɔg.
41014014	U daan gii kua ŋaag nba ninŋ yin maad l ŋaagdaan: “ T canbaa maad: ‘N liɛ dieog nba ninŋ k n bu di Fielu jaanm yen n ŋuantieb i ?’ ”
41014015	U bu ŋɔn’i deciɛɔnŋ nne k l be detuadug po, g bona kul be l ninŋ. L deciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ i, k i bu bobn Fielu jaanm. »
41014016	Lann i k u ŋuantieb gad. Ban pund doug n, k l bona kul tien nyan Yiesu n bo maad’b nand nyan. K b bobn Fielu jaanm.
41014017	L daal daajuoug, g Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann pund.
41014018	Ban tan kal g di yaa youg, g Yiesu maad’b: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, yinm nba taan g di yen’n ne, i ninŋ yend bu kuad’n. »
41014019	K u ŋuantieb kul yam ŋmad k b ji bual’o yend yend: « Min yaa aa ? »
41014020	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Yinm piig yen banle ne ninŋ yend, yua nba taan g suun saaŋmanŋ n yen’n, wano n bu kuad’n.
41014021	Nifosaal Bija nuan bu kpe nyan ban bo diɛn nand u po Yendu Kadaaɔg n nyan i. Ama fala bu gbad daan nba bu kuad’o. B bo gii g mal l daan, lann n bo baa su u po. »
41014022	Ban bo di yaa youg g Yiesu tug kpanu, g tien Yendu balg, g jend jend g tie u ŋuantieb g maad: « Gaal man, ne tie n gbannand i. »
41014023	G biɛ tug dimɔunŋ yen ŋmanŋ g tien Yendu balg, g tie u ŋuantieb k b kul nyuu.
41014024	K u maad’b: « Ne tie n sɔm i, Yendu yen niib dɔnnu sɔm, sɔm nba wul niib bonciɛnn po.
41014025	Yen mɔni n maad’i, n ji kan ban g nyu dimɔunŋ ne saa yen daal nba k n tan bu guan g nyu dimɔnpaanm Yendu ŋaag n. »
41014026	L puol po k b yin biɛyani g fiil g duo Oliif tiidi jual po.
41014027	Lann i g Yiesu maad u ŋuantieb: « I kul bu yad g ŋaa’n, g dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: “ N tan bu pua g kpi pekpaal, pei kul ń yad. ” »
41014028	G Yiesu guan g pugn: « Ama n gii yied, n bu gaal liig g daan guul’i Galile. »
41014029	Lann i g Piɛr maad: « B kul gii yad g ŋaa’a, min nuan g saa siɛl. »
41014030	G Yiesu maad’o: « Yen mɔni n maad’a, dinne nyiɛɔg ne mɔno, a bu nai taal muntaa k a g ban’n g sua g kolg daa g mɔ taal munle po. »
41014031	G Piɛr pua pal g maad: « L gii tie kuum mɔno, min yen fin n bu taan g kpe, n kan nai k n g ban’a nuan. » K u ŋuantieb nba tenn kul mɔ maad nnyan.
41014032	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo pund naan buol nba k b yi Gɛtsemani. G Yiesu maad u ŋuantieb: « Kal man ne, k n daa gad g jaand o. »
41014033	Lann i g yiin Piɛr yen Saak yen San k b paan g saa. G jiwaani ji cil g kua’ɔg, k u yam yaad.
41014034	K u maad’b: « N yam kul ŋmad k l naan n bu kpe. I kal man ne g daa guand man. »
41014035	G Yiesu sud g gad liig waam g baa g gbaan g jaand g maad k l gii tie k l bu fid, wan daa ŋaa l fala youg ń baal’o.
41014036	G Yiesu biɛ maad: « N Baa, baa siɛl g paa a po, fagn l fala yen’n. Ama lan daa tie n yaa buam n kaa, lan tien nyan ŋan bua nand nyan. »
41014037	K u guan u ŋuantieb buol g sua k b ji guand i. K u bual Piɛr: « Simɔn, a guand yaa aa ? A g fid g kal g guul’n baa kudyeonŋ uu ?
41014038	Daa guand man gii jaand, g daa baa bignn n. I yam bua, g paalu yen ji pɔd’i. »
41014039	Lann i g Yiesu biɛ guan g sud g gad liig waam, g jaand g maad lanbona nba k u bo kpiɛ g maad nyan.
41014040	G lebd g guan u ŋuantieb buol, g sua k b biɛ guand k b ningbaad kul kpai. B bo g ban ban bu jiin’o yal nba.
41014041	K u guan muntaa po g ji maad’b: « I dua g guand man. I dua g fei man, l ji dagd, youg pund n nyan. B bu kuad Nifosaal Bija mɔlane, biiddanm ń suol’o.
41014042	Fiil man tin gad, yua bu kuad’n baal o.»
41014043	Yiesu daa bo g maad g gbenn mɔno k u ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann n ninŋ yend baal, yua k b bo yi’ug Suuda nyan. U bo yeg yen niib bonciɛnn k b diɛ jugi yen lanbana. Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen doug n nikpela n bo sun’m.
41014044	Wano nba bo bu kuad Yiesu bo maad niib ŋanm, k u daan gii muad yua nba tankpinn, ban gii ban k ban kpaan yua n nyan. K ban suol’o g ŋanm gii diɛ’ɔg g gad yen’o.
41014045	Suuda n tan pund yaa youg k u nagn Yiesu buol g maad: « Canbaa ! » G muad u tankpinn.
41014046	Lann i g Suuda n bo yeg yen niib nba nyan nagn g suol Yiesu.
41014047	G niib nba bo be yen Yiesu nyan ninŋ yend dad g nɔd jug, g cua g jiɛl salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tuonsunn tubl.
41014048	G Yiesu gaal maam g maad’b: « I baal g bua n suol’n g diɛ jugi yen lanbana nyan n tie bibiɛdg nyan ii ?
41014049	Daal kul n daan tu be yen’i, g tund niib jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n k i g suol’n. Ama l tien nnyan g yal diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n, ń tien yen mɔni i. »
41014050	L youg k u ŋuantieb kul san g yad g ŋaa’ɔg.
41014051	L sua g naasen nne ŋua Yiesu g gbab cincenn kua. K b gab g suol’o g dagd yen cincenn.
41014052	K u ŋaa’b yen cincenn g san niiyann g ciɛl.
41014053	B bo gad yen Yiesu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn ŋaag. G salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen doug n nikpela yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda taan lieb l buol.
41014054	L bo sua g Piɛr ŋua b puol po g be hal fagm. Wan tan pund k u kua g kal salg-yidkab kul ciɛn lijɔug n, g yie muu yen l buol tuonsunna.
41014055	G salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Suif‑nba buuddanm ji kpaan niib n bu fa g Yiesu tien yal, k ban fid te k ban kpi’ug, g g la.
41014056	G dugn niib bonciɛnn bo fa faaɔg g jalg Yiesu, ama sua yaa maam bo g taa yen u lua.
41014057	G yenm tan fiil g fa faaɔg g jalg Yiesu g maad:
41014058	« T daan gbad k u maad, k u bu mud jaanddeciɛɔnŋ nba g niib maa yen b nui, g guan g maa liel g gbenn daa ŋantaa k l g tie yen niib nui. »
41014059	L maam po mɔno, b bo g fid g taan mɔb.
41014060	Lann i g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn fiil g sed niib kul siign g bual Yiesu: « A kan jiin siɛl ii ? A g mɔg siɛl g bu maad niib n jalg’a yal po ne ii ? »
41014061	G Yiesu g jiin baa siɛl l po. Lann i g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn biɛ guan g bual’o: « A tie Kristo yaa aa, Yendu nba k t dond’o ne Bija ii ? »
41014062	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn: « Ɛɛn n tie wano i. I tan bu la Nifosaal Bija k u kal Paaciɛnudaan jendu. I biɛ tan bu la’ɔg k u nyiɛ polu po g ji yen tawalgband. »
41014063	L youg g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn dad g pad wano mɔno tiɛd g maad k l g tie ban biɛ ji kpaan sieda‑nba kaa,
41014064	k n tua b gbad wan maad yal g sugd Yendu waa, k b ji mali nle i u po i ? K b kul taan k l dagd yen ban kpi’ug.
41014065	Lann i g yenm ji tu sii mɔsand u po, g pibn u nunŋ po, g kud’o nuukula, g nyaan maad: « Bund g bann yua nba pua’a. » G salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tuonsunna mɔ suol’o g pua pua’ɔg tanpai.
41014066	Piɛr bo kal lijɔug n ninŋ i. G salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tuonsunna n ninŋ, sipaanyend tan baal
41014067	g la Piɛr k u yie muu k u nyuan’o suoo g tan maad: « A mɔ tu be yen l Nasarɛt Yiesu i. »
41014068	G Piɛr nai g maad: « Min g ban, min g gbiɛ a maam ne niimn. » Lann i g Piɛr nyiɛ g kua cugl n, [l youg g kuutounŋ buud.]
41014069	G sipaan ŋann biɛ la’ɔg, g maad niib nba bo be l buol nyan: « U ne tie Yiesu ŋuantua i. »
41014070	G Piɛr biɛ nai. K l yann waam nne, g niib nba bo be l buol nyan maad Piɛr: « Mɔni, a l tie Yiesu ŋuantua i. K l maa a tie Galile jua i. »
41014071	Lann i g Piɛr nai g pol: « Min g ban yin maad jua nba ne. »
41014072	L youg g kuutounŋ buud taal munle po, g Piɛr tiɛd Yiesu n bo maad’o yal: « A bu nai k a g ban’n taal muntaa g kolg daa g buud taal munle po. » Lann i g Piɛr cil g ji buud.
41015001	L fann siŋapanpan g salg-yidkab ciɛnm taan g kal yen doug n nikpela yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen buuddanm kul g taan mɔb, g lol Yiesu g gad yen’o g daan tie’og Pilat.
41015002	G Pilat bual Yiesu: « A tie Suif‑nba bad yaa aa ? » K u ŋmiɛn’o: « Fin n maad. »
41015003	Lann i g salg-yidkab ciɛnm maad maam bonciɛnn g jalg Yiesu.
41015004	G Pilat guan g bual Yiesu: « A kan jiin baa siɛl ii ? A g gbiɛ ban jalg’a yal nba kul po ne ii ? »
41015005	Ama g Yiesu g jiin baa siɛl, k l yaa g lid Pilat.
41015006	Suif‑nba fielu jaanm kul, Pilat bo tu luod dansalyenŋ i, g ŋaa’ɔg, yua nba g niib taan g bual k wan luod’o.
41015007	L bo sua g jua nne be dansaldieog n k b yi’ug Barabas. Wano yen u bibiɛdlei n bo kpid wounŋ g kpii nil, k b suol’b g luon.
41015008	G niwulug duo Pilat buol g miɛl’o k wan tien wan tu tie yal b po jaanm kul nyan.
41015009	Lann i g Pilat ŋmiɛn’m k b bua wan ŋaa Suif‑nba bad yaa aa ?
41015010	U bo maad nnyan g dugn u bo ban g nanŋ po i, g salg-yidkab ciɛnm suol Yiesu g baal yen’o u buol.
41015011	Ama g salg-yidkab ciɛnm tud tud niwulug k ban maad k b bua wan luod Barabas i.
41015012	G Pilat guan g bual’b: « Yua k i yi’ug Suif‑nba bad nyan i, n tien’o nle ? »
41015013	K b kul guan g yign g maad: « Te k ban kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po ! »
41015014	Lann i g Pilat bual’b k u biil bɛ i ? K b biɛ ŋanm g yign g maad: « Te k ban kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po ! »
41015015	Pilat n bo bua k wan manŋ niib pala nyan k u luod Barabas g ŋaa’ɔg, g nyaan te k b pua Yiesu gbana, k u cab k ban tug’o g daan kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po.
41015016	G sijenm tug Yiesu g kua yen’o buuddaan ŋaag, wan kaal naan g bu buud, g yiin b sijelieb kul.
41015017	Lann i g lan’o gaalmɔunŋ g lug kunkoni feglg g yilm’o,
41015018	g ji tu fuond’o g maad: « T fuond’a naa, Suif‑nba bad ! »
41015019	G tug lanbann g pua u yul po, g sii mɔsand u po, g nyaan gbaan u nunŋ n ninŋ nyan b bua n pug’o nyan.
41015020	Sijenm n laa laa’ɔg g gbenn, k b land gaalmɔunŋ ŋann g guan g lan’o u tiɛd g ji tug’o g saa g daan bu kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po.
41015021	Ban bo nyiɛ yen Yiesu g saa g daan bu kpaa’ɔg g la Siirɛnn jua nne k b yi’ug Simɔn, yua tie Alɛksandr yen Rufus baa, k u nyiɛ kpaab n g kun, k b niin’o k u tug Yiesu dapunpɔnn.
41015022	K b gad yen Yiesu naan buol nba k b yi Gɔlgota nyan. L niimn n tie g Yukpabug buol.
41015023	G tug dimɔunŋ k l ŋmad yen bonn nne k b yi miir g tie Yiesu k wan gaal g nyu. K u yie g g nyuu.
41015024	Lann i k b kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po g tug u tiɛd g tɔ tiɛ tiɛ g biid biid.
41015025	L bo tie siŋaaɔg n kud munwai i, k b kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po.
41015026	G diɛn diɛni nne k l ŋɔnŋ wan biil yal nba k b kpaa’ɔg, g tabn l dapunpɔnn po. Ban bo diɛn yal nba n ne: « Suif‑nba bad. »
41015027	B bo kpaa bibiɛdi banle nne mɔ g pugn Yiesu po. Yend bo be u nuujendu po, g lua be u nuuganŋ po.
41015028	[K l ji tien nyan Yendu Kadaaɔg n bo maad nand nyan: « B tug’o g taan yen bibiɛdi. »]
41015029	G niib nba pend l buol ji tu sugd’o g gum gum yul g maad: « Fin i, a daan g yed k a bu fid g mud jaanddeciɛɔnŋ g guan g maa daa ŋantaa g gbenn ii ?
41015030	Ji fiel a kua g nya dapunpɔnn po g jiid k t diid. »
41015031	G salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda mɔ ji tu laa’ɔg g maad b kua n ninŋ: « U daan fiel nilieb, wan ji mɔnd g fiel u kua mɔ.
41015032	Israyɛl bad Kristo ń ji fiel u kua g nya dapunpɔnn po g jiid, k tin la g bann k u tie Kristo yen mɔni, gii dug u po. » G bibiɛdi nba k b bo kpaa’b g kpiɛn’o nyan mɔ ji sugd’o.
41015033	Piig yen kud munle po, g doug kul bɔnn cinmm, saa yen daajuoug kud muntaa.
41015034	L kud muntaa youg u, g Yiesu yign yen paalu g maad: «Eloyi Eloyi, lama sabaktani ?» L niimn n tie k: « N Yendu, n Yendu bɛ po i k a ŋaa’n i ? »
41015035	G niib nba bo be l buol nyan, yenm gbad g maad k u ji ta g yi Eli i.
41015036	L youg g yend san g gad g daan tug ciesuobu g nyua dimiigl n, g tuun laalu po, g tie’og k wan nyu, g nyaan maad k ban ŋaa k ban diid g liɛ Eli bu baal g fiel’o o ?
41015037	Lann i g Yiesu yign yen paalu, g jiin.
41015038	L youg g cincenciɛɔnŋ nba bo juan jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ nyan cil polu g pad g daan jiid tinŋ.
41015039	Sijeciɛn nba bo be l buol n la wan kpe nand, k u maad: « Yen mɔni, jua ne tu l tie Yendu Bija i. »
41015040	L sua g puob nne mɔ be l buol g sie fagm g nyuan. B siign ninŋ Magdala Mari bo be, g Mari nba tie Sose yen Saakbig naa be, g Salome mɔ be.
41015041	Banm puob bantaa ne n bo ŋua Yiesu, g tie’og wan bua yal, wan bo be Galile yaa youg. Puolieb bonciɛnn mɔ bo be. B kul n bo ŋuan Yiesu k b duo Serusalɛm.
41015042	L bo tie Saaba n cilg daajuoug nba i k Arimati jua nne baal k b yi’ug Sosɛf, g sua b daa baand Saaba i. U bo tie Suif‑nba buuddanm n ninŋ yua nba k b cɔlm’o i. U bo tie yua mɔ bo guu Yendu bal baalu i. Wano n bo paan pal g gad g daan la Pilat g miɛl Yiesu gbannand.
41015044	L bo yaa g lid Pilat yen wan gbad g Yiesu taan kpe o. Lann i k u sun g yiin sijeciɛn ŋano g bual’o g Yiesu kpe k l wai yo oo ?
41015045	K l sijeciɛn maad’o wan kpe yaa youg. G Pilat cab Sosɛf Yiesu gbannand.
41015046	Lann i g Sosɛf daa cabpienn, g nyan Yiesu gbannand dapunpɔnn po, g kadm’o, g kua g duan’o kakul nba ninŋ k b bo lugl tangbaɔnŋ n. G ji bind tanciɛɔnŋ g biin kakumɔb.
41015047	L sua g Magdala Mari yen Mari nba bo tie Sose naa be l buol g nyuan ban pii Yiesu naan.
41016001	Saaba n pend, g Magdala Mari yen Salome yen Mari nba bo tie Saak naa daa kpam nba nu g man, g bu gad g tien Yiesu gbannand po.
41016002	L fann laad daal siŋapanpan, k b gad Yiesu kakul buol g sua g yendu daa do i.
41016003	Ban bo paa sɔnu po yaa youg k b maad b ŋmiɛl n k nne: « Ŋmaa n daan bu bind kakutann t po i ? »
41016004	B yed k ban diid nne, b sua k l tanciɛɔnŋ bind g dua siɛl po.
41016005	K b kua kakul n g la g naasen kal b nuujendu g liɛ gaalpieonŋ, g jiwaani kua’b.
41016006	K u maad’b: « Daa jie man. I kpaan Nasarɛt Yiesu yaa aa ? Yua nba k b daan kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po ii ? U yied o, u g be ne. Diid man, b daan bil’o ne buol ne i.
41016007	Gad man g daan maad Piɛr yen u lieb nba tie wano Yiesu ŋuantieb, k u gaal liig g daan bu guul i kul Galile ; k l po i, k i bu la’ɔg nyan wan daan maad’i nand nyan. »
41016008	Lann i k b yam pud k b nyiɛ kakul buol g ji siɛn g jegl. B bo g tuo g maad baa sua g dugn jiwaani bo kua’b bonciɛnn. [
41016009	Yiesu n yied laad daal siŋaaɔg n, u kpiɛ g ŋɔn u kua Magdala Mari i. Wano i k u bo bel g yaan sanpola banlile nba bo ŋua’ɔg.
41016010	Lann i k u gad g daan maad Yiesu yegni. L sua k b kal yen pabɔnn g buud.
41016011	Wan maad’b g Yiesu yied o, k u la’ɔg, baa sua g tuo k l tie mɔni.
41016012	L po n pend, k u biɛ lebd u ninnaɔnŋ g ŋɔn u kua u ŋuantieb banle nba bo paa sɔnu po g saa doug.
41016013	Lann i k b lebd g maad b lieb. K b biɛ l g tuo k l tie mɔni.
41016014	G Yiesu ji tan juod g ŋɔn u kua u ŋuantieb piig yen yend ŋann. L bo sua k b di i. K u fu yen’m b kangbadm po, yen dindann n bo pɔd’b nyan po, k l maa niib n bo maad’b k u yied, k b g tuo g gaal k l tie mɔni nyan po.
41016015	Lann i g maad u ŋuantieb: « Gad man ŋanduna munn kul po, g muand niib kul, n Laabamann.
41016016	Yua nba tuo g gaal l maam, g wul nyum, u bu la fielu. Ama yua yie g g gaal l maam, b tan bu bu’ug g ŋmal u tubl.
41016017	Yab nba gaal n maam, ban saa naan kul yaalidug tuona ne n baa suun: b baa biel sanpola n sann po, g maad mabuolfani n ninŋ,
41016018	g so wai, b gii nyuu nyɔgbiiug l kan tien’m baa siɛl, b tu bu jaand g maan b nui yiɛnm po k ban paag. »
41016019	Yonmdaan Yiesu n maad’b l bona kul g gbenn, k u duo polu g kal Yendu jendu.
41016020	Lann i k u ŋuantieb gad g muand Laabamann naan kul. B tuona n ninŋ Yonmdaan bo be yen’m, g te k b tie yaalidug bona, k l ŋɔnŋ k u maam tie mɔni.]
42001001	Canbaa Tewofiil, niib bonciɛnn bo cil g diɛn yal nba bo tien t siign,
42001002	nyan yab nba bo be cilg youg, g la yen b ninbina g ji muand Yendu maam n dugn’ti nand nyan.
42001003	L yaa po n te, k n ŋanm g bual bual yal nba kul bo tien hal cilg youg, g la k l ŋan yen k n mɔ ń diɛn nyua nyua g te’a,
42001004	k a fid g bann k ban tund’a yal tie mɔni.
42001005	Youg nba k Erod bo tie Suude doug n bad, salg-yidkua nne bo be k b yi’ug Sakari. U bo be Abiya salg-yidkab cagl n ninŋ i, k u ŋaapuo tie Aharɔn yaabuonn, k b yi’ug Elisabɛt.
42001006	B banle kul bo tie nimɔnm i Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ, g sonm u sɔnu n ninŋ, g cɔln u mɔmaam kul, g g mɔg siɛl yaa jalgi.
42001007	Ama b bo g mɔg big, k l maa Elisabɛt bo tie ŋɔlg i, k banm banle kul biɛ bo ciɛnd o.
42001008	Dana nba ninŋ g Sakari yen u cagl n niib bo bu sun jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n tuonn Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ nyan, g diyenn
42001009	k b tɔ tiɛ tiɛ, nyan ban bo tu tie nand, k l suol Sakari, k wan kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ gɔnn n ninŋ, g ŋubn ŋubl.
42001010	Niib kul bo be lijɔug n ninŋ, g jaand youg nba k b ŋubnd ŋubl.
42001011	G Sakari tan la Yonmdaan malɛg, k u sie ŋubl binbindl jendu po.
42001012	Sakari n yaan la’ɔg nnyan, k u yam pud, g jiwaani suol’o.
42001013	Ama g malɛg maad’o: « Sakari, daa jie k l maa Yendu gaal a jaandi. A ŋaapuo Elisabɛt bu mal bijabg, ŋan pul’o San.
42001014	A baa kpanm yen pamann, g niib bonciɛnn pala ń biɛ manŋ u malu po,
42001015	k l maa u baa mɔg sann Yonmdaan nunŋ n ninŋ. U kan gii nyu dimɔunŋ g bual dipaalm. U bu tuod gii gbie yen Foŋanm, g daa be u naa tug n ninŋ i.
42001016	U bu te k Israyɛl yab bonciɛnn ń guan Yonmdaan b Yendu buol.
42001017	U tan baa mɔg Yendu Fuom yen u paalu nba k Eli bo mɔg, g gaal Yonmdaan liig g te g bibaa‑nba ń guan g manŋ yen b bid, g te g kangbada ń mɔ ń ji gii mɔg nimɔnm yam. Wano n bu te g niib ń bobn gii guu Yonmdaan. »
42001018	G Sakari maad malɛg: « Bɛ n bu te min bann k l tie mɔni i ? K l maa n ciɛnd o. N ŋaapuo mɔ biɛ ji tie puciɛnn i. »
42001019	G malɛg ŋmiɛn g maad’o: « Min n tie Gabriɛl, n be Yendu buol i. U sun’n k n baal g pag yen’a, g maad’a l laabamann i.
42001020	A yen g gaal k min maad’a yal tie mɔni. Lann, a bu te muug, g ji kan fid g maad, saa yen daal nba k l bona kul ne tan bu tien, nyan Yendu n sen k l tan bu tien youg nba. »
42001021	Niib bo guu Sakari, k l yaa g lid’b yen wan wai jaanddeciɛɔnŋ gɔnn n ninŋ.
42001022	Wan nyiɛ youg nba, u g fid g maad yen’m. Lann i k b bann k u la siɛl jaanddeciɛɔnŋ gɔnn n ninŋ. U ji bo tie muug i, g maad muudm.
42001023	Wan yaan gbenn u tuonn dana jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, k u kun ŋaag.
42001024	L puol po, k u ŋaapuo Elisabɛt suol puol, g wuon dieog n ŋmaali yinmu. U bo mali u pal n ninŋ:
42001025	« Yonmdaan n yaan tien yal nba n nyan n po: mɔlane u diid’n yen nunmanŋ, g nyan’n fai n ninŋ niib buol. »
42001026	Elisabɛt n suol puol, l ŋmaali yinluob po i, g Yendu sun malɛg Gabriɛl, k wan gad Galile doug nne ninŋ, k b yi Nasarɛt.
42001027	U bo sun’o sipaan nne buol i, k b yi’ug Mari, k u tie Dafiid cugl n jua nne sikpenŋ. B bo yi l jua Sosɛf i.
42001028	G malɛg kua Mari buol, g maad’o: « A pal ń gii man, fin i g Yendu tie’a ŋalbalg nba g mɔg l liel. Yonmdaan be yen’a. »
42001029	Mari n yaan gbad nnyan, k u yam ŋmad, k u mali l maam niimn.
42001030	G malɛg maad’o: « Mari, daa jie, k l maa Yendu tie’a ŋalbalg nba g mɔg l liel.
42001031	A bu suol puol g mal bijabg, g pul’o Yiesu.
42001032	U tan baa tie nicinŋl i, ban gii yi’ug Yendu Badciɛn Bija. Yonmdaan Yendu bu te’og u yaaja Dafiid badkog,
42001033	wan gii tie youg kul Sakɔb buolu bad, yua k u bal kan ban g gbenn. »
42001034	G Mari maad malɛg: « L bu tien nle i, k n yen g ban jua i ? »
42001035	G malɛg ŋmiɛn’o g maad: « Foŋanm bu jiid a po, g Yendu Badciɛn paalu ń kua a ninŋ. L yaa po n te g yua nba k a bu mal’o ne baa tie niŋan, gii yi Yendu Bija.
42001036	I ban k a naataanu Elisabɛt mɔ pil bijabg, ŋmaali yinluob n nyan, g yen ciɛnd o, wano nba k b yi’ug ŋɔlg,
42001037	k l maa baa siɛl g be g paa Yendu po. »
42001038	G Mari maad: « N tie Yonmdaan tuonsunn i. Lan tien n po nyan ŋan maad nand. » G malɛg ji cab’o.
42001039	L dana n ninŋ g Mari fiil g ŋmaa tonm, g gad doyenu nne ninŋ k l be Suude jɔa n ninŋ,
42001040	g kua Sakari ŋaag, g fuond Elisabɛt.
42001041	Elisabɛt n yaan gbad Mari fuondi, k u big kpanm u tug n ninŋ, k Elisabɛt gbie yen Foŋanm,
42001042	g ji tand yen paalu g maad: « Yendu yad u yedŋanm a po g cie puob kul, g biɛ yad u yedŋanm a tug n big mɔ yaa po.
42001043	L tien nle i, k n Yonmdaan naa baal n buol i ?
42001044	Diid, a fuondi n baa n tubl n ninŋ youg nba, k n big kpanm n tug n ninŋ.
42001045	Pamann tie a yal i, fin nba tuo g gaal g Yonmdaan n maad’a yal nba bu tien yen mɔni. »
42001046	G Mari maad: « N dond Yonmdaan yen n pal kul,
42001047	k n pal ŋanm g man g dugn Yendu n Fietua po,
42001048	k l maa u juog u tuonsunn nba k b g yi’ug siɛl. L yaa po, niib kul ji baa pag’n youg kul,
42001049	k l maa Paaciɛnudaan tien n po ŋanm nba yab. U sann ŋan.
42001050	U diid yen nunmanŋ youg kul yab nba cɔlm’o.
42001051	U ŋɔn u paalu, g yaan jagbeldanm.
42001052	U fiin batieb b kogi po, g don yab nba k b g yi’b k b tie siɛl.
42001053	U tien taladdanm ŋanm bonciɛnn, g bel ŋalmandanm yen nuukuoni.
42001054	U tebl Israyɛl yab, u tuonsunna. U g sunm ŋanm nba k u tien
42001055	Abraham yen u yaabuona po, nyan wan bo puon t yaajanm nand, k l ŋanm g mɔg juog. »
42001056	G Mari tien nyan ŋmaali ntaa nyan Elisabɛt buol, g lebd g kun ŋaag.
42001057	Elisabɛt mad daal n yaan pund, k u mal bijabg.
42001058	U kunkuanyuag‑nba yen u naataani n yaan gbad Yonmdaan n tien ŋanm nba u po, k b mɔ yaa pala manŋ.
42001059	Daa ŋanniin daal, k b baal k ban kɔnd big. B bo bua ban pul’o Sakari, nyan u baa nyan i,
42001060	k u naa gaal maam g maad: « N n, b baa yi’ug San i. »
42001061	K b maad’o: « Sua g be i ŋaag n ninŋ g yi nnyan. »
42001062	K b bual u baa muudm n ninŋ, k u bua ban gii yi big nle i ?
42001063	K u te k b tie’og kalagl, k u diɛn l po: « U sann n tie San. » K l yaa g lid b kul.
42001064	L youg mɔno, k u lanm tabd, k u ji fid g maad g pag Yendu.
42001065	G jiwaani kua u kunkuanyuag‑nba kul, k l maam yad dingbana kul nba be Suude jɔa n ninŋ.
42001066	Yab nba kul bo gbad l maam, bo bil b pala n ninŋ i g bual b kua: « L big tan baa tie ŋmaa yaa a ? » Mɔni, Yonmdaan paalu kon bo be yen’o.
42001067	K u baa Sakari gbie yen Foŋanm, g maad Yendu lanbona ne:
42001068	« Ban gii dond Yonmdaan, Israyɛl Yendu, k l maa u gɔnn u buolu g fiel’o.
42001069	U te k t paaludaan, yua n tie t Fietua, nyiɛ u tuonsunn Dafiid cugl n ninŋ,
42001070	nyan yaa youg po Yendu sogni‑nba n yaan bo maad nand nyan.
42001071	B bo maad k wano n bu fiel’ti t ninnanda nui n ninŋ, yen yab nba kul g bua k b la’ti yen ninbinn.
42001072	Nnyan i g Yendu tien t baa‑nba ŋanm, g tiɛd u dɔnnu po,
42001073	lan tie puoni nba k u bo puon t yaaja Abraham,
42001074	k u bu nyan’ti t ninnanda nui n ninŋ, k tin gii suun u tuonn g ji daa jie siɛl,
42001075	gii tie papiendanm yen mɔnkundanm u nunŋ n ninŋ daal kul.
42001076	Fin, sanpandg ne, b bu yiin’a Yendu Badciɛn sogni i, k l maa a bu gaal Yonmdaan liig, g ŋanm u sɔni
42001077	k u buolu ń fid g bann k b biid bu piin k ban la fielu,
42001078	g dugn t Yonmdaan bua’ti g biɛ jie’ti ninbaaɔg. U bu te yinyiem ń nya polu po gii naan nyan yendupudkaɔg yinyiem nyan,
42001079	g baal g fand yab be bunbɔnn n ninŋ yen kuum fiɛl n ninŋ g ŋmagd’ti laafiɛ sɔnu n ninŋ. »
42001080	L big nuan bo kped, k u yam pugd. U bo tan gad g be tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i, saa yen daal nba k u ŋɔn u kua Israyɛl buolu.
42002001	L dana n ninŋ, g Rom badciɛn Ogust nyan yiko k ban cɔd u niib kul.
42002002	L cɔdcincinn bo tien youg nba g Kiriniyus bo tie Siiri doug n ninŋ yudaan i.
42002003	L bo tie g nil kul ń kun u danm doug n i, k ban cɔd’o.
42002004	G Sosɛf mɔ fiil Nasarɛt, Galile doug n ninŋ, g duo Bɛtlɛm, Suude doug n ninŋ, Dafiid danm doug n, k l maa u bo tie Dafiid yaabuonn i.
42002005	Wano yen u sikpenŋ Mari bo gad k ban cɔd’b. L youg l sua g Mari mɔg puol i.
42002006	Ban be l doug n ninŋ nyan, k u mad daal pund.
42002007	K u mal bijabg u sipaanmad, g fun fun’o caba, g duan’o bonkobd jedibonn n ninŋ, k l maa banm nuan ji bo g la yiɛl saanm gaal buol.
42002008	Pekpaali bo be l doug n ninŋ, g dua pekpamuaɔg n ninŋ, g tu sie nyiɛɔg sindl, g guu b pei.
42002009	K b tan sua g Yonmdaan malɛg sie b buol, g Yonmdaan yinyiem fand g lind’b, g jiwaani suol’b paaa.
42002010	G malɛg maad’b: « Daa jie man, k l maa n baal k n muand’i laabaal i. L laabaal baa tie pamanciɛnn i, buolu kul po.
42002011	Dinne mɔno, Dafiid doug n ninŋ, b mal Fietua i po, wano n tie Kristo g biɛ tie Yonmdaan.
42002012	Yin bu la yal g bann’o n ne: i bu la sanpandg k b fun fun’o caba g duan’o bonkobd jedibonn n ninŋ. »
42002013	L youg mɔno, g malɛg‑nba bonciɛnn nyiɛ polu g baal g pugn cincinn yua po, k b dond Yendu g maad:
42002014	« Yendu sann ń do, wano nba be hal polu po. G tinŋ n ninŋ ne, laafiɛ ń gii be niib po, banm nba k u bua’b. »
42002015	Youg nba g malɛg‑nba yaad g ŋaa pekpaali g lebd g duo polu po, g pekpaali maad yen b lieb: « Ŋaa man tin gad Bɛtlɛm g daan diid yal nba tien l po, g Yonmdaan ŋɔn’ti. »
42002016	K b ŋmaa tonm g gad g daan la Mari yen Sosɛf yen big, k u dua bonkobd jedibonn n ninŋ.
42002017	Ban yaan la nnyan, k b dugn malɛg‑nba n bo maad’b yal l big po.
42002018	K l yaa g lid yab nba kul bo gbad pekpaali maam.
42002019	G Mari nuan gaan l maam kul, g bilg u pal n ninŋ, g ji mali l po.
42002020	G pekpaali nyiɛ l buol g ji leb g kun, g dond Yendu, g pag u sann, g dugn b bo gbad g biɛ la bona kul nyan malɛg‑nba n bo maad’b nand nyan.
42002021	Daa ŋanniin daal n pund, k b kɔnd big, g pul’o Yiesu, nyan malɛg n yaan bo pul’o nand, g sua k u naa daa g pil’o nyan.
42002022	Daal nba k b bo bu tien bogda nba g Moyis yiko bo bual g puo gii mal ban tien g nyan jɔgnd ji bo pund, k b gad yen’o Serusalɛm, k ban ŋɔn’o Yendu,
42002023	nyan lan diɛn g maad nand Yonmdaan Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n ninŋ nyan. L maad g bikpelg nba l tie bonjag kul baa tie Yonmdaan yua i.
42002024	B biɛ bo bu yid salg yen muaɔg n lanjeli nle, lann i kaa ŋaag lanjepaani nle, nyan Yonmdaan Mɔmaam n yaan bual nand.
42002025	Nil nne bo be Serusalɛm n ninŋ, g yi Simeyɔn. U bo tie nimɔn i, g cɔln Yendu, g guu Israyɛl Fietua baalu, g Foŋanm be yen’o.
42002026	Foŋanm bo tuod g maad’o, k u daa kan kpe g g la Yonmdaan n sun yua nba, wano n tie Kristo.
42002027	Youg nba g Yiesu danm bo kua yen’o jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, k ban tien Yonmdaan Mɔmaam n maad yal, l sua g Foŋanm te g Simeyɔn gad l n ninŋ o.
42002028	Lann i k u gaal big u nui n ninŋ, g dond Yendu g maad k nne:
42002029	« Yonmdaan, ŋan bo maad yal ji tien, ji cab mɔlane k a tuonsunn ń kpe gii saa yen laafiɛ.
42002030	K l maa n ninbina la fielu
42002031	nba k a bobn buoli kul po.
42002032	L tie yinyiem nba bu fand buolfani niib k ban bann’a, g te k a buolu Israyɛl niib ń gaal yudand. »
42002033	Maam nba kul k u maad Yiesu po bo yaa g lid u naa yen u baa.
42002034	G Simeyɔn yad yedŋanm b po g biɛ maad u naa Mari: « Yendu te k a big ne po, Israyɛl buolu n ninŋ, yenm bu baa, g lieb ń la fielu. U tie banm i g Yendu ŋɔn. Ama niib bu yie’og.
42002035	Nnyan, niib bonciɛnn maalm bu dɔgd. Ama fin nuan, fala tan bu kua’a, nyan b cɔg a pal jugsieg nyan. »
42002036	Yendu sogni nne mɔ bo be k b yi’ug Ann, u bo tie Fanuwɛl bipuo i, Asɛr buolu n big. U bo ciɛnd hal bonciɛnn. U bo tien bina ŋanlile kua i yen u sal,
42002037	g ji te pekual g tan pund piinniin yen bina ŋanna. U bo tund g be jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, g lolg mɔb g jaand g pug Yendu, yendu n yen nyiɛɔg.
42002038	L youg k u mɔ baal, g dond Yendu, g maad big ne maam danm nba kul bo guu Israyɛl buolu fielu daal.
42002039	Ban yaan tien bogda kul g gbenn, nyan Yonmdaan Mɔmaam n bual nand, k b lebd g kun Nasarɛt, Galile doug n ninŋ.
42002040	K l big ji kped g pugd, g gbie yen yanfuom, g Yendu ŋalbalg be yen’o.
42002041	Binn kul, u danm bo tu gad Serusalɛm g di Suif‑nba fielu jaanm.
42002042	Yiesu n yaan la piig yen bina ŋanle, k b duo l doug n ninŋ, nyan ban bo tu tie nand.
42002043	L jaanm dana n yaan pend, g Yiesu danm leb g kun g ban g Yiesu ŋua i, k u yen be Serusalɛm.
42002044	B sonm yentunmunn, g mali k u be yen b yegni i. B tan kpaan’o b naataani n ninŋ, yen yab nba ban’m buol,
42002045	g g la’ɔg. K b lebd Serusalɛm, g ŋanm g kpaan’o.
42002046	Daa ŋantaa daal, k b ji tan la’ɔg jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, k u kal Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda canbaa‑nba siign ninŋ, g cenŋ b maam g biɛ bual’b buali.
42002047	Yab nba kul bo cenŋ u maam, bo yaa mɔi i yen ban la k u yam fo, k u biɛ ŋmiɛnd yen banm nba.
42002048	U danm n yaan la’ɔg, k l yaa g lid’b, k u naa maad’o: « N big, bɛ n te k a tien’ti nnyan i ? Diid, min yen a baa kul kpaan’a k t yam ŋmad. »
42002049	K u maad’b: « Bɛ po i k i kpaan’n nii ? I g ban k l tie k min gii be n Baa ŋaag n ninŋ ii ? »
42002050	K banm yen g gbad maam nba k u bo maad’b nyan niimn.
42002051	K u yeg yen’m g jiid Nasarɛt, g tiend b buam kul. K u naa bilg l bona kul u pal n ninŋ.
42002052	G Yiesu kped, k u yanfuom pugd, k u manŋd Yendu yen niib pala.
42003001	Rom badciɛn Tibɛr n yaan dii bal, l piig yen bina ŋanmu ninŋ, l sua g Pɔns Pilat kal Suude doug n Rom badciɛn sann po, g tie l doug n gobna. K Erod mɔ tie Galile bad, k u ninja Filiip tie Iture yen Trakonit bad, g Lisaniyas tie Abilɛnn bad.
42003002	Ann yen Kaayif mɔ n bo tie Suif‑nba salg-yidkab kul ciɛnm. L youg, l sua g Sakari bija San be tinkuonŋ n ninŋ. L buol i k u gbad Yendu maam
42003003	g gad Suurdɛn fuann n ninŋ kul, g muand niib k ban wul nyum, g ŋaa b tuonbiid g lebd binbem, g Yendu ń piin b biid
42003004	nyan lan bo diɛn Yendu sogni Esaayi kadaaɔg n ninŋ nand nyan. L bo diɛn g maad: « Nil kpaand tinkuonŋ n ninŋ g maad: “ Ŋanm man Yonmdaan sɔnu, sond man u sɔni.
42003005	G baalɔdi kul ń piin, g jɔa yen gbingbana kul ń sal, g sɔngɔga kul ń sond g sɔnbuod kul ń biɛ sal.
42003006	G niib kul ń la yen b ninbina Yendu fielu ”. »
42003007	San bo maad danm nba baad k wan wul’b nyum nyan: « Yinm waalaba ne, ŋmaa n maad’i k yin nya Yendu mutuol nba baad ne ninŋ i ?
42003008	I yie g tien yal ŋɔn k i lebd binbem o, gii kal g tua k Abraham tie i yaaja. N maad’i faa, Yendu nuan bu fid g te g tana ne ń kpand Abraham yaabuona.
42003009	Piɛg ji dua tiidi nyaga n i. Tiig nba g luon luanŋana kul, b bu cua’ɔg u g lu muu n ninŋ. »
42003010	Lann i g niib bual San: « T yen ji bu tien nle i ? »
42003011	K u ŋmiɛn’m: « Yua n mɔg liɛda ŋanle, wan bɔgd g te yua nba g mɔg. Yua n mɔg jied mɔ ń tien nnyan. »
42003012	G lonpogaala mɔ baal k wan wul’b nyum, g bual’o: « Canbaa, t bu tien nle ? »
42003013	K u maad’b: « Daa gaan man lonpo k lan gii cie ban ŋɔn’i yal nyan. »
42003014	G sijenm mɔ bual’o: « K tinm i, t mɔ bu tien nle ? » K u maad’b: « Daa tug man jad yen faaɔg gii ŋua niib g fe b ligli. Yin gaan ligli nba, i pala ń gii man l po. »
42003015	Niib bo guu Kristo, g ji bual b kua n ninŋ g San kan gii tie wano kaa aa ?
42003016	G San ŋmiɛn g maad b kul: « Min nuan wuul’i nyum n i. Ama sua baad, g mɔg paalu g cie’n. K n g dagd yen k n lod u taacagbani. Wano tan bu tug Foŋanm yen muu i g wul’i.
42003017	U diɛ u dilennŋmantonn g saa jalg n, g bu lenn u dii. U bu wod diŋani g ŋuun u bunbual n. G nyaan tug feonŋ g lu muu nba kan ban g junn n ninŋ. »
42003018	San biɛ bo tien niib cegllei bonciɛnn, g muand’b Laabamann.
42003019	Ama u bo jalg bad Erod, k l maa u bo fiel u ninja ŋaapuo Erodiad g kuan, g biɛ tien bontitebiid nba yab.
42003020	Erod biɛ bo tien biid g pugn, k l maa u bo suol San g luon’o dansalg.
42003021	San n yaan wul niib g gbenn, g wul Yiesu mɔ, g Yiesu sie g jaand, b tan sua g polu po luod,
42003022	g Foŋanm jiid u po g naan lanjelg. G niɛlu nne nyiɛ polu po g maad: « A tie n bija i, n pal kɔn a po bonciɛnn. N tug n buam kul g tien a ninŋ. »
42003023	Yiesu n yaan cil u tuonn, l sua k u mɔg nyan bina piintaa nyan i. Niib bo mali k u tie Sosɛf bija i. K u yaaja tie Eli,
42003024	k Eli baa tie Matat, g Matat baa tie Lefi, g Lefi baa tie Mɛlki, g Mɛlki baa tie Yanaayi, g Yanaayi baa tie Sosɛf,
42003025	g Sosɛf baa tie Matatiyas, g Matatiyas baa tie Amɔs, k Amɔs baa tie Nahum, g Nahum baa tie Ɛsli, k Ɛsli baa tie Nagaayi,
42003026	g Nagaayi baa tie Maat, g Maat baa tie Matatiyas, g Matatiyas baa tie Semeyinn, g Semeyinn baa tie Sosek, g Sosek baa tie Soda,
42003027	g Soda baa tie Suanan, g Suanan baa tie Resa, g Resa baa tie Sorobabɛl, g Sorobabɛl baa tie Salatiɛl, g Salatiɛl baa tie Neri,
42003028	g Neri baa tie Mɛlki, g Mɛlki baa tie Adi, k Adi baa tie Kosam, g Kosam baa tie Ɛlmadam, k Ɛlmadam baa tie Ɛr,
42003029	k Ɛr baa tie Yiesu, g Yiesu baa tie Eliesɛr, k Eliesɛr baa tie Sorim, g Sorim baa tie Matat, g Matat baa tie Lefi,
42003030	g Lefi baa tie Simeyɔn, g Simeyɔn baa tie Suuda, g Suuda baa tie Sosɛf, g Sosɛf baa tie Sonam, g Sonam baa tie Eliakim,
42003031	k Eliakim baa tie Meleya, g Meleya baa tie Mena, g Mena baa tie Matata, g Matata baa tie Natan,
42003032	g Natan baa tie Dafiid, g Dafiid baa tie Sese, g Sese baa tie Obɛd, k Obɛd baa tie Bos, g Bos baa tie Sala, g Sala baa tie Naasɔnn,
42003033	g Naasɔnn baa tie Aminadab, k Aminadab baa tie Adminn, k Adminn baa tie Arni, k Arni baa tie Ɛsrɔm, k Ɛsrɔm baa tie Faarɛs, g Faarɛs baa tie Suuda,
42003034	g Suuda baa tie Sakɔb, g Sakɔb baa tie Isaak, k Isaak baa tie Abraham, k Abraham baa tie Tara, g Tara baa tie Nahɔr,
42003035	g Nahɔr baa tie Seruk, g Seruk baa tie Rago, g Rago baa tie Falɛk, g Falɛk baa tie Ebɛr, k Ebɛr baa tie Sala,
42003036	g Sala baa tie Kaayinam, g Kaayinam baa tie Arfasad, k Arfasad baa tie Sem, g Sem baa tie Nowe, g Nowe baa tie Lamɛk,
42003037	g Lamɛk baa tie Matusala, g Matusala baa tie Enɔk, k Enɔk baa tie Sarɛd, g Sarɛd baa tie Malaliɛl, g Malaliɛl baa tie Kaayinam,
42003038	g Kaayinam baa tie Enɔs, k Enɔs baa tie Set, g Set baa tie Adam, k Adam baa tie Yendu.
42004001	Yiesu bo gbie yen Foŋanm, g nyiɛ Suurdɛn bɔngbann, g Foŋanm gad yen’o tinkuonŋ n ninŋ,
42004002	k u tien daa piinna g Sitaan bign’o. U bo g di siɛl l dana n ninŋ. L puol po g kom suol’o.
42004003	G Sitaan maad’o: « A gii tie Yendu Bija, ŋan te g tann ne ń kpand jied. »
42004004	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Yendu Kadaaɔg maad g jied kua kaa bu te g nil ń gii mɔg miɛl. »
42004005	G Sitaan tug’o g duo yen’o naan nba kped po, g ŋɔn’o ŋanduna doi kul pilb yenm kua g maad’o:
42004006	« N bu te’a doi ne kul diem yen l ŋalman, k l maa l kul ne b tie min i, k n mɔ tien min bua yua nba.
42004007	Lann, a gii gbaan n nunŋ n ninŋ g pug’n, l kul baa tie a yal i. »
42004008	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn g maad’o: « L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ g maad: “ A baa pug Yonmdaan a Yendu kua i, g biɛ dond wano kukua. ” »
42004009	G Sitaan tug’o g gad yen’o Serusalɛm, g daan don’o jaanddeciɛɔnŋ yul po, g maad’o: « A gii tie Yendu Bija, ŋan yug g jiid tinŋ n,
42004010	k l maa Yendu Kadaaɔg maad g Yendu bu te u malɛg‑nba ń guul’a
42004011	g biɛ tebn g gabl’a b nui n ninŋ, g daa ŋaa baa a titala ń tuud tann. »
42004012	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn g maad’o: « L kadaaɔg n biɛ maad k a kan bign Yonmdaan, a Yendu. »
42004013	Sitaan n yaan bign’o bignbuolu kul g gbenn, k u yaad g ŋaa’ɔg, g ji guu youg nba k u bu guan g bign’o.
42004014	Yiesu bo gbie yen Foŋanm paalu i, g guan Galile doug n, k u sann duo l fuann n ninŋ kul.
42004015	K u tund niib Yendu maam Suif‑nba tintaann died n ninŋ, k b kul ji pag’o.
42004016	K u gad Nasarɛt doug n ninŋ, naan nba k u bo pugd, g Saaba daal k u kua tintaann dieog n ninŋ, nyan wan bo tu tie nand nyan. G tan fiil k wan lii Yendu Kadaaɔg.
42004017	K b tie’og Yendu sogni Esaayi n bo diɛn yal, k u pɔbd, g la diɛni ne:
42004018	« Yonmdaan Fuom be n ninŋ, k l maa u lugd’n k n muand tali Laabamann. U sun’n k n maad yonmi k b bu nya yonmd n, g juanm mɔ bu guan g nyuand, g yab nba be mabl n bu yal b kua.
42004019	K n biɛ kpaand g dinne, Yonmdaan bu fiel’ti. »
42004020	G Yiesu pɔbn kadaaɔg, g ŋmiɛn jua nba bo suun tintaann dieog n, g ji kal. G niib kul fid ninbina u po.
42004021	K u ji cil g maad’b: « Yin gbad lanbona nba ne, dinne l ji tien yen mɔni. »
42004022	Lanbonmana nba k u bo maad nyan bo yaa g lid’b g baal yen pinpagd, k b ji tua k wano kaa tie Sosɛf bija ii ?
42004023	K u maad’b: « N ban k i bu yin’n jɔug nba ne: “ Dogda, teb a kua ” g biɛ maad’n: “ T gbad yal nba kul k a tien Kafarnawunm, biɛ tien l bona a doug n ninŋ ne mɔ ! ” »
42004024	K u biɛ maad: « L tie mɔni i, b g ban g gaal Yendu sogni u doug n ninŋ.
42004025	Yen mɔni n maad’i, g pekɔa bo yab Israyɛl doug n ninŋ Eli youg, youg nba g taag bo luon bina ntaa yen ŋmaali yinluob, g kom baa l doug n kul.
42004026	Yendu yen bo g sun Eli k wan gad sua buol, l gii g tie pekual nne buol i kaa, k u kua Sarɛpta, Sidɔn doug n ninŋ.
42004027	Yendu sogni Elise youg mɔ, gbaada bo be bonciɛnn Israyɛl doug n ninŋ, ama k b ninŋ sua bo g paag, l gii g tie Siiri jua Naaman i kaa. »
42004028	Yab nba bo be tintaann dieog n n gbad nnyan, k b pala bie g pend.
42004029	L sua k b doug be jual po i. K b fiil g nyan’o b doug n ninŋ, g gad yen’o l jual n kped naan g daan bu tud g lu’ug yidug n.
42004030	K u yen nyiɛ b siign ninŋ g paan g saa u sɔnu.
42004031	Yiesu bo jiid Kafarnawunm, Galile doug n ninŋ, g tund niib Yendu maam Saaba daal.
42004032	K u tundl yaa g lid’b, k l maa u bo maad yen yikod i.
42004033	L sua g jua nne be Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n g sanpola ŋua’ɔg, k u tand yen paalu g maad:
42004034	« Hei i ! Nasarɛt Yiesu, tinm yen fin bɛ po i ? A baal k a biɛn’ti yaa aa ? N ban ŋan tie yua. Fin n tie niŋan nba g Yendu sun. »
42004035	G Yiesu gaal jad b po g maad: « Suon man l buol ! Yaad man g ŋaa jua ne. » G sanpola yugl l jua g gul’o niib siign ninŋ, g yaad g ŋaa’ɔg g g tien’o baa siɛl yaa bonbiil.
42004036	G jiwaani kua b kul, k b ji maad maad yen b lieb g tua: « Ne tie malanm po n ne i ? U mɔg yikod yen paalu g niind sanpola k b yaadl. »
42004037	K u sann duo l dingbankunkogi n ninŋ kul.
42004038	Yiesu bo nyiɛ tintaann dieog n ninŋ, g gad Simɔn ŋaag n, g sua g Simɔn ŋaapuo naa gbanu ton bug bug. K b miɛl’o k wan tien siɛl u po.
42004039	K u nagn g yin u po, g tand g maad k u gbannantounŋ ń gbenn, k l yand u po. L youg mɔno k u fiil g ji cand’b.
42004040	Yendu n yaan tan baa, k b baal yen u buol yab nba bo yiɛl yiɛlbuoli kul. K u maan nui sua kul po g paag’b.
42004041	G sanpola mɔ yaad g ŋaan niib bonciɛnn g yign g tua: « A tie Yendu Bija i. » K u fu yen’m g g tuod k b maad nnyan, k l maa b bo ban k u tie Kristo.
42004042	Lan tan fann youg nba, g Yiesu nyiɛ g gad naan nba g sua g be, g niib kpaan’o g tan la’ɔg, g gɔgl’o g ji g bua k u kpiɛd’b.
42004043	Ama k u maad’b: « L tie k n muand Yendu bal Laabamann doi nba tenn ninŋ mɔ i, k l maa l yaa po i g Yendu sun’n. »
42004044	Nnyan i k u ji muand Laabamann Suude Suif‑nba tintaann died n ninŋ.
42005001	Diyenn Yiesu bo be Senesarɛt mɔgl kunŋ i, g niib bonciɛnn kaan g lind’o, g nuul g kpaan k ban cenŋ Yendu maam.
42005002	K u la ŋadnd tinle k l sie mɔgl kunŋ, g jansuola nyiɛ l ninŋ g ŋuni b janbaand.
42005003	K u kua ŋadnyeonŋ n ninŋ, k l tie Simɔn yal, g miɛl’o k wan sud waam nyum n ninŋ yen’o. K u ji kal l ninŋ g tund niib Yendu maam.
42005004	Wan yaan tund’b g gbenn, k u maad Simɔn: « Sud g gad nyunnyuaɔnŋ n ninŋ, k yin lu i janbaand, g suol jani. »
42005005	G Simɔn ŋmiɛn g maad: « Canbaa, t won gbaa nyamunŋ kul g g suol baa siɛl. Ama, a yaa maam po, n bu lu. »
42005006	K b lu, g baan jani bonciɛnn, k b janbaand ji cil g pad.
42005007	Lann i k b kanm b lieb nba bo be ŋadnlieog n ninŋ nyan nuu, k ban baal nii g taan’m. K b baal g gbien b ŋadnd tinle kul, k l ji bua n mii mɔno.
42005008	Simɔn Piɛr n yaan la nnyan, k u baa g gbaan Yiesu nunŋ n ninŋ g maad: « Yonmdaan, fagd n buol, k l maa n tie biiddaan i. »
42005009	Jiwaani bo suol wano yen yab nba bo be yen’o, g dugn ban suol jani nba k l yab bonciɛnn nyan po.
42005010	Jiwaani biɛ bo suol Saak yen San mɔ, Sebede bid nba bo tie Simɔn jansolieb nyan. G Yiesu maad Simɔn: « Daa jie kaa. Mɔlane, a ji baa taand niib i, ban gii ŋua’n. »
42005011	L youg, k b don b ŋadnd bɔngbann, g nyɔl l kul g ji ŋua Yiesu.
42005012	Yiesu bo be doyenu nne ninŋ, k l tuu g jua nne be l buol, g tie gbaadpienn. Wan la Yiesu, k u baa g gbaan u nunŋ n ninŋ, g miɛl’o g maad: « Yonmdaan, a gii bua, a bu fid g paag’n. »
42005013	G Yiesu tand nuu g sii’ug g maad: « N, n bua, paag ! » L youg mɔno, k u gbaadm gbenn.
42005014	K u kpaa’ɔg g maad: « Suol a mɔb g daa ŋaa sua ń gbad. Ama, gad g salg-yidkua ń la’a, k a te’og salg nba g Moyis bo maad g gbaadl gii paag wan te nyan, k lan ŋɔn k a paag. »
42005015	Ama k b yad g maad Yiesu po, g niib ji baad cul cul, k ban cenŋ’o, k wan biɛ paag’b.
42005016	Yiesu nuan bo tu piɛd naan nba g sua g be i, g daan jaand.
42005017	Diyenn, Yiesu bo tund niib, g Farisiɛn-nba yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda kal u buol. B bo nyiɛ Galile yen Suude doi kul n ninŋ, yen Serusalɛm n ninŋ i. G Yonmdaan paalu be yen Yiesu, g te k u paagd niib.
42005018	G jab nne baal g tug yiɛn k u nui yen u titala kul kpe k u dua liɛnŋ po, g kpaan k ban kuan g duan’o Yiesu nunŋ n ninŋ.
42005019	G niwulug po te k b g la ban bu tɔgn naan g kuan’o. K b duo deliɛkaɔg po, g lond bonn g jiin’o yen liɛnŋ niib siign ninŋ Yiesu buol.
42005020	Yiesu n yaan la ban dug u po nand nyan, k u maad: « N ninja, a biid piin o. »
42005021	G Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Farisiɛn-nba mali b pala n ninŋ g sɔbn: « U ne tie ŋmaa i, g sugd Yendu i ? Yendu kua i kaa ŋmaa n bu fid g piin nil biid i ? »
42005022	Yiesu n yaan bann b maalm, k u bual’b: « Bɛ po n te k i mɔg l maalm i ?
42005023	Lanbona nle ne ninŋ, n liɛ yal maadu paa i ? G maad: A biid piin, bii fiil g sonm i ?
42005024	To ! Bann man g Nifosaal Bija mɔg paalu tinŋ ne po g bu fid g piin niib biid. » Lann i k u maad jua nba k u nui yen u titala bo kpe nyan: « Min n cab’a, fiil, tug a liɛnŋ gii kun. »
42005025	L youg mɔno, k u fiil niib kul nunŋ n ninŋ, g tug u liɛnŋ g kun g dond Yendu.
42005026	K l cɔg’b. G jiwaani suol’b k b ji dond Yendu g maad: « Dinne, t la tin g ban g la yal. »
42005027	L puol po, g Yiesu nyiɛ g la lonpogaal nne k b yi’ug Lefi, k u kal ban pa lonpo naan nba, g Yiesu maad’o: « I ŋua’n. »
42005028	K u ŋaa l kul, g fiil g ŋua’ɔg.
42005029	G Lefi tien jaanciɛnm Yiesu po u ŋaag n ninŋ, g lonpogaala yen nilieb bonciɛnn taan g kal g di yen’m.
42005030	G Farisiɛn-nba yen b Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda buln buln g maad Yiesu ŋuantieb: « Bɛ n te k i taan g di g nyu yen lonpogaala yen biiddanm i ? »
42005031	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn g maad’b: « Yab nba mɔg laafiɛ kaa kpaan dogda, yiɛnm n kpaan’o.
42005032	N g baal k n yiin nimɔnm kaa, n baal k n yiin biiddanm i, k ban lebd b binbem. »
42005033	Farisiɛn-nba yen b Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda bo maad Yiesu: « San ŋuantieb paa g lolg mɔb, g tie jaandi, g Farisiɛn-nba ŋuantieb mɔ tie nnyan. Ama k a yab di g biɛ nyu. »
42005034	G Yiesu maad’b: « I ban k b kan fid g te k ban yiin yab puokuanu jaanm ń lol mɔb, youg nba g puodaan daa be yen’m a, bii ?
42005035	Ama youg baad g puodaan tan kan gii be b siign. L youg u k b ji baa lolg mɔb. »
42005036	K u biɛ pua’b makpanjam ne: « Sua g pad tiɛpaaɔnŋ cabl g libn tiɛdudunŋ. U gii tien nnyan, u biil tiɛpaaɔnŋ n nyan, cabpaann ŋann mɔ kan nand yen tiɛkpel.
42005037	Sua biɛ g piɛgd dikaam gband-lenkpela n ninŋ mɔ. Lann i kaa l daam tan gii bie, l gband-lenkpela bu pud i, daam ń yad, l lena mɔ ń biɛl.
42005038	Ama l tie k ban tu piɛg dikaam gband-lenpaana n ninŋ i.
42005039	Yua nba gii nyuu dikpel, u ji g bua dipaanm. Yen mɔni, u bu maad g dikpel n man. »
42006001	Yiesu bo pend kpaab n ninŋ Saaba daal, k u ŋuantieb togd dii g pini g ŋman.
42006002	G Farisiɛn-nba yenm maad: « Bɛ n te k i suun yal nba k l g cab g nil ń sun Saaba daal i ? »
42006003	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn g maad’b: « I g lii Yendu Kadaaɔg n, diyenn kom n bo suol Dafiid yen u yegni k u sun yal ii ?
42006004	U bo kua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ n ninŋ, g juab salg kpanu g ŋman, g tie u lieb, k l yen bo g cab g sua ń ŋman, l gii g tie salg-yidkab kua i kaa. »
42006005	Lann i k u maad’b: « Saaba be Nifosaal Bija nuu n i. »
42006006	Saabaliel daal k u kua tintaann dieog n ninŋ g tund niib Yendu maam. L sua g jua nne be l buol k u nuujendu kpe.
42006007	G Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Farisiɛn-nba ji suli Yiesu, k ban diid g liɛ u bu paag l jua Saaba daal, k ban fid g jalg’o oo ?
42006008	Yiesu n yen bo ban ban mali yal nyan, k u maad jua nba k u nuu bo kpe nyan, k wan fiil g sed siign. K u fiil g sed.
42006009	G Yiesu maad: « N bual’i, l cab g Saaba daal, nil ń tien bonŋann daa bii bonbiil i ? K wan fiel nifuog daa bii k wan biɛn’o i ? »
42006010	K u ŋaand ninbina b kul po, g maad l jua k wan tand u nuu. K u tand, k l nuu paag.
42006011	K b pala bie bonciɛnn, k b taan g kpaan ban bu tien Yiesu nand.
42006012	L dana n ninŋ, g Yiesu nyiɛ g duo jual po g bu jaand, g jaand nyamunŋ kul.
42006013	Lan yaan tan fann youg nba, k u yiin u ŋuantieb g lugd b ninŋ piig yen banle, g yiin’m u sundi.
42006014	Wan bo lugd yab sana n ne: Simɔn, yua k u bo pul’o Piɛr, yen u ninja Andre, yen Saak yen San yen Filiip
42006015	yen Bartelemi yen Matieog yen Toma, yen Alfe bija Saak
42006016	yen Simɔn yua nba bo kɔn u doug po, yen Saak bija Suuda yen Suuda Iskariyɔt, yua nba bo bu kuad Yiesu.
42006017	Yiesu bo nyiɛ jual po g jiid yen’m g sed jɔnyiɛlu. U ŋuantieb bonciɛnn bo be l buol ; niib bonciɛnn mɔ bo be g nyiɛ Suude kul n ninŋ yen Serusalɛm doug n. G lieb nyiɛ Tiir yen Sidɔn dingbana nba be mɔgl kunŋ nyan.
42006018	B bo baal k ban cenŋ’o, k wan biɛ paag’b. Yab nba g sanpola bo mabnd’b mɔ bo paag.
42006019	Niib kul bo kpaan k ban sii’ug, k l maa paalu bo nya u ninŋ g paagd b kul.
42006020	Yiesu bo yaad g diid u ŋuantieb g maad’b: « Yinm nba tie tali, pamann tie i yal i, g dugn yinm n tie Yendu diem yab.
42006021	Yinm nba g kom mɔg’i mɔlane, pamann tie i yal i, g dugn i tan bu guo. Yinm nba buud mɔlane, pamann tie i yal i, g dugn i tan baa kpanm.
42006022	Niib gii g bua k b la’i yen ninbinn, g biel’i, g sugd’i, g biid i sann g dugn Nifosaal Bija po, pamann tie i yal i.
42006023	L tan gii baal’i nnyan, yin gii kpanm yen pamann, k l maa i nyuad tan baa yab Yendu ŋaag. B baa‑nba mɔ bo tiend Yendu sogni‑nba nnyan i.
42006024	Ama, yinm nba tie ŋalmandanm, l tan baa biɛ i po, g dugn i la i nyuad o.
42006025	Yinm nba guo mɔlane, l tan baa biɛ i po, g dugn kom tan bu suol’i. Yinm nba laa mɔlane, l tan baa biɛ i po, g dugn i tan baa cagn g buud.
42006026	Yinm nba g niib kul pag’i, l tan baa biɛ i po, g dugn l niib baa‑nba bo tiend yab bo fa k b tie Yendu sogni‑nba nnyan i.
42006027	Yinm nba cenŋ’n ne, n maad’i: I bua man i ninnanda. Yab nba g bua k b la’i yen ninbinn nyan, i tiend’b man ŋanm.
42006028	Yab nba polg’i mɔb, i miɛd man Yendu yedŋanm b po. Yab nba biid i sann mɔ, i jaand man b po.
42006029	Nil gii peb’a kpiɛnyenu, ŋan te’og liel po. Nil gii fiel a liɛdgbenŋl, ŋan cab’o a liɛdbig mɔ.
42006030	Yua nba kul miɛl’a, ŋan te’og. G yua nba juab a bonn, ŋan daa bual’o l po.
42006031	I gii bua g niib ń gii tie yal nba i po, yin mɔ ń gii tie’b lann.
42006032	I gii bua yab nba bua’i kua, i bulcind be lɛ i ? Baa biiddanm mɔno bua yab nba bua’b.
42006033	I gii tiend ŋanm yab nba tiend’i ŋanm, i bulcind be lɛ i ? Baa biiddanm mɔno tiend nnyan.
42006034	I gii kpend yab nba k i ban k b bu ŋmiɛn’i, i bulcind be lɛ i ? Baa biiddanm mɔno kpend biiddanlieb, k ban tan ŋmiɛn’m ban kpend yal i.
42006035	Ama, i bua man i ninnanda, gii tiend’b ŋanm, gii kpend g daa daan siɛl. Nnyan, i nyuad tan baa yab, yin gii tie Yendu Badciɛn bid, k l maa wano nuan ŋanmd yaa danm nba g ban ŋanm, yen tondanm. »
42006036	« I tie man yab jie niib ninbaaɔg, nyan i Baa mɔ n yaan jie niib ninbaaɔg nand nyan.
42006037	Daa jalg man sua. Nnyan, Yendu kan jalg’i. Daa tien man sua biid, Yendu mɔ kan te’i biid. I di man sugl niib po. Nnyan, Yendu mɔ bu di sugl i po.
42006038	I piin man, nnyan Yendu bu pi i mɔ. U bu bign golunŋ nba yab, g nyag nyag, lan gbie g yad, g ŋuun i kpalpiɛɔg n ninŋ. K l maa, yin bignd nand g tien lieb, Yendu tan bu bign nnyan i g te’i. »
42006039	K u biɛ pua’b makpanjam nba ne: « Juan bu fid g dadb juan ii ? B banle kul kan baa buoug n ninŋ ii ?
42006040	Tuonbanŋl g cie u canbaa. Ama tuonbanŋl nba kul banŋ g gbenn, u baa tie nyan u canbaa nyan i.
42006041	Bɛ po i k a nyuan muanu nba be a ninja ninbinn n ninŋ, g yen g la daaɔg nba paan a yal n ninŋ i ?
42006042	A bu tien nle i g maad a ninja: “ N ninja, tien suoo k n nyan muanu nba be a ninbinn n ninŋ ”, k a yen g nyuan daaɔg nba paan a yal n ninŋ i ? Fin munafigidaan ne, daa pand daaɔg nba paan a ninbinn n ninŋ o, nnyan, a bu ŋanm g nyuand g fid g nyan muanu nba be a ninja ninbinn n ninŋ.
42006043	Tiŋanŋ g be g luon luanbiid. Tibiiug mɔ g be g luon luanŋana.
42006044	B band tiig kul u luana buol i. B g pɔ kinkana kunkontiig po, b biɛ g pɔ sinsaba kunkonbɔnn po.
42006045	Nimɔn n yaan mɔg bonŋana nba u pal n ninŋ, u nyanŋ lann i. G nibiiug mɔ n yaan mɔg bonbiiug nba u pal n ninŋ, u nyanŋ lann i. K l maa u pal n ninŋ n gbie yen yal, u maad lann i.
42006046	Bɛ po i k i yi’n Yonmdaan, Yonmdaan, g yen g tiend min maad’i yal nba i ?
42006047	N bu ŋɔn’i yua nba baad n buol, g cenŋ n maam g biɛ tiend lan bual nand n tie yua nba.
42006048	U tie nyan nil nba bua n maa ŋaag, g gbiil k l nyuag g daan nand tantiɛɔg, g bil fiɛgl. G bɔnŋ gbie g yad, g nyum yil l ŋaag, g yen g fid g gul’o, k l maa b maa k l paa.
42006049	Ama daan nba cenŋ n maam g g tiend lan bual nand, u tie nyan nil nba maa ŋaag tand po, g g bil fiɛgl. G bɔnŋ gbie g yad, g nyum yil l ŋaag, k l wob g baa l youg mɔno g te digbeonŋ. »
42007001	Yiesu n yaan maad niib wan mɔg yal g gbenn, k u kua Kafarnawunm doug n ninŋ.
42007002	L sua g Rom sijenm ciɛn nne be l buol, k u yonm nba k u mand g bua’ɔg nyan yiɛl g nag kuum o.
42007003	Wan yaan gbad k b maad Yiesu po, k u sun Suif‑nba nikpela, k ban gad g miɛl’o, k wan baal g fiel u yonm.
42007004	Ban yaan pund u buol, k b balm’o g maad: « U l dagd yen k a tuo wan bual yal,
42007005	k l maa u bua t buolu, wano n biɛ te k b maa t tintaann dieog. »
42007006	G Yiesu yeg yen’m k b saa. Ban tan nag ŋaag, g sijenm ciɛn biɛ sun u dɔnn‑nba k ban maad’o k nne: « Canbaa, daa mabnd a kua. K l maa n g dagd yen ŋan kua n ŋaag n ninŋ.
42007007	Lann n te k min mɔno diid g sua k n g dagd yen k n baal a buol. Ama, maad lanbonyenn kua, k n yonm ń paag.
42007008	K l maa, n mɔ mɔg canbaa‑nba g cɔln’m. G mɔg sijenm nba cɔln’n mɔ. N tu maad yend: “ Gad. ” Wan gad. G maad lua: “ Baal. ” Wan baal. G maad n yonm: “ Tien ne. ” Wan tien. »
42007009	Yiesu n yaan gbad u maam, k u pag’o. G gbeg g maad niwulug nba bo ŋua’ɔg nyan k nne: « N maad’i, Israyɛl buolu n ninŋ mɔno, n g la nil nba dug n po nne. »
42007010	L sijenm ciɛn sundi n yaan guan ŋaag youg nba, k b la l yonm g siɛl ji g mɔg’o.
42007011	L puol po, g Yiesu gad doug nne ninŋ, k b yi Nayɛn. U ŋuantieb yen niib bonciɛnn bo yeg yen’o.
42007012	Wan yaan nag l doug dimɔb buol, k u tuog niib k b tug kuum g saa g daan bu pii. Pekual nne bija n bo kpe ; wano kua n bo tie u big. Doug n ninŋ niib bonciɛnn bo ciɛnd’o.
42007013	Yonmdaan Yiesu n yaan la l big naa, g ninbaaɔg suol’o, k u maad’o k wan daa buud.
42007014	G nagn g sii kaliɛndaba, g kutugla sed. K u maad: « Naasen, n maad’a, fiil. »
42007015	G naasen nba bo kpe nyan fiil g kal, g ji maad. G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o u naa.
42007016	G jiwaani suol b kul, k b dond Yendu g maad k nne: « Yendu sogni nba mɔg yudand ŋɔn u kua t siign ninŋ. Yendu gɔnn u buolu. »
42007017	K b maad Yiesu po Suude n ninŋ kul, yen l dingbankunkogi n ninŋ kul.
42007018	San ŋuantieb bo gad g dugn’o Yiesu n yaan tien yal nba kul. K u yiin b ninŋ banle,
42007019	g sun’m Yonmdaan buol, k ban bual’o: « Fin n tie yua n bo bu baal daa bii, t daa baa guu sua i ? »
42007020	Ban baal Yiesu buol youg nba, k b maad’o: « San Nyunwultua n sun’ti, k tin bual’a g liɛ, fin n tie yua n bo bu baal daa bii, t daa baa guu sua i ? »
42007021	L youg mɔno g Yiesu te g yiɛnm yen yab bo yiɛl yiɛlpaali g bonciɛnn paag. Sanpola bo ŋua niib bonciɛnn k u bel g yaan l sanpola kul. G biɛ te g juanm bonciɛnn mɔ nyuand.
42007022	Lann i k u ŋmiɛn San tondi, g maad: « Guan man g daan maad San yin la yal g biɛ gbad yal: Juanm nyuand, g wabi sonm, g gbaada paagd, g tuukpaa gbiɛ, g kpienm yied, k b muand tali Laabamann.
42007023	Yua nba kan buon u dindann g dugn n po, pamann tie u yal i. »
42007024	San tondi n yaan lebd g kun, g Yiesu ji maad yen niwulug San po nne: « I gad g diid bɛ i tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i ? Galgulnn nba g faalu mign ii ? N n.
42007025	K i yen gad g la bɛ ? Nil k u liɛ tiɛŋand ii ? I ban g yab nba liɛ tiɛgbenŋa, g be manu n, b kua batieb ŋai i.
42007026	K i yen ji gad g diid bɛ i ? Yendu sogni ii ? Yen mɔni, i gad g la Yendu sogni i, ama yin la yua nba nyan, u cie Yendu sogni mɔno.
42007027	U po i k l diɛn Yendu maam kadaaɔg n ninŋ nne: “ N bu sun n tond k wan gaal liig, g ŋanm a sɔnu g sua k a baal. ”
