42007028	N maad’i, puob n mal niib nba kul tinŋ n ne, nil daa g be g cie San. Ama yab tuo Yendu bal ne, b siign yua g tie siɛl mɔno cie San.
42007029	Niib nba kul bo cenŋ San maam, baa lonpogaala mɔno, b kul bo tuo g Yendu n tie yal nba dagd, g San wul’b nyum.
42007030	Farisiɛn-nba yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda nuan g tuo Yendu n yaan bo bua nand b po, g yie g San g wul’b nyum.
42007031	N ban k n bu maad bɛ i mɔlane niib ne po i ? B tie nibuollanu n ne i ?
42007032	B tie nyan bid nba kal jinjelnbaaɔg n, g yi lieb g maad: “ T pieb naagbaag, k i g ŋɔ siɛg. K t yin kuyani, k i g mɔ kumɔni. ”
42007033	N maad nnyan g dugn San Nyunwultua baal g g di jied, g biɛ g nyu daam, k i maad g sanpola ŋua’ɔg.
42007034	G Nifosaal Bija baal, g di g nyu, k i maad: Diid man nil ne. U puol man g kand, u tie dinyuul i, u tie lonpogaala yen biiddanm dɔnn i.
42007035	Ama yab nba gaan Yendu yanfuom n ŋɔnŋ b binbem n ninŋ k l yanfuom tie mɔni. »
42007036	G diyenn Farisiɛn nne yiin Yiesu k wan di yen’o. K u kua l Farisiɛn ŋaag g kal g bu di.
42007037	L sua g puo nne be l doug n ninŋ, g tie biiddaan. Wan yaan gbad g Yiesu di Farisiɛn ŋaag, k u tug kunkɔnŋanŋ nne k l gbie yen tilaali,
42007038	g baal g sed Yiesu puol po u titala buol g buud, k u ninsiid baal Yiesu titala po, k u fiɛn yen u yud, g muad, g sɔgn tilaali.
42007039	Farisiɛn nba bo yiin Yiesu n yaan la nnyan, k u maad u pal n ninŋ: « Jua ne bo gii tie Yendu sogni, u bo bu bann puo nba siin’o ne n tie yua. U bo bu bann k u tie biiddaan i. »
42007040	G Yiesu maad’o: « Simɔn, n mɔg maam g bu maad’a. » K u tuo: « Canbaa, i maad. »
42007041	G Yiesu maad: « Jab banle nne bo kpend ligli niyend buol. G yend pann tie dibala kobiinmu, lua mɔ dibala piinmu.
42007042	Ban yaan bo kan fid g pa nyan, g nil ŋann cab banm banle b pana. To, b ninŋ ne, ŋmaa n baa bua’ɔg g cie u lua i ? »
42007043	G Simɔn ŋmiɛn g maad: « N tama g yua nba k u pann yab i. » G Yiesu maad’o: « Lann n kon nyan. »
42007044	G ji gbeg l puo po g maad Simɔn: « A la puo ne ii ? Min kua a ŋaag n ninŋ ne, a g te k b ŋunn n titala. Ama wano ŋunn n titala yen u ninsiid, g fiɛl yen u yud.
42007045	Fin, a g muad n tankpinn. Ama puo ne n l kua ne, u l muad n titala i.
42007046	A g bud kpam n yul po. Ama wano yen bud tilaali n titala po.
42007047	Lann n te k n maad’a: Wan ŋɔn buam bonciɛnn nba n po ne, lann n ŋɔnŋ k u biid n l yab nand kul, l piin. Ama yua nba mɔg biid waam nne k b piin l biid, u tu ŋɔn u buam mɔ waam nne i. »
42007048	G maad puo: « A biid piin o. »
42007049	G yab nba bo kal g di yen’o nyan ji maad b pala n ninŋ: « Nil ne tie ŋmaa po i, g mɔ piind biid i ? »
42007050	G Yiesu maad puo: « Ŋan yaan dug n po nyan, a la fielu. I kun k a yam ń ji gii dua. »
42008001	L po n pend, g Yiesu saa doi n ninŋ yen dingbankunkogi n ninŋ, g muand g biɛ ŋɔnŋ niib Yendu bal Laabamann. U ŋuantieb piig yen banle bo be yen’o.
42008002	Puob nne mɔ bo be, k u bo bel g yaan sanpola nba bo ŋua’b g lieb mɔ yiɛl k u paag’b. L puob n ninŋ, yeno bo be k b yi’ug Magdala Mari, g sanpola banlile bo ŋua’ɔg g Yiesu bel g yaan’m.
42008003	G lua mɔ be k b yi’ug Sann, u bo tie Kusa ŋaapuo i. Wano Kusa n bo nyuan Erod ŋalman. Susann yen puolieb bonciɛnn mɔ bo be. L puob n bo tugd b ŋalman, g tod Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb.
42008004	Niib bonciɛnn bo nyiɛ doi kul n ninŋ, g tigl Yiesu buol, k u pua’b makpanjam g maad:
42008005	« Tanbuul nne bo nyiɛ g bua n pag bonbuoli. Wan pagn yaa youg, g binyena baa sɔnkunŋ, g niib ŋmaa l po. G bonyugda dii l kul.
42008006	G liel‑nba baa tantiɛli po, g piɛ g yen kuol, k l maa sɔnŋl bo g be.
42008007	G liel‑nba mɔ baa kunkoni n ninŋ, g piɛ, k l kul taan g fiil, g kunkoni fun g luon l po.
42008008	G liel‑nba baa tinŋ n ŋan naan, g piɛ, g nan bim kobg kobg. » G Yiesu biɛ tand g maad: « Yua nba mɔg tuba g bu gbad, wan gbad. »
42008009	K u ŋuantieb bual’o l makpanjam niimn.
42008010	K u maad’b: « Yendu cab yinm i k yin bann u bal ŋasiil. Ama lieb nuan, l baa tie makpanjam i b po, k ban gii nyuan g yen daa laad, g biɛ gii cenŋ g yen daa gbad siɛl.
42008011	L makpanjam niimn tie k nne i: Bonbulkal tie Yendu maam.
42008012	Bim nba baa sɔnkunŋ tie yab nba cenŋ Yendu maam, ama g Sitaan baal g nyan l maam b pala n ninŋ, k ban daa gaal g la fielu.
42008013	Yal nba baa tantiɛli po tie yab nba cenŋ l maam, g gaal yen pamann, k l yen kan kaln b pala n ninŋ. B tie niib nba g mɔg juunn i ; bignn gii baal’b, ban nɔd nui.
42008014	Yal nba baa kunkoni n ninŋ tie yab nba cenŋ Yendu maam, ama g maalm yen ŋalman yen ŋanduna n ninŋ ne manu kul te k b kan fid g kped g nan bim.
42008015	Yal nba baa tinŋ n ŋan naan tie yab nba cenŋ l maam g gaal yen papienn, g bil b pala n ninŋ, g mind g lon luana. »
42008016	« Sua g sonŋ fidl g cibnd bobl n, lann i kaa g kubnd gadoug yagma n ninŋ. Ama b tu tuan’o naan buol nba, g yab kua ŋaag n ninŋ bu fid g la yinyiem i.
42008017	G dugn siɛl g be g wuo, g tan kan wuod. Siɛl mɔ biɛ g be g tie ŋasiil g niib tan kan bann dindaanyenn.
42008018	Lann, suol man i kua yen yin cenŋ nand. K l maa, yua nba mɔg, b tan bu pugn wano i. G yua nba g mɔg mɔ, ban fiel baa yal nba k u mali k l tie u yal. »
42008019	Yiesu ninjanm yen u naa bo baal k ban la’ɔg, g yen g fid g nagn’o, k l maa niib bo yabd.
42008020	K b maad’o: « A naa yen a ninjanm sie cincann, g bua k ban la’a. »
42008021	K u ŋmiɛn’m g maad: « N naa yen n ninjanm tie yab nba cenŋ Yendu maam, g biɛ cɔln g tie lan bual nand i. »
42008022	Diyenn g Yiesu kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ yen u ŋuantieb, g maad’b: « T puod man mɔgl, g gad bɔngbanliel po. »
42008023	Ban kud ŋadunŋ g saa, g guam tan suol Yiesu, k u guan. G faalu kpid mɔgl po yen paalu, g nyum kua kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ, k b ji bua n biɛl.
42008024	Lann i k b nagn Yiesu buol, g find’o, g maad: « Canbaa, canbaa, t kpe n nyan. » Yiesu n yaan find, k u tiɛn faalu yen nyunguona po. K l kul te silb.
42008025	K u maad’b: « I dindann be lɛ i ? » G jiwaani kua’b, k l yaa g lid’b, k b maad b kua ninŋ: « U ne tie ŋmaa i, g niind faalu yen nyum mɔno, k b cɔlm’o i ? »
42008026	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo pund yen b ŋadunŋ Gerasaniɛn-nba doug n ninŋ, k l doug tuol yen Galile.
42008027	Yiesu n yaan nyiɛ ŋadunŋ n ninŋ youg nba, k l doug n ninŋ jua nne tuog’o. Sanpola bo ŋuan l jua k l wai. U bo g liɛ siɛl, u biɛ bo g kua ŋaag, u bo dua kakula n ninŋ i.
42008028	Wan yaan la Yiesu, k u baa g gbaan u nunŋ n ninŋ, g tand g maad yen paalu k nne: « Yendu Badciɛn Bija Yiesu, bɛ n be min yen fin siign i ? Miɛl sugl g daa ŋɔnŋ’n fala. »
42008029	U bo maad nnyan k l maa Yiesu bo niin sanpola, k ban yaad g ŋaa l jua. L g luol fuunu munŋaa, k l sanpola bo tu yie u po. B bo tu lol u nui yen kudsiseli g biɛ dagn u titala k wan daa fid g gad siɛl. Ama u bo tu ciel l kul i, sanpola ń kuan’o muaɔg.
42008030	G Yiesu bual’o: « A sann i ? » K u maad: « T-yab. » K l maa sanpola bonciɛnn bo ŋua’ɔg.
42008031	K b miɛd Yiesu sugl k wan daa bel g lebn’m naan buol nba g fala kan ban g gbenn.
42008032	L sua g duoli bonciɛnn be l buol, k b kpaa’b jual n ninŋ. G sanpola miɛl Yiesu sugl, k wan cab k ban gad g ŋuan l duoli. K u cab’b.
42008033	Lann i k b ŋaa l jua, g ji ŋuan duoli. K l duoli nyiɛ jual po, g san san g baa mɔgl n ninŋ, g biɛl.
42008034	Duokpaali n yaan la yal nba tien, k b san g gad g maad l laabaal doug n ninŋ yen dingbana n ninŋ.
42008035	G niib nyiɛ k ban diid yal nba bo tien. K b baal Yiesu buol, g la jua nba g sanpola bo yaad g ŋaa’ɔg nyan, k u kal Yiesu nintual n, g liɛ tiɛd, g ji tie nimɔn. G jiwaani kua’b.
42008036	G yab nba bo be l buol g la l youg dugn lan tien nand g sanpola yaad g ŋaa l jua.
42008037	G Gerasa doug n niib kul ji baln Yiesu, k wan nya b tinŋ n, k l maa jiwaani bo suol’b bonciɛnn. Lann i k u kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ g lebd.
42008038	G jua nba g sanpola bo yaad g ŋaa’ɔg nyan miɛl’o, k wan gii be yen’o. Ama k u yie g maad’o:
42008039	« I kun a ŋaapo, g daan maad Yendu n yaan tien yal nba kul a po. » K u gad g muand doug munn kul Yiesu n yaan tien yal nba kul u po.
42008040	Yiesu n yaan lebd Galile yaa youg nba, g niwulug gaal’o, k l maa b kul bo guu’ug.
42008041	G jua nne tan baal g baa g gbaan Yiesu nintual n. B bo yi’ug Saayirus i, k u tie Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n canbaa. K u miɛl Yiesu, k wan baal u ŋaapo,
42008042	k l maa u bo mɔg bipuobyenŋ kua i, k l big pund nyan bina piig yen ŋanle nne, g yiɛl g nag kuum o. Yiesu n yaan saa youg nba, g niwulug belb g tud lieb g mabnd’o.
42008043	L sua g puo nne bo be g wul faad k l g kɔl piig yen bina ŋanle n nyan. U bo biil u mɔgm kul dogda‑nba buol. Sua yen bo g fid g teb’o.
42008044	K u nagn Yiesu puol po, g sii u liɛdl mɔgbann. L youg mɔno, k u sɔm ji kɔl.
42008045	G Yiesu bual: « Ŋmaa sii’n i ? » K b kul nai, g Piɛr maad’o: « Yonmdaan, niib n yiɛ g tud’a. »
42008046	Ama g Yiesu maad: « Sua sii’n. K l maa n la g paalu nyiɛ n ninŋ. »
42008047	L puo n yaan la k l g tie wuodi bonn, k u nagn u buol, g jegl, g baa g gbaan, g maad niib kul nunŋ n ninŋ yal nba po te k u sii’ug, yen wan paag nand l youg mɔno.
42008048	G Yiesu maad’o: « N bipuo, a paag g dugn a dug n po. I saa yen laafiɛ. »
42008049	U daa bo g maad g gbenn mɔno, g nil nyiɛ Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n canbaa Saayirus ŋaag, g baal g maad wano Saayirus: « A bipuo kpe o. Ji daa mabnd Canbaa. »
42008050	Yiesu n yaan gbad nnyan, k u maad Saayirus: « Daa jie. I dug n po kukua, k u bu la laafiɛ. »
42008051	Wan yaan pund l ŋaag, u g tuo g sua ń kua yen’o, lan nyan Piɛr yen San yen Saak yen binaa yen bibaa kua i kaa.
42008052	Niib kul bo buud g fabn l big po. G Yiesu maad’b: « Daa buud man. U g kpe kaa, u gɔ i. »
42008053	K b laa’ɔg, k l maa b bo ban k u kpe.
42008054	K u suol big nuu, g yiin’o, g maad: « Sipaanbig, fiil. »
42008055	K u fuom guan, k u fiil l youg mɔno. G Yiesu maad k ban te’og jied.
42008056	K l yaa g lid u danm. Ama g Yiesu kpaa’b, k ban daa maad sua yal nba tien ne.
42009001	Yiesu bo taan u ŋuantieb piig yen banle, g tie’b paalu yen yikod, k ban gii biel sanpola kul, g biɛ gii paagd yiɛnm.
42009002	Lann i g sun’m k ban gii muand Yendu bal maam, gii paagd yiɛnm.
42009003	G biɛ maad’b: « I gii saa, yin daa tugd siɛl. I daa kub man lanbann g bual kɔl, g daa kub jied g bual ligli, g baa sua ń biɛ daa kub liɛdliel.
42009004	I gii can ŋaag nba ninŋ, yin gii be l buol saa yen yin tan bu yaad l buol.
42009005	Ama yab nba g gaal’i, yin nya b doug n ninŋ, g pid pid i titala po tangulunŋ k lan ŋɔn’m k l la banm i. »
42009006	K u ŋuantieb ji waa g tuan dingbana. Naan buol kul b bo muand Laabamann, g biɛ paagd yiɛnm.
42009007	Galile bad Erod bo gbad yal nba kul bo tiend k u yam ŋmad. K l maa yenm bo maad g San n yied kpienm siign.
42009008	G lieb mɔ tua k Eli n guan. Lieb mɔ, g yaa youg po Yendu sogni‑nba ninŋ yend n yied.
42009009	Ama k Erod maad k nne: « L gii tie San i yaa, min mɔno n te k b jagd u yul. K u ne yen ji tie ŋmaa i, k n gbiɛ k b maad k u tie bona ne kul i ? » K u ji kpaan k wan la’ɔg.
42009010	Yiesu sundi n yaan tan guan yaa youg, k b dugn’o ban tien yal nba. K u tug’b g piɛd yen’m siɛl buol, k l kpiɛ yen doug nba k b yi Bɛtsayida nyan.
42009011	Ama g niib bann g ŋuan’o l po. K u gaal’b g ŋɔnŋ’b Yendu bal maam, g paagd yab nba bo kpaan laafiɛ.
42009012	Daajuoug n yaan tan baal, k u ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann nagn u buol, g maad’o: « Te g niib ń gad dingbankunkogi n yen dobid n ninŋ, g la jied yen dunduanbuol. K l maa tin be naan ne tie muaɔg n i, nyiɛnn g kɔb ne. »
42009013	K u maad’b: « Yinm mɔno ń te’b jied k ban di. » K b ŋmiɛn’o: « Tin mɔg yal g cie kpanu ŋanmu yen jani yinle, daa bii, t bu gad g daa jied g te niib nba be ne kul i ? »
42009014	K l maa jab nba bo be l buol bo g luol tuda ŋanmu. K u maad u ŋuantieb: « Te man k ban kal cagl kul jab piinmu. »
42009015	K b te k b kul kal nnyan.
42009016	G Yiesu gaal l kpanu ŋanmu yen l jani yinle, g yaad g diid polu po, g tien Yendu balg, g jend jend, g tie u ŋuantieb k ban biid niib.
42009017	K b kul ŋman g guo. K b taan taan bonjena nba tenn, g gbien kpancubd piig yen ŋanle.
42009018	Diyenn Yiesu bo piɛd g jaand, k u ŋuantieb be yen’o. K u tan bual’b: « Niib tua k n tie ŋmaa i ? »
42009019	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « Yenm tua k a tie San Nyunwultua, g lieb mɔ k Eli, g lieb mɔ biɛg, g yaa youg po Yendu sogni‑nba ninŋ yend n yied. »
42009020	K u bual’b: « K yinm i, i mali k n tie ŋmaa i ? » G Piɛr gaal maam g maad: « A tie Kristo i, yua nba g Yendu sun’o. »
42009021	K u ŋanm g kpaa’b k ban daa ŋaa g sua ń gbad.
42009022	G biɛ maad k l bual g Nifosaal Bija ń la fala bonciɛnn, g doug n nikpela yen Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda ń yie’og, k ban kpi’ug, k wan yied daa ŋantaa daal.
42009023	Lann i g ji maad niib kul k nne: « Yua nba bua wan ŋuan’n, wan sunn u kua po, g bug u dapunpɔnn daal kul gii ŋua’n.
42009024	Yua nba bua wan fiel u miɛl, u bu buon l miɛl. Ama yua nba bu lu u miɛl g dugn n po, u bu la miɛl.
42009025	Nil gii mɔg ŋanduna bona kul g yen buon u kua lann i kaa g buon u miɛl, n liɛ l nyuad i ? .
42009026	B gii taan n sann, g muand n Laabamann k l mɔg yua nba fai, Nifosaal Bija mɔ tan bu yie’og youg nba k u tan bu guan yen u yudand yen u Baa yudand yen malɛg‑nba yudand.
42009027	Yen mɔni n maad’i, Yendu bal bu baal g sua k yinm nba ne, g siɛb daa g kpe. »
42009028	Yiesu n yaan maad l maam g gbenn, k l tien nyan daa ŋanniin nyan, k u tug Piɛr yen Saak yen San, g duo jual po, k wan jaand.
42009029	Wan jaand youg nba, k u nunŋ lebd, k u tiɛd penn g nyili, g tuud.
42009030	K b la g jab banle pag yen’o, lann n tie Moyis yen Eli.
42009031	B mɔ bo nyili g tuud, g maad Yiesu n bu kpe Serusalɛm nand g tien Yendu buam.
42009032	Guam bo kpii Piɛr yen u yegni, ama k b tan nyuand g la Yiesu k u nyili g tuud, yen jab banle nba bo sie u buol.
42009033	Youg nba k l jab bo bua n yaad g ŋaa Yiesu, g Piɛr maad’o: « Canbaa, l ŋan yen tin gii be ne. T bu pua jond tintaa. Yenn ń gii tie a yal, g liel ń gii tie Moyis yal, g liel mɔ ń gii tie Eli yal. » U bo g ban wan maad yal nba.
42009034	Wan yaan maad youg nba, g tawalgbaɔnŋ jiid nyan ŋunn nyan g libn b po, g jiwaani suol wano yen Saak yen San youg nba k l libn b po.
42009035	G niɛlu nne nyiɛ l tawalgbaɔnŋ n ninŋ g maad: « U ne tie n Bija i, k n lugd’o. I cenŋ man u maam. »
42009036	Niɛlu n yaan maad g gbenn, l sua g Yiesu ji be u kukua i. K b suol b kua g g maad sua l dana n ninŋ ban yaan la yal nba.
42009037	Lan fann g Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bantaa nyiɛ jual po g jiid, g niib bonciɛnn tuog’o.
42009038	G jua nne yign niib siign g maad: « Canbaa, n miɛd’a k a nyuand n bija n ninŋ, n mɔg wano kua i.
42009039	G sanpola ŋua’ɔg, k u tu tan yign ban fuun g lu’ug, g mɔsankpinkpaaɔnŋ cuud. B tan gii cɔg’o, ban gbal g ŋaa’ɔg.
42009040	N miɛl a ŋuantieb k ban bel’b, k b gbal. »
42009041	G Yiesu maad: « Yinm nibiid buolu ne, i g mɔg dindann baa waam nne ! N biɛ baa be yen’i saa yen bɛ youg u g di sugl i po i ? Baal yen a big nii. »
42009042	Big n yaan nagd youg nba, g sanpola fuun’o g lu’ug tinŋ n ninŋ k u dua g tabd. G Yiesu tiɛn sanpola po, g paag l big g ŋmiɛn’o u baa.
42009043	K l yaa g lid b kul, k b maad g Yendu mɔg paalu. Lan daa bo yaa g lid niib yen Yiesu n tie bonŋana nba kul, k u maad u ŋuantieb:
42009044	« I ŋanm g cenŋ man maam nba ne: B bu kuad Nifosaal Bija g niib ń suol’o. »
42009045	Ama b bo g gbad l maam niimn. L bo duag b po, k ban daa fid g gbad l niimn i, k b yen ji jie yen ban bual’o.
42009046	Yiesu ŋuantieb bo nai yen lieb g kpaan k ban bann yua nba baa tie ciɛn b siign.
42009047	Yiesu n yaan bann ban mali yal b pala n ninŋ nyan, k u tug big g sen’o u buol, g maad’b:
42009048	« Yua nba gaal big ne n sann po, u gaal min i. Yua nba gaal’n mɔ, u gaal yua nba sun’n i. K l maa yua nba tie talg i siign ninŋ, wano n tie ciɛn. »
42009049	G San gaal maam g maad: « Canbaa, t la jua nne k u biel sanpola a sann po, k t bel’o k wan daa tie nnyan, k l maa u g yegd yen’ti. »
42009050	Ama g Yiesu maad: « Daa biel’o man. Yua nba g kɔn yen’i, u taa i po i. »
42009051	Youg nba g Yiesu bo bu do polu po n yaan bo nagd, k u yed k u bu l gad Serusalɛm i,
42009052	g sun tondi u liig po. K b paan sɔnu g kua Samari doyenu n ninŋ k ban bobn g gaal’o.
42009053	Ama k l doug n niib g tuo g bu gaal’o, k l maa u bo tuol Serusalɛm po.
42009054	U ŋuantieb Saak yen San n yaan la nnyan, k b maad’o: « Yonmdaan, a bua k t te g muu ń nya polu po, g baa g di b kul ii ? »
42009055	G Yiesu ŋmagd b po g fu yen’m.
42009056	K b tuad dingbanliel n ninŋ.
42009057	Ban daa bo paa sɔnu po nyan, g nil nne maad’o: « N baa ŋua’a ŋan saa naan kul. »
42009058	G Yiesu maad’o: « Nantantoba mɔg fali, g nuani mɔg tedd, Nifosaal Bija nuan yen g mɔg wan bu kpagn yul naan g fuod. »
42009059	K u maad lua mɔ: « I ŋua’n. » K l nil maad: « Cab’n k n daa kun g daan pii n baa o. »
42009060	Ama k u maad’o: « Ŋaa g kpienm ń gii pii b kpienm. Fin nuan ń gii saa g daan muand Yendu bal maam. »
42009061	G lua mɔ maad’o: « Yonmdaan, n baa ŋua’a, ama yen daa ŋaa k n kun g daan cab n ŋaag yab o. »
42009062	G Yiesu maad’o: « Yua nba ko yen naakuul, g yen gbegd puol po, l daan g dagd yen wan sun Yendu diem n tuonn. »
42010001	L po n yaan pend, g Yonmdaan lugd nilieb piinlile yen banle, g yegn’m banle-le, g sun’m k ban gad doi n yen dingbana nba kul n ninŋ, k wano mɔno bo bu gad.
42010002	U bo maad’b nne: « Bonkukuod bie g yab, g tuonsunna yen g yab. Lann, miɛl man kpaabdaan, k wan sun tuonsunna u kpaab n ninŋ.
42010003	I saa man. Min n suun’i nyan pebid nyan fuabɔjad sinsiign ninŋ.
42010004	Daa kub man ligli, daa kub man kɔl g bual taacaad. I biɛ daa biɛl man fuondi n ninŋ sɔnu po.
42010005	I gii kua ŋaag nba kul n ninŋ, yin cind g maad: Yanduanm ń gii be ŋaag ne ninŋ.
42010006	L gii tie g nil be l ŋaag n, g kpaan g niib yam ń gii dua, l nil yam bu duan. L yen gii g tie nnyan l yanduanm bu guan i buol.
42010007	I be man ŋaag nba ninŋ k b gaal’i, gii di g nyu ban mɔg yal. K l maa tuonsunn kan luol u paaɔg. Daa waa man g tuan ŋai.
42010008	I gii kua doi nba kul n ninŋ, g niib gaal’i, yin gii di yal nba kul k b tien’i,
42010009	gii paagd l ninŋ yiɛnm, g maad l doug n niib g Yendu bal nag b buol n nyan.
42010010	Ama i gii kua doi nba kul n ninŋ, g niib g gaal’i, yin nya g sed sɔnjala po g maad:
42010011	Baa i doug ne tangulunŋ nba tab t titala po, t pid lann n nyan, g ŋaa yen’i. Ama, i yen gii ban g Yendu bal nag o.
42010012	N maad’i, g Yendu n bu bu niib kul yaa daal, Sɔdɔm yab yal baa su yen l doug n yab.
42010013	Yinm Korasinn yab yen yinm Bɛtsayida yab, fala bu gbad’i ! Yaalidug bona nba tien i doug n ne, l bo gii tie Tiir yen Sidɔn doi n ninŋ i yaa aa, man b liɛ kpalpiɛd g pug fantam hal youg, g ŋɔn k b ŋaa b tuonbiid o.
42010014	Mɔni, buud daal, Tiir yen Sidɔn yab yal baa su yen’i.
42010015	K yinm Kafarnawunm yab, i mali k i bu fid g te i doug sann ń do polu po yaa aa ? Yendu bu jiin i doug hal tinkpiiug n.
42010016	Yua nba cenŋ i maam, u cenŋ min i. Yua nba yie’i, u yie min i. Yua nba yie’n mɔ, u yie yua nba sun’n i. »
42010017	K l piinlile yen banle tan guan k b pala man, k b maad: « Yonmdaan, a sann po, baa sanpola mɔno gbal g tuo tin yed yal i. »
42010018	K u maad’b: « N bo la Sitaan k u nyiɛ polu po nyan tanyigdu nyan, g baa.
42010019	I la i, n tie’i paalu nba k i baa ŋmaad nani yen wai, g biɛ paad i ninnand Sitaan paalu kul, g baa siɛl kan fid g tien’i bonbiil.
42010020	Yen l yaa kul, daa kpanm man g dugn sanpola n gbal g tuo i maam kaa. I kpanm man yen pamann, g dugn i sana diɛn Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ. »
42010021	L youg mɔno, g Yiesu kpanm yen pamann Foŋanm paalu po, g maad: « N Baa, polu yen tinŋ Yonmdaan, n dond’a g tiend’a balg yen ŋan ŋɔn yab g ban siɛl bona nba k a g cab g yanfodanm yen ninfandanm ń bann. Ɛɛn n Baa, a buam n i, k l tien nnyan.
42010022	N Baa Yendu tie’n paalu bonn kul po. Sua g ban yua n tie Yendu Bija, u Baa kua i kaa. Sua biɛ g ban Baa mɔ, Yendu Bija kua i kaa, yen yua nba g Yendu Bija tuo g ŋɔn’o Yendu. »
42010023	K u ŋmagd u ŋuantieb po, g maad yen banm kukua: « Yab nba nyuan yin nyuan yal nba, pamann tie b yal i.
42010024	K l maa n maad’i, g Yendu sogni‑nba yen batieb bonciɛnn bo bua k ban la yin nyuan yal, g g la, g bua k ban gbad yin gbiɛ yal ne, g g gbad. »
42010025	Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanband nne bo fiil k wan bign Yiesu, g bual’o: « Canbaa, n bu tien nle i, g tan la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn i ? »
42010026	K u ŋmiɛn’o: « Bɛ n diɛn Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n ninŋ i ? A gbiɛ’l nle i ? »
42010027	K u ŋmiɛn g maad: « A baa bua Yonmdaan a Yendu yen a pal kul, yen a munn kul, yen a paalu kul, yen a maalm kul, g biɛ gii bua a lua nyan a kua nyan. »
42010028	G Yiesu maad’o: « A maad lann n nyan. I tiend nnyan, a bu la miɛl. »
42010029	Ama k l jua bua wan ŋɔn k u buali mɔg niimn, g guan g bual: « Ŋmaa n tie n lua i ? »
42010030	G Yiesu gaal maam g maad: « Jua nne bo nyiɛ Serusalɛm g ji Seriko, g bibiɛdi cend g suol’o, g fiel u tiɛd, g pua pua’ɔg, k u tan nubl kuum, k b yaad g ŋaa’ɔg.
42010031	K l tuu g salg-yidkua nne tuag l sɔnu g ji, g la’ɔg g kogn g pend.
42010032	G jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n tuonsunn nne mɔ baal l buol, g la’ɔg g mɔ kogn g pend.
42010033	Samari jua nne mɔ bo paa l sɔnu po. Wano n tan baal u buol g la’ɔg, g ninbaaɔg suol’o,
42010034	k u nagn g tien kpam yen dimɔunŋ u yiɛd n ninŋ, g fin fin, g jagn’o u bonŋ po, g gad yen’o saanm gaal buol, g nyuand u ninŋ.
42010035	Lan fann, k u nyan dibala ŋanle, g tie yua nba guu saanm gaal buol, g maad: “ Ŋanm gii kub’o. L gii tie k a biɛ nyan siɛl g pugn l po, n tan gii guan, n bu ŋmiɛn’a. ”
42010036	A yaa po, niib bantaa ne ninŋ, ŋmaa n ŋɔn k u tie yua nba g bibiɛdi cend’o nyan lua i ? »
42010037	K u maad: « Yua nba jie’og ninbaaɔg. » G Yiesu maad’o: « I saa, g mɔ ń gii tiend nnyan. »
42010038	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb bo paa sɔnu po, k u kua dingbanbig nne ninŋ, g puo nne gaal’o u ŋaag n ninŋ. L puo bo yi Mart i.
42010039	Mart bo mɔg niipuo k b yi’ug Mari. G Mari baal g kal Yonmdaan buol g cenŋ u maam.
42010040	Mart nuan bo liɛd yen tuona i, g tan baal b buol g maad: « Yonmdaan, a baga yen n niipuo n ŋaa k n liɛd yen tuona n kukua aa ? Lann, maad’o k wan taan’n. »
42010041	G Yonmdaan ŋmiɛn’o: « Mart, Mart, a kuand a kua maalm, g bibd bona bonciɛnn. Bonyenn kua n be g tie bonmɔnn.
42010042	Mari lugd yal nba mand g tie bonmɔnn, g sua kan fid g fiel. »
42011001	Diyenn Yiesu bo be siɛl buol g jaand. Wan yaan jaand g gbenn, k u ŋuantieb n ninŋ, yend bual’o: « Yonmdaan, ŋɔn’ti tin baa jaand nand, nyan San Nyunwultua n yaan ŋɔn u ŋuantieb nand nyan. »
42011002	K u maad’b: « I tu gii jaand, yin maad k nne: T Baa, a sann ń do, a diem ń pund.
42011003	Te’ti daal kul jied.
42011004	Di sugl t biid po, k l maa t mɔ tu di sugl yab nba tu biil’ti nyan. G biɛ daa ŋaa tin baa bignn n ninŋ. »
42011005	G Yiesu biɛ maad’b: « I ninŋ ne, nil gii mɔg dɔnn, g gad yɔugsiiug g la’ɔg g maad’o: “ N dɔnn, kpend’n kpanu ŋantaa,
42011006	k l maa n dɔnn nne nyiɛ sɔnu g baal, k n g mɔg siɛl g bu cand’o. ”
42011007	L gii tie k u dɔnn ŋann be dieog n o, g nyaan ŋmiɛn’o: “ Daa mabnd’n. T kpal gann o. Min yen n bid duan o. N kan fid g fiil g te’a. ”
42011008	Min maad’i, baa u gii g fiil g tie’og g dugn b dɔnnu po, u yen bu gbal g fiil g te’og wan bua yal nba kul, k l maa u nyanŋ u yam.
42011009	Min maad’i, i miɛd man, b bu te’i. I kpaan man, i bu la. I kuog man gann, b bu luod i po.
42011010	K l maa yua miɛd kul, b bu te’og, yua kpaan kul bu la, yua nba kuo gann, b bu luod wan kua.
42011011	I ninŋ ne, bibaa lano po i k u big bu miɛl’o janŋ, wan ŋaa lann o g te’og waaɔg u ?
42011012	Lann i kaa u gii miɛl jenn, wan te’og nanŋ i ?
42011013	Lann, yinm nba tie nibiid, i gii ban k i te i bid bonŋana, l bu tien nle i, k i Baa nba be polu po ji kan te yab nba miɛd’o Foŋanm i ? »
42011014	Jua nne bo be g sanpola ŋua’ɔg g te k u muu, g Yiesu bel g yaan l sanpola, k u ji fid g maad, k l yaa g lid niwulug.
42011015	Ama k b ninŋ siɛb maad k u diɛ Bɛlsebuul paalu i, yua nba tie sanpola bad, g biel sanpola.
42011016	G lieb mɔ kpaan k ban bign’o, g bual’o, k wan tien yaalidug bonn g ŋɔn k u paalu nya Yendu buol i.
42011017	G Yiesu bann b maalm g maad’b: « Doug nba ninŋ g niib g taa mɔb b tu tan juod g yad i, died ń gii baal g nyagd liel.
42011018	I maad k n diɛ Bɛlsebuul paalu i, g biel sanpola. Sitaan gii guan g kɔn yen u kua, l bu tien nle i k u diem ń gii tund g be i ?
42011019	I gii yed k min diɛ Bɛlsebuul paalu i g biel sanpola, i ŋuantieb mɔ biel’b ŋmaa paalu po i ? Lann, banm mɔno n bu ŋɔn k i mɔg biid.
42011020	Ama l gii tie k n diɛ Yendu paalu i g biel sanpola, l ŋɔn g Yendu bal pund i buol n nyan.
42011021	Gbanmandaan gii mɔg jakɔntiɛd g guu u ŋaag, sua kan fid g jan u mɔgm.
42011022	Ama, sua gii baal g paa g cie’og, g paad’o, u bu fiel jakɔntiɛd nba kul k u bo dug l po nyan, g bɔgd lieb wan tug yal kul.
42011023	Yua nba g taa n po, u tie n ninnand i. Yua nba g tod’n k n taand mɔ, u yad i.
42011024	Sanpol gii ŋua nil k b tan bel g yaan’o, u tu gad gii waa tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i, g kpaan naan nba k u bu fuod. U gii kpaan kpaan g luol, wan maad k u bu lebd g ŋuan wan daan kpiɛ g ŋua nil nba i.
42011025	U gii guan l buol, g sua g siɛl g be g bu pan’o,
42011026	wan guan g lebd g daan yiin u lieb banlile, yab n biɛ g cie wano mɔno, b kul ń guan g ŋanm gii ŋua l nil. L youg, nil ŋann binbem ji baa bi g cie lan daan kpiɛ g tie nand. »
42011027	Yiesu n daa bo maad nnyan, g puo nne tand niib siign ninŋ, g maad: « Puo nba pil’a g biɛ ŋaan’a u biil, pamann tie u yal i. »
42011028	Ama g Yiesu maad: « Yab nba cenŋ Yendu maam g biɛ tug g sun yen tuonn, banm n mand g be pamann n ninŋ. »
42011029	Niib bonciɛnn n yaan bo tigi nyan, g Yiesu maad: « Mɔlane niib ne tie nibiid i. B kpaan k ban la yaalidug bonn i. B yen kan la siɛl yaa yaalidug bonn, l gii g tie Yendu n bo tien yal u sogni Sonas po i kaa.
42011030	Nyan Sonas n yaan bo te banm Niniif yab po nyan, nnyan i g Nifosaal Bija mɔ bu te banm, mɔlane niib ne po.
42011031	Yendu n bu bu niib yaa daal, yanbaɔnŋ puobad bu fiil g te yinm mɔlane niib ne i biid, k l maa u bo nyiɛ hal banfagl i, g baal k wan cenŋ Salomɔn yanfomaam. Yua nba yen be ne cie Salomɔn.
42011032	Yendu n bu bu niib yaa daal, Niniif yab bu fiil g te yinm mɔlane niib ne i biid, k l maa Sonas bo muand’b Yendu Laabaal, k b lebd b binbem o. Yua nba yen be ne cie Sonas.
42011033	Sua g sonŋ fidl g wuond, lann i kaa g cibnd bobl n ninŋ. B tu tuan’o naan buol nba, g yab kua ŋaag n ninŋ bu fid g la yinyiem i.
42011034	Ninbinn n tie gbannand fidl. L gii tie k a ninbinn ŋan, a gbannand kul baa be yinyiem n ninŋ i. A ninbinn gii g ŋan, a gbannand kul baa be bunbɔnn n i.
42011035	Lann, ŋanm g diid g liɛ yinyiem nba be a ninŋ g tie bunbɔnn ii ?
42011036	To ! L gii tie k a gbannand kul be yinyiem n, g siɛl yaa bunbɔnn g ŋmad, a baa be yinyiem n, nyan fidl n tu fand’a yen u yinyiem nand nyan i. »
42011037	Yiesu n yaan maad nnyan, g Farisiɛn nne yiin’o, k wan di u ŋaapo. K u gad g kua g kal g bu di.
42011038	Ama l Farisiɛn n yaan la k u di g g nid nyan b danm bogda n bual nand nyan, k l yaa g lid’o.
42011039	G Yonmdaan maad’o: « Yinm Farisiɛn-nba yaann ii ! I tu ŋanm i jeditiɛd yen i nyunnyubona puol po k lan gii ŋan Yendu nunŋ n i, ama k i pala n ninŋ yen gbie yen naayiug maalm yen tugmɔunŋ.
42011040	Yinm yanjalndanm ne ! Yua nba tien puol po, wano kaa biɛ tien nuag n ii ?
42011041	Tug man yal nba be i jedibona n, g te tali. L youg, l kul bu te ŋand i po.
42011042	Ama, yinm Farisiɛn-nba, fala bu gbad’i, yinm nba tu bɔgd i bonkukuod n ninŋ kanmi yen guand yen kpinlied, g bil kpega piig, g tug kpegyenn g te Yendu paab, g yen yi Yendu mɔnkund fam, g biɛ g mɔg buam u po. I daa bo bu cind g tien lann yo, g fid g diid yal n tenn.
42011043	Yinm Farisiɛn-nba, fala bu gbad’i, yinm nba bua k i gii kaal liig kinkaani po tintaann died n ninŋ, g biɛ bua k i tu gii baal naan niib n ninŋ, niib ń gii fuond’i.
42011044	Fala bu gbad’i, i tie nyan kakula nba sal g niib g nyuan, g ŋmaad l po g g ban nyan i. »
42011045	G Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanband gaal maam g maad’o: « Canbaa, ŋan yaan maad nand ne, a sugd t mɔ i. »
42011046	K u maad: « Yinm Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda, fala bu gbad i mɔ, k l maa i tunŋ niib tugkpiɛga nba k yinm mɔno kan tuo g biɛb baa yen nuubil.
42011047	Fala bu gbad’i, k l maa i maa Yendu sogni‑nba kakula, k i baa‑nba n yen bo kpii’b.
42011048	Nnyan, i ŋɔnŋ k yinm yen i baa‑nba taa maalm yen bontitied n nyan. Banm n kpii’b, k yinm ji maa b kakula.
42011049	L yaa po n te g Yendu nba tie Yanfodaan mɔno maad: “ N bu sun sogni‑nba yen sundi b buol. B ninŋ, b bu ŋɔn yenm‑nba fala, g kpi lieb‑nba. ”
42011050	Lann, Yendu sogni‑nba nba kul k b kpii’b hal ŋanduna cilyoug, lan cil Abɛl saa yen Sakari, yua nba k b bo kpii’ug jaanddeciɛɔnŋ gɔnn n, g kpiɛn salg binbindl nyan, yinm mɔlane niib ne i, k n bu dad i tubl l po. N maad’i faa, yinm mɔlane niib ne i, k n bu dad i tubl.
42011052	Yinm Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda, fala bu gbad’i, k l maa i luon dimɔb nba g niib bu fid g kua g banŋ Yendu maam. Yinm mɔno g kua, i biɛ g ŋaa yab nba mɔ bo bua ban kua, k b kua. »
42011053	Yiesu n yaan nyiɛ l buol, g Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Farisiɛn-nba pala ŋub u po. Lann i k b ji bual’o buali bona kul po,
42011054	g kpaan k wan maad g kpiɛd k ban jalg’o.
42012001	L youg l sua g niib tigl tuda tuda, g ŋmaad lieb, g Yiesu ji cil g maad u ŋuantieb k nne: « Suol man i kua yen Farisiɛn-nba dibina, lann n tie b munafigi nba k b mɔg.
42012002	Siɛl g wuo g tan kan wuod. Siɛl biɛ g tie ŋasiil g sua tan kan bann.
42012003	Lann n te k yin maad yal kul bunbɔnn n ninŋ, b tan bu gbad yensiig n. K yin sɔb g maad yal kul lɔdg n, b tan bu kpaand niib kul siign ninŋ.
42012004	Yinm, n dɔnn‑nba, n maad’i, daa jie man yab nba bu kpi nil, g yen ji kan fid g tien siɛl l puol po.
42012005	N bu ŋɔn’i yin baa jie yua nba. I jie man nil kuum puol po yua nba bu fid g lu’ug muu nba so g kan ban g junn n ninŋ. Ɛɛn, n maad’i, i jie man wano.
42012006	B g kuad nɔnbid banmu g gaan ligli waam nne ii ? Yen l yaa kul, Yendu g suni baa yend po.
42012007	Baa i yud mɔno, Yendu ban l dugl. Daa jie man, i cie nɔnbid kul.
42012008	N maad’i, yua nba maad niib nunŋ n ninŋ, k u tie n yua, min Nifosaal Bija mɔ tan bu maad Yendu malɛg‑nba nunŋ n ninŋ, k n ban’o.
42012009	Ama yua nba yie niib nunŋ n ninŋ, k u g tie n yua, n mɔ tan bu yie k n g ban’o Yendu malɛg‑nba nunŋ n ninŋ.
42012010	G nil nba kul bu maad mabiid Nifosaal Bija po, l daan bu la sugl, ama nil nba yiin Foŋanm fam, l daan kan la sugl.
42012011	Youg nba k b bu gad yen’i Suif‑nba tintaann died n ninŋ, b buuddanm yen b yikodanm buol, i daa jaad man i kua, g kpaan yin bu kɔn i kua po nand, lann i kaa yin bu maad yal.
42012012	K l maa Foŋanm bu ŋɔn’i l youg mɔno, yin bu maad yal. »
42012013	G niib siign ninŋ, yend maad Yiesu: « Canbaa, maad n ninja k wan bɔgd’n t baa faal. »
42012014	K u maad’o: « Ŋmaa n kaan’n k n gii bu i buud i, lann i kaa k n gii bɔgd i faal i ? »
42012015	K u biɛ maad’b: « I ceg man ! Suol man i kua yen ŋalman buam. K l maa nil gii bua wan gii mɔg mɔgm nba kul, lann kaa bu fid g guul u miɛl. »
42012016	Lann i k u pua’b makpanjam g maad: « Nil nne n bo be g tie mɔgd, k u bonkukuod tien hal bonciɛnn.
42012017	K u ji tan mali mali k u bu tien nle ? K u g mɔg wan bu bil u bonkukuod naan nba.
42012018	G ji maad: “ N ban min bu tien yal nba: n bu bed n bunbɔa, g guan g maa bunbɔciɛnd, g taan dii yen min mɔg bona nba kul g ŋuun.
42012019	N gii tien nnyan, n ji bu maad n kua k nne: Diid a, a mɔg bondikal bonciɛnn g bu di hal bina nba yab. Kal gii fei, gii di g nyu, gii tie jaanm. ”
42012020	Ama g Yendu maad’o: “ A g mɔg yam ! Dinne nyiɛɔg ne mɔno, a miɛl bu junn. K ŋan ji taan taan yal ne kul i, l ji baa tie ŋmaa yal i ? ”
42012021	L tie nnyan i, daan nba kpaan ŋalman u kua po, g yen g kpaan k wan gii mɔg Yendu buol yaa mɔgm. »
42012022	G Yiesu biɛ maad u ŋuantieb: « L po n te k n maad’i. Daa tun g mali i miɛl po yin bu di yal, yen i gbannand po yin bu liɛ yal.
42012023	K l maa miɛl n cie jied, g gbannand mɔ cie tiɛd.
42012024	Diid man kinkaad. B g buul, b biɛ g yend. B g mɔg bunbɔa, b biɛ g mɔg bunbuna. G Yendu yen dinŋ’b. I g cie bonyugda ii ?
42012025	I ninŋ ne, ŋmaa i, k u maalciɛnm po, u bu fid g te u miɛl ń fagd baa waam nne g pugn i ?
42012026	Nnyan, l gii tie k i g mɔg paalu bonn nba tie bonbig po, bɛ po i k i fabn yal nba tenn po i ?
42012027	Diid man tiidi n kped nand g tien puug. B g suun tuonn, b biɛ g luug tiɛd mɔ. Ama n maad’i, g bad Salomɔn nba bo mɔg bonciɛnn mɔno bo g ban g liɛ tiɛd k l ŋan nyan tiidi ne ninŋ baa tiyenŋ nyan.
42012028	Yendu gii lanŋ muaɔg n tiidi nba be dinne, g wonn k b won bu cua g kuun muu n ninŋ, bɛ po i k u kan lan yinm nifoi i ? I dindann g yab baa waam nne.
42012029	Yinm, i daa kpaan man yin baa di yal, lann i kaa yin baa nyu yal. I daa ŋmad man i yam l po.
42012030	Yab nba g dug Yendu po n mɔg l yanbani. Yinm nuan, i Baa Yendu ban k l bona kul ne tie payiɛnu i po.
42012031	Lann, daa cind man g tuo Yendu bal o, g yal nba tenn kul, u bu pugn’i.
42012032	I daa jie man, yinm Yendu buolu nba g yab, k l maa i Baa Yendu cegn g bu din’i bal.
42012033	Kuad man yin mɔg yal g te tali ligli. Nyal man ligkɔla nba kan cad g bil man i mɔgm Yendu ŋaag, naan buol k l kan biɛl, g naayig kan fid g jan, g kuutuul mɔ biɛ kan fid g mua.
42012034	K l maa i mɔgm n be naan nba, i maalm mɔ be l buol i. »
42012035	Yiesu biɛ maad u ŋuantieb: « Liɛ man i tuonsuntiɛd, g son i fida gii kub,
42012036	gii tie nyan naasenm nba guu youg nba k b canbaa bu nya puobiɛnn g kpen nyan. U tan gii kpen g tien kafala, ban luod gann l youg mɔno.
42012037	L baa tie pamann i l naasenm po, youg nba k b canbaa bu kpen g sua k b nyuan. Yen mɔni n maad’i, wano mɔno bu liɛ tuonsuntiɛɔg g te k ban kal, k wan te yua kul jied.
42012038	U gii kpen yɔugsiiug, lann i kaa kuutonmɔni g la’b nnyan, l baa tie pamann i l naasenm po.
42012039	Ŋanm g cenŋ man ne: Ŋaagdaan bo gii ban naayig n bu baal nyiɛɔg yaa youg nba, u bo kan ŋaa wan kua u ŋaag n.
42012040	Lann, mɔ ń baan man gii guu, k l maa Nifosaal Bija tan bu baal yin g mali k u bu baal youg nba i. »
42012041	G Piɛr bual’o: « Yonmdaan, t yaa po i k a pua makpanjam nba ne bii niib kul po i ? »
42012042	G Yonmdaan maad: « Tuonsunn nba k u canbaa guun’o u tuonsunlieb, k wan gii tien’m jied ban bua yaa youg nba, l tuonsunn gii ceg, g biɛ cenŋ u canbaa maam,
42012043	k u tan kpen yaa daal g sua k u ŋanm g suun u tuonn, pamann baa tie l tuonsunn yal i.
42012044	Yen mɔni n maad’i, u canbaa bu tug u mɔgm kul g guun wano i.
42012045	Ama l gii tie k l tuonsunn maad u pal n ninŋ k u canbaa daa kan kpen mɔlane, g ji suol naasenm yen sipaanm nba tie u tuonsunlieb g pua, g di, g nyu, g guog daam,
42012046	u canbaa tan bu kpen wan g guu yaa daal, yen youg nba k u g ban i, g pua g pad pad’o, nyan ban tu tie nibiid nand nyan.
42012047	Tuonsunn nba ban u canbaa n bua yal, g yen g bobn siɛl, g g tien yal nba g canbaa bua, b bu pua’ɔg bonciɛnn.
42012048	Ama yua nba g ban u canbaa n bua yal, g tien yal nba dagd yen puad, b kan pua’ɔg bonciɛnn. Yua nba k b tie’og bonciɛnn, b tan bu bual’o l po bonciɛnn. Yua nba k b piɛn’o bonciɛnn, b tan bu ŋanm g bual wano i bonciɛnn.
42012049	N baal yen muu i tinŋ po ne, g biɛ sun k l bo suol o.
42012050	Fala be g guu’n k n bu kua l n nyan ban tu jiid nyuncinn n nyan, k n yam g dua baa waam nne, saa yen l kul n tan bu tien g gbenn.
42012051	I mali k n baal yen manu i niib siign tinŋ ne po ii ? N n, n maad’i, n baal yen paadu i.
42012052	Lan cil mɔlane g ji gii saa, ŋaag nba ninŋ g niib tie banmu, b bu paad yen lieb, bantaa ń kɔn yen banle, g banle ń kɔn yen bantaa.
42012053	Bibaa ń kɔn yen u bija, g bija mɔ ń kɔn yen u baa. Binaa ń kɔn yen u bipuo, g bipuo mɔ ń kɔn yen u naa. Salnaa ń kɔn yen u sipuog, g sipuog mɔ ń kɔn yen u salnaa. »
42012054	G Yiesu pugn g maad niwulug: « I gii la g tawalgbaɔnŋ nyiɛ puol, i tu maad l youg mɔno, g taag yin, k u kon tu baa.
42012055	Faalu gii nyiɛ yanbaɔnŋ, i tu maad g tuntounŋ baa be, lan kon tien nnyan.
42012056	Munafigidanm ! I tu diid tinŋ n, g yaad g diid polu po g ŋɔn daal n baa tie nand. K l ji tien nle i k i ji kan fid g bann mɔlane bona nba tie ne niimn i ?
42012057	L tien nle i k yinm mɔno g ban yal nba dagd yen yin tien i ?
42012058	Fin yen nil gii mɔg maam k u saa yen’a buuddanm buol, ŋan tuod yin gbad i lieb maam g sua k i daa paa sɔnu po, lann i kaa u bu dad g gad yen’a buuddaan buol i, ban juab’a, g te sijenm, k ban luon’a dansalg.
42012059	N maad’a, a gii ŋaa k b luon’a l buol, a kan nya saa yen youg nba k a bu pa l kul, g kan tenn baa kuug. »
42013001	L youg, g niib baal g maad Yiesu g Pilat bo te k b kpii Galile niib nne. L bo sua k l niib yid Yendu salg i.
42013002	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « I mali k l Galile niib bo kpe l kuum g dugn b bo tie biiddanm g cie Galile yab kul yaa aa ?
42013003	N n, n maad’i l g tie nnyan kaa. Ama i mɔ yen gii g lebd i binbem, i kul bu biɛl nnyan i.
42013004	Bii, i mali g piig yen niib banniin nba g Silowe detuadug bo baa g nyag’b, k b kpe nyan, bo biil Yendu g cie Serusalɛm yab kul i ?
42013005	N n, n maad’i l g tie nnyan kaa. Ama i mɔ yen gii g lebd i binbem, i kul bu biɛl nnyan i. »
42013006	K u pua’b makpanjam g maad: « Nil bo be g mɔg kinkanŋ u kpaab n ninŋ, g tan baal k wan pual kinkana, g yen g la.
42013007	Lann i k u maad kpaguul: “ Diid a ! Bina ŋantaa n nyan, k n tu baal k n pual kinkana, g yen g laad siɛl. Cua’ɔg, k wan daa sie g biid yiɛl fam. ”
42013008	Ama g kpaguul ŋmiɛn g maad: “ Canbaa, daa ŋaa’ɔg binn nba ne o, k n gbiil u nyagl n ninŋ g tien dulm.
42013009	L g kand u bu lon binn po. U tan gii g lon, ŋan cua’ɔg. ” »
42013010	Yiesu bo tund niib Yendu maam Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n ninŋ Saaba daal.
42013011	L sua g puo nne be l buol g sanpola ŋua’ɔg g te k u yiɛl bina piig yen ŋanniin, g nyiɛ golg g kan fid g yaad g sed baa waam nne.
42013012	G Yiesu la’ɔg, g yiin’o g maad’o: « Puo, a paag n nyan. »
42013013	G maan nui u po. L youg mɔno, k u yaad g sed, g ji dond Yendu.
42013014	Ama g Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n canbaa pal bie yen Yiesu n yaan paag nil Saaba daal, k u gaal maam g maad niib: « Daa ŋanluob n tie g nil kul ń sun tuonn. Lann, tu baal man l dana n ninŋ, k wan paag’i, k lan daa tie Saaba daal. »
42013015	G Yonmdaan ŋmiɛn’o g maad: « Munafigidanm ! I siign ninŋ ne, sua kul g lod u naab, lann i kaa u bonŋ g saa g nyunŋ’o Saaba daal ii ?
42013016	G puo ne nba tie Abraham yaabuonn, g Sitaan lol’o piig yen bina ŋanniin n ne, l bo g dagd yen ban lod’o Saaba daal ii ? »
42013017	Wan yaan maad nnyan, g fai suol u nantieb, ama g niib kul pala manŋ tuonŋana nba kul k u suun po.
42013018	G Yiesu biɛ maad: « Yendu diem naan yen bɛ i ? N bu bogn’o yen bɛ i ?
42013019	Yendu diem naan yen kpinbuolg nba k b yi mutard nyan bii i ; g nil tug g bul u gɔglug n ninŋ. K l piɛ g tan te tiig, g nuani ted b tedd u benda po. »
42013020	K u pugn g maad: « N bu bogn Yendu diem yen bɛ i ?
42013021	L tie nyan dibina nyan i, g puo tug g buun yen kpanu yom nba yab, k l kpanu yom kul tan fid fid g gbie tadd. »
42013022	Yiesu bo paa sɔnu po g saa Serusalɛm g pend g lɔ doi, g tuad dingbana, g tund niib Yendu maam.
42013023	G nil nne bual’o: « Yonmdaan, niib banŋaa nne kua n tan bu la fielu uu ? »
42013024	K u maad niib: « I nyign man g kua dimɔb nba yiɛb, k l maa n maad’i, niib bonciɛnn bu kpaan k ban kua, g yen kan fid.
42013025	Youg nba g ŋaagdaan bu fiil g luon dimɔb, l bu sua k i be cincann i. L youg, i bu kuo gann g maad: “ Yonmdaan, luod gann k t kua. ” U bu ŋmiɛn g maad’i: “ N g ban yin nyiɛ naan. ”
42013026	L youg, i bu maad: “ T daan di g nyu a nunŋ n ninŋ, k a tund Yendu maam t doi n ninŋ. ”
42013027	Wan maad’i: “ N g ban yin nyiɛ naan. Sud man n buol ne, yinm nba kul tiend bonbiil. ”
42013028	B bu lu’i cincann po i. L buol i k i baa buud g ŋman nyina youg nba k i bu la Abraham yen Isaak yen Sakɔb yen Yendu sogni‑nba kul Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ.
42013029	Niib bu nya hal puol yen nintual, yaanŋ yen yanbaɔnŋ, g kal g di jaanm Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ.
42013030	Lann, yab nba juod ninŋ, siɛb tan bu gaal liig, g yab nba be liig n ninŋ mɔ, siɛb ń guan puol. »
42013031	L youg mɔno, g Farisiɛn-nba ninŋ, yenm nagn Yiesu buol g maad’o: « Fagd ne buol ne, k l maa Erod kpaan k wan kpi’a. »
42013032	K u maad’b: « Gad man g daan maad l jun‑g‑pieb g dinne yen wonn, n bu bel sanpola g paag yiɛnm. G daa ŋantaa daal, n tuonn bu gbenn.
42013033	Lann dinne yen wonn yen wontunm, l tie k n min guan g tug n sɔnu gii saa i, k l maa l g cab g Yendu sogni ń kpe fann po, l gii g tie Serusalɛm n ninŋ i kaa.
42013034	Serusalɛm ! Yinm Serusalɛm yab, yinm nba kpi Yendu sogni‑nba, g jaag wan sun yab i buol tana, taal munŋaa i k n kpaan k n taan’i, nyan kuunaanŋ n yaan tu taan u kuubid u kpinkpana n ninŋ nand nyan, k i yie i ?
42013035	L po n te g Yendu bu nyɔl i ŋaag. N maad’i k i ji kan ban g la’n, saa yen youg nba k i tan bu maad: “ Yua baad Yonmdaan sann po u sann ń do. ” »
42014001	L bo tie Saaba daal i, g Yiesu kua Farisiɛn-nba ciɛn nne ŋaag, k wan di. G niib kul suli’ug.
42014002	L sua g jua nne be u nunŋ po, g mɔla suol’o.
42014003	G Yiesu gaal maam g maad Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen Farisiɛn-nba: « L cab k ban paag nil Saaba daal bii l g cab i ? »
42014004	K b kul ŋmin. Lann i k u suol l yiɛn nuu g paag’o, g cab’o k wan gii kun.
42014005	G bual’b: « I siign ninŋ ne, ŋmaa big i, lann i kaa ŋmaa naab n bu baa caal n ninŋ Saaba daal, k u kan nyan’o l youg mɔno o ? »
42014006	K b g fid g ŋmiɛn siɛl.
42014007	Yiesu n yaan la yab nba k b yiin’m k ban di nyan, k b pagl liig kinkaani po, k u pua makpanjam nne g maad’b:
42014008	« L gii tie k b yiin’a puobiɛnn jaanm, daa gad g kal liig kinkaanu po. L bu fid g tuu k b yiin sua, k u cie a yaa po.
42014009	Yua nba yiin’i kul nyan bu baal g maad’a: “ Fiil g ŋaa yua nba ne kinkaanu. ” L youg nyan, a bu fiil yen fai i, g gad g kal puol po.
42014010	Ama, b gii yiin’a jaanm, gad g kal puol po, g yua nba yiin’a nyan tan gii baal, wan maad’a: “ N dɔnn, fiil g gad g kal liig kinkaanu po. ” L youg nyan, l baa tie yudand i a po yab nba k b yiin’m kul nunŋ n ninŋ.
42014011	K l maa yua nba kul donŋ u kua, b bu jiin’o. G yua nba jiind u kua mɔ, b bu don’o. »
42014012	G Yiesu biɛ maad yua nba yiin’o k wan di nyan mɔ: « L gii tie k a tien jaanm yensiig n, lann i kaa daajuoug, daa yiin a dɔnn‑nba, daa yiin a ninjanm, daa yiin a naataani, g biɛ daa yiin a kunkuanyuag‑nba nba tie ŋalmandanm, k l maa b mɔ tan bu yiin’a, g ŋmiɛn’a l ŋanm.
42014013	Ama, l gii tie k a tien jaanm, yiin tali yen wabi yen diɛni yen juanm.
42014014	Nnyan, l baa tie pamann a po, k l maa b g mɔg siɛl g bu ŋmiɛn’a l ŋanm. Yendu n tan bu yied nimɔnm yaa daal, u bu ŋmiɛn’a l ŋanm. »
42014015	Yab nba di yen’o n gbad l maam, b siign ninŋ yend ń maad’o: « Yua nba bu di jied Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ, pamann tie u yal i. »
42014016	G Yiesu maad’o: « Nil nne n bo be, g tien jaanciɛɔnŋ, g yiin niib bonciɛnn.
42014017	Jediyoug n yaan pund, k u sun u naasen k wan maad wan yiin yab k ban baal. K l kul bobn g gbenn o.
42014018	L youg g sua kul mɔ’ɔg kafala. G cincinn yua maad’o k u daa kpaab. K l tie mabl i yen wan gad g diid. K l po n te k u miɛd sugl.
42014019	G munle po yua mɔ maad k u daa naakpakuoli piig, g saa g bu bign’m kpaab. K l yaa po, k u miɛl’o sugl.
42014020	G lua mɔ maad k u kuan puo mɔlane i, k lann n te k u kan fid g baal.
42014021	Naasen n yaan guan youg nba, k u dugn u canbaa l kul. K u canbaa pal bie bonciɛnn, lann i k u maad u naasen: “ Gad tonm niib n tigi naan buol yen doug n sɔni po, g guan yen tali yen wabi yen juanm yen diɛni nii. ”
42014022	G naasen tan guan g baal, g maad’o: “ Canbaa, ŋan maad yal nba, l tien g gbenn o, g yiɛl biɛ daa tenn. ”
42014023	G canbaa biɛ maad u naasen: “ Nya gii saa sɔnjala po, yen kpaand n ninŋ, g niid niid niib k ban kua, g gbie n ŋaag.
42014024	K l maa n maad’i, yab nba k n bo yiin’m kul, b ninŋ ne, baa sua kan lenm n jaanm jied. ” »
42014025	Niwulug n yaan bo yeg yen Yiesu, k u tan gbeg b po g maad’b:
42014026	« Yua nba bua wan gii ŋua’n, g g bua’n g cie u baa yen u naa yen u puo yen u bid yen u ninjanm yen u niipuob yen hal yen u miɛl mɔno i kaa, u kan fid gii tie n ŋuantua.
42014027	Yua nba g bug u dapunpɔnn, g ŋuan’n, u kan fid gii tie n ŋuantua.
42014028	I siign ninŋ ne, ŋmaa po i, u gii bua wan maa dɔunŋ, u daa kan kal g diid l ligli n baa ja nand g liɛ wan mɔg yal nba bu dagd wan fid g maa g gbenn i ?
42014029	Lann i kaa, u gii bil fiɛgl, g g fid g maa g gbenn, niib nba kul bu la bu salg’o,
42014030	g maad: “ Nil ne cil demaanu, g yen gbal l gbennu. ”
42014031	Daa bii, badlano po i, u gii bua k wan pua tɔb yen badlua, u daa kan kal g mali g liɛ u bu fid g tuog yen u niib tuda piig u lua nba togd’o, g mɔg niib tuda piinle i ?
42014032	U gii mali g sua u kan fid, u bu sun u kpaaga, k ban gad g daan la badlua ŋann k u daa be fagm, k ban manŋ yen lieb.
42014033	Lann l tie nnyan i, i mɔ yaa po. Yua nba mɔ g nyɔl wan mɔg yal nba kul, u kan fid gii tie n ŋuantua.
42014034	Yaalm tie bonmɔnn i. Ama yaalm manu gii gbenn i, b bu tug bɛ i g guan g manŋ’o i ?
42014035	L ji g tie siɛl, l kan fid g te baa dulm. B tu lu’ug cincann po i. Yua nba mɔg tuba g bu gbad, wan gbad. »
42015001	Lonpogaala yen biiddanm kul bo baad Yiesu buol g cenŋ u maam.
42015002	G Farisiɛn-nba yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda buln buln g maad: « Nil ne gaan biiddanm g kaal g di yen’m. »
42015003	Lann i k u pua’b makpanjam ne:
42015004	« I siign ninŋ ne, nil gii mɔg pei kobg g yend bod b ninŋ, u kan ŋaa pei piinwai yen banwai nba tenn muaɔg n ninŋ, g gad g kpaan yua nba bod, saa yen youg nba k u tan bu la’ɔg uu ?
42015005	U gii la’ɔg youg nba, u bu juab’o g bug’o yen pamann,
42015006	g kun ŋaag g taan u dɔnn‑nba yen u kunkuanyuag‑nba g maad’b: “ I kpanm man yen’n, k l maa n pieog nba daan bod nyan, n la’ɔg o. ”
42015007	N maad’i, l baa tie nnyan i. Youg nba g biiddanyeno kukua lebd u binbem, l tu tie pamanciɛnn i Yendu po, g cie pamann nba k u mɔg, g dugn nimɔnm piinwai yen banwai nba tenn, g ji g mɔg k ban lebd b binbem.
42015008	Daa bii puolano po n baa mɔg dibala piig, g dibayenn ń bod k u kan son fidl g tign dieog g ŋanm g kpaan bonŋann, saa yen youg nba k u tan bu la i ?
42015009	Wan bu la youg nba, u bu taan u dɔnn‑nba yen u kunkuanyuag‑nba g maad’b: “ I kpanm man yen’n, k l maa n dibal nba daan bod nyan, n guan g la o. ”
42015010	N maad’i, l baa tie nnyan i. Youg nba g biiddanyeno kukua lebd u binbem, l tu tie pamanciɛnn i malɛg‑nba buol. »
42015011	G Yiesu biɛ maad: « Nil nne n bo be g mɔg bijabi banle,
42015012	g sanbiɛn tan maad u baa: “ N baa, te’n faal nba tan baa tie n yal. ” Lann i g bibaa biid’b u mɔgm.
42015013	Daa ŋanŋaa nne n pend, g sanbiɛn taan taan wan mɔg yal nba kul, g fiil g gad doug nba fag, g daan dii u mɔgm kul yen jadm.
42015014	Wan dii g gbenn youg nba, k l tuu g kom baa l doug n ninŋ g mɔn, g jied ji pɔd’o.
42015015	K u gad l doug n niyend nne buol, k wan gaal’o k wan gii tie u tuonsunn, k l nil gaal’o k u kpaa u duoli.
42015016	U bo sun k wan gii di duoli jied, ama g sua yen bo g tien’o.
42015017	K u baa yam, g mali suoo g maad: “ N baa ŋaag n, tuonsunna be g yab, g di b yam n ninŋ k l biɛ tend, k min yen ji kpenn kom ne buol ne.
42015018	N bu fiil g kun n baa buol, g daan maad’o: ‘N baa, n biil Yendu, g biɛ biil’a mɔ.
42015019	N ji g dagd yen ŋan yiin’n k a bija. I kub’n nyan a tuonsunna n ninŋ yend nyan.’ ”
42015020	Lann i k u fiil g kun u baa buol. Wan daa bo paa fagm, k u baa la’ɔg, k u pal siɛ u po, k u san g daan wob’o.
42015021	K u big maad’o: “ N baa, n biil Yendu, g biɛ biil’a mɔ. N ji g dagd yen ŋan yiin’n k a bija. ”
42015022	Ama k u baa maad u tuonsunna: “ Kagn man, g baal yen gaalug nba mand g ŋan g lan’o, g pilm’o nuubinyinn, g biɛ pilm’o taacaad.
42015023	Suol man naatonpaanŋ nba mɔg kpam g kpi, k tin tien jaanm.
42015024	K l maa n bija ne daan kpe o, g guan g la miɛl. U daan bod i, k n guan g la’ɔg. ” L po k b ji tiend jaanm.
42015025	L sua g bijakpel be kpaab po. Wan tan kpend g nag ŋaag, g gbad gingana yen yani,
42015026	k u yiin tuonsunyeno, g bual’o l nyɔgl niimn.
42015027	K l tuonsunn maad’o k u waag n kpen, k u baa kpii naatonpaanŋ nba mɔg kpam, k l maa u la’ɔg yen laafiɛ.
42015028	L po g bijakpel pal bie, k u yie k u kan kua. K u baa nyiɛ g balm’o.
42015029	K u ŋmiɛn g maad u baa: “ Bina ŋanŋaa n nyan, k n tiend a buam, g g ban g yie a maam i ? Yen l yaa kul, a g ban g tie min baa ŋuab, k n tien jaanm yen n dɔnn‑nba.
42015030	Ama a bija nba ne, yua nba biil a mɔgm yen puocuncona n yaan tan kpen, k a kpii naatonpaanŋ nba mɔg kpam u yaa po ! ”
42015031	K u baa maad’o: “ N big, fin tund g be yen’n youg kul. K min mɔg yal nba kul tie a yal i.
42015032	L tie k t pala ń gii man k tin tien jaanm, k l maa a waag ne daan kpe o, g guan g la miɛl. U daan bod i, k t guan g la’ɔg. ” »
42016001	Yiesu biɛ bo maad u ŋuantieb: « Ŋalmandaan nne n bo be, g mɔg tuonsunn k u guu u mɔgm. K b tan sɔb g maad’o k l tuonsunn diɛ u mɔgm g yad.
42016002	K u yiin’o g bual’o: “ N gbiɛ k b maad a po g bɛ ɛ ? Baal g ŋɔn’n ŋan tu kub n bona nand k n diid. K l maa a ji kan gii nyuan n bona n ninŋ. ”
42016003	K l tuonsunn maad u kua ninŋ: “ N canbaa n yaan nyanŋ’n u tuonn n ninŋ ne, n ji bu tien nle ? Kpakonu i yaa aa, n g mɔg paalu. Miɛdug mɔ i yaa aa, l baa mɔg’n fai.
42016004	N ban min bu tien nand, k b gii bel’n tuonn, siɛb ń gaal’n b ŋai n ninŋ. ”
42016005	G yiin yab nba bo mɔg u canbaa pana kul, yend yend. G maad cincinn yua: “ A mɔg n canbaa pann yinŋaa daan ii ? ”
42016006	K l jua maad’o g kpam golnd kobg. K u maad’o: “ A pann kadaaɔg n nyan. Kal g diɛn g golnd piinmu. ”
42016007	G biɛ maad lua mɔ: “ A mɔ mɔg pann yinŋaa i ? ” K u maad g dii kpalpiɛd kobg. K u maad’o: “ A pann kadaaɔg n nyan. Diɛn g piinniin. ”
42016008	G canbaa pag l joddiil, yen wan sun ninfantuonn. Nnyan i g yab nba k b pala kɔn ŋanduna ne binbem po kukua, b mɔg ninfanm ban be nand yen b lieb g cie yab nba k b pala kɔn k ban gii mɔg Yendu yinyiem. »
42016009	G Yiesu biɛ maad: « Min maad’i faa, tug man ŋanduna ne mɔgm gii kpaan dɔnn‑nba, g daal nba k l mɔgm tan bu gbenn, Yendu ń gaal’i u ŋaag n.
42016010	Yua nba mɔn bonbid-bid n ninŋ, u mɔn yal nba yab n ninŋ mɔ. Yua nba mɔ g mɔn bonbid-bid n ninŋ, u g mɔn yal nba yab n ninŋ mɔ.
42016011	L gii tie k i g ŋanm g kub ŋanduna ne mɔgm, ŋmaa n bu guun’i polu po mɔgm i ?
42016012	L gii tie k i g ŋanm g kub yal nba g tie i yal, ŋmaa n bu te’i yal nba tie i yal i ?
42016013	Tuonsunsua kan fid gii ŋua canbaa‑nba banle. U baa bua yend maam i, u kan gii bua lua nublu. U bu tug u kua g cab yend i, gii nund lua. I kan fid gii ŋua Yendu g biɛ ŋua ligli mɔ. »
42016014	G Farisiɛn-nba gbad l maam kul, g ji laa’ɔg k l maa b bo buad ligli.
42016015	K u maad’b: « Yinm, i ŋɔnŋ i kua k i tie nimɔnm niib nunŋ n ninŋ, ama Yendu ban i pala n ninŋ yal nba be. Niib n pag’i yal nba po, l tie juali i Yendu po. »
42016016	« Moyis kadaaɔg yen Yendu sogni‑nba mɔ n bo diɛn yal nba bo be, saa yen San Nyunwultua youg. Lan cil San Nyunwultua youg, b muand Yendu bal Laabamann, g sua kul gbaa k wan tuo l bal.
42016017	Polu yen tinŋ bodu kan gii paa g cie Yendu Mɔmaam n ninŋ baa diɛnbiyenŋ gii bua lan bod.
42016018	Nil nba kul nyan u ŋaapuo, u gii guan g kuan puolua, u tien cunconm n nyan. G yua nba mɔ kuan puo nba k u sal nyan’o mɔ tien cunconm i. »
42016019	« Jua nne n bo be g tie ŋalmandaan, g liɛ tiɛŋand nba k l daaɔg paa, g tie jaanm daal kul, g di manu.
42016020	G talg nne mɔ be, k b yi’ug Lasar, g bo dua ŋalmandaan dimɔb n, k u gbannand po gbie yen nala.
42016021	U bo sun k wan gii di jeyoli-yoli nba bo baal ŋalmandaan jedibuol. Sangbanni bo baad mɔno g lagi u nala.
42016022	G talg ne tan kpe, g malɛg‑nba tug’o, g gad yen’o Abraham buol. G ŋalmandaan mɔ tan kpe, k b pii’ug.
42016023	U bo laad fala bonciɛnn tinkpiiug n ninŋ, g tan yaad ninbina g diid g la Abraham hal fagm, g Lasar be u buol.
42016024	Lann i k u tand g maad: “ N baa Abraham, jie’n ninbaaɔg. Sun Lasar k wan tuu u nuubil nyum n ninŋ, g sɔnŋ n lanm, k l maa n laad fala bonciɛnn muu ne ninŋ. ”
42016025	K Abraham maad: “ N big, tiɛd k a daan la manu youg nba k a daan mɔg miɛl, ama Lasar nuan daan la fala. Mɔlane, u ji laad u fuom ne buol ne, k fin be walu n ninŋ.
42016026	L kul kaa nyan. Buoug biɛ be g yab g paad tinm yen yinm, g yab nba bua ban nya ne g gad i buol kan fid, k i mɔ biɛ kan fid g nya l po g baal ne. ”
42016027	G ŋalmandaan maad: “ Lann, n baa, n balm’a k a sun Lasar n baa ŋaag n,
42016028	k l maa n mɔg ninjanm banmu, k wan tuod g cegl’b, k b mɔ ń tan daa baad fala ne ninŋ. ”
42016029	K Abraham maad’o: “ A ninjanm mɔg Moyis kadaaɔg yen Yendu sogni‑nba n bo diɛn yal. Ban gii cenŋ’b. ”
42016030	G ŋalmandaan maad: “ N baa Abraham, lann kua kan fid g te k ban lebd b binbem, ama l gii tie g sua nyiɛ tinkpiiug n g gad g maad’b, b bu lebd b binbem. ”
42016031	K Abraham maad’o: “ L gii tie k b g cenŋ Moyis yen Yendu sogni‑nba, baa nil gii yied kpienm siign ninŋ g guan, b kan gaal ”. »
42017001	Yiesu bo maad u ŋuantieb: « Bigna nuan bu l baal niib k ban tien biid i. Ama daan nba bu te g lieb ń tien biid nyan, fala bu gbad’o.
42017002	B bo gii tug naal nba kpai g lol g jɔn u tulu n, g lu’ug mɔgl n ninŋ, lann n bo baa su u po yen wan te bid ne ninŋ, baa yend ń tud Yendu sɔnu.
42017003	Diid man i yula po. L gii tie k a naataanu biil’a, ŋan cegl’o. U gii mɔ kua l biid po, ŋan di sugl u po.
42017004	L gii tie k u biil’a g guan g mɔ kua, g tien nnyan diyenn n ninŋ taal munlile mɔno, ŋan di sugl u po. »
42017005	G Yonmdaan Yiesu sundi maad’o: « Te k t dindann ń pugn. »
42017006	G Yonmdaan maad’b: « I dindann bo gii yab g pund baa dibinyenm, i bo bu maad tiig nba ne k wan figd ne buol, g gad g fign mɔgl n ninŋ. U bo bu cɔlm’i. »
42017007	« I ninŋ ne, ŋmaa n baa mɔg u tuonsunn k u ko tanmɔnn lann i kaa k u kpaa bonkobd, wan tan kpen youg nba, wan maad’o k wan baal tonm, g kal g di i ?
42017008	U bu maad’o k wan tien jied g te’og. K u gii tien g gbenn, wan bobn g tien’o k wan di g nyu g gbenn o, k l puol po k u mɔ ń ji fid g di g nyu.
42017009	U gii sun l kul ne, u biɛ kan tien’o balg l po.
42017010	I mɔ yaa po, l tie nnyan i. I gii sun Yendu n yed k i sun yal nba kul g daan gbenn, yin maad: “ T tie tuonsunna nba g dagd yen pinpagd. T sun tuonn nba bo tie k tin sun i. ” »
42017011	Yiesu bo saa Serusalɛm po, g tɔgn Samari yen Galile sinsiign.
42017012	Wan bua n kua doug nne ninŋ, g gbaada piig baad u buol, g tan sed fagm
42017013	g yign g maad: « Canbaa Yiesu, jie tinm ninbaaɔg. »
42017014	Yiesu n yaan la’b nnyan, k u maad’b: « Gad man g salg-yidkab ń la’i. » Ban yaan paan g saa nyan, k b paag.
42017015	B siign ninŋ yend n yaan la k u paag nyan, k u guan, g tand g dond Yendu,
42017016	g baa g gbaan Yiesu nunŋ n ninŋ, g tiend’o balg. L jua bo tie Samari yua i.
42017017	Lann i g Yiesu gaal maam g maad: « L gbaada piig kul kaa paag ii ? G banwai nba tenn nuan be lɛ ?
42017018	Sua g guan g dond Yendu, l gii g tie buolfanu yua ne kukua i kaa. »
42017019	K u maad’o: « Fiil gii saa. A paag g dugn a dug n po. »
42017020	Farisiɛn-nba bo bual’o: « Bɛ youg po i g Yendu bu kaan u bal i ? » K u ŋmiɛn g maad’b: « Yendu n bu kaan u bal youg nba g tie yal g niib bu la kaa.
42017021	B kan maad k u be ne, lann i kaa k u be ne po. K l maa Yendu bal pund i buol o. »
42017022	K u ji maad u ŋuantieb: « Youg baad k i baa niɛn k yin la Nifosaal Bija dana, baa diyenn kua, g yen kan la.
42017023	B bu maad’i k u be ne, k u be ne po. Daa saa man, daa belb man.
42017024	Nyan tanyigdu n tu nyigd g fand naan kul, lan cil puol saa yen nintual nyan, Nifosaal Bija tan baa tie nnyan i, u guanu daal.
42017025	Ama l daa tie k wan la fala bonciɛnn, g mɔlane niib ń yie’og yo.
42017026	Nyan Nowe youg lan bo tie nand nyan, l biɛ tan baa tie nnyan i Nifosaal Bija guanu youg.
42017027	Niib bo di g nyu, g kuand puob, g tien b bid jab, saa yen daal nba g Nowe tan kua u ŋadunŋ n ninŋ, g nyunciɛnm baal g biɛn yab n tenn kul.
42017028	L biɛ bo tie nnyan i Lɔt youg. Niib bo di g nyu, g daa, g kuad, g buul, g maa ŋai.
42017029	Ama daal nba g Lɔt nyiɛ Sɔdɔm doug n ninŋ, Yendu te g muu yen tindanyɔgm baa g biɛn yab tenn kul.
42017030	L tan baa tie nnyan i, daal nba g Nifosaal Bija tan bu legd.
42017031	L daal, yua nba be deliɛkaɔg po, wan daa jii k u bu tug u tiɛd nba be u dieog n ninŋ. G yua nba be kpaab n ninŋ mɔ, wan daa kpend ŋaag.
42017032	Tiɛd man yal bo baal Lɔt ŋaapuo.
42017033	Yua nba kpaan k wan fiel u miɛl, u bu buon l miɛl. Yua nba lu u miɛl, u bu fiel u miɛl.
42017034	N maad’i, l nyiɛɔg n ninŋ, niib banle baa dua dunduanyenu po, wan tug yend g ŋaa lua.
42017035	Puob banle bu taan gii naan dii, wan tug yend g ŋaa lua. [
42017036	Jab banle baa be kpaab n ninŋ, wan tug yend g ŋaa lua.] »
42017037	K u ŋuantieb gaal maam g bual’o: « Yonmdaan, l bu tien lɛ buol i ? » K u maad’b: « Bonkpienn n be naan, nanyobli mɔ tigi l buol i. »
42018001	G Yiesu biɛ pua u ŋuantieb makpanjam ne g bua ban bann k l tie k ban gii jaand youg kul i, g daa wad b pala.
42018002	U bo maad’b: « Doyenu nne ninŋ, buuddaan nne n bo be g g jie Yendu, k u baga g be yen nil.
42018003	K l doug n ninŋ, pekual nne mɔ bo be, g tund g baad g laad’o, g maad k wan kun mɔni wano yen yua nba mɔg maam ne siign ninŋ.
42018004	G buuddaan ne tund g yied. G diyenn, k u tan mali g maad: “ N l g jie Yendu, k n baga biɛ g be yen nil.
42018005	Ama pekual ne n baad g mabnd’n nand ne, n bu bu u buud, k wan ji daa baad g nyanŋ n yam. ” »
42018006	G Yonmdaan guan g maad: « I cenŋ man buuddanbiɛdo ne n yaan maad yal nba.
42018007	I mali g Yendu nuan kan kun mɔni u nigannkab po, banm nba yign u po yendu n yen nyiɛɔg uu ? U biɛ daa baa biɛnd yaam yaa aa ?
42018008	N maad’i, u bu gbaa g kun mɔni b po. Ama min Nifosaal Bija n tan bu guan, n bu l la niib nba biɛ daa l dug n po ii ? »
42018009	G Yiesu biɛ pua makpanjam nne, k l nyuan niib nba mali k b tie nimɔnm g nund lieb.
42018010	« Jab banle nne bo duo jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, g daan bu jaand. Yend bo tie Farisiɛn i g lua tie lonpogaal.
42018011	Ban yaan pund, g Farisiɛn sie g jaand u pal n ninŋ nne: “ N Yendu, n tiend’a balg yen min g tie nyan nilieb nyan. Banm tie naayiga i, nibiid, cuncona. N biɛ g tie nyan lonpogaal ne nyan.
42018012	N lolg mɔb taal munle i laad n ninŋ, k min mɔg yal kul, n tu bɔgd g bil kpega piig i, g tug kpegyenn g te’a. ”
42018013	G lonpogaal nuan sie fagm, g taan g bua wan yaad yul mɔno, ama g tiib g taag nuu g maad: “ N Yendu, diid min biiddaan yen ninbaaɔg ”. »
42018014	G Yiesu ji maad’b lann i: « N maad’i g lonpogaal ne i, g Yendu pii’ug sugl k u lebd g kun ŋaag. L g tie u lua ŋano kaa. K l maa yua nba kul donŋ u kua, b bu jiin’o. Yua nba jiind u kua mɔ, b bu don’o. »
42018015	Niib bo baal yen binyidi mɔno Yiesu buol, k wan maan nuu b po. U ŋuantieb n yaan la nnyan, k b fu yen’m.
42018016	Ama g Yiesu te k b nagn yen’m, k u maad: « Ŋaa man g bid ń baal n buol, daa biel’b man, g dugn yab nba tie nyan banm nyan, Yendu diem tie b yal i.
42018017	Yen mɔni n maad’i, yua g tuo g gaal Yendu bal nyan big nyan, u kan kua u diem n ninŋ. »
42018018	Suif‑nba yudaan nne bo bual Yiesu: « Canbaa, fin nba mɔn, n bu tien bɛ i, g tan la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn i ? »
42018019	G Yiesu maad’o: « Laabaal k a yed k n mɔn i ? Baa sua g mɔn, Yendu kua i kaa.
42018020	A yen ban Yendu mɔmaam ne: “ A kan conm, a kan kpi nil, a kan jan, a kan kun mɔnkunninkpind, cɔln a baa yen a naa. ” »
42018021	K l jua maad: « N cil g cɔln l kul ne g daa tie naasenbig i. »
42018022	Yiesu n yaan gbad nnyan, k u maad’o: « Bonyenn kua n ji pɔd’a. Kuad ŋan mɔg yal kul, g tug l ligli g biid tali. Nnyan i k a bu la mɔgm Yendu ŋaag n. A gii tien nnyan, ŋan baal gii ŋua’n. »
42018023	Wan yaan gbad l maam nnyan, k u pal biil, k l maa u bo mɔg ŋalman nba yab.
42018024	Yiesu n yaan la’ɔg nnyan, k u maad: « L paa yen ŋalmandanm ń kua Yendu diem n ninŋ.
42018025	Lan paa yuoyuoug po nand k u kan fid g kua kpalpienu bonn n nyan, ŋalmandaan gii bua n kua Yendu diem n, l baa paa u po g cie nnyan. »
42018026	G yab nba gbad l maam bual k l gii tie nnyan, g ŋmaa n bu fid g la fielu i?
42018027	K u maad’b: « Nifosaal n kan fid yal nba, Yendu nuan bu fid. »
42018028	G Piɛr maad: « Diid a, tinm n ji ŋaa tin mɔg yal nba kul g ŋua’a ne ii ? »
42018029	G Yiesu maad’b: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, nil gii yaad g ŋaa u ŋaag, u puo, u ninjanm, u danm lann i kaa u bid, k l tie Yendu diem po,
42018030	l daan bu la nyuad lan gii yab tinŋ po ne, g youg nba baad wan biɛ tan la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn. »
42018031	G Yiesu yiin u ŋuantieb piig yen banle nba nyan g maad’b: « I la ii ? T do Serusalɛm n nyan. G yal nba kul g Yendu sogni‑nba bo diɛn Nifosaal Bija po, l bu tien.
42018032	B bu tug’o g cab buolfanu yab, ban laa laa’ɔg g sugd’o, g sii mɔsand u po,
42018033	g pua’ɔg yen naapuna g kpi’ug, daa ŋantaa daal wan yied. »
42018034	Ama b bo g gbad l niimn ninŋ. L maam bo duag’b, k b g ban Yiesu n bua n maad yal.
42018035	Yiesu yen u ŋuantieb n yaan nagd Seriko doug n ninŋ, l sua g juan nne kal sɔnkunŋ g miɛd.
42018036	Wan yaan gbad g niib bonciɛnn pend k u bual lan tie yal.
42018037	K b maad’o g Nasarɛt Yiesu n pend.
42018038	K u tand g maad: « Yiesu, Dafiid Bija, jie’n ninbaaɔg. »
42018039	G yab nba bo be liig nyan, gaal jad u po, k wan suon. Ama k u ŋanm g yign yen paalu: « Dafiid Bija, jie’n ninbaaɔg. »
42018040	Lann i g Yiesu sed g te k b baal yen’o u buol. Wan yaan nagn youg nba, k u bual’o
42018041	k u bua k wan tien bɛ i u po i ? K u maad: « Yonmdaan, n bua k ŋan te k n guan g nyuand i. »
42018042	G Yiesu maad’o: « Nyuand, a paag n nyan g dugn a dug n po. »
42018043	L youg mɔno, k u nyuand, g ji ŋua Yiesu g pag Yendu. Niib kul n yaan la nnyan, k b dond Yendu.
42019001	Yiesu bo kua Seriko doug n ninŋ g pend.
42019002	L sua g nil nne be, k b yi’ug Sase. U bo tie lonpogaala ciɛn i, g biɛ tie mɔgd.
42019003	U bo kpaan k wan la Yiesu n tie yua nba, g g fid g dugn niwulug po, k l maa u bo tie nijinjenŋ i.
42019004	K u san g gaal liig, g daan duo tiig po, k wan fid g la’ɔg, k l maa u bo bu tɔgn l sɔnu i.
42019005	Yiesu n yaan tan pund l tiig buol youg nba, k u yaad g diid g maad’o: « Sase, jiid tonm. N bu can fin i dinne. »
42019006	G Sase gbaa g jiid g gaal’o yen pamann.
42019007	Niib kul n yaan la nnyan, k b buln buln g maad: « U gad g daan can biiddaan i. »
42019008	L puol po g Sase fiil g sed g maad Yonmdaan: « To, Yonmdaan, n bu te tali n mɔgm bɔgdm. L gii tie k n dii sua jod, n bu ŋmiɛn’o taal munna l po. »
42019009	G Yiesu maad: « Dinne mɔno fielu baal ŋaag ne ninŋ, k l maa nil ne mɔ tie Abraham yaabuonn i.
42019010	Yen mɔni, Nifosaal Bija baal k wan kpaan g biɛ fiel niib nba bod i. »
42019011	Niib n yaan bo cenŋ Yiesu nyan, k u biɛ pua makpanjam g pugn, k l maa u ji bo g fag yen Serusalɛm, g niib biɛ mali g Yendu bu kaan u bal l youg mɔno i.
42019012	U bo maad: « Bad bija nne bo be, g tan saa doug nba fag, k ban din’o bal k wan guan g kpen u doug n ninŋ.
42019013	Lann i k u yiin u tuonsunna piig, g tie yua kul dibala tudl, g maad’b: “ Tug man gii tie kpinkpeonŋ saa yen n guanu. ”
42019014	Ama k u doug n niib g bua’ɔg, g sun tondi u puol po, k ban daan maad, k b g bua k wan gii tie b bad.
42019015	Yen l yaa kul, k u dii bal g guan g kpen u doug n ninŋ, g yiin u tuonsunna nba k u daan tie’b ligli nyan, k wan diid yua kul n kpend g la nand.
42019016	G cincinn yua baal g maad: “ Canbaa, n la nyuad a ligli ŋann po dibala tuda piig. ”
42019017	G bad maad’o: “ N faa, a tie tuonsunmɔn i. N tie’a ŋalman waam nne k a ŋanm g kub. L yaa po, n cab’a dingbana piig, k l baa tie a diem. ”
42019018	G munle po yua baal g maad: “ Canbaa, n la nyuad a ligli ŋann po dibala tuda ŋanmu. ”
42019019	G bad maad’o: “ A mɔ, n cab’a dingbana ŋanmu, k l baa tie a diem. ”
42019020	G lua mɔ baal g maad: “ Canbaa, a ligli n nyan, k n daan gbin cabl n g wuon.
42019021	N daan jie’a, k l maa a tie nil nba biɛ i. A wo yal nba k a g den, g yend yal nba k a g bul. ”
42019022	K u canbaa maad’o: “ Tuonsunyuonn, a maam n bu guan g suol’a. A daan ban k n tie nil nba biɛ, g wo yal nba k n g den, g yend yal nba k n g bul,
42019023	bɛ n te k a daan g juab n ligli g bil ban bilg ligli naan, k n tan gii kpen yaa daal, min gad g gaal n ligli yen l nyuad i ? ”
42019024	K u maad yab nba bo be l buol: “ Fiel man u ligli, g te yua nba mɔg piig nyan. ”
42019025	K b maad’o: “ Canbaa, wano mɔg piig o waa ! ”
42019026	K u ŋmiɛn’m: “ N maad’i, yua nba mɔg kul, b bu pugn wano i. Ama yua nba g mɔg, b bu fiel baa wan mɔg yal mɔno.
42019027	K n ninnanda mɔ, yab nba daan yie k n kan gii tie b bad nyan, baal yen’m man ne buol ne, g kpi’b n nunŋ n ninŋ. ” »
42019028	Yiesu n yaan maad nnyan, k u yeg yen’m g be liig g do Serusalɛm.
42019029	Wan yaan nag dobid nne k b yi Bɛtfaase yen Betani, k l g fag yen Oliif tiidi jual, k u sun u ŋuantieb n ninŋ banle, g maad’b:
42019030	« Gad man doug nba be liig ne. I daan gii pund l doug n, i bu la g bonbig daag, g sua daa g ban g jag’o. Yin dagd’o g guan yen’o nii.
42019031	Nil daan gii bual’i g laabaal k i dagd bonbig i ? Yin maad g Yonmdaan n bua. »
42019032	K u ŋuantieb ne gad g daan la nyan wan yaan bo maad’b nand nyan.
42019033	Ban yaan bua n dagd bonbig nyan, g yab yen l bonbig bual’b: « Laabaal k i dagd bonbig ne i ? »
42019034	K b maad: « Yonmdaan n bua’ɔg. »
42019035	K b guan yen l bonbig Yiesu buol, k b land b tiɛd g maan u po, g jagn Yiesu.
42019036	Wan yaan jag l bonbig g saa nyan, g niib land b tiɛd g lad u sɔnu po.
42019037	Wan ji nagd Serusalɛm g jii Oliif tiidi jual, k u ŋuantieb kul pala man k b kpanm, g ji tand g yiin g dond Yendu, g dugn palug nba kul k b daan la nyan po,
42019038	g maad: « Yendu ń yad u yedŋanm bad nba baad Yonmdaan sann po. Laafiɛ ń gii be Yendu buol. Yendu sann ń do hal polu po. »
42019039	Farisiɛn-nba nne bo be l niwulug n ninŋ, g maad Yiesu: « Canbaa, kɔn yen a ŋuantieb ne k ban suon ! »
42019040	K u ŋmiɛn g maad: « N maad’i, banm gii suon, tana n ji baa yign. »
42019041	Youg nba g Yiesu bo nag Serusalɛm g gbenn, g la l doug, k u ji buud l doug n yab po g maad:
42019042	« L bo gii tie k i mɔ ban dinne yal nba bo bu baal yen i po laafiɛ, l bo baa ŋan ! Ama mɔlane, l kul daa duag’i nii.
42019043	Dana baad k i ninnanda bu pign’i g kaan g lind’i, g pib’i kaannaa kul,
42019044	g biɛn yinm yen i bid kul, g mud i died kul som som, k l maa i g bann youg nba g Yendu gɔnn’i. »
42019045	Lann i g Yiesu gad g kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, g ji biel kpinkpenda g maad’b:
42019046	« L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: “ N ŋaag ne baa tie jaandi ŋaag i ”, k yinm yen ji tug g tien naayiga tintaanbuol. »
42019047	Daal kul, u ji bo tund niib Yendu maam jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ i. G Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen doug n nikpela kpaan k ban biɛn’o,
42019048	ama b yen bo g ban ban bu tien nand, g dugn niib kul bo luod tuba i g cenŋ’o.
42020001	Diyenn daal, g Yiesu tund niib Yendu maam jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, g muand’b Laabamann. G salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen doug n nikpela baal, g bual’o:
42020002	« Maad’ti, a diɛ yikolann i g suun tuona nba ne i ? Lann i kaa, ŋmaa n cab’a l yikod i ? »
42020003	K u ŋmiɛn’m: « N mɔ mɔg bonyenn g bu bual’i. Maad’n man,
42020004	ŋmaa n bo cab San Nyunwultua k u wuul niib nyum i ? Yendu bii niib i ? »
42020005	K b maad maad b ŋmiɛl n k nne: « T gii yed g Yendu u, u bu bual’ti, g laabaal k t bo g tuo g gaal San maam i ?
42020006	T gii yed g niib mɔ i yaa, niib kul bu jaa’ti tana i g kpi’ti, k l maa b bo ban g San tie Yendu sogni i. »
42020007	Lann i k b ŋmiɛn, k b g ban yua cab.
42020008	G Yiesu maad’b: « N mɔ kan maad’i yua nba cab’n l yikod, k n suun l tuona. »
42020009	L puol po g Yiesu pua niib makpanjam nba ne g maad: « Jua nne n bo ŋuun dimɔunŋ tiidi, g tug l kpaab g guun tuonsunna, g fiil g gad sɔnu g daan wai.
42020010	Dimɔunŋ tiidi luana n yaan tan bie yaa youg, k u sun u naasenyend tuonsunna ŋann buol, k wan gad g gaal u tiidi luana biinu nii. Ama g tuonsunna ŋann pua’ɔg bonŋann, g bel’o g g tie’og siɛl.
42020011	K u guan g sun naasenlua, k b pua u mɔ, g sugl sugl’o, g bel’o g g tie’og siɛl.
42020012	K u biɛ guan g sun muntaa po yua, k b janm u mɔ, g bel’o.
42020013	G kpaabdaan ji maad: “ N bu tien nle ? N bu sun n bija nba k n mand g bua’ɔg u. L g kand b bu cɔlm’o. ”
42020014	Tuonsunna n yaan la’ɔg youg nba, k b joi yen lieb, g maad: “ Yua n tan bu di faal n nyan. T kpi’ug man, g yend l faal. ”
42020015	K b suol’o g fil g nyan’o kpaab n ninŋ, g kpii’ug. Kpaabdaan ji bu tien u tuonsunna ŋann nle i ?
42020016	U bu gad g biɛn tuonsunna ŋann i, g tug kpaab g guun nifanm. » L maam po, k b maad: « Yendu ń wuon lann. »
42020017	G Yiesu nyuand’b suoo g maad: « I gbiɛ Yendu lanbona nba diɛn kadaaɔg n ninŋ ne nle i ? “ Tann nba g tanmaala bo yie g lu nyan, l tann n tan guan g te dieog fiɛgl tanjal. ”
42020018	Yua nba kul baa l tann po, u bu kɔnn kɔnn i. L tann gii baa yua nba po mɔ, l bu nann’o i yom yom. »
42020019	G Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda yen salg-yidkab ciɛnm bann k l makpanjam nyuan banm i, k b ji kpaan k ban suol Yiesu l youg mɔno, g yen jie niib.
42020020	L po k b ji legd Yiesu g sun niib nne u buol, k l niib yiin b kua nimɔnm, g ji kpaan k ban la jalgi u maam n ninŋ, k ban fid g suol’o, g kubn’o Rom gobna nui n ninŋ.
42020021	K l niib bual’o: « Canbaa, t ban k a maad mamɔni g biɛ tund niib lan bual nand. A g jie sua, ama a ŋɔnŋ niib Yendu sɔnu yen mɔni.
42020022	Maad’ti, l cab k tin pa Sesaar lonpo bii, l g cab i ? »
42020023	Yiesu n yaan bann k l tie janmi maam, k u maad’b:
42020024	« Ŋɔn’n man dibal ii ! Ŋmaa ninnaɔnŋ yen ŋmaa sann n be l po i ? » K b yed g Sesaar yal i.
42020025	Lann i k u maad’b: « Te man Sesaar yal nba tie Sesaar yal, g te Yendu mɔ yal nba tie Yendu yal. »
42020026	B bo g fid g la jalgi u maam n ninŋ niib nunŋ n. K u maam yaa g lid’b, k b ji ŋmin.
42020027	Sadusien-nba, banm nba bo g tuo g kpienm tan bu yied nyan, b ninŋ siɛb bo nagn Yiesu buol g bual’o:
42020028	« Canbaa, Moyis bo diɛn yiko ne g tie’ti, k l gii tie g nil kuan puo, g kpe g g mɔg big, u ninja ń tug u pekual g mal’o bid.
42020029	To, jab banlile nne n bo be g tie ninjann, g ciɛn po kuan puo, g kpe g g mɔg big.
42020030	Munle po yua yen muntaa po yua yen yab n tenn kul tug l puo, g kpe g g mɔg big.
42020032	G puo mɔ tan yuand g kpe.
42020033	To, kpienm yiedu daal, ŋmaa n ji bu yend puo i ? K l maa banm banlile kul kuan’o g la. »
42020034	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Tin daa be ŋanduna nba ninŋ ne, jab kuand puob, g puob mɔ kun jab.
42020035	Ama yab nba g Yendu diid g sua k b dagd yen ban yied kpienm siign g kua ŋandunpaann n ninŋ nuan, jab kan kuan puob, puob mɔ kan kun jab,
42020036	k l maa b naan yen malɛg‑nba i, b ji kan fid g kpe. B tie Yendu bid, g dugn wan yied’b nyan po.
42020037	Yal nba nyuan kpienm yiedu po, Moyis mɔ bo maad lann n nyan g ŋɔn g kpienm tan bu yied. Youg nba k u bo be tuntuug nba bo so muu nyan buol, u bo yiin Yonmdaan k Abraham Yendu yen Isaak Yendu yen Sakɔb Yendu.
42020038	Yendu g tie kpienm Yendu kaa, u tie fuodb Yendu i. K l maa u yaa po b kul fo i. »
42020039	G Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda n ninŋ, yenm gaal maam g maad: « Canbaa, a maad bonŋann. »
42020040	B ji bo jie yen ban bual’o buali.
42020041	G Yiesu maad’b: « L tien nle i k b maad g Kristo tie Dafiid yaabuonn i ?
42020042	K l maa Dafiid mɔno bo diɛn g maad biɛyani kadaaɔg n ninŋ k nne: “ Yonmdaan Yendu maad n Yonmdaan: Kal n nuujendu, saa yen youg nba
42020043	k n tan bu te a ninnanda kul ń gbaan a nintual n. ”
42020044	Lann, Dafiid gii yi Kristo u Yonmdaan, l bu tien nle i, u Yonmdaan ń biɛ guan gii tie u yaabuonn i ? »
42020045	Niib kul n yaan cenŋ’o nyan, k u maad u ŋuantieb:
42020046	« Suol man i kua yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda. Banm n bua ban tu liɛ liɛdfagd gii waa, g biɛ bua k b tu gii baal naan niib n ninŋ, niib ń gii fuond’b. G bua k ban gii kaal liig kinkaani po tintaann died n ninŋ, g biɛ bua k ban gii kaal nigbenŋa kinkaani po jaanm n be naan kul.
42020047	Banm n fe pekɔa n mɔg yal kul, g tu jaand lan wai bonciɛnn g niib ń la’b. B tan bu dad b tubl hal lan gbad’b. »
42021001	Yiesu bo yaad g diid yab nba kpiend ligli jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ. B bo tie ŋalmandanm i.
42021002	K u tan la g pekɔtalg nne mɔ baal g kpien dibala ŋanle nba g mɔg fuom.
42021003	K u maad: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, pekɔtalg ne n kpien ligli nba yab g cie nil kul n kpien yal.
42021004	G dugn b kul ne kpien ligli nba kan wad b mɔgm i. Ama pekual ne nuan tond wan mɔg yal g baa di kul n nyan g baal g kpien. »
42021005	L puol po g siɛb maad jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ŋan nand. K b maa’ɔg yen tanŋana, g tug paab nba k b tie Yendu nyan g tien’o naasend k l kul ŋan paaa. G Yiesu maad’b:
42021006	« Yal nba k i nyuan ne kul, dana baad k l kul tan bu bed g duan tinŋ n sa‑la‑la-la, g baa tanyenn kan tenn gii tua liel po. »
42021007	K b bual’o: « Canbaa, bɛ youg u, k l bona kul tan bu tien i ? Bɛ n tan bu ŋɔn, k l youg pund i ? »
42021008	K u maad: « Suol man i kua g daa ŋaa baa sua ń bɔnd’i. Niib bonciɛnn tan bu baal gii kub n sann g tua k banm n tie Kristo, g youg biɛ ji g fag. Daa ŋua’b man.
42021009	I tan gii gbiɛ k b maad tɔb yen ŋmadl maam, yin daa jie. L bual k l kul ne ń tien yo, ama l youg mɔno daa kaa baa tie ŋanduna juodu. »
42021010	K u biɛ maad’b: « Buolu tu tan bu fiil g kɔn yen buollua, doug ń fiil g kɔn yen dolieog.
42021011	Tinŋ tu tan bu jeg bonciɛnn. Yiɛli yen kom ń baa buol buol. Bona nba mɔg jijei yen yaalidug bonciɛnn bu tien polu po.
42021012	Ama l kul ne n tan fid g tien, b bu suol’i, g ŋɔn’i fala, g gad yen’i g te’i Suif‑nba tintaann died n nikpela, k ban bu’i. B bu luon’i dansaldied n ninŋ, g gad yen’i batieb buol, yen dougdanm buol, g dugn n po.
42021013	Nnyan i, k i bu kun mɔni n po.
42021014	I ban man k yinm kaa daan bu mali yin bu ŋmiɛn’m yal nba g kɔn i kua po.
42021015	K l maa min mɔno n bu te’i lanbona nba k i bu maad yen yanfuom, k i ninnanda n ninŋ sua kan fid g jiin siɛl l po, lann i kaa g nai yin maad yal nba.
42021016	Baa i danm, yen i ninjanm, yen i naataani, yen i dɔnn‑nba mɔno bu te ban suol’i, g kpi yenm i siign ninŋ.
42021017	Baa sua tan kan gii bua i nublu g dugn n po.
42021018	Ama baa i yuyeonŋ kan biɛl.
42021019	I bu la miɛl g dugn i mindl po. »
42021020	« I tan gii la g yab nba pua tɔb yen’i kaan g lind Serusalɛm, yin gii ban k u mudyoug nag n nyan.
42021021	L youg, yab nba be Suude n ninŋ, ń gii siɛn g kua jɔa n ninŋ. Yab nba be Serusalɛm doug n ninŋ ń nya g fagd. Yab nba be kpaand n ninŋ ń daa kpend doug n ninŋ.
42021022	K l maa l dana n ninŋ, Yendu bu dad u buolu tubl. Nnyan i g Yendu sogni‑nba n bo diɛn yal nba ji bu tien g gbenn.
42021023	L dani n ninŋ, fala bu gbad puotinpunma yen sanpandi naa‑nba. Fala bonciɛnn bu baa l doug n ninŋ, g Yendu mutuol ń lag b po.
42021024	B bu kpi yenm yen jugi, g suol lieb g gad yen’m dofani kul n ninŋ. Buolfanu yab bu sɔnd Serusalɛm yab, saa yen b youg n yaan tan bu gbenn.
42021025	I bu la bona k l mɔg yaalidug yendu n ninŋ, yen ŋmaalg n ninŋ, yen ŋmaabid n ninŋ. Tinŋ ne po buoli kul niib yam bu ŋmad, g dugn b bu gbad g mɔgl begl.
42021026	Jiwaani bu kpi niib gbanu, b gii mali yubɔnn nba bu baal ŋanduna po. K l maa yal nba be polu po kul g mɔg paalu bu jeg.
42021027	L youg u, k b bu la Nifosaal Bija, k u be tawalgband n ninŋ g baad yen u paaciɛnu yen yudand nba yab.
42021028	I tan gii la k l bona cil g tie, yin fiil g sed, i yula ń yaad, k l maa i fielu nag. »
42021029	G Yiesu tug maninnaɔnŋ nba ne g maad’b: « Diid man kinkanŋ yen tiidi kul.
42021030	B gii bund youg nba, k i nyuan, i tu bann g kpanyil nag o.
42021031	Nnyan, i mɔ tan gii la k l kul ne tie, yin bann g Yendu bal nag o.
42021032	Yen mɔni, n maad’i, l kul ne bu tien g sua g mɔlane niib nba be ne, g siɛb daa g kpe.
42021033	Polu yen tinŋ bu pend, ama n maam nuan kan ban g pend.
42021034	I ceg man i kua po. I daa tug i yula g lol yen jied yen daam. G biɛ daa cagn i kua ŋanduna ne ninŋ binbenu po. Lann i kaa l daal bu baal g cib’i nii,
42021035	nyan janbaaɔnŋ nyan, g baan ŋanduna niib kul.
42021036	Daa guand man, gii jaand youg kul, g Yendu ń te’i paalu k i fid g nya bonbiil nba baad ne ninŋ kul, g sed Nifosaal Bija nunŋ n ninŋ. »
42021037	Yentunn n ninŋ, Yiesu bo tu be jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n i, g tund niib Yendu maam. Nyiɛɔg, wan gad Oliif tiidi jual po.
42021038	G siŋapanpan kul, niib ń tigl u buol jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, gii cenŋ’o.
42022001	Jaanm nba k b tu ŋman kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan bo nag, l jaanm i k b yi Suif‑nba fielu jaanm.
42022002	Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda bo kpaan ban bu tien nand g biɛn Yiesu g yen jie niib.
42022003	G Sitaan kuan maalm Suuda nba k b yi’ug Iskariyɔt nyan pal n ninŋ. U bo tie Yiesu ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann ninŋ yend i.
42022004	K u gad g daan la Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen jaanddeciɛɔnŋ sijeciɛnm, k b joi wan bu tien nand g suol Yiesu g te’b.
42022005	K b pala manŋ, k b maad’o k b bu te’og ligli.
42022006	K u tuo, g ji kpaan youg nba k u bu suol Yiesu g te’b g niib g be l buol.
42022007	Daal nba k b bo tu cil g ŋman kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan bo pund. L daal i k b tu kpi pebid g di Fielu jaanm.
42022008	G Yiesu sun Piɛr yen San g maad’b: « Gad man g bobn man Suif‑nba fielu jaanm jied k tin di. »
42022009	K b maad’o: « A bua k tin gad lɛ i g bobn l jaanm jied i ? »
42022010	K u maad’b: « I ban ii ? I daan gii kua doug n ninŋ, i bu tuog jua nne k u tug sual yen nyum. Yin gii ŋua’ɔg. U daan gii kua ŋaag nba ninŋ,
42022011	yin maad ŋaagdaan: “ Canbaa n sun’ti k t bual’a k a ŋɔn’ti dieog nba ninŋ k u bu di Fielu jaanm yen u ŋuantieb. ”
42022012	U bu ŋɔn’i deciɛɔnŋ nne k l be detuadug po, g bona kul be l n ninŋ. L deciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ i, k i bu bobn Fielu jaanm. »
42022013	K b gad g la nyan wan bo maad nand nyan, g bobn Fielu jaanm.
42022014	L youg n yaan pund, k u kal yen u sundi g bu di
42022015	g maad’b: « N bo mand g niɛn k n taan g di yen’i Fielu jaanm ne yo, g fid g la fala.
42022016	K l maa, n maad’i: N ji kan ban g di l jaanm saa yen youg nba k l jaanm tan bu guan g tien Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ. »
42022017	Lann i k u juab dimɔunŋ, g tien Yendu balg, g maad: « Gaal man ne g bɔgd i lieb g nyu.
42022018	K l maa n maad’i, n ji kan ban g nyu dimɔunŋ ne, saa yen youg nba g Yendu tan bu kaan u bal g gbenn. »
42022019	K u biɛ juab kpanu, g tien Yendu balg, g jend jend g tie’b g maad: « Ne tie n gbannand i k n tug g yid salg i po. I tie man nnyan, gii tiɛd n po. »
42022020	Ban yaan dii g gbenn youg nba, k u tug dimɔunŋ yen ŋmanŋ g biɛ tien nnyan g maad: « Dimɔunŋ ne tie Yendu yen u niib dɔnnpaanu sɔm i, sɔm nba k n wul i po.
42022021	Ama i ban man, g yua nba kuad’n taan g kal g di yen’n.
42022022	Mɔni, Nifosaal Bija ji tɔgn sɔnu nyan Yendu n bo cab nand nyan i. Ama fala bu gbad yua nba kuad’o. »
42022023	K b ji cil g bual b ŋmiɛl n ninŋ k b siign ninŋ ne, ŋmaa n bu fid g tien nnyan i ?
42022024	Mɔniɛɔg bo tien Yiesu ŋuantieb siign ninŋ, k ban liɛ ŋmaa n tie ciɛn i ?
42022025	G Yiesu maad’b: « Dougdanm kub b niib yen paalu. G yab nba mɔg yikod bua k ban gii yi’b bulcindanm.
42022026	I yaa po, l kan gii tie nnyan kaa. Ama yua nba tie ciɛn i siign ninŋ, wan tien u kua nyan big nyan, g yua nba yen yul ń gii tie yua nba suun lieb po.
42022027	I ban g ŋmaa n tie ciɛn i ? Yua nba kal g di bii, yua nba nyanŋ jied i ? L g tie yua nba kal g di kaa aa ? Ama min tie nyan yua nba nyanŋ jied nyan i, i siign ninŋ ne.
42022028	Yinm n tie danm nba bo juun g be yen’n youg nba kul k b bo ŋɔnŋ’n fala.
42022029	L po n te k n din’i bal, nyan n Baa n din’n bal nand nyan,
42022030	k yin tan gii di g biɛ nyu yen’n n diem n ninŋ, g biɛ gii kal badkogi po g bu Israyɛl cuga piig yen ŋanle. »
42022031	G Yiesu maad Piɛr: « Simɔn Simɔn, a gii ban g Sitaan bual Yendu g bu lenn’i nyan ban tu lenn dii nand nyan.
42022032	Ama n miɛl Yendu a po, k a daa buon a dindann, k a tan gii guan g ŋuan’n yaa youg nba, ŋan paan a ninjanm pala. »
42022033	G Piɛr maad’o: « Yonmdaan, n tuo k l gii tie baa dansalg min yen fin n bu taan g kua, lann i kaa l gii tie kuum tin taan g kpe. »
42022034	Ama g Yiesu maad: « Piɛr, n maad’a, dinne mɔno, a bu nai taal muntaa k a g ban’n g sua g kolg daa g mɔ. »
42022035	K u biɛ maad’b: « Min daan sun’i youg nba, k i g diɛ ligli, g g kub kɔl, g g diɛ taacaad, siɛl daan pɔd’i nii ? » K b ŋmiɛn: « Baa siɛl daan g pɔd’ti. »
42022036	K u maad’b: « Mɔlane nuan, yua nba ji mɔg ligli, wan juab. Yua nba mɔg kɔl, u mɔ ń juab. G yua nba g mɔg jug, wan tug u liɛdl g kuad g daa.
42022037	K l maa n maad’i, yal nba bo diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ n po, l tie k lan tien i. L bo diɛn k nne: “ B taan’o yen nibiid. ” Mɔni, ban bo diɛn yal n po, ji bu tien i. »
42022038	K b maad’o: « Diid a, Yonmdaan, jugi nle n nyan. » K u maad’b: « Ŋaa man. »
42022039	Lann i g Yiesu nyiɛ l buol g gad Oliif tiidi jual po, nyan wan bo tu tie nand nyan, k u ŋuantieb mɔ ciɛn’o.
42022040	Wan pund l buol, k u maad’b: « I jaand man, g daa baa bignn n ninŋ. »
42022041	G piɛd nyan taabana ŋanŋaa nne, g gbaan g jaand g maad:
