43013005	Lann i g tug nyum g kuol tadug n ninŋ, g ji tu ŋuul ŋuul u ŋuantieb titala g tug cabl nba k u bo lol u siɛg n ninŋ nyan g fiɛl fiɛl.
43013006	K u tan pund Simɔn Piɛr buol k u bual’o: « Yonmdaan, fin mɔno n bu ŋuul n titala aa ? »
43013007	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o g maad: « A daa g ban min tie yal nba ne niimn ninŋ, ama l gii yann waam, a bu gbad l niimn ninŋ. »
43013008	G Piɛr yie g maad: « Kai, Yonmdaan, a kan ŋuul min yaa titala. » G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « A gii yie k n kan ŋuul a titala, lann a ji g mɔg siɛl n buol. »
43013009	G Simɔn Piɛr maad: « Yonmdaan, l gii tie nnyan nuan ŋan daa ŋuul n titala kukua kaa, ŋuul n nui yen n yul kul. »
43013010	G Yiesu maad: « L g bual g yua nba wul ń biɛ guan g wul g led, l gii g tie k wan ŋuul u titala i kaa. K l maa wano ji g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd. Yinm nuan ji g mɔg jɔgnd. Ama i kul biɛ kaa. »
43013011	U bo ban yua nba bu kuad’o. Lann n te k u bo maad k b kul kaa g mɔg jɔgnd.
43013012	Wan yaan ŋuul b titala g gbenn, k u guan g tug u tiɛd g liɛ g guan u kinkaanu n ninŋ, g bual u ŋuantieb: « I ban min tien yal nba i po ne niimn ninŋ ii ?
43013013	I yi’n k i Canbaa yen i Yonmdaan. I mɔg mɔni k yin gii yi’n nnyan, g dugn n kon l tie wano i.
43013014	K min nba tie i Yonmdaan yen i Canbaa gii ŋuul i titala i, l g dagd yen k i mɔ ń ŋuul i lieb titala ii ?
43013015	N tien nnyan k yin la n buol g mɔ ń gii tie i lieb min tien’i yal nba i.
43013016	Yen mɔni n maad’i, tuonsunn g cie u canbaa, yua nba k b sun’o mɔ g cie yua n sun’o.
43013017	Yal nba k i ji ban ne, i gii tug g sun yenn tuonn, i bu sua k i be pamann n ninŋ i.
43013018	N g maad i kul kaa, n ban min lugd yab nba. L yen bual g Yendu Kadaaɔg n bo maad yal nba ne ń tien i. L bo diɛn g maad: “ Yua nba daan taan g di yen’n, wano n biɛ guan g lind n puol. ”
43013019	N tuod g maad’i k l bonn daa g tien ne, k l tan gii tien yaa youg nba yin gii dug n po, k min n l be.
43013020	Yen mɔni n maad’i, daan nba gaal min sun yua nba, u gaal min i. Daan nba gaal’n mɔ, u gaal yua nba sun’n i. »
43013021	Yiesu n maad nnyan k u yam kul ŋmad k u maad: « Yen mɔni n maad’i, i ninŋ ne yend bu kuad’n. »
43013022	K u ŋuantieb yaad g diid diid lieb, b yen g fid g bann wan maad yua nba.
43013023	L sua k u ŋuantieb n ninŋ yend, yua nba k wano Yiesu bo bua’ɔg nyan kpaag g kuul’o.
43013024	G Simɔn Piɛr gognd yul g ŋɔn’o k wan bual Yiesu g liɛ u maad ŋmaa i ?
43013025	K l ŋuantua nagn Yiesu g bual’o: « Yonmdaan, a maad ŋmaa i ? »
43013026	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « N gii ŋuu kpanu jenn g tie yua nba, ŋan gii ban k wano n nyan. » Lann i g ŋuu kpanu jenn g tie Suuda, Simɔn Iskariyɔt bija.
43013027	Suuda n l gaal kpanu jenn yaa youg, g Sitaan kua u ninŋ. G Yiesu maad’o: « Tien tonm g sun ŋan bu sun yal nba. »
43013028	Banm nba bo be l buol kul, sua g bann yal nba po te k u maad’o nnyan.
43013029	Suuda n bo diɛ b ligli kɔl nyan, g siɛb mali g Yiesu baa maad’o k wan gad g daa ban bu tug yal nba g di jaanm i, lann i kaa k wan te tali siɛl i.
43013030	G Suuda gaal u kpanu jenn g fiil l youg mɔno g nyiɛ. L sua k l bɔnn o.
43013031	Suuda n nyiɛ yaa youg g Yiesu maad: « Mɔlane po Nifosaal Bija gaal yudand, g biɛ te g Yendu mɔ gaal yudand.
43013032	Yendu gii gaal yudand g dugn u Bija po, wano Yendu mɔ bu ŋɔn u yudand u Bija n ninŋ. L ji kan wai yen lan tien.
43013033	N bid, n ji kan gii be yen’i lan wai. I bu kpaan’n. N ji maad i mɔ min daan maad Suif‑nba yudanm yal nba i: Min saa naan buol nyan, i kan fid g gad l buol.
43013034	Mɔmapaanm n nyan k n tien’i: I bua man i lieb. I bua man i lieb nyan min buad’i nand nyan.
43013035	I gii bua i lieb i, g niib kul bu bann k i tie n ŋuantieb. »
43013036	G Simɔn Piɛr bual Yiesu: « Yonmdaan, a saa lɛ i ? » G Yiesu ŋmiɛn: « Min saa naan buol, a daa kan fid g ŋuan’n mɔlane. Ama a tan bu ŋuan’n siɛnyoug. »
43013037	G Piɛr bual’o: « Yonmdaan, bɛ po i k n kan fid g ŋuan’a mɔlane i ? L gii bual k n kpe a po mɔlane mɔno, min be i. »
43013038	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « A bu kpe n po i ? Yen mɔni n maad’a, dinne a bu nai taal muntaa k a g ban’n g kolg daa g mɔ. »
43014001	G Yiesu maad: « Daa ŋmad man i yam kaa. I dug man Yendu po, g biɛ gii dug n po mɔ.
43014002	N Baa ŋaag n died be bonciɛnn. L bo gii g tie mɔni, n bo kan maad’i k n bu gad g daan cegn yiɛl i po.
43014003	N gii gad g cegn yiɛl i po, n bu guan g tug’i k yin mɔ ń daan gii be min baa be naan buol.
43014004	I yen ban sɔnu nba saa min saa naan buol. »
43014005	G Toma maad: « Yonmdaan, t g ban ŋan saa naan buol mɔno, t ji bu tien nle i gii ban l sɔnu i ? »
43014006	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Min n tie sɔnu, min n tie mamɔni, min n tie miɛl. Sua kan fid g gad n Baa buol g g maan nuu n po.
43014007	I bo gii ban’n, i ban n Baa mɔ n nyan. Lan cil dinne gii saa, i ban’o g biɛ la’ɔg. »
43014008	G Filiip maad’o: « Yonmdaan, ŋɔn’ti a Baa. Lann kukua bu dagd’ti. »
43014009	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Filiip, min be yen’i k l wai nand ne, k a tan g ban’n ii ? Yua nba la’n, u la n Baa n nyan. Laabaal k a biɛ tua k n ŋɔn’i n Baa i ?
43014010	A g tuo g gaal yen mɔni k n be n Baa n ninŋ, k n Baa mɔ be n ninŋ ii ? Lanbona nba k n maad’i ne g tie n yul po maam kaa. N Baa nba be n ninŋ n suun u tuona.
43014011	Tuo man g gaal yen mɔni k n be n Baa n ninŋ k n Baa mɔ be n ninŋ. L gii g tie nnyan mɔno yin yen tuo g dugn l tuona po.
43014012	Yen mɔni n maad’i, yua nba dug n po, u bu fid g sun tuona nba k n suun ne kul. U bu fid g sun yal cie nnyan mɔno, g dugn n saa n Baa buol i.
43014013	Yal nba k i bu miɛl n sann po kul, n bu tien, g niib ń fid g la Yendu Bija n ninŋ, Yendu yudand.
43014014	I gii miɛl’n yal nba kul n sann po, n bu tien.
43014015	I gii bua’n, i baa kub n mɔmaam.
43014016	N bu miɛl n Baa wan te’i todkɔlua nba baa be yen’i youg kul.
43014017	Wano n tie Foŋanm, yua nba ŋɔnŋ mamɔni. Ŋanduna niib kan fid g gaal’o, g dugn b kan fid g la’ɔg, b biɛ kan fid g bann’o. Yinm nuan yen bu bann’o, g dugn u baa be yen’i, g biɛ be i ninŋ.
43014018	N kan ŋaa’i yin gii be i kukua nyan kpiebi nyan, n bu guan i buol.
43014019	L gii pugn waam, ŋanduna ne niib ji kan la’n. Ama yinm nuan bu la’n, g dugn min baa fo nyan, i mɔ baa fo.
43014020	L daal, i bu bann k n be n Baa n ninŋ, k i be n ninŋ, k n mɔ be i ninŋ.
43014021	Yua nba tuo g gaal n mɔmaam g cɔln, wano n bua’n. N Baa baa bua yua nba bua’n, k n mɔ bua l daan. N bu legd g ŋɔn’o min tie yua nba. »
43014022	Lann i g Suuda bual’o (l g tie Suuda Iskariyɔt kaa): « Bɛ po i k a bu legd g ŋɔn a kua, tinm ń la’a, k a yen ji kan ŋɔn a kua ŋanduna yab i ? »
43014023	G Yiesu guan g ŋmiɛn’o: « Yua nba bua’n, u baa kub n maam. N Baa baa bua’ɔg. Min yen n Baa bu baal u buol gii be yen’o.
43014024	Yua nba g bua’n, u kan kub n maam. Min maad’i yal nba ne g tie n yul po maam kaa. N Baa nba sun’n yal i.
43014025	N maad’i l kul ne g daa be yen’i.
43014026	Foŋanm nba tie i Todkua, k n Baa bu sun’o n sann po nyan n tan bu ŋɔn’i bonn kul niimn ninŋ, g tiɛd’i min daan maad’i yal nba kul.
43014027	N bu cab’i yin gii be laafiɛ. N laafiɛ i k n tien’i. Min yen g tien’i nyan ŋanduna yab n tien nand nyan kaa. Daa ŋmad man i yam, daa jie man siɛl.
43014028	N tua i gbad k n maad’i mii n saa n nyan g yen bu guan i buol aa ? L bo gii tie k i bua’n, min maad k n saa n Baa buol nyan, i bo baa kpanm i, g dugn n Baa yab g cie’n.
43014029	N tuod g maad’i mɔlane k l bona daa g tien, k l tan gii tien yin tuo g gaal yen mɔni i.
43014030	N ji kan maad yen’i bonciɛnn, g dugn Sitaan baad, wano nba tie ŋanduna ne bad. N ban k u g mɔg paalu n po,
43014031	ama l bual g ŋanduna kul ń bann k n bua n Baa, k n suun n Baa n yed k n sun yal nba i. Fiil man k t yaad ne buol. »
43015001	Yiesu bo maad: « Min n tie dimɔunŋ tiig yen mɔni, k n Baa tie dimɔunŋ tiidi kpadaan.
43015002	Bendl nba be n po, g g luon luana, u tu cua’ɔg u. Yua nba luon mɔ, wan gbad gbad’o, lan ŋanm g lon g pugn.
43015003	Yinm nuan, min muand’i laabaal nba tuod g ŋanm i pala o.
43015004	I be man yen’n, k n mɔ baa be yen’i. Tibendl gii g be tinyagl po, u kan fid g lon luana. I mɔ gii g be yen’n, i mɔ kan fid g lon luana.
43015005	Min n tie dimɔunŋ tiig, k i tie benda. Yua nba be yen’n k n mɔ be yen’o, l daan bu lon luana bonciɛnn, g dugn i gii paad i kua, i kan fid g tien baa siɛl.
43015006	Yua nba g be yen’n, b bu lu’ug cincann i, nyan dikuounŋ nyan. B tu gann l dikuond i g kuun muu n ninŋ lan di g buod.
43015007	I gii be yen’n, k n maam mɔ be i ninŋ, yin bua yal nba kul yin miɛl, i bu la.
43015008	I gii luon luana bonciɛnn, g ŋɔnŋ k i tie n ŋuantieb, lann n baad yen yudand n Baa po.
43015009	N bua’i nyan n Baa n buad’n nand nyan i. I be man n buam n ninŋ.
43015010	I gii kub n mɔmaam, i baa be n buam n ninŋ i, nyan min yaan kub n Baa mɔmaam g be u buam n ninŋ nyan.
43015011	N maad’i l kul ne k yin gii mɔg pamann nba k n mɔg i, k i pala ń l manŋ canyiin.
43015012	N mɔmaam n ne: I bua man i lieb nyan min bua’i nand nyan.
43015013	Buam g be g cie g nil ń lu u miɛl g dugn u dɔnn‑nba po.
43015014	I tie n dɔnn‑nba i, l gii tie k i suun min yed k i sun yal nba.
43015015	N ji kan gii yi’i n tuonsunna, g dugn tuonsunn g ban u canbaa n suun yal nba. N ji baa yi’i n dɔnn‑nba i, k l maa n ŋɔn’i min banŋ yal nba kul n Baa buol o.
43015016	Yinm kaa lugd’n. Min n lugd’i g sun’i k yin gad g lon luana nba bu wai. Nnyan, i gii miɛl n Baa yal nba kul n sann po, u bu te’i.
43015017	Min n maad’i yal nba n ne: I bua man i lieb.
43015018	Ŋanduna niib gii g bua i nublu, yin gii ban k b bo kpiɛ g g bua n yaa nublu i.
43015019	I bo gii tie ŋanduna yab, ŋanduna niib pala bo baa man i po g dugn banm n yen’i. I yen g tie ŋanduna yab. Min yaan lugd’i, g nyan’i ŋanduna n ninŋ po n te k b g bua i nublu.
43015020	I tiɛn man min maad’i yal nba: “ Tuonsunn g cie u canbaa. ” B gii ŋɔn’n fala yin gii ban k b bu ŋɔn i mɔ fala. B gii gaal n maam, b bu gaal i mɔ yaa maam.
43015021	B bu tien’i l kul ne n yaa sann po i, g dugn b g ban yua nba sun’n.
43015022	L bo gii tie k n g baal, g biɛ g maad yen’m, sua bo kan jalg’b k b tien biid. Mɔlane po, b ji kan fid g nya b biid n ninŋ.
43015023	Yua nba g bua n nublu, u g bua n Baa mɔ.
43015024	N bo gii g baal b siign, g tien bona nba g sua g ban g tien, sua bo kan jalg’b k b tien biid. Ama b la l kul ne yo, g biɛ l g bua min yen n Baa kul nublu.
43015025	L bona tie nnyan, g yal nba bo diɛn b Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n ninŋ ń te mɔni i. L kon bo diɛn: “ B l yie k b g bua n nublu finfam i. ”
43015026	Yaa youg nba k n tan bu sun i Todkua Foŋanm nba tie mamɔnmaad, wan nya n Baa buol g baal nyan u bu kun mɔni n po.
43015027	I mɔ biɛ bu kun mɔni n po, g dugn yinm n tu l be yen’n hal cilg youg.
43016001	N maad’i l kul ne, k yin tan daa buon i dindann i.
43016002	B tan bu nyan’i Suif‑nba tintaann died n ninŋ. Youg baad mɔno g yab nba bu kpi’i baa mali k b suun Yendu tuonn i.
43016003	B bu sun l tuona k l maa b g bann n Baa, b biɛ g bann n mɔ.
43016004	Ama n tuod g maad’i mɔlane, k l youg tan gii pund k b suun l tuona, yin tiɛd k n daan maad’i no. N bo g maad’i cilg youg k l maa n daa bo be yen’i.
43016005	Mɔlane n ji gɔ g leb yua nba bo sun’n po n nyan, k i ninŋ baa sua g bual’n min saa naan ii ?
43016006	Bɛ n tien k n maad’i l bona k i ji kal yen pabɔnn i ?
43016007	N yen maad’i mɔni i. N gii gad, lann n baa su i po. K l maa n gii g gad, i Todkua kan baal i buol. N gii gad nuan, n bu sun’o i buol.
43016008	U gii baal u bu ŋɔn ŋanduna niib k b kpiɛd sɔnu yal tie biid po yen mɔnkund po yen Yendu buud po.
43016009	B kpiɛd sɔnu yal tie biid po g dugn b g dug n po.
43016010	Yal tie mɔnkund po mɔ b biɛ kpiɛd sɔnu, g dugn n saa n Baa buol, k i ji kan la’n.
43016011	B biɛ kpiɛd sɔnu yal tie Yendu buud po mɔ, g dugn u jiɛl ŋanduna ne bad buud o.
43016012	N biɛ mɔg maam bonciɛnn g bu maad’i, i yen daa kan fid g tug l tugl mɔlane.
43016013	Foŋanm nba tie mamɔnmaad tan gii baal, u bu ŋɔn’i mamɔni kul. U kan gii maad’i u yul po maam kaa, u baa maad’i wan gbad yal nba i. U bu maad’i yal nba bu tien kul.
43016014	U bu don n sann, k l maa u bu tug min mɔg yal nba i g ŋɔn’i.
43016015	N Baa n mɔg yal nba kul tie n yal i, l po n te k n maad g Foŋanm bu tug min mɔg yal nba i g ŋɔn’i.
43016016	L gii yann waam, i ji kan la’n. Ama l gii pugn waam yin biɛ guan g la’n. »
43016017	K u ŋuantieb n ninŋ yenm ji maad b ŋmiɛl n g tua: « U bua n maad bɛ i g tua k l gii yann waam t ji kan la’ɔg, ama l gii pugn waam tin biɛ guan g la’ɔg u ? K wan maad yal nba k u saa u Baa buol nyan niimn ii ?
43016018	Waam niimn ii ? T g ban wan bua n maad yal nba. »
43016019	G Yiesu bann k b bua n bual’o buali, lann i g maad: « N maad’i mii l gii yann waam, i ji kan la’n. Ama l gii pugn waam yin biɛ guan g la’n. L maam po i k i bual bual i lieb ii ?
43016020	Yen mɔni n maad’i, i tan baa buud g fabn g ŋanduna niib be pamann n ninŋ i. I tan baa kal yen pabɔnn, ama l pabɔnn bu lebd gii tie pamann i po.
43016021	Puo gii bua n mal yaa youg, u tu be yanbani n ninŋ i, g dugn u fala youg pund n nyan. Ama u gii mal g gbenn, u ji tu g tiɛn u fala po. U ji tu be pamann n ninŋ i, k l maa u baal yen nifuog ŋanduna n ninŋ.
43016022	L tie nnyan i, i mɔ yaa po. Mɔlane, i daa kal yen pabɔnn i, ama n tan bu guan g la’i, i pala ń manŋ bonciɛnn. Sua kan fid g nyan l pamann i ninŋ.
43016023	L daal gii pund, i ji kan bual’n baa siɛl po. Yen mɔni n maad’i, i gii miɛl n Baa yal nba kul n sann po, u bu te’i.
43016024	Tin be yen dinne, i daa g ban g miɛl siɛl n sann po. I miɛd man, i baa laad, k i pala ń gii man lan bual nand.
43016025	N tu pua’i makpanjam i g maad’i l kul ne. Ama youg baad k n tan kan gii pua makpanjam kaa g maad yen’i. N tan bu maad’i n Baa po g kan dɔgn’i baa siɛl.
43016026	L daal gii pund i bu miɛl’o n sann po i, n g yed k min kaa bu miɛl n Baa i po.
43016027	K l maa n Baa mɔno yen bua’i. U bua’i g dugn i bua’n, g biɛ tuo g gaal k n nyiɛ Yendu buol.
43016028	N kon nyiɛ n Baa buol i g baal ŋanduna n ninŋ ne. Mɔlane n ji bua n nya ŋanduna n ninŋ g guan g lebd n Baa po. »
43016029	K u ŋuantieb maad: « Mɔlane a ji maad g dɔgd, g g pua makpanjam.
43016030	T ji bann k a ban bonn kul, k a g guu k ban daa bual’a buali kaa. L po n te k t gaal yen mɔni k a nyiɛ Yendu buol. »
43016031	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « Mɔlane nuan i ji tuo g gaal aa ?
43016032	Youg baad, l youg taan pund o, k i kul bu yad g kun g ŋaa’n n kukua. G nyaan n yen g be n kukua kaa, n Baa be yen’n.
43016033	N maad’i l kul ne k i gii be yen’n i yam ń gii dua i. I bu la fala ŋanduna ne ninŋ. Ama yin mɔnd g paan i pala k l maa min paad ŋanduna o. »
43017001	Yiesu n maad nnyan g gbenn, k u yaad g nyuan polu po g maad: « N Baa, youg pund o, ji te a Bija yudand, k a Bija mɔ ń ŋɔn niib a yudand.
43017002	K l maa a tie’og yikod nifosaal kul po, k wan fid g te niib nba k a kubn u nuu n ninŋ kul, miɛl nba g mɔg gbennu.
43017003	Miɛl nba g mɔg gbennu tie k ban bann fin i, fin kukua nba tie Yendu yen mɔni, g bann Yiesu, Kristo nba k a sun’o.
43017004	Tuonn nba k a bo tie’n nyan, n sun g gbenn o, n ŋɔn niib a yudand n nyan tinŋ po ne.
43017005	Lann mɔlane po, n Baa, ji te’n yudand a buol, yudand nba k n bo mɔg a buol g sua g ŋanduna daa g be nyan.
43017006	N ŋɔn niib ŋan tie yua nba, niib nba k a nyan’m ŋanduna n ninŋ g tie’n nyan. B bo tie a yab i k a tug’b g tie’n, k b tuo g cenŋ a maam.
43017007	Mɔlane b ji ban k ŋan tie’n yal nba kul nyiɛ a buol i.
43017008	G dugn n maad’b ŋan maad’n maam nba i, k b mɔ tuo g gaal, g bann g yen mɔni k n nyiɛ a buol i, g tuo k fin n sun’n.
43017009	N jaand b po i. N g jaand ŋanduna niib po kaa, n jaand ŋan tie’n yab nba po i, g dugn b tie a yab i.
43017010	Yal nba tie n yal kul tie a yal i. Yal nba tie a yal mɔ tie n yal i. B po n te k n sann duo.
43017011	Min ji kan gii be ŋanduna n ninŋ. Ama banm nuan daa baa be ŋanduna n ninŋ i. Min ji baad a buol i. N Baa papiendaan, ŋanm gii diɛ’b a sann paalu po, sann nba k a tie’n, k ban fid g taan gii tie niyend, nyan min yen fin n taan g tie yend nyan.
43017012	Min daan tu be yen’m, n daan guu’b a sann paalu po i, sann nba k a tie’n. N daan guul’b k b ninŋ baa yend g biɛl ; l gii g tie yua nba bo tuod g nyiɛ biɛfanm k lan ŋɔn g Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni tie mɔni i kaa.
43017013	Mɔlane po, n ji baad a buol i. N daa be ŋanduna n ninŋ ne i, g maad nnyan k min mɔg pamann nba ń gii be b ninŋ, pamann nba g mɔg po.
43017014	Min yaan tie’b a maam nyan i, g ŋanduna niib ji g bua b nublu, g dugn b g tie ŋanduna n yab kaa ; nyan min mɔ n yaan g tie ŋanduna yua nyan.
43017015	N g miɛd’a k a nyan’m ŋanduna n ninŋ kaa, n miɛd’a k a guul’b g Bonbiildaan ń daa nand’b i.
43017016	B g tie ŋanduna yab, nyan min mɔ n g tie ŋanduna yua nyan.
43017017	Te g mamɔni ń te k ban gii tie fin kukua yab, g dugn a maam n tie mamɔni.
43017018	Nyan ŋan bo sun’n ŋanduna n ninŋ nand nyan, n mɔ suun’m ŋanduna n ninŋ nnyan i.
43017019	B po i k n tugd n munn kul g cabd k n sun a tuonn, k ban mɔ ń tug b munn kul g cab’a yen mɔni.
43017020	N g jaand g miɛd’a b po kua kaa, n miɛd’a yen yab nba tan baa dug n po g dugn ban bu muand’b maam nba po.
43017021	N jaand k b kul ń taan gii tie niyend i, nyan fin, n Baa ŋan be n ninŋ k n mɔ be a ninŋ nyan, ban mɔ ń taan gii be t ninŋ g ŋanduna niib ń tuo g gaal k fin n sun’n.
43017022	N tie’b yudand nba k a tie’n, k ban fid gii tie niyend nyan tin tie yend nyan,
43017023	k min gii be b ninŋ k a mɔ be n ninŋ k ban taan gii tie bonyenn yen mɔni, g ŋanduna niib ń bann k fin n sun’n, k a bua’b nyan ŋan bua’n nand nyan.
43017024	N Baa, n bua g yab nba k a tug’b g tie’n, ń mɔ ń gii be yen’n min baa be naan buol, gii nyuan yudand nba k a tie’n, g dugn a bo bua’n g sua g ŋanduna daa g tag.
43017025	N Baa mɔnkundaan, ŋanduna niib g ban’a, min nuan yen ban’a, k b ne mɔ biɛ ban k fin n sun’n.
43017026	N te k b bann’a. N biɛ bu te ban gii band’a g pugd, k ŋan bua’n yaa buam nba ń gii be b ninŋ, k n mɔ ń gii be b ninŋ. »
43018001	Yiesu n maad nnyan g gbenn, k u nyiɛ l buol k wano yen u ŋuantieb puod Sedrɔn bɔnkɔdg. L sua g gɔglug nne be l buol. K b gad g kua l n ninŋ.
43018002	Suuda, yua nba bo bu kuad Yiesu nyan bo ban l gɔglug buol, g dugn Yiesu bo tund g saa l buol yen u ŋuantieb i.
43018003	Lann i k wano Suuda baal g kua l gɔglug n ninŋ g yeg yen Rom sijenm yen jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n sijenm nba g salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Farisiɛn-nba bo sun’m, k b diɛ naamaani yen fida yen jakɔntiɛd.
43018004	Yiesu bo tuod g ban yal nba bu baal’o kul, lann i k u fiil g tuog’b g bual’b: « I kpaan ŋmaa i ? »
43018005	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « T kpaan Nasarɛt Yiesu i. » G Yiesu maad: « Min n nyan. » L sua g Suuda, yua bo bu kuad Yiesu nyan be b siign.
43018006	Yiesu n maad yaa youg k « min n nyan », k b lebd puotuntuna g baa baa.
43018007	G Yiesu biɛ guan g bual’b: « I kpaan ŋmaa i ? » K b yed g Nasarɛt Yiesu.
43018008	G Yiesu maad’b: « N g maad’i mii min n nyan ii ? L gii tie k min i k i kpaan, yin ŋaa g lieb ne ń gii saa. »
43018009	Nnyan i k wano Yiesu n bo maad yal nba ji tien yen mɔni. U kon bo maad: « N Baa, ŋan daan guun’n yab nba, n g ŋaa g baa yend biɛl. »
43018010	L sua g Simɔn Piɛr ŋuu jug. K u nɔd l jug g cua g jiɛl salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tuonsunn nuujendu tubl. B bo yi l tuonsunn Malkus i.
43018011	G Yiesu maad Piɛr: « Guan g ŋuun a jug u tuaɔg n ninŋ. A mali k n kan nyu n Baa n tie’n fala nyunŋmanŋ nba k n nyu yaa aa ? »
43018012	L youg g Rom sijenm yen b canbaa, yen Suif‑nba mɔ yaa sijenm suol Yiesu g lol’o.
43018013	B bo cind g gad yen’o Ann ŋaag i. Ann bo tie Kaayif diɛnm i. Kaayif n bo tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn l binn.
43018014	Wano n bo maad Suif‑nba yudanm g niyend gii gaal b buolu po g kpe lann n su.
43018015	Simɔn Piɛr yen Yiesu ŋuantelua nne bo ŋua Yiesu. Salg-yidkab kul ciɛn bo ban l ŋuantua. L po n te k u bo ŋuan Yiesu g baal g kua salg-yidkab kul ciɛn lijɔug n ninŋ.
43018016	G Piɛr nuan sed cincann, dimɔb buol. G Yiesu ŋuantelua nba g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn bo ban’o nyan nyiɛ g pag yen puo nba bo guu dimɔb nyan g kuan Piɛr.
43018017	G puo nba bo guu dimɔb nyan bual Piɛr: « A tien tu g tie jua ne ŋuantua kaa aa ? » G Piɛr ŋmiɛn’o g yed: « Kai, min g tie u ŋuantua. »
43018018	Wad n bo be nyan, g tuonsunna yen sijenm son muu g yie. G Piɛr mɔ sie b buol g yie muu.
43018019	G salg-yidkab kul ciɛn bual Yiesu buali u ŋuantieb yen u tundl po.
43018020	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Min tu l maad niib nunŋ n i, g yua kul gbiɛ. N tu tund n tundl mɔ tintaann died n yen jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n i, naan buol g Suif‑nba kul taand lieb. N g ban g maad siɛl wuol n ninŋ.
43018021	Laabaal k a bual’n l buali i ? Bual yab nba daan cenŋ n maam, banm ban min daan maad yal nba. »
43018022	Yiesu n maad nnyan yaa youg, l sua g sije nne sie u buol, k l sije peb’o tanpaɔg g nyaan bual’o: « Ŋan baa ŋmiɛnd Yendu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nand n nyan ii ? »
43018023	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « L gii tie k n maad g kpiɛd, ŋan ŋɔn min kpiɛd naan buol nba. Min maad yal nba gii tie mɔni, bɛ po i k a yen ji pua’n i ? »
43018024	K Ann yed k ban gad yen’o salg-yidkab kul ciɛn Kaayif buol. U bo l luol i.
43018025	Simɔn Piɛr daa bo l be l buol g yie muu i, k b tan baal g bual’o: « A g tie jua ne ŋuantua kaa aa ? » G Piɛr nai g maad: « Kai, min g tie u ŋuantua ».
43018026	L sua g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tuonsunna n ninŋ jua nne be l buol, u bo tie Piɛr n bo cua g jiɛl yua nba tubl nyan naataanu i. K l jua bual Piɛr: « N bo g la’a gɔglug n ninŋ k a be yen’o oo ? »
43018027	G Piɛr biɛ nai. L youg u g kuutounŋ buud.
43018028	K l fann siŋapanpan g Suif‑nba yudanm nyiɛ yen Yiesu Kaayif ŋaag g gad yen’o Rom gobna ŋaag. Ama yab nba bo gad yen’o bo g tuo g kua, g dugn b bo g bua k b mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ, nnyan i k b bo bu fid g di Fielu jaanm.
43018029	L po n te g Pilat bo nyiɛ g tuog’b cincann g bual’b: « Jua ne biil bɛ i k i baal yen’o i ? »
43018030	K b guan g ŋmiɛn’o: « U bo gii g tie nibiiug, t bo kan suol’o g baal g te’a. »
43018031	Lann i g Pilat maad’b: « Yinm mɔno n tug’o g daan bu’ug, nyan i yiko n bual nand nyan. » K b guan g ŋmiɛn’o: « T g mɔg nuu yen tin kpi nil ».
43018032	L bona bo tien nnyan, g Yiesu n bo maad maam nba g ŋɔn kubuolu nba k u bu kpe nyan, ń te mɔni i.
43018033	G Pilat guan g kua ŋaag n ninŋ g te g sijenm kua yen Yiesu k u bual’o: « A tie Suif‑nba bad yaa aa ? »
43018034	G Yiesu mɔ guan g bual’o: « Fin mɔno pal n maam i k a maad bii, siɛb n maad n po k a gbad i ? »
43018035	G Pilat ŋmiɛn’o: « N mɔ tie Suif yaa aa ? A doug n yab, mandg salg-yidkab ciɛnm n tug’a g baal g tie’n. A biil bɛ i ? »
43018036	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « N bal g tie ŋanduna ne yal kaa. L bo gii tie ŋanduna ne yal, n naasenm bo bu kɔn n po, b bo kan ŋaa ban suol’n g te Suif‑nba yudanm. N bal yen g tie ŋanduna ne yal. »
43018037	G Pilat biɛ guan g bual’o: « Lann a tie bad yaa aa ? » G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « Fin n maad k n tie bad. B mal’n, k n baal ŋanduna n ninŋ ne, k n ŋɔn niib mamɔni i. Yua nba tie mamɔni nil kul cenŋ n maam. »
43018038	G Pilat guan g bual’o: « Mamɔni tie bɛ i ? » Lann i g biɛ guan g nyiɛ cincann g la Suif‑nba yudanm g maad’b: « Min g la jua ne n biil yal nba.
43018039	Ama n ban g siɛl be g ji tie nyan bogdl nyan i po. Fielu jaanm kul n tu luod dansalyenŋ g ŋaa’ɔg. I bua k n luod i po Suif‑nba bad ii ? »
43018040	Lann i k b ji ta g maad: « T g bua wano kaa, t bua Barabas i. » Wano Barabas bo tie bibiɛdg i.
43019001	L youg u g Pilat te k b tug Yiesu g pua’ɔg gbana.
43019002	G Rom sijenm tug kunkoni g lug feglg g yilm’o. G tug gaalmɔunŋ g lan’o.
43019003	G ji tu nagn u buol g maad: « T fuond’a naa, Suif‑nba bad ! » G nyaan peb’o tanpaɔg.
43019004	G Pilat biɛ guan g nyiɛ cincann g maad yab bo be l buol: « I la ii ? N bu nyan’o cincann, i buol ne, k yin bann k min g la wan biil yal nba. »
43019005	Lann i k b nyan Yiesu k u yil kunkoni feglg, g liɛ gaalmɔunŋ. G Pilat maad’b: « Diid man, nil ne ! »
43019006	Salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen b sijenm n la’ɔg yaa youg k b ji ta g maad: « Kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po, kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po. » G Pilat maad’b: « Tug’o man g daan kpaa’ɔg i kua, g dugn min g la wan biil yal nba. »
43019007	G Suif‑nba yudanm guan g ŋmiɛn’o: « Tinm mɔg yiko nne, k l yiko ŋɔn k u kon l dagd yen ban kpi’ug, k l maa u maad k u tie Yendu Bija. »
43019008	Pilat n gbad l maam, g jiwaani kua’ɔg bonciɛnn.
43019009	K u guan g kua ŋaag n ninŋ g bual Yiesu, k u nyiɛ lɛ i ? Yiesu g jiin’o baa siɛl.
43019010	Lann i g Pilat maad’o: « A ŋmin yen min yaa aa ? A g ban k n mɔg yikod g bu fid g te k ban luod’a, g biɛ mɔg yikod g bu fid g te k ban kpaa’a dapunpɔnn po ii ? »
43019011	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « A bo kan fid g te ban tien’n baa siɛl, l bo gii g tie g Yendu tie’a nuu. L po n te g yua nba suol’n g tie’a nyan yaa biid ŋanm g yabd. »
43019012	L youg u g Pilat ji cil g kpaan wan bu tien nand g luod Yiesu g ŋaa’ɔg. Ama g Suif‑nba yudanm ŋanm g tand g maad: « A gii luod jua ne g ŋaa’ɔg, lann a g taa Sesaar po. Yua nba yiin u kua bad kul, l daan tie Sesaar ninnand i. »
43019013	Pilat n gbad nnyan, k u nyan Yiesu cincann, g kal buud kog po, naan buol nba k b kpaa yen tana. B bo yi l binbindl i Gabata, Ebro‑nba maam n ninŋ.
43019014	L bo tie daal nba k b tu bobn Saaba i, k l Saaba daal tuu yen Fielu jaanm dana, yensiig po, g Pilat maad Suif‑nba: « I bad n nyan ! »
43019015	K b tand g ŋmiɛn’o: « Kpi’ug, kpi’ug, kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po. » G Pilat bual’b: « N kpaa i bad dapunpɔnn po ii ? » G salg-yidkab ciɛnm ŋmiɛn’o: « Tinm g mɔg badfano, Sesaar kua i kaa. »
43019016	G Pilat cab mɔb k ban kpaa Yiesu dapunpɔnn po. K b tug Yiesu g gad yen’o.
43019017	Yiesu mɔno n bo bug u dapunpɔnn hal k b daan nyiɛ doug n ninŋ, g gad naan buol nba k b yi Yukpabug buol, k Ebro‑nba maam n ninŋ k b yi Gɔlgota.
43019018	L buol i k b kpaa Yiesu dapunpɔnn po. G kpaa niib banle nne mɔ g kpiɛn’o, g yend be u nuujendu po, g lua be u nuuganŋ po, k u be sinsiign ninŋ.
43019019	G Pilat te k b diɛn diɛni nne g tabn dapunpɔnn po. L diɛni n bo maad yal nba n ne: « Nasarɛt Yiesu, Suif‑nba bad ».
43019020	Suif‑nba bonciɛnn bo lii l diɛni k l maa ban bo kpaa Yiesu naan buol bo g fag yen doug n ninŋ, k b biɛ bo diɛn l diɛni Ebro‑nba maam n ninŋ yen Rom yab maam n ninŋ yen Grɛk‑nba maam n ninŋ.
43019021	Lann i g Suif‑nba salg-yidkab ciɛnm gad g maad Pilat: « A bo kan diɛn k u ne tie “ Suif‑nba bad ” kaa, a bo bu diɛn g “ jua ne maad k wano n tie Suif‑nba bad ”. »
43019022	G Pilat ŋmiɛn’m: « Min n diɛn yal nba, lann n nyan. »
43019023	Rom sijenm n kpaa Yiesu g gbenn, k b tug u tiɛd g bɔgd kpega ŋanna g yua kul gaal kpegyenn. K l ji tenn gaalug. Lann bo tie cabmunn i, l bo g mɔg nyalm baa siɛl buol.
43019024	G Rom sijenm maad b ŋmiɛl n ninŋ: « T kan pad gaalug ne kaa, t bu tɔ tiɛ tiɛ i g bann yua nba bu yend’o. L bo tien nnyan g Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni ne ń tien yen mɔni i: “ B biid n tiɛd, g tɔ tiɛ tiɛ g tug n gaalug. ” » Rom sijenm bo sun l tuonn n nyan.
43019025	L sua g Yiesu naa sie g kpiɛ ban bo kpaa Yiesu dapunpɔnn nba po. Wano yen u niipuo yen Kleyopas ŋaapuo Mari yen Magdala Mari n bo sie.
43019026	Yiesu n yaan la u naa, k u ŋuantua nba k u bo bua’ɔg nyan sie u buol, k u maad u naa: « Diid, a bija n nyan. »
43019027	Lann i g maad u ŋuantua mɔ: « Diid, a naa n nyan. » L daal i k l ŋuantua ji kun yen’o k u be u ŋaapo.
43019028	L puol po, Yiesu n ji bo ban g bonn kul tien g gbenn nyan, k u maad: « Nyunnyuglu mɔg’n. » L bo tien nnyan g yal nba bo diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ kul ń tien g juod i.
43019029	L sua g sual sie l buol g gbie yen dimiigl. K b tug ciesuobu g nyua l dimiigl n ninŋ, g tuun daaɔg po g gad yen u mɔb po.
43019030	Yiesu n l nyuu yaa youg k u maad: « Bona kul ji tien g gbenn. » Lann i g tibn, g ji jiin.
43019031	L bo tie ban tu bobn Saaba yaa daal nba i. Suif‑nba yudanm bo g bua k ban kpaa niib nba ń gii juan dapunpɔna po Saaba daal, g dugn l Saaba daal bo tie digbenŋl i b po. Lann i k b gad g miɛl Pilat k wan cab g Rom sijenm ń kɔnn kɔnn ban kpaa niib nba nyan titala k ban kpe tonm, k ban nyan’m dapunpɔna po.
43019032	G sijenm baal ban bo kpaa yab nba g kpiɛn Yiesu nyan buol, g kɔnn yend titala, g guan g kɔnn lua titala.
43019033	B pund Yiesu buol g sua k u kpe u. L po n te k b ji bo g kɔnn u yaa titala.
43019034	Yen l kul g sijenm ninŋ yend tug kpann g cɔg u logl n ninŋ g sɔm yen nyum nyiɛ l youg.
43019035	Yua nba maad l bona kul ne la yen u ninbinn i. Wan maad yal nba tie mɔni i. U ban k u maad mɔni k i mɔ ń tuo g gaal i.
43019036	L bo tien nnyan g Yendu maam ne ń tien yen mɔni i: « Baa u kpabyenn kan mud. »
43019037	L biɛ diɛn liel buol g maad: « B ninbina tan baa maa yua nba k b cɔg g lond’o po i. »
43019038	L bona po n pend, k Arimati jua nne k b yi’ug Sosɛf gad g miɛl Pilat k wan cab’o k wan tug Yiesu gbannand. U mɔ bo tie Yiesu ŋuantua i g yen wuod, g dugn u bo jie Suif‑nba yudanm. G Pilat cab’o k u gad g tug Yiesu gbannand.
43019039	G Nikodɛm, jua nba bo gad diyenn nyiɛɔg g la Yiesu nyan baal yen tilaali cilo piintaa. B bo tien l tilaali yen tiidi nne siim i, k b yi l tiidi miir yen alowɛs.
43019040	Banm jab banle n bo tug Yiesu gbannand g pɔbn caba n ninŋ, g tien tilaali nyan Suif‑nba n bo tu tien nand g pii b kuum nyan.
43019041	Ban bo kpaa Yiesu naan buol nba nyan, gɔglug nne bo be l buol, g kakupaann nne be l n ninŋ, k b daa g ban g pii sua l kakul n ninŋ.
43019042	Lan bo tie Suif‑nba Saaba bobnu daal, k l kakul biɛ kɔb yen l buol nyan, k b gad g duan Yiesu l n ninŋ.
43020001	Laad daal siŋapanpan Magdala Mari bo gad kakul po g sua k l daa bɔn. U baal g sua g kakutann biid g dua siɛl po.
43020002	K u san g gad g la Simɔn Piɛr yen Yiesu ŋuantelua nba g Yiesu bo bua u maam nyan, g maad’b: « B nyan t Yonmdaan kakul n ninŋ, t yen g ban ban bil’o naan buol nba. »
43020003	G Piɛr yen ŋuantelua ŋano nyiɛ g saa kakul po.
43020004	B kul bo siɛn i, g lua ŋano yen san g liid Piɛr g kpiɛ g pund kakul po,
43020005	g dɔnn g la g caba dua, ama u yen g kua.
43020006	G Simɔn Piɛr yuand g pund, g kua kakul n ninŋ g diid g sua g caba dua.
43020007	Ama cabl nba k b bo tug g fun Yiesu yul nuan bo g be yen cablaa kaa, l bo piɛd g dua l kua i.
43020008	Lann i g ŋuantelua nba bo kpiɛ g pund kakul buol nyan mɔ ji kua, g la g ji tuo g gaal yen mɔni.
43020009	B daa bo g gbad Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni niimn. Diɛni bo maad k l tie talad i k wan yied kpienm siign ninŋ.
43020010	G Yiesu ŋuantieb lebd g kun ŋaag.
43020011	Mari nuan bo l sie kakul buol i g buud. Wan bo buud nyan, k u tan dɔnn k wan diid kakul n ninŋ.
43020012	U sua g malɛg‑nba banle liɛ tiɛpiend g kal ban daan duan Yiesu naan buol nyan. G yend kal yul kpagn buol, g lua kal titala bil buol.
43020013	G malɛg‑nba bual’o: « Puo ne, bɛ po i k a buud i ? » K u ŋmiɛn’m: « B nyan n Yonmdaan k n g ban ban bil’o naan buol. »
43020014	Wan maad nnyan k u gbeg g sua g Yiesu sie, ama u bo g bann k wano i.
43020015	G Yiesu bual’o: « Puo ne, bɛ po i k a buud i ? A kpaan ŋmaa i ? » Mari bo mali g yua nba guu gɔglug u, lann i g maad’o: « Canbaa, l gii tie k fin n tug’o, ŋan maad’n ŋan bil’o naan buol k n bu gad g daan juab’o. »
43020016	G Yiesu yiin’o: « Mari. » K u gbeg g maad Ebro‑nba maam n ninŋ: « Rabuni. » L niimn tie g Canbaa.
43020017	G Yiesu maad’o: « Daa so’n, k l maa n daa g duo n Baa po. Gad g daan la n ninjanm g maad’b k n do n Baa po n nyan, yua nba tie i mɔ yaa Baa ; k n do n Yendu po, yua nba tie i mɔ yaa Yendu. »
43020018	Lann i g Magdala Mari gad g la Yiesu ŋuantieb g maad’b k u la Yonmdaan. G dugn’m Yiesu n maad’o yal nba.
43020019	L laad daal daajuoug Yiesu ŋuantieb bo be ŋaag nne ninŋ, g luon g kpal gana g dugn b bo jie Suif‑nba yudanm. B tan sua g Yiesu sie b siign ninŋ, g maad: « Laafiɛ ń gii be yen’i. »
43020020	Wan maad nnyan yaa youg, k u ŋɔn’m u nui yen u logl. K u ŋuantieb pala manŋ bonciɛnn yen ban la Yonmdaan.
43020021	G Yiesu biɛ guan g maad: « Laafiɛ ń gii be yen’i. N Baa n sun’n nand nyan, n mɔ suun’i nnyan i. »
43020022	Wan maad nnyan, k u pieb faam b po g maad: « Gaal man Foŋanm.
43020023	I gii dii sugl yab nba biid po, b biid piin n nyan, i gii g dii sugl yab nba biid po mɔ, b yaa biid baa l be i. »
43020024	Yiesu n bo baal yaa youg, l bo sua k u ŋuantieb piig yen banle ŋann n ninŋ Toma g be. B bo yi wano Toma i Didiim.
43020025	U ŋuantelieb n bo maad’o k b la Yonmdaan. G Toma guan g ŋmiɛn’m g maad: « Min gii g la penbona u nui n ninŋ, g g suun n nuubil l penbona n ninŋ, g biɛ g suun n nuu yiɛɔg nba be u logl n nyan ninŋ, n kan ban g gaal k l tie mɔni. »
43020026	L daa ŋanniin po, g Yiesu ŋuantieb yaan be ŋaag n ninŋ, l sua g Toma be yen’m l daal. K b yaan luon g kpal gana kul. B tan sua g Yiesu sie b siign ninŋ, g maad: « Laafiɛ ń gii be yen’i. »
43020027	Lann i g maad Toma: « Nagn g suun a nuubil ne, diid n nui, nagn a nuu g suun n logl n ninŋ. Daa mali munle-le, tuo g gaal yen mɔni. »
43020028	G Toma ŋmiɛn’o: « N Yonmdaan, n Yendu. »
43020029	G Yiesu maad’o: « Ŋan la’n nyan po n te k a ji tuo g gaal yen mɔni waa ! Yab nba tuo g gaal g yen g la, pamann tie b yal i. »
43020030	Yiesu biɛ sun yaalidug tuona bonciɛnn k u ŋuantieb la, k l yen g diɛn kadaaɔg ne ninŋ.
43020031	Ama yal nba be kadaaɔg ne ninŋ diɛn k lan tod’i, yin tuo g gaal yen mɔni g Yiesu tie Kristo, Yendu Bija. I gii gaal yen mɔni, i bu la miɛl g dugn u sann po.
43021001	L bo tien nyan dana ŋanŋaa nne i, g Yiesu biɛ legd g ŋɔn u kua u ŋuantieb Tiberiad mɔgl kunŋ. Wan bo ŋɔn u kua nand n ne:
43021002	Simɔn Piɛr yen Toma, yua k b bo yi’ug Didiim nyan, yen Natanayɛl, yua nba bo nyiɛ Kaana, Galile doug n ninŋ, yen Sebede bid yen Yiesu ŋuantieb banle nne n bo taan g be.
43021003	G Simɔn Piɛr tan maad: « N bu gad jansuolu. » K u lieb maad’o: « T mɔ bu gad, tinm yen fin n bu yeg. » K b nyiɛ g kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ. Ama l nyiɛɔg b g suol baa siɛl.
43021004	Lan tan fani yaa youg, g Yiesu baal g sie bɔngbann, ama k u ŋuantieb yen g bann k wano i.
43021005	G Yiesu bual’b: « Ŋaajab, i g la jani yaa aa ? » K b ŋmiɛn’o g yed: « Ɛɛn, t g la siɛl. »
43021006	K u guan g maad’b: « Lu man i janbaaɔnŋ ŋadunŋ jendu po, i bu la jani. » K b lu janbaaɔnŋ g baan jani g ji gbaa k ban dad g nyan nyum n ninŋ g gbal, g dugn b bo suol jani bonciɛnn.
43021007	G Yiesu n bo bua u ŋuantua nba nyan maad Piɛr: « Yonmdaan i. » L sua g Piɛr bo land u liɛdl g bil. Wan gbad g Yonmdaan yaa youg, k u tug u liɛdl g liɛ, g yug g baa mɔgl n ninŋ.
43021008	G Yiesu ŋuantelieb ŋann guan yen ŋadunŋ bɔngbann g diɛl janbaaɔnŋ k l gbie yen jani. L bo sua k ban be naan buol yen bɔngbann g fag. L bo tie nyan taabana kobg nne i.
43021009	Ban duo bɔngbann yaa youg, k b la g kuana so g jani maa l po, g kpanu mɔ be.
43021010	G Yiesu maad’b: « Bɔgd man jani nba k i daa l suol mɔlane nii. »
43021011	G Simɔn Piɛr guan g kua ŋadunŋ n ninŋ g dad janbaaɔnŋ g don yen jangbenŋa kobg yen piinmu yen jani ntaa. L jani n bo l yab nand kul, g nyaan janbaaɔnŋ bo g pad.
43021012	G Yiesu maad: « Baal man g ŋman. » U ŋuantieb n ninŋ sua g tuo g bual’o wan tie yua nba. G dugn b bo ban g Yonmdaan i.
43021013	G Yiesu baal g tug kpanu g tie’b, g biɛ tie’b jani mɔ.
43021014	Yiesu n yied kpienm siign ninŋ, u ji bo ŋɔn u kua u ŋuantieb g guan taal muntaa po n nyan.
43021015	Ban dii g gbenn, g Yiesu bual Simɔn Piɛr: « San bija Simɔn, a bua’n g cie yab nba ne ii ? » G Simɔn ŋmiɛn’o: « Ɛɛn, Yonmdaan, fin mɔno ban k n bua’a bonciɛnn. » G Yiesu maad’o: « Ŋanm gii kub n pebid. »
43021016	G Yiesu biɛ guan g bual’o munle po: « San bija Simɔn, a bua’n ii ? » G Simɔn ŋmiɛn’o: « Ɛɛn, Yonmdaan, fin mɔno ban k n bua’a bonciɛnn. » G Yiesu maad’o: « I kpaa n pei. »
43021017	K u biɛ guan g bual’o taal muntaa po: « San bija Simɔn, a bua’n bonciɛnn ii ? » G Piɛr yam ŋmad g dugn Yiesu n bual’o taal muntaa po g yed: « A bua’n bonciɛnn ii ? » Lann i g Piɛr ŋmiɛn’o: « Yonmdaan, fin n ban bonn kul, a yen ban k n bua’a bonciɛnn. » G Yiesu maad’o: « Ŋanm gii kub n pei.
43021018	Yen mɔni n maad’a, ŋan bo tie naasen, fin mɔno n bo tu bob g gbenn, g lol a gbann gii saa ŋan bua naan buol kul. Ama a tan gii ciɛnd, a bu tand nui i, nifan ń bobn’a g lol a gbann g gad yen’a naan buol nba k a bo g bua k a gad. »
43021019	Yiesu bo maad nnyan g ŋɔnŋ Piɛr n tan bu kpe yaa kubuolu nba g don Yendu sann i. L puol po g Yiesu maad’o: « I ŋua’n. »
43021020	Piɛr bo gbeg g la Yiesu n bo bua u ŋuantua nba nyan, k u ŋua’b. L ŋuantua n bo kal g kpiɛ Yiesu yaa youg nba k b bo di nyan. Wano n bo nagn g bual’o g « Yonmdaan, ŋmaa n bu kuad’a nii ? »
43021021	Piɛr n la’ɔg nnyan, k u bual Yiesu: « Yonmdaan, k u ne i, bɛ n bu baal’o i ? »
43021022	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’o: « L gii tie n buam n ninŋ k wan gii be saa yen n guanu i, l la’a lɛ i ? Fin ń gii ŋua’n. »
43021023	L laabaal n bo yad Yiesu ŋuantieb siign ninŋ k b ji tua k l yaa ŋuantua kan kpe. Yiesu yen bo g maad Piɛr k l ŋuantua kan kpe kaa. U bo maad’o g yed g: « L gii tie n buam n ninŋ k wan gii be saa yen n guanu i, l la’a lɛ i ? »
43021024	L ŋuantua n kun mɔni bona ne kul po, wano n biɛ diɛn l kul. T ban k wan maad yal nba kul tie mamɔni.
43021025	Bona bonciɛnn biɛ be g Yiesu bo tien. B bo gii bu diɛn l kul yenn yenn, n mali k b bo kan la yiɛl ŋanduna n ninŋ g bil kadaad nba k b bo bu diɛn kul.
44001001	Tewofiil, n kadacincinn n ninŋ n bo diɛn g ŋɔn Yiesu n cil g suun yal nba kul g biɛ tund niib nand
44001002	saa yen daal nba g Yendu don’o polu po. U bo tie u sundi nba k u bo lugd’b nyan, u mɔbonn Foŋanm paalu po yo, g fid g duo.
44001003	U fala yen u kuum puol po, u bo yied g ŋɔn u kua u sundi taal munŋaa kul. G tien bona bonciɛnn g ŋɔn’m k u mɔg miɛl yen mɔni. U bo tien daa piinna i k u sundi laad’o k u maad’b Yendu bal po.
44001004	G diyenn k u tan di yen u sundi g maad’b: « Daa fagd man yen Serusalɛm. I guu man min daan maad’i k n Baa puon’i yal nba.
44001005	San nuan bo wuul niib yen nyum i, ama yinm nuan, daa ŋanle b bu wul’i yen Foŋanm i. »
44001006	G Yiesu sundi nba bo taan u buol nyan bual’o: « Yonmdaan, mɔlane i k a bu kaan Israyɛl bal ii ? »
44001007	G Yiesu ŋmiɛn’m: « L g tie k yinm kaa ń bann youg nba lann i kaa dana nba k n Baa sen yen u yikod.
44001008	Ama Foŋanm bu jiid i po g te’i paalu. L youg, i bu kun mɔni n po Serusalɛm doug n yen Suude doug n kul, g tuad Samari g ji daan tuu yen ŋanduna munn kul. »
44001009	Yiesu n maad l kul g gbenn, k b la k u do polu po. G tawalgbaɔnŋ nne baal g legn’o k b ji g nyuan’o.
44001010	Yiesu n do k b daa sie g nyuan polu po, b sua niib banle nne sie b buol g liɛ tiɛpiend
44001011	g maad’b: « Galile niib, laabaal k i sie g nyuan polu po i ? Yendu n nyan Yiesu i siign g don’o nand k i la ne, u biɛ tan bu guan nnyan i. »
44001012	Yiesu sundi bo nyiɛ Oliif tiidi jual po g lebd Serusalɛm doug n. L jual bo g ŋanm g fag yen Serusalɛm. L bo tie nyan taabana tudl nyan i.
44001013	Ban pund doug n, k b duo detuadug po ban bo tu paa g be naan. Yab bo be n ne: Piɛr yen San yen Saak yen Andre yen Filiip yen Toma yen Bartelemi yen Matieog yen Alfe bija Saak, yen Simɔn, yua bo kɔn u doug po, yen Saak bija Suud.
44001014	Banm yen puob yen Yiesu ninjanm yen u naa Mari bo taan g mɔg maalyenm i, g jaand daal kul.
44001015	G diyenn, g yab dug Yiesu po taan lieb g g luol niib kobg yen piinle. G Piɛr fiil g maad’b:
44001016	« N ninjanm, l bo tie g Foŋanm n maad yal Yendu Kadaaɔg n, ń l tien i. U bo te g Dafiid liid g maad maam k l nyuan Suuda. Wano Suuda n tan ciɛn niib k b suol Yiesu.
44001017	U daan tie t yegnu i, k b tie u mɔ tuonn nba k t kul suun ne.
44001018	Wan daan kuad Yiesu g gaal ligli nba, u daan tug l ligli i g daa kpaab. L buol i k u daan baa finfabug, g puol pud g nuad yad.
44001019	Serusalɛm niib kul daan gbad l maam. G ji pul l kpaab b maam n ninŋ k Akɛldama: l niimn tie sɔm kpaab.
44001020	L yen diɛn Biɛyani kadaaɔg n ninŋ g maad: “ G sua ń daa kua u ŋaag n, l ŋaag ń te digbeonŋ. ” G biɛ maad: “ G sua ń gaal u tuonn. ”
44001021	Lan cil youg nba g San wul Yonmdaan Yiesu nyum saa yen daal nba g Yendu nyan’o t siign ninŋ, niib daan be g ŋua tinm yen wano Yiesu youg kul. Mɔlane, l tie k tin gann b siign ninŋ niyend i, k u mɔ ń gii kun mɔni g Yonmdaan Yiesu yied. »
44001023	Lann i k b sen niib banle: lan tie Matias yen Sosɛf, yua k b bo yi’ug Barsabas k u sanliel tie Sustus.
44001024	K b kul tien jaandi g maad: « Yonmdaan, fin nba nyuan yua kul pal n, ŋɔn’ti banm banle ne siign ŋan gann yua
44001025	Suuda yiɛl n k wan te a sundu, yiɛl nba k wano Suuda ŋaa g ji be naan dagd yen’o ne. »
44001026	Lann i k b tɔ tiɛ tiɛ g gann Matias, k u ji pugn Yiesu sundi piig yen yend ŋann po.
44002001	Jaanm nba k b yi Pantekuot nyan daal bo pund g sua g yab dug Yiesu po kul taan lieb yenn buol i.
44002002	B tan gbad g fuug nne nyiɛ polu nyan faaciɛnu nyan g baal g begl ŋaag nba ninŋ k b bo kal.
44002003	K b la g siɛl nne tie nyan lani nyan g naan muukpaana g paad paad, g maan nil kul po.
44002004	L youg k b kul gbie yen Foŋanm g ji maad mabuoli. Nil kul bo maad mabuolu nba g Foŋanm bo cab’o k wan maad i.
44002005	L bo sua g Suif‑nba nba ŋua Yendu yen b pal kul nyiɛ doi kul g baal g be Serusalɛm.
44002006	Ban gbad nyɔgl, k b tigl g g mɔg dindin. K l lid’b bonciɛnn yen nil kul n gbiɛ k b maad u maam n.
44002007	L bo yaa g lid’b bonciɛnn k b pala manŋ k b ji maad: « Niib nba maad ne kul g tie Galile yab kaa aa ?
44002008	K l tien nle i k t ninŋ ne, g yua kul gbiɛ k b maad u maam n i ?
44002009	T ninŋ ne, niib be g nyiɛ Part g lieb nyiɛ Medi g lieb nyiɛ Elam. Mesopotami yab be, g Suude yab be, g Kapadɔs yab be, g Pɔn yab be, k Asi yab be.
44002010	G lieb mɔ nyiɛ Frisi g lieb nyiɛ Panfili g lieb nyiɛ Esipt g lieb nyiɛ Libi dingbann nba k b yi Siirɛnn. Lieb be g nyiɛ Rom:
44002011	siɛb tie Suif‑nba g lieb tie buolfanu yab nba kua Suif‑nba jaandi. G lieb be g tie Krɛt yab g lieb mɔ tie Arabi yab. Yen l kul ne, t kul gbiɛ k b maad t maam n, Yendu n sun tuonŋana nba kul. »
44002012	L bo yaa g lid’b bonciɛnn k b ji g ban ban mali yal, g ji maad b ŋmiɛl n ninŋ: « Ne mɔ tie bɛ n ne i ? »
44002013	Ama g lieb yen laa’b g maad: « B ne nyuu dimɔunŋ u g buo. »
44002014	L sua g Piɛr be yen Yiesu sundi piig yen yend ŋann. K u fiil g gaal maam, g don niɛlu g maad niwulug: « Yinm Suif‑nba yen yinm nba kul be Serusalɛm ne, ŋanm g cenŋ man ne, l tie k yin gbad bonn nba tien ne niimn i.
44002015	Niib nba k i nyuan’m ne, daa mali man k b buo daam kaa. T daa be siŋaaɔg n kud munwai i.
44002016	Ama Yendu sogni Sowɛl n bo maad yal, lann n ji tie ne. U bo yed
44002017	g Yendu maad: “ Dijijuog dani n, n bu te n Foŋanm ń paad paad g jiid nil kul po. I bijabi yen i bipuobi baa maad min ŋɔn’m yal nba. N bu ŋɔn i nipaaɔnŋ, bona nba wuo. I nikpela bu la bona danŋd n ninŋ.
44002018	Yen mɔni, l dani n ninŋ, n bu jiin n Foŋanm jab yen puob nba tie n tuonsunna po. K ban gii maad min ŋɔn’m yal nba.
44002019	N bu tien yaalidug bona polu po g tien palug tinŋ po: sɔm tan baa be, g muu be, g munyinaajuaɔg be.
44002020	Yendu tan bu bɔnn, ŋmaalg ń mɔnn peounŋ nyan sɔm nyan. L kul ne bu tien yo, Yonmdaan daal ń pund. L daal baa tie digbenŋl i, g tie yudand daal.
44002021	Nnyan, yua nba kul taa Yonmdaan sann, u bu la fielu. ” » G Piɛr pugn g maad:
44002022	« Israyɛl yab, cenŋ man min bu maad yal ne. Yendu bo ŋɔn’i wan tie Nasarɛt Yiesu yikod nba. Yinm mɔno, i ban Yendu n te g Yiesu tien palug yen yaalidug bona nba i buol.
44002023	B daan suol l jua i g tie’i, nyan Yendu n bo liid g jag nand nyan. Yendu bo liid g ban l po. Yinm n daan te g yab g ban Yendu kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po k u kpe.
44002024	Ama g Yendu nyan’o kuum fala n, g yied’o kpienm siign. G dugn kuum yen u paalu kul, u daan kan fid gii diɛ’ɔg.
44002025	Dafiid mɔno bo maad u po k nne: “ N daan tu nyuan Yonmdaan k u be yen’n youg kul g be n nuujendu k min daa jie siɛl.
44002026	L po n te k n pal man k n yiin pamanyani kua g ban g baa n gbannand tan gii be kakul n, n baa dua g mɔg dindann
44002027	g dugn n ban k a kan nyɔl’n tinkpiiug n, k a kan ŋaa a niŋan gbannand ń bed kakul n.
44002028	A ŋɔn’n miɛl sɔni g baa be yen’n, k n pal man. ” »
44002029	Lann i g Piɛr biɛ maad: « N ninjanm, l dagd yen min maad’i mamɔni. T yaaja Dafiid bo kpe k b pii’ug. U kakul biɛ daa be yen dinne, bii i ?
44002030	Dafiid bo tie Yendu sogni i, g ban g Yendu bo puon’o g pol, k u yaabuona n ninŋ yend tan bu kal u badkog po.
44002031	L po n te k u bo liid g ban g Kristo tan bu yied kpienm siign. U bo maad u po k nne: “ Yendu kan nyɔl’o tinkpiiug n, u gbannand mɔ kan bed kakul n. ”
44002032	T kul tie sieda‑nba g Yendu yied wano Yiesu kpienm siign,
44002033	g don’o polu po g kaan’o u jendu, g tie’og Foŋanm nba k u bo puon. L Foŋanm i k u yad t po k i nyuan g biɛ gbiɛ ne.
44002034	Wano Dafiid mɔno bo g duo polu po, ama g yen maad: “ Yonmdaan Yendu maad n Yonmdaan: kal n jendu,
44002035	saa yen min tan bu te ŋan paad a ninnanda. ”
44002036	Lann l tie k Israyɛl buolu kul ń bann yen mɔni i: Yiesu nba k i daan kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po k u kpe nyan, wano i g Yendu te k u tie Yonmdaan g biɛ tie yua nba k u lugd’o. »
44002037	Ban gbad l maam, k l siɛ b pala ; lann i k b bual Piɛr yen u lieb: « T ninjanm, t bu tien nle i ? »
44002038	G Piɛr ŋmiɛn’m: « Lebd man i binbem, k ban wul’i nyum Yiesu Kristo sann po, g Yendu ń piin i biid g te’i Foŋanm.
44002039	G dugn Yendu n bo puon’i puoni nba tie yinm yen i bid yal i, yen yab nba kul be banfagl, yab nba kul g Yonmdaan t Yendu bu l yiin’m k ban te u yab. »
44002040	G Piɛr biɛ maad maam bonciɛnn g kpaan k ban tuo, g paan b pala g maad’b: « Ŋaa man Yendu ń fiel’i g nyan’i biiddanm siign. »
44002041	L daal, yab bo tuo g gaal Piɛr maam k b wul’b nyum, k b pugn yab dug Yiesu po bo g luol tuda ŋantaa.
44002042	B bo g ped yen Yiesu sundi tundl, g naataann be b siign, k b taand g bɔgd kpanu g ŋman g biɛ taand g jaand.
44002043	Yiesu sundi bo tie palug yen yaalidug bona bonciɛnn k l kuand nil kul jiwaani.
44002044	Yab bo dug Yiesu po kul bo taa mɔb i, g yua kul n mɔg yal tie tintaanbonn.
44002045	B bo tu kuad b tini yen b mɔgm g biid yua kul yen u payiɛnu i.
44002046	B bo mɔg maalyenm i g taand lieb jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n daal kul. B ŋai n ninŋ, b bo biid kpanu, g di b jied yen pamann yen cɔlunŋ.
44002047	B bo dond Yendu, g niib kul pal man b po. Daal kul Yonmdaan n bo tu fiel yab nba, u bo tu pugn’m Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ i.
44003001	Diyenn g Piɛr yen San gad jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g bu jaand daajuoug kud muntaa jaandi.
44003002	L sua k b baal yen jua nne k b mal’o k u tie wabg, g kaan’o jaanddeciɛɔnŋ dimɔb n. B bo yi l dimɔb « Dimɔŋanm » i. Daal kul, b bo tu baal yen l wabg l buol i k wan gii miɛd niib nba kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ligli.
44003003	Wan la g Piɛr yen San bua n kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, k u miɛl’b ligli.
44003004	Lann i, g Piɛr yen San nyuan’o suoo, g Piɛr maad’o: « Diid’ti ».
44003005	G wabg ji ŋanm g nyuan’m suoo, g daan k b bu te’og siɛl.
44003006	Ama g Piɛr maad’o: « N g mɔg ligli, n biɛ g mɔg wula mɔ. Min mɔg yal, n bu te’a lann i. Nasarɛt Yiesu Kristo sann po, fiil g sonm. »
44003007	Lann i g Piɛr suol u nuujendu g fiin’o. L youg mɔno, k u taapuod yen u taagbina tod.
44003008	K u yug g cii. K wano yen Piɛr yen San yeg g kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ, k u yuug g ciid g dond Yendu.
44003009	G niib nyuan’o k u sonm, g dond Yendu.
44003010	Ban bann k wano n tu kal g miɛd jaanddeciɛɔnŋ Dimɔŋanm buol nyan, k l yaa g lid’b g jiwaani kua’b yen yal tien.
44003011	L jua bo g bua k u kpiɛd Piɛr yen San. K l yaa g lid niwulug k b siɛn g ŋua’b ciɛɔg n. B bo yi l ciɛɔg Salomɔn ciɛɔg u.
44003012	Piɛr n la nnyan k u maad niwulug: « Israyɛl niib, laabaal g yal tien ne suol’i yaalidug u ? Bɛ n tien k i nyuan nyan t paalu po i, lann i kaa tin ŋua Yendu po n te g wabg ne paag i ?
44003013	Yua nba tie t baa‑nba Yendu, Abraham, Isaak yen Sakɔb Yendu, wano n tie u tuonsunn Yiesu yudand. Yinm mɔno n bo suol’o g tie yikodanm, g yie k i g ban’o Pilat nunŋ n, g Pilat yen bo bua k wan ŋaa’ɔg.
44003014	I yie yua nba tie niŋan, g tie mɔnkundaan yo, g maad Pilat k wan luod nikpiil g ŋaa.
44003015	Nnyan i, k i daan te k b kpii miɛldaan. Yendu mɔ yen yied’o kpienm siign o. Tinm tie sieda‑nba.
44003016	Jua nba k i nyuan’o g biɛ ban’o ne paag Yiesu nba k t daan u ninŋ nyan sann po i. T dindann Yiesu ninŋ n paag jua ne, i kul nunŋ n.
44003017	N ninjanm, n ban k yinm yen i canbaa‑nba daan sun l kul ne yen yanbɔnm i.
44003018	Ama g Yendu nuan yen bo tuod g te k u sogni‑nba maad k wan lugd yua nba bo bu l cagn i. U tien lann n nyan.
44003019	Ji lebd man i binbem g tug i kua g cab Yonmdaan, k wan di sugl i biid po.
44003020	Nnyan i k u bu te yin fuod, g biɛ sun Kristo nba k u bo liid g puon’i. Wano n tie Yiesu.
44003021	U yen daa baa be polu yo, saa yen bona kul n tan bu ŋmagd g gbenn, nyan Yendu n bo te k u sogni‑nba nba tie niŋanm maad siɛnyoug nand nyan.
44003022	Moyis n daa bo cind g maad: “ Yonmdaan i Yendu bu nyan i ninjanm n ninŋ niyend, wan gii tie Yendu sogni nyan min nyan. I cenŋ man u maam man.
44003023	Nil nba kul yie g g cenŋ u maam, Yonmdaan bu nyan’o i siign g biɛn’o. ”
44003024	Yendu sogni‑nba, lan cil hal Samiɛl saa yen u mɔ yaa puol po ŋuani, b mɔ bo tuod g maad yal tie mɔlane.
44003025	Yinm n tie Yendu sogni‑nba yaabuona. Yendu bo puon yinm i youg nba k u bo suol dɔnnu yen t yaajanm. U bo maad Abraham: “ A yaabuona yaa yaabuona buol i g ŋanduna buoli kul bu gaal n yedŋanm. ”
44003026	Yendu n nyan u tuonsunn, u cind g sun’o i buol i, g sua kul ń ŋaa tuonbiid sunu, k wan yad u yedŋanm i po. »
44004001	Piɛr yen San biɛ daa bo l sie g maad yen niwulug u, g salg-yidkab yen jaanddeciɛɔnŋ sijenm canbaa yen Sadusien-nba baal b buol.
44004002	B pala bo bie bonciɛnn g dugn Piɛr yen San bo nyii Yiesu yiedu po i, g tund niib g kpienm tan bu yied.
44004003	K b suol’b g luon’m g ji guu siŋaaɔg, g dugn l bo sua k l bɔnn o.
44004004	Yen l kul, niib nba bo cenŋ Piɛr yen San tundl, b ninŋ bonciɛnn bo tuo g gaal Kristo. Yab bo dug Yiesu po ji bo g luol niib tuda ŋanmu.
44004005	Lan fann, g Suif‑nba yudanm yen b nikpela, yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda taan lieb Serusalɛm.
44004006	Salg-yidkab kul ciɛn Ann bo be, g Kaayif be, g San be, k Alɛksandr be. Yab nba kul bo tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn cugl n yab mɔ bo be.
44004007	K b te k b baal yen Piɛr yen San b buol. Lann i k b bual’b: « Yiko lann po i, lann i kaa ŋmaa yaa sann po i, k i paag jua ne i ? »
44004008	L youg, g Piɛr gbie yen Foŋanm g maad: « Doug n yudanm yen doug n nikpela,
44004009	t tien wabg ŋanm k i bual’ti dinne tin tien ŋanm nba po yen lan tien nand g jua ne paag.
44004010	Bann man, yinm yen Israyɛl buolu kul g Nasarɛt Yiesu Kristo, yua k i daan kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po, k u kpe, g Yendu te k u yied kpienm siign, u yaa sann po i g jua nba ne sie i buol ne g mɔg laafiɛ.
44004011	“ Yiesu n tie tann nba k yinm tanmaala bo lu. L tann n tan guan g te dieog fiɛgl tanjal. ”
44004012	Yiesu buol i kaa, nil kan fid g la fielu. G dugn ŋanduna ne ninŋ Yiesu sann i kaa sanfann ji g be g Yendu tie k t bu fid g taa g la fielu. »
44004013	Ban bo la g Piɛr yen San maad g g jie siɛl, g yen tie niib nba bo g kua kalaatu k b nunŋ po biɛ g luod nyan, k l yaa g lid’b. K b bann k b tie niib nba daan tu ŋua Yiesu i.
44004014	Ban biɛ bo nyuan g jua nba bo paag sie b buol nyan, b ji bo kan fid g jiin siɛl.
44004015	K b te k b nyan Piɛr yen San, g ji taan g kal b ŋmiɛl n g maad:
44004016	« T bu tien niib ne nle i ? G dugn Serusalɛm niib kul ban yaalidug bonn nba k b tien ne. T kan fid g nai.
44004017	Ama l tie k tin mɔnd k l maam ń ji daa yad naan kul i. T bu fu yen’m i, g bel’b k ban ji daa ban g taa l jua sann baa sua buol. »
44004018	Lann i k b yiin Piɛr yen San g bel’b k ban ji daa fann g taa Yiesu sann, g biɛ daa ban g tund nil Yiesu maam.
44004019	Ama g Piɛr yen San ŋmiɛn’m: « Yinm mɔno n diid g liɛ Yendu buol, l dagd k tin cɔln Yendu bii, tin cɔln yinm i ? Maad man’ti.
44004020	Tinm nuan kan fid gii ŋmin, g kan maad tin la yal yen tin gbad yal. »
44004021	Lann i k b biɛ fu yen’m. B bo g la ban bu tien nand g dad b tubl. Lann i, k b ŋaa’b g dugn niwulug po, k l maa b kul ji bo yiin g dond Yendu, yal nba bo tien po i.
44004022	L kon bo tie yaalidug bonn i g dugn jua nba bo paag nyan, u bina bo cie bina piinna.
44004023	Ban tan ŋaa Piɛr yen San, k b gad g la b lieb g dugn’m salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Suif‑nba nikpela n maad’b yal kul.
44004024	Ban gbad l maam, k b kul taan mɔb g jaand Yendu g maad: « Yonmdaan, fin n tag polu yen tinŋ yen mɔgl yen bona nba be kul.
44004025	Fin n bo tie t yaaja Dafiid a tuonsunn Foŋanm k u maad: “ Laabaal g buoli ne fiil g nyɔgl i ? Laabaal g niib jaad b kua k b taand mɔb i ?
44004026	Ŋanduna ne batieb pol g sed, g doug n yudanm mɔ taan mɔb g kɔn yen Yonmdaan yen wan lugd yua nba. ”
44004027	L tie mɔni i, Erod yen Pɔns Pilat taan mɔb doug ne ninŋ yen buolfanu niib, yen Israyɛl yab g kɔn yen Yiesu, a tuonsunŋan nba k a lugd’o.
44004028	B tien yal nba kul k a bo liid g bobn k a bu tien yen a paalu yen a buam n ninŋ.
44004029	Yonmdaan, ji diid ban cagn’ti nand, g te k a tuonsunna ń muand a maam g daa jie siɛl ;
44004030	tand a nuu g te g niib ń paag, g yaalidug bona yen palug ń tien a tuonsunŋan Yiesu sann po. »
44004031	Ban jaand g gbenn, g tinŋ jeg naan buol nba k b bo taan lieb nyan. K b kul gbie yen Foŋanm g ji muand Yendu maam yen papaal.
44004032	Niib nba kul bo dug Yiesu po bo taa mɔb i, g mɔg maalyenm. Sua bo g diɛ u mɔgm k l tie u kua yal. Yua kul n bo mɔg yal bo tie tintaanbonn i.
44004033	Yiesu sundi bo muand yen Yendu paalu g maad g Yonmdaan Yiesu yied. Yendu ŋalbalg biɛ bo be yen b kul bonciɛnn.
44004034	Siɛl bo g pɔd baa sua b siign. G dugn yab bo mɔg tini lann i kaa ŋai bo tu kuad g baal yen l ligli
44004035	g bil Yiesu sundi buol. B bo tu bɔgd yua kul yen u payiɛnu i.
44004036	Nnyan i g Sosɛf, yua g Yiesu sundi bo pul’o Barnabas bo kuad u kpaab g baal yen l ligli g tie’b. U bo tie Lefiit i, g nyiɛ Sipr. (Barnabas sann niimn tie jua nba paand niib pala.)
44005001	Jua nne mɔ bo be g yi Ananias k u ŋaapuo yi Safiira. Wano n bo kuad u kpaab g juog yen u ŋaapuo
44005002	g bɔgd ligli g wuon. G tug yal tenn g gad g tie Yiesu sundi.
44005003	Lann i g Piɛr maad’o: « Ananias, l tien nle i k a ŋaa g Sitaan kua a pal n g yend’a, g te k a bɔgd a kpaab ligli g wuon, g baal g bɔnd Foŋanm i ?
44005004	A bo bu fid g ŋaa g daa kuad a kpaab, lann i kaa ŋan kuad nyan, a bo bu fid g tug l ligli g tien ŋan bua yal. A tien nle i g ŋaa k l maalm kua a pal n i ? A g bɔnd niib kaa, a bɔnd Yendu i. »
44005005	Ananias n gbad l maam, k u baa k l gbenn nnyan. G jiwaani kua niib nba kul bo gbad yal tien.
44005006	Lann i g naasenm fiil g tug’o g pɔbn’o cabl n, g gad g pii.
44005007	Lan tien nyan kud muntaa nyan, k Ananias ŋaapuo baal g kua. U daa bo g ban yal tien.
44005008	G Piɛr bual’o: « Diid a, yin kuad i kpaab, i gaal ligli ne yaa aa ? » G puo ŋmiɛn’o k ɛɛn, k b gaal l ligli i.
44005009	Lann i g Piɛr maad’o: « L tien nle i k fin yen a sal taan mɔb g bign k yin bɔnd Yonmdaan Foŋanm i ? A la i, yab gad g pii a sal, banm n be dimɔb n nyan. B bu tug a mɔ g gad yen’a. »
44005010	L youg mɔno k u mɔ caad g baa Piɛr nunŋ n k l gbenn nnyan. G naasenm kua g sua k u kpe g dua. K b tug u mɔ g gad g pii’ug g kpiɛn u sal.
44005011	G jiwaani kua yab nba kul bo dug Yiesu po yen yab nba bo gbad l maam kul.
44005012	Yiesu sundi bo tie yaalidug bona yen palug bonciɛnn niib kul buol. Yab bo dug Yiesu po kul bo taa mɔb, g taand lieb Salomɔn ciɛɔg n.
44005013	Nifanm nba bo be bo bua b maam bonciɛnn, ama g baa sua yen g paand pal g kua b ninŋ.
44005014	Yen l kul jab yen puob, bonciɛnn bo tan tuo g gaal Yonmdaan g pugn b po.
44005015	Niib bo baad yen yiɛnm g duand’b liɛni yen dinduantiɛd po sɔnjakuni, k l gii tie g Piɛr tan pend, u jinjunŋ ń pend b ninŋ baa yend po.
44005016	Lann i g lieb bonciɛnn mɔ nya Serusalɛm dingbankunkogi n g siɛn g baad yen yiɛnm yen yab g sanpola bo ŋua’b. K b kul ne laad laafiɛ.
44005017	L youg, g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn yen yab bo be yen’o g tie Sadusien-nba cagl n ninŋ yab nyan, fiil yen nanŋ g te
44005018	k b suol Yiesu sundi g luon’m dansaldieog n.
44005019	Ama g Yonmdaan malɛg tan baal nyiɛɔg, g luod dansaldieog gana g nyan’m cincann g maad’b:
44005020	« Gad man g sed jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n g muand niib manfopaann maam. »
44005021	Ban gbad nnyan, k b fiil siŋapanpan g gad g kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g cil g tund niib. L sua g Yendu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn yen yab bo be yen’o mɔ gad, g taan g kal yen Suif‑nba buuddanm yen Suif‑nba nikpela, g sun k ban gad g luod Yiesu sundi g baal yen’m nii.
44005022	G sijenm gad g g la Yiesu sundi dansaldieog n, g guan g maad’b:
44005023	« T pund g sua g dansaldieog gana kul ŋanm g luo, g sijenm sie dimɔb n g guu. Ama tin luod dansaldieog t g la baa sua l ninŋ. »
44005024	Ban gbad l maam, k l yaa g lid jaanddeciɛɔnŋ sijenm kul ciɛn yen salg-yidkab ciɛnm, yen lan tien nand g Yiesu sundi nyiɛ. K b ji mali yal bu baal l puol po.
44005025	L youg g nil baal g maad’b: « Yab nba k i won suol g luon’m nyan, sie jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n g tund niib. »
44005026	Lann i g jaanddeciɛɔnŋ sijenm kul ciɛn tug sijenm k b gad g tug Yiesu sundi g guan yen’m. B yen bo g tuo g sii’b g dugn b bo jie g niib tan bu jaa’b tana.
44005027	Ban guan yen’m Suif‑nba buuddanm buol, g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn bual’b:
44005028	« T daan g bel’i yen ninmɔnn k yin daa tund niib l sann po ii ? Ama k yinm yen yad l tundl Serusalɛm doug n kul, g bua g niib ń jalg’ti k tinm n kpii l jua. »
44005029	Lann i g Piɛr yen u lieb ŋmiɛn’m: « T bu cɔln Yendu i, t kan cɔln niib kaa.
44005030	Yinm n daan kpaa Yiesu dapunpɔnn po, k u kpe. Ama k t yaajanm Yendu te k u yied kpienm siign.
44005031	Wano i g Yendu don’o g kaan’o u jendu, g te k u tie Bad g biɛ tie Fietua, k wan te k Israyɛl yab ń lebd b binbem, k wan di sugl b biid po.
44005032	Tinm yen Foŋanm tie sieda‑nba. Wano Foŋanm i, g Yendu tie yaa danm nba cɔlm’o. »
44005033	Suif‑nba buuddanm n gbad nnyan, k b pala bie g pend k b ji lolg k ban kpi Yiesu sundi.
44005034	Ama g jua nne fiil Suif‑nba buuddanm siign g maad k ban daa nyan Yiesu sundi u. U bo tie Farisiɛn i, k b yi’ug Gamaliɛl. U biɛ bo tie Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanband i, g niib kul cɔlm’o.
44005035	Lann i k u maad: « Israyɛl yab, suol man i kua yen yin bua n tien niib ne yal.
44005036	Bann man k l daa g wai mɔno, g jua nne bo fiil k b yi’ug Tewudas. U bo yi u kua nigbenŋl i, g niib nba g luol kobiinna ŋuan’o. Ama k b tan kpii’ug, g yab bo ŋuan’o nyan kul san g yad, k b tintaanu yod.
44005037	U yal po n pend, g Galile jua Suuda fiil cɔdl youg, g mɔ yaan te g niib bonciɛnn ŋuan’o. K b tan kpii u mɔ, k u niib kul san g yad.
44005038	L po n te k n ji maad’i: Daa kua man b maam n. Ŋaa’b man k ban gii saa. G dugn l gii sua k b didugd lann i kaa k b tuona tie niib maalm, l bu yod l kua i.
44005039	Ama l gii sua k l tie Yendu yal, i kan fid g tien’m baa siɛl. Lann suol man i kua g daa tan kɔn yen Yendu. » K b kul tuo k u maam tie mɔni.
44005040	Lann i k b guan g yiin Yiesu sundi g te k b pua’b gbana. G bel’b k ban daa ban g taa Yiesu sann. G ji ŋaa’b.
44005041	K b nyiɛ Suif‑nba buuddanm buol g paan g saa. K b kul pala man yen Yendu n diid g sua k b dagd yen ban cagn’m Yiesu sann po.
44005042	Daal kul b bo be jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n yen ŋai n ninŋ, g tund g biɛ muand Yendu Laabamann, g maad niib g Yiesu n tie yua nba g Yendu lugd’o.
44006001	L dana n ninŋ g Yiesu ŋuantieb pugn bonciɛnn. B ninŋ, g Suif‑nba nba maad grɛk nyan yie Ebro‑nba po, g maad’b k l tien nle i k b tu bua n biid pekɔa jied, g sunm b yaa pekɔa po i ?
44006002	Lann i g Yiesu sundi piig yen banle ŋann, taan yab bo ŋua Yiesu nyan kul g maad’b: « L g dagd k tin ŋaa Yendu maam muandu gii nyuan jied biidu n ninŋ.
44006003	Lann n ninjanm, lugd man i ninŋ niib banlile, yab nba g sua kan fid g jalg’b baa siɛl po, g Foŋanm be yen’m k b mɔg yanfuom, k t bu te’b l tuonn.
44006004	Nnyan, t yaa tuonn ji baa tie jaandi yen Yendu maam muandu i. »
44006005	G niib kul tuo l maam. Lann i k b lugd Etiɛnn, u bo tie nil nba mɔg dindann bonciɛnn g gbie yen Foŋanm. G lugd Filiip yen Prokɔr yen Nikanɔr yen Timɔn yen Parmena yen Nikola, yua bo tie Antiyɔs jua g bo kua Suif‑nba jaandi,
44006006	g baal yen’m g Yiesu sundi jaand g maan nui b po.
44006007	Yendu maam bo yad g saa, g Yiesu ŋuantieb pugd bonciɛnn Serusalɛm doug n. G salg-yidkab bonciɛnn mɔ tuo g gaal Yiesu.
44006008	Yendu bo tie Etiɛnn u ŋalbalg yen u paalu k u tie palug yen yaalidug bona bonciɛnn, g niib kul nyuan.
44006009	Suif‑nba nne bo mɔg b tintaann dieog k b yi « Yab‑nyiɛ-yonmd‑n. » B ninŋ siɛb bo fiil g cil g nai yen wano Etiɛnn. L tintaann dieog n, yenm bo nyiɛ Siirɛnn yen Alɛksandri, g lieb nyiɛ Silisi yen Asi.
44006010	Ama b bo kan fid g nai g paad Etiɛnn g dugn Foŋanm bo te k u maad yen yanfuom.
44006011	Lann i k b la niib g tie’b ligli k ban maad k b gbad k u maad g sugd Moyis yen Yendu.
44006012	K b tig muu g nyɔgl tien, g niib fiil yen Suif‑nba nikpela yen Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda, g gad g suol Etiɛnn, g gad yen’o Suif‑nba buuddanm buol.
44006013	K b kpaan niib k b baal g fa faaɔg g jalg’o g maad: « Jua ne l maad mabiid i Yendu jaanddeciɛɔnŋ po yen Moyis yiko po.
44006014	T gbad k u maad g Nasarɛt Yiesu bu mud jaanddeciɛɔnŋ g biɛ lebd bogda nba g Moyis bo tie’ti. »
44006015	G danm nba kul bo kal buud po nyuand Etiɛnn g la k u nunŋ naan nyan malɛg yal nyan.
44007001	G salg-yidkab kul ciɛn bual Etiɛnn: « Ban maad yal a po ne tie mɔni yaa aa ? »
44007002	K Etiɛnn ŋmiɛn: « N baa‑nba yen n ninjanm, cenŋ man ne: T Yendu nba mɔg yudand bo ŋɔn u kua t yaaja Abraham g sua k u daa be Mesopotami, g daa g kua Aran doug n.
44007003	U bo maad’o: “ Nya g ŋaa a doug yen a ŋaag yab, g gad doug nba ninŋ k n bu ŋɔn’a. ”
44007004	Lann i k Abraham nyiɛ Kalde‑nba doug n g gad g kua Aran. U baa kpe yo k l puol po g Yendu te k u nyiɛ l buol, g baal g kua doug nba ninŋ k i be mɔlane.
44007005	Yendu bo g tie’og baa siɛl, baa tinŋ boncebg nne l doug n. Ama u yen bo puon’o g maad: “ N bu te’a l doug, a tan gii g be a yaabuona ń yend. ” L yen bo sua k Abraham daa g mɔg baa big.
44007006	Yendu biɛ bo maad’o: “ A yaabuona bu gad g kua dofanu n g te yonmi, k ban cagn’m bina kobiinna.
44007007	Ama min, n tan bu bu buolu nba tug’b g tien’m b yonmi nyan. L po gii pend, a yaabuona bu nya l dofanu n g guan doug ne ninŋ gii dond’n. ”
44007008	Lann i g Yendu suol dɔnnu yen Abraham. L dɔnnu banm n tie kɔnd. K Abraham mal Isaak g kɔnd’o daa ŋanniin daal, k Isaak mɔ tan kɔnd Sakɔb, g Sakɔb mɔ tan kɔnd u bid piig yen banle nba tie t yaajanm.
44007009	K t yaajanm ŋanm fiil yen nanŋ b ninja Sosɛf po, g kuad’o k b gad yen’o Esipt, k u te yonm. Ama Yendu bo be yen’o,
44007010	g nyan’o fala n ninŋ kul. G tie’og u ŋalbalg yen u yanfuom k u tu bu fid g maad yen Faraaɔn, yua bo tie Esipt bad. G Faraaɔn din Sosɛf Esipt gobna, g tug u ŋaag kul g kubn’o.
44007011	Lann i g kom tan baa Esipt doug n kul yen Kanaan doug n, g niib cagn bonciɛnn, k t yaajanm ji tan g laad siɛl g di.
44007012	Sakɔb n gbad g jied be Esipt, k u sun t yaajanm l doug n.
44007013	Ban gad taal munle po g Sosɛf te k u ninjanm bann’o. G Faraaɔn ji bann Sosɛf n nyiɛ ŋaag nba ninŋ.
44007014	Lann i g Sosɛf sun k b baal yen u baa Sakɔb yen u ŋaag yab kul. B kul bo tie niib piinlile yen banmu i.
44007015	G Sakɔb jiid Esipt. L buol i k u kpe, wano yen t yaajanm,
44007016	k b tug’b g baal yen’m Sisem, g pii’b kakul nba ninŋ k Abraham bo daa yen u ligli Emɔr bid buol, Sisem doug n.
44007017	Ama Yendu n bo puon Abraham k u bu tien yal, l youg ji bo nag g sua g Suif‑nba pugn, g mal g yabd Esipt doug n.
44007018	Diyenn g badpaanŋ nne tan gaal kog Esipt doug n, wano nuan bo g ban Sosɛf.
44007019	L bad bo bɔnd t buolu niib, g cagn t yaajanm g tan niin’m mɔno k b lunn b bid, k b kpenn.
44007020	L youg u, k b mal Moyis k u ŋan g pend. K b ŋub’o u baa ŋaag n ninŋ ŋmaali yintaa.
44007021	B bo tan lu’ug u, g Faraaɔn bipuo gann’o, g kun g ŋub’o nyan u big nyan.
44007022	L bo tien nnyan i, g Moyis gaal Esipt yab banm kul, g ban maam bonciɛnn g biɛ paa tuonn.
44007023	Wan tan la bina piinna, k u tug yanjagl k u bu gad g la u ninjanm Israyɛl bid.
44007024	Wan gad, k u la k Esipt jua cagn u ninja, k u gaal u ninja po g kpii Esipt jua.
44007025	U bo mali k u ninjanm bu gbad g Yendu tug wano i, k wan fiel’b, ama k b yen bo g gbad l niimn.
44007026	K l fann, g Moyis la k u ninjanm banle sie g kɔn yen lieb, k u bua n pad’b g maad: “ N dɔnn‑nba, i tie ninjann i, g laabaal k i kɔn yen i lieb i ? ”
44007027	Ama g yua nba bo cagn u lua nyan, pii g tud Moyis g maad’o: “ Ŋmaa tug’a k a gii tie t bad g biɛ gii bu t buud i ?
44007028	A bua n kpi n mɔ nyan ŋan won kpii Esipt jua nand nyan yaa aa ? ”
44007029	Moyis n gbad l maam k u san g gad g kua Madian. L buol i k u mal bijabi banle.
44007030	Bina piinna bo pend yo, g Yonmdaan malɛg ŋɔn u kua Moyis, tuntuug nba bo suol muu nyan ninŋ tinkuonŋ n ninŋ, Sinaayi jual buol.
44007031	Wano Moyis n la nnyan k l yaa g lid’o yen wan la yal. K u nagn k wan diid, lann i g gbad Yonmdaan niɛlu k l maad k nne:
44007032	“ Min n tie a yaajanm Yendu: Abraham yen Isaak yen Sakɔb Yendu ”. G jiwaani kua Moyis k u ji jegl, g g bua k u yaad g diid mɔno.
44007033	L youg g Yonmdaan maad’o: “ Pid a taacaad g dugn ŋan sie tinŋ nba po ne, n be l buol i.
44007034	Yen mɔni, n la n buolu n cagn nand Esipt doug n, g gbad u finfabni, lann i k n jiid k n fiel’o. Baal mɔlane k n bu sun’a Esipt doug n. ”
44007035	Moyis nba k Israyɛl yab bo yie’og g maad g ŋmaa n tug’o k wan gii tie b bad g biɛ gii bu b buud nyan, wano i g Yendu tan sun’o g te g malɛg tod’o, k u tie b bad g biɛ tie b Fietua. L malɛg n bo be tuntuug nba bo so muu nyan ninŋ.
44007036	L Moyis n tan tien yaalidug bona yen palug, g nyan Israyɛl buolu Esipt doug n, g te k b puod mɔgmɔnn, k u ŋmagd’b tinkuonŋ n ninŋ bina piinna siign.
44007037	Wano n biɛ bo maad Israyɛl yab: “ Yendu bu lugd i buolu n yeno, wan gii tie Yendu sogni nyan min nyan. ”
44007038	Youg nba k t yaajanm Yendu buolu bo taan lieb tinkuonŋ n ninŋ, Moyis bo be banm yen malɛg siign, g gaan maam nba tien miɛl malɛg buol Sinaayi jual po, g sɔgnd’ti.
44007039	Ama t yaajanm bo g bua k b cɔlm’o, g yie’og k b yam guan Esipt.
44007040	Lann i k t yaajanm maad Aharɔn: “ Naan yendui nba baa be t liig k t ŋua, g dugn Moyis nba nyan’ti Esipt doug n nuan, t ji g ban yal baal’o. ”
44007041	L dana n ninŋ mɔno k b naan yendu k u tie naabig, k b baad yen sali g yid’o, k b tien jaanciɛnm yen banm mɔno n sun yaa tuonn.
44007042	Lann i g Yendu nyɔl’b, g ŋaa’b k b dond polu po ŋmaabid nyan lan bo tan diɛn Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg n nand nyan. L bo diɛn g maad: “ Israyɛl yab, bina piinna nba k i bo be tinkuonŋ n ninŋ, i bo diɛ bonkobd yen sali g yid min yaa aa ?
44007043	I bo tug yendu nba k b yi Molɔk nyan yen u jounŋ, yen yendu nba k b yi Refann nyan ŋmaabig ninnaɔnŋ u. L yendui i k i bo naan g dond’b. L po n te k n bu nyan’i i doug n, g gad yen’i hal Babilɔnn yaa liig. ”
44007044	T yaajanm n bo be tinkuonŋ n ninŋ, b bo mɔg Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ g Yendu Mɔmaam be l ninŋ. Yendu n bo te g Moyis pua l jounŋ. U bo pua nyan wan bo la l jounŋ k l naan nand nyan i.
44007045	T yaajanm ji bo tan gaal l jounŋ u g diɛ, youg nba g Sosuwe bo be b liig. B bo kua yen l jounŋ u, doug nba ninŋ g Yendu bo te k b pua tɔb g yaan l doug n niib g yend. K l jounŋ ji be yen’m saa yen Dafiid youg.
44007046	Yendu bo tie Dafiid u ŋalbalg, g Dafiid miɛl’o k wan cab’o k wan maa ŋaag g te wano Sakɔb Yendu.
44007047	Ama Salomɔn n ji bo tan maa ŋaag g tie’og.
44007048	Yendu Badciɛn mɔ yen g kua ŋai nba g niib maa yen b nui kaa. Yendu bo te k u sogni maad lann n nyan:
44007049	“ Polu tie n kinkaanbuol i, g tinŋ tie n taaŋmaabuol. I bu fid g maa ŋalanŋ i g te’n i ? Lɛ buol n bu fid g te n dinduanbuol i ?
44007050	Min mɔno kaa tag l bona kul ne ii ? ” » Lann i k Etiɛnn biɛ maad Suif‑nba buuddanm:
44007051	« Yinm kangbada ne, i yie k i kan lebd i pala g cenŋ Yendu, yinm l yie Foŋanm i. I tie nyan i yaajanm nyan i.
44007052	Yendu sogni lano po i, k i yaajanm g ŋɔn’o fala i ? B kpii yab bo liid mɔno g muand Mɔnkundaan baalu. I kuad wano i mɔlane, g biɛ kpii’ug.
44007053	Yinm nba gaal Yendu Mɔmaam u malɛg‑nba buol, i biɛ g cɔln l Mɔmaam. »
44007054	Suif‑nba buuddanm n gbad l maam, k b pala bie Etiɛnn po, k b ji ŋman nyina.
44007055	Ama wano n yen bo gbie yen Foŋanm nyan, k u yaad g diid polu po, g la Yendu yudand yen Yiesu k u sie Yendu nuujendu.
44007056	Lann i k u maad: « Cenŋ man, n la g polu luod k n nyuan g Nifosaal Bija sie Yendu nuujendu. »
44007057	Ban gbad l maam k b kul yign yen paalu, g pii b tuba, g bed g gad g gob Etiɛnn.
44007058	G dad g nyan’o doug kunŋ g jaa’ɔg tana g bu kpi’ug. G yab bo fa faaɔg g jalg Etiɛnn nyan, land b tiɛd g bil naasen nne buol k b yi’ug Sɔl.
44007059	Ban bo jaag Etiɛnn tana yaa youg, u bo jaand g maad k nne: « Yonmdaan Yiesu, gaal n nalnŋ. »
44007060	L puol po k u baa g gbaan g yign yen paalu g maad: « Yonmdaan, di sugl biid nba k b tien ne po. » Wan maad l lanbona g gbenn, k u jiin.
44008001	Sɔl mɔ bo taa yab bo kpii Etiɛnn nyan po i. L daal k l mɔnn yab bo dug Yiesu po Serusalɛm doug n. K b kul yad g kua Suude yen Samari dingbana n ninŋ, g ŋaa Yiesu sundi kua.
44008002	G yab nba bo ŋua Yendu yen b pal kul tug Etiɛnn g gad g pii g mɔ u kumɔni hal bonciɛnn.
44008003	Ama g Sɔl nuan gbaa k wan biɛn yab bo dug Yiesu po. U bo kua b ŋai n i, g so jab yen puob g luond’b dansaldieog n.
44008004	G yab nba bo dug Yiesu po g san g ciɛl nyan, waa dingbana n g muand Laabamann.
44008005	L bo tien nnyan i g Filiip gad dopienu nne ninŋ k l be Samari g muand niib Kristo n tie yua.
44008006	Niwulug bo tu gbad Filiip n maad yal, g biɛ la wan tie yaalidug bona nba, g ŋanm g luod tuba g cenŋ u maam.
44008007	Niib bonciɛnn bo be l buol g sanpola ŋua’b, k l sanpola ji tu yign bag bag g yaad g ŋaa’b. G yab k b gbanu bo kpe yen wabi mɔ paagd.
44008008	Lann i g pamanciɛnn kpen l doug n.
44008009	L sua g jua nne bo be l doug n k b yi’ug Simɔn. U bo tie belbɔnd i, k l mɔg yaalidug Samari niib po. U mɔ bo yi u kua k u tie wano i.
44008010	G bid yen nikpela kul ŋua’ɔg g cenŋ u maam. B kul bo tua g jua ne nuan mɔg Yendu paalu i, ban yi yal nba Paaciɛnu mɔno.
44008011	Niib bo cenŋ u maam g dugn u bo cil g tie l belbɔnd k l wai. L po mɔno n te g niib bo ŋua’ɔg.
44008012	Ama Filiip n bo muand’b Yendu diem Laabamann, g biɛ maad’b Yiesu Kristo n tie yua k b gaal nyan, jab yen puob bo te k b wuul’b nyum.
44008013	K wano Simɔn mɔno tuo g gaal Kristo k b wul’o nyum. U ji bo g bua k u sud g ŋaa Filiip. U bo tu la yaalidug bona yen palug nba tie, lan suol’o yaalidug.
44008014	Yiesu sundi bo be Serusalɛm g gbad g Samari niib mɔ tuo g gaal Yendu maam, k b sun Piɛr yen San b buol.
44008015	Ban pund Samari, k b jaand yab dug Yiesu po, k ban gaal Foŋanm.
44008016	G dugn Foŋanm daa bo g jiid b ninŋ baa sua po. B daa bo wul’b nyum kua i Yonmdaan Yiesu sann po.
44008017	Lann i g Piɛr yen San maan nui b po k b gaal Foŋanm.
44008018	Simɔn n la g Piɛr yen San maand nui yab dug Yiesu po k b gaan Foŋanm, k u tug ligli g tie’b
44008019	g maad: « Te man n mɔ l paalu, k n tu gii maan nui yab nba po ban gaal Foŋanm. »
44008020	G Piɛr jiin’o: « Fin yen a ligli kul ń biɛl fam, g dugn a mali k a bu fid g tug ligli g daa Yendu n piin yal fam.
44008021	Yal nba tie ne buol ne, a g mɔg baa siɛl l n ninŋ ; a g mɔg yiko yen ŋan kua l n ninŋ, g dugn a maalm fag yen Yendu.
44008022	Ŋaa a maalbiid g jaand g miɛl Yonmdaan, l g kua u bu di sugl a maalbiid po.
44008023	G dugn n la k a tug n gbie yen nanŋ, k a biɛ kan ŋaa biid tienu. »
44008024	G Simɔn jiin’m g maad: « Yinm mɔno ń jaand Yonmdaan n po, k yin maad yal ne, baa siɛl ń daa baal’n. »
44008025	G Piɛr yen San ŋɔn niib Yiesu n tie yua, g biɛ muand’b Yendu maam. L puol po k b lebd Serusalɛm doug n. Ban leb Serusalɛm k b muand Laabamann Samari dingbana bonciɛnn n ninŋ.
44008026	Yonmdaan malɛg bo maad Filiip: « Fiil g tɔgn yanbaɔnŋ po, g tug sɔnu nba nyiɛ Serusalɛm g ji Gasa. Niib g paa g tɔg l sɔnu. »
44008027	G Filiip fiil g gad l youg mɔno, g la jua nne sɔnu po. L jua bo tie Etiyopi Puobad tuonsungbenŋl i. Wano i k b bo biil u jatiɛd k u guu l puo mɔgm kul. B bo yi l puo Kandas i. U bo baal Serusalɛm g pug Yendu i,
44008028	g ji leb g kun. U bo kal tolug n ninŋ, g taanm diɛl’o, k u lii Yendu sogni Esaayi kadaaɔg.
44008029	Lann i g Foŋanm maad Filiip: « Nagn tantolug ne buol. »
44008030	G Filiip san g nagn g gbad k l jua lii Yendu sogni Esaayi kadaaɔg. G Filiip bual’o: « A gbiɛ ŋan lii yal ne niimn ii ? »
44008031	K l jua ŋmiɛn’o: « N bu tien nle i g gbad l niimn g nil g ŋɔn’n i ? » K u maad Filiip k wan do g kal u buol.
44008032	Wan bo lii yal Esaayi kadaaɔg n n ne: « B daan saa yen’o k u ŋmin nyan ban tu tug pieog g saa g daan bu kod nyan i. U daan ŋmin nyan pebig n tu ŋmin yab ja u kobd nunŋ n nyan i. U daan g yaad mɔb g maad baa siɛl.
44008033	B daan sɔnd’o i, g yie g g kun’o mɔni. Ŋmaa n tan bu fid g maad u tennm po i ? G dugn, b junn u miɛl tinŋ po ne u. »
44008034	K l jua ji bual Filiip: « N miɛd’a sugl, maad’n Yendu sogni n maad yua nba. U maad wano mɔno bii, u maad sua i ? »
44008035	Lann i g Filiip gaal maam, g cil l kadaaɔg n, g muand’o Laabamann Yiesu po.
44008036	K b saa saa g daan la nyum sɔnu po. K l jua maad Filiip: « Nyum n nyan, bɛ n biɛ pɔd yen ŋan wul’n i ? » [
44008037	G Filiip maad’o: « A gii dug Yiesu po yen a pal kul, l bu fid g tien. » K l jua maad: « N tuo g Yiesu Kristo tie Yendu Bija. »]
44008038	Lann i k l jua te k b sen tolug, k wano yen Filiip jiid nyum n, g Filiip wul’o.
44008039	Ban nyiɛ nyum n ninŋ yaa youg, g Yonmdaan Foŋanm tug Filiip g yaad yen’o k l jua ji g la’ɔg, g tug u sɔnu g paan g saa yen pamann.
44008040	Filiip nuan tan sua k u ji be Asɔt doug n i. Lann i k u nyiɛ l buol g gad Sesaare. Wan saa, k u muand Laabamann doi nba be sɔnu po g daan pund Sesaare.
44009001	L youg Sɔl pal daa bo l ŋub Yonmdaan ŋuantieb po, k u ŋua’b yen ninmɔnn k wan biɛn’m. U bo gad g la salg-yidkab kul ciɛn
44009002	g te k u tie’og kadaad nba bu cab’o yikod k wan fid g kua Damas tintaann died n ninŋ, l gii tie k u la yab tuag Yonmdaan sɔnu, jab lann i kaa puob, wan suol g lol’b g guan yen’m Serusalɛm.
44009003	Wan bo paa sɔnu po g tan nag Damas, u sua g yinyiem nne nyiɛ polu po g baal g fand g lind’o.
44009004	K u baa tinŋ n, g gbad g niɛlu nne maad’o: « Sɔl, Sɔl, laabaal k a cagn’n i ? »
44009005	G Sɔl bual’o: « Yonmdaan, a tie ŋmaa i ? » K l niɛlu guan g ŋmiɛn’o: « Min n tie Yiesu, min i k a cagn’n.
44009006	Fiil g kua doug n, b daan bu maad’a ŋan bu tien yal. »
44009007	Lann i g jiwaani kua u yegni, k b sie g kan fid g maad baa siɛl. B bo gbiɛ g niɛlu n maad, ama b bo g nyuan baa sua.
44009008	G Sɔl fiil g nuul ninbina g yen ji g nyuan baa siɛl. K b suol u nuu g dadb’o g kua yen’o Damas.
44009009	L buol i k u tien daa ŋantaa g g nyuan, g g dii g biɛ g nyuu.
44009010	L bo sua g Yiesu ŋuantua nne be Damas k b yi’ug Ananias. K l tien’o nyan danŋd nyan g Yonmdaan yiin’o: « Ananias ! » K u tuo: « Min n nyan, Yonmdaan. »
44009011	G Yonmdaan maad’o: « Fiil g gad sɔnu nba po k b yi Sɔnsunsonn nyan, g kua Suuda ŋaag, g bual jua nne po k b yi’ug Sɔl k u nyiɛ Tars. U be l buol g jaand.
44009012	Wan jaand yaa youg, k l tien’o nyan danŋd nyan k u la jua nne k b yi’ug Ananias, k u kua g maan nui u po k wan nyuand. »
44009013	K Ananias ŋmiɛn: « Yonmdaan, niib bonciɛnn maad’n l jua n sun yab nba dug a po tuonbiid nba kul Serusalɛm doug n.
44009014	U baal ne yen salg-yidkab ciɛnm yikod i, k wan suol yab nba kul jaand g taan a sann. »
44009015	Ama g Yonmdaan maad’o: « Gad, g dugn min n tug’o g tien’o n tuonsunn, k wan ŋɔn buolfanu yab yen b batieb yen Israyɛl yab min tie yua.
44009016	Min mɔno n bu ŋɔn’o cicagm nba kul k u bu cagn n po. »
44009017	Lann i k Ananias gad g kua l ŋaag n, g maan nui u po g maad: « N ninja Sɔl, Yonmdaan Yiesu nba te k a la’ɔg youg nba k a bo paa sɔnu po g baad nyan, wano n sun’n k ŋan fid g guan g nyuand g biɛ gbie yen Foŋanm. »
44009018	L youg g bona nne nyiɛ u ninbina n g baa g naan waga. K u ji nyuand. K b wul’o nyum.
44009019	K u la jied g dii g paalu tien. Sɔl bo g luol daa ŋanŋaa g be yen Yiesu ŋuantieb Damas doug n.
44009020	U bo cil l youg mɔno g muand tintaann died n g Yiesu tie Yendu Bija.
44009021	Yab bo cenŋ l tundl kul k l ji yaa g lid’b, k b maad: « Wano tien kaa daan tu cagn yab taan Yiesu sann Serusalɛm ii ? L po kaa te k u baal ne k wan suol’b g lol’b, g gad yen’m g daan te salg-yidkab ciɛnm ii ? »
44009022	Sɔl paalu bo pugd daal kul Yendu mamuandu n ninŋ. K u muand g ŋɔnŋ niib g Yiesu kon l tie Kristo i. G Suif‑nba nba be Damas ji g ban ban bu maad’o yal.
44009023	L bo wai bonciɛnn yo, g Suif‑nba tan taan mɔb g bu kpi Sɔl.
44009024	G Sɔl bann ban taan mɔb g lol yal u po. Yendu n yen nyiɛɔg, b bo guu doug dimɔi mɔno g kpaan k ban kpi’ug.
44009025	Diyenn nyiɛɔg k u ŋuantieb duo yen’o guonn nba bo kaan g lind doug nyan po, g kpien’o kpancubug n, g jiin’o cincann po.
44009026	Sɔl bo gad Serusalɛm g kpaan k wan kua Yiesu ŋuantieb n ninŋ, ama k b kul yen jie’og. G dugn b bo g tuo k u te Yiesu ŋuantua yen mɔni.
44009027	Lann i g Barnabas juab’o g gad yen’o Yiesu sundi buol, g dugn’m nand nba g Sɔl bo la Yonmdaan, sɔnu po, yen Yonmdaan n bo maad yen’o nand, yen nand nba k u bo muand Yendu maam Damas doug n yen papaal Yiesu sann po.
44009028	Lan cil l youg, Sɔl bo be yen Yiesu sundi i. U bo yegd yen banm i, g waa g muand Yendu maam yen papaal, Yonmdaan sann po, Serusalɛm doug n.
44009029	U bo pag yen Suif‑nba nba maad grɛk nyan mɔ bonciɛnn, k l tan tien mɔniɛɔg, k b ji kpaan k ban kpi’ug.
44009030	Sɔl lieb n gbad nnyan, k b tug’o g gad yen’o Sesaare, g te k u kun Tars.
44009031	L youg, yab bo dug Yiesu po, g be Suude yen Galile yen Samari bo be b yam n, k b dindann pugd, k b cɔln Yonmdaan, g Foŋanm tod’b g niib pugd bonciɛnn b po.
44009032	Piɛr bo waa doug n naan buol kul. Diyenn, k u tan gad g can yab bo dug Yiesu po g kua Lida,
44009033	g la jua nne k u be l buol k b yi’ug Ene. U bo yiɛl i, k u gbanu kpe k u dua dunduanu po. Wan bo duan l yiɛlu bina nniin n nyan.
44009034	Lann i g Piɛr maad’o: « Ene, Yiesu Kristo paag’a no. Fiil g ŋanm a dunduanu. » L youg mɔno k Ene fiil.
44009035	Lida niib yen Sarɔn niib n la nnyan, k b kul gaal Yonmdaan.
44009036	Jope doug n bo mɔg puo nne k u dug Yiesu po k b yi’ug Tabita, (g Grɛk‑nba maam n k b yi’ug Dɔrkas). U bo tie ŋanm bonciɛnn g biɛ tod tali.
44009037	K l tuu k l dana n ninŋ, g yiɛlu suol’o, k u kpe. K b wul’o g duo g duan’o detuadug po.
44009038	G Yiesu ŋuantieb gbad g Piɛr be Lida. Jope bo g fag yen Lida. Lann i k b sun niib banle k b gad g maad’o k wan di sugl g baal tonm nii.
44009039	G Piɛr fiil l youg mɔno g ŋuan’m. Ban pund yaa youg, k b duo yen’o detuadug po. G pekɔa kul baal u buol g buud, g ŋɔnŋ’o liɛdbid yen liɛdgbenŋa nba k wano Dɔrkas daan tu luug youg nba k u daan be yen’m.
44009040	G Piɛr te k b nyan niib kul, k u gbaan g jaand g tan tol u nunŋ kuum n dua naan po, g maad: « Tabita, fiil. » K u ligd ninbina. Wan la Piɛr, k u fiil g kal.
44009041	G Piɛr suol u nuu, g fiin g sen’o. Lann i, g yiin yab dug Yiesu po yen pekɔa g ŋɔn’m k u fo.
44009042	G Jope yab kul gbad yal tien, g niib bonciɛnn tuo g ŋuan Yonmdaan.
44009043	Piɛr bo g luol g tien dana ŋanŋaa Jope doug n, gbanjabl nne ŋaag, k b yi’ug Simɔn.
44010001	Jua nne bo be Sesaare doug n, k b yi’ug Kɔrnai. U bo tie Rom sijenm ciɛn i, g kub sijenm kobg u yul po, k b be cagl nne ninŋ k b yi l cagl « Itali sijenm ».
44010002	U bo tie nil nba k u pal pien i, k u biɛ jie Yendu, wano yen u ŋaag yab kul. U bo tod Suif‑nba buolu n ninŋ taladdanm, g biɛ jaand youg kul.
44010003	G diyenn, daajuoug kud muntaa po, k l tien’o nyan danŋd nyan, k u la Yonmdaan malɛg ninprurr. G malɛg kua u buol g yed g « Kɔrnai ! »
44010004	G Kɔrnai yaad g diid’o g jiwaani kua’ɔg k u bual malɛg: « Yonmdaan, laabaal tie bɛ i? » G malɛg ŋmiɛn’o: « A jaandi yen todl nba kul k a tod tali pund Yendu buol. U tiɛn l po.
44010005	Ji sun niib mɔlane mɔno Jope doug n, k ban daan yiin Simɔn, yua k b yi’ug Piɛr nyan.
44010006	U be Simɔn gbanjabl ŋaag. L ŋaag kpiɛ yen mɔgl i. »
44010007	Malɛg nba bo maad yen Kɔrnai n yaad g ŋaa’ɔg, k u yiin u tuonsunna banle yen u sijenm nba guu’ug nyan ninŋ yend, yua k u pal pien,
44010008	g dugn’m yal tien kul. Lann i g sun’m Jope doug n.
44010009	Lan fann k b paa sɔnu po g tan nagd doug n, l sua g Piɛr duo deliɛkaɔg po g bu jaand. L bo tie yensikpikpalg n i.
44010010	G kom suol’o k u kpaan k wan di. Ban tie jied yaa youg nba, k l tien’o nyan danŋd nyan,
44010011	k u la g polu po luod g bonn nne juan g ji, g naan cincenciɛɔnŋ k l mɔgbana ŋanna kul luol. L bo jiid g daan sii tinŋ i.
44010012	L n ninŋ, bonkobd nba mɔg titala ŋanna kul bo be, g tinŋ n bonbalnkaa kul be, g polu po bonyugda kul be.
44010013	K u gbad g niɛlu nne maad’o: « Piɛr, fiil g kpi g ŋman. »
44010014	G Piɛr ŋmiɛn: « Kai Yonmdaan ! N g ban g dii jied nba k b kuan’ti, lann i kaa jɔgnd jied. »
44010015	K l niɛlu guan g maad’o taal munle po: « Yendu n ŋanm yal nba, ŋan daa yed k l tie kual. »
44010016	K l tien’o nnyan g daan biin taal muntaa. K l cincenciɛɔnŋ guan g duo polu po g bod.
44010017	K l yaa g lid Piɛr bonciɛnn, k u ji bual u kua k wan la yal ne niimn tie bɛ i ? L youg, l sua g Kɔrnai n bo sun niib nba nyan, bual bual g bann Simɔn ŋaag n be naan, g baal g ji sie dimɔb n i.
