44010018	Lann i k b yiin g bual: « L tie mɔni i g Simɔn nba k b yi’ug Piɛr nyan be ŋaag ne ninŋ ii ? »
44010019	Piɛr daa bo mali wan la yal po i, g Foŋanm maad’o: « Diid, niib bantaa kpaan’a.
44010020	Fiil g jiid g ŋuan’m g daa mali munle-le, g dugn min n sun’m. »
44010021	Lann i g Piɛr jiid b buol, g maad’b: « Min n tie yua nba k i kpaan’o. I paa k l man ii ? »
44010022	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « Rom sijenm ciɛn Kɔrnai n sun’ti a buol. U tie nimɔn i, g jie Yendu, g Suif‑nba cɔlm’o. Yendu malɛg n cegl’o, k wan te k ŋan baal u buol, k wan cenŋ ŋan mɔg yal g bu maad’o. »
44010023	G Piɛr te k b kua l ŋaag n, k b duan l nyiɛɔg. K l fann, k banm yen Piɛr yeg g lebd. G Jope yab nba dug Yiesu po nyan ninŋ yenm ciɛn’m.
44010024	K l wonn po, k b pund Sesaare. L sua g Kɔrnai yiin u naataani yen u dɔnn‑nba g guu’b.
44010025	Piɛr n kua ŋaag n yaa youg, g Kɔrnai tuog’o, g gbaan u nintual n, g pug’o.
44010026	Ama g Piɛr gbaa g suol u nuu g fiin’o g maad: « Fiil, g dugn n mɔ tie nil nyan fin nyan i. »
44010027	K wano yen Piɛr ji yeg g pag g kua dieog n. Ban kua dieog n, g Piɛr la g niib tigl g g mɔg dindin,
44010028	k u maad’b: « I ban k tinm Suif‑nba yiko g cab g Suif ń gii be yen buolfanu nil, lann i kaa wan kua u ŋaag n ninŋ. Ama g Yendu yen maad’n k min daa nyuan sua k u jɔgn, lann i kaa k u g dagd yen min gii nagd’o.
44010029	L po n te ŋan yiin’n yaa youg nba, k n g yie yen min baal. N ji bua min bann yal po te k a yiin’n i. »
44010030	G Kɔrnai maad’o: « Daa ŋanna n nyan, l youg n ne, k n daan jaand n ŋaag ne, daajuoug kud muntaa jaandi, g tan la jua nne k u liɛ tiɛpiend k l nyili g tuud, k u kua g sed n buol,
44010031	g maad: “ Kɔrnai, Yendu gaal a jaandi, u g sunn todl nba k a tod tali nyan po.
44010032	Lann, sun niib Jope doug n, g te g Simɔn, yua k b yi’ug Piɛr nyan ń baal. U be Simɔn gbanjabl ŋaag. L ŋaag kpiɛ yen mɔgl i. ”
44010033	L youg mɔno k n sun k b yiin’a, k a tuo g baal. Mɔlane t kul ji taan g be Yendu nintual n i, g bu cenŋ Yonmdaan n yed k a maad’ti yal. »
44010034	Lann i g Piɛr gaal maam g maad: « Mɔlane, n ji bann yen mɔni g Yendu g mɔg lugdm.
44010035	Nil kul, u gii tie baa buolu nba, g cɔln Yendu, g suun tuona nba tuag mamɔni sɔnu, Yendu pal man u po.
44010036	Yendu bo tie Israyɛl buolu u laabaal. L Laabamann tie, g Yiesu Kristo po n te g manu kal Yendu yen niib siign, wano Yiesu n tie niib kul Yonmdaan.
44010037	I kul ban yal nba tien Suude doug n ninŋ kul. San bo muand niib u nyunwulu yo, g bona kul fid g cil Galile g ji yad Suude doug n.
44010038	I biɛ ban Yendu n yad u Foŋanm paalu nand nba Nasarɛt Yiesu po. Yendu bo be yen’o k u waa doug n naan kul, g tie ŋanm g biɛ paagd niib nba kul bo be Sitaan nuu n, g dugn Yendu bo be yen’o.
44010039	Tinm la wan tien yal nba kul Serusalɛm yen Suif‑nba n l kua naan kul. B kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po i k u kpe.
44010040	Ama daa ŋantaa daal, g Yendu yied’o kpienm siign, g te k u legd g ŋɔn u kua.
44010041	Niib kul kaa bo la’ɔg, ama tinm nba g Yendu bo tuod g lugd’ti, k t tie u sieda‑nba n la’ɔg. Wan yied, tinm n taan g dii g biɛ nyuu yen’o.
44010042	K u maad’ti k tin gii muand niib Yendu maam g biɛ gii ŋɔnŋ’b yen mɔni k wano Yiesu n tie yua nba g Yendu lugd’o, k u bu bu fuodb yen kpienm buud.
44010043	Yendu sogni‑nba kul bo maad wano i g tua g yaa daan nba kul dug u po, u bu la u biid sugl. »
44010044	Piɛr daa bo g maad g gbenn mɔno g Foŋanm jiid yab nba kul bo cenŋ u maam nyan po.
44010045	K l yaa g lid Suif‑nba nba dug Yiesu po g bo ciɛn Piɛr nyan, yen ban la g Yendu te k u Foŋanm jiid hal yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba mɔ yaa po.
44010046	B ji bo gbiɛ k b maad mabuoli nba k b g ban g gbad i, g biɛ dond Yendu.
44010047	Lann i g Piɛr maad: « Yab nba gaal Foŋanm nyan tinm nyan, t biɛ bu fid g yie g kan wul’b nyum ii ? »
44010048	G cab mɔb k ban wul’b nyum Yiesu Kristo sann po. Lann i k b ji miɛl’o k wan tien daa ŋanŋaa b buol.
44011001	Yiesu sundi yen Suude yab nba bo dug u po bo gbad, g yab g tie Suif‑nba mɔ tuo g gaal Yendu maam.
44011002	Youg nba g Piɛr guan g lebd Serusalɛm, yab nba bo kɔnd Suif‑nba kɔnd, g dug Yiesu po, bo jalg’o
44011003	g maad: « Laabaal k a gad g kua yab g kɔnd ŋaag n ninŋ g biɛ dii yen’m i ? »
44011004	Lann i g Piɛr cil g dugn’m lan daan cil nand, g yed:
44011005	« N daan be Jope doug n i g jaand, k l tan tien’n nyan danŋd nyan k n la bonn nne k l nyiɛ polu po g ji. L bonn daan naan cincenciɛɔnŋ u, k l mɔgbana ŋanna kul luol k l jiid g tan pund n buol.
44011006	K n ŋanm g diid l n ninŋ, g la bonkobd nba mɔg titala nna‑na yen muaɔg n bonkobd yen bonbalnkaa yen bonyugda.
44011007	K n gbad g niɛlu nne maad’n: “ Piɛr, fiil g kpi g ŋman. ”
44011008	Ama k n ŋmiɛn’o: Kai Yonmdaan ! Hal min be min be o, jɔgnd bonn lann i kaa ban kuan’ti yal daa g ban g kua n mɔb n.
44011009	K l niɛlu biɛ guan g maad’n taal munle po: “ Yendu n ŋanm yal nba, ŋan daa yed k l tie kual. ”
44011010	L daan tien nnyan i g daan biin taal muntaa, g guan g duo polu po.
44011011	K l youg mɔno, g niib bantaa pund ŋaag nba ninŋ k t daan be. B daan sun’m k b nyiɛ Sesaare g baal n buol.
44011012	G Foŋanm maad’n k min fiil gii ŋua’b g daa mali munle-le. Niib banluob nba ne, banm n daan ciɛn’n k t yeg g gad Kɔrnai ŋaag.
44011013	K u dugn’ti g maad: “ N daan la malɛg n ŋaag n, k u maad’n k n sun niib Jope doug n, k ban daan yiin Simɔn, yua k b yi’ug Piɛr.
44011014	U bu maad’a maam nba bu te ŋan la fielu, fin yen a ŋaag yab kul. ”
44011015	Min tan cil yaa youg g maad, g Foŋanm jiid Kɔrnai yen u ŋaag yab kul po, nyan lan bo jiid t po cilg youg nand nyan.
44011016	L youg mɔno k n tiɛd Yonmdaan n bo maad yal nba. U bo maad: “ San bo wul niib yen nyum i, yinm nuan, b tan bu wul’i yen Foŋanm i. ”
44011017	Tin daan dug Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po g Yendu tie’ti paab nba, u gii pii’b l paab, n tie ŋmaa i g bu yie Yendu n tien yal b po i ? »
44011018	Ban cenŋ Piɛr maam g gbenn, k b pala sɔnŋ, k b ji dond Yendu g tua: « Yendu cab yab g tie Suif‑nba mɔ k ban lebd b binbem g la miɛl nba kan gbenn. »
44011019	B bo kpii Etiɛnn, k l puol po g cicagm baa yab dug Yiesu po. K b yad g yenm gad Fenisi, g lieb gad Sipr, g lieb mɔ gad Antiyɔs. Ama b bo muand Suif‑nba kua i Yendu maam.
44011020	G nyaan b ninŋ, yenm bo be g nyiɛ Sipr yen Siirɛnn, g gad Antiyɔs g muand yab nba g tie Suif‑nba Yonmdaan Yiesu Laabamann.
44011021	Yonmdaan paalu bo be yen’m. L po n te g bonciɛnn bo tuo g gaal Yonmdaan g te u ŋuantieb.
44011022	Serusalɛm Kristo tintaanu yab bo gbad l maam g sun Barnabas Antiyɔs doug n.
44011023	Wan pund g la g Yendu ŋalbalg be yen Yiesu ŋuantieb, k u pal manŋ bonciɛnn. K u paan b pala k ban ŋanm gii ŋua Yonmdaan yen b pala kul.
44011024	U bo tie nimɔn i, g gbie yen Foŋanm, g mɔg dindann. L po n te g niib bonciɛnn bo tuo g ŋuan Yonmdaan.
44011025	Lann i g Barnabas gad Tars g kpaan Sɔl.
44011026	Wan la’ɔg, k u gad yen’o Antiyɔs. K banm banle kul tien binmunn g be Antiyɔs Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ, g ŋɔnŋ niib bonciɛnn bona niimn. Antiyɔs doug n i, k b cind g yiin Yiesu ŋuantieb, Kristo‑yab.
44011027	L dana n ninŋ, g Yendu sogni‑nba nyiɛ Serusalɛm g jiid Antiyɔs.
44011028	B ninŋ, yend, yua k b bo yi’ug Agabus, Yendu Foŋanm bo te k u maad g kom bu baa ŋanduna n ninŋ kul. L kom kon bo tan baa g sua g Klod n tie Rom bad.
44011029	Lann i g Yiesu ŋuantieb tug yanjagl, g maad g yua kul ń te wan mɔg yal, k ban tod Suude Kristo‑yab.
44011030	B bo taan lann i g sun Barnabas yen Sɔl, k b gad g tie Suude Kristo‑yab nikpela.
44012001	L youg g Bad Erod cil g cagn Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ yenm,
44012002	g te k b kpii Saak yen jug. Saak bo tie San ninja i.
44012003	Erod n la g Suif‑nba pala manŋ l po, k u biɛ te k b suol Piɛr mɔ. L bo tie youg nba k b tu ŋman kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan i.
44012004	Erod n te k b suol Piɛr k u luon’o, u bo te g sijenm caga ŋanna n guu’ug. Cagl n ninŋ kul bo mɔg sijenm banna i. U bo guu g Suif‑nba fielu jaanm po ń pend yo, wan fid g bu’ug niib kul nunŋ n.
44012005	Piɛr bo be dansaldieog n i, g Kristo tintaanu yab l jaand u po yen ninmɔnn.
44012006	Nyiɛɔg nba bo bu pend, lan fann Erod ń bu Piɛr niib kul nunŋ n, l nyiɛɔg, l sua g Piɛr luol yen kudsiseli yinle, g dua sijenm banle siign, g gɔ. G sijelieb sie dimɔb n g guu.
44012007	Lann i g malɛg tan kpil g legd, g yinyiem yend dieog, k u paa paa Piɛr logl, g fiin’o g maad: « Fiil tonm. » L youg mɔno, g kudsiseli nyiɛ u nui po g baa.
44012008	G malɛg biɛ maad’o: « Lol a gbann g pil a taacaad. » G Piɛr tien nnyan. G malɛg guan g maad’o: « Liɛ a gbagdl gii ŋua. »
44012009	G Piɛr ŋuan malɛg g nyiɛ. U bo g ban g malɛg n tien yal tie mɔni. U bo mali k l tie danŋd i.
44012010	K b pend cincinn cagl sijenm, g guan g pend munle po yab g ji pund dimɔjal nba k l gann tien yen kuda nyan buol. L dimɔb bo tuol yen sɔnu nba saa doug n i. K l gann luod l kukua k b nyiɛ g tug sɔnu g saa. K b tan pund l sɔnu juog, g malɛg kpil g yaad g ŋaa Piɛr.
44012011	L youg u g Piɛr ji fid g bann yal nba tien g maad: « Mɔlane, n ji bann k l tie mɔni i g Yonmdaan sun u malɛg k wan baal g fiel’n Erod nui n, g biɛ nyan’n bonbiiug nba ninŋ g Suif‑nba bo mali k ban kuan’n. »
44012012	Wan gbad l niimn k u gad Mari ŋaag. Wano Mari bo tie San nba k b yi’ug Mark nyan naa i. L buol, Kristo‑yab bonciɛnn bo taan g jaand.
44012013	Piɛr n pund g kuo kuo dimɔjal gann, g sipaan nba suun l buol k b yi’ug Rode nyan baal k wan diid.
44012014	Wan bann k l tie Piɛr niɛlu, k u pal manŋ g pend, k u ŋaa gann luodu, g san g lebd u lieb buol, g maad’b g Piɛr be dimɔb n.
44012015	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « A baa waad i ! » Ama k u ŋanm g maad k wano i, k l tie mɔni i. K b maad k lann l yen baa tie u malɛg i.
44012016	L sua g Piɛr l sie g pua gann i. K b luod g la k l tie wano, k l suol’b yaalidug.
44012017	G Piɛr ŋag’b nuu g maad k ban suon. Lann i g dugn’m Yonmdaan n tien nand g nyan’o dansaldieog n ninŋ. G biɛ maad: « Gad man g maad Saak yen t ninjanm Kristo‑yab nba tenn. » L puol po, k u nyiɛ l buol g tol siɛl po.
44012018	Lan fann, g nyɔgl tien hal bonciɛnn sijenm siign. K b ji bual g Piɛr ji juod lɛ yaa a ?
44012019	K Erod sun k b kpaan’o naan kul, ama b yen g la’ɔg. Lann i k u bual sijenm nba bo guu Piɛr nyan buali, g cab mɔb k ban kpi’b. L puol po, g bad Erod nyiɛ Suude g gad Sesaare, g tien daa ŋanŋaa l po.
44012020	Erod pal bo bie Tiir yen Sidɔn niib po bonciɛnn. K b taan mɔb g bu gad g la’ɔg, g baa yen Blastus, yua bo guu bad n dua naan, k b gad g miɛl Erod sugl g laafiɛ ń gii be. G dugn b jied kul bo nya u doug n i.
44012021	Ban bo bu la Erod yaa daal bo pund, k Erod liɛ u kpanbatiɛd, g kal u badkog po, g pii laabaal niib kul nunŋ n.
44012022	G niib kul ji yign g maad g yendu n maad ne, k l g tie nisaal kaa.
44012023	K l youg mɔno, g Yonmdaan malɛg baal g pua’ɔg, g dugn u bo gaal Yendu yudand. G nanguba ŋman ŋman’o k u kpe.
44012024	Ama Yendu maam nuan bo l yad naan kul i.
44012025	Barnabas yen Sɔl n bo sun b tuonn g gbenn Serusalɛm doug n, b bo tug San, yua k b yi’ug Mark nyan, k b kul lebd Antiyɔs.
44013001	Antiyɔs Kristo‑yab tintaanu n, Yendu sogni‑nba bo be, g yab tund niib Yendu maam mɔ be. Lan tie Barnabas yen Simeyɔn yua k b yi’ug Nibɔnn, yen Siirɛnn jua Lusiyus, yen Manayɛn yua k b bo taan g ŋub’o yen gobna Erod. Sɔl mɔ bo be.
44013002	G diyenn k b lol mɔb g dond Yonmdaan g Foŋanm maad’b: « Lugd man Barnabas yen Sɔl k ban sun tuonn nba k n yiin’m k ban sun. »
44013003	Ban lol mɔb g jaand g gbenn, k b maan nui Barnabas yen Sɔl po g ji cab’b k ban gii saa.
44013004	Lann i g Foŋanm sun’m k b gad Selesi. L buol i, k b kua ŋadunŋ g gad doug nne ninŋ g nyum kaan g lind, k b yi Sipr.
44013005	Ban tan pund Salamiinn doug n, k b muand Yendu maam Suif‑nba tintaann died n. San Mark bo be yen’m g tod’b.
44013006	K b nyiɛ l buol g tɔgn Sipr doi n ninŋ kul, g daan pund doug nba juod k b yi Pafɔs, g la nyɔgdaan nne k u yi u kua k u tie Yendu sogni. U bo tie Suif i, k b yi’ug Bar‑Yiesu.
44013007	U bo be gobna Sɛrgiyus Pɔlus buol i. L gobna yam bo fo. Wano n bo tan yiin Barnabas yen Sɔl g bua yen u pal kul wan cenŋ Yendu maam.
44013008	Ama g yua bo tie belbɔnd, g Grɛk‑nba maam n k b yi’ug Elimas nyan, bo yie g kpaan k wan bel Sipr gobna k wan daa tuo g gaal Yendu maam.
44013009	Lann i g Sɔl, yua k b biɛ bo yi’ug Pɔl nyan, bo gbie yen Foŋanm g nyuan’o suoo g tan maad:
44013010	« A tie nil nba gbie yen janmi g biɛ gbie yen tonu i. A tie Sitaan bija i, g mɔg nanŋ yal ŋan kul po. Bɛ youg po i, k a tan bu ŋaa g kan biil Yonmdaan sɔni i ?
44013011	Mɔlane po, cenŋ ne. Yonmdaan bu dad a tubl g te ŋan juan. L bu yann k a ninbinn g la yendu yinyiem. » L youg mɔno k u juan g ji jiln g kpaan yua nba bu dadb’o.
44013012	Sipr gobna n la yal nba bo tien yen wan bo cenŋ tundl nba Yonmdaan po, k l sii u pal hal bonciɛnn k u tuo g gaal Yiesu.
44013013	Pɔl yen u yegni bo nyiɛ Pafɔs g tug ŋadunŋ g gad Pɛrse, Panfili doug n. L buol i g San Mark ŋaa’b g lebd Serusalɛm.
44013014	Lann i g Barnabas yen Pɔl nyiɛ Pɛrse g gad Antiyɔs, Pisidi doug n. G Saaba daal k b kua Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n ninŋ g kal.
44013015	Ban lii Moyis kadaaɔg yen Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg g gbenn, k l tintaann dieog n canbaa‑nba sun k b maad’b: « T ninjanm, i gii mɔg siɛl yaa lanbona g bu paan niib pala, yin gaal maam g maad. »
44013016	Lann i g Pɔl fiil g ŋag nuu g maad: « Israyɛl buolu yen yinm yab nba jie Yendu, cenŋ man ne:
44013017	Israyɛl yab, Yendu n bo lugd t yaajanm, g te k b mal g yabd youg nba k b bo be Esipt doug n g tie saanm. K u paalu po k u yuand g te k b nyiɛ Esipt doug n.
44013018	Wano n bo kub’b bina piinna tinkuonŋ n ninŋ,
44013019	g biɛ pua g yaan buoli ŋanlile Kanaan doug n, g tug b tinŋ g tie’b.
44013020	L kul ne bo tien bina kobiinna yen piinmu siign i. L puol po k u lugd t yaajanm siign buuddanm saa yen Yendu sogni Samiɛl youg.
44013021	K b yuand g bual bad po, g Yendu tie’b Kis bija Saawul, k u kaln kog po bina piinna. U bo tie Bɛnsamɛn cugl n jua i.
44013022	G Yendu tan yie’og g lugd Dafiid k u te b bad. Yendu bo maad wano i g tua: “ N la Sese bija Dafiid, u dagd n po g bu fid g tien min bual yal kul. ”
44013023	Wano Dafiid yaabuona n ninŋ i, g Yendu lugd Yiesu k wan fiel Israyɛl buolu nyan wan bo puon nand nyan.
44013024	San bo liid g muand Israyɛl buolu k ban lebd b binbem g wul nyum ; l bo sua g Yiesu daa g baal.
44013025	San tuonn n ji bo saa g bua n gbenn, u bo maad: “ Yin mali k n tie yua nba nyan, n g tie wano kaa. N puol po sua be g baad. N g dagd yen min lod u taacagbani. ”
44013026	N ninjanm, yinm nba tie Abraham yaabuona yen yinm nba jie Yendu, Yendu sun k b maad tinm i l fielu maam.
44013027	Serusalɛm yab yen b yudanm bo g bann Yiesu n tie yua. B biɛ bo g gbad Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg nba k b lii Saaba daal kul niimn. L po n te k b bo jalg Yiesu. Nnyan, k b tien Yendu sogni‑nba n bo liid g maad yal.
44013028	B bo g la ban bu jalg’o yal nba po g kpi’ug. Yen l kul, b yen bo miɛl Pilat k wan te k ban biɛn’o.
44013029	Ban tien’o nyan lan bo liid g diɛn nand u po Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ nyan, k b nyan’o dapunpɔnn po g jiin’o kakul n ninŋ.
44013030	Ama g Yendu te k u yied kpienm siign.
44013031	G niib nba bo yegd yen’o g nyiɛ Galile g gad Serusalɛm nyan la’ɔg dana bonciɛnn. Banm n ji tie u sieda‑nba mɔlane Israyɛl niib buol.
44013032	Tinm mɔno, t muand’i l Laabamann n nyan. Laabamann nba g Yendu bo puon t yaajanm.
44013033	U tien lann n nyan tinm nba tie b yaabuona po, g yied Yiesu nyan lan diɛn Biɛyani kadaaɔg n lanmgbenŋa ŋanle buol nand nyan. L bo diɛn g maad: “ A tie n Bija i. Dinne min n tie a Baa. ”
44013034	Yendu bo maad k u bu yied Yiesu kpienm siign, k wan ji daa ban g kpe. U bo maad lann i g tua: “ N bu te’i bona nba k n bo puon Dafiid, yal ŋan g dagd g biɛ bu tien yen mɔni. ”
44013035	L po n te k l biɛ bo diɛn siɛl buol g maad: “ A kan ŋaa a niŋan gbannand ń bed kakul n. ”
44013036	Dafiid nuan n bo be yaa youg, u bo sun Yendu tuonn nyan Yendu n bo bua nand nyan i, k l puol po k u kpe, k b pii’ug g kpiɛn u yaajanm k u gbannand yen bed.
44013037	Ama Yendu n yied yua nba, u yaa gbannand g la g bed.
44013038	N ninjanm, l tie k yin bann ne i, Yiesu po n te k b muand’i biid sugl maam. Moyis yiko bo g fid g piin i biid. Ama yab nba kul dug Yiesu po, b biid bu piin.
44013040	Lann, suol man i kua g daa ŋaa Yendu sogni‑nba n bo maad yal ń baal’i. B bo maad:
44013041	“ Yinm nba nund Yendu maam ne, diid man, n bu tien bonn g sua k i daa be g mɔg miɛl ne, k lan lid’i k yin bod. L bo gii tie g nil n maad’i l bonn, i bo kan tuo. ” »
44013042	Pɔl yen Barnabas n tan nyiɛ tintaann dieog n yaa youg, k b maad’b, k ban daan guan Saaba daal nba ŋua g biɛ pag yen’m l maam po.
44013043	Tintaanu n gbenn k b yad, g Suif‑nba yen yab nba bo kua Suif‑nba jaandi, b ninŋ bonciɛnn bo ŋuan Pɔl yen Barnabas. K b pag yen’m g pugn’m papaal k ban gii be Yendu ŋalbalg n.
44013044	L Saaba daal n pund, g doug n niib kul ŋman g tigl g bu gbad Yonmdaan maam.
44013045	Suif‑nba n la niwulug, k b fiil yen nanŋ Pɔl po, g nai u maam g sugd’o.
44013046	Lann i g Pɔl yen Barnabas maad’b g g jie baa siɛl: « B daa bo bu cind g muand yinm i Yendu maam. Ama yin yie l maam, g biɛ diid g sua k i g dagd yen yin la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn nyan, to, lann t ji bu gad g muand yab g tie Suif‑nba i.
44013047	G dugn Yonmdaan n tie’ti mɔbonn nba n ne: “ Min n tug’a k a gii tie ŋanduna yinyiem, g fid g muand fielu maam ŋanduna n ninŋ kul ”. »
44013048	Yab g tie Suif‑nba n gbad l maam, k b pala manŋ bonciɛnn, k b ji tua g Yonmdaan maam man. G yab kul bo tie k ban la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn, tuo g gaal Kristo.
44013049	Nnyan i g Yonmdaan maam bo yad l doug n kaannaa kul.
44013050	Ama g Suif‑nba tud tud b tintaanu n ninŋ puoŋalmandanm yen doug n yudanm, k b biil biil maam k b kul fiil g yie Pɔl yen Barnabas po, g bel’b g nyan’m b doug n.
44013051	Lann i g Pɔl yen Barnabas pid pid tangulunŋ b titala po k l ŋɔnŋ k l la banm i, g nyiɛ l buol g gad Ikoniyɔm.
44013052	Kristo‑yab nba bo be Antiyɔs nuan bo be pamann n i, g biɛ gbie yen Foŋanm.
44014001	Pɔl yen Barnabas bo pund Ikoniyɔm, g yaan gad g kua Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n, g maad maam hal k l kua Suif‑nba yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba pala n, g bonciɛnn tuo g gaal Yiesu.
44014002	Ama g Suif‑nba nba bo g tuo b maam nyan, tud tud yab bo g tie Suif‑nba k b yam nyiɛ b ninjanm nba tie Kristo‑yab n ninŋ.
44014003	G Pɔl yen Barnabas kal g wai Ikoniyɔm doug n. B bo dug Yonmdaan po, g muand u maam g g jie baa siɛl. G Yonmdaan ŋɔn k u ŋalbalg be yen’m, g te k b tie yaalidug bona yen palug.
44014004	L doug n niib ji bo bɔgd caga ŋanle i, g yenm ŋua Suif‑nba g lieb mɔ ŋua Yiesu sundi.
44014005	Suif‑nba yen yab g tie Suif‑nba yen b yudanm bo bobnd g bu cagn Pɔl yen Barnabas g biɛ jaa’b tana g kpi’b.
44014006	Ama banm banle n gbad l maam yaa youg, k b san g gad Listr g tuad Dɛrb yen l dingbankunkogi n. L doi be Likaaɔni tinŋ n i.
44014007	L po mɔ k b biɛ muand Laabamann.
44014008	Listr doug n bo mɔg jua nne k u titala kul kpe. B bo mal’o k u tie wabg i, u bo g ban g sonm palb.
44014009	G diyenn k u tan kal g cenŋ Pɔl maam, g Pɔl nyuan’o suoo g la k u dug k u bu fid g paag.
44014010	K u maad’o yen paalu: « Fiil g sed a titala po. » K u yug g cii, g ji sonm.
44014011	Niwulug nuan n l la Pɔl n tien yal, k b yign yen paalu banm Likaaɔni yab maam n g maad: « T yendui n kpand niib g jiid t buol. »
44014012	Lann i k b pul Barnabas « Seos », g pul Pɔl mɔ « Ɛrmɛs », g dugn wano n bo tun g maad.
44014013	G yua bo tu yid yendu Seos salg nyan, tug tiidi puud g tien laani g lan naatona g baal yen’m doug dimɔb n. K wano yen niwulug bu yid Pɔl yen Barnabas salg.
44014014	Ban gbad nnyan, k b dad g pad b tiɛd, g san g kua niwulug n g ta g maad:
44014015	« T ninjanm, laabaal k i tie nnyan i ? T mɔ tie niib nyan yinm nyan i. T baal g muand’i Laabamann i, k l tie k yin ŋaa yin naan bona nba g yi g yendui, k l yen g mɔg niimn nyan, g ji tug i kua g cab Yendu nba fo, g tag polu yen tinŋ yen mɔgl, yen bona nba kul be l kul ne ninŋ.
44014016	Youg nba pend Yendu bo ŋaa g buolu kul tuag u yul po sɔnu i.
44014017	Ama yen l kul ne, Yendu nba be polu po bo tie’b ŋanm g ŋɔnŋ’b u buam ; g te g taag baa, g te g jied tie siɛɔg kul, g biɛ te k b be pamann n. »
44014018	Pɔl yen Barnabas n bo l maad’b yal kul, b bo la fala bonciɛnn yo, g tan pan’m k b g fid g yid’b salg.
44014019	L youg g Suif‑nba nyiɛ Ikoniyɔm yen Antiyɔs nba be Pisidi nyan, g baal g sagn niwulug yen Pɔl‑nba, g jaa Pɔl tana g tan mali k u kpe i, g fil g nyan’o doug n.
44014020	G Kristo‑yab baal g sed g lind’o, k u fiil g kua doug n. K l fann k wano yen Barnabas gad Dɛrb doug n.
44014021	Ban muand Laabamann l doug n, g niib bonciɛnn te Kristo‑yab, k b lebd Listr yen Ikoniyɔm yen Antiyɔs nba be Pisidi nyan.
44014022	B bo paand Kristo‑yab pala, k ban ŋanm gii sie dindann n. B bo maad: « T bu la fala bonciɛnn yo, g fid g kua Yendu diem n. »
44014023	Lann i k b lugd nikpela Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ kul, g lol mɔb g jaand b po, g tug’b g kubn’m Yonmdaan nuu n, wano nba k b dug u po.
44014024	G nyiɛ l buol, g pend Pisidi g gad Panfili doug n,
44014025	g daan muand Yendu maam Pɛrse, yen Atali.
44014026	L buol i k b tug ŋadunŋ g lebd Antiyɔs. L doug n i, g Kristo‑yab bo miɛl Yendu ŋalbalg, g kubn’m tuonn nba k b sun.
44014027	Ban pund l doug n, k b taan Kristo‑yab tintaanu niib, g dugn’m Yendu n te k b tien yal kul, yen lan tien nand g Yendu luod sɔnu, g buolfanu yab mɔ ji bann’o.
44014028	K b kal l buol yen Kristo‑yab g wai bonciɛnn.
44015001	Niib nne bo nyiɛ Suude g baal Antiyɔs g tund b ninjanm Kristo‑yab g maad: « I gii g te k b kɔnd’i nyan Moyis n bo ŋɔn nand nyan, i kan la fielu. »
44015002	Pɔl yen Barnabas bo g tuo l maam po, k b gag yen lieb hal bonciɛnn. Lann i g Kristo tintaanu tug yanjagl g sun Pɔl yen Barnabas yen lann Antiyɔs Kristo‑yab n ninŋ yenm, k ban gad Serusalɛm g daan la Yiesu sundi yen Kristo‑yab nikpela l maam po,
44015003	g tie’b bona nba bu tod’b ban gad l sɔnu. Ban saa, b nyiɛ Fenisi yen Samari i, g dugd niib, buolfanu yab n gaal Yendu nand. K l maam manŋ b ninjanm Kristo‑yab pala bonciɛnn.
44015004	Ban pund Serusalɛm, g Kristo‑yab tintaanu yen b nikpela yen Yiesu sundi gaal’b. Lann i k b dugn’m Yendu n te k b sun yal kul.
44015005	Ama g Farisiɛn-nba cagl n, yab bo te Kristo‑yab, yenm fiil g maad: « L tie k ban kɔnd Kristo‑yab nba g tie Suif‑nba, g biɛ te ban gii cɔln Moyis yiko i. »
44015006	G Yiesu sundi yen Kristo‑yab nikpela taan g kal g bu diid l maam.
44015007	B bo nai yen lieb k l wai yo, g Piɛr tan fiil g maad: « N ninjanm, i ban g Yendu lugd’n i siign k l wai, k min muand yab g tie Suif‑nba Laabamann k ban gbad g mɔ ń tuo g gaal Yiesu.
44015008	Yendu nba ban yal be niib pala n ninŋ, n tie’b Foŋanm nyan t mɔ nyan. G ŋɔn k u tuo g gaal’b.
44015009	U g tien baa siɛl yaa lugdm tinm yen banm siign. U penn b pala g dugn b dug u po.
44015010	Laabaal k i dalg Yendu, g tunŋ Kristo‑yab tugl nba k t yaajanm bo g fid g tug k tinm mɔno biɛ g fid g tug i ?
44015011	Ama Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ŋalbalg po i, k t dug k t la fielu nyan banm nyan. »
44015012	L youg, g yab bo be l buol kul suon. G Barnabas yen Pɔl dugn’m yaalidug bona nba yen palug nba g Yendu bo te k b tien yab g tie Suif‑nba siign. K b kul cenŋ.
44015013	Ban maad g gbenn, g Saak gaal maam g maad: « N ninjanm, cenŋ man n maam.
44015014	Simɔn dugn Yendu n cind g lugd niib nand, yab g tie Suif‑nba siign k ban te u buolu.
44015015	K l tuag yen Yendu sogni‑nba n bo maad yal ; g dugn Yendu Kadaaɔg n, Yonmdaan bo maad:
44015016	“ L po gii pend, n bu guan g maa Dafiid ŋaag nba bo baa. G ŋanm g fiin u digbeonŋ g sen.
44015017	L youg niib nba tenn bu kpaan Yonmdaan, banm yen buoli nba kul k n yiin’m k ban te n yab. Yonmdaan n maad yal nba n nyan.
44015018	U ŋɔn l bona kul hal youg n ninŋ yo ”. »
44015019	G Saak pugn g maad: « L po n te k min diid g sua k t bo kan gii pugd buolfanu yab tuga, yab tug b kua g cab Yendu.
44015020	Ama t diɛn g maad’b man, k ban suol b kua yen padnand yen cunconm yen bonkobd nba kpe k b g kod, g suol b kua g daa di sɔm.
44015021	G dugn hal youg n ninŋ yo, g niib lii Moyis kadaaɔg g muand dingbana kul n ninŋ, g biɛ lii tintaann died n Saaba daal kul. »
44015022	Lann i g Yiesu sundi yen Kristo‑yab nikpela yen Kristo‑yab tintaanu niib kul kal, g suol k l tie k ban lugd siɛb b ninŋ i, g sun’m k ban yeg yen Pɔl yen Barnabas g gad Antiyɔs. B bo lugd Silas yen Suud, yua k b bo yi’ug Barsabas. B bo tie niib nba k b ninjanm Kristo‑yab cɔln’m i.
44015023	Ban bo diɛn yal kadaaɔg n g tie’b k ban gad yenn n ne: « Yiesu sundi yen Kristo‑yab nikpela fuond b ninjanm Kristo‑yab nba g tie Suif‑nba g be Antiyɔs yen Siiri yen Silisi.
44015024	T gbad g niib nyiɛ t siign, g gad i buol yen maam g ŋmad i yam g kuan’i maalm, k t yen g sun’m.
44015025	L po n te k t taan mɔb g lugd niib t siign g sun’m k ban yeg yen t dɔnn‑nba Barnabas yen Pɔl, g gad i buol.
44015026	Banm nba tuo g lu b miɛl t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po.
44015027	T sun Suud yen Silas n nyan i buol k banm mɔno n maad’i tin diɛn’i yal.
44015028	Tinm mɔno yen Foŋanm diid g sua k l g dagd k tin gii pugd’i tuga, l gii g tie kɔa nba tie bonmɔnn k i kan fid g ŋaa kua i kaa.
44015029	Lan tie k i kan ŋman padnand, i kan di sɔm, i kan ŋman bonkobug nba kpe k b g kod, i kan gii conm. L gii tie k i ŋaa l bona kul ne, l baa ŋan. I be man pamann n. »
44015030	Lann i g yab nba k b bo sun’m nyan cab’b g gad Antiyɔs. Ban pund, k b tigl Kristo‑yab g tie’b l kadaaɔg.
44015031	Ban lii l kadaaɔg k l paan b pala, k b pala manŋ bonciɛnn.
44015032	Suud yen Silas mɔno bo tie Yendu sogni‑nba i. B bo maad maam bonciɛnn g paan b pala, g yed k ban ŋanm gii diɛ k l paa.
44015033	Ban tien dana ŋanŋaa, k b ninjanm Kristo‑yab nba be l buol cab’b k ban lebd g kun yab daan sun’m buol yen laafiɛ. [
44015035	G Pɔl yen Barnabas nuan be Antiyɔs, k banm yen b lieb bonciɛnn tund g biɛ muand niib Yonmdaan Laabamann.
44015036	Lan tien dana waam, g Pɔl maad Barnabas: « T lebd doi nba ninŋ kul k t daan muand Yonmdaan maam nyan, g gɔnn t ninjanm Kristo‑yab, g liɛ b be nle. »
44015037	Barnabas bo bua k b gii saa ban tug San, yua k b yi’ug Mark nyan i, k ban yeg.
44015038	Ama g Pɔl yie g Mark ji kan ŋuan’m ; g dugn Mark bo yie hal Panfili doug n yo, g paad, g g taan’m k b bu sun b tuonn.
44015039	B bo gag yen lieb bonciɛnn g tan juod g paad. G Barnabas tug Mark k b kua ŋadunŋ g gad Sipr.
44015040	G Pɔl mɔ tug Silas. K b ninjanm Kristo‑yab jaand g miɛl Yonmdaan ŋalbalg Pɔl po, k wano yen Silas tol,
44015041	g tɔgn Siiri yen Silisi doi n ninŋ g paand Kristo‑yab tintaanu niib pala.
44016001	Pɔl bo tan pund Dɛrb, g pend Listr. Listr doug n bo mɔg jua nne k u tie Yiesu ŋuantua k b yi’ug Timote. U naa bo tie Suif i, g tie Kristo‑yua. U baa n bo tie Grɛk.
44016002	Kristo‑yab nba bo be Listr yen Ikoniyɔm bo tun g maad g Timote tie nimɔn i.
44016003	Pɔl bo bua Timote ń te u yegnu. Lann i g tug’o g kɔnd’o, g dugn b bo be Suif‑nba siign i, g yua kul biɛ ban k u baa tie Grɛk.
44016004	Ban bo pend doi nba ninŋ, b bo maad Kristo‑yab k ban cɔln lanbona nba g Yiesu sundi yen Kristo‑yab nikpela suol Serusalɛm doug n.
44016005	L po bo te g Kristo‑yab pala paagd dindann n, g niib biɛ pugd b po daal kul.
44016006	Foŋanm bo yie g Pɔl yen Silas ń daa muand maam Asi dingbana n ninŋ. Lann i k b tɔgn Frisi yen Galasi.
44016007	Ban saa g daan nag Misi k b bign k ban gad Bitini. Ama g Yiesu Foŋanm g cab’b sɔnu.
44016008	Lann i k b tɔgn Misi g pend g gad Trowas.
44016009	G nyiɛɔg tan baal k l tien Pɔl nyan danŋd nyan, k u la Maseduann jua nne k u sie g baln’o g tua: « Baal Maseduann g tod’ti. »
44016010	Lan tien’o nnyan g pend, k t kpaan k tin gad Maseduann tonm ; k l maa t ji bo bann g Yendu yiin’ti l buol i, k tin muand u Laabamann.
44016011	Lann i k t kua ŋadunŋ Trowas doug n, g gbaa g gad tonm doug nba g nyum kaan g lind, k b yi Samotras nyan. K l fann, k t gad Neyapolis.
44016012	G nyiɛ ŋadunŋ n l buol g gad Filiip, Rom yab n bo yend yaa doug. Filiip bo tie Maseduann docincinn i. T bo g luol g tien dana ŋanŋaa l doug n.
44016013	Saaba daal k t nyiɛ doug kunŋ, g gad siɛl buol nne k l be bɔngbann. T bo mali k t bu la naan buol g Suif‑nba tu taand lieb g jaand i. K t baal g la puob, g kal g pag yen’m.
44016014	L puob n ninŋ, puo nne bo be g tie yua nba dond Yendu, k b yi’ug Lidi. U bo tie kpinkpendl i, g nyiɛ Tiatiir doug n, g kuad cabmɔna nba k l daaɔg paa. U bo cenŋ tin maad yal, g Yonmdaan fand’o k u tug Pɔl maam g bil u pal n ninŋ.
44016015	Tin wul wano yen u ŋaag yab nyum g gbenn, k u gɔgl’ti g maad: « Yin diid g sua k n dug Yonmdaan po nyan, lann baal man gii be n ŋaapo. » K u niid’ti k tin tuo.
44016016	Diyenn k t tan saa jaandi g daan tuog sipaan nne k u tie yonm, g mɔg nindanm. L nindanm n bo te k u tie ninnyuandaan. Wan bo nyuan bona nba g maad bo te k u canbaa‑nba laad ligli bonciɛnn.
44016017	U ji bo ŋua tinm yen Pɔl i, g yign yen paalu g maad: « Jab ne tie Yendu Badciɛn tuonsunna i.
44016018	B baal k ban ŋɔn’i yin bu tɔgn sɔnu nba g la fielu i. » L sipaan bo l ŋua g maad nnyan i daal kul. G Pɔl pal tan bie k u gbeg g gaal jad l nindanm po g maad: « Yiesu Kristo sann po, ŋaa man sipaan ne. » L youg mɔno g nindanm yaad g ŋaa’ɔg.
44016019	Yonm ŋann canbaa‑nba n la k b yonm ji kan fid g te ban la ligli nyan, k b suol Pɔl yen Silas g fil g gad yen’m niib n bo tu taand lieb naan, doug n yudanm buol.
44016020	G tuad yen’m buuddanm buol g maad’b: « Jab ne n ŋmad t doug. B tie Suif‑nba i
44016021	g tund niib b danm bogda, k l yen g cab k tinm Rom yab ń tuo, lann i kaa k tin gii tie l bogda. »
44016022	Lann i g niwulug mɔ fiil g yie b po. G buuddanm te k b dad g land Pɔl yen Silas tiɛd, g cab k ban pua’b gbana.
44016023	K b pua pua’b, g luon’m g nyaan maad yua guu nyan, k wan ŋanm gii guu’b.
44016024	G yua nba k b bo maad’o k wan ŋanm gii guu’b nyan, kuan’m dansaldieog n hal liig po, g kpaa’b.
44016025	Yɔugsiiug po, g Pɔl yen Silas tan jaand g yiin g dond Yendu, g dansallei cenŋ.
44016026	G tinŋ tan kpil g jeg yen paalu. G dansaldieog fiɛgl mig mig. L youg mɔno g gana kul luod, g kudsiseli nba bo luol dansali nyan mɔ lod lod.
44016027	G yua bo guu dansaldieog nyan nyuand g sua g dansaldieog gana luod. Lann i k u nɔd jug g bu kpi u kua, g dugn u bo mali g dansali kul yad o.
44016028	G Pɔl yign yen paalu g maad: « Daa tie a kua siɛl yaa bonbiiug ! T kul be ne. »
44016029	L youg g yua bo guu dansaldieog nyan ji jegl, g bual fidl po, g san g kua g baa g gbaan Pɔl yen Silas nintual n,
44016030	g tug’b g nyan’m cincann g bual’b: « Canbaa‑nba, n bu tien nle i g la fielu i ? »
44016031	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « I dug Yonmdaan Yiesu po, a bu la fielu fin yen a ŋaag yab. »
44016032	K b muand wano yen yab bo be u ŋaag n ninŋ kul Yonmdaan maam.
44016033	L youg mɔno k u tug’b l nyiɛɔg, g ŋuul b nala. K b wul wano yen u ŋaag yab kul nyum.
44016034	K u tug’b g duo yen’m u ŋaapo, g cand’b. Wano yen u ŋaag yab kul bo be pamann n, yen ban dug Yendu po.
44016035	Lan fann, g buuddanm sun b tuonsunna k ban gad g maad yua guu dansaldieog k wan ŋaa l niib.
44016036	G yua guu dansaldieog nyan gad yen l maam Pɔl buol g maad’o: « Buuddanm sun g maad k min ŋaa’i. Lann, nya man g ji gii saa man yen laafiɛ. »
44016037	G Pɔl maad ban bo sun yab k nne: « B g bu’ti g yen te k b pua’ti gbana niib kul nunŋ n, tinm nba tie Rom yab. G tug’ti g gad g luon. G ji bua mɔlane ban wuon g ŋaa’ti. Lann kan tien. Banm mɔno ń baal g luod’ti ! »
44016038	Lann i g tuonsunna ŋann lebd yen l maam g maad buuddanm. G jiwaani suol’b yen ban gbad g Pɔl yen Silas tie Rom yab.
44016039	K b baal g miɛl’b sugl, g luod’b g baln’m k ban nya b doug n.
44016040	Pɔl yen Silas n nyiɛ dansaldieog n, k b gad Lidi ŋaag. L buol i k b la b ninjanm Kristo‑yab, g pugn’m papaal, g nyiɛ l doug n.
44017001	B bo tɔgn Anfipolis yen Apoloni i, g pund Tɛsaloniik. Suif‑nba bo mɔg tintaann dieog l buol.
44017002	G Pɔl saa g kua l n ninŋ Saaba daal kul, g pag yen Suif‑nba nyan wan bo tu tie nand tintaann delied n ninŋ nyan, g daan biin Saaba‑nba ŋantaa. U bo diɛ Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni i,
44017003	g ŋɔnŋ’b l niimn g tua g: « Kristo bo bu l cagn i, g yied kpienm siign. L Kristo n tie Yiesu, yua k n maad’i u maam ne. »
44017004	B ninŋ siɛb bo gbad l maam g tuo yen mɔni, g pugn Pɔl yen Silas po. Grɛk‑nba ninŋ, yab bo dond Yendu, b ninŋ bonciɛnn yen puob nba bo mɔg yudand mɔ bo pugn b po.
44017005	Ama g Suif‑nba yie, g fiil yen nanŋ, g tug yukpiena nba waa sɔnjala po, g tigl niib g te k b kpil doug. K b gad Jasɔn ŋaag g kpaan Pɔl yen Silas, k ban suol’b, g gad yen’m niwulug buol.
44017006	Ban gad g g la’b nyan, k b ji suol Jasɔn yen b ninjanm Kristo‑yab n ninŋ yenm, g fil g gad yen’m buuddanm buol, g yign g maad: « Niib nba ŋmad ŋanduna munn, ji be t doug ne i.
44017007	Jasɔn n gaal’b u ŋaag n. L niib kul n tie yal g tuag Rom badciɛn yiko n bual nand. G dugn b maad g badfano be k b yi’ug Yiesu. »
44017008	L maam bo ŋmad niwulug yen buuddanm kul yam.
44017009	B bo te g Jasɔn yen u lieb ŋanm bil ligli yo, k b fid g ŋaa’b.
44017010	Lan tan l bɔnn yaa youg, g Kristo‑yab te g Pɔl yen Silas gad Bere. Ban pund l doug n, k b gad g kua Suif‑nba tintaann dieog n.
44017011	L buol Suif‑nba bo gbiɛ maam niimn g cie Tɛsaloniik yab. B bo gaal Yendu maam yen b pala kul. Daal kul b bo tu diid Yendu Kadaaɔg n i, g liɛ Pɔl n maad yal tie mɔni i.
44017012	B ninŋ niib bonciɛnn bo te Kristo‑yab. Grɛk‑nba ninŋ mɔ, puob nba bo mɔg yudand, yen jab bonciɛnn mɔ bo te Kristo‑yab.
44017013	Ama Tɛsaloniik Suif‑nba n gbad g Bere doug n mɔ Pɔl biɛ muand Yendu maam, k b baal yen ŋmadl g don niwulug mutuol.
44017014	Lann i k t ninjanm Kristo‑yab tien tonm g te g Pɔl tol mɔgl po, g nyaan ŋaa Timote yen Silas nuan l buol.
44017015	Yab nba bo ciɛnd Pɔl bo ciɛn’o g daan pund hal Atɛnn doug n. Ban leb, g Pɔl nagn’m k ban daan maad Timote yen Silas k ban ŋuan’o tonm nii.
44017016	Pɔl ji bo guu Timote yen Silas Atɛnn i. U bo la k b maa yendui l doug n kaannaa kul, k u pal biil bonciɛnn.
44017017	K u pag yen Suif‑nba yen yab nba kua Suif‑nba jaandi, tintaann dieog n. Daal kul u bo tu pag yen niib nba k u cend’b, niib n bo tu taand lieb naan i.
44017018	Kadabanda nne bo be k b yi yenm Epikuriɛn-nba, g yi lieb Stoyisiɛn-nba. B mɔ bo baal g pag yen Pɔl, g yenm tan maad: « Maciɛndaan ne bua wan maad bɛ i ? » G lieb maad: « U ne baa muand dingbanfana yendui maam i. » G dugn Pɔl bo muand Yiesu Laabamann yen u yiedu maam i.
44017019	Lann i k b tug’o g gad yen’o jual nne po, k b yi l jual Areyopaas, g bual’o: « A bu fid g ŋɔn’ti tundpaann nba k a tund ne niimn ii ?
44017020	G dugn ŋan maad bona nba ne tie bonsaana i t po. T bua tin gbad l niimn. »
44017021	Atɛnn yab kul yen saanm nba bo be b doug n mɔ yaa tuonn n yen bo tie k ban gii maad, lann i kaa ban gii cenŋ masaanm.
44017022	Lann i g Pɔl fiil g sed buuddanm siign g maad: « Atɛnn yab, n la g bona kul ninŋ k i dond yendui hal bonciɛnn.
44017023	G dugn min waa i doug ne ninŋ kul, n la k i maa yendui g dond. N tan la binbindyenn po mɔno k l diɛn k nne: “ Yendu nba k t g ban’o yal ”. Yin dond yua g yen g ban’o nyan, n baal g ŋɔnŋ’i wano i.
44017024	Yendu nba tag ŋanduna yen bona nba kul be l n ninŋ, wano nba tie polu yen tinŋ Yonmdaan, u g be jaanddied nba ninŋ g niib maa yen b nui kaa.
44017025	U biɛ g bua g baa sua tien siɛl u po, g dugn baa siɛl g pɔd’o. Wano n tien niib kul miɛl yen fuom yen bona kul.
44017026	U cil niyend buol i, g tag niib nba kul be tinŋ po ne. Wano n sen bona kul youg, g biɛ ŋɔn niib kul n baa kua naan.
44017027	U tien nnyan k ban gii kpaan’o i. L gii tie baa k b tuln g kpaan’o, l bu fid g tuu ban la’ɔg. Yen mɔni Yendu g fag yen t ninŋ baa sua.
44017028	G dugn wano n te k t mɔg miɛl, g be, g biɛ waa. I yanyinna n ninŋ siɛb mɔno bo maad lann i g tua: “ T mɔ tie u bid i. ”
44017029	Nyan tin tie Yendu bid nyan, t ji kan gii mali g Yendu naan yen yendui nba k b tag yen wula, lann i kaa yen ligli, lann i kaa yen tana nba g niib mɔno mali g kpied.
44017030	B bo tien l bona kul ne g dugn b bo g ban Yendu i. Yendu mɔ g tug l yanbɔnm youg g sun yen tuonn. Mɔlane u ji maad niib kul k ban be naan kul, ban lebd b binbem.
44017031	U sen daal nba k u bu bu ŋanduna niib kul yen mɔnkund. U bo lugd nil l po, g yied’o kpienm siign. U tien nnyan i, g ŋɔn nil kul k u lugd wano i yen mɔni, k wan gii tie mɔnkundaan. »
44017032	Ban gbad g Pɔl maad kpienm yiedu maam g yenm ji laa’ɔg. G lieb mɔ maad: « Disiɛl yo, k t bu ŋanm g cenŋ a maam ne. »
44017033	L bo tien nnyan i g Pɔl yaad g ŋaa’b.
44017034	Yen l yaa kul, siɛb bo gaal Pɔl maam g ji dug Yiesu po. B ninŋ Deniis bo be. U bo tie l buol buuddanm n ninŋ yeno i. G puo nne be k b yi’ug Damariis. Lieb mɔ biɛ bo be.
44018001	L puol po g Pɔl nyiɛ Atɛnn g gad Korɛnt.
44018002	L buol i, k u la jua nne k b yi’ug Akilas, k u tie Suif. U bo tie Pɔn doug n jua i. U daa bo l nyiɛ Itali n nyan g baal, wano yen u ŋaapuo Prisiil. G dugn bad Klod bo nyan yiko g Suif‑nba kul ń nya Rom doug n. Lann i g Pɔl gad b pin.
44018003	Banm yen Pɔl kul bo suun tuonyenn i, b bo tie jonpuala i. L po n te g Pɔl bo be b ŋaag n, k b taan g suun.
44018004	Saaba daal kul, Pɔl bo saa tintaann dieog n i, g gaan maam g maad g gbaa g Suif‑nba yen Grɛk‑nba ń tuo k wan maad yal tie mɔni.
44018005	Silas yen Timote n nyiɛ Maseduann g pund, Pɔl ji bo tug u yaam kul g muand Yendu maam i, g ŋɔnŋ Suif‑nba g Yiesu n tie Kristo.
44018006	Ama g Suif‑nba yie Pɔl po g ji sugd’o. Lann i g Pɔl yog yog u tiɛd g nyan tangulunŋ, g maad: « Yal baal kul l bu tuan i yula po i. Min g mɔg siɛl yaa biid. Lan cil mɔlane, n ji baa saa yab g tie Suif‑nba buol i. »
44018007	G Pɔl nyiɛ l buol g gad jua nne ŋaag k b yi’ug Titiyus Sustus. L jua bo tie yua dond Yendu i k u ŋaag kpiɛ yen tintaann dieog.
44018008	Krispus, yua bo tie tintaann dieog n canbaa nyan, bo gaal Kristo, wano yen u ŋaag yab kul. G Korɛnt yab nba bo cenŋ Pɔl nyan, bonciɛnn mɔ gaal Kristo k b wul’b nyum.
44018009	G nyayeonŋ, k l tien Pɔl nyan danŋd nyan g Yonmdaan maad’o: « Daa jie siɛl, yi maad g daa ŋmin.
44018010	G dugn n baa be yen’a. Sua kan fid g suun nuu a po g tien’a bonbiiug. N niib be doug ne ninŋ g yab. »
44018011	Pɔl bo tien l buol binn yen ŋmaali nluob i, g tund niib Yendu maam.
44018012	Youg nba g Galiyɔn bo tie yudaan Akaayi doug n g kal Rom badciɛn sann po, diyenn, g Suif‑nba taan mɔb g yie Pɔl po, g tug’o g gad yen’o buuddanm buol
44018013	g maad: « Jua ne n gbaa g niib ń gii dond Yendu nand nba k t yiko g cab. »
44018014	Pɔl bo yed k wan maad nne g Galiyɔn gaal maam g maad Suif‑nba: « L bo gii tie k u tien yal n biɛ, lann i kaa k u sun yal nba kua, n bo bu cenŋ’i lan bual nand.
44018015	Ama yin jalg i lieb lanbona po yen sana po yen i yiko po nyan, yinm mɔno ń diid l n ninŋ. Min kan bu l buud. »
44018016	Lann i k u bel g yaan’m.
44018017	G Suif‑nba kul suol tintaann dieog n canbaa Sostɛnn, g pua’ɔg buuddanm nunŋ n, k l g maad Galiyɔn baa siɛl.
44018018	Pɔl biɛ bo wai bonciɛnn Korɛnt doug n. G tan nyiɛ l buol g ŋaa u ninjanm Kristo‑yab. K wano yen Prisiil yen Akilas kua ŋadunŋ g gad Siiri. Pɔl bo kuol yukolnpaanu Sankre doug n yo, g fid g kua ŋadunŋ, g dugn u bo puon puoni nne.
44018019	Ban tan pund Efɛs doug n, g Pɔl paad g ŋaa u yegni, g gad g kua tinaanu dieog n, g pag yen Suif‑nba.
44018020	Lann i g Suif‑nba gɔgl’o k wan daa gii be yen’m. G Pɔl yie
44018021	g cab’b g nyaan maad’b: « Yendu gii bua, disiɛl n bu guan i buol. » L puol po, k u kua ŋadunŋ Efɛs g gad Sesaare doug n.
44018022	Wan pund Sesaare k u duo Serusalɛm g fuond Kristo‑yab tintaanu, g guan g jiid Antiyɔs.
44018023	U bo kal l doug n waam yo, g guan g lebd g tɔgn Galasi yen Frisi doi n ninŋ g paand Yiesu ŋuantieb kul pala.
44018024	Jua nne n bo be g tie Alɛksandri jua g baal Efɛs. B bo yi l jua Apolɔs i, k u tie Suif. U bo ban maam, g biɛ ban Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni lan bual nand.
44018025	U bo tie yua nba k b tund’o g ŋɔn’o Yonmdaan Sɔnu i. U pal bo kɔn Yendu maam po k u muand g biɛ tund niib yen mɔni Yiesu n tie yua. Ama u bo ban San nyunwulu kua i.
44018026	Lann i k u gaal maam tintaann dieog n g maad yen papaal. Prisiil yen Akilas n gbad u maam, k b tug’o b kua n ninŋ g biɛ ŋanm g ŋɔn’o yen mɔni Yendu Sɔnu.
44018027	Apolɔs bo bua wan gad Akaayi doug n, k u ninjanm Kristo‑yab paan u pal g diɛn kadaaɔg k wan daan te l po Yiesu ŋuantieb k ban ŋanm g gaal’o. Wan pund yaa youg, Yendu ŋalbalg po k u tod l buol niib nba dug Yiesu po.
44018028	G dugn u bo tu maad g di Suif‑nba mɔni niib kul nunŋ n. U bo diɛ Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni i g ŋɔnŋ’b yen mɔni g Yiesu n tie Kristo.
44019001	Apolɔs n bo be Korɛnt yaa youg, l bo sua g Pɔl paa sɔnu i. U bo tɔgn doi nba be jɔa n ninŋ i, g daan pund Efɛs. U bo la Yiesu ŋuantieb n ninŋ yenm l buol
44019002	g bual’b: « Yin tuo g dug Kristo po, i gaal Foŋanm ii ? » K b ŋmiɛn’o: « T g ban g gbad g Foŋanm be mɔno. »
44019003	K u biɛ bual’b: « B wul’i nyunwullann po i ? » K b mɔ ŋmiɛn’o: « B wul’ti San nyunwulu i. »
44019004	Lann i g Pɔl maad’b: « San bo wuul niib nba bua ban lebd b binbem i. U bo maad niib k ban tuo g gaal yua nba bu baal u puol po, lan tie Yiesu. »
44019005	Ban cenŋ l lanbona g gbenn, k b te k b wul’b nyum Yonmdaan Yiesu sann po.
44019006	G Pɔl maan nui b po g Foŋanm jiid b po, k b maad mabuoli g biɛ sɔgn Yendu lanbona.
44019007	L niib kul bo taan g tie nyan piig yen niib banle nyan i.
44019008	Pɔl bo tien ŋmaali ntaa g saa tintaann dieog n, g tu gaal maam g maad yen papaal. U bo muand’b Yendu bal po i g kpaan g yab cenŋ’o ń gaal u maam.
44019009	Ama siɛb bo tien kangbadm i, g yie g g cenŋ u maam, g maad mabiid Yendu Sɔnu maam po niib kul nunŋ n. Lann i g Pɔl yaad g ŋaa’b, g tug Yiesu ŋuantieb g gad yen’m Tiranus kalaatu ŋaag, g pag yen’m daal kul Yendu maam po.
44019010	Pɔl bo tie nnyan i, g daan biin bina ŋanle, hal g Suif‑nba nba be Asi dingbana n ninŋ yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba kul, tan gbad Yonmdaan maam.
44019011	Yendu bo te g Pɔl tie yaalidug bona nba g mɔg l liel.
44019012	Hal g niib tan tugd Pɔl gbannand n sii ninfiɛni nba, lann i kaa caba nba mɔno, g saa g maand yiɛnm po k b paagd. G yab nba bo mɔg sanpola mɔ, k l sanpola ŋaan’m.
44019013	L bo sua g Suif‑nba nne be g waa dingbana g biel g yaand sanpola nba bo ŋua niib. B mɔ bo bign k ban gii taan Yonmdaan Yiesu sann g biel g yaand sanpola. B bo maad sanpola: « Yiesu nba g Pɔl muand u maam nyan sann po, n maad’i ŋaa’b man. »
44019014	Sefa bid banlile n bo suun l tuonn. Sefa mɔ bo tie Suif‑nba salg-yidkab ciɛn i.
44019015	Lann i g sanpola ŋmagd g maad’b: « T ban Yiesu g biɛ ban Pɔl mɔ n tie yua, k i mɔ i, i tie b lɛ i ? »
44019016	G jua nba g sanpola bo ŋua’ɔg nyan yug g baa b po, g pua g paad’b, g janm’b hal k b san g nyiɛ niiyana l ŋaag n.
44019017	Yab bo kua Efɛs nyan kul, Suif‑nba yen yab g tie Suif‑nba, b kul bo gbad yal tien. Jiwaani bo kua b kul, k b ji dond Yonmdaan Yiesu sann.
44019018	Niib bonciɛnn nba bo tuo g gaal Yiesu bo baad g maad b biid niib kul nunŋ n.
44019019	G yab bo mɔg nyɔgu g tie palug nyan, b ninŋ bonciɛnn baal yen b kadaad g juu niib kul nunŋ n. K b kal g dugn g la k l kadaad daaɔg tie dibala tuda piinmu.
44019020	L bo tien nnyan i, g Yonmdaan maam yad kaannaa kul, g biɛ ŋɔnŋ k l mɔg paalu.
44019021	L po n pend g Pɔl tug yanjagl k u bu gad Maseduann yen Akaayi doi n yo, g fid g gad Serusalɛm. U bo maad: « N gii pund Serusalɛm, l tie k min gad Rom i. »
44019022	Lann i k u sun u todkab Timote yen Erast Maseduann doug n, g nyaan biɛ tien dana waam Asi dingbana n.
44019023	L youg, g nyɔgl tien bonciɛnn Yendu Sɔnu maam po,
44019024	g dugn Demetriyus po. Wano Demetriyus bo tie mamaal i. U bo diɛ ligtana i g maal yendu Artemis dondl dieog bonninnana. L tuonn n bo kuand wano yen u tuonsunna ligli nba bo g tie ligbig kaa.
44019025	Lann i k u taan mamaala kul yen yab nba bo suun l tuonbuolu kul g maad’b: « N ninjanm, i ban k t tuonn ne po n te k t be t yam n.
44019026	N tua i gbad g biɛ la Pɔl n tie yal a. U maad g niib n tag yendui nba yen b nui g tie yendui kaa. U te g niib bonciɛnn gaal u maam k l tie mɔni. L g tie Efɛs doug n ninŋ ne kua kaa, l tenn waam nne yen l maam ń yad Asi dingbana n ninŋ kul.
44019027	L maam g bua n biil t tuonn kukua kaa, ama l bu yuan yenduciɛn Artemis dondl dieog mɔ g biɛ te wan juod fam ; wano nba k Asi dingbana kul yen ŋanduna niib kul pug’o. »
44019028	Ban gbad l maam, k b pala biil, k b ji yign g maad: « Efɛs yab yendu Artemis n tie yenduciɛn ! »
44019029	G nyɔgl yad doug n ninŋ kul. K b suol Pɔl yegni Gaayus yen Aristark g gad yen’m doug n, niib n bo tu tigi naan. Pɔl yegni banle ŋann bo tie Maseduann yab i.
44019030	Pɔl bo bua wan gad niib n tigl naan nyan i, g Yiesu ŋuantieb bel’o.
44019031	K Asi tuonsungbenŋa nba bo tie u dɔnn‑nba nyan, mɔ sun g maad’o k wan di sugl g daa saa l buol.
44019032	L youg l sua g niib nba bo tigl nyan, g ŋmadl tien b siign. G yenm yign k nne, g lieb yign k nne. B ninŋ bonciɛnn bo g ban yal po te k b tigl monɔ.
44019033	Lann i g Suif‑nba tug Alɛksandr g nyan’o niwulug n g sen’o liig. G niwulug n ninŋ siɛb ŋɔn’o yal po te k b yign. K u don nuu g bu gaal maam g maad mɔni.
44019034	Ama niwulug n bann k u tie Suif, k b yie, g ji tand g maad k l g luol nyan kud munle nyan. B bo tand g tua: « Efɛs yab yendu Artemis n tie yenduciɛn ! »
44019035	Yua nba k u tuonn bo tie k wan gii diɛ b doug n kadaad nyan n bo tan fid g te g niwulug suon, k u maad’b: « Efɛs yab, nil kul ban k Efɛs doug n guu yenduciɛn Artemis dondl dieog, yen u ninnaɔnŋ nba nyiɛ polu g baa.
44019036	Baa sua kan fid g nai k l g tie nnyan, lann suol man i kua, g ŋanm g mali u, g fid g sun yin bu sun yal nba.
44019037	I baal yen niib ne, ne buol k b yen g biil baa siɛl t yendu dondl dieog n, g bual k ban sugl t yendu.
44019038	L gii tie g Demetriyus yen u tuonsunlieb mɔg maam yen sua i yaa, buuddanm be, g mɔg ban bu niib daal nba. Ban gad yen l maam b buol.
44019039	L biɛ gii tie k i mɔg siɛl g bu bual i yaa, tintaanciɛɔnŋ nba mɔg yiko nyan n bu diid l maam.
44019040	Dinne tintaann nba k t tien ne, b tan bu fid g jalg’ti k t tie niib nba g cɔlm i. G dugn t kan fid g maad yal po te k t taan lieb ne buol ne. »
44019041	Wan maad nnyan g gbenn k u cab niwulug.
44020001	L nyɔgl po n gbenn, g Pɔl taan Yiesu ŋuantieb g paan b pala. Lann i g cab’b g tug sɔnu g saa Maseduann.
44020002	Wan pund Maseduann, k u waa dingbana n ninŋ kul, g paan Yiesu ŋuantieb pala, g pend g gad Grɛs.
44020003	U bo tien l doug n ŋmaali ntaa i. Wan bo tan bua n tug ŋadunŋ g gad Siiri yaa youg, k u gbad g Suif‑nba bua n kpi’ug. Lann i k u tug yanjagl g guan g tɔgn Maseduann po.
44020004	Yab bo ciɛn’o sana n ne: Piirus bija Sopatɛr yua bo tie Bere jua, yen Tɛsaloniik jab Aristark yen Sekundus, yen Dɛrb jua Gaayus, yen Timote, yen Asi jab Tisiik yen Trofiim.
44020005	Banm n bo liid g daan bu guul’ti Trowas.
44020006	Jaanm nba k b bo tu ŋman kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan bo pend yo, k tinm mɔno tug ŋadunŋ Filiip doug n. T bo tien daa ŋanmu yo, g fid g pund b buol Trowas. T kul bo tien l buol daa ŋanlile i.
44020007	G laad n ninŋ dacincinn daal, k t taan lieb g bu biid kpanu. L bo sua k l wonn po g Pɔl bu fiil. Lann i k u gaal maam g maad yen Kristo‑yab g yɔug tan yɔgd.
44020008	Tin bo taan lieb naan detuadug po, fida bo be bonciɛnn.
44020009	L bo sua g naasen nne be k b yi’ug Etiis k u kal detuada ŋantaa takobonn po. Pɔl n bo maad g g gbend tonm nyan, g guam tan suol l naasen k u guan g lagd l detuada ŋantaa po g baa. K b fiin’o g sua k u kpe o.
44020010	G Pɔl jiid g gbaa g gad g wob’o g maad: « I yam ń daa ŋmad man. U mɔg miɛl ! »
44020011	Lann i k u guan g duo g jend kpanu g ŋman, g biɛ gaal maam g maad k l tan fann, k u yaad g ŋaa’b.
44020012	K b tug l naasen g ciɛn’o k u mɔg miɛl. G nil kul yam duan.
44020013	Pɔl bo bua wan sonm i g gad Asɔs. K tinm tug ŋadunŋ g gaal liig g daan bu tug’o l doug n.
44020014	Wan tan pund Asɔs, k t tug’o yen ŋadunŋ g gad Mitilɛnn.
44020015	K t nyiɛ l buol yen ŋadunŋ, k l wonn po k t pund Siiyo. L wontunm po k t pund Samɔs. K l dinnedaal po k t pund Mile.
44020016	Pɔl bo g bua k u sed Efɛs doug n, g dugn u bo g bua wan biɛn yaam Asi dingbana n. U bo bua wan tien tonm, l gii tie k l bu fid wan pund Serusalɛm, Pantekuot daal.
44020017	Pɔl bo be Mile doug n i, g sun g yiin Efɛs Kristo‑yab tintaanu nikpela.
44020018	Ban tan baal u buol, k u maad’b: « Yinm mɔno, i ban lan cil hal dacincinn daal nba k n pund Asi doug n, min bo tu be yen’i nand.
44020019	N jiin n kua g sun Yonmdaan tuonn yen ninsiid, g biɛ la fala g dugn Suif‑nba bo kpaan k ban janm’n.
44020020	Yal nba tie bonmɔnn k n bo bu maad’i, n g ŋaa baa siɛl. N muand’i, g biɛ tund’i Yendu maam, niib kul buol yen i ŋai n.
44020021	N biɛ muand Suif‑nba yen yab g tie Suif‑nba mɔ, k ban lebd b binbem g tug b kua g cab Yendu, g biɛ tuo g gaal t Yonmdaan Yiesu.
44020022	Mɔlane, Foŋanm niin’n g saa yen’n Serusalɛm n nyan. N g ban yal daan bu baal’n.
44020023	Ama n ban g doug kul ninŋ, Foŋanm tu maad’n k n bu cagn k ban biɛ luon’n dansalg.
44020024	Yen l kul ne, n g tug n miɛl k l tie siɛl n po. Yal tie bonmɔnn n po, l tie k min fid g sun g gbenn tuonn nba k t Yonmdaan Yiesu kubn’n i. Lan tie k min muand Yendu ŋalbalg Laabamann.
44020025	N kal i buol ne, g muand’i Yendu diem maam. Mɔlane n ban k i ninŋ ne, baa sua ji kan ban g la’n.
44020026	L po n te k n bua min maad’i k i ninŋ ne baa sua gii tud sɔnu, l ji g la’n,
44020027	g dugn n ŋɔn’i Yendu n bua n tien yal nba kul, g g wuon’i baa siɛl.
44020028	I tiɛn man i kua po, g biɛ gii guu pelol nba g Foŋanm tug’i k yin gii kpaa l pei. Ŋanm man gii kpaa Yendu tintaanu nba g Yonmdaan wul u sɔm g yend.
44020029	N ban k n gii kun, n puol po fuabɔjad bu baal g kua i ninŋ. B kan ŋaa pelol.
44020030	G baa i ninŋ mɔno, niib bu fiil g fa faaɔg g bɔnd Yiesu ŋuantieb ban ŋuan’m.
44020031	Lann, i ceg man gii tiɛn g bina ŋantaa siign, yendu n yen nyiɛɔg, yen ninsiid i, k n ŋmagd yua kul k wan tɔgn sɔnŋanu n.
44020032	Mɔlane n ji kubnd’i Yendu nuu n, u ŋalbalg maam ń gii ŋmagd’i. L maam n mɔg paalu nba bu paan i pala, g biɛ te yin di faal nba k u cegn g bu te yab nba kul tie u yab.
44020033	N g buad nil ligli, lann i kaa u wula, lann i kaa u tiɛd.
44020034	Yinm mɔno, i ban k n sun yen n nui ne i, g la min yen n yegni n bo bua yal nba.
44020035	N l tun g ŋɔnŋ’i k yin gii suun nnyan i, g fid g tod tali g biɛ gii tiɛn t Yonmdaan Yiesu mɔno n bo maad yal. U bo maad: “ L tie pamann i yua tien po g cie yua gaan. ” »
44020036	Pɔl n maad g gbenn, k u taan g gbaan yen’m g jaand.
44020037	Lann i k b kul ŋmaa bubuul g yuug g jɔlg Pɔl g cabd’o.
44020038	B kul pala bo wad yen Pɔl n bo maad’b k b ji kan ban g la’ɔg. K b ciɛn’o g daan pund ŋadunŋ buol.
44021001	L puol po k t yaad g ŋaa’b l pin, g tug ŋadunŋ g tol Kɔs. K l wonn po, k t pund Rod. G nyiɛ l buol g tuad Patara.
44021002	L buol i, k t la ŋadunŋ k u saa Fenisi doug n, k t kua.
44021003	Tin saa saa g tan nyuan Sipr yaa youg, k t gɔgd g tɔgn yanbaɔnŋ g ŋaa l kpendegl, g saa Siiri po. T maa maa nnyan i g daan pund Tiir, naan k b bo bu nyan tiɛd ŋadunŋ n.
44021004	L buol i k t la Yiesu ŋuantieb g tien yen’m daa ŋanlile. G Foŋanm te k b maad Pɔl k wan daa saa Serusalɛm.
44021005	Ama l daa ŋanlile po n pend, k t guan g tug t sɔnu. K banm yen b puob yen b bid ciɛn’ti, g daan nyan’ti doug n. K t kul gbaan mɔgl kunŋ g tien jaandi.
44021006	Lann i k t cab t lieb. K tinm kua t ŋadunŋ Tiir nyan, k b mɔ lebd g kun.
44021007	K t kaag g saa saa g daan pund Pitolemaayis doug n, g gad g fuond t ninjanm Kristo‑yab g tund yen’m.
44021008	K l fann k t gad Sesaare, g daan can Filiip, yua nba bo muand Laabamann nyan. U bo tie niib banlile nba k b bo lugd’b Serusalɛm nyan ninŋ yend i.
44021009	U bo mɔg bipuobi banna i, k b kul ne sua daa g ban jua. Banm n bo tu maad Yendu n yed k ban maad yal.
44021010	T bo g luol g tien l buol dana ŋanŋaa nne, g Yendu sogni nba k b yi’ug Agabus nyan nyiɛ Suude g baal t buol.
44021011	Lann i g juab Pɔl gbann g lol wano mɔno nui yen u titala g maad: « Foŋanm n maad yal n ne: “ Jua nba yen gbann ne, Suif‑nba daan bu lol’o nne i Serusalɛm, g tug’o g te’og buolfanu yab. ” »
44021012	Tin gbad l maam, k tinm yen Sesaare yab miɛl Pɔl sugl k wan ji daa saa Serusalɛm.
44021013	Ama g Pɔl ŋmiɛn’ti: « Laabaal k i buud g bua n wad n pal i ? Min g tuo k ban lol’n kukua kaa, n tuo k ban kpi’n mɔno Yonmdaan Yiesu sann po Serusalɛm doug n. »
44021014	Nyan wan bo g tuo t maam nyan, t ji bo ŋaa i g nyaan maad k lan tien nyan Yonmdaan n bua nand nyan.
44021015	Tin tien l buol dana waam, k t bobn t tiɛd g gad Serusalɛm.
44021016	G Yiesu ŋuantieb nba bo be Sesaare nyan, g yenm ciɛn’ti, g gad yen’ti jua nne ŋaag k b yi’ug Minasɔn. L jua bo nyiɛ Sipr i, g bo te Yiesu ŋuantua k l wai. T bo bu duan u ŋaag i.
44021017	Tin pund Serusalɛm youg nba, k t ninjanm Kristo‑yab gaal’ti yen pamann.
44021018	K l fann k tinm yen Pɔl gad Saak ŋaag. L bo sua g Kristo‑yab nikpela kul tigl l buol.
44021019	Pɔl n fuond’b g gbenn, k u ŋanm g dugn’m Yendu n te k u sun tuona nba kul, yab g tie Suif‑nba siign.
44021020	Kristo‑yab nikpela n gbad l maam, k b ji dond Yendu g nyaan maad Pɔl: « T ninja, a la waa, Suif‑nba tie tuda tuda i g tuo g gaal Kristo, k b kul ne pal biɛ kɔn Moyis kadaaɔg n diɛni po.
44021021	B maad’b k a tund Suif‑nba nba be buolfanu siign k ban daa cɔln yal be l kadaaɔg n, g daa kɔnd b bid, g biɛ daa cɔln Suif‑nba bogda.
44021022	T ji bu tien nle i ? B yen bu l bann k a be ne buol ne.
44021023	Lann, tien tin bu maad’a yal. Jab banna be t buol ne g puon puoni Yendu nunŋ n.
44021024	Tug’b, k i kul ń gad g daan taan g tien l bogdl g ŋanm i kua, k a pa b po, k ban fid g kuol yud. Nnyan i g nil kul bu bann k ban maad a po yal kul tie faaɔg u. Lann i k b bu bann k a mɔ cɔln yal be Moyis kadaaɔg n.
44021025	Ama yab g tie Suif‑nba g yen tuo g gaal Yiesu nuan, t daan diɛn’m kadaaɔg g maad’b tin kal g suol yal o. Lan tie k ban daa ŋman padnand, g daa di sɔm, g daa ŋman bonkobug nba kpe k b g kod, g biɛ daa conm. »
44021026	K l fann g Pɔl tug l jab banna k b gad g tien l bogdl g ŋanm b kua, g yuand g kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n. G Pɔl ji ŋɔn daal nba k b bu yid salg sua kul po, k l ŋanml bogdl po ń juab.
44021027	L ŋanml daa ŋanlile po n ji bo bua n gbenn, k Asi Suif‑nba la Pɔl jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n. Lann i g tud tud niwulug k b fiil g yie Pɔl po, k b suol’o
44021028	g tand g maad k nne: « Israyɛl niib, baal man g tod’ti ! Jua ne n muand naan kul g kɔn yen t buolu, g tud niib k ban daa mɔg siɛl yaa cɔlunŋ t bogda yen t jaanddeciɛɔnŋ po, g tan te g yab g tie Suif‑nba mɔno kua jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n. B kuan jɔgnd n nyan Yendu ŋaag n. »
44021029	B bo maad nnyan g dugn b bo la Pɔl doug n k u yeg yen Efɛs jua Trofiim. B ji bo mali g Pɔl kua yen’o jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n i.
44021030	Lann i g nyɔgl tien doug n kul, g niib san g tigl. K b suol Pɔl g fil g nyan’o jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g luon dimɔi l youg mɔno.
44021031	B ji bo kpaan k ban kpi Pɔl i, g niib gad g maad Rom sijenm kul ciɛn k l mɔn Serusalɛm doug n.
44021032	L youg mɔno k u fiil g tug sijebid yen sijeciɛnm, k b san g gad niwulug buol. Niwulug n l la sijenm kul ciɛn yen sijenm yaa youg, k b ŋaa g ji g pua Pɔl.
44021033	Lann i g sijenm kul ciɛn nagn u buol g cab mɔb k ban suol g lol’o yen kudsiseli nle, g nyaan bual k u tie ŋmaa i ? K u tien bɛ i ?
44021034	Ama g niwulug n ninŋ g yenm yign k nne g lieb yign k nne. L po bo te g sijenm kul ciɛn kan fid g bann yal n tien. Lann i k u cab mɔb k ban tug Pɔl g gad yen’o sijekanŋ n.
44021035	Ban do dimɔŋmaada po yaa youg, g niwulug yie Pɔl po g sijenm tan gbal g tug’o.
44021036	G dugn niwulug bo ŋua g yign g tua: « Kpi’ug man ! Kpi’ug man ! »
44021037	Youg nba k b ji bo bua n kuan Pɔl sijekanŋ n, k u bual sijenm kul ciɛn: « N bu fid g maad’a siɛl ii ? » K u ŋmiɛn’o: « A gbiɛ grɛk yaa aa ?
44021038	Lann fin kaa tie Esipt jua nba daan kpid wounŋ, g tug bibiɛdi tuda ŋanna, dana nba pend ne ninŋ, g gad yen’m tinkuonŋ n ninŋ ii ? »
44021039	G Pɔl ŋmiɛn: « Min tie Suif i, b mal’n Tars i, Silisi doug n. N tie l dogbenŋl n ninŋ big i. Cab’n k min maad yen niwulug. »
44021040	G sijenm kul ciɛn cab’o. Lann i g Pɔl sed dimɔŋmaada ŋann po, g ŋag niwulug nuu k b suon silb. K u gaal maam g maad’b Ebro‑nba maam n k nne:
44022001	« N baa‑nba yen n ninjanm, cenŋ man min mɔg yal mɔlane g bu maad’i g kɔn n kua po. »
44022002	Ban gbad g Pɔl maad yen’m Ebro‑nba maam, k b ŋanm g tien suoo. Lann i k u maad’b:
44022003	« N tie Suif i, g mal Tars, Silisi doug n. Ama b ŋub’n Serusalɛm ne i. G Gamaliɛl te n canbaa. Wano n tund’n, g ŋanm g ŋɔn’n t yaajanm bogda. N pal bo siɛd Yendu po nyan lan tie i mɔ nand dinne nyan i.
44022004	N cagn yab nba bo tuag sɔnu nba k n tuag mɔlane, g tan kpii’b mɔno. N fid g suol jab yen puob g luon’m dansaldieog n.
44022005	Salg-yidkab kul ciɛn yen Suif‑nba nikpela bu fid g maad k n maad mɔni i. N gaal kadaad mɔno b buol g bu te t ninjanm nba be Damas. N bo saa l buol i, g daan bu suol yab nba bo tuag l sɔnu g lol’b g gad yen’m Serusalɛm g te k ban dad b tubl.
44022006	Min bo paa sɔnu po g saa g tan nag Damas, yensikpikpalg po, n tan sua g yinyiem nyiɛ polu po g baal g fand n buol kul.
44022007	K n baa tinŋ n, g gbad niɛlu nne, k l maad’n: “ Sɔl, Sɔl, laabaal k a cagn’n i ? ”
44022008	K n ŋmiɛn: “ Yonmdaan, a tie ŋmaa i ? ” K l niɛlu ŋmiɛn’n: “ Min n tie Nasarɛt Yiesu, a cagn min i. ”
44022009	Yab nba bo be yen’n, b bo la yinyiem nuan, ama b bo g gbad yua nba bo maad yen’n nyan yaa niɛlu.
44022010	Lann i k n bual: “ Yonmdaan, a bua k n sun bɛ i ? ” G Yonmdaan maad’n: “ Fiil g gad Damas, l buol b daan bu maad’a min bua ŋan sun yal nba kul. ”
44022011	Nyan l yinyiem n bo te k n juan nyan, n lieb n ji bo suol n nuu g gad yen’n Damas.
44022012	L bo sua g jua nne be l doug n k b yi’ug Ananias. U bo tie yua nba ŋua Yendu yen u pal kul i, g cɔln Moyis kadaaɔg n diɛni, g biɛ mɔg sann Suif‑nba nba kul bo kua Damas nyan buol.
44022013	Wano n bo baal g maad’n: “ N ninja Sɔl, guan g nyuand. ” L youg mɔno k n nyuand g ji la’ɔg.
44022014	Lann i k u biɛ maad’n: “ T yaajanm Yendu n liid g lugd’a, k ŋan bann u yanbuam, g la Mɔnkundaan g biɛ gbad u mɔb n maam.
44022015	G dugn a tuonn tie k a gii tie u sieda gii maad niib kul ŋan la yal g biɛ gbad yal.
44022016	Lann ji daa taand kaa. Baal g wul nyum, g taa u sann k a biid ń piin. ”
44022017	L puol po k n lebd Serusalɛm. Diyenn k n tan jaand jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, k l tan tie nyan danŋd nyan
44022018	k n la Yonmdaan k u maad’n: “ Tien tonm, g nya Serusalɛm doug n, g dugn l doug n niib kan tuo g gaal maam nba k a bu maad g kun mɔni n po. ”
44022019	K n ŋmiɛn: “ Yonmdaan, banm mɔno ban k n bo tu saa tintaann died n, g so yab nba dug a po, g puag’b g biɛ luond’b dansalg.
44022020	K ban biɛ bo kpii a sieda Etiɛnn, n mɔ bo be l youg. N bo taa yab nba bo kpii’ug nyan po i. Min n bo guu b tiɛd. ”
44022021	Lann i g Yonmdaan maad’n: “ Fiil, n bu sun’a ŋan gad fagm, yab g tie Suif‑nba buol. ” »
44022022	Niwulug bo l cenŋ Pɔl maam i. Wan tan maad yab g tie Suif‑nba maam yaa youg, k b yign g maad: « Biɛn man jua ne, l ji g dagd yen wan gii mɔg miɛl ! »
44022023	B ji bo l yign i, g lunn b tiɛd, g yad tand polu po.
44022024	G sijenm kul ciɛn maad k ban tug Pɔl g kua yen’o sijekanŋ n, g pua’ɔg gbana, g niin’o k wan maad yal po te g niwulug yign u po nne.
44022025	Ama ban lol’o g bu pua’ɔg gbana, k u bual sijenm ciɛn nba bo be l buol nyan: « Yiko cab k yin pua Rom jua k b g bu’ug mɔno oo ? »
44022026	Sijeciɛn n gbad l maam k u gad g maad b canbaa: « A ji bu tien nle i ? Jua ne tie Rom jua i. »
44022027	Lann i g sijenm kul ciɛn gad g bual Pɔl: . « Maad’n, a tie Rom jua yaa aa ? » G Pɔl ŋmiɛn k ɛɛn.
44022028	Lann i g sijenm kul ciɛn maad’o: « Min pa ligciɛnŋ yo, g fid g te Rom jua. » G Pɔl ŋmiɛn: « Min nuan b mal’n k n tie Rom jua i. »
44022029	L youg mɔno yab bo bu niin Pɔl k wan maad nyan yad g ŋaa’ɔg. G jiwaani kua sijenm kul ciɛn yen wan gbad g Pɔl tie Rom jua k u yen te k b lol’o yen kudsiseli.
44022030	Lan fann, g sijenm kul ciɛn l bua wan bann Suif‑nba n jalg Pɔl yal nba po, k u cab mɔb k b lod’o. Lann i g te k b taan salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Suif‑nba buuddanm. G biɛ te k b baal yen Pɔl g sen’o b kul nunŋ n.
44023001	G Pɔl nyuan nyuan Suif‑nba buuddanm g tan maad: « N ninjanm, hal min cil g ŋua Yendu saa yen mɔlane, n l ŋua’ɔg yen papienn i. »
44023002	Lann i g salg-yidkab kul ciɛn Ananias maad yab bo kpiɛ Pɔl nyan, k ban pua u mɔb po.
44023003	G Pɔl maad’o: « Fin i g Yendu bu pua’a, diid wan naan guonpieonŋ. A kal l buol g yed k a bu’n nyan yiko n bual nand i, k fin mɔno yen kand l yiko po n nyan, g yed k ban pua’n. »
44023004	G yab bo kpiɛ Pɔl nyan maad’o: « Fin n sugd Yendu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn a ! »
44023005	G Pɔl ŋmiɛn’m: « N ninjanm, n bo g ban k u tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn. Yen mɔni l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ g maad: “ A kan maad mabiid a doug n bad po. ” »
44023006	Pɔl n bo ban g Suif‑nba buuddanm siign Sadusien-nba yen Farisiɛn-nba be nyan, k u maad: « N ninjanm, n tie Farisiɛn i k n baa‑nba mɔ tie Farisiɛn-nba. Min dug g kpienm tan bu yied nyan po n te k b bu’n ne. »
44023007	Wan maad nnyan, g Farisiɛn-nba yen Sadusien-nba ji gag yen lieb, g bɔgd caga ŋanle.
44023008	G dugn Sadusien-nba bo tu maad g kpienm tan kan yied, g malɛg‑nba g be, g cicili mɔ biɛ g be. Ama g Farisiɛn-nba nuan yen tuo k l kul ne be.
44023009	Nyɔgl bo pugd bonciɛnn, g Farisiɛn-nba cagl n, yab nba tie Yendu Kadaaɔg gbanbanda nyan, g yenm fiil g gaal jad g maad: « Tinm g la jua ne n biil yal. L g kua cicilg lann i kaa malɛg n pag yen’o. »
44023010	Nyan l gigaɔg n ji bo ŋanm g paag nyan, g sijenm kul ciɛn jie k b tan bu dad g pad pad Pɔl. Lann i g te g sijenm jiid g tug’o l niib siign, g guan g kua yen’o sijekanŋ n.
44023011	K l daal nyiɛɔg g Yonmdaan baal Pɔl buol g maad’o: « Paan a pal g daa jie. Ŋan maad n po nand Serusalɛm ne, l tie k ŋan biɛ daan maad n po nnyan i, Rom doug n. »
44023012	K l fann g Suif‑nba ninŋ siɛb taan g kal, g taan mɔb g pol k b gii g kpii Pɔl, b daa kan di, b biɛ daa kan nyu.
44023013	Yab nba bo taan g pol k b bu kpi Pɔl bo cie niib piinna.
44023014	B bo gad g la salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Suif‑nba nikpela g maad’b: « T taan mɔb g pol k t gii g kpii Pɔl, t daa kan di baa siɛl.
44023015	Lann, yinm yen Suif‑nba buuddanm, sun man mɔlane mɔno k ban maad sijenm kul ciɛn, k wan te k ban baal yen Pɔl i buol, k lan gii tie k i bua n ŋanm g diid u maam i. Tinm, t cegn g bu gbenn u maam k u daa g pund i buol. »
44023016	Ama g Pɔl niipuo bija gbad l maam, g gad sijekanŋ n g kua g maad Pɔl.
44023017	Lann i g Pɔl yiin sijeciɛnm n ninŋ yend g maad’o: « Ciɛn naasenbig ne i canbaa buol, u mɔg maam g bu maad’o. »
44023018	K l sijeciɛn tug’o g kua yen’o b canbaa buol g maad: « Pɔl nba k t luon’o n yiin’n g maad’n, k min ciɛn naasenbig ne a buol, k u mɔg maam g bu maad’a. »
44023019	G sijenm kul ciɛn suol naasenbig nuu, g piɛd yen’o g bual’o k u mɔg bɛ i, g bua n maad’o i ?
44023020	G naasenbig ŋmiɛn: « Suif‑nba taan mɔb g bu baal g miɛl’a ŋan won te ban baal yen Pɔl Suif‑nba buuddanm buol. B bu maad’a k b bua ban ŋanm g diid Pɔl maam i,
44023021	ama ŋan daa tuo b maam. G dugn b taan g cie niib piinna g won bu laan g guul Pɔl. B pol k b won gii g kpii Pɔl i kaa, b daa kan di, b biɛ daa kan nyu. B bobn g gbenn o, b ji guu k fin i ń cab k ban gad yen Pɔl. »
44023022	G sijenm kul ciɛn cab naasenbig g nyaan maad’o: « Daa ŋaa baa sua ń gbad k a maad’n l maam. »
44023023	L puol po g sijenm kul ciɛn yiin sijeciɛnm n ninŋ banle, g maad’b: « Taan man sijenm kobiinle yen tanjagla piinlile yen niib kobiinle nba baa diɛ kpana, k b kul ń bobn g gbenn, k i gad Sesaare nyiɛɔg kud munwai.
44023024	Bobn man taani mɔ, g Pɔl ń jag, k i ciɛn’o g daan te’og gobna Feliks yen laafiɛ. »
44023025	K u biɛ diɛn kadaaɔg nba k b daan bu te wano Feliks g maad k nne:
44023026	« Min Klod Lisias n da kadaaɔg ne g fuond canbaaciɛɔnŋ Feliks.
44023027	Jua nba k n te k b baad yen’o a buol ne, Suif‑nba n daan suol’o g bu kpi’ug. Min gbad k u tie Rom jua nyan, k n tug n sijenm k t gad g fiel’o.
44023028	Min daan bua min bann yal po te k b jalg’o nyan, k n gad yen’o banm Suif‑nba buuddanm buol.
44023029	N tan la k b jalg’o yal tie banm Suif‑nba yiko po i. Ama n g la wan tien yal k l dagd yen ban kpi’ug lann i kaa k wan kua dansalg.
44023030	Ban biɛ maad’n g Suif‑nba bobn g bu kpi’ug nyan, l po n te k n sun sijenm k ban baal yen’o a buol. G nyaan maad yab jalg’o nyan, k ban gad yen l maam a buol. »
44023031	G sijenm tien nyan wan yed k ban tien nand nyan. G tug Pɔl nyiɛɔg g saa saa g daan pund yen’o Antipatris,
44023032	k l fann g sijenm nba bo sonm nyan lebd sijekanŋ n, g ŋaa tanjagla kua k b saa yen’o.
44023033	Ban tan pund Sesaare yaa youg, g tanjagla tug kadaaɔg g tie gobna Feliks g biɛ kubn’o Pɔl mɔ.
44023034	Wan lii kadaaɔg g gbenn, k u bual Pɔl wan nyiɛ yaa diem nba ninŋ. Wan gbad g Pɔl tie Silisi jua,
44023035	k u maad’o: « N tan bu cenŋ a maam youg nba g yab jalg’a pund. » Lann i g te k b luon’o bad Erod ŋaag n.
44024001	Daa ŋanmu po bo pend yo, k Ananias, yua bo tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nyan, pund Sesaare yen Suif‑nba nikpela n ninŋ yenm, yen buud maband nne k b yi’ug Tɛrtulus, k b kua g la gobna Feliks g maad’o k b mɔg maam yen Pɔl.
44024002	Lann i k b yiin Pɔl, g Tɛrtulus gaal maam g bu ŋɔn ban mɔg maam nba yen’o, g maad k nne: « Canbaaciɛɔnŋ Feliks, a yaa po n te k t be t yam n yen laafiɛ. Ŋan ŋanm g kub doug yen yanfuom po n te, g bona lebd g ji ŋan g doug sonm.
44024003	Tin be naan nba kul, t gaan l ŋanm daal kul. T tiend’a balg bonciɛnn l bona kul po.
44024004	Min g bua k n biɛn’a yaam nyan, l po n te k n miɛd’a k a di sugl g cenŋ’ti waam.
44024005	T la g jua ne n ŋmad doug. Wano n kuand ŋmadl Suif‑nba kul ninŋ ŋanduna munn kul. U tie cagl nba k b yi Nasariɛn-nba nyan canbaa i.
44024006	U bign k wan tien bonsiɛl mɔno g biil t jaanddeciɛɔnŋ k lan te fam, k t suol’o. [T daan bua tin bu’ug nyan t yiko n bual nand i,
44024007	ama g sijenm kul ciɛn Lisias baal g fiel’o yen paalu t nui n ninŋ.
44024008	G biɛ maad g yab jalg’o nyan ń baal a buol.] L gii tie k a bual l jua buali, fin mɔno bu bann k tin jalg’o yal po kul tie mɔni. »
44024009	G Suif‑nba taan u po, k wan maad yal tie mɔni i.
44024010	G gobna cab Pɔl mɔb k wan maad. G Pɔl gaal maam g maad: « N ban g bina bonciɛnn n nyan k a bu buud doug ne ninŋ. L po n te k n pal paa k n bu maad g kɔn n kua po a buol ne.
44024011	A bu fid g bual g diid, dana piig yen ŋanle n nyan, k n baal Serusalɛm g bua k n pug Yendu.
44024012	Baa sua g la’n k n sie g kɔn yen nil g bual k n kpid wounŋ jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, lann i kaa tintaann desiɛɔg n, lann i kaa doug n siɛl buol.
44024013	B biɛ kan fid g ŋɔn, k ban jalg’n yal po mɔlane mɔno tie mɔni.
44024014	Ama min ban yal n ne: Min pug Yendu nba k t yaajanm bo pug i, g tuag Yonmdaan sɔnu. K banm yen yie k l tie sɔnbiiug u, k n yen tuo g yal diɛn Moyis kadaaɔg n yen Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg n kul tie mɔni.
44024015	Min mɔg dindann nba Yendu n ninŋ, b mɔ biɛ mɔg l dindann i. Lan tie g yaa danm nba kpe g tie nimɔnm ii, nibiid ii, b kul tan bu yied.
44024016	L po n te k n l gbaa k n daa mɔg siɛl yaa biid Yendu nunŋ n yen niib buol.
44024017	L tien bina ŋanŋaa n nyan k n tu g be Serusalɛm. N daan kpen k n tod n buolu yen ligli i, g biɛ yid Yendu salg.
44024018	L po n te k n daan be jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, k b tan baal g la’n. L daan sua k n gad k min ŋanm n kua nyan t danm bogda n bual nand nyan i. Niib daan g tigl n buol, siɛl yaa nyɔgl mɔ biɛ daan g tien.
44024019	Ama Asi doug n Suif‑nba yenm daan be. L bo gii tie k ban jalg’n, banm n bo bu fid g sed a nintual n g jalg’n.
44024020	Lann i kaa, niib nba jalg’n mɔlane ń ji ŋɔn ban daan bu’n Suif‑nba buuddanm buol, g la k n biil yal nba.
44024021	L gii g tie min daan sed b nunŋ n, g maad maam nba yen paalu i kaa. N daan maad: “ Min daan g kpienm tan bu yied po n te k b bu’n dinne. ” »
44024022	Feliks n bo ban hal bonŋann, Kristo‑yab jaandi n tie yal nyan, k u lie buud daal g maad: « Sijenm kul ciɛn Lisias gii baal, n bu jiɛl i buud. »
44024023	Lann i g maad sijeciɛn k wan gii guu Pɔl g ji daa mabnd’o bonciɛnn. K wan daa biel u dɔnn‑nba, g ŋaa’b k ban gii baad g nyuan u ninŋ.
44024024	L bo tien dana waam yo, g Feliks tan baal yen u ŋaapuo Drusiil. Wano Drusiil bo tie Suif i. G Feliks te k b yiin Pɔl, g Pɔl maad’b dindann Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ n tie yal nba, k b cenŋ.
44024025	Ama Pɔl n ji bo tan ŋɔnŋ’b nil n baa be nand k l ŋan Yendu po, yen nil n baa so u kua nand, yen buud nba baad ŋanduna po, g jiwaani kua Feliks k u maad Pɔl: « L daa dagd nnyan dinne o. N tan gii la yaam n bu guan g yiin’a. »
44024026	Feliks bo tun g yi Pɔl k b pag k u daan g Pɔl bu te’og ligli i.
44024027	Bina ŋanle bo pend yo, g Pɔrsiyus Fɛstus gaal Feliks yiɛl g te gobna. Feliks n bo bua Suif‑nba pala ń gii man u po nyan, k u ŋaa Pɔl dansaldieog n.
44025001	Fɛstus bo baal u diem n, k l daa ŋantaa daal k u nyiɛ Sesaare g duo Serusalɛm.
44025002	L buol i g salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Suif‑nba nba tie nigbenŋa baal g la’ɔg, g maad k b mɔg maam yen Pɔl.
44025003	Ban bo bobn g bua ban kpi Pɔl sɔnu po nyan, k b maad Fɛstus k wan di sugl g te g Pɔl ń baal Serusalɛm.
44025004	G Fɛstus ŋmiɛn’m g Pɔl luo Sesaare dansaldieog n, k wano mɔno kan wai yen wan lebd Sesaare,
44025005	k b liig yab ń ŋuan’o, k ban gad Sesaare, k b daan gii mɔg maam nba g bu maad g ŋɔn’m Pɔl n biil yal nba, ban maad.
44025006	Fɛstus bo tien l buol dana ŋanniin lann i kaa dana piig kua i. Wan lebd g kun Sesaare k l fann, k u kal ban tu bu buud naan g te k b baal yen Pɔl.
44025007	Pɔl n l pund yaa youg, g Suif‑nba nba nyiɛ Serusalɛm nyan kaan g lind’o, g jalg’o bona bonciɛnn po hal k l biɛ. B yen bo kan fid g ŋɔn k ban jalg’o yal po tie mɔni.
44025008	G Pɔl kɔn u kua po g maad: « N g tien siɛl k l g tuag yen Suif‑nba yiko, n g tien siɛl g biil jaanddeciɛɔnŋ, n biɛ g biil Rom badciɛn mɔ baa siɛl. »
44025009	Fɛstus n bo bua wan manŋ Suif‑nba pala nyan, k u bual Pɔl k nne: « A tuo k a bu gad Serusalɛm ban daan bu’a n nunŋ n, ban jalg’a yal po ii ? »
44025010	G Pɔl ŋmiɛn: « Min be naan ne mɔ tie Rom badciɛn buud buol i. L buol i k b bu bu’n. Fin mɔno a ban k n g biil Suif‑nba baa siɛl.
44025011	L gii tie k n biil siɛl, l gii tie k n tien siɛl k l dagd k ban kpi’n, n kan yie k ban daa kpi’n. Ama l gii tie k ban jalg’n yal nba ne po kul, g baa siɛl g tie mɔni, baa sua g mɔg yiko k wan tug’n g cab’b. N bua g Rom badciɛn mɔno i ń bu n buud. »
44025012	Lann i g Fɛstus pag yen u kpaaga g maad Pɔl: « A yed k a bua Rom badciɛn i ń bu a buud a, lann a bu gad u buol i. »
44025013	L bo tien dana waam yo, g bad Agripa yen Berenis baal Sesaare g bu fuond Fɛstus.
44025014	Ban bo wai l buol nyan, g Fɛstus tan tug Pɔl maam g maad bad k nne: « Jua nne be ne buol ne, Feliks n daan luon’o dansalg.
44025015	Min daan gad Serusalɛm i, g salg-yidkab ciɛnm yen Suif‑nba nikpela baal yen u maam n buol g jalg’o, g maad’n k min jiɛl u buud g te’og biid.
44025016	K n ŋmiɛn’m g Rom yab g maan k ban tuo g nil biil k b yen daa g bu’ug. B daa tu cab l daan wan maad g kɔn u kua po, yab jalg’o nunŋ n i.
44025017	Lann i k min yen banm kul n daan guan ne buol ne, n ji daan g ŋaa k l wai. L daan fann k n kal min tu bu buud naan i, g te k b baal yen l jua.
44025018	Yab kɔn yen’o daan tigl, k n mali k ban bu yed k u biil yal nba baa biɛ i. N yen daan tan sua k l g tie nnyan.
44025019	N daan tan la k b kɔn yen lieb b danm bogda po i yen jua nba k b yi’ug Yiesu nyan po. L jua kpe o, g Pɔl yie k u fei.
44025020	N daan g ban min bu tien nand l maam po, lann i k n bual’o k u bu gad Serusalɛm ban daan bu’ug uu ?
44025021	Ama g Pɔl yie g Canbaaciɛɔnŋ mɔno n bu bu u buud. K n te k b guan g kaan’o, g guu daal nba k n bu te ban gad yen’o Rom badciɛn buol. »
44025022	K Agripa maad Fɛstus: « N bo bua k min mɔno n cenŋ l jua maam. » G Fɛstus ŋmiɛn’o: « Wonn a won bu cenŋ’o. »
44025023	K l fann, k Agripa yen Berenis pund yen yudand nba yab, g kua ban tu bu buud naan. Banm yen sijeciɛnm yen doug n nigbenŋa n bo yeg. G Fɛstus te k b baal yen Pɔl.
44025024	Lann i k wano Fɛstus gaal maam g maad: « Bad Agripa yen yinm nba kul be ne buol ne, jua nba k i nyuan’o ne, Suif‑nba daan g mɔg dindin g baal yen l jua maam g la’n Serusalɛm yen ne buol ne g yign g maad k l tie k l jua miɛl ń junn i.
44025025	Min yaa po, min yen daan g la wan tien yal k l dagd yen kuum. Ama wano mɔno n daan bual g badciɛn n bu u buud nyan, k n yed k ban gad yen’o u buol.
44025026	Min daan kan fid g diɛn baa siɛl lan gii tie mɔni Pɔl maam po, g te badciɛn nyan, l po n te k n te k b baal yen’o i kul nunŋ n, mandg fin bad Agripa nunŋ n, k a bual’o k n fid g la siɛl g diɛn u po.
44025027	G dugn l kan gii mɔg niimn yen min te k ban tug dansalg g gad yen’o, k n yen kan fid g ŋɔn ban yed k u biil yal nba. »
44026001	K Agripa maad Pɔl: « A bu fid g maad g kɔn a kua po. » Lann i g Pɔl don nuu g gaal maam g maad g kɔn u kua po k nne:
44026002	« Bad Agripa, dinne n pal man yen min la yiɛl g bu maad a nunŋ n, g kɔn n kua po Suif‑nba n jalg’n yal nba kul po.
44026003	G dugn a ŋanm g ban Suif‑nba bogda kul yen l maadi. Lann di sugl g cenŋ’n yen yanfuom.
44026004	Suif‑nba kul ban min bo be nand hal n naasend n. B ban hal lan cil, min bo tu be nand yen n doug n niib yen min bo tu be nand Serusalɛm doug n.
44026005	B ban’n hal k l wai. B bu fid g maad k l tie mɔni l gii tie k b bua, k n bo tu be Farisiɛn-nba cagl n i. Suif‑nba jaandi n ninŋ, l cagl n ninŋ binbenu n ŋanm g paa.
44026006	B ji bu’n mɔlane g dugn n guu puoni nba g Yendu bo puon t yaajanm i.
44026007	T buolu n, piig yen cuga ŋanle nba be ŋua Yendu yen b pal kul yendu n yen nyiɛɔg, g guu k wan puon t yaajanm yal ń tien yen mɔni. Bad Agripa, Suif‑nba jalg’n l dindann po i.
44026008	Laabaal k yinm Suif‑nba g tuo g Yendu bu yied kpienm i ?
44026009	Min mɔno, n bo tu mali k l tie mabl i, k min bel niib k ban daa taan Nasarɛt Yiesu sann.
44026010	N bo tien lann i, Serusalɛm doug n. Yendu salg-yidkab ciɛnm n bo cab’n yiko k n suol l niib bonciɛnn g luon dansaldieog n. Ban bo tu jiɛl b buud k ban kpi’b, n mɔ bo tu taa yab bua k ban kpi’b nyan po i.
44026011	N bo tu paa g waa tintaann died n kul g cagn’m, g kpaan k n niin’m k ban yie Yiesu i. N pal bo bie b po g pend, k n ji l ŋua’b hal yen dofani n ninŋ g cagn’m.
44026012	L po n te g diyenn k n bo saa Damas, yen salg-yidkab ciɛnm n bo tie’n yiko nba g sun’n k n suol Yiesu ŋuantieb.
44026013	Bad Agripa, n bo paa sɔnu po yensikpikpalg n, g tan la g yinyiem nyiɛ polu po g paa g cie yendukpaana, k l baal g nyigd g fand min yen yab nba bo yeg.
44026014	K t kul baa tinŋ n, k n gbad g niɛlu nne maad’n Ebro‑nba maam n ninŋ k nne: “ Sɔl, Sɔl, laabaal k a cagn’n i ? A tie nyan naab nba yied k u kan sun u daan tuonn k u yen ŋua g puag’o g tan bu duol’o fam nyan i. ”
44026015	K n bual: “ Yonmdaan, a tie ŋmaa i ? ” G Yonmdaan ŋmiɛn: “ Min n tie Yiesu, a cagn min i.
44026016	Ama fiil g sed. N legd g ŋɔn n kua k a te n tuonsunn. A baa tie n sieda i, g ŋɔnŋ niib ŋan la’n nand dinne yen bona nba k n bu ŋɔn’a dana nba baad.
44026017	N bu sun’a Suif‑nba buol yen buolfanu yab buol. N bu guul’a k b kan fid g tien’a baa siɛl.
44026018	N sun’a k a luod b ninbina i, g nyan’m bunbɔnn n g kuan’m yinyiem n, g fiel’b Sitaan nui n k ban te Yendu yab. Nnyan yab dug n po, n bu piin b biid k ban mɔ ń tan di faal yen yab nba tie Yendu yab. ”
44026019	Bad Agripa, lan ji nyiɛ l buol saa yen dinne, n cɔln Yonmdaan n bo te k n la yal i.
44026020	N daan cind g muand Damas yab yen Serusalɛm yab i, g guan g muand Suude dingbana kul niib yen buolfanu niib. G maad’b k ban lebd b binbem gii ŋua Yendu, gii suun tuona nba ŋɔnŋ k b lebd b binbem yen mɔni.
44026021	L yaa po n te, g Suif‑nba bo suol’n jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n g bua ban kpi’n.
44026022	Ama Yendu guul’n hal k n tan pund dinne. K n biɛ daa l mɔg miɛl, g bu kun mɔni bid yen nikpela buol, g Yendu sogni‑nba yen Moyis n bo maad yal tien o. N g pugd baa siɛl l po.
44026023	B bo maad g Kristo tan bu cagn, k u bu te yua nba bu kpiɛ g yied kpienm siign, g muand yab tie Suif‑nba yen buolfanu yab yinyiem maam. »
44026024	Pɔl n daa bo l maad nnyan g kɔn u kua po, g Fɛstus gaal jad u po g maad: « Pɔl, a tie waad i. A banm bonciɛnn n te k a waad. »
44026025	G Pɔl ŋmiɛn’o: « Canbaa Fɛstus, n g waad kaa, maam nba k n maad ne tie mɔni i g biɛ dagd yen k n maad.
44026026	Bad Agripa ban l kul ne. L po n te k n maad g g jie siɛl u nunŋ n. N ban k u ban l bona kul ne g dugn l bona kul ne daan g tien lɔdg n ninŋ siɛl buol kaa.
44026027	Bad Agripa, a tuo g Yendu sogni‑nba n maad yal tie mɔni ii ? N ban k a tuo k l maam tie mɔni. »
44026028	Lann i k Agripa maad Pɔl: « Ŋan maad’n yal waam nne n bu te min te Kristo‑yua aa ? »
44026029	G Pɔl ŋmiɛn’o: « Min maad’a yal gii tie waam nne ii, lan yab ii, n miɛd Yendu k lan daa tie fin kukua kaa, ama lan gii tie i kul, fin yen yab cenŋ’n dinne, i kul ń te nyan min nyan, g yen daa luol yen kudsiseli. »
44026030	Lann i g bad yen badciɛn yen Berenis yen yab nba bo be l buol nyan kul fiil.
44026031	Ban nyiɛ yaa youg, k b ji maad maad yen b lieb k nne: « Jua ne g biil baa siɛl k l dagd k ban kpi’ug lann i kaa k ban luon’o dansalg. »
44026032	K Agripa maad Fɛstus: « Jua ne bo gii g bual g Rom badciɛn n bu bu’ug, t bo bu fid g luod g ŋaa’ɔg. »
44027001	Ban suol k t bu kua ŋadunŋ g gad Itali, k b tug Pɔl yen dansallei banŋaa nne, g kubn’m Rom sijeciɛn nne k b yi’ug Juliyus. Wano Juliyus bo tie sijenm cagl nba suun Rom badciɛn po nyan ninŋ yend i.
44027002	T bo kua Adramiit doug n ŋadunŋ u. L ŋadunŋ bo bu kagn Asi dingbana i g gad. Tinm yen Maseduann jua nne n bo yeg k b yi’ug Aristark k u nyiɛ Tɛsaloniik.
44027003	K l fann k t pund Sidɔn. G Juliyus diid Pɔl yen nunmanŋ g cab’o k wan gad g fuond u dɔnn‑nba, k ban te’og wan bua yal.
44027004	K t nyiɛ l buol g sua g faalu togd’ti, k t tɔgn g legn Sipr kpendegl.
44027005	K t puod mɔgl nba kpiɛ Silisi yen Panfili, g pund Miira, Lisi doug n.
44027006	L buol i g sijeciɛn la Alɛksandri ŋadunŋ nne k l saa Itali doug n, k u te k t kua.
44027007	T bo g luol g tien dana ŋanŋaa g saa waam waam yen t ŋadunŋ. T bo la fala bonciɛnn yo, g tan fid g pund Kiniid doug n. Nyan faalu n bo togi’ti k t kan fid g gad fagm nyan, k t kpib sɔnu g tɔgn Salmone g legn Krɛt kpendegl.
44027008	T bo cagn nnyan i g saa, g kaag bɔngbann g daan pund siɛl buol nne k b yi Bɔnpɔr, k l kpiɛ yen Lase doug.
44027009	T bo biɛn yaam bonciɛnn hal k l ji tan biɛ t po yen tin fid g sonm yen t ŋadunŋ, g dugn mɔlolu youg bo pend o. L po n bo te g Pɔl bo tuod g maad yab ŋmagd ŋadunŋ k nne:
44027010	« N dɔnn‑nba, n la k t sɔnu ne baa biɛ t po. T ŋadunŋ yen t tuga kul bu biɛl. Tinm mɔno gii g mɔnd t bu biɛl. »
44027011	Ama sijeciɛn bo g cenŋ Pɔl maam, u bo cenŋ yua ŋmagd ŋadunŋ yen yua yen ŋadunŋ maam i.
44027012	Ŋadunŋ sedbuol biɛ bo g ŋan g dugn l bo tie fawaaɔg youg u. L po n te k b ninŋ bonciɛnn bo yie k ban yaad l buol g mɔnd g pund Feniks gii be g sua g fawaaɔg pend. Feniks mɔ bo tie Krɛt doug n ŋadunŋ sedbuol i, k l kua buol be g guan nintual po.
44027013	Faalu nne bo nyiɛ yanbaɔnŋ po g g ŋanm g paa, k b ji mali k b bu fid g pund ban saa naan i. Lann i k b dad g don kudkpiɛga nba tu sen ŋadunŋ nyan, g fiil g kaag g g bua k b fagd yen Krɛt bɔngbann.
44027014	Ama lan yann waam nne, g faalu nne kpid yen paalu kpendegl po, k b yi l faalu Erakilɔn, g baal g yil b po,
44027015	k t gbaa k tin gad faalu n nyiɛ naan po g tan gbal. K l pien g gad yen’ti.
44027016	K t baal g pend kpendegbig nne k b yi Koda k l legn’ti. L buol i k t gbaa gbaa g tan suol ŋadnbig nba k t bo tul yen t ŋadunŋ nyan g don’o.
44027017	G tug ŋui g lol g lind t ŋadunŋ. Nyan ban bo jie k b tan bu gad g tuon Libi bɔngbann tanbiinguona nyan, k b jiin ŋadunŋ cabciɛɔnŋ g ji ŋaa g faalu piend ŋadunŋ g saa.
44027018	L faaciɛnu bo l nyɔgn’ti yen paalu nnyan i, k l tan fann k b gbal g tug tuga g lu mɔgl n.
44027019	L daa ŋantaa po k banm mɔno biɛ tug ŋadunŋ n ninŋ tuonsuntiɛd g lu mɔgl n.
44027020	L bo tien dana ŋanŋaa g faaciɛnu ŋann l paa nnyan i, g sua kan fid g la yendu g bual ŋmaabid. T ji bo g mali mɔno k t bu ciɛl.
44027021	L bo tien dana ŋanŋaa g yab be ŋadunŋ n g dii baa siɛl. Lann i g Pɔl fiil g sed b nunŋ n g maad: « N dɔnn‑nba, i daan bo gii tuo n maam, i daan bo kan fiil Krɛt. Nnyan, fala nba k t la yen t bona nba biɛl ne bo kan biɛl.
44027022	Ama mɔlane n bua g yua kul ń guan g paan u pal g dugn baa sua kan kpe, ŋadunŋ kua n bu biɛl.
44027023	Min ŋua Yendu nba g suun u po ne, sun u malɛg nyiɛɔg ne mɔno
44027024	g maad’n: “ Pɔl daa jie, a bu pund Rom badciɛn nunŋ n. A yaa po Yendu bu fiel yab be ŋadunŋ ne ninŋ kul. ”
44027025	Lann, paan man i pala g dugn n pal paa Yendu po. L bu tien nyan wan maad’n nand nyan i.
44027026	Ŋadunŋ daan bu lu’ti kpendegl nne po i. »
44027027	L bo tien piig yen daa ŋanna g faaciɛnu l piend’ti Mediterane mɔgl po. L piig yen daa ŋanna daal yɔugsiiug u, g yab suun ŋadunŋ n ji mali k t g fag yen bɔngbann.
44027028	Lann i k b lu ŋuu nba k b diɛ g bignd nyan, g sua k l daa tenn g nyua nyan taabana piintaa yen ŋanlile nyan. G ŋadunŋ sud g fagd waam k b biɛ guan g lu ŋuu, g ji la k l tie taabana piinle yen ŋanniin.
