44027029	Nyan ban bo jie g ŋadunŋ tan bu tuon tana nyan, k b lu kudkpiɛga ŋanna nne k l tuul ŋadunŋ puol po k lan sen ŋadunŋ, g ji guu k lan fann tonm.
44027030	Yab suun ŋadunŋ n ninŋ ji bo kpaan k ban san g ŋaa ŋadunŋ u. Lann i k b jiin ŋadnbig nyum po, g ji tua k b bua ban lu ŋadunŋ liig kudkpiɛga nba luol yen ŋui nyan i.
44027031	Ban tien nnyan g Pɔl maad Rom sijeciɛn yen sijebid k nne: « I gii ŋaa g niib ne nyiɛ ŋadunŋ n, i kan ciɛl. »
44027032	Lann i g sijenm ciel ŋui nba bo luol ŋadnbig nyan g ŋaa g nyum tug’l.
44027033	Ban ji bo guu k lan fann nyan, g Pɔl paan b kul pala k ban di jied, g maad’b: « Dinne tie piig yen daa ŋanna n nyan k i be g g dii baa siɛl.
44027034	N miɛd’i k i di sugl g di jied g dugn l bu tod’i yin gii mɔg miɛl. I ninŋ baa sua yukobyeonŋ kan biɛl. »
44027035	Wan maad nnyan g gbenn, k u tug kpanu g tien Yendu balg b kul nunŋ n g jend g ji ŋman.
44027036	Lann i k b kul pala paag k b mɔ dii.
44027037	Tinm nba bo be ŋadunŋ n, t bo taan g tie niib kobiinle yen piinlile yen niib banluob i.
44027038	Ban dii g buo yaa youg, k b tug bii nba k b diɛ g tie kpanu nyan, g lu mɔgl n g ŋadunŋ ń ji daa kpai.
44027039	Lan tan fann yaa youg, g yab suun ŋadunŋ n diid g g bann ban be naan. Ama b bo la g mɔgl kunŋ bil yen tanbiinn, g mɔg nyunlual nne, k b ji mali k l gii tie k l bu fid ban gad g sed l buol.
44027040	Lann i k b lod ŋui nba bo luol yen kudkpiɛga nyan g lu nyum n. G biɛ lod lanbanpipaba nba tu luol k b diɛ g ŋmagd ŋadunŋ nyan, g ji don cabl nba tu luol ŋadunŋ liig po nyan, g faalu ji piend ŋadunŋ g saa yenn mɔgl kunŋ.
44027041	Lann i k b saa saa g daan tuon tanbiinguonn nne nyum n, g liig fel g ŋadunŋ ji kan fid g lie. G nyunguona baal yen paalu g pua g mud ŋadunŋ puol po.
44027042	G sijenm ji bua ban kpi dansali, g baa sua ń tan daa dug nyum g san g ciɛl.
44027043	Ama Rom sijeciɛn n bo bua wan fiel Pɔl nyan, k u bel’b k b g kpii’b. Lann i g cab mɔb g yab ban nyundugnu ń kpiɛ g baa nyum n g dug g nya.
44027044	G lieb ń jɔl jɔl kalaga lann i kaa ŋadunŋ bonjena, g mɔ ń nya. L bo tien nnyan i, k b kul duo bɔngbann g baa siɛl g tien sua.
44028001	T bo ciɛl yo, k b ji maad’ti k tin be kpendegl nba po ne yi Malt i.
44028002	L doug n niib bo ŋanm g gaal’ti. B bo son muu i, g te k t kul baal g yie, g dugn taag bo cil g baa g wad be.
44028003	G Pɔl wod daad g bu lu muu n, jaa waalabl be l n. G muuwalu te k u nyiɛ daad n g jɔl Pɔl nuu g diɛ.
44028004	L doug n niib n yaan la g waalabl juan Pɔl nuu po nyan, k b ji maad b ŋmiɛl n k nne: « Jua ne baa tie nikpiil i. U gbaa gbaa g nyiɛ mɔgl n, ama g Mɔnkundaan yen g bua’ɔg yen miɛl. »
44028005	Ama g Pɔl mii, g waalabl jɔnd g baa muu n. L bo g maad Pɔl baa siɛl.
44028006	B kul ji bo guu g Pɔl ń mɔl i, lann i kaa k wan baa g kpe. Ama lan bo wai k b la k l g tien Pɔl baa siɛl nyan, k b lebd b maalm g maad k u tie yendu i.
44028007	L kpendegl bad bo mɔg kpaab nne g maa ŋaag l n, k l g fag yen l buol. B bo yi’ug Publiyus i. Wano n bo gaal’ti nyan u dɔnn‑nba nyan u ŋaag n, k t tien daa ŋantaa.
44028008	L bo sua k u baa dua yen gbannantounŋ yen sabuonŋ i. G Pɔl kua u buol, g jaand g maan nui u po, k u paag.
44028009	Lann i k l doug n yiɛnlieb kul baal Pɔl buol k u paag b mɔ.
44028010	L buol niib bo cɔln’ti hal bonciɛnn. Tin bo bua n fiil, b bo tie’ti bona nba kul bo bu fid g tod’ti sɔnu po.
44028011	T bo tien l buol ŋmaali yintaa yo, g fid g kua Alɛksandri ŋadunŋ nba bo sed fawaaɔg youg Malt kpendegl bɔngbann nyan. B bo yi l ŋadunŋ Diyoskuur i.
44028012	T bo pund Siirakus doug n g tien l buol daa ŋantaa.
44028013	G nyiɛ l buol g kagn bɔngbann g pund Rejiyo. K l fann g faalu nyiɛ yanbaɔnŋ g pien’ti, k l daa ŋanle po k t pund Pusɔl.
44028014	L doug n i, k t la t ninjanm Kristo‑yab k b gɔgl’ti k tin tien daa ŋanlile yen’m. T bo sonm nnyan i g daan pund Rom.
44028015	T ninjanm Rom Kristo‑yab n gbad t laabaal, g yenm tuog’ti Apiyus daag n, g lieb tuog’ti naan buol nba k b yi Candied-tintaa. Pɔl n la’b yaa youg nba, k u tien Yendu balg k u pal paag.
44028016	Tin tan pund Rom, g Rom yikodanm cab Pɔl k wan kpaan ŋaag gii be, g sije guu’ug.
44028017	Wan pund l daa ŋantaa po, k u yiin Rom Suif‑nba liig yab u ŋaag n. Ban tigl g gbenn yaa youg nba, k u maad’b: « N ninjanm, n g tien siɛl g biil n buolu, n biɛ g tien siɛl k l g tuag yen t yaajanm bogda. Ama b yen suol’n Serusalɛm doug n, g tug’n g tie Rom yab.
44028018	K b bual’n buali g bua ban ŋaa’n, g dugn b bo g la min tien yal k l dagd yen k ban kpi’n.
44028019	G Suif‑nba yie n po, k n tan gbal g maad g Rom badciɛn n bu bu’n. L daan g tie k n bua n maad siɛl g biil n buolu kaa.
44028020	L po n te k n miɛl k min la’i g pag yen’i. Yen mɔni Israyɛl yab n daan yal po n te k b lol’n kudsiseli ne. »
44028021	K b ŋmiɛn’o: « T g gaal siɛl yaa kadaaɔg k l nyiɛ Suude g maad a maam. T ninjanm n ninŋ baa sua biɛ g baal g dugn a maam lann i kaa g maad mabiid a po.
44028022	Ama t bua k fin mɔno ń ŋanm g dugn’ti ŋan mali yal. G dugn t ban g kaannaa kul niib g tuo i cagl po. »
44028023	K banm yen Pɔl suol daal nba k b bu guan u ŋaag n. K l daal pund k b baal g yab. G Pɔl gaal maam siŋaaɔg n saa yen daajuoug, g kun mɔni Yendu diem po. U bo nyii Moyis kadaaɔg po yen Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg po i g ŋɔnŋ’b, g kpaan k ban bann Yiesu n tie yua nba.
44028024	Yenm bo tuo g gaal Pɔl maam, g lieb yie.
44028025	B ji bo tan bua n kun g sua k b daa l g gbad lieb maam, lann i g Pɔl maad’b: « Foŋanm bo mɔg mɔni youg nba k u bo te g Yendu sogni Esaayi maad i yaajanm k nne:
44028026	“ Gad g maad buolu ne: I bu ŋanm g luod i tuba g cenŋ, i yen kan gbad baa siɛl. G ŋanm g nud i ninbina g diid, g yen kan la baa siɛl.
44028027	G dugn b tie kangbada i. B yie g nyal b tuba, g yie g pii b ninbina k ban daa la baa siɛl, g biɛ daa gbad baa siɛl. K lan tan daa kua b pala n, k ban lebd b binbem k n paag’b. ” »
44028028	Lann i g Pɔl biɛ pugn g maad: « Ji bann man g Yendu sun fielu Laabamann yab g tie Suif‑nba po i. Banm n ji bu gaal l Laabamann. » [
44028029	Wan maad l lanbona g gbenn, g Suif‑nba yad g nai nai yen b lieb.]
44028030	Pɔl bo tien bina ŋanle i ŋaag nba ninŋ k u bo pa g be nyan. Niib nba kul bo baad g bu la’ɔg, u bo gaan’m l buol i.
44028031	G maad niib Yendu diem po. G tund niib yen papaal yal nba nyuan Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po, g baa siɛl g mabnd’o.
45001001	Min Pɔl n da kadaaɔg ne. N tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunn i, Yendu n yiin’n k n gii tie u sundu, g lugd’n k n gii muand u Laabamann.
45001002	Yendu bo tuod g puon l Laabamann hal siɛnyoug yo, g te k u sogni‑nba diɛn u kadaaɔg n ninŋ.
45001003	L Laabamann maad u Bija Yiesu Kristo, t Yonmdaan maam i. Wan yaan bo te nifosaal nyan po n te k b bo mal’o k u tie Dafiid yaabuonn.
45001004	Ama Yendu Fuom nba be u ninŋ, g ŋan g gbenn nyan po n te k u yied kpienm siign, g ŋɔn yen paalu k u tie Yendu Bija.
45001005	U yaa po i k n la ŋalbalg g te Yendu sundu, k u sann po, min te g buolfanu niib kul ń gii dug u po gii cɔlm’o.
45001006	I mɔ tie b ninŋ yenm n nyan, yinm nba g Yendu yiin’i k yin te Yiesu Kristo yab.
45001007	N da kadaaɔg ne g tien i kul nba be Rom, g Yendu bua’i, g yiin’i k yin gii tie u niib nyan i. N fuond’i. T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po g te k i yam ń gii dua.
45001008	N daa bu cind g tien n Yendu i balg. Yiesu Kristo po n te k n bu fid g tien’o balg i kul ne po, g dugn ŋanduna n munn kul, niib gbad k i dug Yiesu po.
45001009	Yendu tie n sieda, wano nba k n suun u tuonn yen payenn g muand u Bija Laabamann. U tie n sieda k n tiɛd i po youg kul,
45001010	min yaan l jaand yaa youg nba kul. N miɛd Yendu, k l gii tie u buam n ninŋ, wan ji cab’n sɔnu k n baal i buol.
45001011	L tie payiɛnu i n po, k min la’i, g pi’i paab nba k n gaal Foŋanm buol, k yin ŋanm gii sie k l paa.
45001012	Min bo bua n maad yal tie k tin yaan taan g dug yal nba po ń paan min yen yinm pala i.
45001013	N ninjanm, n bua k yin bann k n jag taal munŋaa kul k n baal i buol k l paad’n i. N bo bua g yab nba be i buol mɔ ń do nyuad n tuonn po, nyan lieb nba tenn g mɔ tie buolfanu yab n duo nyuad nand nyan i.
45001014	L tie mabl i n po, k n tod yab nba k b nuni luod yen yab nba g ban siɛl, g tod yanfodanm yen yanbɔndanm.
45001015	L po n te k n pal kɔn hal bonciɛnn, k min baal g muand yinm nba be Rom mɔ Laabamann.
45001016	Min g jie fai yen k n muand Laabamann, g dugn l tie Yendu paalu i, g be k lan fiel niib nba kul mɔg dindann, lan cil Suif‑nba saa yen yab nba tie buolfanu yab kul.
45001017	L Laabamann n ŋɔn nand nba g Yendu tu yiin nil k u tie nimɔn u nunŋ n ninŋ. Nil dindann kukua po n tu te Yendu ń yed k u tie nimɔn. Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « Yua nba tie nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ, u baa fo g dugn u dindann po. »
45001018	Yendu ŋɔn k u mutuol bu nya hal polu po yo, g jiid nil nba g cɔlm’o po lann i kaa nil nba suun tuonkpiɛdl kul po. Niib nba suun l tuonkpiɛda nyan n g bua g lieb bann mamɔni.
45001019	K l maa b ban nifosaal n bu fid g bann yal nba Yendu po kul, g dugn wano Yendu mɔno n ŋɔn’m g g wuon baa siɛl.
45001020	Yen mɔni, hal ŋanduna cilg youg yo, g Yendu nba g nil kan fid g la’ɔg yen u ninbina nyan bo te g niib la u tuona n ninŋ, g bann k u paalu g mɔg gbennu, g biɛ bann wano Yendu n tie yua nba. Lann, niib ji kan fid g kal k b g ban siɛl.
45001021	Yen ban yaan l ban Yendu nand kul, b yen g dond’o nyan u tie Yendu nyan, b biɛ g tiend’o balg mɔ. B ŋaa lann yo, g bund g diɛ maalm nba g mɔg niimn, k b yanjuanm po te k b ji be bunbɔnn n ninŋ.
45001022	B yi b kua yanfodanm i, g yen tie yankpiena.
45001023	B ŋaa Yendu nba mɔg yudand, g biɛ kan ban g kpe yo, g ji pug nifosaal nba bu kpe g bed yaa ninnaɔnŋ, yen bonyugda, yen bonkobd, yen bonbalnkaa ninnand.
45001024	L po n te g Yendu mɔ ŋaa’b k b suun b tuonjɔgna nyan b yam n suol k ban gii suun nand nyan. K b ji diɛ b gbannand g suun fai tuona g fiɛgd b kua.
45001025	B tug Yendu mamɔni g kpend g gaal faaɔg, g ji pug Yendu n tag yal nba, g nyaan ŋaa wano Yendu nba tie Tagtua, g dagd k ban gii dond’o youg kul. Amɛnn.
45001026	L po n te g Yendu ŋaa’b k b suun ban bua yal nba g fiɛgd b kua. K b puob ji ŋaa k ban gii dua yen jab o g dua yen b puolieb.
45001027	Nnyan i, g jab mɔ ŋaa puob o, g ji tug b niɛnŋ kul g tien b jalieb n ninŋ, g ŋua k ban gii dua yen’m nyan b tie puob nyan. G jab ji diɛ b jalieb g suun yal nba mɔg fai. L po n te k b gaan b gbannand n ninŋ b tudm paaɔg lan bual nand.
45001028	Nyan ban diid g sua k l g tie bonmɔnn b po yen ban gii diɛ Yendu n ŋɔn’m banm nba nyan, g Yendu mɔ ŋaa’b k b diɛ b yul po maalm, maalbiid kukua, g suun yal nba bo g dagd yen ban sun.
45001029	B gbie yen mɔnkunninkpind kua i, yen tonu, yen kunkuam, yen tuonbiɛd. B tug n gbie yen nanŋ i, k b mali nikpinu po kua. Kunkɔna yen bɔndl yen cibl yen tuali kua n gbie b tug n ninŋ.
45001030	B be yen ŋalkudm kua i b lieb po, b g bua Yendu nublu. B tie filkpaandanm i, jigbeldanm yen jipaadanm. B yam fo tuonbiid sunu n ninŋ kua i. B g cɔln b danm maam.
45001031	B tie yukpiena i, mɔi yinle danm. B pala g siɛd nil po, b biɛ g jie nil ninbaaɔg.
45001032	B ban g Yendu nyan yiko g maad g yab nba suun l tuonbuolu, b nyuad tie kuum i. Ama yen l kul ne, b yen l suun l tuonbiid i, g biɛ tua g yab nba mɔ suun nnyan, k b suun tuonŋann i.
45002001	Fin nba tie nifosaal, g jalg a lua k u tien biid nyan, a mɔ g mɔg ciɛlu. A gii bua ŋan gii tie yua nba kul, ŋan jalg a lieb nyan, a gɔ g jalg a kua i. G dugn fin nba jalg lieb nyan, a mɔ tie nyan banm nyan i.
45002002	T yen ban g Yendu bu jiɛl yab nba suun l tuona nyan buud lan bual nand.
45002003	K fin nifosaal nba jalg lieb l bontitied po, g mɔ yen suun nyan banm nyan i, a mali k a bu nya Yendu buud n ninŋ yaa aa ?
45002004	Bii a yiin Yendu buaciɛnm yen u sugl yen u pasɔnŋl kul fam i ? A g ban g Yendu buam be k lan tod’a k a mɔ kua a biid po, g lebd a binbem ii ?
45002005	Ama ŋan tie kangbadl, g biɛ yie k a kan lebd a binbem nyan, a taand mutuol nba yab i g kulg a kua g guu mutuol daal. L daal i g Yendu bu ŋɔn k u tie mɔnkundaan.
45002006	L daal i k u bu pa nil kul u tuona paaɔg.
45002007	Yab nba tie ŋanm youg kul, g kpaan Yendu yudand yen u sel yen miɛl nba g mɔg gbennu nyan, Yendu bu te banm i miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
45002008	Ama yab nba bua b yal kua, g yie mamɔni sɔnu u, g ŋaa g bonbiil kukua ŋmagd b binbem nyan, Yendu mutuol yen u pabɔnn bu lag b po i.
45002009	Nil nba suun bonbiil kul, fala yen cicagm n tan bu lag u po. L bu cil Suif‑nba i, g tuan buolfanu yab.
45002010	Ama yab nba tie ŋanm nuan, Yendu bu te’b yudand, g seln’m, g te k b yam ń duan. U bu cil Suif‑nba i, g tuan buolfanu yab.
45002011	G dugn Yendu yaa buol lugdm g be.
45002012	Yab nba kul tien biid g daa g bann Yendu Mɔmaam, b bu biɛl, baa b gii g tug l Mɔmaam g jiɛl b buud. Ama yab nba kul bann l Mɔmaam o, g yen yuand g tien biid nyan, b bu tug l Mɔmaam i g bu’b.
45002013	K l maa l g tie yab nba cenŋ Mɔmaam kaa tie nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n, yab nba cɔln l Mɔmaam, Yendu bu yiin banm i nimɔnm.
45002014	Buolfanu yab g mɔg Moyis n bo diɛn yiko nba. Ama b gii diɛ b yul po maalm g suun yen tuonn, k l tuag yen yiko n maad yal nba, yen ban g ban yiko nand kul, banm mɔno ji tie yiko i b kua po.
45002015	L ŋɔn g yiko n maad yal nba diɛn g bil b pala n ninŋ i. B yam mɔ biɛ gad’b l po, g yenn youg b pala g man b kua po yen ban sun yal nba, g liel youg mɔ b kɔn b kua po g ban k b mɔg mɔni.
45002016	Nyan Laabamann nba k n muand n maad nand nyan, l kul bu dɔgd yaa daal nba g Yendu bu te g Yiesu Kristo ń bu yua kul n wuod yal nba u pal n ninŋ.
45002017	Fin nba yi a kua Suif, g nyii Moyis yiko po, g donŋ a kua g dugn a Yendu po,
45002018	a ban Yendu n bua yal nba, g yiko ŋɔn’a yal nba tie bonmɔnn,
45002019	a pal n ninŋ, a l diɛ k fin n ŋmagd juanm, k a tie yinyiem i yab nba be bunbɔnn n ninŋ po,
45002020	a mali k fin n fand yanbɔndanm, g tund bid, k l maa a ban g yal nba tie banm yen mamɔni kul be yiko kadaaɔg n ninŋ i.
45002021	A tund lieb, g bɛ n te k a g tund a kua i ? A muand g niib ń daa jaan, k fin mɔno yen jaan.
45002022	A maad niib k ban daa conm, k l tien nle i k a conm i ? A g bua yennaankad maam, g yen jaan bona nba be lieb tingbandied n.
45002023	A donŋ a kua g Yendu tie fin i u Mɔmaam, g biɛ yen ji kuand’o fai g dugn a g cɔln l Mɔmaam.
45002024	Yendu Kadaaɔg maad lann n nyan: « Buolfanu yab biid Yendu sann g dugn i po i. »
45002025	A gii kɔnd Suif‑nba kɔnd, g cɔln Moyis yiko, l kɔnd baa mɔg nyuad a po, ama a gii g cɔln yiko nuan, a daa g kɔnd.
45002026	Yua nba g tie Suif, g g kɔnd palb g yen cɔln yiko, Yendu yaa po u kɔnd o.
45002027	I mɔg yiko k l diɛn kadaaɔg n, k i biɛ kɔnd. Ama yin g cɔln l yiko nyan, yua nba g kɔnd palb, g yen cɔln yiko n tan bu jiɛl i buud.
45002028	Yua nba tie Suif yen mɔni g tie yua nba g nil bu la u gbanu g bann kaa. Kɔnd mɔ biɛ g tie banm nba be nil gbannand po g niib nyuan kaa.
45002029	Yua nba tie Suif yen mɔni, l be u pal n ninŋ i. Kɔnd mɔ biɛ tie pal n ninŋ yal i. Foŋanm n kɔnd yua nba, l daan n kɔnd yen mɔni, l g tie yua nba kɔnd nyan lan diɛn Moyis yiko kadaaɔg n ninŋ nand nyan kaa. Yua nba tie Suif yen mɔni yaa pinpagd g nya niib buol kaa, l nya Yendu buol i.
45003001	L gii tie nnyan, Suif mɔg bɛ nyuad i g cie nilieb i ? Lann i kaa, Suif‑nba kɔnd mɔg bɛ nyuad i ?
45003002	Nyuad nuan be g yab hal bonciɛnn. Yenm, Yendu bo tie Suif‑nba i u mɔbona.
45003003	B ninŋ siɛb gii ŋaa g g tie Yendu n yed k ban gii tie yal nba mɔno, l po ji bu te g Yendu mɔ kan tien wan bo puon yal nba ii ?
45003004	Kai, lann g be. L bual g Yendu nuan ń gii tie mamɔnmaad i, g nifosaal kul tie faaɔgdaan. Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « L bual k a maam n ninŋ, sua kul ń bann k a tie mamɔnmaad i, buud buol mɔ ŋan di mɔni. »
45003005	To, k t tuonbiid gii te g nil kul nyuan g Yendu tie mamɔnmaad i, t ji bu yed g bɛ ? T bu fid g maad g Yendu g mɔg mɔni yen wan dad t tubl ii ? (N maad nifosaal n mali nand i).
45003006	Palb, t kan fid g maad nnyan. G dugn, l gii tie nnyan, Yendu tan kan fid g bu ŋanduna buud.
45003007	Sua bu fid g maad: « N faaɔg gii te g Yendu mamɔni yad kaannaa kul k u yudand pugd, bɛ po i g Yendu biɛ yen ji bu jalg’n k n tie biiddaan i ? »
45003008	L tien nnyan i g ŋalaacidanm waa g tua k n maad g niib ń gii tie bonbiil, k lan baal yen bonŋann. Yendu mɔg mɔni yen wan dad l nibuolu tubl.
45003009	I la nle ? Tinm Suif‑nba biɛ bu fid g maad k t cie nilieb ii ? Kai kai. N ŋɔn lann g gbenn o, mii tuonbiid yend Suif‑nba yen buolfanu yab kul o.
45003010	Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « Nimɔn g be, baa yend.
45003011	Sua g be g gbiɛ bona niimn, baa sua g kpaan Yendu.
45003012	Niib kul kpiɛd sɔnu u. B kul ji taan g be biid n i. Baa sua g be g tie ŋanm, baa yend.
45003013	B kunkɔla tie nyan kakula nba yaa nyan i, b lani ban bɔndl kukua i, yal nba nya b mɔi n ninŋ biɛ nyan waalabl lɔbd nyan i.
45003014	B mɔi gbie yen mɔpola yen matonm kukua i.
45003015	Nikpinu nuan b kagi yenn.
45003016	B gii tɔgn naan buol kul, b baad yen tuonbiidu yen fala kukua i.
45003017	Laafiɛ sɔnu nuan, banm g ban lann.
45003018	B g jie Yendu. »
45003019	T yen ban g yiko n maad yal nba kul, l nyuan yab nba k l yiko ŋmagd b binbem i. L tien nnyan g sua ń daa la wan bu kal yal nba g ciɛl i, g buud daal Yendu ń la g nil kul tie biiddaan.
45003020	L po n te g Yendu tan kan yed g sua tie nimɔn k l maa u sun yiko n yed k wan sun yal nba. Yiko nuan be k lan ŋɔn nil u biid i.
45003021	To, mɔlane Yendu ji ŋɔn’ti yal nba bu te wan yiin’ti nimɔnm. Lann ji g tie yiko yal kaa. Mɔni, Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg yen Yendu sogni‑nba kadaaɔg bo tuod g maad l maam.
45003022	Yab nba dug Yiesu Kristo po i g Yendu yi’b nimɔnm. Nimɔnm tie yab nba kul l tug b kua g cab Yiesu Kristo g dug u po i, g dugn b siign ninŋ paadu g be,
45003023	k l maa niib kul tien biid o. B kan fid g la Yendu yudand.
45003024	Yendu ŋalbalg po i k u te k b ji tie nimɔnm u po. Yiesu Kristo n nyan’m biid n nyan, l tie paab i k u pii’b.
45003025	Wano Yiesu i g Yendu bo tug’o g yid salg k u sɔm ń te g niib nba dug u po nyan biid ń piin. U tien nnyan k wan ŋɔn u mɔnkund i. G dugn u pasɔnŋl po n bo te k u ŋaa yab nba bo tien biid siɛnyoug nyan, g g dad b tubl.
45003026	Mɔlane u ji bua n ŋɔn u mɔnkund k ban bann k u tie mamɔnmaad, k wan fid g te g yab nba dug Yiesu po kul ń gii tie nimɔnm wano Yendu nunŋ n.
45003027	Nil biɛ mɔg wan bu fid gii pua jipaad yal nba po ii ? Palb, lann ji g be. Bɛ po i k l g be i ? L g be g dugn l ji g tie nil tuona po kaa, u dindann po i.
45003028	G dugn, t ban g nil dindann po i g Yendu bu yiin’o nimɔn, l g tie Moyis yiko n ŋɔn k wan sun tuona nba po kaa.
45003029	Bii Yendu tie Suif‑nba kukua yaa Yendu yaa aa ? U g tie buolfanu yab yaa Yendu uu ? U tie buolfanu yab mɔ yaa Yendu,
45003030	k l maa Yenduyeno kukua n be, g bu te Suif‑nba yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba kul ń te nimɔnm g dugn b dindann po.
45003031	K tin maad nand ne i, l ji bua n maad k t dindann po, Moyis yiko ji g tie siɛl yaa aa ? N n, l g tie nnyan, t bua n ŋɔn g yiko l tie bonmɔnn i canyiin.
45004001	To, k t ji bu maad bɛ i t yaaja Abraham po i ? U bo duo bɛ nyuad i ?
45004002	L bo gii tie Abraham tuona po i g Yendu yiin’o nimɔn, u bo bu fid gii pua jipaad. Ama u yen kan fid g pua jipaad Yendu buol nuan.
45004003	Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni maad bɛ i ? K Abraham bo dug Yendu po i, g Yendu yiin’o nimɔn.
45004004	Nil gii sun tuonn, wan bu gaal yal nba g tie paab kaa k b pii’ug, l tie u tuonn paaɔg u.
45004005	Ama yua nba g sun siɛl yaa tuonn, g nyaan yen dug Yendu po nyan, wano i g Yendu nba jie biiddaan ninbaaɔg bu yiin’o nimɔn k l maa u dug u po.
45004006	Nnyan i g Dafiid mɔ bo maad, g daan nba g Yendu yiin’o nimɔn, k l g tie u tuona po kaa, g pamann tie l daan yal i. U bo maad:
45004007	« Yab nba g Yendu dii sugl b tuonbiɛd po, g piin b biid, pamann tie b yal i.
45004008	Daan nba g Yonmdaan g tiɛn u biid, pamann tie u yal i. »
45004009	L pamann tie yab nba kɔnd Suif‑nba kɔnd kua yal bii l tie yab nba g kɔnd mɔ yaa yal i ? T maad mɔlane i k Abraham bo dug Yendu po i k u yiin’o nimɔn.
45004010	Bɛ youg u k u bo yiin’o nimɔn i ? L bo sua k u kɔnd bii k u daa g kɔnd i ? L bo sua k u daa g kɔnd.
45004011	Kɔnd nuan, u bo tan yuand i g gaal l banm, k l bil nyan tanpal nyan u po, g ŋɔnŋ k wan yaan bo dug Yendu po i k u yiin’o nimɔn. L sua k u daa g kɔnd mɔno. Lann, u tie yab nba g kɔnd g yen dug Yendu po kul yaaja i, g Yendu ń yiin’m nimɔnm g dugn b dug u po.
45004012	Yab nba kɔnd mɔ, Abraham n biɛ tie b yaaja. L g tie yab nba ji bund g be g tua k b kɔnd kaa, l tie yab nba tuag t yaaja Abraham taabuod n ninŋ i, g dug Yendu po nyan wano mɔno n bo dug Yendu po nand g daa tie jol nyan.
45004013	Abraham bo g cɔln yiko kaa g Yendu puon’o, k wano lann i kaa u yaabuona tan bu yend ŋanduna. Wan yaan bo dug Yendu po i k u bo puon’o l puoni.
45004014	L bo gii tie g nil ń cɔln yiko i g yend Yendu puoni, lann dindann bo baa tie fam i, Yendu puoni mɔ bo kan gii mɔg siɛl yaa nyuad.
45004015	G dugn yiko nuan fiind Yendu mutuol i. Ama naan buol g yiko g be, b kan fid g maad g nil miid yiko kual.
45004016	Lann Abraham dindann po i, g Yendu bo puon l puoni, k l puoni ń gii tie paab Abraham yaabuona kul po. L g tie u yaabuona nba cɔln yiko yal kukua kaa, yab nba dug Yendu po nyan wano Abraham nyan, l tie b mɔ yaa yal i. G dugn Abraham tie t kul yaaja i.
45004017	Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad nand nyan: « N te k a tie buoli bonciɛnn yaaja. » Wano n tie t yaaja Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ. Yendu nba k u bo dug u po nyan n te g yab nba bo kpe guan g fo, g te g yal nba bo g be ji be.
45004018	Abraham ji bo g mɔg wan nyii yal nba po g daan k u bu mal big, ama k u yen l dug Yendu po. Nnyan i k u bo tan te buoli bonciɛnn yaaja, nyan lan bo tuod g diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ g maad nand nyan: « A yaabuona tan baa ja nne i. »
45004019	Abraham ji bo mɔg nyan bina kobg nyan i, g tu diid u gbanu g sua k u nag kuum o, g diid u ŋaapuo Sara g sua k u mɔ ciɛnd yen madug o, ama yen l kul ne, u dindann bo g wad baa waam.
45004020	Yal nba tie Yendu puoni po nuan, u bo g ban g mali munle-le l po. U dindann bo pugd’o paalu i, k u dond Yendu,
45004021	k u pal paa g Yendu bu fid g tien wan puon yal nba kul.
45004022	L po n te g « Yendu bo yiin’o nimɔn ».
45004023	Ama lanbona nba maad g « Yendu yiin’o nimɔn » nyan bo g diɛn u po kukua kaa.
45004024	L bo diɛn t mɔ yaa po i, Yendu tan bu yiin t mɔ nimɔnm k l maa t dug u po, wano nba yied t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo g nyan’o kpienm siign.
45004025	T tuonbiid po i k u bo tug’o g tie, k b kpii’ug, k u yied’o g nyan’o kpienm siign, k wan te k tin mɔ ń te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n.
45005001	Lann, tin yaan dug Yendu po i, k u te k t tie nimɔnm u nunŋ n, g guan g manŋ yen’o g dugn t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po.
45005002	Tin yaan dug wano Yiesu po nyan, k u te k t fid g la Yendu ŋalbalg g diɛ k l paa. T kpanm g dugn t mɔg dindann g Yendu yudand tan baa tie t kul yal i.
45005003	L g tie lann kukua kaa, t gii be fala n ninŋ mɔno t tu kpanm i, g dugn t ban g fala baad yen juunn i nil po,
45005004	g juunn mɔ baad yen mindl bigna youg, g mindl baad yen dindann.
45005005	Dindann mɔ yen kan kuan’ti fai n ninŋ, g dugn Yendu tie’ti Foŋanm k u ŋɔn’ti g Yendu bua’ti hal bonciɛnn.
45005006	Yen mɔni, yaa youg nba k t daa bo kan fid g tien siɛl i, g Kristo kpe tinm biiddanm po, Yendu n bo sen k u bu kpe yaa youg.
45005007	Yen mɔni, yua nba tie bona kul lan bual nand mɔno, l paa yen nil ń tuo g gaal u po g kpe. Yua nba tie nimɔn nuan, l g kua sua tan bu fid g pua pal g gaal u po g kpe.
45005008	Ama Yendu nuan yen ŋɔn’ti wan bua’ti nand, g dugn yaa youg nba k t daa bo tie biiddanm i, g Kristo gaal t po g kpe.
45005009	U tuo g yid u miɛl salg k t mɔ ji te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n o, bɛ po i k u ji kan fiel’ti k tin daa baa Yendu mutuol n ninŋ i ?
45005010	G dugn, yaa youg nba k t daa bo tie Yendu ninnanda, g Yendu yen guan g manŋ yen’ti g dugn u Bija bo kpe t po, g mɔlane tin ji man yen’o ne, u kan fiel’ti g dugn u Bija n fo nyan po ii ?
45005011	L g tie lann kukua kaa mɔno, t pal man Yendu po bonciɛnn, g dugn t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po, wano nba te k t guan g manŋ yen Yendu.
45005012	Niyend po i g biid kua ŋanduna n ninŋ, g baal yen kuum, g niib kul ji kpenn, g dugn niib kul tien biid.
45005013	Biid nuan bo tuod g be ŋanduna n ninŋ g sua g Yendu daa g tie Moyis u Mɔmaam. Yendu n daa bo g tie Moyis u Mɔmaam nyan, u bo g dugd nil biid.
45005014	Ama lan cil Adam youg saa yen Moyis youg, kuum nuan bo l be i, g dii yen niib nba k b biid bo g tie nyan Adam n bo sun tuonkpiɛdl nba nyan mɔno. Adam n bo tie nil nba bo tan bu baal nyan yaa ninnaɔnŋ.
45005015	G nyaan Adam tuonbiid, yen Yendu n piin paab nba fam yen g taa, l biɛ g ja. G dugn, l tie mɔni i k wano niyend ne po i, g niib bonciɛnn kpe, ama niyend mɔ yaa po i, g Yendu ŋɔnŋ niib bonciɛnn u ŋalbalg nba yab, g piin’m u paab nba g mɔg lan ja yen yal nba. L nil n tie Yiesu Kristo.
45005016	Niyend tuonbiid n baad yen yal nba kan nand yen Yendu paab, g dugn niyend n bo sun tuonbiiug k b jiɛl u buud k l baal yen tubdadu, ama Yendu paab nuan tie g niib sun tuonbiid bonciɛnn g Yendu yen cab’b, g g dad b tubl.
45005017	L gii tie g niyend kukua yaa tuonbiid po g kuum ji mɔg nuu yua kul po, g yab nba ji la Yendu ŋalbalg nba g mɔg po, k u cab’b k b g mɔg biid, g dugn Yiesu Kristo kukua po, l danm ji kan gii mɔg nuu bonn kul po b binbem n ninŋ g dugn u po ii ?
45005018	Lann, nyan niyend biid n bo baal yen tubdadu niib kul po nyan, nnyan i g niyend mɔ yaa tuonŋann po te g Yendu nyanŋ niib kul buud n ninŋ, g tien’m miɛl.
45005019	Nyan niyend ninkuam n bo te g niib bonciɛnn te biiddanm nyan, nnyan mɔ i g niyend cɔlunŋ po bu te g niib bonciɛnn ń te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ.
45005020	Yendu bo tan yuand i g tie Moyis u Mɔmaam g niib biid ń ŋanm g pugn, ama naan buol g biid pugn nyan, l buol i g Yendu ŋɔn k u ŋalbalg g mɔg lan ja yen yal nba.
45005021	Lann, nyan biid po n bo te g niib kpenn nyan, nnyan i g Yendu ŋalbalg po mɔ te g niib te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n, g la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn g dugn t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po.
45006001	K l gii tie nnyan, t ji bu yed g bɛ ? K tin gii tie biid o g Yendu ŋalbalg ń gii pugd ii ?
45006002	Palb, lann kan tien. Tinm kpe biid kuum o, l biɛ bu tien nle i tin gii tie biid i ?
45006003	Bii i g ban k t kul nba wul nyum Yiesu Kristo sann po, k t nyunwulu n ninŋ t taan yen’o i g kpe i ?
45006004	Lann t nyunwulu youg u k t bo taan g kpe yen’o, k b taan g pii’ti yen’o, k t mɔ yaa binbem ń ji pand gii tie binbepaanm nyan t Baa Yendu n yied Kristo kpienm siign yen u yudand nyan.
45006005	G dugn, t kuum gii nand yen u kuum, k tinm yen wano kul ji taan g tie bonyenn, t tan bu taan yen’o nnyan i t yiedu youg mɔ.
45006006	Tin ŋanm man g bann bonyenn: tin bo kpiɛ g mɔg yaa tɔgu nba nyan, b bo taan l tɔgu i yen Kristo g kpaa dapunpɔnn po, k t tɔgkpelu nba bo kuand’ti biid n nyan ń bod canyiin, g biid ń ji daa diɛ’ti nyan yonmi nyan.
45006007	G dugn yua nba kpe nuan fuod yen biid n nyan.
45006008	Tin yaan kpe yen Kristo nyan i k t dug k t baa fo yen’o mɔ.
45006009	T yen ban g Kristo n yied kpienm siign nyan, u ji kan ban g kpe, kuum ji g mɔg nuu u po.
45006010	Wan kpe yaa kubuolu nyan, u kpe biid kuum i taal yenm kua. Wan ji be binbem nba ne, u ji be Yendu po i.
45006011	I mɔ ń ji tug g bil i pala n ninŋ, k i kpe biid kuum o, k i ji fo Yendu po i, yen Yiesu Kristo.
45006012	Lann ji daa ŋaa man g biid ń yend i gbannand nba tan bu bed g te k yin gii suun i gbannand n bua yal nba.
45006013	Biɛ ji daa tug man baa i gbannand bɔgyenn g cab biid, k lan gii tie nyan tuonsuntiɛɔg nyan g suun yal nba g ŋan. Tug man i munn kul g cab Yendu nyan i tie niib nba nyiɛ kuum n ninŋ, g guan g mɔg miɛl nyan, gii tie nyan tuonsuntiɛɔg nyan g suun yal nba ŋan.
45006014	Biid ji kan fid g yend’i g dugn i g dug Moyis yiko po kaa g be, i dug Yendu ŋalbalg po i.
45006015	K nle jig i ? T ji baa tie biid k t be Yendu ŋalbalg youg uu, g Moyis yiko g mɔg nuu t po ii ? Palb, lann kan tien.
45006016	I g ban k i gii tug i kua g cab nil g te u yonmi g cɔlm’o, i ji baa l tie yin cɔln yua nba nyan yonmi yen mɔni ii ? I gii tug i kua g tien biid yonmi, l nyuad tie kuum i. I gii tug i kua g tien Yendu yonmi g cɔlm’o, l nyuad tie k i bu la binbem nba ŋan g dagd Yendu po.
45006017	Ama t tiend Yendu balg, g dugn yinm nba bo tie biid yonmi siɛnyoug, mɔlane i ji cɔln yen i pal kul ban yaan tie’i tundl g ŋɔn’i k yin gii cɔln yal nba kul.
45006018	I nyiɛ biid yonmd n ninŋ g ji tie yonmi nba be k ban gii suun yal nba ŋan g dagd Yendu po kukua.
45006019	N maad nifuog n bu maad nand yin gbad i, g dugn i tie nifosaalb i, i g paa yen siɛl. Siɛnyoug, i bo tug i munn kul g cab nyan yonmi nyan i, g suun tuonjɔgna yen yal nba l kpiɛd kul, g ji be binbem nba g dagd Yendu po. Mɔlane, ji tug man i munn kul g cab nyan yonmi nyan, gii suun yal nba ŋan g dagd Yendu po, g siɛl yaa jɔgnd ń ji daa be i binbem n ninŋ.
45006020	Yin bo tie biid yonmi yaa youg nba, siɛl bo g mabnd’i k yin gii suun yal nba ŋan g dagd Yendu po.
45006021	Tuona nba k i bo suun k l ji mɔg i fai mɔlane nyan, i bo duo bɛ nyuad i l po i ? L tuonbuolu baad yen kuum i.
45006022	Ama mɔlane nuan yin ji nyiɛ biid yonmd n ninŋ g te Yendu yonmi nyan, i nyuad tie g Yendu kukua n ji yen’i k i suun tuona nba ŋan g dagd u po, k i biɛ tan bu la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
45006023	G dugn biid paaɔg tie kuum i, ama Yendu n piin paab nba n tie miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn g dugn t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po.
45007001	N naataani, i tuod g ban min bu maad yal nba ne, g dugn i ban yiko. I yen ban g yiko bu fid g suol nil yaa youg nba k u daa be g mɔg miɛl kukua i.
45007002	L tie nyan puo n tu kun jua nyan i. Yiko po, l tie mabl i k wan gii be u sal nuu n ninŋ yaa youg nba k u sal daa be g mɔg miɛl. Ama u sal gii kpe, l yiko ji kan fid g mabn’o k wan biɛ l gii be u sal nuu n ninŋ.
45007003	U sal daa gii be g mɔg miɛl, k wano puo yen kun jafan, b bu yiin’o cunconn i. Ama u sal gii kpe nuan, yiko ji g mɔg nuu l puo po, u ji bu fid g kun jafan k l g tie k u tien cunconm.
45007004	N naataani, l tie nnyan i i mɔ yaa po. Yal tie yiko po nuan, i kpe l yaa kuum o, g dugn yinm yen Kristo n yaan taa gbannand nyan. I ji tie nifan yab i, yua nba yied kpienm siign k tin mɔ ń ji fid gii suun tuonmɔna Yendu po nyan.
45007005	Yen mɔni, tin mɔ n daa bo be nyan t yam n suol k tin gii be nand nyan, yiko n yaan baad yen maalbiid nba kukua n bo yend t gbannand kul, g te k t suun tuona nba bu kuan’ti kuum n ninŋ.
45007006	Ama mɔlane nuan, t nyiɛ yiko mabl n ninŋ o, g dugn t kpe yen yal nba bo diɛ’ti dansalg o. T ji bu fid gii suun Yendu po yen maalpaanm, g Foŋanm ŋmagd’ti. T ji kan gii suun yen maalkpelm kaa. Ban bo diɛn yal nba k l daa ŋmagd’ti n bo te k t suun nnyan.
45007007	T ji bu yed g bɛ ? G yiko tie bonbiiug uu ? Palb, l g tie nnyan. Ama yiko bo gii g be, n bo kan bann biid n tie yal nba. N bo kan bann yal nba tie nunfufuug l bo gii sua g yiko g maad: « A nunŋ ń daa fu a lua bonn po ».
45007008	Biid la sɔnu mɔmaam buol i g te k n nunŋ ji fu bonn kul po, k l maa yiko bo gii g be biid bo kan fid g tien siɛl.
45007009	Siɛnyoug, min daa bo g ban yiko, n bo mɔg miɛl g fo, ama min yaan ji tan gbad mɔmaam yaa youg, g biid yend n binbem,
45007010	k n kpe. Mɔmaam bo tie k lan baal yen miɛl i, ama k n yaa buol k l ji baal yen kuum.
45007011	G dugn biid la sɔnu l buol i, g tug mɔmaam g bɔnd’n g te k n kpe l mɔmaam po.
45007012	Lann yiko g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd, mɔmaam mɔ biɛ g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd. L tuag mamɔni sɔnu g biɛ ŋan.
45007013	K nnyan i, yal nba ŋan nyan n tan baal yen n kuum ii ? Kai, lann kaa. Biid n baal yenn. Biid laan bonŋann n ninŋ i g baal yen n kuum. L tien nnyan g biid ń ŋɔn yen mɔni wan tie yal nba, g mɔmaam mɔ ń te g biid ń ŋanm g yabd g pend.
45007014	T ban g yiko nyiɛ Yendu buol i, min nuan yen tie nifosaal i, k b kuad’n nyan yonm nyan g biid daa’n.
45007015	N g ban min suun yal nba. Min bua k n sun yal nba, n g suun, ama yal nba k n g bua k n sun nyan, n suun lann i.
45007016	L gii tie k n suun min g bua yal nba, n tuo g yiko ŋan.
45007017	Lann, min mɔno kaa suun nnyan, biid nba be n ninŋ nyan n suun l tuonn.
45007018	N ban g siɛl yaa bonŋann g be n ninŋ, n maad min tie nifosaal nyan po i. N bua bonŋann tienu nuan, n yen kan fid g tien i.
45007019	N bua k n gii tie ŋanm i, g yen g fid g tie, ama biid nba k n g bua k n tien nyan, n biɛ ji tie lann i.
45007020	K l gii tie k n suun min g bua k n sun yal nba, lann min kaa suun, biid nba be n ninŋ nyan n suun u tuonn.
45007021	Min n ji tan la g yal nba be n ninŋ n ne: N gii kpaan k n tien ŋanm, n tu tan sua g bonbiiug kua i k n bu fid g tien.
45007022	N pal n ninŋ, n bua yiko nba nyiɛ Yendu buol,
45007023	ama n yen la g yiko liel biɛ be n ninŋ g kɔn yen n yam n yaan tuo yiko nba nyan, g te k n tie nyan dansalg nyan g cɔln biid yiko nba be n ninŋ.
45007024	N tie cicagdaan i paaa. Ŋmaa bu fiel’n g nyan’n gbannand nba bua kuan’n kuum n ninŋ ne i ?
45007025	Yendu ń gaal balg, wano kua n bu fid g fiel’n t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po. Lann, n pal n ninŋ, n ŋua Yendu yiko i, ama k n gbannand n ninŋ k n ŋua biid yiko.
45008001	To, mɔlane buud ji kan di yab nba be yen Yiesu Kristo.
45008002	G dugn Foŋanm yikod nba tien miɛl Yiesu Kristo po nyan n fiel’a, g biid yen kuum ji g mɔg yikod a po.
45008003	Moyis yiko n bo kan fid g tien yal nba, g dugn nifosaal gbalm po bo te k l yiko ji g mɔg paalu, Yendu nuan tien lann n nyan: U sun u Bija mɔno i k u baal g mɔ mɔg gbannand nba g biiddanm mɔg, g yid l gbannand salg biid po, g gbenn biid maam nil gbannand n ninŋ.
45008004	U tien nnyan k tin fid gii suun yiko n bual k tin gii suun yal nba k l ŋan kul i, g dugn tinm nuan ji g bund g be nyan t yam n suol nand nyan kaa, t be nyan Foŋanm n bua nand i.
45008005	Yen mɔni, yab nba bund g be nyan b yam n suol nand nyan nuan mali k ban sun b yanbuatuona kukua i, ama yab nba be nyan Foŋanm n bua nand nba n mali k ban sun Foŋanm n bua yal nba.
45008006	Yua nba tug u maalm g tien u yanbuatuona n ninŋ nuan, l baad yen kuum i. Ama yua nba tug u maalm g tien Foŋanm n ninŋ, wano n bu la miɛl, u yam ń biɛ gii dua.
45008007	Yab nba k b yanbuatuona yend b maalm, b tie Yendu ninnanda i, g dugn b g cɔln Yendu Mɔmaam, b biɛ kan l fid g cɔln mɔ.
45008008	Yab nba k b yanbuatuona yend’b, b kan fid g manŋ Yendu pal.
45008009	Ama yinm nuan, i yanbuatuona kaa yen’i, Foŋanm n yen’i, g dugn Yendu Fuom be i ninŋ. Yua nba g Kristo Fuom g be u ninŋ, u g tie Kristo‑yua.
45008010	Kristo gii be i ninŋ, baa yen i gbannand n l tie yal nba g kuum bu di g dugn biid po mɔno, Foŋanm nba be i ninŋ nyan bu te’i miɛl g dugn i ji tie nimɔnm i Yendu po.
45008011	Yendu Fuom nba te g Yiesu yied kpienm siign nyan gii be i ninŋ, wano nba yied Kristo kpienm siign nyan bu te k u Fuom nba be i ninŋ nyan ń guan g te k i gbannand ń gii fo.
45008012	Lann, n naataani, t mɔg pann, ama l pann yen g tie k tin gii suun t yanbuatuona kaa.
45008013	G dugn, i gii suun i yanbuatuona, i bu kpe i, ama Foŋanm gii tod’i k i tuo g lu i yanbuatuona, i baa fo.
45008014	K l maa yab nba g Yendu Fuom ŋmagd’b kul tie Yendu bid i.
45008015	Yendu g tie’i Fuom nba bu kuan’i yonmd n ninŋ yin biɛ ji gii jie jiwaani kaa, u tie’i Fuom nba bu te yin te Yendu bid i, gii yi’ug k « t Baa ».
45008016	Wano Foŋanm mɔno n kun mɔni t pala n ninŋ k t tie Yendu bid.
45008017	Tin tie Yendu bid nyan, lann tinm n bu yend u ŋalman, tinm yen Kristo n bu taan g yend. G dugn, t gii taan g gaal fala yen’o, t tan bu taan g gaal yudand mɔ nnyan i yen’o.
45008018	N ban g fala nba k t laad mɔlane kan nand yen yudand nba k t tan bu la.
45008019	Yendu n tag yal nba kul guu yen pakɔnn youg nba g Yendu bu ŋɔn yab tie u bid i.
45008020	G dugn Yendu n tag yal nba te fam, l g tie l tagm yanbuam kaa, Yendu mɔno n bo bua k l tien nnyan, ama g dindann yen be g
45008021	Yendu n tag yal nba tan bu nya yonmd n ninŋ, g yal u kua gii mɔg yudand nyan Yendu bid nyan.
45008022	T ban g Yendu n tag yal nba kul biɛ daa l be fala n ninŋ g dun nyan puo n tu mɔ madyiɛlu nand nyan.
45008023	Ama lann kukua kaa, tinm nba gaal Foŋanm k l tie Yendu cincinn paab mɔno, t mɔ l dun t tug n ninŋ i g guu g Yendu bu tug’ti k t te u bid k wan nyan t gbannand fala n ninŋ canyiin.
45008024	G dugn t la fielu, ama l yen daa tie dindann n i. K l maa nil gii nyuan wan daan yal nba, lann dindann ji g be n nyan. Ŋmaa bu la bonn o g biɛ gii daan l bonn i ?
45008025	Ama t gii daan tin g nyuan yal nba, lann i k t bu mind gii guu.
45008026	L tie nnyan i g Foŋanm tod’ti, g dugn t g paa yen siɛl. T g ban tin bu jaand nand g miɛl Yendu bonn. Foŋanm nba miɛd Yendu t po mɔno tu dun i g sɔgnd maam nba g nil kan fid g yaad g maad.
45008027	Yendu nba nyuan nil pal n ninŋ nyan ban Foŋanm n bua n miɛl yal nba, g dugn Foŋanm jaand Yendu niib po nyan Yendu mɔno n bua nand nyan i.
45008028	T ban g Yendu suun tuonn bonn kul n ninŋ k lan ŋanm yab nba bua’ɔg u, yab nba k u bo tuod g yiin’m nyan wan bo sen nand nyan.
45008029	Yendu n bo tuod g ban yab nba po nyan, u bo tuod g lugd banm i k ban gii tie nyan u Bija n tie nand nyan, k u Bija ń gii tie bijakpel g mɔg waali k b yab.
45008030	Yendu bo yiin wan bo tuod g lugd yab nba nyan i. Banm nba k u bo yiin’m nyan, u biɛ bo te k banm n te nimɔnm u nunŋ n. Wan te g yab te nimɔnm nyan, u biɛ tie banm i u yudand.
45008031	To, t biɛ ji bu yed g bɛ ? Yendu gii taa t po, ŋmaa bu fid g kɔn yen’ti nii ?
45008032	Yendu bo g ŋaa baa u Bija mɔno. U bo tug’o g yid salg i t kul ne po. L ji bu tien nle i k u kan te’ti u Bija yen yal tenn kul yen bulcind i ?
45008033	Ŋmaa n bu jalg yab nba g Yendu lugd’b i ? Yendu mɔno yen yed k b g mɔg biid.
45008034	Ŋmaa n bu fid g jiɛl b buud g buud ń suol’b i ? Sua g be. G dugn Yiesu Kristo kpe g yied, g be Yendu jendu, g jaand t po.
45008035	Bɛ n bu fid g paad’ti yen Kristo buam i ? Cicagm bii, yanyaɔg bii, fala nba k b ŋɔnŋ’ti bii, kom bii, taladm bii, yibild daa bii jad kuum i ?
45008036	Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « A yaa po i g yendu n yen nyiɛɔg k t be kuum fiɛl n, k b nyuan’ti nyan t tie pei i k b bu kod nyan. »
45008037	Ama l kul ne ninŋ tinm n yen bu l paad, g dugn yua nba buad’ti nyan bu tod’ti.
45008038	Yen mɔni, n l ban i canyiin, g siɛl kan fid g paad’ti yen u buam. L gii tie kuum ii, miɛl ii, malɛg‑nba ii, polu po yudanm ii, mɔlane yen youg nba baad ii, yal nba l mɔg paalu kul ii,
45008039	yal nba be polu po ii, yal nba be tinpual n ninŋ ii, Yendu n l tag yal nba kul, baa siɛl g be g bu fid g paad’ti yen Yendu buam nba k u ŋɔn t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ.
45009001	N maad mɔni i, n tie Kristo‑yua i, n g fa faaɔg kaa. Foŋanm ŋmagd’n, k min mɔno yaa pal n ninŋ k n ban k l g tie faaɔg kaa
45009002	k n be pabɔnn n, k l yiɛl’n n pal n ninŋ youg kul.
45009003	Min bo sun mɔno g Yendu ń yie’n, g fagn’n yen Kristo, k lan tod n ninjanm. N maad min yen yab nba taa buolu i,
45009004	Israyɛl yab. Banm i g Yendu tug’b k b tie u bid, k u ŋɔn’m u yudand, g suol dɔnnu yen’m taal munŋaa kul, g tie’b u Mɔmaam, g ŋɔn’m jaandi, g puon’m u puoni.
45009005	Israyɛl buolu bo cil yen b yaajanm nba k b sana duo i. Kristo bo te nifosaal k b mal’o b buolu n i, wano nba mɔg nuu bonn kul po, g tie Yendu, wan gaal dondl youg kul. Amɛnn.
45009006	L g bua n maad g Yendu g fid g tien wan bo puon b yaajanm yal nba kaa. Yen mɔni Israyɛl yab kul kaa tie Israyɛl buolu.
45009007	L tie nnyan i yen Abraham yaabuona mɔ, b kul kaa tie u yaabuona yen mɔni. G dugn Yendu bo maad Abraham: « Isaak yaabuona kukua n tan bu don a sann ».
45009008	L bua n maad k l g tie nifosaal sɔm bid kaa tie Yendu bid, Yendu n puon bid nba n tie u bid yen mɔni.
45009009	Yendu n bo puon g maad yal nba n ne: « N tan bu guan nne youg, l bu sua g Sara ji diɛ bijabg i. »
45009010	Lann kukua kaa. T yaaja Isaak yen Rebeka bo taan lieb g mal sanpola banle.
45009011	Ama ban daa bo g mal l bid mɔno, k b daa g tien siɛl k l tie bonbiiug lann i kaa bonŋann, g Yendu yen tuod g maad b naa Rebeka g ciɛn po tan baa tie nyan u waag yonm nyan i, g suun u tuona. Yendu bo maad nnyan k wan ŋɔn k u tu g nyuand nil tuona kaa g yiin’o, k u yanbuam n i k u tu yiin’o, k l yanbuam g mɔg lebdu.
45009013	L tie nyan Yendu n maad nand u kadaaɔg n nyan i: « N buad Sakɔb g yie Esaayu. »
45009014	To, t ji bu yed g bɛ ? G Yendu n suun yal nba g ŋan ii ? Palb, lann g be.
45009015	Yendu bo maad Moyis: « Yua nba k n pal bu siɛ u po, l bu l siɛ u po i, yua nba k n bu jie’og ninbaaɔg mɔ, n bu l jie’og ninbaaɔg u. »
45009016	Lann, l g nya nil yanbuam po, lann i kaa wan tie mɔndl nba po kaa, l nya Yendu pasiɛdug po i.
45009017	Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ u maad Faraaɔn: « Min n kaan’a badkog po, g niib ń la a buol n paalu, k n sann ń yad ŋanduna n ninŋ kul. »
45009018	Lann, l tie nnyan i, Yendu n bua yua nba i k u tu jie’og ninbaaɔg, g kuan kangbadm mɔ wan bua yua nba.
45009019	Sua bu bual’n k l gii tie nnyan, g bɛ po i g Yendu yen kɔn yen’ti nii ? G ŋmaa n bu fid g yie Yendu yanbuam i ?
45009020	Fin nifosaal, a mɔ tie ŋmaa i g baa nai yen Yendu i ? Tiɛɔg bu fid g bual tiɛmaal k l tien nle i k u maa’ɔg nne ii ?
45009021	Tiɛmaal g mɔg yiko yen wan tuon yɔug, g bɔgd yɔugkonyenn g maa bulcintiɛɔg, g tug yɔugkonliel g maa tiɛɔg nba g tie bulcintiɛɔg uu ?
45009022	Yendu bo bua k wan ŋɔn u mutuol, g te g niib ń la u paalu i, ama yen l kul, k u yen dii mindl bonciɛnn g ŋaa yab nba bo dagd yen k u mutuol ń baa b po k ban biɛl fam nyan.
45009023	U biɛ bo bua wan ŋɔn yab nba k u jie’b ninbaaɔg, g bo tuod g bobn’m g bu te’b yudand nyan, k u yudand yab hal bonciɛnn.
45009024	Tinm n tie yab nba k u yiin ; l g tie Suif‑nba buolu n ninŋ kukua kaa, buolfanu n ninŋ yab mɔ be.
45009025	Yendu bo maad lann n nyan u sogni Ose kadaaɔg n ninŋ: « Yab nba bo g tie n buolu, n ji bu yiin banm i n buolu, yua nba k n bo g bua’ɔg, wano n ji baa tie n buakua.
45009026	G naan buol nba k b bo maad’b k: “ Yinm g tie n buolu ” nyan, l buol i k b ji baa yi’b Yendu miɛldaan bid. »
45009027	Esaayi mɔ bo maad Israyɛl yab po k nne: « Baa Israyɛl yab gii mal mal g yabd nyan mɔgl tanbiini nyan, yab nba bu tenn g la fielu baa tie waam nne i.
45009028	G dugn Yonmdaan bu gbaa g tien g gbenn tinŋ po ne, wan bo maad k u bu tien yal nba. »
45009029	Wano Esaayi biɛ bo tuod g maad g: « Yonmdaan paaciɛnudaan bo gii g tie t buolu tennm baa waam, man ne t bo bu te nyan Sɔdɔm nyan i, tinm yen Gomɔr kul bo baa tie bonyenn i. »
45009030	Tin maad yal nba ne niimn ii ? L niimn tie g buolfanu yab nba bo g kpaan k ban te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n, banm n biɛ ji tan te nimɔnm. Yendu yiin’m nimɔnm g dugn b dindann po i.
45009031	Ama k Israyɛl yab nuan yen bo kpaan yiko nba bu te k ban gii tie nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ i, g yen tan luol.
45009032	Bɛ n te k b luol i ? B luol g dugn ban bo kpaan nyan, b bo g dug b dindann po kaa, b bo dug b tuona po i, g tan tuud tantuudkal.
45009033	Nyan Yendu n maad nand u kadaaɔg n nyan: « I la i, n bil tantuudkal n nyan Siyɔn doug n, l tie tangbaɔnŋ u, g niib tuud g baal. Ama yua nba dug u po, u kan di fai. »
45010001	N naataani, yal nba tie n pakɔnn k n jaand g miɛd Yendu tie g Suif‑nba ń la fielu i.
45010002	N bu fid g kun mɔni b po, k l tie payiɛnu i paaa b po, k ban gii suun Yendu n bua yal, ama b g ban ban baa suun nand.
45010003	G dugn b bo g bann Yendu n bua g nil ń tɔgn sɔnu nba k wan yed k u tie nimɔn u nunŋ n, b bo kpaan b yul po sɔnu i, g yie g g tɔgn sɔnu nba g niib tu tɔgn, Yendu ń yiin’m nimɔnm.
45010004	Kristo n te g Moyis n bo diɛn yiko nba paalu po juab, g yua nba dug u po kul, wan te nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n.
45010005	Moyis mɔno bo diɛn g ŋɔn nil n baa cɔln yiko nand gii tie nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n. U bo diɛn g maad k nne i: « Yua nba cɔln yiko, u baa mɔg miɛl g dugn l yiko po i. »
45010006	Ama yal nba tie g Yendu ń yiin nil nimɔn g dugn u dindann po nuan, Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni maad l po k nne i: « Daa maad a pal n ninŋ g ŋmaa n bu do polu po i ? » (L niimn tie g ŋmaa n bu do polu po g jiid yen Kristo i ?)
45010007	Lann i kaa « g ŋmaa n bu jiid tinkpiiug n ninŋ i ? » (L bua n maad g ŋmaa n bu yied Kristo kpienm siign g do yen’o i ?)
45010008	Yendu Kadaaɔg biɛ maad bɛ i ? G « Yendu maam be a buol i, a mɔb n ninŋ yen a pal n ninŋ. » L maam n tie dindann laabaal nba k t muand.
45010009	A gii yaad a mɔb g maad niib kul nunŋ n g Yiesu tie Yonmdaan, g biɛ tuo yen a pal kul g Yendu yied’o kpienm siign, Yendu bu fiel’a.
45010010	Yen mɔni, a gii tuo yen a pal kul i, k a bu te nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n, a gii yaad a mɔb g maad niib kul nunŋ n k a tuo, Yendu bu fiel’a.
45010011	Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni kon maad lann n nyan: « Yua nba dug u po kul kan di fai. »
45010012	Lann paadu g be Suif‑nba yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba siign ninŋ. B kul taa Yonmdaan yend i, k u piin yen bulcind yab nba miɛd’o kul.
45010013	L kon tie mɔni i, « Yua nba taa Yonmdaan sann kul, u bu fiel’o. »
45010014	G niib bu tien nle i g taa u sann g g dug u po i ? B bu tien nle i gii dug u po, g g ban g gbad u maam i ? B bu tien nle i g gbad u maam g sua g ban g muand’b i ?
45010015	K b gii g sun sua mamuandu i, l bu tien nle i l maam ń muand i ? Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nyan: « Yab nba waa g muand laabamann, b baalu tie pamanciɛnn i. »
45010016	Ama b kul kaa tuo g gaal Laabamann. Esaayi bo maad lann n nyan: « Yonmdaan, ŋmaa tuo g gaal k t laabaal tie mɔni i ? »
45010017	Nil tu cenŋ ban muand laabaal nba i gii mɔg dindann. Kristo maam n tie l laabaal.
45010018	Lann i k n bual: B kan gii gbad l laabaal bii ii ? Bo, b gbad nuan: « B niɛli duo g ŋanduna munn kul gbad. B maam gad hal ne yen ŋanduna n juod naan buol. »
45010019	K n biɛ guan g bual: Israyɛl yab bo g gbad yaa aa ? B bo gbad. Moyis n bo kpiɛ g maad Yendu lanbona ne: « N bu te yin gii nan buolu nba g tie siɛl mɔno. N bu te i pala ń gii ŋub buolu nba g mɔg yam po. »
45010020	Esaayi nuan taan bo maad mɔno g Yendu yed k nne: « Yab nba bo g kpaan’n nyan, banm n ji tan la’n. N legd g ŋɔn n kua yab nba bo g bual n po. »
45010021	Ama yal nba nyuan Israyɛl buolu po, Yendu pugn g maad: « N tund yentunmunn g tiɛn n nui i, k n manŋ yen l buolu, k b g cɔln, b biɛ g tuod n maam. »
45011001	N ji bual lann i, mii Yendu baa yie u buolu bii ii ? Kai, lann kaa. G dugn min mɔno tie Israyɛl buolu n nil i, n tie Abraham yaabuonn i, Bɛnsamɛn cugl n jua.
45011002	Yendu g yie u buolu, u bo tuod g lugd’b k l wai. Bii, i g ban Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ, lan diɛn g ŋɔn Israyɛl buolu n bo biil, k Eli jalg’b Yendu nunŋ n g maad yal ii ?
45011003	« Yonmdaan, b kpii a sogni‑nba, g mud a salg binbinda o. Min kukua n tenn k b biɛ kpaan k ban junn n mɔ yaa miɛl. »
45011004	Yendu bo guan g jiin’o bɛ ? « N tenn jab tuda ŋanlile i g guun n kua, yab nba daa g gbaan dunn Baal buol g pug’o. »
45011005	Mɔlane mɔ l tie nnyan i. Niib tenn waam, g Yendu lugd’b g dugn u ŋalbalg po.
45011006	U ŋalbalg po i k u lugd’b faa, l g tie b tuona po kaa. L bo gii tie b tuona po, lann Yendu ŋalbalg ji g tie ŋalbalg.
45011007	L niimn ii ? Israyɛl yab g la ban bo kpaan yal nba. Yendu n lugd yab nba kukua n la. Yab nba tenn kul ji te kangbada i.
45011008	Lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand n nyan: « Yendu te k b yam juan, g te k b ninbina g nyuan, k b tuba g gbiɛ saa yen dinne. »
45011009	Dafiid mɔ biɛ bo maad g: « B jied ń te diɛɔg, lan te janbaaɔnŋ k ban baa l n ninŋ, k lan dad b tubl.
45011010	B ninbina ń juan k ban ji daa laad baa siɛl. Ban gii bua youg kul g daa ban g yaad g sed. »
45011011	K n ji bual lann i, mii Suif‑nba tuud k ban ji l baa, g daa ban g fiil yaa aa ? Kai, l g tie nnyan kaa. Ban tien biid nba nyan po n te g yab nba g tie Suif‑nba mɔ la fielu, k banm Israyɛl yab nunŋ ń ji gii fu b po.
45011012	K l gii tie g Suif‑nba tuonbiid ŋanm ŋanduna bonciɛnn, b binbaag gii ŋanm buolfanu yab bonciɛnn, g Suif‑nba kul ji tan gii guan g la fielu i, l ji baa tie nle ?
45011013	Mɔlane, n ji maad yen yinm buolfanu yab i. Min yaan tie Yiesu sundu buolfanu yab buol nyan, n tug l tuonn k l tie bulcintuonn i n po,
45011014	k n daan k l g kua n buolu n yab nunŋ baa fu l po k b ninŋ siɛb ń mɔ ń la fielu.
45011015	Yen mɔni, Yendu daa bo piɛn’m i g ŋanduna yab fid g manŋ yen’o, u ji tan gii guan g tuo’b nuan, kpienm mɔno la miɛl n nyan.
45011016	Jekpiɛla gii ŋan Yendu po, jied nba tenn kul ji ŋan n nyan. Jiinn gii ŋan Yendu po, benda mɔ ŋan n nyan.
45011017	Israyɛl buolu tie nyan oliif tiig nba k b bul’o ŋaag nyan i, g gbad bendyena l po. K fin nba tie buolfanu yua tie nyan muaɔg n oliif tibendl nyan, k b tug’a g tugn yen ban gbad g tenn yal nba nyan, k l tiig jiina ji tien a mɔ siim k a fo.
45011018	Lann daa pua jipaad k fin n cie ban gbad benda nba nyan. A yen ji baa pua jipaad bɛ po i ? Fin kaa te g jiina be, jiina n te k a be.
45011019	A bu fid g maad k b bo gbad l tiig benda k ban tugn’a b yiɛl n i.
45011020	Lann tie mɔni i. B bo gbad’b g dugn b bo g mɔg dindann i, g tug’a g dugn a dindann po. Ama daa pua jipaad kaa, i jie jiwaani.
45011021	G dugn, Yendu gii gbad benda nba bo be tibulkag po, ŋan gii ban k u kan ŋaa a mɔ.
45011022	Lann, ŋanm g bann g Yendu mɔg pasiɛdug g biɛ mɔg nunkuoni. U mɔg nunkuoni yen yab nba tien biid, k u pal yen siɛd a yaa po. Mɔnd k wan l gii mɔg l pasiɛdug nnyan a po, lann i kaa u bu gbad a mɔ nnyan i.
45011023	Ama banm Suif‑nba mɔ gii lebd maalm g guan g dug Yendu po, Yendu bu guan g tugn’m wan bo gbad’b tiig nba nyan po, g dugn u mɔg paalu g bu fid g guan g tugn’m.
45011024	Fin nuan tie muaɔg n oliif tibendl i, k b cua’a g tugn’a ŋaag oliif tiig po, k l yen bo g dagd k lan tien nnyan. G Suif‑nba nba ji tie ŋaag oliif tibenda i, b gii bua n guan g tugn’m ban bo gbad’b tiig nba po, l kan gii tie faala kaa aa ?
45011025	N naataani, n g bua g mamɔni nba tie ŋasiil ne ń gii duag’i. N gii g dɔgd g ŋɔn’i, i mɔ ji baa mali k i tie yanfodanm i. Israyɛl yab n ninŋ siɛb daa baa be yen b nangbanm i, saa yen yaa youg nba g buolfanu yab kul tan bu kua Yendu diem n.
45011026	Nnyan i k Israyɛl yab kul ji bu la fielu, nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « Fietua bu nya Siyɔn i g baal g nyan Sakɔb yaabuona tuonbiid kul n ninŋ.
45011027	Min yaan bu suol n dɔnnu nba yen’m n nyan, yaa youg nba k n bu piin b biid kul. »
45011028	Yal nba tie Laabamann po nuan, b l yie i g te Yendu ninnanda, k yinm buolfanu yab duo nyuad l po. Ama Yendu n bo tuod g lugd’b k b tie u buolu nyan, u bua’b g dugn b yaajanm po.
45011029	K l maa Yendu nuan gii pii nil paab u pii’ug u, u gii yiin nil mɔ u l yiin’o i, u g lebd u maalm.
45011030	Yen mɔni, siɛnyoug i bo g cɔln Yendu. Ama mɔlane u jie’i ninbaaɔg g dugn Suif‑nba mɔ n g cɔlm’o nyan po.
45011031	L tie nnyan i Suif‑nba mɔ yaa po mɔlane. B g cɔln Yendu, g Yendu ń jie’b ninbaaɔg nyan wan jie’i ninbaaɔg nand nyan i.
45011032	Yendu te g nifoi kul ji g cɔln, k l ji tie nyan dansalg nyan b po, k wan fid g jie b kul ninbaaɔg u.
45011033	Yendu ŋalman g mɔg lan ja yen yal nba, u yanfuom yen u banm kul yab hal bonciɛnn. Sua g ban u yanjagl, g ŋmaa ji baa ban u sɔni i ?
45011034	Yendu Kadaaɔg kon maad lann n nyan: « Ŋmaa ban Yonmdaan maalm i ? Bii sua bu fid g te’og cegli yaa aa ?
45011035	Ŋmaa ban g tie’og siɛl o g ji guu k wan guan g pa’ɔg u ? »
45011036	Yen mɔni, bonn kul nyiɛ u buol i, wano n te g bonn kul be, bonn kul be u po i. Yudand tie u yal i, mɔlane saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog. Amɛnn.
45012001	N naataani, Yendu n yaan ŋɔn’ti k u jie’ti ninbaaɔg hal bonciɛnn nyan po n te k n mɔ balm’i, mii yin tug i kua g cab nyan salg nba fo, g ŋan g dagd Yendu po nyan. Jaandi nba tuag sɔnu n nyan.
45012002	Daa ŋua man ŋanduna ne yab bontitied kaa. Ŋaa man g Yendu ń lebd i ninfanm g te’i ninfanpaanm, k yin fid g bann wan bua yal nba: lann n tie yal nba ŋan, g man g biɛ dagd u po.
45012003	Yendu n yaan pii’n u paab nba po n te k n maad i kul ne: Daa senŋ man i kua yin g pund naan buol. Sua kul ń ŋanm g diid wan tie yua nba, g sen u kua Yendu n tie’og dindann k l dagd k wan sed naan buol.
45012004	Nyan t gbannand n mɔg bɔga k l yab, k l bɔga yen g taa taa tuona nyan,
45012005	l tie nnyan i, k t mɔ yab g yen taan Kristo n ninŋ g tie gbannanyend kua, g taan g tuug yen lieb nyan gbannand bɔga nyan.
45012006	Yendu ŋalbalg po i k u pii t kul paab jiɛg jiɛg. Yua nba gaal Yendu paab k l tie k wan gii gaan Yendu maam g sɔgnd, l daan ń gii suun l tuonn nyan dindann n bual nand nyan.
45012007	Yua nba gaal Yendu paab k l tie k wan gii suun lieb po, l daan ń gii suun nnyan. Yua nba k u paab tie tundl po mɔ, wan gii tund lieb.
45012008	Yua nba paab tie k wan gii paand lieb pala, l daan ń gii tie nnyan. Yua nba g Yendu n pii’ug paab nba tie k wan gii piin lieb paab, l daan ń gii piin yen bulcind. Yua nba ŋmagd lieb ń gii ŋmagd lan bual nand. Yua nba tod tali mɔ ń gii tod’b yen pamann.
45012009	I gii bua nil, yin gii bua’ɔg yen mɔni. Daa bua man bonbiil yaa maam palb. I kpaan man k yin gii tie ŋanm kukua.
45012010	I bua man i lieb nyan nil yen u ninja n bua lieb nand nyan. Mɔnd man g cɔlunŋ ń gii be yinm yen i lieb siign. Ama k l cɔlunŋ n tu kpiɛ g nya i po.
45012011	I suun man Yonmdaan po yen pakɔnn, g daa mɔg siɛl yaa gbannyagl. I pala ń gii kɔn youg kul k yin sun u tuonn.
45012012	I pala ń gii man g dugn i daan k i bu la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn. I mɔg man juunn fala youg, gii jaand youg kul.
45012013	I bɔgd man yin mɔg yal nba gii tien i lieb nba be cicagm n ninŋ. Tu ŋanm g gaal man saanm nba caan’i.
45012014	I miɛd man Yendu k wan yad u yedŋanm yab nba cagn’i po. I gbad a, yedŋanm i k i baa miɛd b po, l g tie k i baa jaand’b kaa.
45012015	I kpanm man yen yab nba kpanm, gii buud yen yab nba buud.
45012016	I mɔg man maalyenm i lieb kul po. Daa donŋ man i kua kaa, i dɔnn man yen yab nba g tie nigbenŋa mɔ, g daa mali k yinm n tie yanfodanm.
45012017	Yua nba tien’i bonbiiug, yin daa kpaan k yin mɔ ń guan g ŋmiɛn’o l bonbiiug kaa, i kpaan man k yin tien yal nba ŋan niib po.
45012018	L gii tie k l bu fid, g biɛ bu nya i po, yin mɔnd gii man yen niib kul.
45012019	N naataani, daa kpaan man k yin tuu pann kaa, ŋaa man g Yendu mutuol ń sun tuonn, k l maa l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n k nne: « Min n bu tuu pann, min n bu guan g pa yua kul pann. » Yonmdaan n maad nnyan.
45012020	G biɛ pugn liel buol k nne: « Ama kom gii mɔg a ninnand, ŋan te’og jied k wan di, nyunnyuglu gii mɔg’o, ŋan te’og nyum k wan nyu, g dugn a gii tien nnyan, a pad muukuana i g dognd u yul po. »
45012021	Daa ŋaa g biid ń paad’a. Mɔnd g tien ŋanm g paad biid.
45013001	Nil kul ń gii cɔln gobna yikodanm, g dugn yikod g be g g nyiɛ Yendu buol. Yikodanm nba be kul, Yendu n kaan’m.
45013002	Lann yua nba yie yikodaan, u yie Yendu mɔno n sen g bona ń gii sonm nand i. Yab nba yie l sɔnu, banm mɔno n kpaan g buud ń lag b po.
45013003	Yen mɔni, yab nba suun yal nba ŋan, b g jie yikodanm. Yab nba suun tuonbiid n jie’b. A gii bua k ŋan daa jie yikodaan, lann ŋan gii suun yal nba ŋan, yikodaan baa pag’a nii.
45013004	G dugn yikodaan mɔ suun Yendu tuonn k lan ŋanm fin i. Ama a gii suun yal nba g ŋan, ŋan tuod gii jie, g dugn l g tie fam kaa k u mɔg yiko yen wan dad a tubl. U suun Yendu tuonn k wan dad yua nba suun tuonbiid g fiind Yendu mutuol nyan tubl i.
45013005	L po n te k l dagd g nil ń gii cɔln yikodanm. L g tie tubdadu po kukua kaa, ama l baa tie nil yam n i k u cɔln.
45013006	L po n biɛ te k i pa lonpo mɔ. Yab nba gaan lonpo mɔ suun Yendu tuonn i lan bual nand.
45013007	Pa man yua kul yin bu pa’ɔg yal nba. Pa man lonpogaal u lonpo, g pa tigddaan mɔ u tigd po. Cɔln man yua dagd yen cɔlunŋ, g seln yua dagd yen sel.
45013008	Daa mɔg man baa sua pann, l gii g tie k yin gii bua i lieb i kaa. G dugn yua nba bua u lua u cɔln yiko n bual yal nba kul n nyan.
45013009	Yen mɔni, Yendu Mɔmaam nba maad k « a kan conm, a kan kpi nil, a kan jan, a kan gii bua a lua bonn », yen liel‑nba nba tenn kul nyan taan g maad bonyenn i: « I bua a lua nyan a kua nyan ».
45013010	Yua nba bua u lua, u kan fid g tien’o bonbiiug. Lann yua nba bua u lua, u cɔln yiko n bual yal nba kul n nyan.
45013011	I tie man nnyan g dugn i yen ban tin ji be yaa youg nba ne. Youg pund yen guam ń yand i po, yin find o. Yen mɔni, t fielu daal ji nag g cie yaa youg nba k t daa bo cind g dug Kristo po.
45013012	Yɔugsiiug siid g pend, g siŋaaɔg nag o. Lann t lu man yal nba tie bunbɔnn n tuona kul, g tug yinyiem n jakɔntiɛd.
45013013	T gii suun man papientuona nyan lan dagd k tin gii suun nand yensiig n nyan. T ŋaa man jediciɛnu yen dinyuciɛnu, g ŋaa cuncontuona yen jɔgntuona, g ŋaa kunkɔna yen nanŋ.
45013014	Tug man Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo k wan te i jakɔntiɛd k i liɛ, g ji daa kpaan k yin sun i yam n kuan’i tuonbiid nba n ninŋ.
45014001	Tuo g gaal man yua nba k u dindann daa g yab, g daa nai yen’o wan mali yal nba po.
45014002	Sua be g dug k l cab yen wan di jebuoli kul. G sua mɔ be g dindann pɔd’o, g kpinfaad kua i kaa u g ŋman nand.
45014003	Yua nba di jebuoli kul ń daa nund yua nba g di. Yua nba g gbiɛ k u di jied kul mɔ ń daa jalg yua nba di, g dugn Yendu gaal’o o.
45014004	A tie ŋmaa i g baa jalg sua yaa tuonsunn i ? U gii sie k l paa ii, u gii baa ii, lann la u canbaa i. U baa sie k l paa mɔ, g dugn Yonmdaan mɔg paalu g bu te wan gii sie.
45014005	Sua be g mali g diyena ŋan g cie dilaa. G sua mɔ mali g daal kul l tie daal i. Yua kul n mali yal nba, wan gii diɛ u pal n ninŋ k l tie nnyan i.
45014006	Yua nba nyuan g diyena ŋan g cie dilaa, u tie nnyan g seln Yonmdaan i. Yua nba di jebuoli kul, u seln Yonmdaan i, g dugn u tu tien Yendu i balg l jied po. Yua nba g gbiɛ k u di jied kul mɔ biɛ l seln Yonmdaan i, g tiend Yendu balg.
45014007	Yen mɔni, t kul ne, sua g be g fo u yul po kukua. Sua biɛ g kpenn u yul po kukua kuum.
45014008	T gii fo, t fo Yonmdaan po i. T biɛ gii kpe mɔ, t kpe Yonmdaan po i. Lann, tin fo i, tin kpe i, Yonmdaan n yen’ti.
45014009	G dugn Kristo bo kpe g guan g fo k wan gii tie kpienm yen fuodb Yonmdaan i.
45014010	K a mɔ i, bɛ po i k a jalg a ninja i ? K fin i, bɛ po i k a nund a ninja i ? T kul tan bu sed Yendu nunŋ n i, wan bu’ti.
45014011	L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad k nne: « Min Yonmdaan, n fo, min n maad: Nil kul tan bu gbaan dunn n nintual n. Nil kul tan bu yaad u mɔb g maad k n tie Yendu. »
45014012	Lann, t ninŋ ne, sua kul tan bu ŋɔn Yendu nunŋ n wan sun yal nba.
45014013	Lann t ŋaa man g daa jalg t lieb. Yin bu tug yanjagl nba n ne: daa tien man i kua nyan tantuudkal nyan k i ninja tan bu tuud’i lann i kaa g jal’i g baa.
45014014	Min nuan ban, g Yonmdaan Yiesu te k n bann g tond canyiin, g jied g be g tie kual. Ama yua nba mali g yaa jied ne nuan tie kual i, l baa l tie kual i u po.
45014015	A gii di jied, g ban k l jied po bu te a ninja pal ń biil, lann a ji g sonm buam sɔnu n. Daa ŋaa g jied po ń te g Kristo n kpe yua nba po ń biɛl fam.
45014016	Daa ŋaa man g yal nba ŋan i po ń te g lieb ń ji gii maad mabiid l po.
45014017	K l maa Yendu diem g tie jied yen daam maam kaa. Yendu diem tie Foŋanm n baad yen yal nba nil po i, lan tie g nil ń gii suun yal ŋan Yendu po, u yam ń gii dua, k u pal man.
45014018	Yua nba suun Kristo po nnyan, Yendu pal baa man u po g niib mɔ biɛ taa u po.
45014019	Lann t gii kpaan man yal nba bu te g manu ń gii be tinm yen t lieb siign, yal nba bu te tin gii tod t lieb k t dindann ń ŋanm g pugn.
45014020	Daa biid Yendu tuonn jied po. L tie mɔni i g jied kul ŋan g dagd g nil ń di, ama l g ŋan k ŋan gii di jied nba bu te g nil ń kua tudm n ninŋ.
45014021	Yal nba ŋan tie k ŋan daa ŋman nand, g daa nyu daam, g daa l tie yal nba bu fid g te a ninja ń kua tudm n kul.
45014022	A gii mali yal nba l po, ŋan gii diɛ a pal n ninŋ, lann tie fin yen Yendu yal i. Yua nba tug yanjagl k u bu tien bonn, g g jalg u kua l po, pamann tie u yal i.
45014023	Ama yua nba di jied o, g yen mali munle-le l jied po nyan, l daan mɔg biid Yendu nunŋ n, g dugn u g tien u dindann n bual k wan tien nand. Yal nba g nil tie k l g tuag yen u dindann mɔ yen tie biid i.
45015001	L bual k tinm nba paa dindann n ninŋ i ń tod yab nba g paa, g gaal b tuga nba paad’b, g tug. T kan gii kpaan t yul po manu kaa.
45015002	T kul ne, sua kul ń gii kpaan k wan tien yal nba bu manŋ u lua, yal bu ŋanm’o, g te k u dindann ń pugn.
45015003	Yen mɔni, Kristo bo g kpaan yal nba bu manŋ wano mɔno kaa. U bo ŋaa g yal nba diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n n tien: « Sugd nba k b sugl’a kul juod n po i ».
45015004	Yal nba bo diɛn siɛnyoug Yendu Kadaaɔg n kul, l bo diɛn k lan te’ti tundl i, k tin la l diɛni n ninŋ mindl yen papaal nba bu te k tin gii mɔg dindann.
45015005	Yendu nba tien mindl yen papaal ń te k i gii taa mɔb nyan Yiesu Kristo n bua nand nyan.
45015006	Nnyan i k i bu fid g taan mɔb g dond Yendu yen payenn, wano nba tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo Baa.
45015007	I gaan man i lieb nyan Kristo n gaal’i nand nyan, g yudand ń te Yendu yal.
45015008	Min n maad’i, Kristo bo tug u kua g tien Suif‑nba tuonsunn, k wan tien Yendu n bo puon b yaajanm yal nba i, k lan ŋɔn g Yendu kon tie mamɔnmaad.
45015009	G buolfanu yab mɔ ń gii dond Yendu g dugn u ninbajienu po, nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « L po n te k n baa pag’a buolfanu yab buol, n baa yiin yani g donŋ a sann. »
45015010	L biɛ diɛn k nne: « Buolfanu yab, i kpanm man yen Yendu buolu. »
45015011	L biɛ diɛn liel buol mɔ k nne: « Yinm buolfanu yab, i kul ń gii dond Yonmdaan. Buoli kul ń ŋanm g dond’o. »
45015012	Esaayi mɔ biɛ bo maad: « Big tan bu nya Sese yaabuona n ninŋ, wano n tan bu fiil gii mɔg nuu buoli kul po, b kul ń gii daan u ninŋ. »
45015013	Yendu nba te g niib daan u ninŋ ń te k i pala ń gii man bonciɛnn, i yam ń gii dua g dugn yin dug u po nyan. G Foŋanm paalu ń te k i dindann ń ŋanm g pugn.
45015014	N naataani, min mɔno ban n pal n ninŋ k i l tie nimɔnm i canyiin, k i ban bonn kul n sonm nand, k i biɛ bu fid g te i lieb cegli lan bual nand.
45015015	Ama min diɛn’i kadaaɔg nba ne, yenn‑nba buol be k n pua pal g tiɛd’i yal nba k i tu tuod g ban. N diɛn nnyan g dugn Yendu pii’n u ŋalbalg,
45015016	k n te Yiesu Kristo tuonsunn buolfanu yab buol. Wan tie’n tuonn nba tie nyan salg-yidkua tuonn nyan i, k n gii muand Yendu Laabamann, g buolfanu yab mɔ ń te salg nba g Foŋanm bu ŋanm k lan dagd Yendu po.
45015017	Lann Yiesu Kristo po n te k n pal man n kua po g dugn tuonn nba k n suun Yendu po ne.
45015018	Min kan fid g pua pal g maad siɛl po, l gii g tie Kristo n te k n tien yal nba i kaa. U te k n tod buolfanu yab k b mɔ ji cɔln Yendu. N maam yen n tuonn,
45015019	palug yen yaalidug tuongbenŋa nba k n sun yen Foŋanm paalu n tod’b. Nnyan i k n fid g muand Kristo Laabamann lan bual nand kaannaa kul, lan cil Serusalɛm saa yen Iliiri dingbana n ninŋ.
45015020	Ama n mɔnd g tien bonyenn, naan buol nba kul g niib daa bo g ban g gbad Kristo sann palb nyan, n muand Laabamann l buol kukua i. N tien nnyan k min daa baal g maa dieog lua fiɛgl po i.
45015021	Lann, n tien yal nba tuag yen Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni n nyan: « Yab nba k b bo g maad’b u maam, b bu la’ɔg, yab nba bo g ban g gbad siɛl u po bu gbad. »
45015022	L po n te k n bign taal munŋaa kul k n baal i buol k l paad’n.
45015023	Ama mɔlane nuan, min yaan ji g mɔg tuonn l dingbana n ninŋ, k l biɛ tu tie payiɛnu bonciɛnn n po bina ŋanŋaa ne kul k n baal i buol nyan,
45015024	n gii saa Ɛspany n bu tɔgn i buol. Yen mɔni, n mali k n tɔgn i buol k i tod’n k n gad l doug. N gii baal, n yen bu tien dana ŋanŋaa nuan yen’i yo, g fid g pend.
45015025	Ama mɔlane nuan, n yen daa saa Serusalɛm i, g daan bu tod Kristo‑yab nba be l po,
45015026	k l maa Maseduann yen Akaayi Kristo‑yab jag g suol k ban tod Kristo‑yab nba be Serusalɛm g tie tali nyan.
45015027	Yen mɔni, banm mɔno n tug l yanjagl, ama l yen daan bual k ban tien nnyan i. G dugn Yendu yedŋanm nba g Serusalɛm Kristo‑yab gaal, b bɔgd yen banm buolfanu yab i. L po n te k l bual k b mɔ ń bɔgd ban mɔg ŋalman nba yen Serusalɛm Kristo‑yab.
45015028	Lann, n gii gbenn l maam, g tug ban taan paab nba nyan g tie Serusalɛm yab, n bu tug Ɛspany sɔnu i g tɔgn i buol g pend gii saa.
45015029	N yen ban k n bu baal i buol g gbie yen Kristo yedŋanm i.
45015030	N naataani, n balm’i, t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po, yen Foŋanm n tien’ti buam nba po, tod’n man gii jaand g miɛd Yendu n po,
45015031	k wan nyan’n Suude kangbada ne janmi n ninŋ, g Serusalɛm Kristo‑yab mɔ ń biɛ gaal yen pamann todl nba k n saa yen b buol.
45015032	Nnyan, Yendu gii bua, n bu fid g pund i buol yen pamann, g tien dana ŋanŋaa yen’i g fuod waam.
45015033	Yendu nba te g niib be k l man ń gii be yen i kul. Amɛnn.
45016001	N bua n maad’i k t niipuo Febe nba suun Sankre Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ nyan tie nimɔn i.
45016002	Ŋanm g gaal’o man Yonmdaan sann po, nyan lan dagd g Kristo‑yab ń gii gaan lieb nand nyan. U gii bua k yin tod’o yen yal nba kul, yin tod’o. G dugn wano mɔno tod niib bonciɛnn, g biɛ tod min mɔno.
45016003	Fuond man Prisiil yen Akilas n po, min yen banm n bo taan g suun Yiesu Kristo po.
45016004	B bo lu b miɛl i g fiel n miɛl. Min kukua kaa tiɛn b ŋanm po, Kristo tintaanu niib nba tie buolfanu yab kul tiɛn b ŋanm po.
45016005	Fuond man Kristo‑yab nba taand lieb g jaand b ŋaapo kul. Ŋanm g fuond man n dɔnn Epaayinɛt, Asi diem n ninŋ wano n bo cind g tuo g ŋuan Kristo.
45016006	Fuond man Mari nba sun tuonn bonciɛnn i po.
45016007	Fuond man n naataani Andronikus yen Sunias, b bo taan g suol tinm i dansalg. B tie Yiesu sundi nba k b sana duo bonciɛnn. Banm n kpiɛ g te Kristo‑yab yen’n.
45016008	Fuond man Anpliyatus, wano nba k n bua’ɔg bonciɛnn t Yonmdaan po.
45016009	Fuond man Urbɛn, yua nba tie t tuonsunlua Kristo n ninŋ, yen n dɔnn Stakis.
45016010	Fuond man Apelɛs nba ŋɔn yen mɔni k u tie Kristo‑yua. Fuond man Aristobul ŋaag yab.
45016011	Fuond man n naataanu Erodiyɔn. G fuond Narsis ŋaag yab nba dug t Yonmdaan po.
45016012	Fuond man Trifɛnn yen Trifos. L puob banle suun tuonn bonciɛnn t Yonmdaan po. G ŋanm g fuond n dɔnn Pɛrsiid nba mɔ sun tuonn bonciɛnn Yonmdaan po.
45016013	Fuond man Rufus, wano nba ŋanm g suun Yonmdaan tuonn lan bual nand. G fuond u naa. U naa tie n po nyan n naa nyan i.
45016014	Fuond man Asinkrit, Filegɔn, Ɛrmɛs, Patrobas, Ɛrmas yen t ninjanm nba be yen’m kul.
45016015	Fuond man Filolɔg yen Juuli, g fuond Nere yen u niipuo, g fuond Olinpas yen Kristo‑yab nba be yen’m kul.
45016016	Fuond fuond man i lieb kul, g ŋanm g lɔn lɔn lieb yen naataann. Kristo‑yab tintaani nba be kul fuond’i.
45016017	N naataani, n bua n tuod g maad’i nii, suol man i kua yen yab nba baad yen paadu yen ŋmadl i siign, g tund niib tundl nba g tuag yen yin gaal yaa tundl nyan. B tie nnyan i g buond niib dindann. Lɔgl’b man.
45016018	G dugn l nibuoli g suun t Yonmdaan Kristo po kaa, b suun b puol po i. B tu ŋanm g luan b lani i, g manŋ b mɔi g bɔnd yab nba k b maalm g saa fagm.
45016019	Yen mɔni, sua kul ban i cɔlunŋ po. L po n te k n pal man i po. Ama n bua k yin fuon yam gii tie bonŋann. Yal nba tie bonbiiug kul yin daa kuand i nuu l n ninŋ.
45016020	L ji kan wai, Yendu nba te g niib kul be k l man bu te yin ŋmaa g mad Sitaan. T Yonmdaan Yiesu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen’i.
45016021	N tuonsunlua Timote fuond’i. N naataani Lusiyus yen Jasɔn yen Sosipatɛr mɔ fuond’i.
45016022	Min Tɛrtiyus nba diɛn kadaaɔg ne, n mɔ fuond’i t Yonmdaan sann po.
45016023	Gaayus mɔ fuond’i. N be u ŋaapo i, Kristo‑yab kul mɔ biɛ taand lieb u ŋaag n i. Erast mɔ fuond’i, wano n diɛ doug n ligli kpaɔg. T ninja Kartus mɔ fuond’i. [
45016024	T Yonmdaan Yiesu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen i kul. Amɛnn.]
45016025	Tin gii dond man Yendu, k l maa u mɔg paalu g bu fid g te k i dindann ń ŋanm g pugn, nyan min muand Laabamann nba Yiesu Kristo po n maad nand nyan. Yendu ŋasiil nba bo wuo hal bina nba g mɔg dugl, g ji tan dɔgd mɔlane mɔ biɛ maad lann i.
45016026	Ama mɔlane po l ŋasiil ji dɔgd, g dugn Yendu sogni‑nba diɛn kadaad n ninŋ nyan Yendu nba l be youg kul n bo sen nand nyan, g buolfanu yab kul ń bann gii dug u po, g cɔlm’o.
45016027	Yendu kukua n tie yanfodaan. Dondl tie u yal i Yiesu Kristo sann po, saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog. Amɛnn.
46001001	Min Pɔl, Yendu yanbuam po i k u yiin’n k n te Yiesu Kristo sundu. Min n da kadaaɔg ne, min yen t ninja Sostɛnn,
46001002	g fuond Yendu tintaanu niib nba be Korɛnt doug n, yab nba g Yendu te k b tie u niib g dugn Yiesu Kristo po. Yendu yiin banm i, k ban gii be binbem nba ŋan g dagd u po, banm yen yab nba l be naan buol kul g taan t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sann, wano nba tie tinm yen banm kul yaa Yonmdaan.
46001003	T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po g te k i yam ń gii dua.
46001004	N tiend n Yendu balg youg kul i po yen wan tien’i yaa ŋanm nba g dugn i be yen Yiesu Kristo.
46001005	Yen mɔni, yin be yen Kristo nyan po n te g Yendu pii’i paab nba yab bonn kul n ninŋ, mandg maam n ninŋ yen banm n ninŋ.
46001006	G dugn i tuo g gaal ban muand’i yal nba Kristo po g diɛ k l paa.
46001007	L po n te g Yendu pii’i paab kul g siɛl g pɔd’i, yinm nba guu youg nba k t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo tan bu dɔgd.
46001008	Wano n bu te yin gii sie k l paa saa yen juog, k t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo guanu daal yin daa mɔg ban bu jalg’i yal nba po.
46001009	Yendu gii puon k u bu tien yal nba u tu tien i. Wano n yiin’i k yin taan gii be yen u Bija, t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo.
46001010	N naataani, n miɛd’i, t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sann po, k i gii taa mɔb, g siɛl yaa paadu ń daa be i siign. Mɔnd man gii taa mɔb, gii mɔg maalyenm kua g biɛ tu taan g suol bonyenn kua.
46001011	N naataani, Klowe ŋaag yab yen daan maad’n g kunkɔna be i siign ninŋ.
46001012	Min bua n maad yal nba tie k i ninŋ, yend tu yed: « min ŋua Pɔl i », lua ń yed: « min ŋua Apolɔs i », lua ń yed: « min ŋua Kefas i », lua mɔ k: « min ŋua Kristo i ».
46001013	Kristo bɔgd caga caga yaa aa ? B bo kpaa Pɔl i dapunpɔnn po k u kpe i po ii ? Bii Pɔl sann po i k b bo wul’i nyum i ?
46001014	N tiend Yendu balg yen min g wul i ninŋ ne baa sua, l gii g tie Krispus yen Gaayus i kaa.
46001015	Lann, sua kan fid g maad k n sann po i k i bo wul nyum.
46001016	Aaan, mɔni i, n bo wul Stefanas ŋaag yab mɔ, l gii nyiɛ l buol, n ji g mali k n wul sua g pugn.
46001017	G dugn Kristo bo g sun’n k n gii wuul niib kaa, u bo sun’n k n gii muand Laabamann i, ama u g yed k n tug nifosaal yanfomaam kaa gii muand, g dugn n gii tien nnyan Kristo kuum dapunpɔnn po bu te fam i.
46001018	L tie mɔni i g Kristo kuum dapunpɔnn po tie waadmaam i yab nba paa biɛlfam sɔnu po, ama tinm nba paa fielu sɔnu po nuan, t yaa po l ŋɔnŋ Yendu paalu i.
46001019	G dugn l diɛn g maad g Yendu yed: « N bu te g yanfodanm yam ń juan, n bu te g ninfandanm ninfanm ń te fam. »
46001020	Yanfodaan biɛ be lɛ ? Gbanband be lɛ ? Yua nba nai yen niib ŋanduna ne ninŋ be lɛ ? Yendu g te g ŋanduna ne yanfuom te waadm ii ?
46001021	Ŋanduna niib n l mɔg yanfuom nba kul, b yen g fid g bann Yendu, yaa youg nba g Yendu ŋɔn u yanfuom. L po n te g Yendu mɔ jag g suol k u bu fiel yab nba k b muand’b waadmaam k b tuo g gaal nyan.
46001022	Suif‑nba bua ban la yaalidug tuona i, g buolfanu yab kpaan yanfuom,
46001023	k tinm yen muand k b kpaa Kristo dapunpɔnn po. Suif‑nba n kan fid g tuo yal nba n nyan, g buolfanu yab mɔ mali k lann tie waadmaam i.
46001024	Ama Yendu n yiin yab nba nuan, ban tie Suif‑nba ii, ban tie buolfanu yab ii, Kristo tie Yendu paalu yen Yendu yanfuom i b po.
46001025	G dugn Yendu tuonn nba naan waadtuonn cie nifosaal yanfuom tuonn, Yendu tuonn nba naan gbalm tuonn cie nifosaal paalu tuonn.
46001026	N naataani, ŋanm g diid man yin tie niib nba g Yendu yiin’i. I siign ninŋ, nifosaal n nyuan g yab nba tie yanfodanm nyan g yab, nigbenŋa g yab, badbijanm mɔ biɛ g yab.
46001027	Ama Yendu nuan yen lugd niib n nyuan g yal nba tie waadbonn nyan i g fiɛg yanfodanm, g tug niib n nyuan g yal tie gbalm bonn g fiɛg paaludanm.
46001028	Ŋanduna niib n nyuan g yal nba ji l juod k b nund nyan, yal nba k b nyuan k l g tie siɛl nyan, u lugd lann i g bu biɛn yal nba tie bonmɔnn.
46001029	U tien nnyan g nifosaal kul ń daa fid g don u kua u nunŋ n i.
46001030	Wano n taan’i yen Yiesu Kristo g biɛ te g Kristo te t yanfuom. Kristo po i k t te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ, k u lugd’ti k tin gii tie Yendu kukua yaa yab, g biɛ nyan’ti biid n ninŋ.
46001031	Lann, nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « nil nba bua wan don u kua kul, wan don u kua Yonmdaan n tien yal nba po ».
46002001	N naataani, min bo baal i buol g bu dɔgd Yendu ŋasiil g ŋɔn’i nyan, n bo g diɛ maband lann i kaa yanfomaam kaa g muand’i.
46002002	G dugn min bo be i siign nyan, n bo jag g suol g Yiesu Kristo po kua i kaa, min g ban siɛl g bu maad l po, Kristo nba k b kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po kua i kaa.
46002003	Min nuan bo baal i buol g tie nyan yiɛn nyan i, g jiwaani mɔg’n k n jegl tɔn tɔn tɔn.
46002004	N bo g diɛ maband yen yanfomaam kaa g tund n tundl g biɛ muand n laabaal, ama n maam n ninŋ yen n tundl n ninŋ Foŋanm n bo ŋɔnŋ u paalu.
46002005	L bo tien nnyan k yin daa tug i dindann g tien nifosaal yanfuom n ninŋ kaa, ama k yin gii dug Yendu paalu po i.
46002006	Ama yen l kul, yanfuom i k t ŋɔnŋ yab nba k b yam gagd Kristo ŋuanu n ninŋ. L yanfuom yen g tie ŋanduna ne yal, l biɛ g tie ŋanduna ne badbijanm yal mɔ ; banm nuan bu biɛl b kul o.
46002007	T maad Yendu yaa yanfuom i. L bo tie ŋasiil i g wuo, k u bo tuod g bobn t yudand po g sua g ŋanduna daa g be.
46002008	Ŋanduna badbijanm ne, baa sua yen g bann l yanfuom, g dugn b bo gii bann l yanfuom b bo kan te ban kpaa Yonmdaan, yudanddaan dapunpɔnn po.
46002009	Ama nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « Nil ninbinn n g ban g la yal, nil tubl n g ban g gbad yal, maalm nba g ban g kua nil pal n ninŋ palb nyan, Yendu bobn lann i yab nba bua’ɔg po. »
46002010	Tinm i g Yendu te g Foŋanm ŋɔn’ti u ŋasiil. Yen mɔni, Foŋanm nuan nyuan bonn kul, baa yen yal nba wuo hal Yendu pal n ninŋ mɔno.
46002011	Ŋmaa ban yal nba be nifosaal pal n ninŋ i ? Nifosaal kukua n ban u yam n ninŋ yal nba be u pal n. Yendu mɔ, l tie nnyan i, Yendu Fuom kua i kaa, sua g ban yal nba be Yendu pal n ninŋ.
46002012	Tinm nuan yen g diɛ ŋanduna ne yam kaa g suun yenn tuonn, Yendu n tie’ti u Fuom k tin fid g bann wano Yendu n pii’ti paab nba kul.
46002013	Tin maad yal nba n nyan: T g maad nyan nifosaal yanfomaam n bual nand nyan kaa, t maad nyan Yendu Fuom n tund’ti k tin gii maad nand i. Nnyan i k t ŋɔnŋ yab nba mɔg Yendu Fuom yal nba tie Yendu Fuom yal.
46002014	Nil nba g mɔg Yendu Fuom kan fid g tuo yal nba nyiɛ Yendu Fuom buol. U yaa po l tie waadmaam i, u kan fid g gbad l niimn, g dugn Yendu Fuom n tu te nil l banm.
46002015	Yua nba mɔg Yendu Fuom bu fid g bann bonn kul niimn, ama sua yen kan fid g bann u yaa niimn.
46002016	G dugn, nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nyan: « Ŋmaa ban Yonmdaan maalm i ? Ŋmaa bu fid g te’og cegli i ? » Tinm nuan yen mɔg Kristo maalm i.
46003001	N naataani, n bo g fid g maad yen’i nyan i tie niib nba g Yendu Fuom ŋmagd’b nyan kaa. N bo maad yen’i nyan i tie niib nba diɛ ŋanduna ne niib yam nyan i, nyan i daa tie binyidi i Kristo ŋuanu n ninŋ nyan.
46003002	N bo tie’i biim i k i nyuu, n bo g tie’i jied nba kpai, g dugn i daa bo kan fid g di jekpiɛgd l youg. Baa yen mɔlane mɔno i biɛ daa kan l fid,
46003003	g dugn i biɛ daa l diɛ ŋanduna ne niib yam i. Nanŋ yen kunkɔna n be i siign nyan, lann n ŋɔnŋ k i biɛ daa l diɛ ŋanduna ne niib yam, g be nyan banm nyan.
46003004	I ninŋ yend n tu yed k u tie Pɔl yua, lua ń yed k u tie Apolɔs yua nyan, i g tie nyan nifosaal kul nyan kaa aa ?
46003005	Apolɔs tie ŋmaa i, Pɔl tie ŋmaa i ? T tie Yendu tuonsunna i, g ŋɔn’i dindann sɔnu. Sua kul sun Yonmdaan n cab’o k wan sun yal nba i.
46003006	Min nuan bo bul tibinn i, k Apolɔs jɔg nyum. Ama Yendu n te k l piɛ g duo.
46003007	Lann, yua nba bul g tie siɛl, yua nba jɔg nyum mɔ biɛ g tie siɛl, Yendu kukua n mɔn, g dugn wano n te k l pa g do.
46003008	Yua nba bul yen yua nba jɔg nyum kul tie yenm i. Sua kul tan bu gaal u paaɔg lan dagd yen wan sun tuonn nba i.
46003009	G dugn t taan g suun Yendu tuonn i. Yinm n tie Yendu kpaab, yinm n biɛ tie dieog nba k u maa.
46003010	Yendu n pii’n paab nba n te k n sun nyan tanmaala ciɛn nba mɔg yanfuom nyan, g fag dieog fiɛgl g sua ji maa g tuand l po. Ama yua kul ń ŋanm g bann wan maa nand.
46003011	G dugn fiɛgl nuan yen be o, lann n tie Yiesu Kristo. Sua ji kan fid g fag fiɛgliel.
46003012	Sua bu fid g tug wula, lann i kaa ligtana, lann i kaa tana nba daaɔg paa g maa g tuan l fiɛgl po. Sua mɔ ń tug daad lann i kaa muad, lann i kaa kinkaga g caan l fiɛgl po.
46003013	Ama buud daal i k b ji bu la yua kul yaa tuonn n tie yal nba canyiin, g dugn l daal bu baal yen muu i. Muu n bu bign yua kul tuonn g ŋɔn lan tie yal nba.
46003014	Yua nba g muu g fid g dii wan sun tuonn nba k l tua l fiɛgl po nyan, wano n bu gaal pani.
46003015	Yua nba g muu dii u tuonn nuan kan la pani. U bu ciɛl nuan, g nyaan l yen baa tie nyan u nyiɛ muu n ninŋ i g ciɛl nyan.
46003016	I g ban k i tie Yendu ŋaag i, g Yendu Fuom be i ninŋ ii ?
46003017	To, yua nba tien Yendu ŋaag fam, Yendu mɔ bu tien’o fam g dugn Yendu ŋaag be wano Yendu kukua po i. Yinm n tie l ŋaag.
46003018	Sua ń daa bɔnd u kua. I ninŋ, nil gii mali k u tie yanfodaan nyan ŋanduna ne niib n mali nand nyan, wan tien u kua waad g fid g te yanfodaan yen mɔni.
46003019	G dugn ŋanduna ne yanfuom tie yanluolm i Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ. Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « U tu te yanfodanm ń guan g baa banm mɔno ninfandiɛd n ninŋ. »
46003020	L biɛ diɛn liel buol g maad: « Yonmdaan ban g yanfodanm maalm g tie siɛl. »
46003021	Lann sua ń daa donŋ u kua g dugn nifosaal po, k l maa bonn kul tie i yal i.
46003022	Lan tie min Pɔl ii, lan tie Apolɔs ii, lan tie Kefas ii, ŋanduna ne ii, miɛl ii, kuum ii, mɔlane yen youg nba baad ii, l kul tie i yal i.
46003023	K i mɔ tie Kristo yab, g Kristo mɔ tie Yendu yua.
46004001	Lann, nil kul ń gii diɛ k t tie Kristo tuonsunna i, k t tie yab nba k b cab’b k ban gii ŋɔnŋ niib Yendu ŋasiil i.
46004002	B gii bil nil tuonn mɔ, l tie k wan ŋanm g sun yen papienn i.
46004003	Min nuan, yinm n gii jalg’n ii, nifanm n gii jalg’n nyan nifosaal n tu jalg u lua nand nyan ii, n baga g be. Min mɔno yen g jalg n kua.
46004004	N ban k n tug n ninŋ pien, ama lann kaa ŋɔnŋ k n g mɔg biid. Yonmdaan n tie yua nba n ja min yaa buud.
46004005	Lann, daa tu gbaa g jiɛl man sua buud g daal daa g pund. Guul man g Yonmdaan ń baal. Wano n bu dɔgd yal nba wuo bunbɔnn n ninŋ, g ŋɔn maalm nba be niib pala n ninŋ. L youg u, g yua kul bu gaal wan dagd yen pinpagd nba Yendu buol.
46004006	N naataani, n tug maninnaɔnŋ min yen Apolɔs po k yin gbad niimn i, k yin la t buol g bann g sua kan fid g kand diɛni n yed yal nba po gii pua jipaad k wano bua u ne i, u g bua u ne.
46004007	Ŋmaa yed k fin cie lieb i ? A mɔg bɛ i g Yendu kaa tie’a nii ? K b gii tie’a nii, bɛ po i k a yen ji pua jipaad nyan b g tie’a kaa nyan i ?
46004008	Yinm la yin bua yal nba kul o ! I ji tie ŋalmandanm i ! I dii bal g ŋaa’ti no! Man ne k i ji l tie batieb i yen mɔni, t mɔ bo kan taan yen’i gii tie batieb kaa aa ?
46004009	L naan g Yendu te k tinm Yiesu sundi n ji l juod. T tie nyan niib nba k b jiɛl b buud k l tie k ban kpi’b niwulug nunŋ n nyan i. Ŋanduna n ninŋ, niib kul laa’ti, malɛg‑nba laa’ti nii, g niib mɔ biɛ laa’ti.
46004010	Tinm tie waadb i, g dugn Kristo po. K yinm ceg g dugn yin be yen’o po. Tinm tie tali i, k yinm tie paalb. Niib cɔln yinm, g nyaan g yen nund tinm.
46004011	Saa yen mɔlane, tinm biɛ daa l be yen kom yen nyunnyuglu i, g g mɔg tiɛd, k b puag’ti, k t waa g g mɔg ŋai.
46004012	Tinm biɛ daa l cagn g suun tuonn yen t nui i g di. Yab sugd’ti, t tu gaal’b mɔgaalŋani i, yab cagn’ti tin juun g gaal l cicagm.
46004013	Yab nba jond t po, t tu jiin’m yen yanfomaam i. Saa yen mɔlane, niib daa l nyuan tinm k t tie ŋanduna ne tinbenmuad i. B yaa po t tie ŋanduna ne jɔgnd i.
46004014	N g da’i nne k min kuan’i fai kaa, n bua n te’i cegli i, g dugn i tie nyan n bid nyan i, k n bua’i bonciɛnn.
46004015	Yen mɔni, baa i gii mɔg tundkaab tuda piig mɔno k b ŋmagd’i Kristo sɔnu n ninŋ, baa‑nba nuan, i kan fid gii mɔg’b k b yab. Yiesu Kristo ŋuanu n ninŋ, min nba baal yen Laabamann i buol nyan, min n mal’i.
46004016	Lann, n balm’i, i togd man n binbem.
46004017	L po n te k n sun Timote i buol. U suun t Yonmdaan tuonn lan bual nand k n bua’ɔg nyan n big nyan. U bu guan g tiɛd’i min yaan ŋua Yiesu Kristo g be nand. N biɛ tund lann i kaannaa kul, Kristo‑yab tintaancaga kul n ninŋ.
46004018	I ninŋ siɛb ji daan mali k n kan baal i buol i, g ji pua jipaad.
46004019	Ama Yendu gii bua, l ji kan wai yen k n baal i buol. Lann i k n bu bann l jipaadanm n pua mɔb g maad yal nba yen ban bu fid g tien yal nba.
46004020	G dugn, Yendu diem g tie nil n pua mɔb g maad yal nba kaa, l tie wan bu fid g tien yal nba i.
46004021	I bua bɛ i ? N baal i buol yen lanbann ii ? Bii i bua k n baal yen buam yen pasɔnŋl i?
46005001	Niib yad g maad kaannaa kul k i ninŋ siɛb suun cuncontuona, cuncontuona nba bi hal bonciɛnn, g yab nba g tie Kristo‑yab mɔno kan sun. N gbad k i ninŋ yend diɛ u baa puo g dua yen’o !
46005002	Yen l kul k i biɛ pua jipaad ii ? L bo g dagd k i pala ń biil l po, k yin bel g yaan yua nba suun l tuonn nyan i siign ii ?
46005003	Min nuan, yen min l be banfagl nand kul, n maalm yen be yen’i. Min tuod g jiɛl yua nba sun l tuonn buud nyan n be i siign nyan i.
