46005004	I gii taan lieb Yonmdaan Yiesu sann po, n mɔ baa be yen’i n maalm n ninŋ, k t Yonmdaan Yiesu paalu mɔ be yen’ti,
46005005	yin tug l daan g cab’o Sitaan, k wan biil u gbannand, g Yonmdaan guanu daal wan la fielu.
46005006	Jipaad nba k i pua nyan g ŋan. I g ban g dibina waam nne n tu te g kpanu yom kul ń fid ii ?
46005007	Biid tie nyan dibina nyan i. Tuod g nyan man l dibina i ninŋ, g ji gii tie nyan kpanu yom nba k b buun g g tien dibina nyan. I yen l tie nnyan i yen mɔni. G dugn b kpii Kristo, yua nba tie t Fielu jaanm pebig o.
46005008	Lann, t di man t jaanm, k lan ji daa tie k t mɔg tonu g biɛ suun cuncontuona kaa: lann nuan tie nyan kpanu nba k b tien yen dibina nyan i. Ama tin di yen papienn yen mamɔni: lann n tie nyan kpanu nba k b g tien yen dibina nyan.
46005009	Min daan kpiɛ g diɛn’i kadaaɔg nba, n daan maad’i mii yin daa taand yen cuncona baa siɛl n ninŋ.
46005010	N daan g maad nnyan g nyuan niib nba l yad g be ŋanduna n ninŋ g suun cuncontuona, yab nba mɔg tubonm, yab nba fe lieb bona yen yab nba pad pada kul kaa. L gii tie k i bu lɔgl b kul ne, lann i yen bu nya ŋanduna n ninŋ saa !
46005011	N daan maad g nyuan yua nba yi u kua Kristo‑yua o, g biɛ yen conm, g mɔg tubonm, g pad pada, g ci ŋalaaci lieb po, g tie dinyuul, lann i kaa g tie naayig nyan i. Baa yin daa taand g di jied mɔno yen l daan.
46005012	L la’n lɛ i k n mɔ tan ja yab nba g tie Kristo‑yab buud i ? L g bual k yin gii ja yab nba tie Kristo‑yab yaa buud kaa aa ?
46005013	Yab tenn nuan, Yendu n bu jiɛl b buud. Nyan Yendu Kadaaɔg n maad nyan: « Nyan man nibiiug i siign ninŋ ».
46006001	L tien nle i k i ninŋ yend tu mɔg maam yen u lua g tug’o g gad yen’o buuddanm nba g tie Kristo‑yab buol, g kan ŋaa k u Kristo‑yab lieb kaa ń ŋanm l maam i ? L g mɔg’i fai ii ?
46006002	I g ban g Kristo‑yab n tan bu jiɛl ŋanduna ne yab buud ii ? K l gii tie k i tan bu jiɛl ŋanduna yab buud, i kan fid g bu mabid-bid nba baad’i ne buud ii ?
46006003	I g ban k t tan bu jiɛl malɛg‑nba buud ii ? K t binbem ne ninŋ mabid-bid nba baad’ti ni k t ji bu gbal l buud jiɛlu uu ?
46006004	K l mabid-bid gii baal i binbem n ninŋ i, n tua i tu tug yab nba g tie siɛl Kristo tintaanu n ninŋ i, k ban jiɛl l buud a ?
46006005	L tie i fai i, min n maad’i. Lann, i ninŋ sua g be k u yam fo k u bu fid g jiɛl buud yinm nba taan g tie ninjann ne siign ninŋ ii ?
46006006	Ama i ŋaa lann yo, g Kristo‑yua tu fil u ninja g gad yen’o buuddanm nba g tie Kristo‑yab buol.
46006007	Lan yaan l tie yal nba kul, yin bu yen i lieb nyan, l ŋɔn k i ji l kpiɛd sɔnu n nyan. L bo g dagd k i tuo g nil ń biil’i nii ? L bo g dagd k i ŋaa g nil ń di’i nii ?
46006008	K yinm mɔno biɛ ji gɔ g tie i lieb yal nba g ŋan, g di’b k b yen tie i ninjanm Kristo‑yab i.
46006009	I g ban g biiddanm g mɔg yiɛl Yendu diem n ninŋ ii ? Daa bɔnd man i kua, yab nba conm, yab nba pad pada, jab nba dua yen puob k l g tie b ŋaapuob, puob nba dua yen jab k l g tie b salb, jab nba dua yen b jalieb,
46006010	naayiga, tubondanm, dinyuyukpiena, ŋalaacidanm yen yab nba fe lieb bona, b kul ne, baa sua kan kua Yendu diem n ninŋ.
46006011	I ninŋ, siɛb mɔ bo tie nnyan i. Ama Yendu ŋuul i biid kul, g te k i ji tie u kukua yaa yab, g tie nimɔnm u nunŋ n, Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sann po yen t Yendu Foŋanm po.
46006012	« Siɛl g be g tie kual n po », ama bonn kul kaa tie bonŋann. « Siɛl g be g tie kual n po », ama min yen kan ŋaa siɛl ń gii diɛ’n nyan n tie dansalg nyan.
46006013	« Jied be puol po i, g puol mɔ be jied po », Yendu yen bu biɛn l ŋanle kul o. Ama gbannand nuan g be cunconm po kaa, l be Yonmdaan po i, Yonmdaan n yen t gbannand.
46006014	Yendu n yaan yied t Yonmdaan nyan, u bu yied t mɔ u paalu po.
46006015	I g ban k i gbannand tie Kristo gbannand bɔga aa ? K nnyan i, n bu tug Kristo gbannand bɔgl k lan te cunconn gbannand bɔgl ii ? Palb, lann kan tien.
46006016	Bii i g ban g yua nba yen cunconn taan lieb, wano yen l cunconn ji tu taan gii tie gbannanyend ii ? G dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Banm banle ji bu taan gii tie gbannanyend i ».
46006017	Ama yua nba taan yen Yonmdaan nuan, wano yen Yonmdaan n bu taan gii mɔg yanyenm.
46006018	Lɔgl man cunconm. Biid nba g nil tie kul, l g tie u gbannand yal kaa, ama yua nba tie cunconm nuan, u gɔ g biid wano mɔno yaa gbannand i.
46006019	I g ban k i gbannand tie Foŋanm ŋaag ii ? Foŋanm nba g Yendu tie’i nyan be i ninŋ i. I g ban k i ji g yen i kua aa ?
46006020	Yendu n pa i po g yend’i. Lann, tug man i gbannand g sun tuonn nba bu don Yendu sann.
46007001	T ji diid man yin daan diɛn kadaaɔg g bual’n yal nba po. L ŋan g jua ń daa nagd puo.
46007002	Ama cunconm n yaan yabd nyan, l bual g jua kul ń gii mɔg u ŋaapuo i, g puo kul mɔ ń gii mɔg u sal.
46007003	Puojua kul ń tu te u ŋaapuo, puo n bua yal nba jua buol, puo mɔ ń tu te u sal jua n bua yal nba puo buol.
46007004	Puo kaa yen wano mɔno gbannand, u sal n yen. Jua mɔ kaa yen wano mɔno gbannand, u ŋaapuo n yen.
46007005	Yend ń daa yie g bel lua k b kan taan dinduanu. L gii g tie k i bua n jaand i kaa, g taan mɔb g daa paad yen lieb waam. Ama jaandi po gii pend, yin guan gii be yen lieb g daa ŋaa g Sitaan ń la sɔnu g bign’i g dugn yin yaan g so i kua nyan po.
46007006	Min maad’i yal ne g tie mabl kaa, n cab’i mɔb i, k i bu fid g tien nnyan.
46007007	N bo sun g niib kul ń gii tie nyan min nyan i. Ama nil kul yen gaal u yul po paab i Yendu buol. Sua be k u pii’ug paab ne, lua mɔ k u pii’ug liel ne.
46007008	Min bu maad jikpaga yen pekɔa po yal nba n ne: B gii bu fid gii be nnyan, nyan min mɔno min be jikpagd nand ne, lann n baa su b po.
46007009	Ama b gii kan fid g suol b kua, jab gii kuan puob, g puob mɔ kun jab, lann n su yen ban gii be b kua g jab yen niɛn puob, g puob mɔ niɛn jab.
46007010	Yab nba kuan lieb mɔ, min bu te’b mɔbonn nba n ne, l g nyiɛ n buol kaa, Yonmdaan n yed g: Puo ń daa nya g ŋaa u sal.
46007011	Ama u gii nyiɛ g ŋaa u sal, wan yen ji daa kun jafan, lann i kaa wan yen guan g manŋ yen u sal. Jua mɔ ń daa nyanŋ u ŋaapuo.
46007012	Yab nba tenn, min bu maad’b yal n ne, lann ji g nyiɛ Yonmdaan buol kaa, min n maad: Kristo‑yua gii mɔg puo, k l puo g tie Kristo‑yua g yen tuo g baa be yen’o, wan daa nyan l puo.
46007013	Kristo‑yua nba tie puo mɔ gii mɔg sal k u g tie Kristo‑yua, g yen tuo g baa be yen’o, wan mɔ ń daa nya g ŋaa u sal.
46007014	K l maa jua nba g tie Kristo‑yua nyan mɔ ji nagn Yendu n nyan, g dugn u ŋaapuo po. G puo nba g tie Kristo‑yua mɔ ji nagn Yendu n nyan, g dugn u sal po. L bo gii g tie nnyan, b bid bo baa tie nyan b tie jɔgnd bid nyan i Yendu nunŋ n, k l yen g tie nnyan ; b ŋan g dagd Yendu po.
46007015	Ama yua nba g tie Kristo‑yua gii yie k b bu yad lieb, ban ŋaa’ɔg wan gii saa. L youg, yua tenn g tie Kristo‑yua nyan gii tie jua ii, u gii tie puo ii, siɛl yaa mabl ji g be u po. Yendu yiin’i k yin gii be k l man i.
46007016	K l maa fin puo, a bu fiel a sal ii, a kan fiel’o oo, a daa g ban. K fin jua i, a bu fiel a ŋaapuo oo, a kan fiel’o oo, a daa g ban.
46007017	Lan nyan min maad yal ne o, nil kul ń gii be binbem nba ninŋ g Yonmdaan cab’o k wan gii be. Yendu n bo yiin yua kul g sua k u be binbem nba ninŋ nyan, wan gii be nnyan. N tien l mɔbonn i, Kristo‑yab tintaancaga kul n ninŋ.
46007018	Yendu bo gii yiin nil g sua k u kɔnd, wan daa kpaan k wan piin kɔnd banm u po. Yendu bo gii yiin nil g sua k u daa g kɔnd mɔ, wan ji daa kpaan k wan kɔnd.
46007019	Kɔnd g tie siɛl, yua g kɔnd mɔ, l biɛ g pugd siɛl. Yal nba tie bonmɔnn tie g nil ń cɔln Yendu Mɔmaam i.
46007020	Nil kul ń gii be wan bo be nand g Yendu yiin’o.
46007021	A bo gii tie yonm i, g Yendu yiin’a, ŋan daa bual. Ama a gii la sɔnu g bu fid g nya yonmd n ninŋ, ŋan nya.
46007022	G dugn nil nba g Yonmdaan yiin’o g sua k u tie yonm, Yonmdaan nyan wano yonmd n ninŋ n nyan. Yua nba k u bo yiin’o g sua k u g tie yonm mɔ, u ji te Kristo yonm n nyan.
46007023	U pa i po i, g nyan’i yonmd n, lann ji daa te man niib yonmi.
46007024	N naataani, sua kul ń gii be yen Yendu, nyan Yendu n bo yiin’o g sua k u be nand nyan.
46007025	Mɔlane, n ji bua n maad yab nba daa g kuan lieb po i. Yonmdaan g tie’n u mɔbonn l po. Ama Yonmdaan n diid’n yen nunmanŋ, g te k n tie yua dagd yen ban gii dug u po nyan, n bu fid g maad min mali yal l po.
46007026	N mali k tin be yaa youg nba ne n yaan ji biɛ nyan, l ŋan g nil kul ń gii be wan tu be nand i.
46007027	A gii mɔg puo, ŋan daa kpaan k a nyan’o. A gii g mɔg puo mɔ ŋan ji daa kpaan k a kuan puo.
46007028	Ama a yen gii kuan puo, a g tien biid kaa. Sipaan mɔ gii kun jua, u mɔ biɛ g tien biid kaa. G nyaan yab nba kuan lieb yen bu la fala nuan bonciɛnn binbem ne ninŋ. Min bo bua k i lɔgl l fala i.
46007029	N naataani, min bua n maad yal nba n ne: Youg pel o. Lan cil mɔlane gii saa, yab nba mɔg puob ń ji gii be nyan b g mɔg puob nyan.
46007030	Yab nba buud ń tien nyan b g buud nyan, yab nba kpanm ń tien nyan b g kpanm nyan, yab nba daa bona ń tien nyan ban daa yal nba g tie b yal nyan.
46007031	Yab nba do nyuad ŋanduna ne po ń gii tie nyan b g do siɛl yaa nyuad nyan. G dugn ŋanduna ne n ji tie nand ne, u kan wai yen wan pend.
46007032	N g bua yin gii mɔg siɛl yaa yanbani. Yua nba g mɔg puo, u mali wan bu tien nand g sun Yonmdaan tuona i, u kpaan k wan manŋ Yonmdaan pal i.
46007033	Ama yua nba mɔg puo nuan mali ŋanduna ne bona po i. U kpaan k wan manŋ u ŋaapuo pal i.
46007034	U maalm ji bɔgd munle i. Puo nba g mɔg jua, lann i kaa sipaan nba daa g kun jua mɔ mali Yonmdaan tuona po, g bua k wan tug u maalm yen u munn kul g cab Yonmdaan. Ama puo nba mɔg sal nuan mali ŋanduna ne bona po i, g kpaan k wan manŋ u sal pal.
46007035	N maad nnyan k lan ŋanm yinm i. N g bua n kuan’i mabl n ninŋ kaa, n bua k yin gii be binbem nba ŋan g dagd i, g tug i kua g cab Yonmdaan yen payenn.
46007036	Yua nba mɔg sikpenŋ, g diid g sua k wan niɛn’o nand nyan, u kan fid g suol u kua g cɔln l sikpenŋ, g mali k l dagd yen ban kuan lieb, b bu fid g kuan lieb nyan wan bua nand nyan. U g tien biid kaa.
46007037	Ama yua nba jag g suol u pal n ninŋ, g siɛl yaa mabl g be l n ninŋ, k l tie u yanbuam i k u yed k u kan kuan u sikpenŋ, l ŋan.
46007038	Lann, yua nba kuan u sikpenŋ, u ŋanm i, ama yua nba g kuan u sikpenŋ yal n be liig.
46007039	Puo sal daa gii be g mɔg miɛl i, k u tie u sal. U gii kpe nuan, puo bu fid g guan g kun wan bua yua nba, ama l bual k l daan ń gii tie Kristo‑yua i.
46007040	G nyaan, n yaa maalm n ninŋ, u yen bo gii be nnyan g g guan g kun jua i k u bo bu ŋanm gii be pamann n ninŋ. Min mali yal n nyan, g mali k n mɔ mɔg Yendu Foŋanm.
46008001	T ji diid man yal nba nyuan padnand po. « T ban k t kul mɔg banm ». G nyaan banm kuand nil jipaad i, buam n te g nil kped dindann n.
46008002	Nil gii mali k u ban bonn, u yen daa g ban g pund lan bual k wan gii ban nand.
46008003	Ama nil gii bua Yendu, Yendu ban l daan i.
46008004	Lann, padnand ŋmanu po i, t ban g ŋanduna n ninŋ padl g tie siɛl, g Yenduyeno kukua n be.
46008005	G dugn, bona be polu po yen tinŋ n ninŋ g niib yi’b g yendui (l kon tie mɔni i k l niib yaa po yendui yen yonmdanm be g yab),
46008006	g nyaan t yaa po, Yenduyeno kukua n be, wano n tie t Baa, wano n tag bonn kul, t be u po i. Yonmdanyeno kukua n be, wano n tie Yiesu Kristo, bonn kul be g dugn u po i, t be g dugn u po i.
46008007	Ama niib kul yen kaa mɔg l banm. Siɛb be g bo ŋanm g maan pada bonciɛnn, g baa yen mɔlane mɔno b gii ŋman l nand b biɛ daa l mali k l tie padl yal i. B pala n ninŋ ban yaan daa g ŋanm g kub k l paa nyan, b mali k l kuand’b jɔgnd i.
46008008	Jied yen kan fid g te tin nagn Yendu nunŋ n. T gii g dii, l kan guan’ti puol, t biɛ gii dii mɔ, l kan pugn’ti baa siɛl.
46008009	G nyaan, yen ŋanm man g diid i yul po, k yin yal i kua g bu fid g sun yal nba nyan ń daa te tantuudkal lieb nba k b dindann daa g ŋanm g cie po.
46008010	G dugn, nil nba k u dindann daa g ŋanm g cie gii la fin nba mɔg l banm nyan, k a kal tingbandieog n ninŋ g di jied, l kan kuan’o papaal k wan mɔ ń ŋman padnand ii ?
46008011	A banm po te k wano nba k u dindann daa g cie nyan biɛl n nyan, wano nba tie a ninja, g Kristo bo kpe u po.
46008012	I gii te k i ninjanm nba k b dindann daa g cie nyan baa biid n, k i biɛ ŋmad b yam, i biid Kristo mɔno i.
46008013	L po n te g jied po gii bu te n ninja ń baa biid n ninŋ, n kan ban g ŋman nand palb, lan tan daa te n ninja ń kua tudm n ninŋ.
46009001	N g yen n kua aa ? N g tie Yiesu sundu kaa aa ? N bo g la t Yonmdaan Yiesu ii ? Yinm kaa tie min sun t Yonmdaan po g la yab ii ?
46009002	Baa siɛb gii g nyuan k n tie Yiesu sundu mɔno, i yaa po n l tie i, g dugn yin yaan te Kristo‑yab nyan mɔno n ŋɔn k n sun n sundu tuonn Yonmdaan po.
46009003	Yab nba kɔn yen’n nyan, min bu jiin’m yal nba n ne:
46009004	T g mɔg yiko yen tin di g nyu g dugn tuonn nba k t suun po ii ?
46009005	T g mɔg yiko yen tin mɔ ń tug puo nba tie Kristo‑yua t tu gii saa naan tin gii diɛ’og nyan Yiesu sundlieb yen Yonmdaan ninjanm yen Kefas n tie nand nyan ii ?
46009006	Bii min yen Barnabas kukua i k l tie mabl k tin gii suun g laad t jied ii ?
46009007	Sijelano n baa suun u tuonn g g gaan ŋmaapaaɔg u ? Bii ŋmaa n baa ŋuund dimɔunŋ tiidi u, g yen g mua l luana i ? Bii ŋmaa n baa kpaa bonkobd o, g yen ji g nyu b biim i ?
46009008	Min maad yal ne tie nifosaal maalm kua yaa aa ? Moyis kadaaɔg n yiko g maad lann kaa nyan ii ?
46009009	Yen mɔni, l kon diɛn Moyis yiko kadaaɔg n g maad: « Naab nba tod’a k a pua a dii, a kan lol u mɔb ». Yendu bo fabn nai po yaa aa ?
46009010	U bo g maad tinm kaa aa ? Yen mɔni nuan, l bo diɛn t yaa po i. L bual g yua nba ko tanmɔnn ń gii daan, yua nba pua dii mɔ ń gii daan g sua kul mɔg u biinu wan suun tuonn nba nyan ninŋ.
46009011	Tin bo tie’i ŋalman, k l tie Foŋanm yal nyan, lann l g dagd yen tin mɔ ń ji gaal i buol ŋalman nba tie nifosaal yal ii ?
46009012	Lieb gii mɔg yiko yen ban gaal todl i buol, tinm kaa ŋanm g mɔg l yiko ii ? G nyaan tinm yen g tug t yiko g sun yen tuonn, t tuo g gaal falabuolu kul, k l maa t bo g bua Kristo Laabamann ń guan puol.
46009013	I g ban g yab nba suun jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ tuonn, k b jied nya l jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n ii, g yab nba suun salg binbindl buol mɔ yaa biinu nya salg nba k b yid nyan n ninŋ ii ?
46009014	L tie nnyan i g Yonmdaan tie mɔb, g yab nba muand Laabamann mɔ ń gii di Laabamann muandu po.
46009015	Ama min yen g tug l yiko kul baa yenn g sun yen tuonn. Min biɛ da kadaaɔg nba ne mɔ, l g tie k n ji bua siɛl kaa. N gii kpe lann n su yen nil ń te min luol min pua jipaad yal nba po.
46009016	N kan fid gii pua jipaad Laabamann muandu po, g dugn l tie niinn i n po. N gii g muand Laabamann nuan, fala tie n yal i.
46009017	Min mɔno n bo gii tagd n yam n ninŋ k n sun l tuonn, n bo bu fid g gaal paaɔg l po, ama lan tie niinn n po nyan, n suun lan bual k n sun yal nba i.
46009018	Lann, n nyuad tie bɛ i ? L tie k min gii muand Laabamann fam i, g daa gaan min mɔg yiko yen k n gaal yal nba l Laabamann muandu po.
46009019	Min n yen n kua, sua g yen’n. Ama n yen tug n kua g tien niib kul yonm i, k n fid g gɔgl niib bonciɛnn k ban te Kristo‑yab.
46009020	N gii be yen Suif‑nba, n tu tien nyan banm nyan i, k min fid g gɔgl Suif‑nba k ban te Kristo‑yab. N gii be yen yab nba g Moyis yiko mɔg nuu b po, n tu tien nyan banm nyan i, g Moyis yiko yen g mɔg nuu n yaa po. N tie nnyan k n fid g gɔgl b mɔ i.
46009021	Yab nba g ban Moyis yiko mɔ, n be yen’m nyan n mɔ g ban l yiko nyan i, l g tie k n g cɔln Yendu mɔmaam kaa, n cɔln Kristo mɔmaam. N tie nnyan k n fid g gɔgl b mɔ i.
46009022	Yab nba k b dindann daa g paag mɔ, n be yen’m nyan ban be nand nyan i, k n gɔgl’b k ban te Kristo‑yab. N tug n kua g cab, g tien bonn kul b kul po, g gbaa yal kul k n fiel b ninŋ baa siɛb.
46009023	N tie l kul ne Laabamann po i, k n mɔ ń do nyuad l po.
46009024	I g ban g niib gii bign nantaal, k b kul siɛn, g yend kua n tu di g gaal paadi ii ? Lann, i siɛn man nand nba k i bu gaal paadi.
46009025	Yua nba mɔg nantaal bignn kul, u tu suol u kua bona bonciɛnn n ninŋ i. B tie nnyan k ban gaal bignn paadi i, k l paadi yen kan wai. Tinm nuan yen tie nnyan g kpaan paadi nba kan ban g dud i.
46009026	L po n te k min siɛn, ama n yen g bund g gbiɛ k n siɛn kaa. N pua cedi, ama n yen g bund g gbiɛ k n fuund kaa.
46009027	N mabnd n gbanu bonciɛnn, g diɛ’ɔg yen ninmɔnn, k min tan daa muand lieb Laabamann g gbenn o, g yuand g luol n yaa yiɛl i.
46010001	N naataani, n bua n tiɛd’i g tawalgbaɔnŋ n bo ŋaag t yaajanm kul po, k b kul puod mɔgl.
46010002	Nnyan, b kul bo taan yen Moyis g wul nyum n nyan tawalgbaɔnŋ n ninŋ yen mɔgl n ninŋ.
46010003	B kul bo taan g dii jied nba bo nyiɛ Yendu buol i,
46010004	g biɛ taan g nyuu nyum nba bo nyiɛ Yendu buol. Yen mɔni nyum nba k b bo nyu nyan bo buni Yendu tangbaɔnŋ nba bo ŋua’b nyan ninŋ i. L tangbaɔnŋ n bo tie Kristo.
46010005	Ama yen l kul, b ninŋ bonciɛnn bo tien yal nba g manŋ Yendu pal. Lann n te k b bo kpe g yad g dua dua tinkuonŋ n ninŋ.
46010006	L bona kul ne bo tien k lan te’ti cegli i, k tinm ń ji daa tug maalbiid g kuan t pala n ninŋ nyan ban bo tien nand nyan.
46010007	Daa ŋua man pada nyan b ninŋ siɛb n bo tien nand nyan. L kon diɛn g maad: « Niib bo kal g dii, g nyuu, g ji fiil g jeln. »
46010008	T daa suun cuncontuona nyan b ninŋ siɛb n bo tien nand, g diyenn kua niib tuda piinle yen tuda ŋantaa kpe nyan.
46010009	T daa bignd Yonmdaan nyan b ninŋ siɛb n bo tien nand, g wai jun’m k b kpe nyan.
46010010	Daa buln buln man nyan b ninŋ siɛb n bo tien nand, g kuum malɛg baal g pua g kpii’b nyan.
46010011	L bona kul bo tien k lan te lieb cegli i. L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ k lan fand tinm nba ji be youg nba g fag yen ŋanduna juodu ne i.
46010012	Lann yua nba mali k u sie k l paa ń ŋanm g suol u kua g daa baa.
46010013	Bigna nba baal’i tie yal nba bu fid g baal nifosaal kul i. Yendu gii puon k u bu tien yal nba u tu tien i, u kan ŋaa bigna nba cie i paalu ń baal’i. Bignn biɛ gii baal’i mɔ, u bu ŋɔn sɔnu nba k i bu tɔgn g nya l n ninŋ, g te’i paalu nba k i bu fid g juun.
46010014	Lann, n dɔnn‑nba lɔgl man pada canyiin.
46010015	N maad yinm nba tie yanfodanm ne i, yinm mɔno ń mali n maam ne po.
46010016	Tin tu di Yonmdaan jied, g nyu diŋmanŋ nba ninŋ, g tiend Yendu balg l po nyan, l g taand’ti yen Kristo sɔm kaa aa ? G kpanu nba k t jend g ŋman nyan i, l g taand’ti yen Kristo gbannand kaa aa ?
46010017	G dugn kpanu yenn kukua n be, yen tin l yab nand kul, t taan g tie gbannanyend i, k l maa t kul taan g biid l kpanu yenn i.
46010018	Diid man Israyɛl buolu, yab nba tu ŋman bonkobd nba k b kod g yid salg nyan, banm yen Yendu tu taan lieb gii tie bonyenn n nyan.
46010019	N maam ne niimn ii ? N bua n maad g padnand, lann i kaa g padl mɔno tie siɛl yaa aa ?
46010020	Palb. Ban tu pad padl nyan, sanpola n tu gaal, b g pad g tien Yendu kaa. L po n te k n g bua k yinm yen sanpola ń gii taa siɛl.
46010021	I kan fid gii nyu Yonmdaan diŋmanŋ n g biɛ nyu sanpola mɔ yaa diŋmanŋ n. I kan fid gii di Yonmdaan saaŋmanŋ n g biɛ di sanpola mɔ yaa saaŋmanŋ n.
46010022	Bii t kpaan k t fiin Yonmdaan mutuol yaa aa ? Tinm n paa g cie’og uu ?
46010023	« Siɛl g be g tie kual », ama bonn kul kaa tie bonmɔnn. « Siɛl g be g tie kual », ama bonn kul kaa tod’ti k t kped dindann n ninŋ.
46010024	Sua ń daa kpaan u yal kua, i kpaan man i lieb todl.
46010025	Ban kuad nand nba daag n ninŋ kul, i bu fid g daa g ŋman g daa mali munle-le l po g bual siɛl yaa buali.
46010026	G dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad g « Yonmdaan n yen tinŋ yen yal nba be tinŋ po kul ».
46010027	Yua nba g tie Kristo‑yua gii yiin’i jedinu, k i tuo g gad, yin di wan tie’i jied nba kul, g daa mali munle-le l po g bual’o siɛl yaa buali.
46010028	Ama nil gii maad’i: « Ne tie padnand i », yin ji daa ŋman l nand g dugn yua nba maad’i nyan po, yen lan mɔg maalm munle-le nba l po nyan.
46010029	N maad wan mɔg maalm munle-le nba i, n g maad i yaa yal kaa. G dugn bɛ po i g lua maalm bu pan’n k n kan tien min bua yal nba i ?
46010030	Bɛ po i k n bu tien Yendu balg g di jied o, nil ń biɛ gii jalg’n l jied po i ?
46010031	Lann, i gii di ii, i gii nyu ii, yin l tie yal nba kul, yin mɔnd k lan kpiɛg Yendu sann.
46010032	Daa ŋaa man k i bontitied ń tuln Suif‑nba lann i kaa yab nba g tie Suif‑nba, lann i kaa Yendu tintaanu niib.
46010033	I tie man nyan min nyan. Bonn kul n ninŋ, n kpaan k b kul pala ń gii man n po i. N g kpaan n yul po nyuad kaa, n kpaan niib bonciɛnn yal i, k ban la fielu.
46011001	I ŋmaad man n taabuod n, nyan min mɔ ń yaan ŋmaad Kristo taabuod n nyan.
46011002	N pag’i yen yin tiɛn n po bonn kul n ninŋ g biɛ diɛ tundl nba k n bo tie’i.
46011003	N yen bo bua k yin bann bonyenn: Kristo n tie jua kul Yudaan, g jua tie puo yudaan, g Yendu tie Kristo Yudaan.
46011004	Jua nba yil yucabl o g jaand, lann i kaa g sɔgnd niib Yendu n maad’o yal nba, u fiɛgd u Yudaan i.
46011005	Ama puo nba g yil siɛl, g yen jaand, lann i kaa g sɔgnd niib Yendu n maad’o yal nba, u fiɛgd u yudaan i. G dugn l ŋman k u kuol yukolnpaanu i.
46011006	Puo nba kan yil yucabl, wan yen ceb u yud. U gii jie fai yen wan ceb u yud lann i kaa yen wan kuol yukolnpaanu mɔ, wan yen yil yucabl.
46011007	L g bual g jua nuan ń yil yucabl, g dugn wano n tie Yendu ninnaɔnŋ g ŋɔnŋ u yudand. Puo nuan ŋɔnŋ jua yudand i.
46011008	K l maa Yendu bo g tug puo gbannand kaa g tag jua, u bo tug jua gbannand i g tag puo.
46011009	U biɛ bo g tag jua puo po kaa, u bo tag puo i jua po.
46011010	L po n te k l bual g puo ń gii yil yikod banm u yul po g dugn malɛg‑nba po.
46011011	Ama Yonmdaan buol nuan, puo g tie siɛl g jua g be, jua mɔ g tie siɛl g puo g be.
46011012	G dugn l tie mɔni i k b tug jua gbannand i g tag puo, ama puo mɔ n yen l maal jua, g nyaan l kul nya Yendu buol i.
46011013	Yinm mɔno ń ŋanm g mali g liɛ l dagd yen puo ń gii jaand g miɛd Yendu g g yil siɛl ii ?
46011014	Yendu n tien bona nand mɔno, l g ŋɔnŋ’i g jua gii ŋaa k u yud piɛ g yabd nne l mɔg fai ii ?
46011015	Puo nuan, l tie sel i u po k u yud ń gii yab. Yen mɔni, Yendu tie puo yud k l yab k lan gii tie cabl i u po k u yil.
46011016	Sua biɛ gii bua wan tien mɔniɛɔg l po, wan bann k tinm g ban bogdfana, Yendu tintaanu niib mɔ lann n nyan.
46011017	Min ji bu maad’i yal nba ne, l g tie k n bua n pag’i kaa, k l maa yin tu taan lieb g suun nand nba nyan, l g ŋami’i kaa, l biid’i nii.
46011018	Min bu cind g maad yal n ne: N gbad k i tu taan lieb g paadu be i siign. N mali k ban maad’n yal nba ninŋ bonyena tie mɔni i.
46011019	L bual mɔno g paadu ń gii be i siign i, k ban fid g bann i ninŋ yab nba ŋua Yendu yen payenn.
46011020	Lann, yin tu taan lieb nyan, Yonmdaan jied kaa k i tu di.
46011021	G dugn jediyoug, sua kul tu gbaa g cil gii di u jied u kukua i, g yenm kal kom, g lieb nyu g buog.
46011022	I g mɔg ŋai g baa di g nyu i ŋai n ninŋ ii ? Bii i nund Yendu tintaanu niib, g bua yin fiɛg yab nba g mɔg siɛl i ? K i ji yed k n maad’i bɛ ? K n pag’i l po ii ? Palb, n kan fid g pag’i l yaa po.
46011023	Min n gaal tundl nba Yonmdaan buol g luan’i n ne: Nyiɛɔg nba k b bo kuad Yonmdaan Yiesu, u bo tug kpanu,
46011024	g tien Yendu balg, g jend jend g maad: « Ne tie n gbannand i k n tien’i. I tie man nnyan gii tiɛd n po. »
46011025	Ban dii g gbenn, k u tug dimɔunŋ mɔ yen ŋmanŋ g tien nnyan g maad: « Dimɔunŋ ne tie n sɔm i, sɔm nba baal yen dɔnnpaanu. Yaa youg nba kul k i nyu, yin tiɛd n po. »
46011026	G dugn yaa youg nba k i ŋman kpanu ne, g nyu dimɔunŋ ne, i muand Yonmdaan kuum i saa yen youg nba k u bu guan.
46011027	L po n te g yua nba ŋman Yonmdaan kpanu, g nyu u dimɔunŋ, g cɔlunŋ g be l n, u tunŋ u kua biid n nyan yal nyuan Yonmdaan gbannand yen u sɔm po.
46011028	Yua kul ń ŋanm g diid u pal n wan tie yua nba o, g fid g ŋman l kpanu, g nyu l dimɔunŋ,
46011029	k l maa yua ŋman g nyu, g g nyuan k l tie [Yonmdaan] gbannand nyan, wano mɔno n bu ŋaa buud ń di’ug g dugn wan ŋman g nyu nyan po.
46011030	L po n te k i siign ninŋ niib bonciɛnn yiɛl, g yenm‑nba dinŋ, g lieb mɔ kpe.
46011031	T yen bo gii tuod g diid t pala n ninŋ tin tie yab nba, buud bo kan di’ti.
46011032	Ama Yonmdaan bu’ti k wan tund’ti nii, k u tan gii jiɛl ŋanduna buud yaa youg, buud ń ji daa di tinm.
46011033	Lann, n naataani, i tu gii taan g bu di jied, yin guul i lieb.
46011034	Kom gii mɔg yua nba wan di u ŋaapo o gii baad, k i tintaann ń tan daa baad yen Yendu buud i po. Maam nba tenn g be, n bu baal i buol yo, g gbenn l maam.
46012001	N naataani, n g bua g yal nba nyuan Foŋanm paab po, siɛl ń gii duag’i.
46012002	Yinm mɔno ban k yin daa bo g tie Kristo‑yab yaa youg, tingbana n bo mɔg nuu i po, k i g mɔg ciɛlu, k b yen g maad mɔno.
46012003	L po n te k n bua n ŋanm g maad’i ne: L nil g be g Yendu Fuom bu ŋmagd’o wan maad g « Yiesu ń biɛl fam ». Sua mɔ biɛ kan fid g yaad g maad g « Yiesu tie Yonmdaan », g Foŋanm g ŋmagd’o k wan maad nnyan.
46012004	Paab be jiɛg jiɛg, ama l kul nya Foŋanm yend ne buol i.
46012005	Tuona mɔ biɛ be jiɛg jiɛg, ama l kul tie Yonmdaan yend ne tuonn i.
46012006	Tuonbuoli-buoli be, ama Yenduyeno ne n te g niib kul suun l kul.
46012007	Foŋanm ŋɔnŋ k u be nil kul n ninŋ k lan ŋanm tintaanu niib kul i.
46012008	Foŋanm tu te niyend yanfomaam, g te lua maband, Foŋanm yend ne n tien l kul.
46012009	Wano Foŋanm yend ne kua n tu te yend dindann, g te lua paab k wan gii paagd yiɛnm.
46012010	Wano n tu te niyend ń gii suun yaalidug tuona, g te lua ń gii gaan Yendu maam g gɔ g sɔgnd niib, g te lua ń gii ban tuona nba tie Foŋanm yal yen yal nba g tie Foŋanm yal, g te lua ń gii maad mabuolfani n ninŋ, g te lua ń gii bund l mabuolfani niimn.
46012011	L kul ne, Foŋanm yend ne kukua yaa tuona n nyan, u tien yua kul u paab u kua i, wan bua nand.
46012012	Yen mɔni, gbannand tie gbannanyend i g yen mɔg bɔga k l yab, ama yen l bɔga n l yab nand nba kul, l kul taan g tie gbannanyend i. L tie nnyan i Kristo mɔ yaa po.
46012013	T kul, Suif‑nba yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba, yonmi yen yab nba g tie yonmi, Foŋanm yend ne ninŋ i k b wul t kul nyum, k tin taan gii tie gbannanyend, t kul taan g gaal Foŋanm yend i, nyan nyum nyan g nyuu.
46012014	Gbannand g mɔg bɔgyenn kukua kaa, u bɔga yab.
46012015	Tital bo gii maad: « Min yaan g tie nuu nyan, lann min g tie gbannand bɔgl ». L maam n ji bu te k u kan gii tie gbannand bɔgl ii ?
46012016	G tubl bo gii maad: « Min yaan g tie ninbinn nyan, lann min g tie gbannand bɔgl ». L maam n ji bu te k u kan gii tie gbannand bɔgl ii ?
46012017	Gbannand kul bo gii tie ninbinn, t bo bu tien nle i gii gbiɛ i ? Lann i kaa, gbannand kul bo gii tie tubl, t bo bu tien nle i gii gbiɛ nublu u ?
46012018	Yen mɔni, Yendu tien bɔgl kul gbannand n ninŋ wan bua nand i.
46012019	L kul bo gii taan g tie bɔgyenn kukua, gbannand bo baa be lɛ ?
46012020	Lan tie nand n nyan. Bɔga be g yab g nyaan gbannand nuan tie gbannanyend i.
46012021	L po n te g ninbinn kan fid g maad nuu: « N g bua a todl ». Yul mɔ biɛ kan fid g maad titala: « N g bua i todl ».
46012022	Lann g be. Gbannand bɔga nba naan k l g mɔg paalu mɔno tie bonmɔnn i.
46012023	Yal nba tie nyan l g mɔg sel nyan, t ŋanm g seln lann i, bɔga nba tie fai bonn nyan, t ŋanm g ban l yaa kubnu i,
46012024	ama yal nba mɔg naasend nuan ji g bual siɛl. Yendu n tien gbannand nnyan, g tug sel g tie bɔga nba bo g mɔg sel.
46012025	U tien nnyan g paadu ń daa be gbannand n ninŋ i, g gbannand bɔgl kul ń gii tiɛn lieb po.
46012026	Bɔgyenn gii be fala n ninŋ, bɔga nba tenn tu taan yen’o i gii be l fala n ninŋ. Bɔgyenn gii la sel, bɔga nba tenn mɔ baa kpanm yen’o i.
46012027	Yinm n taan g tie Kristo gbannand, g sua kul tie u gbannand bɔgyenn.
46012028	L tien nnyan i, g Kristo tintaanu n ninŋ, Yendu sen yua kul u sinsienu n. Cincinn, Yiesu sundi, munle po Yendu sogni‑nba, muntaa po yab nba tund Yendu maam, g tuan yab nba suun yaalidug tuona, g tuan yab nba k u pii’b u paab k b paagd yiɛnm, yen yab nba tod lieb, yen yab nba ŋmagd lieb, yen yab nba maad mabuolfani n ninŋ.
46012029	B kul tie Yiesu sundi yaa aa ? B kul tie Yendu sogni‑nba yaa aa ? B kul tund Yendu maam yaa aa ? B kul n suun yaalidug tuona aa ?
46012030	B kul n gaal Yendu paab g paagd yiɛnm ii ? B kul n maad mabuolfani n ninŋ ii ? Bii b kul n bu fid gii bund niib l mabuolfani niimn i ? B kul kaa.
46012031	Lann, mɔnd man k i pala ń gii kɔn paab nba ŋanm g tie bonmɔnn po. N ji bu ŋɔn’i mɔlane sɔnu nba cie liel‑nba kul.
46013001	To, baa n gii bu fid g maad nifosaal mabuoli kul, yen malɛg‑nba maam mɔno, g yen g bua n lieb, n maam tie nyan sanbual lann i kaa gingann nba k b pua k l mɔg fuug nyan i.
46013002	Baa n gii mɔg Yendu paab k l tie k u maad yen’n k n gɔ g sɔgnd niib, n gii ban yal nba l be g tie ŋasiil kul, yen yal nba l be g tie banm kul, n gii mɔg baa dindann nba n bu fid g te g jɔa ń figd g gad g fign siɛl po mɔno, n gii g bua n lieb, n g tie siɛl.
46013003	Baa n gii tug min mɔg yal nba kul g biid tali, n gii cab n gbannand mɔno k ban juu muu, n gii g bua n lieb, l kan pugn’n siɛl.
46013004	Buamdaan mɔg pasɔnŋl, yen nimɔndug, u g nan nil, u g mɔg jipaad, u g mɔg jigbelm,
46013005	u g suun tuonkpiɛdl, u g kpaan u yal kua, u g mɔg mutuol, u g diɛ u pal n ninŋ lieb n biil’o yal nba.
46013006	Bonbiiug gii tien, buamdaan g kpanm l po, mamɔni n manŋd u pal.
46013007	U di sugl bonn kul po, bonn kul n ninŋ u dug Yendu po g daan, u mɔg juunn bonn kul n ninŋ.
46013008	Buam g mɔg gbennu. G nyaan Yendu n tu te niib maam nba ban guan g sɔgn lieb nuan bu gbenn. Mabuolfani nba ninŋ g niib maad mɔ bu bod diyenn. Banm po mɔ biɛ tan bu juab diyenn.
46013009	Yen mɔni, tin ban yal nba, t g ban g gbenn, tin sɔgnd Yendu maam nba mɔ, t g sɔgnd l kul.
46013010	Ama bonn kul youg tan gii pund canyiin, yal nba tie bonjenn kul ji bu bod i.
46013011	Min bo tie big, n bo maad bimɔnmaam i, n maalm yen n dudugd kul bo tie big yal i. Ama min tan cegd g te nil g gbenn, k n ŋaa yal tie bimɔnm kul.
46013012	Mɔlane t daa nyuan gala gala nne i nyan ninnyuandg nba g ŋanm g nyuan ń tien junjunŋ nba nyan, ama l youg tan gii pund t bu la ninprurr jig i. Min daa ban yal nba mɔlane, n ban bɔgl i, ama l youg n tan baa ban i canyiin, nyan Yendu n ban’n nand nyan.
46013013	Lann, bona ŋantaa ne n be youg kul: gii dug Yendu po, yen dindann yen buam. Ama l kul ne ninŋ buam n yen cie.
46014001	I kpaan man k i gii bua i lieb, k i pala ń gii kɔn k i gii mɔg Foŋanm paab, mandg paab nba nyuan Yendu maam sɔgnu po.
46014002	K l maa yua nba maad mabuolfani n ninŋ g maad yen niib kaa, u maad yen Yendu i, g dugn sua yen g gbiɛ wan maad yal nba. Foŋanm n tu te wan gii maad maam nba tie ŋasiil g duag.
46014003	Ama yua nba gaan Yendu maam g sɔgnd niib nuan pugd’b paalu i b dindann n, g paand b pala, g sɔnŋd b pala.
46014004	Yua nba maad mabuolfani n ninŋ pugd u dindann i paalu, ama yua nba gaan Yendu maam g sɔgnd niib nuan pugd Kristo tintaanu niib kul dindann i paalu.
46014005	N bo sun k i kul ń gii maad mabuolfani n ninŋ. Ama n yen mand g bua k i gii sɔgnd Yendu maam i. G dugn, yua nba sɔgnd Yendu maam tuonn mɔg nyuad g cie yua maad mabuolfani n ninŋ, l gii g tie g sua be g sɔgnd l mabuolfani lieb po i kaa.
46014006	N naataani, yinm mɔno ń ji diid, n gii baal g maad yen’i mabuolfani n ninŋ, n maam gii g dɔgd siɛl g ŋɔn’i, g g tie’i siɛl yaa banm, g g sɔgn’i Yendu maam, g g tie’i tundl, n baalu mɔg bɛ nyuad i i po i ?
46014007	L tie nyan bona nba g fo g yen mɔg niɛlu, nyan yelg lann i kaa kogdug nyan i. L gii g mɔ g gagd, niib bu tien nle i g bann yelg n mɔ nand lann i kaa kogdug n mɔ nand i ?
46014008	B gii g g pieb tɔb naatunn k l mɔ g gagd, ŋmaa bu bobn g nya tɔb i ?
46014009	Nnyan i k i mɔ gii maad mabuolfani n ninŋ yal nba g sua g gbiɛ, sua kan bann yin maad yal nba. I bund g yaad mɔb fam i.
46014010	Mabuoli-buoli be bonciɛnn ŋanduna n ninŋ, ama siɛl g be g g mɔg niimn.
46014011	Nil gii maad yen’n mabuolu nba k n g gbiɛ, l daan tie nisaan i n po, k n mɔ tie nisaan u po.
46014012	I mɔ, yin yaan kpaan yen pakɔnn k i gii mɔg Foŋanm paab nyan, mɔnd man gii kpaan yal nba bu tod Kristo tintaanu n niib b dindann n.
46014013	Lann, yua nba maad mabuolfanu n ninŋ ń miɛl Yendu k wan te k wan fid gii sɔgnd l maam.
46014014	G dugn, n gii jaand mabuolfanu n ninŋ, n yam n ninŋ i k n jaand, ama n maalm g be l n ninŋ.
46014015	Lann, n ji bu tien nle ? N baa jaand n yam n ninŋ k n maalm be n jaandi n ninŋ. N baa yiin yani n yam n ninŋ, k n maalm be n yani n ninŋ mɔ.
46014016	G dugn, l gii sua k a yam n ninŋ kukua i k a tiend Yendu balg, yua nba be i tintaanu n ninŋ, g yen g ban l bonn po, u bu tien nle i g maad a balg tienu po k « Amɛnn » g yen g ban ŋan maad yal nba i ?
46014017	Yen mɔni, a balg tienu nuan ŋan hal bonciɛnn, g nyaan l yen g tod lua ŋano k u dindann pugn.
46014018	N tiend Yendu balg yen min maad mabuolfani n ninŋ g cie i kul ne.
46014019	Ama n gii be Kristo tintaanu n ninŋ, n tu maad niib n gbiɛ maam nba ninŋ nyan lanbona ŋanmu nne kua i, k lan te’b tundl, lann n su yen min maad lanbona tuda piig mabuolfanu n ninŋ k b yen kan gbad siɛl.
46014020	N naataani, i yanjagl n ninŋ yin daa tie nyan bid nyan. Biid tienu n ninŋ yin gii tie nyan sanpandi nyan, g nyaan i yanjagl n ninŋ nuan yin gii tie nyan cegdkab nyan.
46014021	L diɛn Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n g maad: « N tan bu sun niib nba maad mabuolfanu i ban maad yen n buolu, buolfanu n tan bu maad yen’m, yen l kul, b kan cenŋ’n ». Yonmdaan n maad yal n nyan.
46014022	Lann, mabuolfani n maadu be k lan ŋɔn yab nba g dug Kristo po i bonn, l g tie yab nba dug u po yal kaa. Ama Yendu maam sɔgnu nuan be k lan ŋɔn Kristo‑yab i bonn, lann g be yab nba g tie Kristo‑yab po kaa.
46014023	Kristo tintaanu n niib kul gii taan, g sua kul ji maad mabuolfani n ninŋ, yab nba daa g ban l po, lann i kaa yab nba g tie Kristo‑yab gii kua g la nnyan, b kan yed k i waad kaa aa ?
46014024	Ama l gii sua k i kul sɔgnd Yendu maam i, g yua nba g tie Kristo‑yua, lann i kaa yua nba daa g ban l po tan kua g gbad i kul n maad yal nba, u bu bann k u tie biiddaan, wan gbad yal nba kul bu kɔn yen’o u pal n ninŋ.
46014025	Yal nba tu tie ŋasiil g be u pal n kul bu dɔgd. L youg, u bu baa g gbaan g pii nunŋ yen tinŋ i g pug Yendu g maad: « Yen mɔni, Yendu be yen’i ».
46014026	N naataani, t ji bu tien nle ? I tu gii taan lieb g bu jaand, yua nba mɔg yanu g bu yin ii, yua nba mɔg tundl g bu te ii, yua nba g Yendu ŋɔn’o madɔgnkam k u bua n maad ii, yua nba maad mabuolfani n ninŋ ii, yua nba sɔgnd l mabuolfani ii, i kul ń tien yal nba bu pugn tintaanu n niib dindann.
46014027	Niib gii bua ban maad mabuolfani n ninŋ, ban daa cie niib banle lann i kaa niib bantaa, ban gii maad tuago tuago, g biɛ gii mɔg yua nba sɔgnd l maam.
46014028	Sua gii g be g bu sɔgn, lann yua bo bu maad mabuolfani n ninŋ nyan ń gii ŋmin Kristo‑yab tintaanu n. Wan gii maad u kua yen Yendu.
46014029	L gii tie Yendu sogni‑nba mɔ, banle lann i kaa bantaa ń gaal maam g lieb ń jag g diid l maam n.
46014030	Nil gii be i siign g Yendu ŋɔn’o madɔgnkam k wan maad niib, yua nba bo kpiɛ g maad nyan ń suon.
46014031	K l maa i kul bu fid gii sɔgnd Yendu maam tuago tuago k lan te sua kul tundl g biɛ paan sua kul pal.
46014032	Yendu sogni‑nba bu fid g suol b kua yaa youg nba k b sɔgnd Yendu maam,
46014033	g dugn Yendu g tie kpil kpil Yendu kaa, u tie yanduanm Yendu i. Nyan lan tie Kristo‑yab tintaancaga kul n ninŋ nand nyan,
46014034	l bual g Kristo‑yab tintaancaga n ninŋ puob ń gii ŋmin i, k l maa yiko g cab k b gii be tintaanu n ban gii maad, l tie k ban jiin b kua b yudanm buol i, nyan Yendu Mɔmaam n mɔno n maad nand nyan.
46014035	B gii bua ban bual g bann siɛl i yaa aa, ban kun ŋaag o g bual b salb, g dugn l mɔg fai yen puo ń gii maad Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ.
46014036	Laabaal i, Yendu maam nyiɛ i buol yaa aa ? Bii i buol kua i k l maam pund i ?
46014037	Yua nba gii mali k u tie Yendu sogni, lann i kaa g Foŋanm n cab’o k u maad, l daan ń bann k min da’i yal nba ne tie Yonmdaan mɔmaam i.
46014038	U gii g tuo k l tie nnyan, Yendu mɔ g ban’o.
46014039	Lann, n naataani, i pala ń gii kɔn Yendu maam sɔgnu po, g nyaan yin yen daa kɔn yen yab nba maad mabuolfani n ninŋ mɔ.
46014040	Ama yin gii tie bonn kul lan bual nand, g daa tie nyabl nyabl.
46015001	N naataani, n bua n tiɛd’i Laabamann nba k n bo muand’i k i gaal, g tug i dindann kul g tien l n ninŋ nyan i.
46015002	L Laabamann n bu te yin la fielu, l gii sua k i l ŋanm g diɛ’l nyan min bo muand’i nand nyan, ama l gii g tie nnyan nuan, i dindann tie fam i.
46015003	Min cind g luan’i yal nba k l tie bonmɔnn canyiin tie min mɔno n bo gaal yal nba i, lan tie g Kristo kpe t biid po nyan lan bo diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan,
46015004	k b pii’ug, g daa ŋantaa daal k u yied nyan lan bo diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan,
46015005	k u dɔgd g Kefas la’ɔg, k u sundi piig yen banle mɔ biɛ la’ɔg.
46015006	L puol po k u dɔgd k u ŋuantieb nba cie niib kobiinmu taan g la’ɔg, b ninŋ bonciɛnn daa be g fo, g nyaan siɛb mɔ kpe o.
46015007	K l po pend, k u dɔgd g Saak la’ɔg, k u sundi kul mɔ yuand g la’ɔg.
46015008	B kul ne po pend yo, k u dɔgd k min nba tie nyan b bo mal’n g daal g pund nyan mɔ ji tan juod g la’ɔg.
46015009	G dugn Yiesu sundi n ninŋ, min n ji l ŋanm g juod, min taan bo g dagd yen ban yiin’n u sundu mɔno, k l maa n ŋɔn Yendu tintaanu niib fala.
46015010	Ama Yendu ŋalbalg po n te k n tie min tie yua nba dinne, l ŋalbalg g te fam, l tod’n mɔno k n sun g cie b kul. Min kaa sun, Yendu ŋalbalg nba be yen’n nyan n sun tuonn.
46015011	Lann, l gii tie min ii, l gii tie banm ii, tin muand yal nba n nyan. I mɔ biɛ bo tuo g gaal lann i.
46015012	Lann, tin muand g Kristo yied kpienm siign nyan, l tien nle i k i ninŋ siɛb biɛ tua g kpienm tan kan yied i ?
46015013	L gii tie g kpienm tan kan yied, lann Kristo mɔ bo g yied.
46015014	Kristo gii g yied, lann tin muand yal nba tie fam i, i dindann mɔ biɛ tie fam i.
46015015	L taan cie nnyan mɔno, l gii tie mɔni g kpienm tan kan yied, l ŋɔn k t ci ŋalaaci Yendu po n nyan, g dugn t yed k tinm tie sieda‑nba k u yied Kristo, k u yen g yied’o.
46015016	L kon gii tie mɔni g kpienm tan kan yied nuan, lann Kristo mɔ bo g yied.
46015017	Kristo gii g yied, lann i dindann tie fam i, i biɛ daa be i biid n ninŋ i.
46015018	L biɛ ŋɔnŋ g yab nba bo dug Kristo po o g kpe nyan biɛl fam n nyan.
46015019	L gii tie t binbem tinŋ ne po kukua i k t daan Kristo n ninŋ, lann t bonn n ŋanm g mɔg ninbaaɔg g cie niib kul.
46015020	Ama yen mɔni, Kristo yied kpienm siign, wano n tie yua nba kpiɛ g yied, k l ŋɔnŋ g kpienm mɔ tan bu yied.
46015021	G dugn nil n baal yen kuum, nil n biɛ baal yen kpienm yiedu mɔ.
46015022	Nyan niib kul n kpenn g dugn Adam po nyan, nnyan i g niib kul mɔ bu yied g dugn Kristo po.
46015023	Ama l mɔg yua lii g yua tua i. Kristo n cind g yied, u tan gii guan yaa youg, Kristo‑yab ń tuan.
46015024	L po gii pend juodu youg ń baal. L youg u g Kristo bu tug bal g ŋmiɛn u Baa Yendu, g sua k u paad batieb kul yen yikodanm kul yen yal nba l mɔg paalu kul o.
46015025	K l maa l bual g Kristo ń gii diɛ bal saa yen youg nba g Yendu bu te wan ŋmaa u ninnanda kul po i.
46015026	Wan bu juod g gbenn ninnand nba maam n tie kuum.
46015027	L kon diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Yendu te k u mɔg nuu bonn kul po ». Ama lan maad k « u ji mɔg nuu bonn kul po » nyan, Yendu nuan g be kul ŋann n ninŋ, g dugn wano n te g Kristo mɔg nuu bonn kul po.
46015028	Bonn kul tan gii be Kristo nuu n ninŋ yaa youg u, k wano Kristo nba tie Yendu Bija mɔ ji bu tug u kua g tien Yendu nuu n ninŋ, wano nba tie’og nuu bonn kul po, g Yendu kukua ń ji gii mɔg nuu bonn kul po.
46015029	L gii g tie nnyan, yab nba k b wuul’b nyum kpienm po nyan tan bu tien nle ? L gii tie g kpienm kan yied palb, bɛ po i k b yen ji wuul nyum b po i ?
46015030	K tinm mɔno i, bɛ po i k t suun daal kul tuonn nba bu fid g baal yen t kuum i ?
46015031	N naataani, yinm nba k n bu fid gii pua jipaad i po g dugn yin be yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo nyan, n pol g tie’i g daal kul, n l togd kuum i.
46015032	L gii sua k l tie nifosaal n nyuan bona nand kukua po i, k n bo kɔn yen bonkobbiid Efɛs doug n, n liɛ n nyuad i ? Kpienm gii kan yied nuan, lann « tin gii di g nyu, gii ban g wonn t won bu kpe ».
46015033	Daa bɔnd man i kua, « yua nba yegd yen nibiid n mɔg tɔgbiiug. »
46015034	Ŋaa man k i yam ń guan lan bual nand, k i ji ŋaa biid tienu. G dugn i ninŋ siɛb g ban Yendu, l tie i fai i k n maad’i.
46015035	Ama sua bu fid g bual g kpienm tan bu yied nle i ? K b tan bu guan yen gbannanland i ?
46015036	A g mɔg yam, ŋan bul yal nba gii g bed, l kan pa.
46015037	Ŋan buul yal nba, yen yal nba bu pa g do, l g naan. Fin nuan tu bul dibim lann i kaa siɛl yaa bonbinn kua i.
46015038	G nyaan Yendu n ji tu te lan pa gii naan wan bua nand, bonbinn kul yen u ninnaɔnŋ.
46015039	Gbannand g taa taa buolu, niib yal be l kua, g bonkobd yal be l kua, g nuani yal be l kua, g jani yal mɔ be l kua.
46015040	Bona be polu po g mɔg b ninnaɔnŋ, g bona be tinŋ n g mɔg b ninnaɔnŋ. Polu po bona n nyili nand yen tinŋ n yal n nyili nand l g taa.
46015041	Yendu n nyili nand yen ŋmaalg n nyili nand yen ŋmaabid n nyili nand, l g taa taa. Ŋmaabiyenŋ nyilgu yen ŋmaabilieg yal mɔ biɛ g taa.
46015042	L tan baa tie nnyan i kpienm yiedu youg mɔ. Gbannand nba k b pii k l tie bonbedkal tan bu yied g ji kan ban g bed.
46015043	Gbannand nba k b pii k l g mɔg nyuandu palb bu yied g ji gii nyili g tuud i. Gbannand nba k b pii k l g mɔg paalu bu yied gii gbie yen paalu i.
46015044	Gbannand nba k b pii k l tie nifosaal yal bu yied, g Foŋanm n ji te’og gbannanfand. G dugn gbannand nba tie nifosaal yal be, g Foŋanm n tien yal nba mɔ be.
46015045	Nnyan i k l kon diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n: « G cincinn nil, Adam te nifosaal, g nyaan jijuog Adam nuan tie Fuom i g tien miɛl. »
46015046	Foŋanm n tien gbannand nba kaa g nil tu cind gii mɔg. Nil tu mɔg u gbannand yo, Foŋanm n yuand g te’og gbannanfand.
46015047	Cincinn nil, b bo tug tinŋ n tanbiini i g tag’o, g munle po nil nyiɛ polu po g jiid.
46015048	Yua nba k b bo tag’o yen tinŋ n tanbiini n bo tie nand, tinŋ po ne niib mɔ tie nnyan i, yua nba nyiɛ polu po n tie nand, polu po niib mɔ tie nnyan i.
46015049	Nyan tin bo gaal tinŋ n nil ninnaɔnŋ nyan, nnyan i k t tan bu gaal yua nba nyiɛ polu po mɔ yaa ninnaɔnŋ.
46015050	N naataani, min bua n maad yal n ne: Yal nba tie gbannand yen sɔm kan fid g kua Yendu ŋaag n, yal nba tie bonbedkal mɔ kan fid g daa bed.
46015051	Cenŋ man ne, n bu dɔgd ŋasiil nne g ŋɔn’i: T kul kaa bu kpe, ama t kul bu lebd,
46015052	pilb yenm kua, nyan ningbankaaɔg kabnu nyan, ban bu pieb jijuog naatunn yaa youg. G dugn b bu pieb naatunn, kpienm ń yied, g ji gii mɔg gbannand nba kan ban g bed, t mɔ yaa gbannand ń lebd.
46015053	G dugn, l bual k t gbannand nba bu bed ne ń lebd g ji daa ban g bed i, k t gbannand nba bu kpe ne ń lebd tin ji daa ban g kpe.
46015054	Yaa youg nba k t gbannand nba bo bu bed tan bu lebd g ji daa ban g bed, g yal nba bo bu kpe ń lebd tin ji daa ban g kpe nyan, l youg u g Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni ne ji bu tien yen mɔni: « Paalu dii kuum o.
46015055	Kuum, a biɛ bu fid g paad bɛ ? Kuum, a pienu nba k a tu yeg g kpi niib nyan be lɛ ? »
46015056	Biid n tie kuum pienu nba kpi niib, g biid paalu mɔ nya yiko buol.
46015057	Ama t tien man Yendu balg yen wan te k t paad l kul t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po.
46015058	Lann, n naataani, yinm nba k n bua’i, ŋanm man gii sie k l paa, g daa mɔg begnu, gii suun Yonmdaan tuonn youg kul g saa liig, i yen ban g tuonn nba k i suun Yonmdaan po g tie fam.
46016001	Mɔlane po, n ji bu maad yal nba nyuan paab nba k i mɔg g bu tug g tod Kristo‑yab nba be Serusalɛm nyan po i. Mɔ ń gii tie man nyan min daan ŋɔn Galasi Kristo‑yab tintaanu n niib k ban gii tie nand nyan.
46016002	Laad n ninŋ dacincinn daal, sua kul ń tu bil u ŋaapo wan mɔg paab nba g bu te, u paalu n dagd’o nand, g daa guu k n tan baal o, yin ji cil gii tien i paab.
46016003	N gii pund, n bu sun yin lugd yab nba, g te’b kadaad k ban gad yen l paab Serusalɛm.
46016004	L gii dagd yen k n gad mɔ, min yen banm n bu yeg g gad.
46016005	N bu nya Maseduann i g baal i buol, g dugn n mali k n waa g gɔnn gɔnn Maseduann dingbana.
46016006	L g kua n bu yann i buol waam, l gii tuu mɔno min gii be yen’i saa yen fawaaɔg gbennu, k yin tod’n k n gad n sɔnu.
46016007	Mɔlane nuan, n ji g bua k n baal g la’i g pend kaa, n daan g Yonmdaan gii cab, min kal i buol g yann waam.
46016008	Ama n daa baa be Efɛs i, saa yen Pantekuot jaanm youg.
46016009	G dugn Yendu luod sɔnu n po k n bu sun tuongbenŋl l doug n, g nyaan ninnanda mɔ yabd.
46016010	Timote gii baal yin ŋanm g gaal’o k wan gii be yen’i g daa mɔg siɛl yaa yanbani, g dugn u mɔ suun t Yonmdaan po i, nyan min nyan.
46016011	Sua ń daa nund’o. Tod’o man k wan guan n buol ne yen laafiɛ g dugn n guu wano yen t naataani guanu.
46016012	T naataanu Apolɔs nuan, n paan u pal taal munŋaa kul k wano yen t naataani ń gad i buol, g nyaan l g be u yam n ninŋ palb k wan gad mɔlane. U tan gii la sɔnu yaa youg, u bu gad.
46016013	I guu man i kua, gii sie dindann n k l paa, g ŋɔn k i tie jab, k i paa.
46016014	Yin suun yal nba kul, yin sun yen buam.
46016015	N naataani, n biɛ bu miɛl’i bonliel g pugn. I ban g Stefanas yen u ŋaag yab n bo cind g tuo Kristo Akaayi doug n ninŋ, g suun Kristo‑yab po yen b pal kul,
46016016	i cɔln man l nibuolu yen yab nba l be l tuonn n ninŋ kul, g suun g g jie fala.
46016017	N pal man bonciɛnn Stefanas yen Fɔrtunatus yen Akaayikus baalu ne po. B tien yin daan g be g bu tien yal nba n po,
46016018	g dugn b te k min yen yinm kul yam duan. L dagd k yin ŋɔn l nibuolu i k i cɔln’m.
46016019	Asi dingbann n ninŋ Kristo‑yab tintaanu niib fuond’i. Akilas yen Prisiil yen Kristo‑yab nba taand lieb b ŋaag n ninŋ mɔ fuond’i bonŋann Yonmdaan sann po.
46016020	T naataani kul fuond’i. Mɔ ń ŋanm g fuond fuond i lieb man, g lɔn lɔn lieb yen naataann.
46016021	Min mɔno n da fuondi ne yen n nuu.
46016022	Yua nba g bua Yonmdaan, l daan ń biɛl fam. Maranata ! (L niimn tie: T Yonmdaan, baal !)
46016023	Yonmdaan Yiesu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen’i.
46016024	N bua i kul bonciɛnn, Yiesu Kristo po.
47001001	Min Pɔl, Yendu yanbuam po i k n tie Yiesu Kristo sundu, min n da kadaaɔg ne, min yen t ninja Timote. T fuond Yendu tintaanu niib nba be Korɛnt doug n yen Yendu niib nba kul be Akaayi diem n ninŋ kul.
47001002	T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po g te k i yam ń gii dua.
47001003	Yendu sann ń do, wano nba tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo Yendu g biɛ tie u Baa. Wano n tie t Baa nba jie niib ninbaaɔg g biɛ paand niib pala bonn kul n ninŋ.
47001004	T gii be fala nba ninŋ kul, wano n tu paan t pala, k tin mɔ ń fid g paan lieb nba be fala n ninŋ kul pala, g dugn papaal nba k tinm mɔno gaal wano Yendu buol nyan po.
47001005	Yen mɔni, nyan tin laad fala bonciɛnn Kristo po nyan, nnyan i k t laad papaal mɔ bonciɛnn Kristo po.
47001006	T gii laad fala, l tie k yin la papaal yen fielu i. T biɛ gii la papaal mɔ, l bu te k i mɔ yaa pala ń paag k yin fid g juun yaa youg nba k i mɔ bu la fala nba k t laad mɔlane.
47001007	T mɔg dindann i po bonciɛnn g dugn t ban k yin taan g laad fala yen’ti nyan, i taan g laad papaal mɔ nnyan i yen’ti.
47001008	N naataani, t kan wuon’i tin daan la fala nba Asi nyan. Fala daan kua’ti hal bonciɛnn, k l ji tan cie t paalu mɔno k t ji g daan t kua yen miɛl.
47001009	Yen mɔni, t pala n ninŋ t ji daan diɛ k t kuum youg pund n nyan. L daan tien nnyan, k tin daa dug tinm mɔno po kaa, ama k tin gii dug Yendu nba yied kpienm nyan po kukua i.
47001010	Wano n daan nyan’ti l cicagkuum n ninŋ, g biɛ bu nyan’ti yal nba baad n ninŋ mɔ. Yen mɔni, t daan u ninŋ k u baa l nyanŋ’ti nnyan i.
47001011	Yinm mɔno yen bu tod’ti yen i jaandi. Nnyan, niib bonciɛnn jaandi n bu te tin la ŋalbalg nba bu te g bonciɛnn ń tien Yendu balg t po.
47001012	T pala n man yal nba po n ne: t ban t pala n ninŋ k tin daan be yen ŋanduna yab, mandg tin daan be yen’i, t daan ŋɔn t bontitied n ninŋ k t tug n ninŋ pien, k t maad’i mɔni. L tɔgŋanu kul ne nya Yendu buol i, nifosaal yanfuom po kaa k t daan be l binbem, Yendu ŋalbalg po i.
47001013	Tin da kadaad g tien’i g bua yin lii g gbad yal nba, i kon lii g gbiɛ lann n nyan, siɛl g pugd l po. Ama n daan k i tan bu gbad l kul canyiin,
47001014	nyan yin cil g gbad waam, g ban k t Yonmdaan Yiesu guanu daal, i pala bu manŋ t po nyan t mɔ yaa pala ń bu manŋ i po nand nyan.
47001015	N pal daan paa l po bonciɛnn, l po n te k n daan jag g suol k n daa bu cind g baal i buol yo, k yin do nyuad munle.
47001016	Yen mɔni, n daan mali k n nya i buol i g gad Maseduann, n gii nyiɛ Maseduann min biɛ guan i buol k yin tod’n k n pend g gad Suude.
47001017	Min daan jag g suol nnyan, n daan g ŋanm g mali yaa aa ? Bii i mali k n daan diɛ n yul po maalm kua i, k n tug n mɔg maalm munle, k n tu yed k ɛɛn, g biɛ yed k ɛn ɛn ?
47001018	Yendu tie mamɔnmaad g ban k tin maad’i yal nba g tie ɛɛn yen ɛn ɛn maam kaa.
47001019	G dugn Yendu Bija, Yiesu Kristo nba k t daan maad’i u po, min yen Silas yen Timote nyan g tie ɛɛn yen ɛn ɛn yua kaa. Wano l tie ɛɛn yua kukua i.
47001020	Yen mɔni, Yendu n bo puon puoni nba kul, Yiesu n tie l puoni ɛɛn. L po n te k wano Yiesu po k t tu tien amɛnn g don Yendu sann.
47001021	Yendu n te k tinm yen yinm kul taan Kristo n ninŋ g diɛ k l paa, wano n lugd’ti.
47001022	Wano n tien u banm t po, g tien Foŋanm t pala n ninŋ k l ŋɔnŋ k t tan bu gaal bonŋana nba k u bil g guun’ti.
47001023	Min tug Yendu k u tie n sieda, n gii fa faaɔg wan dad n tubl: n daan g bua min ŋɔn’i fala i, l po n te k n daan g guan i buol Korɛnt.
47001024	L g tie k t bua n mabn’i g ŋɔn’i yin baa dug Yendu po nand kaa, t ban k l po nuan i sie k l paa. T kpaan k tin taan g sun yen’i k yin gii be pamann n ninŋ i.
47002001	L po n te k n daan jag g suol mii n kan guan i buol g yaan biɛ baal yen pabɔnn i po.
47002002	G dugn, n gii biil i pala, ŋmaa n bu manŋ n pal i ? Yinm nba k n biil i pala nyan kaa biɛg ii ?
47002003	L po n te k n daan diɛn’i nnyan, n daan g bua k n baal i buol o, g yab nba bo bu manŋ n pal ń biɛ ji biil n pal. N dug i kul ne po k n pamann tie i kul mɔ yaa pamann i.
47002004	Yen mɔni, min daan da’i yaa youg nba, n pal daan g man baa waam, l daan yiɛl’n hal bonciɛnn, n daan da g ninsiid cuud i. L g tie k n daan bua i pala ń biil kaa, n daan bua yin bann k n bua’i hal bonciɛnn i.
47002005	Nil daan gii te g pabɔnn baal, l g tie k u daan biil min kukua yaa pal kaa, u daan biil i kul pala i. N g bua k n maad g pend, baa l gii g tie i kul mɔno, i siign n ninŋ siɛb yaa pala yen daan biil.
47002006	Niib bonciɛnn n daan taan g yie u po nyan, l tubdadu dagd’o.
47002007	L po n te k l ji dagd k yin di sugl u po g paan u pal, g daa ŋaa k u pal ń biil g pend g cie u paalu.
47002008	Lann, n balm’i k yin mɔnd g ŋɔn’o k i bua’ɔg.
47002009	Yal nba po te k n diɛn’i n nyan: n bua n diid g liɛ i l cɔln bonn kul n ninŋ ii ?
47002010	I gii dii sugl yua nba po, n mɔ dii sugl l daan po n nyan. Min dii sugl nba mɔ, n maad l gii bual k n di sugl i, n dii g dugn i po i, Kristo nunŋ n ninŋ,
47002011	k tin daa ŋaa g Sitaan ń liid g janm’ti, g dugn t ban u ninfantuona po.
47002012	N daan pund Trowas g bu muand Kristo Laabamann g sua k t Yonmdaan liid g luod sɔnu n po o.
47002013	Ama n yam yen daan g dua baa waam nne, g dugn n daan g la n naataanu Tiit. L po n te k n daan cab Trowas yab g pend g gad Maseduann.
47002014	T tien man Yendu balg, g dugn wano n tug’ti Kristo po, k t ŋua’ɔg youg kul, tinm yen u niib nba k u kɔn jad g yend’b. U tug tinm i k t ŋɔnŋ Kristo n tie yua nba naan kul, nyan tilaali nublu n tu yad nand nyan.
47002015	Yen mɔni, tinm n tie Kristo tilaali nba nu g man Yendu po, t tie nnyan i yab nba tuag fielu sɔnu yen yab nba tuag juodfam sɔnu siign.
47002016	Juodfam yab po, l nublu tie kuum baaɔg u, g baad yen kuum b po, yab bu la fielu yaa po, l tie miɛl baaɔg u, g baad yen miɛl b po. G ŋmaa n dagd yen l tuonn i ?
47002017	Niib bonciɛnn tug Yendu maam g tien kpinkpeonŋ u, tinm yen g tie nnyan kaa. Yendu n sun’ti nyan, tinm maad u maam yen papienn i, u nunŋ n ninŋ Kristo sann po.
47003001	K tin maad nand ne i, t yaan biɛ ŋɔnŋ t kua yaa aa ? Bii l bual k tin mɔ ń ji te’i kadaad nba ŋɔnŋ k t tie Yiesu sundi nba dagd yen ban gii dug b po, lann i kaa k tin gaal l kadaad i buol, nyan siɛb n tie nand nyan yaa aa ?
47003002	Yinm mɔno n tie t kadaad g diɛn g bil t pala n ninŋ, g nil kul ban g biɛ lii.
47003003	L kon ŋɔn k yinm n tie Kristo n diɛn kadaaɔg nba g tie’ti t tuonn po, l g tie kadaaɔg nba k b diɛn yen nyunbɔnm kaa, l tie yal nba g Yendu nba fo yaa Fuom diɛn i, l g tie yal nba diɛn tanpaba po kaa, l tie yal nba diɛn g bil nifosaal pal n i.
47003004	T pala n paa yal nba po Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ n nyan g dugn Kristo po.
47003005	L g tie k t dug k t bu fid g sun siɛl t kua kaa, tin bu fid g sun yal nba kul nya Yendu buol i.
47003006	G dugn wano n te k t fid g suun dɔnnpaanu po, l g tie yiko nba diɛn kadaaɔg n ninŋ kaa, l tie Foŋanm yal i. Yal diɛn kadaaɔg n nuan baad yen kuum i, g Foŋanm baad yen miɛl.
47003007	Moyis yiko bo diɛn tanpaba po i, k l baal yen yudand bonciɛnn, k l yudand te k u nunŋ po ji nyili g tuud, k Israyɛl yab gbaa k ban nyuand’o g gbal, k l yudand yen bo g tie yal nba bu wai. Yiko nba k l tuonn tie k lan baal yen kuum gii baal yen yudand nba yab nne,
47003008	Foŋanm tuonn n bu baal yen yudand nba ji baa tie nle ?
47003009	Tuonn nba bu te Yendu ń jiɛl niib buud gii ŋɔn k l mɔg yudand, tuonn nba bu te Yendu ń yiin niib nimɔnm yudand ji baa tie nle ?
47003010	Yen mɔni, t gii bogn siɛnyoug yudand yen mɔlane yal, t bu sua g siɛnyoug yudand g tie siɛl, g dugn mɔlane yudand g mɔg l liel.
47003011	K l maa yal nba bo kan wai gii baal yen yudand, yal nba ji baa be youg kul yaa yudand ji baa tie nle ?
47003012	Tin yaan mɔg l dindann nyan i k t pala paa bonciɛnn.
47003013	Tinm g suun nyan Moyis nyan kaa. U bo tu tug cabl i g pibn u nunŋ po, k Israyɛl yab ń daa la yal nba bo nyili g tuud g yen kan wai nyan bodyoug.
47003014	Ama b bo kuan kangbadm b pala n ninŋ g ji g gbiɛ bona niimn. Saa yen dinne, b gii lii dɔnnkpelu kadaaɔg, l tu tie nyan cabl nyan i g duag b nuni po. Nil nba be yen Kristo kua i k l tu dɔgd u nunŋ po.
47003015	Yen mɔni, saa yen dinne, b gii lii Moyis kadaaɔg, l tu tie nyan cabl nyan i g duag b pala.
47003016	Yua nba lebd u binbem g ŋuan Yonmdaan kua i k l cabl tu dɔgd u po.
47003017	K l maa ban maad Yonmdaan nba ne tie Foŋanm i, Yonmdaan Fuom n be naan buol, yal‑n‑kua be l buol i.
47003018	T kul ne, siɛl yaa cabl ji g duag t yaa nunŋ po. T tie nyan ninnyuandg nyan i g ŋɔnŋ Yonmdaan yudand. U lebd’ti, k tinm yen wano ji taa ninnaɔnŋ, k t yudand pugd daal kul. Yonmdaan tuonn n nyan, wano nba tie Yendu Fuom.
47004001	Lann, Yendu n yaan jie’ti ninbaaɔg g tug l tuonn g kubn’ti nyan po n te k t g wad t pala.
47004002	Tinm yie bunbɔnn n ninŋ fai tuonn kul o. T g suun ninfantuona, t biɛ g kuand faaɔg mɔ Yendu maam n ninŋ. Tinm maad mɔni kukua i. Nnyan i g nil kul bu fid gii ban u pal n ninŋ tin tie yaa niib nba Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ.
47004003	Ama tin muand Laabamann nba gii tie yal nba duag, l duag yab nba bu biɛl po i,
47004004	yab nba g dug Kristo po, g dugn ŋanduna ne ninŋ yendu n juan b yam, k b kan fid g la Laabamann yinyiem nba ŋɔnŋ Kristo yudand, wano Kristo nba tie Yendu ninnaɔnŋ.
47004005	T g muand k tin ŋɔn t kua kaa, t muand k tin ŋɔn g Yiesu Kristo n tie Yonmdaan, k tinm tie i tuonsunna g dugn wano Yiesu po.
47004006	G dugn Yendu nba bo maad g: « Yinyiem ń gii yien bunbɔnn n ninŋ » nyan, wano n te k u yinyiem yien t pala n ninŋ k tin bann wano Yendu yudand yinyiem nba yien Kristo nunŋ po.
47004007	Ama tinm nba diɛ l ŋalman, t tie nyan tiɛd nba k b maa yen yɔug nyan i. Lann n ŋɔn yen mɔni k l paaciɛnu nba g mɔg l liel nyan nya Yendu buol i, l g nya t buol kaa.
47004008	B mabn’ti ganŋ yen jendu, ama b yen g fid’ti. T yam yag, ama t yam yen g yaad.
47004009	B bel’ti, Yendu yen g ŋaa k b nand’ti. B gul’ti, b yen g fid g biɛn’ti.
47004010	Youg kul t laad Yiesu fala kuum t gbannand n ninŋ i, nnyan i g niib bu la k u miɛl mɔ be t ninŋ.
47004011	Tinm nba daa be g fo ne, t be kuum fiɛl n i youg kul Yiesu po, k u miɛl nba be t gbannand nba bu kpe ne ninŋ ń dɔgd g nil kul ń la.
47004012	Nnyan i g kuum suun tuonn t ninŋ, ama g miɛl suun tuonn i ninŋ.
47004013	L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « N dug Yendu po, lann n te k n maad. » T mɔ yaa dindann tie nyan yua bo maad l maam nyan i, t mɔ dug Yendu po, lann n te k t maad.
47004014	G dugn t ban g yua nba yied Yonmdaan Yiesu nyan bu yied t mɔ yen Yiesu g taan tinm yen yinm kul g sen u buol.
47004015	Tin laad fala nba kul, t laad i yaa po i, g niib nba laad Yendu ŋalbalg ń pugn gii yab, k lan baal yen pinpagd Yendu po g pugn, k u sann ń do.
47004016	L po n te k t g wad t pala. Baa t gbannand gii dinŋd g saa mɔno, t yam n ninŋ nuan t pand daal kul i.
47004017	G dugn cicagm nba k t laad mɔlane g yab, l biɛ g wai, t gii bogn l cicagm yen yudand nba k l bu baal yen t po, l yudand yab hal bonciɛnn g biɛ baa be youg kul.
47004018	T pala g kɔn nil n nyuan yal nba po kaa, t kpaan nil n g nyuan yal nba i. Nil n nyuan yal nba g wai, ama nil n g nyuan yal nba nuan be youg kul i.
47005001	Yen mɔni, t gbannand tie nyan jounŋ nyan i k t kua l n ninŋ tinŋ po ne. T ban k l jounŋ gii caad, t mɔg ŋaag polu po g Yendu maa g tie’ti, ŋaag nba g maa yen nifosaal nui, yal nba baa be youg kul.
47005002	T be l jounŋ n ninŋ g dun i, k t pal kɔn bonciɛnn k tin tug t ŋaag nba be polu po nyan g liɛ nyan liɛdl nyan g ŋɔl liel po,
47005003	gii mɔg tin liɛ yal nba, g daa be niiyann.
47005004	Tin daa be l jounŋ n ninŋ ne, t dun nyan t tug tugkpiɛgl nyan i. L g tie k t bua k tin land tin liɛ yal nba kaa, t bua k tin liɛ manfopaann nyan liɛdliel nyan i, g ŋɔl tin liɛ yal nba po, k t gbannand nba bo tie kuum yal ń lebd gii tie miɛl yal.
47005005	Yendu mɔno n bobn’ti l po, g tie’ti Foŋanm k l ŋɔnŋ k t tan bu gaal bonŋana nba k u bil g guun’ti.
47005006	Lann, t pala l paa youg kul, k t yen ban k t gbannand ne nuan daa gii tie t ŋaag k t kua l n ninŋ, t fag yen Yonmdaan,
47005007	g dugn t ŋua dindann sɔnu i, t g ŋua t ninbina n nyuan yal nba kaa.
47005008	Mɔni, t pala paa bonciɛnn, k t sun k tin nya gbannand ne ninŋ g gad g kua Yonmdaan buol o.
47005009	G nyaan t gii be t ŋaag n ninŋ ii, t gii nyiɛ ii, t payiɛnu tie k tin gii suun yal nba bu manŋ u pal i.
47005010	G dugn t kul tan bu baal Kristo buol wan bu’ti, g sua kul ń gaal u pani lan dagd yen wan sun tuonŋana lann i kaa wan sun tuonbiid nba tinŋ po ne.
47005011	Tinm ban yal nba tie g nil ń cɔln Yonmdaan, l po n te k t gbaa g niib ń tuo t maam. Yendu ban tin tie yab nba, k n mali k i mɔ biɛ l ban’ti nnyan i canyiin i pala n ninŋ.
47005012	T g kpaan k tin ŋɔn t kua i nunŋ n kaa, t bua k i pala ń gii man t po, k yin gii mɔg yal nba k i tu bu maad niib nba k b pala man b kua po, g dugn niib nyuan’m cincann po ban tie yab nba, g yen g nyuan yal be b pala n ninŋ nyan.
47005013	T gii sun waadtuona, t sun Yendu po i, t gii sun nimɔntuona mɔ, t sun i po i.
47005014	Kristo buam n suol g sen’ti, tinm nba ji gbad niimn k wano niyend ne kua n kpe niib kul po, l bua n ŋɔn k b kul kpe n nyan.
47005015	U kpe b kul po, g yab nba fo ń ji daa fo b kua po kaa, ama k ban gii fo yua nba kpe g yied b po nyan yaa po i.
47005016	L po n te k t ji g nyuan sua nyan nifosaal n nyuan u lua nand nyan. Baa t bo gii nyuan Kristo nyan nifosaal n nyuan nand mɔno, mɔlane t ji g nyuan’o nnyan.
47005017	Nnyan, nil nba taan yen Kristo ji tie nipaan i, bonkpel po juab o, bonpaann n ji be.
47005018	L kul ne nya Yendu buol i. U te k t guan g manŋ yen’o g dugn Kristo po, k u tie’ti l tuonn k tin tod niib k ban guan g manŋ yen’o.
47005019	Mɔni, Kristo n luod sɔnu g Yendu guan g manŋ yen ŋanduna niib, g ŋaa g g dugn b biid. L manu Laabamann muandu tie tuonn i k u tug g tien t nui n.
47005020	Lann Kristo sann po i k t maad. Yendu mɔno n maad yen’i t mɔi n ninŋ: T balm’i Kristo sann po, k yin guan g manŋ yen Yendu.
47005021	Kristo bo g tien siɛl yaa biid, ama g Yendu yen tun’o t biid, k u po tin te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n.
47006001	Tin yaan taan g suun l tuonn nyan po n te k t balm’i k yin daa ŋaa g paab nba k i gaal Yendu buol ń te fam.
47006002	G dugn Yendu maad u kadaaɔg n k nne: « Youg nba dagd n po bo pund, k n cenŋ a jaandi, g fielu daal k n tod’a. » Mɔni, daal nba dagd ji pund n nyan, fielu daal n ne.
47006003	T g bua tin kuan sua jalm n ninŋ, sua ń tan daa maad mabiid t tuonn po.
47006004	T ŋɔnŋ bonn kul n ninŋ k t tie Yendu tuonsunna yen mɔni, g dugn t juun bonciɛnn g gaal fala yen cicagm yen mabbuolu kul,
47006005	k b pua’ti, g kuan’ti dansalg, g niwulug fiil g yie t po, t sun tuona g cɔg, g guam pɔd’ti, g kom gbad’ti.
47006006	K t yen l be yen papienn, yen banm, yen pasɔnŋl, g tie ŋanm, g Foŋanm ŋmagd’ti, k t buam tie papienbuam,
47006007	k t muand mamɔni maam, g Yendu paalu be yen’ti, g mɔnkund tie t ganŋ yen t jendu jakɔntiɛd.
47006008	G niyenm donŋ t sann g lieb fiɛgd’ti, g yenm sugd’ti g lieb pag’ti, g niib yi’ti faaɔgdanm k t yen maad mɔni.
47006009	B nyuan’ti nyan sua g ban’ti nyan i, g niib yen ban’ti bonŋann. B mali k l gbenn t po n nyan, ama t yen daa be n nyan g siɛl g mɔg’ti. B dad t tubl i, b g kpii’ti.
47006010	B biid t pala, k t pala yen man youg kul. B nyuan k t tie tali i, k t yen kuand niib bonciɛnn mɔgm. B diɛ k t g mɔg siɛl i, k t yen mɔg bonn kul.
47006011	Yinm Korɛnt yab, t maad yen’i g g wuon’i baa siɛl, t bua’i yen t pal kul.
47006012	Yiɛl g pɔd t yaa pala n ninŋ yen tin gii bua’i, yinm n luon i pala g g bua’ti.
47006013	N maad yen’i nyan i tie n bimadi nyan i: Mɔ ń tien man nyan tinm nyan, luod man i pala.
47006014	Daa tug man i yula g lol yen yab nba g tie Kristo‑yab. G dugn yal nba tuag mamɔni sɔnu yen yal nba g ŋan kan fid g taan yen liel. Yinyiem yen bunbɔnn mɔ kan fid g taan yen liel.
47006015	Kristo bu fid g taan mɔb yen Sitaan ii ? Kristo‑yua yen yua g tie Kristo‑yua taa bɛ i ?
47006016	Yendu jaanddeciɛɔnŋ yen tingbana taa bɛ i ? Tinm n tie Yendu nba fo jaanddeciɛɔnŋ, nyan wano Yendu mɔno n maad nyan: « B siign ninŋ i k n bu tien n binbebuol, gii sonm yen’m, gii tie b Yendu k b tie n buolu. »
47006017	L po n te g Yonmdaan biɛ maad: « Nya man b siign g fagd yen’m, daa ŋud man yal nba tie jɔgnd bonn kul, nnyan, n bu gaal’i. »
47006018	G Yonmdaan paaciɛnudaan biɛ maad: « N ji baa tie i Baa i, k i tie n bijabi yen n bipuobi. »
47007001	N dɔnn‑nba, lann tin la l puoni kul ne nyan, tin ji mɔnd g ŋuul g nyan yal nba l tie jɔgnd kul t gbannand n ninŋ yen t pala n ninŋ, t jie Yendu g ŋanm t kua g gbenn canyiin.
47007002	Mɔnd man gii bua’ti. T g ban g biil sua siɛl, t g ban g kuan sua tudm n ninŋ, t biɛ g ban g dii sua mɔ.
47007003	L g tie k n maad nnyan g bua n jalg’i kaa. G dugn n yen daan kpiɛ g maad’i no: tin be g mɔg miɛl ii, tin kpe ii, t baa l bua’i yen t pal kul i.
47007004	N dug i po bonciɛnn, k n pal man i po. Yinm n tien’n papaal. Tin l be fala nba ninŋ kul, n kpanm yen pamanciɛnn i.
47007005	Yen mɔni, tin daan pund Maseduann t daan g fuod. T daan la fala buolu kul. Cincann po, niib daan kɔn yen’ti, k t tug n ninŋ mɔ gbie yen jijei.
47007006	Ama Yendu nba paand ninbadanm pala daan te g Tiit pund k t pala paag.
47007007	L g tie u baalu kua kaa daan paan t pala, wan daan ŋɔn k i paan wano mɔno pal nand biɛ daan paan t mɔ yaa pala. U daan maad’ti k i bua k i guan g la’n, k i kal yen ninsiid i, k i pal kɔn n po bonciɛnn. L kul ne n daan te k n pal ŋanm g manŋ g pugn.
47007008	N ban k min daan diɛn’i kadaaɔg nba daan biil i pala. Ama n yen ji g gbiɛnd l po. L tie mɔni k n daan gbiɛnd yaa youg nba k n daan la k l kadaaɔg biil i pala waam.
47007009	Ama mɔlane l ji tie pamann i n po. L g tie k i pala n daan biil nyan po kaa manŋ n pal, lan te k i mɔ kua i biid po g lebd i binbem nyan n manŋ n pal. I pala n daan biil nand nyan lann n tuo Yendu po. Lann, t g tien siɛl k l janm’i.
47007010	Nil pal gii biil k l tuag yen Yendu n bua nand, l bu tod l daan wan mɔ kua u biid po g la fielu. Lann g mɔg gbiɛndi. Ama nil pal gii biil k l tie ŋanduna yab n nyuan bona nand i, lann baad yen kuum i.
47007011	Yinm mɔno ń diid i pala n daan biil k l tie Yendu yanbuam sɔnu n, lan baal yen yal nba i po: i g kagn tonm g sun yin bu sun yal ii, i g kɔn i kua po ii, i g gbiɛnd ii, l g kuan’i jijei ii, l g pugn’i niɛnŋ k yin guan g la’n ii, l g pugn’i pakɔnn ii, l g baal yen tubdadu biiddaan po ii ? I ŋɔn bonn kul n ninŋ k i g mɔg siɛl yaa biid l maam n ninŋ.
47007012	Lann, min daan diɛn’i nyan, l daan g tie yua biil po kaa, l biɛ daan g tie wan biil yua nba po mɔ, n daan bua k i siign ninŋ nil kul ń la Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ, i pala n kɔn t po nand i.
47007013	Yal nba daan paan t pala n nyan. L g tie k t pala daan paag kukua kaa, t pala biɛ daan manŋ mɔ hal bonciɛnn g dugn tin daan la g Tiit be yen pamann k l maa i kul ne daan te k u yam duan nyan po.
47007014	N daan pag’i u nunŋ n ninŋ, i kon tan g din’n fai. Nyan tin tu l maad’i mɔni youg kul nyan, l tie nnyan i k n daan mɔg mɔni yen k n pag’i Tiit nunŋ n ninŋ.
47007015	U tu tiɛd i kul n daan ŋanm g gaal’o nand yen cɔlunŋ yen jijei g jegl nyan, u pal ń ŋanm g siɛ i po i.
47007016	N pal man bonciɛnn yen min bu fid gii dug i po bonn kul n ninŋ.
47008001	N naataani, t bua yin bann Yendu n tien yal nba Maseduann Kristo‑yab tintaancaga n ninŋ g dugn u ŋalbalg po i.
47008002	Fala nba baal’b g tie bigna l yabd, g nyaan k b biɛ yen l be pamanciɛnn n ninŋ. Yen ban l tie talpieni nand kul, b daan pii paab yen bulcind.
47008003	N tie sieda k b daan tien ban bu fid g tien yal nba kul, g pii paab nba cie b paalu mɔno. B yanbuam n ninŋ i k b daan tien l kul.
47008004	B daan baln’ti bonciɛnn k tin miɛl sugl g cab’b k ban mɔ ń pugn b paab todl nba k t bobnd Suude Kristo‑yab po nyan.
47008005	B daan tien yal nba cie tin daan daan k b bu tien yal nba: b daa daan cind g tug b kua g cab Yonmdaan yo, g Yendu buam n ninŋ k b yuand g tug b kua g cab t mɔ.
47008006	L po n te k t daan baln Tiit, wano nba daan cil g suun yen’i nyan, k wan mɔnd g tod’i k i sun i bulcintuonn g juod ŋanu.
47008007	Yin mɔg yal nba ne kul tie ŋalman nba yab hal bonciɛnn i: i mɔg dindann, g ban Yendu maam muandu, g ban mamɔni, g suun tuonn kul yen pakɔnn, g bua’ti. Mɔnd man g ŋɔn i bulcind mɔ nnyan paab ne pinu n ninŋ.
47008008	L g tie mɔbonn kaa k n maad g bil’i k yin tien nnyan, n dugn’i lieb n daan sun nand yen pakɔnn mii n liɛ i buam tie papienn buam ii ?
47008009	G dugn, i yen ban t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo bulcind po, i po i k wano nba bo tie ŋalmandaan nyan bo tien u kua taladdaan, k u taladm ń te yin mɔgd.
47008010	Min mali yal nba l po n nyan k n maad’i: n ban k lann n dagd i po, g dugn yinm n bo cil hal jel o g sun l tuonn, lann kua kaa mɔno, yinm n bo jag i yam n g suol k i sun l tuonn.
47008011	Lann, ji mɔnd man g sun l tuonn g juod. I pala n daan kɔn nand k i jag g suol k i bu sun nyan, mɔnd man g juod mɔ nnyan. Tien man i paalu n dagd nand.
47008012	G dugn nil gii pii paab yen papienn, Yendu bu tuo l paab, u nyuan l daan n mɔg yal i, u g nyuan wan g mɔg yal kaa.
47008013	L g bual k yin kpegd yin mɔg yal nba kul g te lieb g faab’b g ji gii cagn kaa, l tie k yin mɔnd i kul ń gii ja i.
47008014	Mɔlane, i nuu n ninŋ n mɔg bonciɛnn nyan, i bu fid g tod yab nba k l pɔd’b. L tan gii pɔd i mɔ yaa daal, k b nuu n mɔg, ban mɔ ń tod’i. Nnyan, i bu sua k i ja i.
47008015	Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « Yua nba bo wod bonciɛnn bo g dii g gbal, yua nba bo wod waam nne mɔ bo g dii k l pɔd’o. »
47008016	Yendu ń gaal balg, wano nba te g Tiit pal kɔn i po nyan t mɔ yaa pal n kɔn i po nand nyan.
47008017	T daan miɛl wano Tiit k wan gad i buol k u tuo. L daan sua k wano mɔno pal tuod g kɔn l gadu po yo, lann i k u kagn tonm g gad.
47008018	T yegn’o yen t naataanu nba k u sann duo Kristo‑yab tintaancaga n ninŋ kul g dugn wan sun yal nba Laabamann muandu n ninŋ po.
47008019	Lann kua kaa, Kristo‑yab tintaancaga daan taan g lugd wano i k wan ciɛn’ti k tin gad yen paab nba k t gaal ne. Yonmdaan mɔno yudand po yen t mɔ yaa yanbuam po i k t suun l tuonn g tod lieb.
47008020	Ban kubn’ti paab nba tie ligciɛnŋ i, t g bua g siɛl yaa jalgi ń tan gii be l ligli kubnu n ninŋ.
47008021	T kpaan k tin tien yal nba ŋan i, l g tie Yendu nunŋ n kua kaa, ama niib nunŋ n mɔ.
47008022	T yegn t naataanu nne mɔ yen yab nba saa i buol nyan. Taal munŋaa kul u ŋɔn k u pal kɔn bonciɛnn lieb po. Mɔlane u pakɔnn ŋanm g pugn i, g dugn u pal paa i po bonciɛnn.
47008023	Tiit nuan tie n yegnu i, g suun yen’n g tod’i. T naataani nba yeg yen’o n tie Kristo‑yab tintaancaga sundi. B suun k ban don Kristo sann i.
47008024	Lann ŋɔn’m man k i bua’b yen mɔni, g Kristo‑yab tintaancaga ń la g bann k t mɔg mɔni yen tin gii pag’i b nunŋ n.
47009001	Yal nba nyuan paab nba k i bu te Kristo‑yab nyan, l ji g bual k n diɛn’i kadaaɔg l po.
47009002	G dugn n ban k i pal kɔn l po. N daan pag’i Maseduann yab nunŋ n l po g tua mii hal jel yo k yinm Akaayi diem n Kristo‑yab bo bobn i paab g gbenn. I pakɔnn paan bonciɛnn pala k b mɔ ji bua ban tod.
47009003	N suun t naataani n nyan i buol, k n pinpagd ń daa tie pinpagkuond kaa, ama k yin kon l bobn g gbenn nyan min maad nyan.
47009004	L g ŋan g Maseduann yab n yeg yen’n g baal g sua k i g bobn g gbenn. T pala n daan paa i po nand nyan, l ji baa tie fai nba yab i t po. Fai nba bu suol’i nuan, n kan fid g maad l yaa maam.
47009005	L po n te k n mali k l dagd yen k n baln t naataani k ban gaal liig g daan ŋanm g diid yin bo puon paab nba nyan ninŋ, k t gii pund tin sua k l kul bobn g gbenn k lan ŋɔn k i pii yen papienn i, k l g tie yen mabl kaa.
47009006	Ŋanm gii tiɛn man ne: yua nba bul waam nne, u tan bu yend waam nne i, yua nba bul k l yab n tan bu yend lan gii yab.
47009007	Lann nil kul ń pi wan suol u yam n ninŋ nand, g siɛl yaa gbiɛndi ń daa be l n ninŋ g bual mabl. K l maa Yendu bua yua nba piin yen pamann i.
47009008	Yendu bu fid g te’i bonŋana kul, g youg kul yin gii mɔg yal nba bu nyan’i payiɛnu kul n ninŋ, g biɛ tenn yal nba k i baa diɛ g tie ŋanmbuolu kul.
47009009	Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nyan: « U piin tali yen bulcind, u nimɔnd g mɔg gbennu. »
47009010	Yendu n tien tanbuul bonbuoli k u buul, g tien’o jied k u di, u bu te i mɔ bonbuoli, g te lan nɔbl, k i nimɔnd ń lon luana bonciɛnn.
47009011	U bu te yin mɔgd bonn kul n ninŋ k yin fid gii piin yen bulcind youg kul. Nnyan i g niib bonciɛnn bu tien Yendu balg paab nba k i bu te’ti tin te’b nyan po.
47009012	G dugn todl tuonn nba k i suun ne g nyanŋ Kristo‑yab payiɛnu kua kaa, l baad yen pinpagd mɔ bonciɛnn Yendu po.
47009013	B bu la yin suun tuonn nba g tod’b nyan n tie bonmɔnn nand b po g don Yendu sann, g dugn lann n bu ŋɔn k i cɔln Kristo Laabamann g biid yin mɔg yal nba yen’m, yen lieb nba tenn kul.
47009014	B baa jaand i po, g ŋɔn’i k b bua’i g dugn Yendu ŋalbalg nba k i gaal g mɔg po.
47009015	Yendu ń gaal balg u paab nba g mɔg dugnu po.
47010001	Min Pɔl, min nba k i yed k n tu be i buol g jiin n kua gii tie suoo, ama n yen gii fag yen’i min gii wud naajad nyan, min mɔno n maad’i ne: Kristo pasɔnŋl yen u sugl po,
47010002	n miɛd’i k i daa ŋaa k n gii baal i buol min gbal g ŋɔn’i n naajad. K l maa yab nba tua k t diɛ nifosaal maalm kukua i g suun tuonn nyan, n kon diɛ k n ŋɔn’m ninmɔnn.
47010003	Mɔni, t tie nifosaalb i, ama t g pua tɔb nyan nifosaalb nyan kaa.
47010004	T yaa jakɔntiɛd g tie nifosaalb yal kaa, l tie Yendu yal i g mɔg paalu, k t diɛ g mud t ninnanda n maa b depaald nba, g biid faaɔgdanm n mali g maad maam nba.
47010005	Yua nba kul l fiil g sed yen jipaad g bu pan nil k u kan bann Yendu, t tu tud g lu’ug u, yua l mɔg maalm nba kul, tin suol’o nyan dansalg nyan wan gii cɔln Kristo.
47010006	I tan gii ŋɔn k yinm cɔln canyiin, t bu dad yua nba g cɔln kul tubl.
47010007	Ŋanm g diid man bona n tie nand. Nil gii diɛ u pal n k u tie Kristo‑yua, wan bann bonyenn: u gii tie Kristo‑yua, t mɔ tie Kristo‑yab i.
47010008	Yonmdaan bo tie’ti yikod k tin tod’i yin gad liig i, l bo g tie k tin biɛn’i kaa. Baa n gii ŋaa k l yikod ŋanm g manŋ n pal k l pend waam mɔno, l g mɔg’n fai.
47010009	N g bua k yin gii nyuan’n nyan n tie yua nba da kadaad g tien’i k min gii jiend’i nyan.
47010010	G dugn, n gbiɛ g niib maad n po k nne: « U tu diɛn u kadaad n ninŋ g maad maam nba paa g wagi, g nyaan u tan gii baal t siign wan dinŋ canyiin, g ji gii maad maam nba g mɔg yul. »
47010011	Yua nba maad nnyan, wan ŋanm g bann bonyenn: tin be fagm g da kadaad g maad nand nyan, t gii baal i buol mɔ t bu tien nnyan i.
47010012	T kan tuo g pua g kpabn t kua yen yab nba ŋɔnŋ b kua, g bual tin yed k tinm yen banm ja. B luol yam i g gɔ g bual b kua g ŋmaa n pund’b i, g ŋɔnŋ ban tie yab nba.
47010013	Tinm nuan yen kan don t kua lan pend tin dagd yen yal. Tin bu don t kua yal nba po bu dagd yen Yendu n sen’ti k tin sun g dagd naan i, wano n cab’ti k tin pund hal i buol.
47010014	G dugn t g pend t yikod n dagd naan buol. T bo gii g baal i buol, g yen donŋ t kua, t bo pend t yikod n dagd naan n nyan. Tinm n kpiɛ g pund hal i buol yen Kristo Laabamann.
47010015	Yikod n g cab’ti k tin pend nand, t g pend l buol, t g donŋ t kua lieb tuona po. T daan k i dindann ń kped g pugn i, k t mɔ ń sun t tuonn i siign ninŋ nyan t yikod n cab’ti nand nyan, k lan gad liig.
47010016	Nnyan, t bu fid g muand Laabamann dingbana nba be i liig po, k lan daa tie k t dug lieb tuona nyuad po kaa g donŋ t kua.
47010017	Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nand nyan: « Nil nba kul bua wan don u kua, wan don u kua Yonmdaan n sun yal nba po. »
47010018	K l maa, yua nba pag u kua kaa bu fid g ŋɔn k u dagd yenn, Yendu n pag yua nba n dagd yen pinpagd.
47011001	I bo gii bu tuo k n maad yen’i waad maam waam i ? Ɛɛn, miɛl man sugl g tuo.
47011002	N pal kɔn i po, l pakɔnn nya Yendu buol i, g dugn n tug’i nyan sipaan nyan i g tie jayend kua, lan tie Kristo, k wan gaal’i nyan sikpenŋ nba daa g ban jua palb nyan.
47011003	Ama n jie bonyenn i: nyan waaɔg n bo tug ninfanm g bɔnd Ɛf nyan, yin tan daa ŋaa ban kuan maalbiid i yula n ninŋ, yin ji daa ŋua Kristo yen payenn [yen papienn].
47011004	G dugn, nifan gii baal g ŋɔn’i Yiesu fano, k l g taa yen tin bo ŋɔn’i k u tie yua nba, lann i kaa, u gii ŋɔn’i yal nba g taa yen Foŋanm nba k i bo gaal, lann i kaa, u gii muand’i Laabamann nba g taa yen yin bo tuo g gaal Laabamann nba, i tu tuo g gaal l daan maam k i pal man i.
47011005	N yen g la yab nba yi b kua Yiesu sundgbenŋa nyan n cie’n yen yal nba.
47011006	L tie mɔni i, k n g ban maam jiɛ‑g‑lebdu, ama yal tie banm po nuan, t ŋɔn’i bonn kul n ninŋ taal munŋaa kul k t ban.
47011007	Min bo jiin n kua k yinm ń do, g muand’i Yendu Laabamann g g gaal siɛl nyan, n bo biil yaa aa ?
47011008	Kristo‑yab tintaancaga nba be dingbanfana nyan n bo pa’n l tundl po. Min bo tuo g gaan siɛl b buol nyan, l bo ŋman k n fe ban mɔg yal nba i g fid g suun tuonn i buol.
47011009	Min bo be i buol yaa youg nba g bona tan pɔd’n, n bo g bual sua baa siɛl po. T naataani nba be Maseduann n bo baal yen yal nba bo pɔd’n kul g tie’n. N bo mind g suol n kua k n daa te tugl sua po i, n biɛ baa l diɛ nnyan i g saa.
47011010	Kristo mamɔni nba be n ninŋ po, n bu fid g maad k Akaayi diem n ninŋ sua kan fid g pan’n k n kan manŋ n pal l po.
47011011	Bɛ po i k n bo tien nnyan i ? N g bua’i yaa aa ? Yendu ban k n bua’i.
47011012	Min suun yal nba, n biɛ baa l suun nnyan i, g yab nba bua ban gii pua jipaad ń daa la ban bu kal yal nba g yed k tinm yen banm ja.
47011013	L niib fa i k b tie Yiesu sundi. B tie tuonsunŋalaacidanm i g bɔnd niib k b tie Kristo sundi.
47011014	L g tie yaalidug bonn kaa, g dugn Sitaan mɔno yen fa k u tie yinyiem malɛg i.
47011015	Lann, l g paa u tuonsunna po yen ban fa k b suun tuonn nba tuag mamɔni sɔnu. Ama b binbem tan bu juod nyan b tuona n tie nand nyan i.
47011016	N bua n maad bonyenn g led: daa mali man k n waad kaa. Baa l gii tie k i mali nnyan mɔno, yin di sugl g ŋaa’n k n mɔ ń daa don n kua waam o.
47011017	Min bu maad yal nba ne g tie Yonmdaan n bua nand kaa, n bu maad waad maam i, k n pal paa k n bu la min bu nyii yal nba po g don n kua.
47011018	Niib bonciɛnn donŋ b kua nyan ŋanduna niib n tie nand nyan i. Lann, n mɔ bu don n kua.
47011019	Yinm nuan mɔg yam, ama i yen tuo g cenŋ yab nba g mɔg yam maam, k i pala man.
47011020	I tuo k ban gii diɛ’i nyan yonmi nyan, g di’i, g fe yin mɔg yal nba kul, g nund’i, g pebd’i tanpai.
47011021	N bu maad bonyenn, tinm daan gbal lann canyiin k l mɔg’n fai. G nyaan, nil n bu fid g pua pal g maad yal nba kul, n mɔ bu pua pal g maad. N yaan maad waad maam i.
47011022	B g yed k b tie Ebro‑nba kaa aa ? N mɔ tie lann i. B g tie Israyɛl yab kaa aa ? N mɔ tie lann i. B g tie Abraham yaabuona kaa aa ? N mɔ tie lann i.
47011023	N bu maad nyan n ji l waad canyiin nyan i: B yed k b tie Kristo tuonsunna i, min n tie Kristo tuonsunn g cie’b. N sun g cie’b, g kua dansalg g cie’b, g gaal puad g cie’b, taal munŋaa kul k l tenn waam nne yen k n kpe.
47011024	Suif‑nba pua’n lanbana piintaa yen ŋanwai g daan biin taal munmu.
47011025	Taal muntaa i g Rom yab pua’n gbana. Niib jaa’n tana yenm, taal muntaa g ŋadunŋ baa yen’n nyum n. N ban g tien nyuncinn n yentunmunn yen nyamunŋ.
47011026	Youg kul n be sɔnu po i, g la yubɔnbuolu kul. Nyum n yubɔnn be, g bibiɛdi be g tie yubɔnn, k n buolu n yab be g tie yubɔnn n po, g buolfanu yab be g tie yubɔnn n po, dopienu n yubɔnn be, g fual n ninŋ yubɔnn be, mɔgl n ninŋ mɔg yubɔnn, yab nba fa k b tie t naataani mɔ tie yubɔnn i g kaag’n.
47011027	N sun tuonpaala g cɔgnd kua’n, g yenn youg g yaam pɔd’n k n g guan g buo. Kom yen nyunnyuglu gbad’n, n ban g tien dana g dua kom g taag, g wad kua’n, k n be g g mɔg yal k n bu ŋagn n kua po.
47011028	N g dugd yal nba tenn nuan. Yal nba ŋanm g tie n pakɔnn daal kul n ne: n mali Kristo‑yab tintaancaga kul po i.
47011029	Paalu gii pɔd nil, l tu naan paalu pɔd min i, b gii ŋaa g nil kua tudm n ninŋ, l tu yiɛl’n hal bonciɛnn.
47011030	N gii bu don n kua, n bu don n kua n gbalm po i.
47011031	Yendu nba tie Yonmdaan Yiesu Baa, wano nba gaan dondl youg ń tuu youg ban k n g fa faaɔg kaa.
47011032	Min bo be Damas yaa youg, yikodaan nba bo be l buol g kal bad Aretas sann po nyan bo te g sijenm guu doug n dimɔi kul i, k ban suol’n.
47011033	N lieb bo tien’n kpancubug n i, g nyan’n takobonn, g jiin’n guonn nba bo lind doug nyan depuol po, k n nyiɛ l jua nui n g ciɛl.
47012001	L bual g nil ń don u kua, g nyaan l yen g mɔg siɛl yaa nyuad. Ama n bu maad bonyenn nne po, lann n tie Yonmdaan n dɔgd yal nba g ŋɔn’n.
47012002	N ban jua nne k u tie Kristo‑yua, piig yen bina ŋanna n nyan, g Yendu bo tug l jua g don’o polu yaa polu yaa polu. U bo don’o yen u gbannand yaa aa, n g ban, u gbannand bo g duo oo, n g ban, Yendu n ban.
47012003	L jua bo duo yen u gbannand ii, u gbannand bo g duo oo, n g ban, Yendu n ban,
47012004	ama n ban k u bo duo Yendu nimɔnm binbebuol, g gbad maam nba g mɔg maadu k l g cab g nifosaal ń yaad mɔb g maad.
47012005	N bu don n kua l jua po, ama n kukua po nuan, min bu don n kua nand tie k n ŋɔn n gbalm kua i.
47012006	N bo gii bua k n don n kua, n bo bu fid, k l biɛ g tie k n waad kaa, g dugn n bo bu maad mɔni i. Ama n yen suol n kua i, k l maa n g bua g sua ń kand wan gbiɛ yal, lann i kaa wan nyuan n tuona n ninŋ k n tie yua nba, gii mali k n cie l buol,
47012007	g dugn min maad k n la bonŋana nba g Yonmdaan dɔgd g ŋɔn’n nyan po. Yendu bo g bua k n gii pua jipaad l po, lann n tien k u te k n laad fala k l tie nyan kunkonu nyan g tuu n gbannand n ninŋ, Sitaan sundu i, k u puag’n k n daa tug jipaad g lol n yul.
47012008	Taal muntaa i k n miɛl Yonmdaan mii wan nyan’n l fala n ninŋ.
47012009	Ama wan jiin’n yal nba n ne: « N ŋalbalg dagd’a. Nil gbalm n ninŋ i k n ŋɔnŋ k n paalu g mɔg l liel. » Lann, n gbalm n ninŋ i k min baa pua jipaad, g Kristo paalu ń gii be yen’n.
47012010	L po n te k n pal man n gbalm po, sugd po, cicagm po, mabl nba k n laad yen yanbani nba k n mɔg g dugn Kristo po. Yen mɔni, yaa youg nba g paalu pɔd’n canyiin nyan, l youg mɔno i k n tu ŋanm g la paalu.
47012011	I la i, n gii maad nyan n waad nyan, yinm n te k n maad nnyan. G dugn, yinm n daan bo bu ŋɔn min tie yua nba, k l maa n l g tie siɛl nuan, g nyaan, yab yi b kua Yiesu sundgbenŋa g cie’n baa siɛl n ninŋ.
47012012	Yal nba ŋɔnŋ g nil tie Yiesu sundu kul tien i siign k i la: i la pasɔnŋl nba g mɔg l liel, g la yaalidug tuona, g la palug yen ciila tuonbuolu kul.
47012013	N sun bɛ i Kristo‑yab tintaancaga nba tenn po g g sun i yaa po i ? Min g gaal siɛl yaa todl i buol nyan kaa tie n biid ii ? Di man sugl n po.
47012014	N bob g gbenn g saa i buol g ji gɔ taal muntaa po n nyan, g biɛ kan l gaal siɛl i buol, g dugn n g kpaan i mɔgm kaa, n kpaan yinm mɔno i. K l maa, l g bual g bid kaa ń gii bilg mɔgm g guund b danm, bidanm n baa bilg g guund b bid.
47012015	Min nuan, yen pamann i k n bu tug min mɔg yal nba g sun tuonn i po, n bu tug n munn kul i g cab i po. K n gii ŋanm g bua’i bonciɛnn i, yinm baa bua’n waam nne yaa aa ?
47012016	To, i tuo k n daan g te tugl sua po waa, ama k l yen ji tie k min tie ninfandaan nyan, k n daan bɔnd bɔnd’i nii k i baa n diɛɔg n aa !
