47012017	Min daan sun yab nba i buol nyan, n te k b ninŋ ŋmaa n bɔnd g dii’i nii ?
47012018	N daan baln Tiit k u gad i buol, wano yen t ninjalua ŋano. Tiit dii’i nii ? Min yen wano kul g taa maalyenm kaa aa, t g tɔgn sɔnyenu kaa aa ?
47012019	L ji g luol waam, i mali k t kpaan k tin di mɔni i nunŋ n i. N n, tinm maad Yendu nunŋ n i, Kristo n bua nand. N dɔnn‑nba, t kpaan k i dindann ń ŋanm g paag i.
47012020	G dugn n jie k n tan baal i buol g sua k i g tie nyan min bua nand, k yin mɔ ń sua k n g tie nyan yin bua nand i. N jie k n baal g sua g kunkɔna yen nanŋ yen pabienn yen naaniɛɔg yen sanjounŋ yen tuali yen jipaad yen ŋmadl be i siign ninŋ i.
47012021	N jie k n baal, g Yendu ń yaan fiɛg’n i nunŋ n ninŋ i. N jie k n bu buud niib bonciɛnn po, yab nba bo kpiɛ g tien biid, g g mɔ kua b biid po, g biɛ daa l be jɔgnd n ninŋ, yen cunconm n ninŋ g suun naayigtuona nyan i.
47013001	Taal muntaa po n nyan k n bu baal i buol. Nyan lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n nyan: « Maam nba be kul, l bual k ban cenŋ sieda‑nba banle lann i kaa bantaa yo, g fid g jiɛl l maam. »
47013002	Min bo baal i buol taal munle po, n bo maad’i no, mɔlane n g be i siign, ama n biɛ bua n guan g maad’i g led, g yab nba bo tien biid siɛnyoug yen lieb nba tenn kul ń gii ban k n gii baal n kan ŋaa sua.
47013003	N tua i bua yin bann yen mɔni g Kristo n be n ninŋ g maad a ? I buol u yen g gbal kaa, u ŋɔnŋ i siign n ninŋ k u mɔg paalu.
47013004	L tie mɔni i k ban bo kpaa’ɔg yaa youg nba, paalu bo g be u ninŋ, ama Yendu paalu po, u fo. T mɔ yaa po, l tie nnyan i, t be yen’o g paalu g be t ninŋ, ama Yendu paalu po, t bu ŋɔn’i k t fo yen’o.
47013005	Yinm mɔno ń ŋanm g diid i tug n ninŋ yin tie yab nba, g liɛ i l mɔg dindann ii ? Bign man i kua g diid, i g la g Yiesu Kristo be i ninŋ ii ? Bii i bign g sua k l g tie nnyan yaa aa ?
47013006	Ama n daan k i bu tuo k tinm nuan g bign k l paad’ti.
47013007	G nyaan t jaand g miɛd Yendu k yin daa sun siɛl yaa bonbiil, t g kpaan k tin ŋɔn k t tien k b la kaa, tinm kpaan k yin gii tie ŋanm i. Baa l po gii te g niib ji nyuan k l tie nyan l paad’ti nyan mɔno, l g biɛ.
47013008	G dugn tinm g mɔg paalu nba k t bu pan mamɔni sɔnu, tin mɔg paalu nba tie k tin sun g mamɔni sɔnu ń gad liig kua i.
47013009	Paalu gii pɔd’ti k yinm yen paa, t tu be pamann n ninŋ i. Tin jaand g miɛd yal nba tie k yinm ń ŋanm i binbem g gbenn i canyiin.
47013010	L po n te k n tuod g da’i l kul ne g daa be fagm, k n tan gii pund i buol, min daa tug n yikod g dad i tubl kaa, g dugn Yonmdaan tie’n l yikod k n tod’i yin gad liig i, l g tie k n biɛn’i kaa.
47013011	N naataani, min bu juod g maad’i yal nba n ne: i be man pamann n ninŋ, gii kpaan youg kul k i binbem ń gii ŋan canyiin, i paand man i lieb pala, gii taa mɔb, mɔnd man g manu ń gii be i siign ninŋ, nnyan, Yendu nba bua’i g te k i yam dua nyan baa be yen’i.
47013012	Fuond fuond man i lieb, g lɔn lɔn lieb yen naataann. Kristo‑yab kul fuond’i.
47013013	Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ŋalbalg, Yendu buam yen Foŋanm naataann ń taan i kul gii be yen’i.
48001001	Min Pɔl n da kadaaɔg ne. N tie Yiesu sundu i, niib kaa sun’n, nifosaal mɔ biɛ kaa te k n tie Yiesu sundu. Yiesu Kristo yen t Baa Yendu nba yied’o kpienm siign nyan n te k n tie Yiesu sundu.
48001002	Min yen t naataani nba be n buol ne fuond yinm Galasi Kristo‑yab.
48001003	T Baa Yendu yen Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po g te k i yam ń gii dua.
48001004	Wano Kristo n yid u miɛl salg k wan piin t biid, g fiel’ti g nyan’ti mɔlane binbebiiug nba n yend ŋanduna ne ninŋ. U bo tien t Baa Yendu yanbuam n nyan.
48001005	Yudand tie wano Yendu yal i, mɔlane saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog. Amɛnn.
48001006	L suol’n yaalidug bonciɛnn yen yin gbaa g nyɔl Yendu nba bo yiin’i g dugn Kristo ŋalbalg po, g ji ŋua laabamanfann.
48001007	Yen mɔni, l g tie g laabamanfann be kaa, niib n be i siign g ŋmad i yam g kpaan k ban lebd Kristo Laabamann.
48001008	Nifan gii baal, baa tinm mɔno gii baal, lann i kaa malɛg gii nyiɛ polu po g baal g muand’i Laabamann, k l g taa yen tin bo kpiɛ g muand’i yal nba nyan, l daan ń biɛl fam !
48001009	T daan kpiɛ g maad’i no, n ji gɔ g maad g led i, g nil gii muand’i Laabamann k l g taa yen yin bo gaal yal nba, l daan ń biɛl fam !
48001010	K nnyan i, n kpaan niib pinpagd bii Yendu yal i ? N kpaan k min manŋ niib pala yaa aa ? N bo gii kpaan k n manŋ niib pala man ne n ji g tie Kristo tuonsunn.
48001011	N naataani, min n maad’i, Laabamann nba k n muand g nyiɛ nifosaal buol kaa.
48001012	G dugn nifosaal kaa maad k n gbad, nifosaal kaa biɛ ŋɔn’n l Laabamann mɔ, Yiesu Kristo mɔno n dɔgd l Laabaal g ŋɔn’n.
48001013	Yinm mɔno yen gbad min bo ŋua Suif‑nba jaandi g suun yaa tuonn nba. N bo diɛ jad kua i g ŋɔnŋ Yendu tintaanu niib fala, g gbaa k n l pua g yod b tintaanu canyiin.
48001014	Tinm Suif‑nba jaandi n ninŋ, n bo cie n baɔnŋ n yab bonciɛnn, min n bo ŋanm g kɔn t danm bogda po yen n pal kul g cie’b.
48001015	Ama Yendu bo tuod g lugd’n g sua k n daa be n naa tug n i, u ŋalbalg po, k u yiin’n k n sun u tuonn. Wan bo tan jag g sua g youg ji pund
48001016	yen wan ŋɔn’n u Bija, k min fid g muand buolfanu yab wan tie yua nba, k u kon ŋɔn’n. Wan ŋɔn’n, min ji bo g bual nifosaal siɛl yaa cegli po,
48001017	n biɛ bo g gad Serusalɛm mɔ k min la yab nba bo kpiɛ g te Yiesu sundi yen’n. N bo fiil l youg mɔno g gad Arabi i, g nyiɛ l po g guan Damas.
48001018	L bo tien bina ŋantaa yo, k n tan duo Serusalɛm k min bann Kefas. N bo tien piig yen daa ŋanmu i yen’o.
48001019	Ama n bo g la sundlei, l gii g tie t Yonmdaan ninja Saak i kaa.
48001020	Min da g maad’i yal nba ne, n maad Yendu nunŋ n i, n g fa faaɔg kaa.
48001021	L puol po i k n gad Siiri yen Silisi dingbana n ninŋ.
48001022	Suude niib nba tie Kristo‑yab bo g ban g la’n palb,
48001023	ama b bo gbiɛ g niib maad n po k nne: « Yua nba bo ŋua g cagn’ti siɛnyoug nyan mɔ ji muand niib Laabamann i, k wano mɔno yen bo gbaa k wan biɛn niib nba bo mɔg dindann l Laabamann po. »
48001024	G Kristo‑yab ji pag Yendu g dugn n po.
48002001	L bo tien piig yen bina ŋanna yo, k n guan g gad Serusalɛm, min yen Barnabas. N bo tug Tiit mɔ k u ciɛn’ti.
48002002	N bo guan g gad l po g dugn Yendu n bo maad k n gad. N bo ŋɔn l buol Kristo‑yab min muand buolfanu yab Laabamann nba, ama n bo la yab nba ŋanm g mɔg yudand i, k t tien tintaanu t kua n ninŋ k n ŋɔn’m, g dugn n bo g bua k min suun yal nba, lann i kaa min bo kpiɛ g sun yal nba kul ń te fam.
48002003	Baa n yegnu Tiit nba n tie Grɛk mɔno, b bo g niin’o k wan kɔnd Suif‑nba kɔnd.
48002004	G nyaan ŋalaacidanm yen bo ŋmad t siign g fa k b tie t naataani, banm nuan bo l ŋua k wan kɔnd i. B bo tien suoo g kua t siign g suli tin be yen Yiesu Kristo g yal t kua nand i, g bua ban kuan’ti yonmd n.
48002005	T yen bo g tie’b nunmanŋ palb. T bo tien nnyan k yin fid gii diɛ mamɔni nba be Laabamann n ninŋ i.
48002006	Ban bo yi yab nba Kristo‑yab tintaanu yudanm bo be, l danm n bo tie yab nba kul, lann g la’n, g dugn Yendu nuan g mɔg lugdm niib buol. L tintaanu yudanm bo g mabn’n k n pugn siɛl l po.
48002007	B bo diid g sua g Yendu tie min i Laabamann muandu tuonn k n gii muand buolfanu yab, nyan wan bo tie Piɛr mɔ l tuonn g yed k wan gii muand Suif‑nba nyan.
48002008	G dugn yua nba bo sun tuonn Piɛr n ninŋ k u te Yiesu sundu Suif‑nba buol nyan, wano n biɛ sun tuonn n mɔ yaa ninŋ k n muand buolfanu yab Laabamann.
48002009	Niib bo nyuan g Saak yen Kefas yen San n tie Kristo‑yab tintaanu yudanm. Banm mɔno n bo bann g Yendu pii’n u paab, k l tie k min n bu sun l tuonn nyan, k b suol min yen Barnabas nui n g yog yog, k lan ŋɔn k tinm yen banm taan mɔb, k tinm ń gii saa g muand buolfanu yab Laabamann, k banm ń gii suun yen Suif‑nba.
48002010	B bo maad k tin mɔnd gii tiɛn b tintaanu n ninŋ tali po kua i, k n kon tien nnyan yen n pal kul.
48002011	Ama Kefas n baal Antiyɔs, Siiri diem n, u bo tien siɛl k n fiil g yie u po niib kul nunŋ n, g dugn u bo g mɔg mɔni.
48002012	Yen mɔni, Saak bo sun niib nne t buol. L niib n daa bo g pund nyan, Kefas bo tu di yen yab nba g tie Suif‑nba i. Ama Saak sundi n pund yaa youg, g Kefas ji den g piɛd u kua g ŋaa’b, g dugn u bo jie yab nba bo ŋua g niib nba g tie Suif‑nba mɔ ń kɔnd Suif‑nba kɔnd i.
48002013	Wan sun l jiwaantuonn nnyan, g Suif‑nba nba tenn mɔ ŋmaa u taabuod n, g Barnabas mɔno tan ŋaa k b kuan’o l munafigi bontitied n ninŋ.
48002014	Min la k b tie nnyan k l yen g tuag yen mamɔni nba be Laabamann n ninŋ nyan, k n maad Kefas niib kul nunŋ n: « Fin tie Suif i, a yen daan g be nyan Suif nyan kaa, a daan be nyan buolfanu yua nyan i, k l tien nle i, k a ji bua ŋan niin buolfanu yab ban gii tie nyan b tie Suif‑nba nyan i ? »
48002015	B mal tinm nuan k t tie Suif‑nba i, t g taa yen buolfanu yab nba tie biiddanm ne.
48002016	T yen ban g nifosaal n suun tuona nba g Moyis yiko bual k wan sun po kaa g Yendu tu yiin’o nimɔn, u dindann Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ po i. T mɔ tuo g dug Yiesu Kristo po, g Yendu ń yiin’ti nimɔnm, k lan gii tie k t dindann Kristo po i, g daa tie k t sun yiko n bual yal nba po kaa, k l maa Yendu kan yed g sua tie nimɔn g dugn k l daan sun yiko n bual k wan sun yal nba.
48002017	K tin yaan gbaa k tin te nimɔnm Kristo po nyan, l gii sua k t mɔ ji te biiddanm i, l bua n maad g Kristo n baad yen biid ii ? Palb, lann g be.
48002018	Yen mɔni, n gii guan g maa min mɔno n bo pua g mud yal nba, n ji te biiddaan n nyan.
48002019	G dugn yal nba tie yiko po nuan, min kpe yiko kuum o, n ji bua min gii fo Yendu po i. Min yen Kristo n taan g kpe dapunpɔnn po,
48002020	lann min kaa ji fo, Kristo n be n ninŋ g fo. Min tie nifosaal g be binbem nba ne, n dug Yendu Bija po i g be, wano n buad’n g yid u kua salg n po.
48002021	N kan ŋaa Yendu ŋalbalg ń te fam. K l maa, l gii tie g nil ń cɔln Yiko i Yendu ń yiin’o nimɔn, lann Kristo kpe fam i.
48003001	Galasi yab, i g mɔg yam baa waam ! B tiel’i yaa aa ? I nunŋ n ninŋ kaa k b bo ŋɔn’i Yiesu Kristo n kpe nand dapunpɔnn po ii ?
48003002	Bonyenn kua i k n bua n bann: yin bo gaal Foŋanm nyan, i bo cɔln Moyis yiko i g gaal bii yin bo gbad Laabamann nba g tuo g gaal nyan po i ?
48003003	Lann, i ji l luol yam canyiin yaa aa ? Yin bo cil yal nba yen Foŋanm paalu nyan, i ji bua n tug i yul po paalu i g juod ii ?
48003004	Yin la yal nba i binbem n ne kul tie fam yaa aa ? L kan fid gii tie fam !
48003005	Yendu n tien’i Foŋanm g suun yaalidug tuona i siign ninŋ nyan, u tie nnyan g dugn yin cɔln yiko po bii, u tie g dugn yin cenŋ Laabamann g tuo g gaal nyan po i ?
48003006	K Abraham i, n tua u bo dug Yendu po i g Yendu yiin’o nimɔn a.
48003007	Lann, ŋanm g gbad man niimn, yab nba dug Yendu po n tie Abraham yaabuona.
48003008	Yendu Kadaaɔg mɔno bo tuod g maad g Yendu bu yiin buolfanu yab nimɔnm g dugn b dindann po. Lann n te k u bo muand Abraham laabamann ne: « N yedŋanm bu nya a buol i g yad ŋanduna ne buoli kul po. »
48003009	Lann yab nba mɔg dindann, Yendu bu yad u yedŋanm b mɔ yaa po nyan wan bo tien Abraham nand g dugn u dindann po nyan.
48003010	Ama yab nba dug yiko po nuan, mɔpol n ŋua’b, g dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Yua nba g cɔln yal nba kul diɛn yiko kadaaɔg n ninŋ, Yendu mɔpol bu ŋuan’o. »
48003011	L taan g tie wuodi bonn kaa, Yendu kan yed g sua tie nimɔn u nunŋ n g dugn k l daan cɔln yiko po ; k l maa l diɛn g maad g: « Yua nba tie nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n g dugn u dindann po n baa fo. »
48003012	To, yiko cɔlmu nuan yen g tie dindann yal kaa. L diɛn g maad g: « Yua nba cɔln yiko n yed yal nba kul, l daan baa fo g dugn l yiko po i. »
48003013	Kristo pa t po g nyan’ti mɔpol n ninŋ o, yiko n bo bu baal yen mɔpol nba t po nyan, wano n ji gaal, g dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad g: « Yua nba k b jɔn’o daaɔg po kul, mɔpol ŋuan’o n nyan. »
48003014	L tien nnyan g Yiesu Kristo po, buolfanu yab mɔ ń la yedŋanm nba g Yendu bo puon Abraham i, k t dindann po tin gaal Yendu n bo puon Foŋanm nba.
48003015	N naataani, t tug man binbiug t binbem n ninŋ. Nil yam n bua yal nba k u diɛn kadaaɔg n, g nyii nuubil g pol k lan ŋɔn k wan bua yal nba n nyan, nifan ji kan fid g piin, lann i kaa g pugn siɛl l po.
48003016	To, Abraham yen u yaabuonn i g Yendu bo puon’m puoni. L g diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ g yed g « yen u yaabuona » kaa, l bo gii diɛn nnyan, l bo baa tie nyan b yab nyan i. L yen diɛn g « yen u yaabuonn » i, l ŋɔn k l maad g nyuan niyend i, lan tie Kristo.
48003017	Min bua n maad yal nba n ne: Yendu n bo puon puoni nba g pol k u bu tien nyan, l bina kobiinna yen bina piintaa po yo g yiko tan yuand g baal, l yiko kan fid g yiin Yendu mɔbona ŋann fam, g piin l puoni.
48003018	L gii tie g nil bu cɔln yiko i g gaal Yendu n bil yal nba g guun’o, lann nuan l ji g tie Yendu puoni yal kaa. Puoni po i k Abraham yen bo la Yendu ŋalbalg.
48003019	L gii tie nnyan, yiko yen ji be bɛ po i ? Yiko nuan bo baal g pugn g niib ń bann k b bontitied g tuag yen Yendu yanbuam i. Yiko tuonn n bo baa tie yal nba n nyan saa yen yaa youg nba k Abraham yaabuonn bo bu baal, yua nba po g Yendu bo puon puoni nyan. Malɛg‑nba n bo gaal l yiko g baal yenn g tie nisaal k u te sandindaan.
48003020	L gii tie niyend po kukua, l g bual g sandindaan ń gii be, Yendu nuan yen tie yeno kua i.
48003021	L bua n maad g yiko yie g Yendu puoni g tie siɛl yaa aa ? Palb, lann kaa. L bo gii tie k t gaal yiko nba bu baal yen miɛl niib po, lann nil bo bu fid g cɔln l yiko g te nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ.
48003022	Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ l yen diɛn g maad g biid yend ŋanduna munn kul o. L tien nnyan g Yendu ń te u niib i wan bo puon puoni nba g dugn ban dug Yiesu Kristo po nyan.
48003023	Dindann youg n daa bo g pund nyan, yiko n daa bo diɛ’ti nyan dansali nyan, saa yen yaa youg nba g Yendu tan dɔgd dindann sɔnu t po.
48003024	Yiko n bo yual’ti saa yen Kristo baalu youg, k tin ji gii dug u po g te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ.
48003025	Youg n yaan pund k t dug Kristo po nyan, t ji g be l biyual nuu n ninŋ.
48003026	G dugn yin dug Yiesu Kristo po nyan, i kul ji tie Yendu bid i.
48003027	Yen mɔni, i kul n yaan taan yen Kristo i nyunwulu youg nyan, yinm yen wano kul ji taan g tie bonyenn i.
48003028	Lann, l ji g mɔg k u ne tie Suif k u ne tie buolfanu yua, k u ne tie yonm k u ne yal u kua, k u ne tie jua k u ne tie puo, g dugn i kul n taan yen Yiesu Kristo nyan, i ji tie niyend i.
48003029	I gii tie Kristo‑yab, lann i tie Abraham yaabuona i, yinm n bu gaal wan bo puon’o yal nba nyan.
48004001	Min bua n maad yal nba n ne: yua nba tan bu yend u baa faal daa gii tie big, mɔni, wano n l yen bonn kul faa, g nyaan wano yen yonm kul yen daa tie yenm i.
48004002	U daa baa be yab nba kub’o g ŋmagd’o yen yab nba nyuan u faal nyan nui n ninŋ i, saa yen youg nba k u baa bo sen.
48004003	T mɔ l tien nnyan i. Tin daa bo tie nyan bid nyan, t bo cɔln ŋanduna ne ninŋ bona nba k t g nyuan ama k l yen mɔg paalu g diɛ niib dansalg i.
48004004	Ama Yendu n bo sen youg nba bo tan pund, k u sun u Bija, g puo mal’o yiko youg,
48004005	k wan nyan yab nba bo be yiko yonmd n ninŋ, g te k t kul ń te Yendu bid.
48004006	Yal nba ŋɔn k i tie Yendu bid yen mɔni n ne: u sun u Bija Fuom t ninŋ. L Fuom n te k t bu fid g yiin Yendu k t Baa.
48004007	Lann, a ji g tie yonm kaa, a ji tie Yendu big i. Ŋan tie Yendu big nyan, lann a bu gaal wan bo puon u bid yal nba.
48004008	Siɛnyoug, i daa bo g ban Yendu, i bo ŋua tingbana i g tie b yonmi nyan b tie Yendu nyan k b yen g tie siɛl.
48004009	Mɔlane po, i ji ban Yendu, nnyan kaa mɔno, Yendu ji ban’i. G bɛ po i k i biɛ ji bua n lebd gii cɔln bonfinfana nba g mɔg siɛl yaa paalu g bual siɛl yaa buam, g biɛ guan g te yonmi nyan siɛnyoug nyan i ?
48004010	I ŋanm g cɔln diyena, ŋmaayeni, binyena, g mɔg binn n ninŋ youg nba k i ŋanm g cɔln.
48004011	N ji jie g tuonn nba k n sun i po ne kul ń te fam i.
48004012	N naataani, n balm’i, i tie man nyan min nyan, g dugn n mɔ tien n kua nyan yinm nyan i. I g biil’n baa siɛl.
48004013	I yen ban k n yiɛlu po n bo te k n cind g muand’i Laabamann.
48004014	N gbannand bo g mɔg nyuandu, i yen bo g nund’n, i biɛ bo g sinŋ’n. I bo ŋanm g gaal’n nyan yin bo bu gaal Yendu malɛg, lann i kaa Yiesu Kristo mɔno nand nyan i.
48004015	I pamann ŋann ji tɔgn lɛ i ? Yen mɔni, n tie sieda, k l bo gii bu fid, man ne i bo kpigd baa i ninbina mɔno g tie’n o.
48004016	G mɔlane po i, min yaan maad’i mɔni nyan, n ji tie i ninnand yaa aa ?
48004017	Niib nba ŋua g tabd’i nyan, b g ŋua’i yen ŋani kaa. B kpaan k ban paad’i yen’n i, k yin ji tug i kua g cab’b.
48004018	L yen ŋan k yin tug i kua g cab yal nba ŋan i youg kul, l g tie yaa youg nba k n be yen’i kukua kaa.
48004019	N bid, puo n tu bua n mal k l yiɛl’o nand nyan, l yaan biɛ guan g yiɛl n mɔ nnyan i i po, saa yen yaa youg nba k i binbem tan bu nand yen Kristo yal.
48004020	N bo sun k n gii be i buol mɔlane, g bann min bu maad yen’i nand, g dugn l lid’n yen min ji bu tien’i nand i.
48004021	Diid a, yinm nba bua g yiko ń gii mɔg nuu i po nyan, i l gbiɛ yiko n maad yal nba nuan ii ?
48004022	L diɛn g maad k Abraham bo mɔg bijabi banle i. Yonm n bo mal yend, g yua g tie yonm mɔ mal lua.
48004023	Yonm bija malu bo nyiɛ nifosaal buol i, ama yua g tie yonm bija nuan l bo tien nyan Yendu n bo puon nand nyan i.
48004024	L maam tie majɔug u, g mɔg bundl. Banm puob banle ne tie dɔnnu munle nba g Yendu bo suol nyan ninnaɔnŋ u. Cincinn dɔnnu n tie Sinaayi jual po yal, Agaar n tie l dɔnnu binbiug, wano maal yonmi i.
48004025	Agaar n tie Sinaayi jual nba be Arabi tinŋ n ninŋ nyan ninnaɔnŋ. Wano n tie mɔlane Serusalɛm ninnaɔnŋ, g dugn Serusalɛm yen u niib kul be yonmd n i.
48004026	Ama polu po Serusalɛm nuan g be yonmd n. Wano n tie t yaa naa.
48004027	Yen mɔni, l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Fin puoŋɔlg, i kpanm, fin nba g ban g mɔ madyiɛlu, i yign yen pamann, g dugn ban nyɔl puo nba nyan, u bid tan baa yab g cie puobuado bid ».
48004028	N naataani, yinm nuan tie Yendu puoni bid i, nyan Isaak nyan.
48004029	Siɛnyoug, big nba k b bo mal’o nifosaal yanbuam n ninŋ nyan bo diɛ big nba k b bo mal’o Yendu Fuom paalu po g cagn’o i. Mɔlane mɔno, l biɛ l tie nnyan i.
48004030	Yendu Kadaaɔg maad bɛ i ? « Bel g yaan yonm ne yen u bija, l g dagd g yonm bija yen yua g tie yonm bija ń taan g di faal. »
48004031	N naataani, tinm nuan yen g tie yonm bid kaa, t tie yua nba g tie yonm yaa bid i.
48005001	Kristo nyan’ti yonmd n ninŋ k tin yal t kua i canyiin. Lann, ŋanm man gii diɛ k l paa g ji daa guan g kuan i kua yonmd n.
48005002	Ŋanm g cenŋ man ne. Min Pɔl, min n maad’i, i gii ŋaa k b kɔnd’i, Kristo n tien yal nba kul ji kan gii tie siɛl i po.
48005003	N bua n ŋanm g maad’i bonyenn g led: nil nba te k b kɔnd’o kul, l tie mabl i l daan po k wan gii cɔln yiko n bual yal nba kul.
48005004	Yinm nba kpaan k yin gii cɔln yiko g te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ nyan, i paad yen Kristo, g nyan i kua Yendu ŋalbalg n ninŋ n nyan.
48005005	Tinm nuan dug g Foŋanm n bu te k t dindann po tin te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n. Tin daan yal nba n nyan.
48005006	G dugn yua nba be yen Kristo, u gii kɔnd ii, u gii g kɔnd ii, l g pugd siɛl. Bonmɔnn tie g nil ń gii mɔg dindann i, g ŋɔn u buam n ninŋ k u mɔg dindann.
48005007	I bo cil g sonm k l ŋan o, g ŋmaa n ji tan jiɛl i sɔnu g pan’i k i kan fid g cɔln mamɔni i ?
48005008	Yal nba pan’i nyan g nyiɛ Yendu buol kaa, g dugn wano n yiin’i.
48005009	I g ban g dibina waam nne n tu te g kpanu yom kul ń fid ii ?
48005010	Ama Yonmdaan yen te k n yaa pal paa i po, n ban k yin bu mali yal nba kan gii be jiɛg yen n maalm. Ama yua nba n ŋmad i yam nuan, wan l tie yua nba kul, Yendu bu dad u tubl.
48005011	N naataani, k min i ? L bo gii tie mɔni i k n biɛ daa l muand g nil kul ń kɔnd, bɛ po i k b biɛ bo baa ŋɔnŋ’n fala i ? L bo gii tie nnyan, tin muand g Kristo kpe dapunpɔnn po nyan, l ji bo kan gii tie yaalidug sua po.
48005012	Yab nba baad yen ŋmadl i siign nyan taan gii bua ban jiɛl b jatiɛd kul g lu mɔno !
48005013	N naataani, yinm nuan Yendu yiin’i k yin yal i kua i. Ama yin daa ŋaa k l yal‑n‑kua binbem ń te k yin ji gii suun yin niɛn yal nba k l g ŋan nyan. Mɔnd man gii suun g tod i lieb k lan ŋɔn k i bua’b.
48005014	Yendu Kadaaɔg n mɔmaam kul taan g be mɔmayenm ne ninŋ i: « I bua a lua nyan a kua nyan ».
48005015	Ama i gii jund lieb nyan muaɔg n bonkobd nyan, g janmd lieb, yin gii ban k l saa k yin biɛn lieb i.
48005016	Lann, min bua n maad’i yal nba n ne: ŋaa man g Foŋanm ń gii ŋmagd i binbem. Nnyan, i ji kan fid gii suun yin niɛn yal nba k l g ŋan nyan.
48005017	G dugn nifosaal n niɛn yal nba g tuo Foŋanm po. Foŋanm n mɔ n bua yal nba g tuag yen nifosaal buam. Lann bona ŋanle kɔn yen liel i, lann n te k i kan fid g tien yin bua yal nba.
48005018	Ama l gii sua g Foŋanm n ŋmagd’i, lann yiko ji g mɔg nuu i po.
48005019	Nil kul ban nifosaal niɛnbiid n kuand’o bontitied nba ninŋ: lan tie cunconm n ninŋ, jɔgntuona n ninŋ, naayigdm n ninŋ,
48005020	pada n ninŋ, yen nyɔgdinu n ninŋ. L niɛnbiid n tu te g niib pala ŋub b lieb po, k b kɔn yen lieb, g nan lieb, g be yen mutuol, g bua b yal kua, k l baad yen lugdm yen paadu b siign.
48005021	B nuni fu lieb n mɔg yal nba po i. B nyu daam g buog youg kul, g saa jaanm nba ninŋ g sua g so u kua, g tuonbilied biɛ be g naan nnyan k b suun g pugd. N bua n ŋanm g maad’i nii, nyan min daan kpiɛ g maad’i nyan: yab nba suun l tuonbiid g mɔg yiɛl Yendu diem n.
48005022	G nyaan Foŋanm nuan gii ŋmagd nil, wan bu te l daan yal nba u binbem n ninŋ n ne: u baa bua u lieb, g be pamann n, k u yam dua, k u pal sɔnŋ, k u tod lieb, g tie ŋanm, g niib dug u po.
48005023	U baa tie yua nba k u yam dinŋ, k u so u kua. Yendu mɔmaam g be g yie l yaa bona.
48005024	Yiesu Kristo n yen yab nba nuan, banm tug yal nba be b pala n ninŋ g tie nifosaal pakɔnn yen u niɛnbiid kul g kpaa dapunpɔnn po o.
48005025	Foŋanm n yaan tien’ti miɛl nyan, tin ŋaa man k wan gii ŋmagd t binbem mɔ.
48005026	Tin daa bund g donŋ t kua fam, tin ŋaa makpaaɔnŋ yen nanŋ t lieb po.
48006001	N naataani, i gii la k i lua tie biid, yinm nba g Yendu Fuom be i ninŋ nyan ń mɔnd g fuon yam o g ŋmagd l daan g guan yen’o sɔnŋanu n ninŋ. Fin nba ŋmagd a lua nyan ń mɔ ń gii ban a kua po g tan daa baa bignn n ninŋ.
48006002	I tod man i lieb nba k l paa b po. I gii tie nnyan, i cɔln Kristo mɔmaam n nyan.
48006003	Nil gii mali k u tie nigbenŋl g yen g tie siɛl, u bɔnd u kua i.
48006004	Nil kul ń ŋanm g diid wan diɛ u kua nand, yua nba diid g sua k u binbem dagd, u pal bu fid gii man u kua po, ama lan daa tie k u pua g kpabnd u kua yen lua kaa,
48006005	g dugn sua kul tan bu tug u yul po tugl i.
48006006	Yua nba k b tund’o Yendu maam ń bɔgd wan mɔg yal nba g te yua nba tund’o nyan.
48006007	Daa bɔnd man i kua, sua kan fid g laa Yendu. Nil kul n bul yal nba, u tan bu yend lann i.
48006008	Yua nba bul u gbannand n bua yal nba, u tan bu yend yal nba tie gbannand yal i, lan tie kuum. Yua nba bul Foŋanm n bua yal nba, u tan bu yend yal nba tie Foŋanm yal i, lan tie miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
48006009	Lann, tin daa yed k t cɔg yen ŋanm tienu. G dugn t gii g wad t pala, daal gii pund t bu yend tin daan bul yal nba.
48006010	Lann, yaa youg nba k t bu l fid kul, tin gii tie niib kul ŋanm, mandg yab nba tie t naataani Kristo‑yab.
48006011	N tua i la diɛngbenŋi ne waa, min mɔno n diɛn’i yen n nuu.
48006012	Yab nba niind’i k yin kɔnd nyan, banm n ŋɔnŋ b kua g bua niib ń gii pag’b. B suun l kul ne g kpaan k ban lɔgl fala nba g niib laad g dugn ban muand Kristo kuum dapunpɔnn po nyan i.
48006013	Yab nba kɔnd mɔno g cɔln yiko n bual k ban sun yal nba, b bua yin kɔnd k ban ji gii pua jipaad k b kɔnd’i nii.
48006014	Min nuan yen g pua jipaad siɛl po, l gii g tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo kuum dapunpɔnn po i kaa. G dugn l dapunpɔnn po n te g ŋanduna ji g tie siɛl n po, k n mɔ g tie siɛl ŋanduna po.
48006015	K l maa nil gii kɔnd ii, u gii g kɔnd ii, l g pugd siɛl. Yal nba tie bonmɔnn tie k wan guan g te nipaan i.
48006016	Yab nba kul tɔgn l sɔnu yen yab nba tie Yendu buolu yen mɔni, Yendu ń te’b yanduanm g jie’b ninbaaɔg.
48006017	Sua ń ji daa fann g mabn’n, g dugn min gaal fala nba kul, l banm be n gbannand po g ŋɔnŋ g Yiesu n yen’n.
48006018	N naataani, t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad u yedŋanm i po. Amɛnn.
49001001	Yendu yanbuam po i k min Pɔl tie Yiesu Kristo sundu. Min n da kadaaɔg ne, g fuond Yendu n lugd u niib nba k b be Efɛs g dug Yiesu Kristo po yen b pal kul.
49001002	T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po, g te k i yam ń gii dua.
49001003	Yendu sann ń do, wano nba tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo Yendu, g biɛ tie u Baa. U pii’ti Foŋanm paab nba be polu po diem n kul, g dugn tin taan g be yen Kristo po.
49001004	U bo tuod g lugd’ti g sua k u daa g tag ŋanduna, k tin taan gii be yen Kristo gii ŋan canyiin, g daa mɔg siɛl yaa biid u nunŋ n ninŋ. U buam n ninŋ,
49001005	u bo tuod g juab’ti k tin te u bid Yiesu Kristo po. U yam n bo suol k u bua yal nba n nyan.
49001006	Lann, t gii dond man Yendu k l maa u pii’ti paab nba mɔg yudand, g dugn u Bibuadg po.
49001007	Yiesu n wul u sɔm g nyan’ti bonbiil n ninŋ, g piin t biid. Nnyan i g Yendu ŋɔn’ti k u ŋalbalg g mɔg po.
49001008	L ŋalbalg po i k u tie’ti yanfuom yen ninfanm bonn kul n ninŋ.
49001009	Yendu n bo tuod g bobn yal nba yen u yanbuam k u bu te Kristo n tien, l youg tan gii pund nyan, u ji ŋɔn’ti l ŋasiil n nyan. Lann n tie k wan taan yal nba be polu po yen yal nba be tinŋ n ninŋ kul, g Kristo ń gii tie l kul yudaan.
49001011	Kristo n ninŋ i, g Yendu nba suun bonn kul, nyan u yam n bua nand nyan, bo tuod g lugd’ti, k tin mɔ ń gii tie u yab.
49001012	K tinm nba n bo cind g daan Kristo ninŋ ń gii dond Yendu g dugn u yudand po.
49001013	I mɔ n yaan bo cenŋ mamɔni maam, lann n tie Laabamann nba tien’i fielu, i bo tuo g gaal wano Kristo i, g Yendu tien u banm i po. L banm tie, k u tie’i wan bo puon Foŋanm nba.
49001014	Tin gaal Foŋanm nba ne, lann n ŋɔn k t bu di faal nba g Yendu bo bil g guun u niib nba k u tan bu nyan’m bonbiil n ninŋ canyiin. Lann, t gii dond man Yendu yudand.
49001015	L po n te min yaan gbad k i mɔg dindann nba Yonmdaan Yiesu n ninŋ, yen yin bua Kristo‑yab kul nand,
49001016	k n tiend Yendu balg youg kul i po. N tiɛn i po n jaandi n ninŋ,
49001017	g miɛd t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo Yendu, t Baa nba tie yudanddaan, k wan te’i Foŋanm, k l Foŋanm ń te’i yanfuom, g fand’i, g ŋɔn’i Yendu, k yin ŋanm g bann’o.
49001018	N biɛ miɛd’o k wan fand’i, k yin fid g bann wan yiin’i dindann nba po, g bann g faal nba k i bu di yen u niib ŋan g biɛ yab bonciɛnn.
49001019	I bu bann u paaciɛnu nba g mɔg lua, k u tien tinm nba dug u po. L paaciɛnu i,
49001020	k u bo ŋɔn Kristo n ninŋ, yaa youg nba k u bo yied’o kpienm siign ninŋ, g kaan’o u jendu yudand kinkaanu po, polu po.
49001021	L buol i k wano Kristo ji be yal l be polu po kul liig, yikodanm liig, paaludanm liig, yen yab nba mɔg yudand kul liig. U sann n lii sana nba g nil bu fid g taa kul. L g tie ŋanduna ne ninŋ kua kaa, lann n be liig ŋanduna nba baad ninŋ mɔ.
49001022	Yendu te g bonn kul gbaan dunn Kristo nintual n ninŋ, g tug’o g tien’o Kristo Tintaanu kul yudaan.
49001023	L Tintaanu n tie Kristo gbannand. Lann n taan yen’o k u tie u munn kul, wano nba be bonn kul n ninŋ, kaannaa kul.
49002001	Siɛnyoug Yendu bo g be yen’i, g dugn i tudm yen i tuonbiid po.
49002002	I bo suun yin bua yal i, nyan ŋanduna ne niib nyan, g ŋua polu po cicilbiɛdi canbaa. L cicilg n be mɔlane niib nba g cɔln Yendu n ninŋ, g suun tuonn.
49002003	T kul, t mɔ bo tie nyan banm nyan i, g suun lan tol’ti k tin sun yal nba. T gbannand yen t cicili n bua yal nba, t bo suun lann i. Tin bo be yaa binbem nyan, t bo g mɔg ciɛlu, Yendu mutuol bo tan bu lag t po i, nyan lan bu lag lieb nba tenn po nand nyan.
49002004	Ama Yendu n jie’ti ninbaaɔg, g biɛ ŋanm g buad’ti po i,
49002005	k u te k t guan g fo g dugn Kristo po, k t biid yen bo te k t kpe o. Yendu ŋalbalg po i, k i la fielu.
49002006	Tin be yen Yiesu Kristo po n te k u taan g yied’ti k tin di bal yen’o polu po diem n ninŋ.
49002007	U tien nnyan g niib kul ń bann g youg nba baad n ninŋ, u bu ŋɔn k u bua’ti yaa buam nba g mɔg po g dugn Yiesu Kristo po.
49002008	K l maa Yendu ŋalbalg po yen i dindann po i, k i la fielu. L g tie i paalu po kaa, l tie Yendu paab i.
49002009	L g tie i tuona nyuad kaa. Lann sua ń daa pua jipaad l po.
49002010	G dugn wano Yendu n te k t guan g te nipaanm Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ, k t binbem n ninŋ tin gii suun tuonŋana nba k u bo tuod g bobn t po.
49002011	I tiɛn man k ban mal’i k i g tie Suif‑nba, g biɛ g kɔnd b kɔnd nyan, siɛnyoug Suif‑nba bo yi’i buolfanu yab i, g yi b kua Yendu niib g dugn nifosaal nuu suun b gbannand po g kɔnd’b.
49002012	L youg, i bo fag yen Kristo. I bo tie saanm i g g mɔg yiɛl Israyɛl buolu yab siign ninŋ. Yendu n bo puon puoni g suol dɔnnu nba yen u buolu mɔ, i biɛ bo g be l n ninŋ. I bo g mɔg siɛl yaa dindann, i biɛ bo g mɔg Yendu mɔ ŋanduna n ninŋ.
49002013	Ama mɔlane yin taan yen Yiesu Kristo nyan, yinm nba bo be fagm kul ji nagn, k l maa Kristo wul u sɔm g yid salg i po.
49002014	Wano mɔno n te g Suif‑nba yen yab g tie Suif‑nba taan g tie buolyenu kukua g manu baal t po. Wan cab u gbannand nyan, u mud guonn nba bo paad’b g te k b tie ninnanda n nyan.
49002015	U te k ban bo diɛn Suif‑nba yiko kadaaɔg nba yen kɔa nba be l n ninŋ kul ji g tie siɛl. U tien nnyan k l buoli yinle kul ń taan g te buolpaanu i u ninŋ, buolyenu kukua, g sua kul ń gii be u yam n.
49002016	U kpe dapunpɔnn po i g taan banm banle gbannanyend n ninŋ, g te k b guan g manŋ yen Yendu, k u buon nanŋ nba bo be b siign ninŋ.
49002017	Kristo baal k wan muand’i laabaal nba bu te i yam ń duan i ; yinm buolfanu yab nba bo fag yen Yendu yen Suif‑nba nba bo kɔb yen Yendu kul.
49002018	Kristo po i k tinm Suif‑nba yen yab g tie Suif‑nba kul kon bu fid g tɔgn sɔnyenu g nagn t Baa nunŋ n ninŋ yen Foŋanm todl.
49002019	I ji g tie saanm kaa, i biɛ ji g tie dingbanfann yab mɔ kaa, yinm yen Yendu niib kul ji tie doyenu n yab i, i ji tie Yendu cugl n bid i.
49002020	I mɔ ji tie ŋaag i g sie, g Yiesu sundi yen Yendu sogni‑nba tie l fiɛgl, g Yiesu Kristo mɔno tie l ŋaag fiɛgl tanjal.
49002021	Wano n te g ŋaag sie g paa, k b maa k l kped g do, g bu te ŋaag nba baa tie Yonmdaan kukua yal.
49002022	Yinm yen wano n taan po i k b tug i mɔ, k i kul ji taan g te ŋaag nba tie Yendu binbebuol, k u Foŋanm be l n ninŋ.
49003001	L po n te g Yiesu Kristo po, k min Pɔl te dansalg g dugn yinm buolfanu yab po.
49003002	I yen baa gbad Yendu buam n ninŋ wan bil’n tuonn nba k n gii suun i po.
49003003	Wano n dɔgd g ŋɔn’n wan bobn yal nba k l be wuol n ninŋ. N bo da g maad’i l ŋasiil po n nyan mɔlane.
49003004	I gii lii kadaaɔg ne, i bu fid g bann min mɔg banm nba Kristo ŋasiil po.
49003005	Youg n ninŋ, Yendu bo g ŋɔn niib l ŋasiil. Mɔlane i, k u ji te g Foŋanm dɔgd l ŋasiil, g ŋɔn wano Yendu n lugd yab nba g tien’m u sundi yen u sogni‑nba.
49003006	L ŋasiil tie g Laabamann po te g buolfanu yab bu taan g di faal yen Suif‑nba, b kul ń taan gii tie gbannanyend, g taan g yend Yendu n bo puon k u bu tien yal nba Yiesu Kristo po.
49003007	Yendu n yaan bua’n po n te k u tie’n u paalu, g cab’n k n te u tuonsunn g muand u Laabamann.
49003008	Kristo‑yab n ninŋ min n ji l ŋanm g juod canyiin. Ama min i g Yendu pii’n u paab, k n muand buolfanu yab, g Kristo n mɔg bonŋana nba tie ŋalman nba g mɔg po,
49003009	k min fand niib kul, k ban bann Yendu nba tie bonn kul tagtua n bu tien bona nand, wan bo bobn k u bu tien yal nba, k l tie ŋasiil g be u ninŋ hal bina nba g mɔg dugl.
49003010	Mɔlane k u ji bua g yab nba be polu po g mɔg yikod yen yab nba mɔg paalu kul ń la Kristo Tintaanu buol g bann g Yendu yanfuom be jiɛg jiɛg g yab bonciɛnn.
49003011	Yendu n bo tuod g bobn k u bu tien yal nba hal bina nba g mɔg dugl nyan, u ji tien l kul t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ i g dud.
49003012	Tin taan g be yen Kristo g biɛ dug u po n te k t bu fid g nagn Yendu, youg kul, k t pala biɛ paa u po.
49003013	L po n te k n maad’i k yin daa ŋaa i pala ń wad g dugn min laad fala nba i po. L kul ne tie k lan don yinm i.
49003014	L po n te k n gbaand t Baa Yendu nintual n ninŋ,
49003015	wano nba tie yab nba be polu po yen yab nba be tinŋ n ninŋ kul Baa,
49003016	n miɛd’o, k wano nba mɔg yudand bonn kul n ninŋ ń te k u Foŋanm ń ŋanm g pugn’i u paalu k i pala ń cie.
49003017	G Kristo ń gii be i pala n ninŋ, g dugn i dindann po. N miɛd’o g buam ń gii tie fiɛgl nba po k i sie, k yin kpaa jiina l buam po gii sie k l paa.
49003018	Nnyan i k yinm yen Kristo‑yab nba tenn kul bu fid g bann Kristo buam n yaln, g fag, g kped g biɛ nyua nand.
49003019	I bu bann Kristo buam, nnyan i g Yendu bu kua i ninŋ g yend i munn kul, ama i yen kan l fid g bann l buam kul g gbenn.
49003020	Yendu nba k u paalu suun t ninŋ, g bu fid g tien yal nba yab hal bonciɛnn g cie tin bu fid g miɛl’o yal yen tin bu fid g mali yal mɔno,
49003021	yudand ń gii tie u yal Kristo Tintaanu n ninŋ yen Kristo n ninŋ, youg ń tuu youg saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog. Amɛnn.
49004001	Lann min nba tie dansalg g dugn Yonmdaan po, n paand i pala k i binbem ń gii ŋan nyan wan yiin’i g bua k yin gii be nand nyan.
49004002	I jiind man i kua youg kul, gii mɔg pasɔnŋl yen mindl, gii mɔg sugl i lieb po. Yin gii tie l kul ne buam n ninŋ.
49004003	Foŋanm te g manu be i siign ninŋ k i mɔg mɔtaaɔg ; mɔnd man gii kub l mɔtaaɔg.
49004004	T kul taan g tie gbannanyend kua i. Foŋanm mɔ tie yend kua i. Yendu n yiin’i dindann nba po mɔ biɛ tie yenn kua i.
49004005	Yonmdanyeno kukua n be, tin dug yal nba ninŋ tie yenn i, nyunwulu bogdl tie yenn i,
49004006	Yenduyeno kua n be g tie niib kul Baa, g mɔg yikod niib kul po, g be b kul n ninŋ, g suun u tuonn.
49004007	Ama t ninŋ sua kul gaal u yul po paab k l dagd yen Kristo n jag nand g pii sua kul i.
49004008	Nyan lan kon bo diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad nand nyan: « Wan duo hal polu polu yaa youg, u tug yonmi i g duo yen’m, g biɛ pii niib paab. »
49004009	« U duo » ŋann niimn ii ? L bua n maad k u bo kpiɛ g jiid hal tinŋ tinŋ po mɔ i.
49004010	Yua nba bo jiid nyan, wano n biɛ duo g daan pend polu yaa polu, k wan fid gii mɔg nuu bonn kul po kaannaa kul.
49004011	Wano n pii niib paab jiɛg jiɛg. U te g yenm tie u sundi, g lieb tie Yendu sogni‑nba, g lieb tie Yendu mamuanda, g lieb tie Kristo‑yab tintaanu canbaa‑nba, g lieb mɔ tie yab tund Yendu maam.
49004012	U bo tien nnyan g bua k wan bobn Kristo‑yab kul, g sua kul ń fid g sun u tuonn, g Kristo‑yab nba tie u gbannand nyan ń gii sie k l paa.
49004013	Nnyan i k t kul tan bu taan gii dug bonyenn po kua, k t banm Yendu Bija n ninŋ mɔ ja. L bu sua k t ji tie cegdkab i, g ji nand yen Kristo g gbenn canyiin.
49004014	L youg t ji kan gii tie bid kaa, g faaɔgdanm bɔnd’ti, g diɛ b tundl g pua g piɛd’ti g saa yen’ti ban bua naan buol kul, nyan nyunguona n tu tugd ŋadnbid nand nyan. B tie nnyan i g bɔnd niib yen b faaɔg tundl g kuand’b tudm n ninŋ.
49004015	Ama tinm nuan baa bua t lieb i, gii maad mamɔni Laabamann po. Nnyan i, k t baa kped bonn kul n ninŋ, g nand yen yua nba tie t Yudaan, lan tie Kristo.
49004016	Wano n te g gbannand bɔga kul taan g tuug yen liel‑nba lan bual nand, g dugn tugda be g diɛ bɔgl kul yen liel k l paa. Bɔgl kul gii suun u tuonn, gbannand baa kped i g cieg g dugn buam nba be b ninŋ nyan po.
49004017	Lann t Yonmdaan sann po, n bu maad’i bonyenn, g bua k yin ŋanm g gbad l niimn: i yaa binbem ń ji daa tie nyan yab g ban Yendu nyan. Banm sonm yen b yul po maalm i, k l g mɔg lan saa yen’m naan buol.
49004018	B maalm be bunbɔnn n i, b g ban siɛl, b biɛ g be Yendu n tien manpaann nba nyan ninŋ, g dugn yanbɔnm yen kangbadm yend b pala.
49004019	B ji g ban yal tie fai, b sun tuonkpiɛda kul, g ji kan fid g suol b kua yen jɔgnd tuona sunu.
49004020	Yinm nuan yen g bann Kristo nnyan kaa.
49004021	Yin gbad k b maad yal nba kon gii tie u po, ban tund’i yal nba gii nyiɛ u buol, g tuag yen mamɔni nba be wano Yiesu n ninŋ,
49004022	l tie k yin ŋaa i tɔgbiiug nba k i bo tu mɔg siɛnyoug u. Niɛnbiid n bo te k i mɔg l tɔgbiiug, k l bɔnd g kuand’i tudm n ninŋ.
49004023	L tie k yin ji pand i pala yen i maalm kul i canyiin,
49004024	g guan g te nipaanm, gii naan yen Yendu nba tag’i, g mamɔni ń te k i binbem ń gii tuag mɔnkund yen ŋand sɔnu.
49004025	L po n te k l bual k i kul ń ŋaa faaɔg. Sua kul ń gii maad u lua mɔni, g dugn t kul taan g tie gbannanyend i.
49004026	I pal gii bie, yin suol i kua g daa tie biid. Daa ŋaa man yendu ń baa k i biɛ daa be yen l mutuol.
49004027	Daa luod man sɔnu g te Sitaan.
49004028	Yua nba tu jaan ń ji daa jaan. Wan tien mɔndl g la tuonn gii suun yen papienn g laad wan bua yal nba, g biɛ tod tali.
49004029	Mabiid ń daa nya i mɔb n ninŋ. I maad man mamɔnm kua, yal nba bu fid g tod lieb k b pala ń ŋanm g paag, g yab nba cenŋ yin maad yal nba ń fid g do nyuad i maam po.
49004030	Daa ŋaa man g Yendu Foŋanm pal ń biil. G dugn Foŋanm n tie banm nba g Yendu tien i po, k l ŋɔnŋ g daal baad k u bu nyan’i bonbiil n ninŋ canyiin.
49004031	Buon man i siign ninŋ pabɔnn, pabienn, mutuol, tintandi, sugd yen yal l tie tonu kul.
49004032	I tie man i lieb ŋanm, gii jie’b ninbaaɔg. I di man sugl i lieb po nyan Yendu ń mɔ n yaan dii sugl i po g dugn Kristo po nyan.
49005001	Yin yaan tie Yendu bibuadi nyan, lann mɔnd man gii togd’o.
49005002	I binbem n ninŋ buam ń gii be, nyan Kristo n buad’ti, g tug u kua g cab t po nyan paab nyan, k l tie nyan salg nba k l nublu man Yendu po nyan.
49005003	Yinm tie Kristo‑yab i, lann l ji g dagd g nil ń gbad cunconm maam i siign, lann i kaa k i tie siɛl yaa jɔgnd bontitied, lann i kaa k i ninŋ sua mɔg kunkuam.
49005004	L biɛ g dagd g mayuyuod, lann i kaa mafinfam, lann i kaa siɛl yaa majɔgnd ń gii nya i mɔb n ninŋ. Yal n dagd tie k yin gii tiend Yendu balg i.
49005005	Ŋanm man gii ban g nil nba suun cuncontuonn, lann i kaa jɔgnd tuonn, lann i kaa yua nba mɔg kunkuam (kunkuam tie padl i l daan po), l nil g mɔg yiɛl Kristo yen Yendu diem n ninŋ.
49005006	Daa ŋaa man sua ń tug mafinfam g bɔnd’i. L bontitied po n te g Yendu mutuol bu lag yab nba yie g g cɔlm’o po.
49005007	Yinm yen l nibuolu ń daa taa baa siɛl.
49005008	Siɛnyoug, i bo be bunbɔnn n ninŋ i. Ama mɔlane yin be yen Yonmdaan nyan, i ji tie yinyiem n ninŋ yab i. Ŋɔn man i binbem n ninŋ k i kon tie yinyiem n ninŋ niib.
49005009	K l maa yinyiem n te g nil tie ŋanmbuolu kul, g tie yal nba ŋan g dagd, g maad mɔni.
49005010	Mɔnd man g bann yal nba ŋan Yonmdaan po.
49005011	Daa kuand man i nui bunbɔnn tuona n ninŋ, k l yen g mɔg siɛl yaa nyuad. Yal nba be bunbɔnn n kul, yin te k lan legd yinyiem n ninŋ.
49005012	L taan mɔg fai mɔno yen nil ń maad l niib n suun yal nba bunbɔnn n ninŋ.
49005013	Ama nil gii maad ban suun yal, l tuona kul ji tu legd yinyiem n i,
49005014	g dugn yal nba legd yinyiem n ninŋ kul ji tie yinyiem yal i. L po n te k l diɛn g maad: « Fiil, fin nba guand ne, nya kpienm siign g Kristo yinyiem ń fand’a. »
49005015	Lann, ŋanm man gii ban yin sonm nand i binbem n ninŋ. Yin daa bund g be nyan yanbɔndanm nyan kaa, i ceg man.
49005016	Youg nba k i bu fid g tien bonŋann kul, yin gbaa g tien, g dugn tin be yaa youg ne ji biɛ.
49005017	Lann, daa be man nyan yab nba g mɔg yam nyan kaa, mɔnd g bann man Yonmdaan n bua yin gii be nand.
49005018	Daa tu nyu man daam g buo, dibuond nuan kuand nil muaɔg u. Ŋaa man g Foŋanm ń yend i munn kul.
49005019	I paand man i lieb pala yen biɛyani yen Yendu dondl yani yen Foŋanm n ŋɔn’i yani nba. I yiin man g dond Yonmdaan yen i pala kul.
49005020	T Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sann po, i tiend man t Baa Yendu balg youg kul, bonn kul po.
49005021	I jiind man i kua i lieb buol k lan ŋɔn k i cɔln Kristo.
49005022	Puob, i jiind man i kua i salb buol, nyan yin jiind i kua nand t Yonmdaan buol nyan.
49005023	G dugn jua n tie puo yudaan, nyan Kristo n tie u Tintaanu yudaan nyan. Kristo Tintaanu n tie u gbannand, k wano Kristo tie l gbannand Fietua.
49005024	Nyan Kristo Tintaanu n jiin u kua nand Kristo nintual n ninŋ nyan, puob mɔ bu jiin b kua nnyan i b salb nintual n, bonn kul n ninŋ.
49005025	Yinm puodanm mɔ ń gii bua i puob nyan Kristo n buad u Tintaanu nand g tuo g kpe u po nyan.
49005026	U bo tien nnyan k wan ŋanm u Tintaanu g gbenn i. U bo tug nyum yen Yendu maam i, g ŋanm u Tintaanu g nyan u jɔgnd kul.
49005027	U bo bua k wan guan g tug u Tintaanu g te u kua, k u ŋan i canyiin g tuud, g siɛl yaa tenml g be u po, k u ŋali g g mɔg yal biil u ŋand. U bo bua wan gii ŋan g gbenn g g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd i.
49005028	Lann, l bual g puodanm mɔ ń gii bua b puob nyan ban bua b gbannand mɔno nand nyan i. Yua nba bua u puo, u bua u kua i.
49005029	Sua yen g ban g nund u gbannand. Yua kul ŋub u gbannand, g ŋanmd’o nyan Kristo n mɔ n diɛ u Tintaanu nand nyan i,
49005030	g dugn t kul n taan g tie u gbannand.
49005031	Yendu Kadaaɔg kon maad lann n nyan: « L po n te g jua tu bu nya g ŋaa u naa yen u baa g taan yen u ŋaapuo, banm banle ń ji taan gii tie gbannanyend kua. »
49005032	Makɔnm ne nyua hal bonciɛnn. Min yen ban k l nyuan Kristo yen u Tintaanu i.
49005033	Ama l maam biɛ nyuan i mɔ. Puodaan kul ń gii bua u puo nyan u kua nyan. Puo kul ń mɔ ń gii cɔln u sal.
49006001	Yinm bid, i cɔln man i danm nyan Yonmdaan n bua nand nyan. Lan bual nand n nyan.
49006002	« Cɔln a naa yen a baa » lann n tie Yendu mɔmacincinn, g ji pugn puoni ne:
49006003	« Nnyan i k a baa be a yam n, g la manfagl tinŋ po ne. »
49006004	Yinm bibaa‑nba mɔ ń daa tie man i bid yal nba bu nyan b yam, b pala ń be i po. I kub’b man, gii tien’m cegli g ŋmagd’b nyan Yonmdaan n bua nand nyan.
49006005	Yinm yonmi, i cɔln man yab nba tie i canbaa‑nba ŋanduna ne ninŋ, gii jie’b, g jegl b nunŋ n. I suun man b tuona yen i pala kul nyan i suun Kristo po nyan.
49006006	L g tie yaa youg nba k b nyuan’i kua kaa k i tu bu ŋanm gii suun b tuona, nyan i bua k i manŋ b pala nyan. I suun man yen i pala kul nyan Kristo yonmi nba kpaan k ban tien Yendu buam nyan.
49006007	I suun man yen pamann, k lan gii tie nyan i suun Yonmdaan po i, g daa tie nifosaal po kaa.
49006008	I tiɛn man g Yendu tan bu ŋmiɛn yua kul u ŋanm nyuad i, yua tie yonm yen yua g tie yonm kul.
49006009	Yinm yonmdanm, yin mɔ ń ŋanm gii diɛ i yonmi. Daa ŋua’b man yen ninmɔnn. I yen ban k yinm yen banm kul taa Yonmdaan i, yua nba be polu po. Wano g mɔg lugdm.
49006010	Min bu juod g maad yal n ne: i kpaan man i paalu Yonmdaan buol, k u paaciɛnu ń te k yin ŋanm g paag.
49006011	Juab man Yendu n tie’i jakɔntiɛd nba kul, g fid gii sie k l paa, g nya Sitaan ninfansɔni n ninŋ.
49006012	Tin mɔg kunkɔnn yen yab nba g tie yab mɔg gbannand yen sɔm kaa. Tin baa kɔn yen yab nba tie ŋanduna ne ninŋ bunbɔnn n yudanm, yen l yikodanm yen l paaludanm, yen polu po cicilbiɛdi i.
49006013	Lann juab man Yendu n tie’i jakɔntiɛd nba kul, gii sie k l paa, g dabiiug daal yin fid g kɔn g nya l n ninŋ g biɛ l sie.
49006014	Lann, i sie man k l paa. Tug man mamɔni k lan te i gbann k i lol i siɛg n, g tug mɔnkund k lan te i kudliɛdl.
49006015	I pala ń gii kɔn k yin gii muand Laabamann nba te g nil yam dua. L pakɔnn n baa tie i taacaad k i pil.
49006016	Tug man dindann youg kul, k lan gii tie gbankɔnŋl nba k i tu bu tegn g junn Bonbiildaan n yeg’i pieni nba kul k l so muu nyan.
49006017	Tuo man fielu k lan gii tie i kudfeglg. Yendu maam ń gii tie i po jugfuaɔg nba g Foŋanm tien.
49006018	I jaand man youg kul, g Foŋanm ń gii ŋmagd’i i jaandi n ninŋ yen yin miɛd yal nba kul ninŋ. Ŋanm man gii ceg i kua po, gii jaand yen ninmɔnn Kristo‑yab kul po.
49006019	I jaand man n mɔ yaa po, k n tu gii yaad mɔb, Yendu ń ŋɔn’n min bu maad yal nba, k n fid g muand ŋasiil nba wuo Laabamann n ninŋ g daa jie siɛl.
49006020	L po i k n tie Yiesu sundu g ji be dansaldieog n ne. Lann, i jaand man k n fid g muand l Laabamann lan bual nand, g daa jie siɛl.
49006021	N bua k i mɔ ń bann min be nand yen min suun yal nba. Lann, t ninja Tisiik nba k n bua’ɔg bonciɛnn, k u suun t Yonmdaan tuonn yen papienn bu baal g te’i laabaal nba be kul.
49006022	L po n ŋanm g te k n sun’o i buol k wan ŋɔn’i tin be nand, g biɛ paan i pala.
49006023	T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń te k yinm Kristo‑yab kul yam ń gii dua, g biɛ te’i buam yen dindann.
49006024	Yendu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen yab nba n bua t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo buam nba g mɔg juodu.
50001001	Min Pɔl yen Timote, tinm nba tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunna n da kadaaɔg ne, g tien yab nba be Filiip g tug b kua g cab Yiesu Kristo g tie Yendu niib nyan, yen b Kristo‑yab liig yab yen b todkab.
50001002	Yendu t Baa yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po g biɛ te k i yam ń gii dua.
50001003	Youg nba kul k n tiɛd i po, n tu tien n Yendu balg i.
50001004	N jaandi kul n ninŋ, yen pamann i k n tu jaand i kul po,
50001005	g dugn, lan cil dacincinn daal saa yen mɔlane, i tod’n k n muand Laabamann.
50001006	N pal ŋanm g paa g Yendu n cil tuonŋann nba i pal n ninŋ ne, k u bu tugn l tuonn g daan juod daal nba g Yiesu Kristo tan bu guan.
50001007	L dagd yen k n gii mɔg l maalm i po, g dugn n pal siɛd i po. N gii be dansaldieog n ii, n gii kɔn Laabamann po, g gbaa k l Laabamann ń kal niib pala n ii, Yendu tu diid min yen yinm kul yen nunmanŋ.
50001008	Yen mɔni, Yendu tie n sieda k n bua’i yen n pal kul nyan Yiesu Kristo n bua’i nand nyan.
50001009	Jaandi nba k n jaand i po n ne: n miɛd Yendu g buam nba be i siign ninŋ ń gii pugd g saa. K l buam ń tod’i k yin bann mamɔni g fid g gann yal tie bonmɔnn kul.
50001010	Nnyan i, k i bu fid g lugd yal nba ŋanm g mɔn, g daal nba g Kristo tan bu guan, yin daa mɔg siɛl yaa biid g bual siɛl yaa jalgi.
50001011	Yen Yiesu Kristo paalu po, i baa l suun tuona nba tuag mamɔni sɔnu kua i, g yudand yen dondl ń gii tie Yendu yal.
50001012	N naataani, n bua k i bann g yal nba baal’n ne biɛ tod yen mɔni g Laabamann ń gad liig i.
50001013	L po n te g sijenm nba guu Rom gobna ŋaag, yen niib nba tenn kul ban k min tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunn po n te k n be dansalg.
50001014	Ban suol’n suod nba ne te k n ninjanm Kristo‑yab bonciɛnn ŋanm g dug Yonmdaan po. Nnyan, b ŋanm g la papaal g muand Yendu maam g g jie siɛl.
50001015	L tie mɔni i, g yenm muand Kristo Laabamann g dugn b nan’n i, g biɛ be yen mɔniɛɔg. Ama lieb nuan muand yen b pal kul i.
50001016	B muand yen buam g dugn b ban g Yendu lugd min i k n kɔn Laabamann po.
50001017	Yab nba muand g kpaan k ban gaal n liig nyan nuan g muand yen maalŋanm kaa, b mali k b bu tien nnyan i, g pugn n cicagm dansaldieog n ninŋ.
50001018	Ama l kul ne yen g biil baa siɛl. Ban muand yen maalŋanm ii, ban muand yen maalbiiug uu, yal n tie bonmɔnn tie k b l muand Kristo Laabamann i. L po n te k n pal man. N pal biɛ baa l tund g man nnyan i.
50001019	G dugn n ban k i jaandi yen Yiesu Kristo Fuom todl po, l kul ne bu te min ciɛl.
50001020	Min guu yal nba g daan yen n pal kul tie k min daa di fai baa siɛl n ninŋ. Ama n pal ń gii paa bonciɛnn k n bu don Kristo sann yen n munn kul mɔlane yen youg kul l gii tie k n kpe lann i kaa n gii fo.
50001021	G dugn min yaa po, n binbem tie Kristo i, k n kuum tie n nyuad.
50001022	Ama l gii tie k n mɔg miɛl g be, g bu fid g sun tuonmɔnn, lann, n ji g ban min bu gann yal nba.
50001023	Bona ŋanle nba diɛl’n n ne: n sun k min kpe gii be yen Kristo o. Lann n baa su n po.
50001024	Ama i yaa po i k l ŋanm g tie bonmɔnn k min gii be g mɔg miɛl.
50001025	Min la k l tie bonmɔnn i po nyan, n ban k n baa be g mɔg miɛl. N baa be yen i kul gii tod’i, k i saa liig g biɛ gii be yen pamann dindann n ninŋ.
50001026	Nnyan, n tan gii guan i buol youg nba, n po bu te i pala ń biɛ guan g ŋanm g manŋ yen yin be yen Yiesu Kristo.
50001027	Mɔnd man gii be binbem nba tuag Kristo Laabamann sɔnu. Nnyan, l gii tie k n baal g la’i, bii k n l g baal mɔno, min gbad k i l ŋanm g sie dindann n, g taa mɔb g biɛ taan yen payenn g gbaa k i kub dindann nba be Laabamann n ninŋ.
50001028	Biɛ daa ŋaa man i ninnanda ń gii jiend’i. Lann n bu ŋɔn’m k b tuag tudm sɔnu, g yen ŋɔn yinm nuan k i tuag fielu sɔnu. Lann nya Yendu buol i.
50001029	G dugn Yendu g tie’i u ŋalbalg k i gii mɔg dindann kua kaa Kristo n ninŋ, ama k yin gii laad fala mɔ u po,
50001030	gii gbaa gbigbaal nba k i daan la k n gbaa, g biɛ daa l gbaa yen mɔlane k i ban nyan.
50002001	I dindann Kristo n ninŋ pugd’i papaal ii ? K u buam i, l sɔnŋd i pala aa ? Manu be yinm yen u Foŋanm n ninŋ ii ? I mɔg buam i lieb po g biɛ jie’b ninbaaɔg uu ?
50002002	Lann, n miɛd’i k yin mɔnd gii taa mɔb, gii bua i lieb, g mɔnd i pal ń gii kɔn bonyenn po, yin biɛ gii mɔg maalyenm kua. Nnyan i, k i bu ŋanm g manŋ n pal.
50002003	Daa kpaan man k i gii be i lieb kul liig lann i kaa k yin gii donŋ i kua finfam. Ama i jiind man i kua, g sua kul ń gii nyuan k u lua cie’og,
50002004	g biɛ daa kpaan u yul po nyuad kaa, ama gii kpaan u lieb kul yaa nyuad.
50002005	I mɔg man maalm nba g Yiesu Kristo bo mɔg:
50002006	Wano nba, hal lan cil o, wano yen Yendu kul bo tie yenm i, u bo g kpaan k wan tug u kua g sen Yendu sinsienu n ninŋ.
50002007	Ama u bo jiin u kua i, g tien u kua yonm, g nand u kua yen nifosaal, g te nifuog g baal.
50002008	U bo jiin u kua hal bonciɛnn, g cɔln saa yen u kuum, u kuum dapunpɔnn po.
50002009	L po n te g Yendu don’o, g tie’og yudand nba cie yudand kul, g biɛ tie’og sann nba cie sana kul,
50002010	g yab nba kul be polu po yen tinŋ n ninŋ yen tinkpiiug po, gii gbad wano Yiesu sann, ban gbaan dunn,
50002011	g sua kul ń biɛ maad k wano Yiesu Kristo n tie Yonmdaan k lan gii tie t Baa Yendu dondl.
50002012	Lann, n dɔnn‑nba, min daan tu be i buol k i cɔlm’n nand nba nyan, l bual k i ŋanm gii cɔlm’n mɔlane nba k n g be yen’i ne i. I suun man yin mɔg fielu nba po yen jijei, yen cɔlunŋ.
50002013	G dugn Yendu suun tuonn i pala n ninŋ g bu te i pala ń gii kɔn u tuona po g biɛ te yin gii suun wan bobn yal nba i po.
50002014	Yin suun yal nba kul, bunbulmi yen mɔniɛɔg ń daa be l n.
50002015	Nnyan, i kan gii mɔg siɛl yaa biid. I baa tie Yendu bid nba g mɔg ban bu jalg’b yal nba po, ŋanduna ne ninŋ faaɔgdanm yen nibiid sinsiign. B siign ninŋ, i nyili nyan polu po ŋmaabid nyan i,
50002016	g ŋɔnŋ’b maam nba tien miɛl. L gii tie k i suun nnyan, daal nba g Kristo tan bu guan, n pal bu manŋ i po u nunŋ n ninŋ, g dugn l bu ŋɔn k n nantaal yen n fala kul g te fam.
50002017	I dindann tie nyan salg nyan i, k i yid Yendu. L gii tie k b kpii’n, n sɔm baa tie nyan paab nyan g pugn i salg po. L gii tie k l bu tien nnyan, n pal bu manŋ, min biɛ kpanm yen pamann yen i kul.
50002018	Mɔ ń manŋ man i pala, g biɛ gii kpanm yen’n.
50002019	L gii tie Yonmdaan Yiesu buam n, l kan wai yen min sun Timote i buol. Nnyan i k n bu gbad i laabaal, k n yam ń fid g duan.
50002020	Wano kua i kaa, sua g be ne g mali nyan min nyan, k u pal biɛ siɛd i po yen mɔni.
50002021	Yab nba tenn kul, sua kul gbaa yen u yul po yal i. Baa sua g nyuan yal nba tie Yiesu Kristo yal.
50002022	Yinm mɔno, i ban g Timote ŋɔn k u tie yua nba k b baa dug u po i. I biɛ ban wan sun yen’n nand, Laabamann muandu po. U sun yen’n nyan big n tu suun yen u baa nand nyan i.
50002023	Lann, n mali k n sun wano i i buol, youg nba k n bann n maam n bu juod nand.
50002024	N dug Yonmdaan po, k l kan wai yen min mɔno ń baal i buol.
50002025	N diid g sua k l tie bonmɔnn i yen k n sun t ninja Epafrodit i buol, wano nba k i daan sun’o k u baal yen todl nba k n bua, wano n taand’n k t suun tuonn g biɛ kɔn jad Laabamann po.
50002026	U pal ŋanm g kɔn k wan la i kul, g dugn u yam g dua yen yin daan gbad k u yiɛl.
50002027	U daan l yiɛl nuan i yen mɔni, g tan bua n kpe mɔno. Ama Yendu daan jie’og ninbaaɔg. U daan g jie wano kukua kaa, u daan jie n mɔ ninbaaɔg, k n pal ń daa ŋanm g bɔnn g pugn.
50002028	L po n te k n bua k n tien tonm g sun’o i buol, k i gii la’ɔg, i pala ń guan g manŋ, k n mɔ yaa pabɔnn ń wad.
50002029	Lann, ŋanm g gaal’o man yen pamanciɛnn nyan i ninja nyan, g dugn Yonmdaan po. Ŋanm gii cɔln man niib nba tie nyan wano nyan,
50002030	g dugn waam nne k u daan kpe Kristo tuonn po. U daan lu u miɛl i, g baal yen todl nba k yinm mɔno daan kan fid g baal yenn.
50003001	N naataani, min ji bu maad’i yal mɔlane tie k i gii be pamann n ninŋ i, g dugn Yonmdaan po. L g yiɛl’n yen min gii tun g da g maad’i bonyenn g led led. Lann n su i po mɔno.
50003002	Suol man i kua yen yab nba suun tuona nba g ŋan, suol man i kua yen l sangbanni, b tie niib nba bund g ja b kua g tua k b kɔnd i.
50003003	Tinm n tie yab nba kɔnd yen mɔni, g dugn yen Foŋanm i k t pug Yendu, k t pala man bonciɛnn g dugn tin be yen Yiesu Kristo, g biɛ g tug t dindann g tien nifosaal bogda n ninŋ.
50003004	Ama n mɔ yen bo bu fid g tug n dindann g tien l bogda n ninŋ. L gii tie g nil mali k u bu fid g tug u kua g cab nifosaal bogda, min n bo dagd yen k n tug n kua g cab,
50003005	min nba k b kɔnd’n daa ŋanniin daal, n tie Israyɛl big i, Bɛnsamɛn cugl n jua. B l mal min k n tie Ebro i. Yal nba nyuan Suif‑nba yiko po, n bo tu be Farisiɛn-nba cagl n ninŋ i.
50003006	N bo tu ŋanm g cɔln tinm Suif‑nba bogda, hal g tan cagn Kristo tintaanu n niib. L biɛ gii tie g nil ń gii tuag mamɔni sɔnu nyan Suif‑nba yiko n bual nand nyan, baa sua kan fid g jalg’n siɛl po.
50003007	N bo tu diɛ l bona kul ne k l mɔg nyuad i, ama mɔlane, n la k l ji g mɔg siɛl yaa nyuad g dugn Kristo po.
50003008	Yen mɔni n ji diɛ g yal l mɔg nyuad kul tie fam i, g dugn min bann n Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo nyan. L banm nyuad g mɔg l liel. U yaa po, n feg g lu l bona kul. N ji diɛ k l kul ne tie tinbenmuad i, k min fid g gaal Kristo,
50003009	g biɛ taan gii be yen’o. N ji g tua k min cɔln tinm Suif‑nba yiko po n te k n tie nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n. Ama min dug Yiesu Kristo po n te k n tie nimɔn. Yendu n te g yua nba dug u po kul tie nimɔn.
50003010	Min bua yal nba kul tie k min bann Kristo i, g bann u kuum yiedu paalu, g la fala nyan wano nyan, g biɛ kpe nyan wan kpe nyan,
50003011	gii mɔg dindann k n mɔ tan bu yied kpienm siign ninŋ g ji gii fo.
50003012	N g bua n maad k n suol min bel yal lann i kaa k n binbem ŋan g gbenn kaa. Ama n daa l maa nantaal po i, g gbaa k min gaal l nantaal pani, g dugn min mɔno, Yiesu Kristo bo nyii g suol’n l yaa po i.
50003013	N naataani, n g mali k n ji kub l pani kaa, ama bonyenn kua i k n tie: n g nyuan yal tien g pend kaa, n nyuan yal be liig i,
50003014	g maa nantaal g gbaa k min suol min bel yal nba, g gaal l nantaal pani, pani nba g Yendu yi’ti polu po k tin gaal g dugn Yiesu Kristo po.
50003015	Tinm yab nba sie dindann n ninŋ k l paa, tin mɔ ń gii mɔg l maalm buolu. L gii sua k i ninŋ g yenm mɔg maalfanm i yaa aa, Yendu bu te’b yinyiem g fand’b l po.
50003016	Lan l tie yal nba kul, tin l gii ŋua sɔnu nba k t daan tuag saa yen mɔlane.
50003017	N naataani, i kul ń gii ŋmaad n taabuod n, gii nyuan man yab n sonm k l ŋan nyan yin la k t sonm k l ŋan nand nyan.
50003018	N daan tund g maad’i nii, g biɛ gɔ g tiɛd’i mɔlane yen ninsiid, g niib bonciɛnn be, k b binbem te k b tie Kristo dapunpɔnn ninnanda.
50003019	B tan bu juod g kua tudm n i, g dugn b puol n tie b yendu. Yal nba bu kuan’m fai, banm juab lann i k l tie b yudand. B mali ŋanduna ne bona po kua i.
50003020	Ama tinm nuan tie Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ yab i. T guu k t Fietua Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo bu nya l buol i, g baal.
50003021	U tan bu lebd t gbannand nba bu bed k lan nand yen u yudand gbannand g dugn u paalu te k u mɔg nuu bona kul po.
50004001	Lann, n naataani, yinm nba k n niɛn’i, g bua yen n pal kul k n guan g la’i, yinm n tie n pamann yen n nyuad. N dɔnn‑nba, ŋanm gii sie man k l paa dindann n ninŋ t Yonmdaan po.
50004002	Efodi yen Sɛntis, n miɛd’i sugl k i mɔnd g taan mɔb gii be yen lieb g dugn t Yonmdaan po.
50004003	K fin nba mɔ tie n tuonsunlua g g lin n puol po, n miɛd’a k a tod puob banle ne, g dugn banm yen Kleman yen n tuonsunlieb n daan tod’n k n muand Laabamann. B kul ne sana be miɛl kadaaɔg n ninŋ.
50004004	I kpanm man youg kul yen yin be yen Yonmdaan. N ŋanm g maad’i k i gii kpanm.
50004005	Mɔnd man g sua kul ń gii ban k i tie nimɔnm. Yonmdaan guanu ji g fag.
50004006	Daa banŋ man baa siɛl po, ama bonn kul n ninŋ yin gii jaand g fabn g miɛd Yendu yal nba k i bua, gii tiend’o balg.
50004007	G Yendu laafiɛ nba yab g cie nifosaal banm kul ń te k i yam ń gii dua g biɛ nyan yanbani i maalm n ninŋ g dugn Yiesu Kristo po.
50004008	N naataani, min bu juod g maad’i yal n ne: i pal ń gii kɔn yal ŋan g dagd yen dondl po, yal l tie mɔni kul po, yal dagd yen cɔlunŋ po, yal tuag mamɔni sɔnu po, yal g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd po, yal nba g nil bu faad po yen yal ŋan g dagd yen pinpagd po.
50004009	Tug man yal nba k i daan banŋ g biɛ gaal n buol, yal nba k i daan gbad k n maad yen yin daan la k n suun yal, g sun yen tuonn. G Yendu nba tien’ti laafiɛ baa be yen’i.
50004010	N pal daan manŋ bonciɛnn Yonmdaan n ninŋ yen yin guan g ŋɔn i buam nba n po. Yen mɔni i bua n maam. Ama i daan g la sɔnu i, yen k i ŋɔn’n l buam.
50004011	L g tie k n bua siɛl kaa g maad nnyan. Min mɔg yal nba, n tu tuo k l man n po i, g dugn l maan’n o.
50004012	Yaa youg nba k n g mɔg siɛl, n ban min kub n kua nand. Yaa youg nba g siɛl g muan’n mɔ, n biɛ ban n kua kubnu. Min be naan kul, yen yal l baal’n kul ninŋ, n ban k min di g dagd n dagdl, g ban k min kol n puol. N gii be guol n, n ban n kua kubnu, n biɛ gii be kom n mɔ, n biɛ l ban n kua kubnu.
50004013	N bu fid g kub n kua l binbem kul ninŋ g dugn Kristo tien’n paalu.
50004014	Yen l yaa kul ne, i daan ŋanm bonciɛnn yen i todl nba k i daan tod’n, min daan be cicagm n ninŋ.
50004015	Yinm Filiip yab, yinm mɔno i ban k min bo nyiɛ Maseduann doug n, youg nba k n bo cil g muand Laabamann nyan, Kristo tintaanu kul ninŋ, i tintaanu kua n bo tod’n g pii’n paab.
50004016	Min yaan bo be Tɛsaloniik mɔno, i bo sun yen todl g tie’n taal munŋaa kul youg nba k n bo be payiɛnu n.
50004017	L g tie k n kpaan k min gii gaan todl kaa, ama n kpaan k i mɔ ń do nyuad i l po.
50004018	Yin sun Epafrodit yen bona nba kul k wan te’n nyan, n gaal l kul. Baa siɛl ji g pɔd’n. Min taan ji mɔg yal cie n payiɛnu mɔno. L bona kul tie nyan salg nba nu g man Yendu po, g biɛ tuo u po nyan i.
50004019	N Yendu mɔg ŋalman k l g mɔg lan ja yen yal g be Kristo n ninŋ, u bu te’i yin bua yal nba kul.
50004020	Yudand ń gii tie t Baa Yendu yal mɔlane yen youg nba baad kul ! Amɛnn.
50004021	Yab nba kul tie Yendu niib g dugn b dug Yiesu Kristo po, fuond man b kul yend yend. T naataani Kristo‑yab nba be yen’n fuond’i.
50004022	Yendu niib kul fuond’i, mandg yab nba be Rom badciɛn ŋaag n ninŋ.
50004023	Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ŋalbalg ń gii be yen’i.
51001001	Min Pɔl, Yendu yanbuam po i k n tie Yiesu Kristo sundu. Min n da kadaaɔg ne, min yen t ninja Timote.
51001002	T fuond yinm t naataani nba tie Yendu niib g be Kolɔs g dug Kristo po yen i pal kul. T Baa Yendu ń yad yedŋanm i po, g te k i yam ń gii dua.
51001003	Youg nba kul k t jaand g miɛd Yendu, wano nba tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo Baa, t tu tien’o balg i po,
51001004	g dugn t gbad yin dug Yiesu Kristo po g biɛ bua yab nba tie u niib kul nand.
51001005	Yin daan g Yendu bil bona g guun’i polu nyan po n te k i dug Kristo po g biɛ mɔg l buam. Ban muand’i Laabamann nba k l tie mamɔni nyan n te k i mɔg l dindann.
51001006	L Laabamann n pund hal i buol nand nyan, l yad nnyan mɔ i ŋanduna n ninŋ kul. L suun tuonn g lebd niib binbem g saa liig nyan lan bo sun tuonn nand i siign ninŋ daal nba k i mɔ bo cind g gbad Yendu ŋalbalg maam, g bann g Yendu bua’i nyan.
51001007	Epafras tund’i lann n nyan. Wano Epafras tie t dɔnn i g biɛ tie t tuonsunlua. Tin bo bu sun tuonn nba i buol nyan u suun lann n nyan. U tie Kristo tuonsunn nba dagd k yin gii dug u po i.
51001008	Wano n maad’ti Yendu Fuom n te k i mɔg buam nba.
51001009	L po n te, g hal daal nba k t mɔ gbad l laabaal, k t jaand youg kul g miɛd Yendu k wan te’i yanfuom yen banm nba nya Foŋanm buol, k i bann u yanbuam kul canyiin.
51001010	Nnyan i k i bu fid gii be nyan Yonmdaan n bua nand, gii tie yal man u po youg kul, g suun tuonŋana kul, g band Yendu g pugd.
51001011	T miɛd’o k wan pugn’i paalu, wano nba k u paalu g mɔg l liel, k yin fid gii mɔg mindl yen juunn bonn kul n ninŋ,
51001012	g tien t Baa Yendu balg yen pamann. Wano n te k i bu fid g la yiɛl u buol gii be yinyiem n yen niib nba tie u yab.
51001013	Bunbɔnn n bo mɔg paalu t po, k u fiel’ti g nyan’ti l n ninŋ g kuan’ti u Bija nba k u ŋanm g bua’ɔg nyan diem n ninŋ.
51001014	U Bija po i k t la fielu, k u dii sugl t biid po.
51001015	Kristo n tie Yendu nba k t g nyuan’o ninnaɔnŋ. U bo be g sua g siɛl daa g tag, wano n tie Yendu tagm kul Yudaan.
51001016	K l maa Yendu bo te k wano n tag bonn kul, lann n tie bona nba kul be polu po yen bona nba kul be tinŋ po ne, tin nyuan yal nba kul yen tin g nyuan yal nba kul, polu po yudanm yen yonmdanm yen yikodanm yen paaludanm. Yendu te k u tag bonn kul k lan don wano Kristo sann i.
51001017	Kristo bo be g sua g siɛl kul daa g be, wano n te g bonn kul sie l sinsienu n.
51001018	Wano n tie u tintaanu kul yul, k l tintaanu tie gbannand. Wano n tie cilg, g tie yua nba bo kpiɛ g yied kpienm siign k wan gii be bonn kul liig.
51001019	Yendu mɔno n bo bua g tug u munn kul g tien Kristo n ninŋ.
51001020	Yendu yanbuam po i k u bo te g bona nba kul be tinŋ po ne yen yal l be polu po kul guan g manŋ yen’o g dugn Kristo po. U te g laafiɛ be tinm yen wano siign g dugn wano Kristo sɔm nba bo wul dapunpɔnn po nyan.
51001021	Siɛnyoug, i maalm yen i tuonbiid bo te k i tie Yendu ninnanda, g fag yen’o,
51001022	ama mɔlane nuan, u te k i guan g manŋ yen’o g dugn u Bija n te nifosaal g tuo g kpe nyan po. U tien nnyan, k yin fid g baal u buol g tie papiendanm i, g g mɔg siɛl yaa biid, g biɛ g mɔg ban bu jalg’i yal nba po.
51001023	Ama l bual k yin ŋanm gii diɛ i dindann i gii sie k l paa, g daa fagd yen ban bo muand’i Yendu Laabamann k i gbad g ji mɔg dindann nba nyan. B bo muand l Laabamann niib nba kul be tinŋ po ne i. Min Pɔl tuonn tie l Laabamann muandu i.
51001024	Mɔlane, n pal man yen min laad fala nba i po. Yen mɔni min laad fala nba ne, n laad k n tond Kristo n bo bu la fala nba kul u gbannand po i, l gbannand n tie u tintaanu.
51001025	N te Kristo tintaanu tuonsunn k n sun Yendu n bual’n k n sun yal nba i. Lann n tie k n muand’i Yendu maam kul canyiin.
51001026	L maam bo tie ŋasiil i, g Yendu bo wuon niib kul siɛnyoug, ama g tan dɔgd g ŋɔn u niib mɔlane.
51001027	U bo bua wan wuod l ŋasiil g ŋɔn’m k ban bann lan mɔn g biɛ mɔg yudand nand nba i yab g tie Suif‑nba siign n. L ŋasiil tie ne i: Kristo be i ninŋ g tien’i dindann k i mɔ tan bu gaal Yendu yudand.
51001028	Wano Kristo laabaal i k t muand, g tien sua kul cegli, g tund sua kul yen yanfuom k tin te g sua kul ń cie Kristo n ninŋ.
51001029	L po n te k n diɛ Kristo paalu nba n be n ninŋ g suun tuonn paaa nyan, g kɔn jad g suun n tuonn.
51002001	N bua k i bann k n l gbaa yen ninmɔnn i i po yen Lawɔdise Kristo‑yab po yen yaa danm nba kul g ban’n po.
51002002	N tie nnyan g bua k b pala ń paag i, g buam ń te k ban gii taa mɔb, k b pala ń gii paa k b mɔg ninfanm canyiin. K l ninfanm bu fid g te k ban bann Yendu ŋasiil, lann n tie Kristo.
51002003	Yanfuom yen banm kul tie ŋalman i g wuo wano Kristo n ninŋ.
51002004	N maad’i l bona kul ne k yin daa ŋaa g baa sua ń manŋ mɔb g bɔnd’i nii.
51002005	Baa n gii fag yen’i, n yen mali i po nuan. N pal man yen min la g sua kul sie u sinsienu n, k i biɛ dug Kristo po yen i pal kul.
51002006	Yin bo tuo g Yiesu Kristo te i Yonmdaan nyan, i be yen’o man i binbem n ninŋ kul.
51002007	Ŋanm man gii dug u po, gii diɛ k l paa g saa liig. Ŋanm man g kub i dindann nyan ban bo tund’i nand nba nyan, gii tiend Yendu balg youg kul.
51002008	Suol man i kua g daa ŋaa g sua ń tug nifosaal yanfuom g nyan maalm nba g tuag sɔnu g diɛn’i diɛɔg k i baa l n. L yaa kul ne tie faaɔg u, l nya niib danm bogda buol yen ŋanduna ne paaludanm buol i, l g nya Kristo buol kaa.
51002009	K l maa Kristo gbannand n ninŋ i g Yendu be u munn kul.
51002010	Yin taan g be yen Kristo i k i mɔg bonn kul, wano nba tie yikodanm yen paaludanm kul Yudaan.
51002011	Yin taan g be yen’o po n te k b kɔnd’i, ama l g tie nyan nifosaal n tu tug u nuu g suun u lua gbannand po g kɔnd’o nand nyan kaa, l kɔnd tie Kristo kɔnd i, g nyanŋ yal nba be nil n ninŋ g te k u tie biid.
51002012	K l maa ban bo wul’i nyum yaa youg, b bo taan g pii yinm yen Kristo i, k i biɛ guan g yied yen’o l nyunwulu n ninŋ, g dugn i bo dug Yendu paalu po i, paalu nba bo yied Kristo kpienm siign ninŋ nyan.
51002013	Youg nba pend, i bo tien biid g biɛ g kɔnd. L po n bo te k i tie nyan yab nba kpe nyan. Ama mɔlane nuan, Yendu guan g yied yinm yen Kristo o. U pii’ti t biid kul sugl o.
51002014	Kadaaɔg nba bo ŋɔnŋ k t tie biiddanm g biɛ jalg’ti nyan, u bo gbenn l yaa maam yaa youg nba k b bo kpaa Kristo dapunpɔnn po o.
51002015	L dapunpɔnn po i k u bo biil Sitaan yen cicilbiɛdi paalu kul, g fil’b niib kul nunŋ n g ŋɔn k u paa’b.
51002016	Lann yin daa ŋaa g sua ń jalg’i yin di yal nba po yen yin nyu yal nba po. Biɛ daa ŋaa man g sua ń jalg’i jaanm dana po, ŋmaapaanŋ dana po yen fuodu dana po.
51002017	L yaa bona kul ne tie yal nba bo tan bu baal nyan yaa jinjunŋ u, ama yal nba be g tie mɔni n tie Kristo.
51002018	Daa ŋaa man g yab nba k b pala man k ban gii jiind b kua g dond malɛg‑nba nyan ń gii jalg’i. B donŋ b kua g dugn ban laad bona nba b damiid n ninŋ nyan po i. B diɛ nifosaal maalm i g bund g donŋ b kua.
51002019	B yie k b kan tugn yen Kristo, wano nba tie yul. B sunn g yul mɔ n yen tien gbannand yal l tie bonmɔnn kul. Yul n te g tugda yen jiina kul taan g ŋanm g diɛ yen liel. G Yendu mɔ te k l gbannand kpaad g pugd.
51002020	I gii taan g kpe yen Kristo k u fiel’i g nyan’i yal nba be ŋanduna n ninŋ g mɔg paalu kul nuu n ninŋ, laabaal k i binbem n ninŋ k i biɛ tuo g cɔln l ŋanduna n ninŋ kɔa nyan i mɔ biɛ daa l tie l ninŋ yab nyan i ? Ji daa cɔln man kɔa nba tua:
51002021	« Daa di ne ! Daa lenm ne ! Daa ŋud ne ! »
51002022	L kɔa yen l tunda kul tie nifosaal maalm i. K l maa bondikal yen bonnyukal nuan be g niib ń di g nyu i, l puol po l ji g mɔg buam.
51002023	Yen mɔni, nil ń jiin u kua g dond malɛg‑nba g cagn u gbannand, l yaa kul tie nyan yanfobonn nyan i, ama l yaa tunda kul ne yen tie fam i, l be k lan tod nil k wan gii tie u gbannand n bua yal nba i.
51003001	Nyan yin taan g yied yen Kristo nyan, ji gii kpaan man bona nba be polu po, Kristo n kal naan buol nba Yendu jendu nyan.
51003002	I kpaan man k yin gii mɔg yal nba be polu po, g nyaan, daa jaad man i kua tinŋ n ne bona po.
51003003	G dugn i bo kpe o, i miɛl ji wuo Kristo n ninŋ i Yendu buol.
51003004	Kristo n tie i miɛl. Wan tan bu dɔgd g ŋɔn u kua yaa youg nba, i mɔ tan bu taan g dɔgd yen’o i u yudand n ninŋ.
51003005	Lann yin ŋaa man ŋanduna ne niɛnŋ nba suun tuonn i ninŋ nyan. Lann n tie yal be i ninŋ g te k i suun cuncontuona yen jɔgntuona, g diɛ i gbannand g suun fai tuona, g mɔg niɛnŋ nba g ŋan, g mɔg kunkuam, kunkuam mɔ yen tie padl i.
51003006	L yaa tuonbiid kul ne n baad yen Yendu mutuol danm nba yie k b kan cɔlm’o nyan po.
51003007	Siɛnyoug, yin mɔ n bo tug i yul g kun yen biid nyan, i mɔ bo suun nnyan i.
51003008	Ama mɔlane nuan, ji feg man g lu bona nba ne kul: mutuol yen jad yen tonu. Daa ŋaa man g sugd lann i kaa siɛl yaa majɔgnn ń nya i mɔb n.
51003009	Yin ji daa fa man i lieb faaɔg, k l maa i ŋaa i tɔgbiiug yen l bontitied
51003010	g Yendu ji tie’i binbepaanm. L binbepaanm i k wano Yendu nba tie t tagtua nyan pandl youg kul k l naan yen wano mɔno yaa binbem k wan te k yin l bann’o yen mɔni.
51003011	L yaa po, paadu ji g be yab tie Suif‑nba yen yab g tie Suif‑nba siign, yab k b kɔnd’b Suif‑nba kɔnd yen yab k b g kɔnd’b siign. Paadu ji g be nisaanm yen muaɔg n yab siign, yonmi yen yab yal b kua siign. Ama Kristo n tie bonn kul g biɛ be yen sua kul.
51003012	Nyan Yendu n bua’i g lugd’i k i te u buolu nyan, lann ji gii jie man i lieb ninbaaɔg, g tie’b ŋanm, g jiind i kua, g ŋɔnŋ’b i manu, g mɔg sugl yen’m.
51003013	I mɔg man sugl yen i lieb. Sua gii biil’i yin di sugl u po nyan Yonmdaan n dii sugl i po nand nyan.
51003014	I gii tien l kul ne, yal pugd n tie k yin ŋanm gii bua i lieb yen mɔni, k l maa lann n bu te yin ŋanm gii taa mɔb.
51003015	Yanduanm nba nya Kristo buol ń gii be i pala n ninŋ g ŋmagd’i. Yendu yiin’i g te k i taan g te gbannanyend kua k i gii mɔg l yaa yanduanm i. I tiend man Yendu balg l po.
51003016	Kristo maam tie ŋalman nba yab i. Ŋaa man k l maam ń gii be i pala n ninŋ k yin fid gii tund i lieb, gii tien’m cegli yen yanfuom. I yiin man biɛyani yen Yendu dondl yani yen Foŋanm n ŋɔn’i yani nba, gii tiend Yendu balg yen i pal kul.
51003017	Yin l suun yal nba kul, l gii tie i maam n ii, lann i kaa i tuona n ninŋ ii, yin sun Yonmdaan Yiesu sann po gii tiend t Baa Yendu balg g dugn u po.
51003018	Yinm puob, i jiind man i kua i salb buol nyan lan bual g yab cɔln Yonmdaan ń gii tiend nand nyan.
51003019	Yinm puodanm, i bua man i puob g daa mɔg tonu yen’m.
51003020	Yinm bid, i cɔln man i danm bonn kul n ninŋ, k l maa lann n man Yonmdaan po.
51003021	Yinm bibaa‑nba, i daa donŋ man i bid mutuol k lan tan daa te k b pala ń wad.
51003022	Yinm yonmi, i cɔln man i yonmdanm bonn kul n ninŋ. Yin daa cɔln’m youg nba k b nyuan’i kua kaa. Yab nba tu bua ban manŋ niib pala n tu tie nnyan. Ama yin gii cɔln’m youg kul yen i pal kul, g dugn yin cɔln Yonmdaan nyan po.
51003023	Yin l suun yal nba kul, yin sun yen i pal kul nyan i suun Yonmdaan po nyan, k lan daa tie k i suun niib po kaa.
51003024	I tiɛn man k i tan bu gaal Yendu n bo puon k u bu te u buolu bonŋana nba. Yua tie Yonmdaan yen mɔni tie Kristo i, i suun u yaa po i.
51003025	Yua nba tie bonbiil, b tan bu dad u tubl g dugn bonbiil nba k u tien nyan po, k l maa Yendu yaa buol lugdm g be.
51004001	Yonmdanm, ŋanm man gii diɛ i yonmi k l tuag yen mɔnkund sɔnu, k l maa i ban k i mɔ mɔg Yonmdaan polu po.
51004002	I jaand man g daa ŋaa, gii ceg man i kua po i jaandi n ninŋ, gii tiend Yendu balg.
51004003	I jaand man t mɔ yaa po g Yendu ń cab’ti sɔnu k t muand u Laabamann g dɔgd g ŋɔn yal tie ŋasiil Kristo po. L Laabamann muandu po n te k n be dansalg.
51004004	I jaand man n po k n fid g ŋanm g maad k n maam ń gii yien nyan min bo bu maad nand nyan.
51004005	I be man yen yab nba g tie Kristo‑yab yen yanfuom, g yaa youg nba k i bu fid g tien bonŋann, yin mɔnd g tien.
51004006	I maam ń tu gii man youg kul, g mɔg niɛnŋ niib po, k i fid g bann yin tu bu jiin yua kul nand.
51004007	Tisiik bu ŋɔn’i n laabaal kul. U tie n ninja i g biɛ tie n dɔnnmɔn, g suun Yendu tuonn yen u pal kul. Min yen wano n taan g suun Yonmdaan tuonn.
51004008	Yal nba po mand g te k n suun’o i buol tie k wan ŋɔn’i tin be nand i, g biɛ paan i pala.
51004009	Wano yen i doug n big Onesiim n yeg. Wano Onesiim ŋua Yendu yen u pal kul, u mɔ tie n ninja i g biɛ tie n dɔnnmɔn. Banm banle kul bu ŋɔn’i bona nba kul tie ne buol ne.
51004010	Min yen Aristark n be dansalg ne, u fuond’i. G Barnabas naataanu Mark mɔ fuond’i. Wano i k n daan ŋɔn ŋɔn’i bona u po, k u gii baal yin ŋanm g gaal’o nyan.
51004011	Yiesu, yua k b biɛ yi’ug Sustus nyan mɔ fuond’i. Suif‑nba nba te Kristo‑yab kul, banm bantaa kua n taan g suun yen’n Yendu diem po g pugd’n papaal.
51004012	I naataanu Epafras mɔ fuond’i. U tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunn i. U kɔn jad bonciɛnn i po jaandi n ninŋ k yin fid gii sie k l paa, g tie danm nba k i dindann cie, g bobn g gbenn g bu tien Yendu n bua yal nba.
51004013	N tie sieda k u suun tuonn bonciɛnn i po yen Lawɔdise Kristo‑yab po yen Yierapolis Kristo‑yab po.
51004014	T dɔnnmɔn Luk nba tie dogda nyan, wano yen Demas mɔ fuond’i.
51004015	Fuond man Lawɔdise Kristo‑yab yen Ninfa yen Kristo‑yab nba taand u ŋaag n ninŋ.
51004016	I gii lii kadaaɔg ne, yin mɔnd g Lawɔdise Kristo‑yab ń mɔ ń lii l kadaaɔg, k i mɔ ń lii kadaaɔg nba bu nya Lawɔdise g baal i buol nyan.
51004017	Maad man Arsiip k wan ŋanm g nyuand tuonn nba ninŋ g Yonmdaan kubn’o nyan, g sun lan bual nand.
51004018	Min Pɔl mɔno n diɛn yen n nuu min fuond’i fuondi nba ne. Daa sunn man k n be dansalg kaa. Yendu ń yad u yedŋanm i po.
52001001	Min Pɔl yen Silas yen Timote n da kadaaɔg ne g tien yinm Kristo‑yab nba be Tɛsaloniik, g tie t Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo yab. Yendu ń yad yedŋanm i po, g te k i yam ń gii dua.
52001002	T tiend Yendu balg i kul po youg kul, g biɛ tiɛn i po youg kul t jaandi n ninŋ.
52001003	T Baa Yendu buol, t tiɛn yin dug u po nand g suun tuona, g tiɛn i buam n te k i fid g sun tuona nba yen pakɔnn, g biɛ tiɛn i dindann n cie nand t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ.
52001004	Yinm nba tie t naataani, t ban g Yendu buad’i g biɛ lugd’i k yin gii tie u yab.
52001005	G dugn Laabamann nba k t bo muand’i, t bo g muand’i maam kukua kaa, t bo ŋɔn Foŋanm paalu mɔ. Foŋanm n bo tod’ti k t muand’i l Laabamann g biɛ ŋɔn k t pala paa l po. Youg nba k t bo be i buol, yinm mɔno ban tin bo be nand k l tod’i
52001006	k i ŋmaa tinm yen t Yonmdaan taabuod n ninŋ. Yen yin bo l be cicagciɛnm n nand kul, k i tuo g gaal l Laabamann yen pamann nba g Foŋanm tien.
52001007	Maseduann yen Akaayi Kristo‑yab kul la i buol i g bann ban baa be nand.
52001008	Nnyan i g niib gbad Yonmdaan maam k l ji g tie Maseduann yen Akaayi yab kua kaa, ama kaannaa kul niib gbiɛ yin dug Yendu po nand k l ji g bual k tin maad siɛl l po.
52001009	Niib kul maad yin bo tuo g gaal’ti nand youg nba k t bo baal i buol, yen nand nba k i bo yie g g pug yennaankad, g ji guan g pug Yendu nba tie miɛldaan yen mɔni,
52001010	g ji guu k u Bija Yiesu ń nya polu po g baal. Wano i g Yendu te k u yied kpienm siign k wan fid g fiel’ti wano Yendu mutuol nba baad ne ninŋ.
52002001	N naataani, yinm mɔno ban k t baalu i buol g te fam.
52002002	I biɛ ban ban bo ŋɔn’ti fala g biɛ sugd’ti nand Filiip doug n. Niib bo fiil g yie t po i doug n mɔno, ama g Yendu yen paan t pala k t muand’i u Laabamann.
52002003	Tin bo paand i pala k yin tuo maam nba nyan g tie faaɔg maam kaa, l biɛ g tie k t bo mɔg maalfanm kaa, lann i kaa k t bo kpaan k t sun ninfantuona kaa.
52002004	Ama t muand’i l Laabamann nyan wano Yendu n bua nand nba i, g dugn u diid g sua k t dagd yenn i, k u cab’ti k t muand u Laabamann. L po n te k t muand g g kpaan k tin manŋ nisaal pal kaa, t kpaan k t manŋ Yendu pal i, g dugn wano ban t pala n ninŋ yal nba be.
52002005	Yinm mɔno ban, g Yendu mɔ biɛ tie t sieda k t g ban g manŋ mɔb g bɔnd nil, k t maalm biɛ g tie k tin la ligli.
52002006	T biɛ bo g kpaan niib pinpagd kaa. T bo g kpaan k yin pag’ti lann i kaa g nifanm ń pag’ti.
52002007	Tin tie Kristo sundi nyan, t bo bu fid g ŋɔn t yikod g gaal todl i buol, g nyaan t bo kpii yam i g be yen’i, g kub’i nyan binaa n tu kub u bid nand nyan.
52002008	Tin mɔg buam bonciɛnn nba i po n bo te k t muand’i Laabamann. L g tie lann kua kaa, t biɛ bo cegn k t yid t miɛl mɔno salg i po g dugn t bua’i bonciɛnn.
52002009	N naataani, yinm mɔno tiɛn tin bo sun tuonn g cɔg nand, t bo suun yendu n yen nyiɛɔg k tin daa te tugl sua po, youg nba k t bo muand’i Yendu Laabamann nyan.
52002010	Yinm yen Yendu tie t sieda‑nba, k t bo be binbem nba ŋan yen yinm Kristo‑yab, k t taasonma tuag mamɔni sɔnu, k t g mɔg ban bu jalg’ti yal po.
52002011	Yinm mɔno yen ban k t bo be yen yua kul nyan bibaa n tu be yen u bid nand nyan i.
52002012	T bo balm’i, g paan i pala g ŋɔn’i g led led yin baa be nand k lan dagd Yendu po, wano nba yiin’i k yin te u diem n yab g la u yudand.
52002013	T biɛ tiend Yendu balg youg kul bonliel po mɔ: youg nba k i bo gbad Yendu Laabamann nba k t muand’i, i bo tuo g gaal yen mɔni k l tie Yendu maam. K l maam g nyiɛ nifosaal buol kaa. Yen mɔni, l maam nyiɛ Yendu buol i g suun yinm yab nba dug Yendu po pala n ninŋ.
52002014	N naataani, yal nba bo baal Yendu tintaanu niib nba be Suude doug n ninŋ g dug Yiesu Kristo po nyan, lann n ji baal i mɔ. Suif‑nba n bo cagn’m yaa cicagm nba nyan, i mɔ yaa doug n yab cagn’i l cicagbuolu n nyan.
52002015	Banm yab nba kpii t Yonmdaan Yiesu nyan, banm n bo kpii Yendu sogni‑nba. Banm n biɛ ŋɔn t mɔ fala. Yendu pal g man b po. B tie niib kul ninnanda i.
52002016	B biel’ti k tin daa muand buolfanu yab Laabamann nba bu te k ban la fielu. Nnyan, ban bo suun b tuonbiid nba nyan, b ji l sun g pund buol. Ama Yendu mutuol ji tan juod g lag b po i.
52002017	N naataani, t yad lieb l g luol waam, t g fid g cend lieb, ama k t yen mali i po. L po n te k t sun k t guan g la’i, g ji gbaa yen t paalu kul k lan fid.
52002018	T daan bobn k tin lebd i buol, k min Pɔl mɔno bign taal munŋaa kul, ama g Sitaan n jiɛl t sɔnu k t g fid g baal.
52002019	B lɛ yaa po i k t daan k t Yonmdaan gii guan yaa daal t baa mɔg pamann g biɛ la yudand u buol i ? L g tie yinm kaa aa ?
52002020	Yen mɔni, i yaa po i k t mɔg yudand k t pala biɛ man.
52003001	Tin daan mind mind g cɔg nyan i k t ji daan gbal g nyind g be Atɛnn t kukua,
52003002	g nyaan sun t ninja Timote nba tie t tuonsunlua Yendu tuonn po g muand Kristo Laabamann nyan, k wan gad i buol g paan i pala g biɛ te k i ŋanm gii dug Kristo po.
52003003	Nnyan i g sua kan ŋaa g cicagm nba k t laad dinne ne ń ŋmad u yam. Yinm mɔno yen ban k l cicagm, Yendu mɔno n cab k lan tien nnyan.
52003004	Youg nba k t bo be yen’i, t bo tuod g maad’i g niib bu cagn’ti. Yinm mɔno ban k lann n ji baal ne.
52003005	Min daan mind g cɔg nyan po n te k n daan sun Timote k wan gad g di i laabaal g liɛ i daa l dug Kristo po ii ? N daan jie g Sitaan ń bign’i yin ji daa dug Kristo po k t tuonn nba k t sun nyan ń te fam i.
52003006	Ama mɔlane Timote nyiɛ i buol g guan g maad’ti laabamann, g ŋɔn’ti yin l dug Kristo po nand yen yin mɔg buam nand. U maad’ti k i l tiɛn t po youg kul, g biɛ sun k i guan g la’ti, nyan t mɔ ń sun k t guan g la’i nand nyan.
52003007	N naataani, yen tin l be cicagciɛnm n yen pabɔnn n ninŋ nand kul, yin dug Kristo po nyan n te k t pala paag.
52003008	Mɔlane po t ji fuod g jiin g dugn yin l diɛ k l paa g ŋua t Yonmdaan nyan.
52003009	Tinm ji g ban tin bu tien nand g ŋanm g tien Yendu balg i po yen pamann nba k i te k t mɔg u buol ne.
52003010	L po n te g yendu n yen nyiɛɔg, k t l gbaa dunn g miɛd’o k wan cab’ti tin guan g la’i, g pugn’i yal nba pɔd’i yen yin ŋanm gii dug Kristo po.
52003011	T miɛd k t Baa Yendu mɔno yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu ń luod sɔnu k t fid g pund i buol.
52003012	T miɛd Yonmdaan k wan te g buam nba be i ninŋ k i bua i lieb yen niib kul nyan ń ŋanm gii pugd nyan t buam n pugd i po nand nyan.
52003013	Nnyan i k u bu paan i pala k i ji kan gii mɔg jɔgnd, gii tie yab nba g mɔg siɛl yaa jalgi t Baa Yendu nunŋ n, youg nba k t Yonmdaan Yiesu tan bu guan yen yab nba tie u yab.
52004001	N naataani, i bo gaal tundl t buol k l ŋɔn’i yin baa be nand g Yendu pal man i po, k i kon biɛ l be nnyan, g nyaan t biɛ daa l miɛd’i g pugd’i Yonmdaan Yiesu sann po k yin mɔnd k i binbem ń gii ŋan g cie nnyan.
52004002	I yen ban cegli nba k t daan tie’i k l nyiɛ t Yonmdaan Yiesu buol.
52004003	Yendu n bua yal nba tie k yin gii be binbem nba ŋan g dagd u po i, g daa suun cuncontuona.
52004004	L tie g yua kul ń fid g suol u kua, g mɔnd k u binbem ń gii ŋan g biɛ dagd yen cɔlunŋ.
52004005	Sua ń daa tug u yul g kun niɛnŋ nba g ŋan nyan buolfanu yab nba g ban Yendu n suun nand nyan.
52004006	Sua ń daa tie l bontitied g biil u naataanu pal lann i kaa g janm u lua. T bo tuod g maad’i no, g biɛ l ŋanm g maad’i g led led, k t Yonmdaan bu dad yab nba suun l tuonbuolu tubl.
52004007	Yen mɔni, Yendu g yiin’ti k tin gii be yen jɔgnd kaa, u yiin’ti k tin gii be binbem nba ŋan g dagd u po i.
52004008	L po n te g yua nba yie cegli nba ne, u g yie nisaal kaa, u yie Yendu nba tien’i u Foŋanm i.
52004009	L ji g tie ban diɛn’i kadaaɔg kaa g ŋɔn yin baa bua lieb nand Kristo n ninŋ, g dugn Yendu ŋɔn yinm mɔno yin baa bua i lieb nand o.
52004010	I biɛ l mɔg l buam n nyan Kristo‑yab kul nba be Maseduann diem n ninŋ po. G nyaan t biɛ yen l miɛd’i, yinm yab nba tie t naataani, k yin ŋanm g tien lan gii cie nnyan.
52004011	Mɔnd man g laafiɛ ń gii be yinm yen i lieb siign, g sua kul ń gii nyuan u tuona n ninŋ gii suun g laad yal nba k u baa di, nyan tin yaan bo maad’i nand nyan.
52004012	Nnyan i g yab g tie Kristo‑yab baa cɔlm’i. I biɛ ji kan gii tie tugl sua po.
52004013	N naataani, t g bua k i gii be yanbɔnm n ninŋ yal nba nyuan kpienm po, k lan tan daa te k yin gii kal yen pabɔnn nyan yab nba g mɔg dindann nyan.
52004014	Tin tuo g gaal g Yiesu kpe g biɛ guan g yied nyan, nnyan i k t tuo g gaal g Yendu tan bu yied yaa danm nba kpe g tie Kristo‑yab mɔ, g taan’m yen Yiesu.
52004015	Tin bu maad’i maam nba ne tie Yonmdaan lanbona i: tinm nba tan baa be g mɔg miɛl Yonmdaan guanu youg, t tan kan fid g liid yab nba kpe.
52004016	G dugn yaa youg nba g niɛlu tan bu tand g cab mɔb, niib bu gbad malɛg‑nba ciɛn niɛlu yen Yendu naatunn mɔni, l youg u g Yonmdaan mɔno bu nya polu po g jiid, yab nba bo kpe g tie Kristo‑yab ń cind g yied.
52004017	L puol po, tinm nba bu tenn gii mɔg miɛl, Yendu bu tug’ti g nyan’ti, t kul ń taan yen’m tawalgband n ninŋ, g tuog Yonmdaan polu po. Nnyan i k t ji baa tund g be yen Yonmdaan.
52004018	Lann, i paand man i lieb pala yen l maam.
52005001	N naataani, l bona n bu tien yaa dana nba, lann i kaa lan bu tien yaa youg, l ji g bual k ban diɛn kadaaɔg kaa g maad’i l maam,
