52005002	g dugn yinm mɔno ban bonŋann g Yonmdaan baalu baa tie nyan naayig n tu baal nyiɛɔg nyan i.
52005003	Youg nba g niib tan baa tua g yanduanm be, g siɛl yaa yanbani ji g be nyan, l youg mɔno i g doug bu ŋmad g bonn kul ń biil. L tan bu kpil g tien nyan madyiɛlu n tu suol puo nyan i. L youg b ji kan fid g ciɛl.
52005004	N naataani, yinm nuan yen g be bunbɔnn n ninŋ kaa, k l daal bu baal g libl’i nyan naayig nyan.
52005005	I kul tie yinyiem n bid i, g tie yendu n ninŋ yab: t g tie nyiɛɔg yab, t biɛ g tie bunbɔnn n ninŋ yab mɔ.
52005006	Lann t daa gɔ man nyan lieb nyan. L tie k tin gii ceg i, g biɛ gii so t kua.
52005007	Yab gɔ, b gɔ nyiɛɔg u, yab buog daam mɔ buog nyiɛɔg u.
52005008	Ama tinm nuan tie yendu n ninŋ yab i, l tie k tin gii so t kua i. T tug man dindann yen buam lan te nyan kudliɛdl nyan k tin liɛ. G fielu nba k t daan k t mɔg ń gii tie t kudfeglg.
52005009	G dugn Yendu g lugd’ti k u mutuol ń baa t po kaa, u buam tie k t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po tin la fielu i.
52005010	T po i k wano Yiesu kpe k tin fid g taan yen’o gii be, baa t gii kpe lann i kaa t daa gii be g fo.
52005011	Lann, i tod man i lieb gii paand man i lieb pala nyan yin l tie nand nyan.
52005012	N naataani, t miɛd’i k yin gii cɔln yab nba tie liig yab i siign. Yonmdaan n cab’b k ban gii ŋmagd’i g biɛ gii tien’i cegli.
52005013	Ŋanm man gii cɔln’m g biɛ gii bua’b yen i pal kul g dugn ban suun tuonn nba po. I kpaan man g laafiɛ ń gii be i siign.
52005014	N naataani, t miɛd’i k yin maad gbannyagdanm k ban gii suun, yab nba k b pala g ŋanm g paa, yin paan b pala, yab nba g paalu pɔd’b, yin tod’b, gii mɔg pasɔnŋl yua kul po.
52005015	Suol man i kua g sua ń daa guan g ŋmiɛn u lua bonbiiug, ama mɔnd man youg kul gii tie i lieb ŋanm g biɛ gii tie niib kul ŋanm.
52005016	I be man pamann n youg kul,
52005017	gii jaand youg kul,
52005018	bonn kul ninŋ yin tu tien Yendu balg. G dugn Yendu n bua yal nba n nyan yinm yab nba tie Kristo‑yab po.
52005019	Daa panŋ man Foŋanm k wan sun tuonn,
52005020	g biɛ daa nund Yendu sogni‑nba n maad yal nba.
52005021	Tu ŋanm man g mali bonn kul po u, g fid g gann yal nba ŋan.
52005022	Suol man i kua yen yal nba l tie bonbiiug kul.
52005023	Yendu nba te g nil yam dua mɔno ń te k i binbem ń dagd u po canyiin, g guul i munn kul, i tagm yen i nalnŋ yen i gbannand k yin ji daa mɔg siɛl yaa jalgi daal nba k t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo bu guan.
52005024	Yua nba yiin’i g tie mɔi yinle daan kaa. Wano n bu tien wan yed yal.
52005025	N naataani, i jaand man t mɔ yaa po.
52005026	Fuond fuond man i lieb kul g lɔn lɔn’m yen naataann.
52005027	N miɛd’i Yonmdaan sann po, k yin mɔnd g lii kadaaɔg ne g Kristo‑yab kul ń gbad.
52005028	T Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ŋalbalg ń gii be yen’i.
53001001	Min Pɔl yen Silas yen Timote n da kadaaɔg ne g tien yinm Kristo‑yab nba be Tɛsaloniik g tie t Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo yab.
53001002	T Baa Yendu yen Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po, g te k i yam ń gii dua.
53001003	N naataani, l tie k tin gii tiend Yendu balg i youg kul i po, l biɛ l dagd k tin tien’o mɔ, g dugn i dindann l kped g pugd i, g buam nba k i mɔg lieb po mɔ pugd g saa.
53001004	L po n te k t maad Yendu tintaanu niib nba tenn, k t pala man i po. K l maa, ban l cagn’i, k i be fala n nand kul, i yen l g ŋaa sɔnu nba k i ŋua, i l dug Yiesu po i.
53001005	Lann n ŋɔnŋ g Yendu buud jiɛlu tuag mamɔni sɔnu. L fala po i k u tan bu maad’i k i dagd yen yin kua u diem n. L Yendu ŋaag n kuanu po i k i cagn ne.
53001006	Yendu tie mɔnkundaan i, yab nba ŋɔnŋ’i fala mɔlane, u mɔ tan bu ŋɔn’m fala.
53001007	Yinm yab nba k b cagn’i nyan, u bu te k tinm yen yinm kul ń fuod. L tuonn bu sun youg nba k t Yonmdaan bu legd polu po yen u malɛg‑nba nba mɔg paalu,
53001008	g baal yen muupienu. Yab nba g ban Yendu yen yab nba g cɔln t Yonmdaan Yiesu Laabamann nyan, u bu dad b tubl l youg u.
53001009	B tubdadu tie k b baa be fala nba g mɔg gbennu n ninŋ i, naan buol fag yen Yonmdaan yen u paaciɛnu yudand buol.
53001010	L tan bu tien daal nba k u bu baal i. L daal u bu gaal dondl u niib po, yab nba kul bo tuo g dug u po baa nyuad’o. Yinm yen tuo g gaal tin maad’i yal o.
53001011	L po n te k t jaand i po youg kul g Yendu ń te k i binbem ń dagd yen wan yiin’i g bua k yin gii be nand nyan. T miɛd t Yendu k wan te’i paalu k yin sun yal nba ŋan nyan yin bua nand nba nyan, g biɛ te k i sun g juod i dindann n te k i suun tuona nba.
53001012	Nnyan i k t Yonmdaan Yiesu bu la dondl i buol, k yin mɔ ń la dondl u buol g dugn t Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ŋalbalg po.
53002001	N naataani, yal tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo guanu, yen tigl nba k t tan bu tigl u buol nyan po,
53002002	l gii tie g sua maad’i g Yendu ŋɔn’o lann i kaa k tinm n maad, lann i kaa k tinm n diɛn kadaaɔg g tie’i g maad g Yonmdaan daal baal o, t miɛd’i k yin daa ŋaa k i yam ń gbaa g ŋmad, lann i kaa g jiwaani ń suol’i.
53002003	Daa ŋaa man baa sua ń fid g bɔnd’i palb. Yen l daal ń pund, niib bu fiil g yie Yendu yo, g yua nba tie Nibiiug ń ji fid g legd. Wano i g Yendu yed k u bu biɛn’o.
53002004	L Nibiiug tan bu fiil g yie niib n l yi yal nba kul yendu, g yie niib n pug yal nba kul, g tan gad mɔno g kua g kal Yendu dondl ŋaciɛɔnŋ n ninŋ g ji yed k wano mɔno n tie Yendu.
53002005	I g tiɛn k n bo maad’i l maam youg nba k n bo be i buol ii ?
53002006	I yen ban yal nba daa diɛ’ɔg k l bona kan fid g tien. Yal nba diɛ’ɔg po bu juab yo, wan fid g ŋɔn u kukua youg nba dagd yen wan legd.
53002007	L Nibiiug ji suun u tuonn i, g nyaan u yen daa wuod i. Ama yua nba daa diɛ’ɔg ji tan gii g be, u ji baa suun g g wuod.
53002008	Nnyan i k l Nibiiug bu legd, Yonmdaan Yiesu mɔb n faam n bu kpi’ug, Yiesu n bu baal yen yudand nba n bu biɛn’o.
53002009	L Nibiiug tan bu baal yen Sitaan paalu i gii suun tuona. U baa suun yaalidug tuona, g tie palug g bɔnd niib.
53002010	U bu sun tuonbuolu nba bi kul g bɔnd niib nba tud sɔnu. B bu tud sɔnu g dugn b bo g tuo g gaal mamɔni nba bo bu fiel’b nyan, b biɛ bo g bua l maam.
53002011	L po n te g Yendu kuand tudciɛnm b ninŋ, k l tudm te k b pala paa faaɔg maam po.
53002012	Nnyan i g yab nba g tuo g gaal mamɔni g yen juab b kua g cab biid nyan, g buud bu di’b.
53002013	N naataani, yinm nba k t Yonmdaan bua’i nyan, l bual k tin gii tiend Yendu balg youg kul i po. G dugn hal cilg youg u g Yendu bo lugd’i k yin la fielu. Yin gaal mamɔni g Foŋanm mɔ biɛ te k i te Yendu yab nyan po n te k i la fielu.
53002014	L kul ne po i k u bo yiin’i. Laabamann nba k t bo muand’i nyan n te k i bann k u yiin’i k yin mɔ ń gii mɔg yudand nba tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo yal.
53002015	N naataani, lann i sie man k l paa g ŋanm g kub tunda nba k t bo luan’i, lann n tie tin yaad t mɔb g maad’i yal nba, yen tin diɛn yal nba kadaaɔg n g tie’i.
53002016	T Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo mɔno yen t Baa Yendu nba buad’ti g te k u ŋalbalg po k t mɔg papaal youg kul, g biɛ mɔg dindann yen mɔni,
53002017	ń te k i pala ń gii paa, g biɛ te’i paalu nba bu te k yin tien yal nba ŋan, i tuona n ninŋ yen i maam n ninŋ.
53003001	N naataani, min bu juod g maad’i yal nba n ne: i jaand man t po g Yonmdaan maam ń fid g yad tonm tonm, k ban biɛ tuo g gaal yen cɔlunŋ nyan lan bo tien i buol nand nyan.
53003002	Biɛ gii jaand man g Yendu ń nyan’ti nibiid yen tondanm nui n. G dugn niib kul kaa tuod g gaan l maam.
53003003	Yonmdaan g tie mɔi nle daan kaa, lann u bu te’i paalu g guul’i yen Bonbiildaan.
53003004	Yonmdaan te k t pala paa i po: tin ŋɔn’i k i gii tie yal nyan, i tie lann i, g biɛ baa l tie nnyan.
53003005	Yonmdaan ń tod’i k yin bann Yendu n bua’i nand nba, g biɛ gii mɔg juunn nyan Kristo nyan.
53003006	N naataani, t miɛd’i Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sann po, k yin fagd yen yaa danm nba tie Kristo‑yab g yen tie gbannyagdanm kul, g biɛ g cɔln tin tund’b k ban gii tie yal.
53003007	Yinm mɔno ban yin bu tien nand g ŋmaa t taabuod n, g dugn tin bo be i buol t bo g tie gbannyagdanm kaa.
53003008	T bo g miɛl g baa sua tie’ti jied k t dii, ama yendu n yen nyiɛɔg t bo suun g laad fala g cɔgd yo, g fid g laad jied g di k tin daa te tugl sua po.
53003009	Yen mɔni, t bo mɔg nuu g bu gaal todl i buol, ama t bo bua k yin la t buol i g bann yin baa be nand.
53003010	L po i, g youg nba k t bo be i buol, k t bo maad’i g yua nba g bua k u sun tuonn, wan daa di mɔ.
53003011	Ama t yen ji gbiɛ g siɛb be i siign g g bua k b sun tuonn, g nyaan yen ji waa g kua b lieb maam n.
53003012	Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sann po, t miɛd l niib g cegi’b k ban gii suun b tuona suoo g laad b jied g di.
53003013	N naataani, yinm nuan ń gii suun tuonŋana youg kul g daa yed k i cɔg yenn.
53003014	L gii tie g sua yie g g cɔln tin maad’i yal kadaaɔg ne ninŋ, yin ŋanm gii nyuan l daan g biɛ ji daa nagi’ug g fai ń suol’o.
53003015	I daa juab’o man nyan u tie i ninnand nyan kaa, ama i cegi’ug man nyan u tie i naataanu nyan.
53003016	Yonmdaan nba te g niib yam dua nyan, wano mɔno ń te k i yam ń gii dua youg kul yen bonn kul ninŋ. Yonmdaan ń gii be yen i kul.
53003017	Min Pɔl n diɛn yen n nuu min fuond’i fuondi nba ne. N kadaaɔg kul ninŋ, n tu juod g diɛn nnyan i. N diɛni i.
53003018	T Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ŋalbalg ń gii be yen i kul.
54001001	Min Pɔl n da kadaaɔg ne. Yendu t Fietua yen Yiesu Kristo, yua k t daan u ninŋ, n cab’n mɔb k n tie Yiesu Kristo sundu.
54001002	N fuond’a Timote, fin nba tie n bimɔnŋ dindann n. T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm a po, g te’a pasiɛdl yen yam nba dua.
54001003	Nyan min daan saa Maseduann g maad’a nand nyan, i be Efɛs. Siɛb be l doug n g diɛ tundfann g ŋɔnŋ niib. Bel’b k ban daa tie nnyan.
54001004	Maad’b ban ŋaa b kpelug yen b yaajanm yaa yaajanm sana nba g mɔg juog nyan. Mɔniɛɔg i kaa, l g pugd siɛl Yendu tuonn nba po k t suun yen dindann.
54001005	N maam ne bua lan fiin buam i, buam nba nya papienn n ninŋ yen maalŋanm n ninŋ yen binbem nba dagd dindann n ninŋ.
54001006	Siɛb ŋaa l sɔnu i, g bod g kua mafinfam n ninŋ.
54001007	B yi b kua Yendu Mɔmaam gbanbanda i, g yen g ban ban maad yal, g bual ban pua pal g maad k b ban yal.
54001008	T ban g Yendu Mɔmaam ŋan, l gii tie k t tug g sun yen tuonn lan bual nand.
54001009	Tin ŋanm g gbad bonyenn. Yendu Mɔmaam g nyuan yab tuag Yendu sɔnu kaa. L nyuan yab g cɔln u Mɔmaam yen yab yie u Mɔmaam i, g nyuan tondanm yen biiddanm, g nyuan yab g cɔln Yendu g bual yal nba tie Yendu yal, g nyuan yab kpi b baa‑nba yen b naa‑nba, yen nikpiila kul.
54001010	Yendu Mɔmaam nyuan jab yen puob nba tie cunconm i, g nyuan jab nba dua yen lieb. L nyuan nikuada i, faaɔgdanm yen yab polg ŋalaaci. L nyuan yab l yie mamɔni tundl kul i.
54001011	L tundl n be Laabamann nba ninŋ g Yendu tug g kubn’n. L ŋɔnŋ Yendu yudand i. U buol i, g bonŋana kul nya.
54001012	N tiend t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo balg, wano nba tie’n paalu k n bu sun u tuonn. U la k n dagd yen wan gii dug n po i, g tie’n l tuonn,
54001013	min nba bo biid u sann, g ŋɔnŋ’o fala, g sugd’o. Ama g Yendu yen jie’n ninbaaɔg, g dugn n bo suun yen yanbɔnm i, n bo g mɔg dindann.
54001014	Ama t Yonmdaan tie’n ŋalbalg nba g mɔg po, g tie’n dindann yen buam nba be Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ.
54001015	Min bu maad yal ne tie mɔni i, l dagd yen nil ń tuo l maam yen u pal kul: Yiesu Kristo baal ŋanduna ne ninŋ k wan fiel biiddanm i, min n be liig biiddanm kul siign.
54001016	G Yendu jie’n ninbaaɔg, min nba be liig biiddanm kul siign, g Yiesu Kristo ŋɔn u pasɔnŋl n ninŋ. G dugn u bo bua g niib nba tan baa dug u po ń la n buol i, g gaal u maam, g la miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
54001017	Yendu n tie bad nba fo youg kul g kan ban g kpe, g sua biɛ g nyuan’o. U tie Yenduyend i. Dondl yen yudand ń gii tie u yal, mɔlane saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog. Amɛnn.
54001018	N big Timote, n bu te’a mɔbonn ne, nyan Yendu sogni‑nba n bo maad yal a po siɛnyoug nyan. A bu nyii l maam po i g ŋanm g kɔn kunkɔnn nba dagd,
54001019	gii diɛ dindann, a pal n ninŋ ń gii ŋan. Siɛb yie g g cenŋ b pala n maam i, g buon b dindann.
54001020	Imene yen Alɛksandr mɔ tie l nibuolu i. N daan tug banm i g cab Sitaan k ban la fala g ŋaa Yendu sann biilu.
54002001	Min daa bu cind g bual’a yal tie g niib ń gii miɛd Yendu, gii pug’o gii balm’o g tiend’o balg niib kul po.
54002002	Ban gii jaand dougdanm yen yikodanm po, k tin fid gii be t yam n yen laafiɛ, gii ŋua Yendu yen t pal kul, gii be binbem nba ŋan.
54002003	Yal nba ŋan g dagd t Fietua Yendu po n nyan.
54002004	Wano nba bua g niib kul ń la fielu, g bann mamɔni.
54002005	G dugn Yenduyend kua n be. Sandindanyend kua n be Yendu yen niib siign. U tie nifosaal i, lan tie Yiesu Kristo.
54002006	Wano mɔno n tug u miɛl g tie k wan fiel niib kul. U tien lann n nyan, g niib la Yendu n bo sen k l tan bu tien yaa youg.
54002007	L po n te k u tug’n g tien u sundu, k n biɛ muand u maam. N maad mɔni i, n g fa faaɔg kaa. U lugd min i, k n gii ŋɔnŋ yab g tie Suif‑nba yal tie dindann yen mamɔni po.
54002008	To, l po n te k n bua g jab ń gii jaand kaannaa kul. B jaandi n ninŋ, ban tu don nui polu po g miɛl yen papienn, g pabienn yen mɔniɛɔg ń daa be l n.
54002009	N biɛ bua g puob mɔ, b tiɛlanu n ninŋ, ban tu ŋanm g liɛ tiɛd, g ŋaa yuounŋ, g jie fai. Ban ŋaa yuounŋ yupiɛnu yen liglaani lanu lann i kaa laani nba k b tag yen wula, g ŋaa ligciɛnŋ tiɛd liɛnu,
54002010	ama gii suun tuona nba ŋan, nyan puob nba tug b kua g cab Yendu n suun nand nyan.
54002011	B gii tund niib yaa youg, puob ń jiin b kua gii tie suoo, g daa maad siɛl.
54002012	N g cab g puo ń gii tund niib lann i kaa wan gii mɔg yikod jua po. N bua wan gii ŋmin i.
54002013	G dugn Yendu bo kpiɛ g tag Adam i, g tan guan g tag Ɛf.
54002014	Adam kaa biɛ ŋaa k b bɔnd’o. Puo n ŋaa k b bɔnd’o k u kpiɛd Yendu sɔnu.
54002015	Ama puo madug po Yendu bu fiel’o, l gii sua k u juun g mɔg dindann, g ŋua Yendu yen u pal kul, g bua niib, g g mɔg yuounŋ.
54003001	Min bua n maad yal ne tie mɔni i: nil gii bua wan te Kristo‑yab liig yua, l tie tuonŋann i k u bua n sun.
54003002	Kristo‑yab liig yua baa tie nil nba g mɔg ban bu jalg’o yal nba po. U baa mɔg puoyend kua i, g tie yua ceg, g tie bona kul g dagd, g ban niib gaalu, g gaan saanm. U baa tie yua bu fid gii tund niib i.
54003003	U kan gii tie dinyuul lann i kaa filkpaandaan. U baa tie yua nba k u yam dinŋ i, yua g bua maam, g biɛ g tug u kua g cab ligli.
54003004	U baa tie nil nba bu fid g kub u ŋaag niib i, k u bid cɔlm’o g cenŋ u maam.
54003005	G dugn, nil nba kan fid g kub u ŋaag niib, u bu tien nle i g kub Yendu niib tintaanu i ?
54003006	U kan gii tie nil nba te Kristo‑yua k l g wai. Lann i kaa u tan bu tug jipaad i g gbien u yul n g tan kua fala n, nyan Sitaan nyan.
54003007	U baa tie nil nba g yab g ŋua Kristo mɔ pag’o, u binbem po, k ban tan daa fiɛg’o, wan biɛ daa baa Sitaan diɛɔg n mɔ.
54003008	Kristo‑yab tintaanu todkab mɔ baa tie niib nba dagd yen cɔlunŋ u, yab g tie mɔi nle danm. B kan gii tie niib nba tug b kua g cab daam lann i kaa yab kpaan k ban di jod g mɔgd.
54003009	B baa tie niib nba diɛ yen b pala kul dindann ŋasiil nba g Yendu ŋɔn Kristo‑yab, g g mɔg siɛl yaa maalbiid.
54003010	B daa bu bign’m yo, b gii diid g sua k b g mɔg niib n bu jalg’b yal po, ban cab’b k ban te Kristo‑yab tintaanu todkab.
54003011	Puob mɔ baa tie yab dagd yen cɔlunŋ u. B baa tie yab g mɔg sanjounŋ, g biɛ tie bona kul g dagd, g niib dug b po bonn kul n ninŋ.
54003012	Kristo‑yab tintaanu todkua baa tie jua nba mɔg puoyend kua i, yua fid g kub u bid yen u ŋaag.
54003013	Yab nba suun todkab tuonn k l ŋan, l tuonn bu don’m, g biɛ paan b pala g dugn dindann nba k b mɔg Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ po.
54003014	N da kadaaɔg ne g bu te’a, g yen daan k l kan wai yen min baal a buol.
54003015	Ama l gii tie k n g baal tonm, l bu te ŋan bann niib ń baa be nand Yendu niib tintaanu n ninŋ, lan tie Yendu nba fo n lugd niib nba k b tie u niib. Banm n tie mamɔni dieog fiɛgl yen l tuudu.
54003016	Yen mɔni, sua kan fid g nai, dindann ŋasiil yab bonciɛnn: U te nifosaal i g baal, g Foŋanm tie’og mɔni, g malɛg‑nba la’ɔg, k b muand buoli kul wan tie yua, g ŋanduna niib tuo g gaal u maam, g Yendu don’o polu po k u gaal yudand.
54004001	Foŋanm maad g g wuon: g dijijuog dani n ninŋ, siɛb bu ŋaa dindann gii ŋua faaɔgdanm yen Sitaan tundl.
54004002	B bu ŋaa munafigidanm ń fa faaɔg g bɔnd’b. B fa faaɔg g bɔnd niib k l biɛ g maad’b baa siɛl.
54004003	L niib n biel jab k ban daa kuand puob, g puob mɔ ń daa kun jab, g kuand niib jeyend. G Yendu yen tag l jied g yab daan u ninŋ, g ban mamɔni, ń tu tien’o balg l jied po g di i.
54004004	Yendu n tag yal nba kul ŋan. Jesiɛd g kua. T gii tien Yendu balg jied nba po kul, t bu fid g di.
54004005	G dugn Yendu maam yen jaandi bu te l jied ń gii ŋan Yendu nunŋ n.
54004006	A gii ŋɔn a ninjanm l kul ne, a tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunmɔn i. Lann i k a bu ŋɔn g Yendu maam yen ŋan ŋanm g gaal tundŋann nba n tie a jied.
54004007	Ŋaa yal tie youg n telmi, lann tie puciɛna mayuyuod i. Kɔn jad g cɔln Yendu.
54004008	A gii kɔn jad g kub a gbanu, lan bu pugn’a yal baa tie waam nne kua i. Ama a gii kɔn jad g cɔln Yendu, a bu la bonn kul. L n ninŋ i g miɛl be, mɔlane yen youg nba baad.
54004009	Min maad yal ne tie mɔni i. L dagd yen nil ń tuo l maam yen u pal kul.
54004010	T ŋmid nunŋ g kɔn jad, g dugn t tug t dindann kul g tien Yendu nba fo ninŋ i. Wano n tie niib kul Fietua, mandg niib nba dug Kristo po.
54004011	I ŋɔnŋ niib l kul ne, gii tund’b.
54004012	Daa ŋaa g sua nund’a k a tie nipaaɔnŋ po. Mɔnd k a maam n yen a binbem n yen a buam niib po yen a dindann n yen a papienn n, yab dug Kristo po ń la a buol, g bann ban baa be nand.
54004013	I lii Yendu maam kadaaɔg niib kul nunŋ n, gii paand b pala, g tund’b, g sua k n baal.
54004014	Daa sunn Yendu n tie’a ŋalbalg nba, youg nba g Yendu sogni‑nba bo maad g Kristo‑yab nikpela maan nui a po.
54004015	Tug l tuonn g tien a pal n ninŋ, g cab a munn kul, g sun k b kul ń la k a tuona saa liig.
54004016	Ŋanm g nyuand a kua ninŋ yen a tundl n ninŋ, gii mɔg juunn l kul po. Nnyan i, k a bu fiel a kua, g fiel yab nba cenŋ a maam mɔ.
54005001	Yua tie nikpel ŋan daa fu yen’o, ŋan te’og cegli nyan a baa nyan, gii diɛ naasenm nyan a ninjanm nyan,
54005002	puonikpela nyan a naa‑nba nyan, puosipaanm nyan a niipuob nyan, siɛl yaa jɔgnd ń daa be i siign.
54005003	Ŋanm g nyuand pekɔa n ninŋ, yab nba tie pekɔa yen mɔni.
54005004	Pekual gii mɔg bid lann i kaa yaabuona, l tie k l bid lann i kaa l yaabuona ń cind g ŋɔn b ŋaag n ninŋ i, k b cɔln, g tod b danm, k b fala ń ŋmiɛn. Lann n ŋan Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ.
54005005	Yua tie pekual yen mɔni tie yua g mɔg sua k u nyuan u ninŋ, g tug u kua g cab Yendu, g jaand youg kul g miɛd’o.
54005006	Ama pekual nba mali ŋanduna manu po kukua, wano kpe o, g yen daa fo.
54005007	Ŋan baa ŋɔnŋ’b yal nba n nyan, g sua ń daa fid g jalg’b.
54005008	Nil gii g nyuan u naataani n ninŋ, mandg u ŋaag n yab, l daan bɔnd u kua i k u mɔg dindann. Yua g ban Kristo yal su’ug.
54005009	Pekual nba la bina piinluob kukua n dagd yen ŋan diɛn u sann g pugn pekɔlieb po. L pekual baa tie yua nba n kun jayend kua i,
54005010	g sun tuonŋana g niib ban. L tuonŋana tie k u ŋanm g ŋub u bid, g gaal saanm, g ŋuul Kristo‑yab titala, g tod niib nba be fala n ninŋ, g sun yal tenn g tie tuonŋana kul.
54005011	Ŋaa pekɔa nba tie puobid. G dugn jua maalm tan gii kua b yula n ninŋ yaa youg, b bu nyɔl Kristo i, g ji gii kpaan k ban kun jab.
54005012	Nnyan mɔ, b bu kpaan jalgi b kua po i, g dugn b g cɔln ban bo kpiɛ g puon Kristo yal nba.
54005013	Ban g mɔg siɛl yaa tuonn nyan, b ji baa waa g tuan ŋai i. L biɛ g tie k b waa fam mɔ, b waa yen mafinfam yen tuali i, g maad yal g la’b.
54005014	L po n te k n bua g pekɔa nba tie puobid ń guan g kun jab, g mal bid, g kub b ŋaag, g daa ŋaa k t ninnanda ń la sɔnu nba k b baa maad mabiid t po.
54005015	Pekɔsiɛb tud sɔnu g ŋuan Sitaan o.
54005016	Kristo‑yua ŋaag n gii mɔg pekɔa, wano n baa tod l pekɔa, k ban ji daa tie tugl Kristo‑yab nba tenn po, k ban fid g tod pekɔa nba g mɔg sua.
54005017	Nikpela nba ŋanm g kub Kristo‑yab tintaanu dagd yen ban la b tuonn nyuad taal munle ; mandg yab nba gbaa g muand Yendu maam g biɛ tund niib.
54005018	K l maa Yendu Kadaaɔg maad: « Naab nba tod’a k a pua dii, a kan lol u mɔb. » G biɛ maad: « L dagd g tuonsunn ń gaal u paaɔg. »
54005019	Nil gii baal yen maam a buol g jalg nikpel, ŋan daa tuo ; l gii g tie g niib banle bantaa i kaa taan g baal yen l maam.
54005020	Yab tu gii tien biid, ŋan fu yen’m niib kul nunŋ n, g lieb ń la g cegd.
54005021	N maad’a hal Yendu po, hal Yiesu Kristo po yen Yendu malɛg‑nba po, i cɔln min ŋɔn’a yal ne kul, g siɛl yaa paadu lann i kaa siɛl yaa lugdm ń daa be l n.
54005022	Daa tu jegl g maan nui sua po. Biɛ daa kuand a nuu sua biid n. Daa mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd.
54005023	Daa nyu nyum kua kaa. A tu gii tien ŋan nyu dimɔunŋ mɔ waam k lan ŋanm a tug n, g dugn a g ped yen yiɛlu.
54005024	Siɛb yaa biid tu tuod g nyuan k b daa g bu’b mɔno. Lieb mɔ, b tu bu’b yo, g fid g la b biid.
54005025	Tuonŋana mɔ tie nnyan i. L nyuan g g wuo baa waam. Yal nba wuo mɔ kan wai yen lan wuod.
54006001	Niib nba be yonmd n kul, ban gii ban k b yonmdanm tie yab nba dagd yen cɔlunŋ, ban gii cɔln’m, g niib ń daa maad mabiid Yendu po yen t tundl po.
54006002	Yab nba k b yonmdanm tie Kristo‑yab, ń daa tua k b kul tie ninjann g ji gii nund’b kaa. Banm n bu ŋanm gii suun b tuona mɔno, g dugn yonmdanm nba laad l tuona nyuad, b mɔ tie Kristo‑yab nba k b bua’b yen b pal kul i. Ŋan baa ŋɔnŋ niib g te k b suun yal n nyan.
54006003	Nil gii diɛ tundfann g tund lieb, g ŋaa t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo lanbona mɔno yen tundl nba tuag Yendu sɔnu,
54006004	l daan tie jipaadaan i. U tie yanbɔndaan nba ŋanm g buad mɔniɛɔg g biɛ kɔn yen lieb lanbona po i. Lann n baad yen nanŋ yen kunkɔna yen sugbiid yen maalbiid lieb po.
54006005	Lann n baad yen mɔniɛɔg nba g mɔg juog yukpiena siign, yab nba g siɛl yaa mamɔni ji g be b ninŋ. B mali k b bu tɔgn Yendu sɔnu i g mɔgd.
54006006	L kon tie mɔni i ; Yendu sɔnu tie mɔgm nba yab niib nba tuo k ban mɔg yal dagd b po.
54006007	G dugn t g baal yen siɛl ŋanduna n ninŋ, t biɛ tan kan fid g kun yen siɛl mɔ.
54006008	Lann, t gii mɔg jied yen tiɛd, tin tuo k l dagd t po.
54006009	Ama yab nba kpaan k ban mɔgd nyan, banm n tu baa bignn n yen diɛɔg n. B tu ŋanm g buad manu lan yabd, manu nba g mɔg niimn. Lann n biid niib, g kuand’b tudm n yen juodfam n ninŋ.
54006010	Yen mɔni, ligbuam n baad yen l tuonbiid kul. Siɛb tug b kua g cab ligli i, g buon b dindann, g maalm nba g mɔg dugl ji baal g gbie b pala n g ŋɔnŋ’b fala.
54006011	Fin tie Yendu nil i, lɔgl l bona kul ne. Mɔnd gii suun yal ŋan g dagd, g tug a kua g cab Yendu, gii mɔg dindann, gii bua niib, gii mɔg juunn, a yam ń gii dinŋ.
54006012	Kɔn kunkɔnn nba dagd dindann po. Mɔnd gii mɔg miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn, l po i g Yendu bo yiin’a, k fin mɔno biɛ bo tuo g maad k l tie mɔni sieda‑nba bonciɛnn nunŋ n.
54006013	N maad’a Yendu nunŋ n, wano nba tien bonn kul miɛl, yen Yiesu Kristo nunŋ n, wano nba bo maad mamɔni Pɔns Pilat nunŋ n g niib gbad,
54006014	i diɛ l mɔmaam, g siɛl yaa jɔgnd yen siɛl yaa jalgi ń daa be l n, saa yen youg nba k t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo tan bu legd.
54006015	Yedŋanmdaan n tan bu te wan legd wan bo sen yaa youg. Wano kukua n mɔg bonn kul yaa paalu. Wano n tie batieb yaa Bad yen yonmdanm yaa Yonmdaan.
54006016	Wano kukua n kan kpe, wano n be yinyiem nba yab n ninŋ, g nil kan fid g nagn. Sua g ban g la’ɔg, sua biɛ kan fid g la’ɔg. Wano n yen sel yen paaciɛnu youg kul. Amɛnn.
54006017	Maad ŋanduna ne ninŋ mɔgda k ban daa mɔg jipaad, g biɛ daa dug b mɔgm po, l tie sɔnŋu i. K ban gii dug Yendu po, wano n tien’ti bona kul k l yab k tin fid gii be k l man’ti.
54006018	Maad’b k ban gii tie ŋanm, g tuonŋana sunu ń gii tie b mɔgm. K b nui ń gii yaa, k b piin lieb paab yen papienn.
54006019	Nnyan b kpaan mɔgm nba ŋan g biɛ bu wai, g guund b kua youg nba baad ne ninŋ i. Lann n bu te ban la miɛl yen mɔni.
54006020	Timote, ŋanm gii kub ban guun’a yal nba. Lɔgl mafinfam, l g pugd dindann siɛl. G biɛ lɔgl mɔniɛɔg nba g niib g ban g tua k lann n tie banm.
54006021	Siɛb tug b kua g cab lann i, g buon b dindann. Yendu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen’i.
55001001	Min Pɔl n da kadaaɔg ne, Yendu yanbuam n i, k n tie Yiesu Kristo sundu. Yendu bo puon’ti miɛl, k l be Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ ; n be k min gii muand l laabaal i.
55001002	N fuond’a Timote, n bibuadg. T baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm a po, g te’a pasiɛdl yen yam nba dua.
55001003	Yendu n yen nyiɛɔg, min tu jaand, n tu tiɛd a po youg kul g tien Yendu balg, wano nba k n suun u tuonn yen papienn nyan n baa‑nba n bo sun nand nyan.
55001004	N tiɛn a ninsiid po, k n pal kɔn k n guan g la’a k n pal ń manŋ bonciɛnn.
55001005	N tiɛn ŋan dug Yiesu po yen papienn nba. A yaa Loyis yen a naa Enis n bo cind g mɔg l dindann. N ban k a mɔ l mɔg l dindann i.
55001006	L po n te k n tiɛd’a, k a ŋanm g kub paab nba g Yendu bo tie’a, min bo maan n nui a po yaa youg.
55001007	Yen mɔni, Yendu n tie’ti Foŋanm nba g tie yal baa kuand’ti jiwaani kaa. L tie yal bu kuan’ti paalu yen buam yen mindl i.
55001008	Lann daa jie fai yen ŋan maad ŋan ban yal t Yonmdaan Yiesu po, g biɛ daa jie fai n mɔ yaa po, min nba tie dansalg g dugn u po. Nyii Yendu n tie’a paalu nba po, g tuo g cagn yen’n Laabamann po.
55001009	Wano Yendu n fiel’ti g yiin’ti k tin gii tie u yab. L g tie t tuona po kaa, u ŋalbalg po i k u tien wan bo sen k u bu tien yal nba. U bo tie’ti l ŋalbalg i Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ, g sua ŋanduna daa g cil.
55001010	U ŋɔn’ti l ŋalbalg n nyan mɔlane t Fietua Yiesu Kristo baalu n ninŋ. G dugn Yiesu Kristo paad kuum, g ŋɔn’ti miɛl nba g mɔg gbennu n tie yal nba. U Laabamann ŋɔnŋ l miɛl i.
55001011	U tug min i, g tien u sundu, k n gii muand l Laabamann, gii ŋɔnŋ niib l niimn.
55001012	L po n te k n be cicagm ne ninŋ. L yen g mɔg’n fai g dugn n ban min tug n dindann g tien yua nba ninŋ, g biɛ dug u po k u bu fid g kub wan guun’n yal nba, saa yen l Daal.
55001013	Maŋanm nba k n ŋɔn’a nyan, i tuag l sɔnu, yen dindann yen buam nba g Yiesu Kristo tien’ti.
55001014	Foŋanm nba be t ninŋ ń tod’a k a ŋanm g kub tundŋann nba k a gaal.
55001015	A yen tuod g ban, yab nba be Asi po kul yad g ŋaa’n o. Figɛl yen Ɛrmogɛnn tie yenm‑nba n nyan b ninŋ.
55001016	T Yonmdaan ń jie Onesifɔr ŋaag yab ninbaaɔg, g dugn wano daan tund g paand n pal. U biɛ daan g jie fai yen min be yen kudsiseli.
55001017	Wan daan baal Rom, u daan kpaan’n mɔno g la fala yo, g tan la’n.
55001018	Buud daal gii pund Yonmdaan ń jie’og ninbaaɔg. A yen ban wan sun tuona nba kul n po Efɛs doug n.
55002001	N big, fin nuan ń paan a pal yen ŋalbalg nba k t mɔg Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ.
55002002	Min bo maad yal g niib bonciɛnn be g tie sieda‑nba, k a mɔ be g gbad nyan, tug g luan niib nba tie nimɔnm k a dug b po, yab bu fid g mɔ ń fand lieb.
55002003	Tuo g cagn nyan Yiesu Kristo sijemɔn nyan.
55002004	Sije nba bua g yua lugd’o pal ń gii man u po, u g suun tuonfana, l gii g tie sijenm tuona i kaa.
55002005	Niib mɔ gii bign gbigbaal k l mɔg pani, g yua nba g cɔln lan bo bual g gbigbaal ŋann ń tien nand, g gul u lua, l daan kan la pani.
55002006	Kpakuol mɔ biɛ gii ŋub g sun tuonn yen ninmɔnn, wano n bu cind g gaal kpaab jied.
55002007	Ŋanm g cenŋ min maad’a yal nba ; Yonmdaan bu tod’a ŋan gbad bonn kul niimn.
55002008	Tiɛd Yiesu Kristo po, wano nba tie Dafiid yaabuonn, g yied kpienm siign. N muand l laabaal n nyan.
55002009	L po i k n la fala, k b tan lol’n mɔno nyan n tie nikpiil nyan. Yendu maam nuan yen g luol.
55002010	L po n te k n tuo l kul ne, g dugn Yendu nigannkab po, k ban mɔ ń la fielu nba be Yiesu Kristo n ninŋ, yen yudand nba g mɔg gbennu.
55002011	Min bu maad yal ne tie mɔni i: Tinm yen wano gii taan g kpe, tinm yen wano n bu taan gii fo.
55002012	T gii tuo g bu taan g gaal fala yen’o, tinm yen wano n tan bu taan g di bal. T gii yie k t g ban’o, u mɔ tan bu yie k u g ban’ti.
55002013	T ji gii g cɔln t puoni yen’o, wano nuan baa l diɛ u puoni yen’ti ni, g dugn u kan fid g yie u kua.
55002014	I tiɛd a niib l bona kul ne, gii cegl’b Yendu nunŋ n k ban daa kɔn lanbona po. L g pugd siɛl, l biɛnd yab nba cenŋ l lanbona kua i.
55002015	Fin nuan ń mɔnd g ŋɔn a kua Yendu nunŋ n, k a tie nil nba k wano Yendu diid g sua k a sie k l paa, tuonsunn nba g fai g mɔg’o, yua nba diɛ mamɔni mɔmaam g ŋɔnŋ niib lan bual nand.
55002016	Daa kuand a kua mafinfam n ninŋ, lann buond nil dindann i. Yab nba tug b kua g kun l maam, l baa l fagnd’b yen Yendu i.
55002017	B maam tie nyan yiɛɔg nba tu dɔln dɔln g daan yend gbannand kul nyan i. Imene yen Filɛt tie l nibuolu i.
55002018	B ŋaa mamɔni sɔnu g tua g yiedu youg baal g pend o. B tie nnyan i, g niib bonciɛnn buond b dindann.
55002019	Ama Yendu fiɛgl nuan yen sie g paa ; k u diɛn banm l po. L banm n ne: « Yonmdaan ban yab nba tie u niib. » G biɛ pugn: « Yua nba taan Yonmdaan sann kul wan ŋaa tuonbiid sunu. »
55002020	Ŋaciɛnŋ n ninŋ, jetienbona nba k b tag yen wula lann i kaa yen ligtana kua kaa be. Daad yal be, g yɔug yal mɔ be. Yenn‑nba be sel po, g liel‑nba mɔ be tuona nba g tie sel yal po.
55002021	Lann nil gii nyan u kua biid nba k n maad ne ninŋ, u baa tie jetienbonn nba be sel po i. G dugn u ji g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd, u tie bonbuakal i ŋaagdaan po, g ŋan g dagd yen wan tug g sun tuonŋana kul.
55002022	Lɔgl tɔgu nba g nipaaɔnŋ paa g diɛ g suun yenn tuonn. Tɔgn mɔnkund yen dindann yen buam yen laafiɛ sɔnu yen niib nba taan Yonmdaan sann yen papienn.
55002023	Daa kua jadm n yen mafinfam mɔniɛɔg n. A yen ban, lann baad yen kunkɔna i.
55002024	Yonmdaan tuonsunn mɔ yen kan gii tie filkpaandaan. U baa tie yua nba k u yam dinŋ niib kul po, yua nba ban tundl, g mɔg panyiil.
55002025	Yam yen yam i k u baa ŋmagd yab yied u tundl, gii dug k l g kua Yendu bu te ban lebd b pala g bann mamɔni,
55002026	g ji guan g la maalŋanm g nya Sitaan diɛd n ninŋ ; wano n diɛ’b g niind’b k b suun wan bua yal nba.
55003001	Ŋanm gii ban g dijijuog dani n ninŋ, l baa paa.
55003002	Niib baa tie yab nba mali b po kua i, g ŋanm g bua ligli, g donŋ b kua, g mɔg jigbelm. B baa sugd Yendu, g g cɔln b danm. B kan gii mɔg ŋanm. B kan gii cɔln yal nba tie Yendu bonn kul.
55003003	B baa tie niib nba biɛ, g g jie nil ninbaaɔg, g mɔg sanjounŋ, g mɔg jad, g mɔg tonu. B kan gii bua tuonŋana nublu.
55003004	B baa tie niib nba kuad b lieb i, niib nba k b yam ton, g jipaad gbie yul, k b bua yal nba man b po g cie Yendu.
55003005	B baa tie bona nba naan nyan niib nba ŋua Yendu yen b pal kul nyan i, g yen yie yal nba tie dindann paalu mɔno. Daa kuand a kua l nibuolu n ninŋ.
55003006	B ninŋ yenm be g tu kua ŋai n ninŋ, g la puoliini nba sun tuonbiid nba l be kul, yab kpaan manu nba g mɔg niimn kul, g bɔnd’b ban gii ŋua’b.
55003007	L puobuolu n l banŋ youg kul, g yen kan ban g bann mamɔni.
55003008	Nyan Sanɛs yen Sanbrɛs n bo yie Moyis maam nyan, l nibuolu mɔ tie nnyan i, b yie mamɔni sɔnu u. B tie niib nba k b yula kpe, k b dindann juan g lenŋ i.
55003009	B bɔndug kan gad fagm, g dugn l kan wai yen niib kul ń bann b yukpientuona nyan niib n bo tuod g bann Sanɛs yen Sanbrɛs tɔgu nyan.
55003010	Fin nuan ŋanm g gbad n tundl, g ban n binbem, g ban n pal n kɔn k n sun yal nba, g ban n dindann, g ban n mindl, g ban n buam yen n juunn.
55003011	A ban fala nba k b ŋɔn’n yen cicagm nba k n cagn Antiyɔs yen Ikoniyɔm yen Listr. Fala buollanu po i k n g la i ? Ama Yonmdaan yen nyan’n l kul ne ninŋ.
55003012	L kon tie mɔni i, yab nba kul ŋua Yiesu Kristo g bua ban gii tuag Yendu sɔnu, b bu cagn’m.
55003013	Ama tondanm yen jabaabuula nuan baa l tie biid i, g saa liig. B baa l bɔnd niib i, g bɔnd b kua.
55003014	Fin ń ŋanm gii diɛ ŋan banŋ yal nba, g tuo k l tie mɔni. A yen ban ŋan banŋ niib nba buol.
55003015	A bim n yo k a bo tuod g ban diɛni nba be Yendu Kadaaɔg n g bu fid g te’a yanfuom, ŋan gii dug Yiesu po g la fielu.
55003016	Yendu Kadaaɔg n diɛni kul nyiɛ Yendu buol i. L ŋan g bu fid g tund nil, g te wan bann k wan suun yal g ŋan, g ŋmagd’o, g ŋɔn’o binbem nba dagd Yendu nunŋ n.
55003017	Nnyan i, g Yendu nil bu fid g ŋanm g bobn g gbenn gii suun tuona nba ŋan kul.
55004001	N maad’a Yendu nunŋ n yen Yiesu Kristo nunŋ n, wano nba tan bu baal g bu fuodb yen kpienm, wan bu baal gii tie bad po n te k n maad’a,
55004002	k a gii muand Yendu maam youg kul, l gii man yaa youg uu, l gii g man yaa youg uu, fin ń tu ŋanm g maad g led led. I ŋmagd niib, gii fu yen’m, gii paand b pala. Tu kpi yam o gii ŋɔnŋ’b l kul ne, k lan ŋanm g te’b tundl.
55004003	Yen mɔni, youg baad k l tan baa yiɛl siɛb yen ban gii cenŋ mamɔni tundl mɔno. B baa ŋua b pala n kɔn bona nba po i, g kpaan gbanbanda bonciɛnn g kul b kua.
55004004	B tuba n ninŋ n yaan saad nyan, b ji bu ŋaa mamɔni tundl yo, g ji gii cenŋ b kpelug.
55004005	Fin nuan ń suol a kua bonn kul n ninŋ. Tuo g gaal fala, g muand Laabamann, g ŋanm g sun Yendu tuonn g juod.
55004006	Min nuan yaa youg pund o. B ji diɛ n sɔm g wulg g yid salg i. N kun daal pund o.
55004007	N kɔn kunkɔnn nba ŋan, g san nantaal g gbenn, g kub n dindann.
55004008	Mɔla po n nantaal pani ji dua g guu’n i. L mɔnkund pani i k t Yonmdaan bu te’n buud daal, wano nba tie mɔnkund buuddaan. U kan te min kukua kaa, u bu te yab nba guu u legdu yen b pala kul i.
55004009	Mɔnd g tien tonm g baal n buol,
55004010	g dugn Demas mand g buad ŋanduna ne manu, g yaad g gad Tɛsaloniik g ŋaa’n o. Kresɛs gad Galasi, Tiit mɔ gad Dalmasi u.
55004011	Luk kukua n ji be yen’n. Tug Mark g baal yen’o nii, u bu tod’n bonciɛnn n tuonn n ninŋ.
55004012	N sun Tisiik Efɛs doug n.
55004013	A gii baad, ŋan tug gbagdl nba k n daan ŋaa Trowas, Karpus buol nyan nii. Tug kadaad kul nii, n pal ŋanm g kɔn bonkobgband nba k b da l po nyan i.
55004014	Alɛksandr, yua nba tie mamaal nyan, daan tien’n yal nba bi paaa. T Yonmdaan n bu ŋmiɛn’o u biid nyuad.
55004015	Mɔ ń lɔgl’o, g dugn u daan yie t tundl yen jad bonciɛnn.
55004016	Ban daan cind g bu bu’n yaa daal nba, sua daan g sed n puol po. B kul daan yad g ŋaa’n i. Yendu ń daa jalg’b l po.
55004017	T Yonmdaan nuan daan taa n po, g tie’n paalu k n muand Laabamann lan bual nand, g yab g tie Suif‑nba kul gbad. Wano n daan nyan’n kuum fiɛl n ninŋ.
55004018	Wano n bu nyan’n bonbiil kul n ninŋ g fiel’n, g te min gad u diem n ninŋ polu po. Yudand ń gii tie u yal, mɔlane saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog ! Amɛnn.
55004019	Fuond Priska yen Akilas yen Onesifɔr ŋaag yab n po.
55004020	Erast daa be Korɛnt. Trofiim mɔ daan yiɛl k n gbal g ŋaa’ɔg Mile.
55004021	Mɔnd g baal g sua g fawaaɔg youg daa g baal. Ebuul yen Pudɛs yen Linus yen Klodia yen t ninjanm kul fuond’a.
55004022	Yonmdaan ń gii be yen’a. U ŋalbalg ń gii be yen i kul.
56001001	Min Pɔl, Yendu tuonsunn yen Yiesu Kristo sundu, Yendu lugd min i g sun’n u nigannkab buol. U sun’n k n ŋɔn’m dindann sɔnu i, g te ban bann mamɔni nba ŋɔnŋ Yendu sɔnu ;
56001002	k b pala ń gii paa k b bu la miɛl nba g mɔg gbennu. Yendu nba g fa faaɔg bo puon’ti l miɛl i, g sua g ŋanduna daa g be.
56001003	T Fietua Yendu pibd u maam g ŋɔn’ti wan bo sen yaa youg. U tie’n l maam i, g cab’n mɔb k n muand.
56001004	Tiit, n da kadaaɔg ne g tien fin i, fin nba k n tug’a k a tie n big yen mɔni t dindann n. T Baa Yendu yen t Fietua Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm a po, g te k a yam ń gii dua.
56001005	N daan ŋaa’a Krɛt doug n mii a ŋanm g ŋmagd yal nba daan tenn i, g gann doug n ninŋ kul Kristo‑yab nikpela, nyan min daan maad’a nand nyan.
56001006	Nikpel baa tie nil nba g mɔg ban bu jalg’o yal nba po. U baa mɔg puoyend kua i, u bid ń gii tie yab nba ŋua Yendu, g sua kan fid g jalg’b k b mɔg bibiɛdm lann i kaa ninkuam.
56001007	Yen mɔni, Kristo‑yab liig yua tuonn tie k wan gii nyuan Yendu tuona n ninŋ i. Lann u kan gii mɔg ban bu jalg’o yal nba po. U kan gii tie jipaadaan, lann i kaa mutodaan, lann i kaa dinyuul, lann i kaa filkpaandaan, lann i kaa yua nba kpaan k wan di jod g mɔgd.
56001008	U baa tie nil nba ban saanm gaalu, g bua ŋanm, g tie bona kul g dagd, g tie nimɔn, g tie yua tug u kua g cab Yendu, g so u kua.
56001009	U baa tie yua nba tug u munn g cab laabaal nba dagd g nil ń tuo k l tie mɔni, yal nba tuag t tundl sɔnu. Nnyan i, k u bu fid g paan lieb pala yen tundŋann, g biɛ ŋmagd yab nba g tuo l tundl.
56001010	Min n maad’a, niib bonciɛnn be g tie kangbada nba yie tundŋann g diɛ mafinfam g bɔnd lieb. L niib ŋanm g yab Suif‑nba nba tie Kristo‑yab ninŋ i.
56001011	Bel’b k ban daa tie nnyan. B bua ligli i, g tund niib yal nba g dagd yen ban tund’b. B tie nnyan i, g tu bɔnd ŋamunn niib g kuan’m muaɔg.
56001012	Banm Krɛt yab siign ninŋ niyend, b ninnyuantua mɔno n bo maad: « Krɛt yaa niib kul l fa faaɔg u youg kul. B tie muaɔg n bonkobbiid i, b tie gbannyagdanm nba l mali b puol po kua i. »
56001013	U kon maad mɔni i. L po n te k l tie mabl k a gii fu yen’m, k ban gii diɛ dindann nba tuag tundŋann sɔnu.
56001014	Ban daa cenŋ Suif‑nba kpelug, g biɛ daa ŋua niib nba yie mamɔni nyan kɔa.
56001015	Bonn kul ŋan i canyiin niib nba mɔg maalŋanm po, ama siɛl g ŋan yab nba mɔg maalbiid po, banm n yie Yendu. G dugn b maalm n yen b pala n ninŋ kul bi i.
56001016	B yed k b ŋua Yendu i ama b bontitied yen ŋɔn k b yie’og. B tie nicala i, kangbada, b kan fid g sun siɛl yaa tuonŋann.
56002001	Fin nuan ń gii tund yal nba tuag tundŋann sɔnu.
56002002	Maad janikpela k ban daa mɔg tubonm, k ban gii cɔln b kua, gii ceg, k ban ŋanm gii kub b dindann yen b buam yen b juunn k l paa.
56002003	Maad puonikpela mɔ, k b binbem n ninŋ, ban ŋɔn k b tie papiendanm Yendu nunŋ n. Ban daa mɔg sanjounŋ g biɛ daa tug b kua g kun daam mɔ. Ban gii tien cegli nba ŋan,
56002004	g puobid ń fid g bann ban bu tien nand gii bua b salb yen b bid,
56002005	gii so b kua, gii tie papiendanm, g ŋanm gii kub b ŋai, gii tie nimɔnm, g daa kand b salb mɔi po. Nnyan i, g sua kan fid g maad mabiiug Yendu maam po.
56002006	Te g naasenm ń mɔ ń gii tie bonn kul g dagd.
56002007	Fin mɔno ń mɔnd k a binbem n ninŋ, ban la a buol g bann yal tie tuonŋana ; a tundl ń gii tie papienn tundl, g cɔlunŋ be l n.
56002008	A maam ń gii tuag sɔnpienu g daa mɔg siɛl yaa jalgi. Lann i g yab nba kpaan k ban gii kɔn yen’ti kan la siɛl yaa mabiiug g maad t po. Fai ji bu kua’b i.
56002009	Bonn kul n ninŋ, yonmi ń daa kand b yonmdanm mɔi po. Ban gii tie b yonmdanm n bua yal nba kul, g daa nai b maam,
56002010	g daa jaan siɛl. Ban gii ŋɔnŋ youg kul k b tie niib nba dagd k ban gii dug b po. Nnyan i, k b bu te t Fietua Yendu tundl ń baal pinpagd bonn kul n ninŋ.
56002011	Yen mɔni, Yendu ŋɔn u ŋalbalg. Niib kul fielu nya l buol i.
56002012	L ŋalbalg ŋɔnŋ’ti k tin ŋaa binbebiiug yen ŋanduna ne manu. K t binbem n ninŋ, tin gii so t kua, gii tie bona lan bual nand, gii tuag Yendu sɔnu,
56002013	g sua k tin guu pamann daal nba pund. L daal i k t Yenduciɛɔnŋ, t Fietua Yiesu Kristo yudand bu legd.
56002014	Wano mɔno n gaal t po g kpe, k wan nyan’ti bonbiil kul n ninŋ, g penn t pala k tin gii tie buolu nba k wano kukua yen’ti ; k t pala kɔn tuonŋana po.
56002015	Ŋan baa tund yal nba n nyan. I paand b pala, gii ŋmagd yab nba biil, yen a yikod kul. Daa ŋaa sua ń nund’a.
56003001	Tiɛd b kul, k ban daa kand buuddanm yen yikodanm mɔb po. K ban gii cɔln’m, g bobn g gbenn g fid g sun yal nba tie tuonŋann kul.
56003002	Maad’b k ban daa sugd sua, g biɛ daa kɔn yen sua mɔ. K ban tuo niib kul, gii ŋɔnŋ’b youg kul k b pala siɛd b po.
56003003	Siɛnyoug t mɔ bo g mɔg yam. T bo tie kangbada i. T bo kpiɛd sɔnu, g tug t kua g cab niɛnŋ nba g ŋan yen manu nba g mɔg niimn. T bo be yen tonu yen nanŋ i, g gbie yen tugmɔunŋ, g g bua t lieb nublu.
56003004	Ama yaa daal nba g Yendu t Fietua ŋɔn u bulcind yen u buam niib po,
56003005	u g diid tuonŋana nba k t bo fid g sun kaa g fiel’ti, u jie’ti ninbaaɔg u, g fiel’ti. U fiel’ti t nyunwulu buol i, g Foŋanm te k t guan g mal, k u tie’ti binbepaanm.
56003006	U tie’ti Foŋanm k l yab t Fietua Yiesu Kristo po.
56003007	U tien nnyan k u ŋalbalg po, tin te nimɔnm Yendu nunŋ n i, g tan di faal, gii mɔg miɛl nba kan gbenn. T guu lann i.
56003008	Min maad yal ne tie mɔni i. L po n te k n bua k a ŋanm g ŋɔn niib l niimn, g yab nba dug Yendu po kul ń ŋmigd g sun tuonŋana. Yal nba ŋan g biɛ tie bonmɔnn niib po n nyan.
56003009	Ama ŋan lɔgl mɔniɛɔg nba g mɔg niimn yen yaajanm sana nba k b taan k l g mɔg juog, g lɔgl kunkɔna yen mɔniɛɔg Yendu Mɔmaam po, g dugn l kul ne g tie bonmɔnn, l biɛ g mɔg siɛl yaa nyuad.
56003010	Yua nba kpaan g niib ń paad yen lieb, k a cegl’o yenm, g guan g cegl’o munle k u yie, ŋan nyɔl’o.
56003011	Fin mɔno a ban k l daan kpiɛd sɔnu u. U biid mɔno n bu guan g suol’o.
56003012	N bu sun Artemas lann i kaa Tisiik a buol. B ninŋ ne yend gii pund, ŋan mɔnd g cend’n Nikopolis. Fawaaɔg ne n baa be l po i.
56003013	Mɔnd g tod Senas nba tie buud maband yen Apolɔs, b gii saa b sɔnu, siɛl ń daa pɔd’b.
56003014	L tie k t niib ń mɔ ń yabl g banŋ tuonŋana sunu i. G nyan mɔlane payiɛnu, ban daa bund g be fam.
56003015	Yab nba be n buol ne kul fuond’a. Fuond yab nba bua’ti dindann n ninŋ. Yendu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen i kul.
57001001	Min Pɔl, n be dansaldieog n ninŋ g dugn Yiesu Kristo po i, min n da kadaaɔg ne, min yen t ninja Timote. T fuond’a Filemɔn, fin nba n tie t dɔnnmɔn g biɛ tie t tuonsunlua,
57001002	g fuond t niipuo Apia yen t tuonsunlua Arsiip nba mɔ gbaa Yendu tuonn po, g biɛ fuond Kristo‑yab nba taand lieb a ŋaag n ninŋ nyan mɔ.
57001003	T Baa Yendu yen t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po g biɛ te k i yam ń gii dua.
57001004	N tiɛn a po youg kul n jaandi n ninŋ g tiend Yendu balg a po,
57001005	k l maa n gbad ŋan dug Yonmdaan Yiesu po g biɛ bua Kristo‑yab kul nand.
57001006	N miɛd Yendu k ŋan mɔg dindann nba g diɛ g bɔgd lieb nyan ń ŋanm g cie a ninŋ, g te g niib ń bann tin be yen Kristo g Yendu tie’ti ŋanm nba kul.
57001007	N ninja, ŋan bua Kristo‑yab nand nyan manŋ n pal hal bonciɛnn g biɛ te k n pal paag g dugn a paan Kristo‑yab pala.
57001008	L po n te g Kristo n ninŋ n bo bu fid g ŋɔn’a ŋan bu sun yal nba,
57001009	g nyaan n yen bua k n miɛl’a miɛdug buam sɔnu n i. Min Pɔl, min yua tie nikpel, g biɛ be dansaldieog n ninŋ mɔlane g dugn Kristo po nyan,
57001010	n miɛd’a sugl n bija Onesiim po k l maa dansaldieog n ninŋ ne i k n ŋɔn’o Laabamann k u te Kristo‑yua.
57001011	Siɛnyoug u bo g tie siɛl a po, ama mɔlane nuan u ji tie yua nba bu fid g tod min yen fin kul i.
57001012	N lebnd’o a buol n nyan, wano nba k n bua’ɔg yen n pal kul.
57001013	N bo sun k wan gii be n buol i, g gaal a yiɛl gii suun n tuona youg nba k n daa be dansaldieog n ninŋ g dugn Laabamann po ne.
57001014	Ama n yen g bua k n tien siɛl k a g cab’n, g ŋanm nba k a bo bu tien n po ń ji tan daa tie nyan niinn bonn nyan. N bua k lan nya a po i.
57001015	L bu fid g tuu k Onesiim bo yaad a buol k l gii yann waam nne, ŋan guan g la’ɔg wan gii be yen’a youg kul i.
57001016	Yen mɔni, mɔlane nuan u ji g tie yonm kukua kaa, u mɔn g cie yonm. U tie t ninja i, niib bua u maam. N mɔ bua u maam hal bonciɛnn. Ama fin n biɛ baa mand g bua’ɔg hal bonciɛnn g dugn u tie nil g biɛ tie Kristo‑yua.
57001017	Lann, l gii tie k a yiin’n a tuonsunlua, ŋan gaal’o nyan a gaal min mɔno i nyan.
57001018	U gii biil’a siɛl lann i kaa u gii mɔg a pann, ŋan tun’n l pann.
57001019	Min Pɔl mɔno n da yen n nuu lanbona ne: n bu pa’a l pann. N g bua k n tiɛd’a k fin mɔno yaa miɛl tie pann k a bu pa’n kaa.
57001020	Lann n ninja, mɔnd g sun l tuonn n po g dugn Yonmdaan po. Te k n yam ń duan g dugn Kristo po.
57001021	N dug a cɔlunŋ po i g da’a. N ban k a yen bu tien yal cie min miɛl’a yal mɔno.
57001022	Bobn dieog mɔ n po k l maa n mɔg dindann k i jaandi bu te k ban luod’n k n guan i buol.
57001023	Epafras, yua k min yen wano taan g be dansaldieog n ninŋ g dugn Kristo po nyan fuond’a.
57001024	N tuonsunlieb Mark yen Aristark yen Demas yen Luk mɔ biɛ fuond’a.
57001025	T Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po.
58001001	Siɛnyoug Yendu bo tɔgn sɔni bonciɛnn g te k u sogni‑nba maad yen t yaajanm k l g luol taal fuunu munŋaa.
58001002	Ama dijijuog dani nba k t be ne, Yendu te k u Bija maad yen’ti. Yendu tag bonn kul yen wano i, g tug’o k u tie yua nba tan bu yend bonn kul.
58001003	U ninŋ i k t nyuan Yendu yudand. Yendu n tie nand, u mɔ l tie nnyan i. U maam nba mɔg paalu nyan n te g ŋanduna n ninŋ, bonn kul sie l sinsienu n. U bo te g niib biid piin g gbenn, k u ji duo g kal Yendu yudanddaan jendu polu po,
58001004	g Yendu te k u cie malɛg‑nba. Nyan Yendu n te k u cie’b nyan, k u pul’o sann nba mɔg yudand g cie b sana.
58001005	Yen mɔni Yendu g ban g maad malɛg sua k nne: « A tie n Bija i, dinne min n tie a Baa. » U biɛ g ban g maad malɛg: « Min n baa tie u Baa, u mɔ baa tie n Bija i. »
58001006	G nyaan Yendu n bo tan suun u Bija nba mɔg nuu bonn kul po yaa youg nba ŋanduna n ninŋ, k u maad g: « Malɛg‑nba kul ń gii pug’o. »
58001007	Malɛg‑nba po nuan, Yendu maad k nne: « U tu te u malɛg‑nba ń te nyan faalu nyan i, g te u tuonsunna ń te nyan muupienu nyan. »
58001008	Ama u Bija yaa po nuan Yendu maad: « Yendu, a baa kal a badkog po i, youg ń tuu youg. A baa diɛ a baddanml i g ŋmagd a niib yen mɔnkund.
58001009	Ŋan buad mɔnkund g yie bonbiil nyan po n te k a Yendu lugd’a g tien kpam a yul po yen pamann. U buad fin i g cie a lieb kul. »
58001010	G Yendu biɛ maad: « Yonmdaan, cilg youg fin n tag tinŋ, g biɛ tag polu yen a nui.
58001011	Polu yen tinŋ bu bod, ama fin nuan baa l be i. L kul ne tan bu cad nyan liɛdl nyan i,
58001012	ŋan pɔbn’m nyan ban tu pɔbn liɛdl nand nyan. B bu lebd’b nyan ban tu lebd tiɛɔg nand nyan i, ama fin nuan g mɔg lebdu, k a miɛl mɔ biɛ kan ban g gbenn. »
58001013	Yendu biɛ g ban g maad malɛg sua k nne: « Kal n jendu, saa yen min tan bu te ŋan paad a ninnanda. »
58001014	Malɛg‑nba tie b lɛ i ? B tie yab nba suun Yendu po, g dond’o i, k u tu sun’m k ban gad g tod yab nba bu la fielu.
58002001	L po n te k l bual k tin ŋanm g gaal tundl nba k t gbad g tan daa tud sɔnu.
58002002	G dugn malɛg‑nba n bo muand t yaajanm laabaal nba gii tie yal nba g niib dug l po, k l biɛ bo gii tie g nil kpiɛd g g cɔln l laabaal, k l baal yen tubdadu u po k l dagd yen wan kpiɛd nand nba nyan,
58002003	l ji bu tien nle i k l kan baal yen tubdadu t yaa po, l gii sua k t nyɔl g g yiin l fielu maam nba mɔn nyan siɛl i ? G dugn Yonmdaan mɔno n bo kpiɛ g maad l fielu maam. G yab nba bo gbad maad’ti k l maam tie mɔni.
58002004	G Yendu mɔ ŋɔn k l maam tie mɔni g sun yaalidug yen palug tuona, g biɛ pii niib Foŋanm paab nyan u yam n bua nand nyan.
58002005	Yen mɔni tin maad ŋanduna nba po ne, Yendu g cab malɛg‑nba kaa k ban gii mɔg nuu l po.
58002006	L yen diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n siɛl buol k nne: « Yendu, nifosaal tie bɛ i, k a baa tiɛn u po i, Nifuog tie bɛ i, k a baa nyuan u ninŋ i ?
58002007	A bo yuan’o youg waam nne g malɛg‑nba cie’og, g yuand g tie’og yudand yen sel,
58002008	g te k u mɔg nuu bonn kul po. » Yendu n bo cab’o k u mɔg nuu bonn kul po nyan, siɛl g tenn k u g mɔg nuu l po. Ama tinm yen daa g nyuan k u mɔg nuu bonn kul po.
58002009	G nyaan tin la yal nba n ne: yua nba g Yendu bo yuan’o youg waam nne g te g malɛg‑nba cie’og nyan, Yiesu i. Ama mɔlane Yendu guan g tie’og sel yen yudand, g dugn u tuo g cagn g kpe niib kul po. Yendu ŋalbalg po i k u tuo l cicagkuum.
58002010	Yen mɔni, Yendu n tag bonn kul, bonn kul tie u yal i. U bo bua k u bid bonciɛnn ń gaal u yudand i. L po n te k l bo dagd yen wan te g Yiesu ń gii tie yua nba dagd yen wan sun u tuonn, g dugn wan tuo g gaal fala nba nyan po. Yiesu n kon tie yua nba luod sɔnu g te g lieb la fielu.
58002011	Wano n te g niib ŋan g dagd Yendu po. Wano yen yab nba k u te k b ŋan g dagd Yendu po nyan kul taa Baa i. L po n te k u g jie fai yen wan yiin’m u ninjanm,
58002012	g biɛ maad: « N bu ŋɔn n ninjanm ŋan tie yua nba, a tintaanu siign min yin g dond’a. »
58002013	G Yiesu biɛ maad k nne: « N baa dug n Yendu po i. » G biɛ maad: « Min yen bid nba g Yendu kubn’n n nyan. »
58002014	Lann, nyan l bid n tie nifoi g mɔg gbannand yen sɔm nyan, Yiesu mɔ bo te nifuog nyan banm nyan i, g kpe k wan biil Sitaan, yua nba mɔg paalu kuum po,
58002015	g yab nba k b binbem ninŋ kul k b bo jie kuum g tie yonmi nyan, wan nyan’m l n ninŋ.
58002016	Yen mɔni Yiesu bo g baal k wan tod malɛg‑nba kaa, u bo baal k wan tod Abraham yaabuona i.
58002017	L po n te k u bo bu nand canyiin yen u ninjanm k wan fid g te salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba jie niib ninbaaɔg, g ciib Yendu tuonn n ninŋ. Nnyan i k u bu fid g tug u kua g yid salg g piin niib biid.
58002018	Bignn n bo baal’o k u la fala bonciɛnn nyan po n te g yab nba g bigna baal’b, k u bu fid g tod’b.
58003001	N naataani, yinm nba tie Yendu yab k u yiin’i k yin taan g te u buolu nyan, lann, i ninbina ń gii maa Yiesu po. Yendu sun wano i k tin dug yal nba po g maad niib nunŋ n nyan, wan gii tie l salg-yidkab kul ciɛn.
58003002	U bo lugd wano i k wan sun l tuonn, k u biɛ sun l tuonn lan bual nand nyan Moyis n bo sun nand Yendu ŋaag n yab po g g kpiɛd nyan.
58003003	Yiesu bo dagd yenn i g gaal yudand nba yab g cie Moyis yal. L tie nyan tanmaal n tu maa ŋaag nyan i. B tu pag tanmaal i, b g pag ŋaag kaa.
58003004	Yen mɔni ŋaag kul mɔg yua nba maa’ɔg u. Ama Yendu n maa bonn kul.
58003005	Moyis bo tie tuonsunn i, g sun lan bual nand Yendu ŋaag n yab po. U tuonn bo tie k wan gii ŋɔnŋ niib Yendu n bo tan bu maad yal i.
58003006	Mɔlane Kristo n ji suun lan bual nand. Ama wano tie Yendu Bija i, g mɔg nuu u Baa Yendu ŋaag po. Tinm n tie u ŋaag, l gii tie k t pala paa k t biɛ mɔg pamann tin daan yal nba po.
58003007	L po n te g Foŋanm maad k nne: « Dinne, i gii gbad Yendu niɛlu,
58003008	yin daa nyal i tuba nyan i yaajanm n bo yie k b kan cenŋ Yendu, g bign’o youg nba k b bo be tinkuonŋ n ninŋ nyan.
58003009	Yendu bo maad: “ L tinkuonŋ n ninŋ i, k i yaajanm bo bign’n k ban diid’n, yen ban bo l la n tuona
58003010	bina piinna siign kul. Lann i k n pal bie b po k n maad: ‘B l tun g tud sɔnu i, B g bann n sɔni.’
58003011	L pabienn n ninŋ k n pol g maad: ‘B kan ban g kua doug nba ninŋ k min Yendu bo bobn b po, k ban kua g fuod nyan.’ ” »
58003012	Lann n naataani, suol man i kua k i ninŋ baa sua ń tan daa mɔg maalbiiug u pal n ninŋ, g yie g nyɔl dindann k lan fagn’o yen Yendu nba fo.
58003013	Ama i paand man i lieb pala daal ń tuu daal yaa youg nba k t ji be ne, k i siign ninŋ sua ń tan daa baa biid n ninŋ k lan te k wan yie Yendu.
58003014	Yen mɔni, t te Kristo yegni n nyan, l gii tie k t ŋanm g sie k l paa saa yen juog, nyan tin bo kpiɛ g sie nand nyan.
58003015	Lan diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad yal nba n ne: « Dinne, i gii gbad Yendu niɛlu, yin daa nyal i tuba nyan i yaajanm n bo yie k b kan cenŋ Yendu nyan. »
58003016	Yen mɔni, b lɛ n bo gbad Yendu niɛlu u, g yie g g cenŋ’o i ? L g tie yab nba kul bo nyiɛ Esipt doug n ninŋ g Moyis ŋmagd’b nyan kaa aa ?
58003017	Yendu pal bo bie b lɛ po i bina piinna siign i ? L g tie yab nba bo tien biid g kpe tinkuonŋ n ninŋ nyan kaa aa ?
58003018	K b lɛ i g Yendu bo pol g maad k b kan ban g kua doug nba ninŋ k u bo bobn b po k ban kua g fuod nyan i ? L g tie yab nba bo yie k b kan cenŋ’o nyan kaa aa ?
58003019	Lann t la k b bo g fid g kua g dugn b bo g dug Yendu po.
58004001	Yendu n bo puon puoni nba k u bobn fuom k u niib bu fuod nyan, l puoni biɛ daa l be i. Lann, suol man i kua k i ninŋ sua ń daa ŋaa k lan paad’o k u kan la l fuom.
58004002	G dugn t mɔ gbad l laabamann nyan yab nba bo be tinkuonŋ n ninŋ n bo gbad nyan i. Ama laabaal nba k b bo gbad nyan, b bo g duo siɛl yaa nyuad l po, g dugn youg nba k b bo gbad l laabaal b bo g tuo g gaal k l tie mɔni.
58004003	Yen mɔni, tinm nba tuo g gaal l laabaal, tinm n bu la Yendu fuom. U maad l fuom po k nne: « N pabienn n ninŋ i, k n bo pol g maad k nne: “ B kan ban g kua doug nba ninŋ k min Yendu bo bobn b po k ban kua g fuod nyan. ” » Yendu n bo maad nand n nyan, g yen sua k u bo bobn l fuom, g sun u tuonn g gbenn hal ŋanduna cilg youg o,
58004004	g dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ siɛl buol g maad daa ŋanlile daal po k nne: « Yendu bo sun u tuona kul g gbenn, g daa nlile daal k u fuod. »
58004005	L biɛ diɛn l buol g maad: « B kan ban g kua doug nba ninŋ k min Yendu bo bobn b po k ban kua g fuod nyan. »
58004006	Yab nba bo kpiɛ g gbad l laabaal bo g la Yendu n bo bobn fuom nba b po nyan g fuod, g dugn b bo g tuo g gaal k l tie mɔni. Yen l yaa kul nifanm be g bu fid g la l fuom g fuod.
58004007	L po n te g Yendu guan g sen daal g yi l daal g dinne. Yendu n bo maad yen t yaajanm, l bo wai yo, k u tan te g Dafiid maad l daal po nyan tin kpiɛ g diɛn nand nyan: « Dinne, i gii gbad Yendu niɛlu, yin daa nyal i tuba. »
58004008	Yen mɔni, l bo gii tie g Sosuwe te k b la fuom, Yendu biɛ ji bo tan kan gii maad diliel po.
58004009	Lann, l bua n maad g fuom biɛ daa tenn g be Yendu niib po. L fuom tie nyan Yendu n bo fuod daa nlile daal nyan i.
58004010	Lann, yua nba la Yendu n bo puon fuom nba g fuod, u mɔ gbenn u tuona g ji fei nyan Yendu n bo gbenn u yal g fuod nand nyan i.
58004011	L yaa po, tin gii gbaa man k tin la l fuom g fuod, g baa sua ń tan daa ŋmaa t yaajanm taabuod n ninŋ g mɔ ń yie g kan cenŋ Yendu g kua tudm n.
58004012	Yen mɔni, Yendu maam suun tuonn g biɛ mɔg paalu. L biɛ man g cie jug nba man u mɔi nle kul po. L tu kua hal t ninŋ g daan sii t pala, g kua hal t tugda ninŋ yen t kpaba ninŋ, g ŋɔn t pala n ninŋ yen t maalm n ninŋ yal ŋan yen yal nba g ŋan.
58004013	Baa siɛl g be g wuo Yendu po. Wan tag yal nba kul, u nyuan l kul ne g ban yal n tie kul. U buol i g sua kul tan bu sed g dugn wan sun yal nba kul.
58004014	Tin mɔg salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba ne g mɔg u lua. Wano n tie Yiesu, Yendu Bija nba duo hal polu po g pund Yendu buol. Lann, l bual k tin ŋanm gii diɛ tin dug yal po k lan gii paa i.
58004015	Tin ji mɔg salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba ne g tie yua nba kan fid g jie’ti ninbaaɔg t gbalm youg kaa. B bign’o bona kul ninŋ nyan tinm nyan, ama wano g ban g tien biid.
58004016	Lann, tin gii nagd man Yendu badkog buol yen papaal, l buol i g ŋalbalg be. Yendu bu jie’ti ninbaaɔg, tin la u ŋalbalg youg nba k t bua todl.
58005001	B tu lugd salg-yidkab kul ciɛn kul niib siign i, g kaan’o k wan gii suun Yendu tuonn niib po. U tuonn tie k wan tu pi Yendu paab i, g biɛ yid’o salg niib biid po.
58005002	Nyan wano mɔno n tie gbalmdaan nyan, lann u bu fid g sɔnŋ yam g tod yab nba tie yanbɔndanm g tud sɔnu.
58005003	L gbalm po i k l bual k wan tu yid salg, l g tie niib biid po kukua kaa, ama yen wano mɔno biid po.
58005004	Sua g ban g din u kua yudand k wano n tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn, ama Yendu n tu din nil nyan wan bo din Aharɔn nand nyan.
58005005	L biɛ tie nnyan i Kristo mɔ yaa po. Wano mɔno kaa bo din u kua yudand k u tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn, ama Yendu n bo din’o g maad: « A tie n Bija i, dinne min n tie a Baa. »
58005006	G biɛ maad liel buol k nne: « Fin n tie salg-yidkua youg ń tuu youg nyan Mɛlkisedɛk nyan. »
58005007	Yiesu n yaan bo be tinŋ po ne, u bo jaand g don niɛlu g buud g fabn g miɛl Yendu nba bu fid g nyan’o kuum n. Wan bo jiin u kua Yendu nunŋ n nyan po n te k u bo cenŋ u jaandi.
58005008	Yen wan bo l tie Yendu Bija kul, wan bo cagn cicagbuolu nba kul bo te k u bann cɔlnn.
58005009	Wan bo sun u tuonn kul g gbenn canyiin yaa youg nba, k u te g yab nba cɔlm’o kul la fielu nba g mɔg gbennu.
58005010	G Yendu din’o salg-yidkab kul ciɛn Mɛlkisedɛk salg-yidkadinu sɔnu n ninŋ.
58005011	T mɔg bona bonciɛnn g bu maad’i l po, ama l yen paa yen tin ŋanm g ŋɔn’i l niimn yin gbad g dugn i g gbiɛ bona niimn tonm.
58005012	Lan pund yaa youg nba ne l ji bo bual k yinm ń gii tie canbaa‑nba i gii tund niib. Ama k i yen biɛ daa bua k ban gii tund’i ban tu kpiɛ g tund nil yal Yendu maam po. L ji bo tie k yin gii di jied nba kpai i, k i ŋaa lann o, g biɛ guan g bua biim.
58005013	Yua nba mual biim mɔ yen daa tie sanpandg i. U daa kan fid g paad bonŋann yen bonbiil.
58005014	Ama jied nba kpai tie ciɛnm yal i. Ban tun g di l jied nyan, banm n bu fid g mali g paad bonŋann yen bonbiil.
58006001	Lann, ŋaa man k tin gii gaan ciɛnm tundl g ji gii saa liig, g tundl nba k t bo kpiɛ g gaal Kristo po nyan, tin daa tun g sie l po. L ji g bual k tin guan g ŋanm g tund’i bona nba ne po kaa. Lan tie g niib ń ŋaa bontitied nba bu baal yen b kuum nyan, gii dug Yendu po,
58006002	yen tundl nba k b tund nyunwulu po, yen ban tu maan nui nil po g jaand u po nyan, yen kpienm yiedu, yen Yendu buud jiɛlu nba g mɔg lebdu nyan po.
58006003	L bual k tin gad liig i, l gii sua g Yendu cab’ti.
58006004	Yen mɔni, yaa danm nba g Yendu yinyiem fand’b, k b gaal Yendu paab, g gaal Foŋanm, g bann Yendu maam n man nand nba, g bann ŋanduna nba baad paalu n tie yal o, g yuand g baa nyan, sua ji kan fid g te banm ń guan g mɔ kua b biid po, g dugn b guan g kpaa Yendu Bija dapunpɔnn po n nyan, g te g niib ji la sɔnu, g sugd’o.
58006007	Tinŋ nba po g taag baa youg kul g sɔnŋl be, g yab nba ko l tinŋ po laad ban bua yal nba, Yendu tu yad u yedŋanm l tinŋ po i.
58006008	Ama l gii tie g kunkoni yen jiɛm n pa l tinŋ po, l tinŋ tie fam i. L kan wai yen Yendu n pol l tinŋ mɔb, ban juod g juu’ug.
58006009	Lann, n dɔnn‑nba, l gii tie k t maad nnyan mɔno, t pala paa i po k i tuag sɔnŋanu nba bu te yin la fielu.
58006010	G dugn Yendu tie mɔnkundaan i. U kan sunm i tuona nba k i sun kul yen buam nba k i ŋɔn u po g sun g biɛ daa l suun Kristo‑yab po.
58006011	Tin bua yal tie g yua kul ń gii diɛ k l paa g daa ŋaa, saa yen juog. Nnyan i k i bu la yin guu yal nba yen i pala kul.
58006012	T g bua yin ŋaa g gbannyagl ń suol’i. T bua yin mɔ ń ŋmaa yab nba bo dug Yendu po g juun g gaal Yendu puoni nyan, taabuod n ninŋ i.
58006013	Yendu n bo puon Abraham nyan, u bo puon’o g pol wano Yendu sann po i, g dugn sua g be g cie’og k u bu pol g taa u sann.
58006014	U bo pol g maad k nne: « Yen mɔni, n bu yad n yedŋanm a po, g te a yaabuona ń mal gii yab. »
58006015	K Abraham juun g guul, g la Yendu n bo puon’o yal.
58006016	Niib n tu maad maam yal g biɛ pol nyan, b tu pol g taa yua nba cie’b sann i, k l mɔpol po ń daa mɔg mɔniɛɔg.
58006017	Lann, Yendu n bo bua g yab nba bu gaal u puoni ń ŋanm g bann k u maam g mɔg lebdu nyan, l po n bo te k u bo puon g biɛ pol
58006018	k lan te k t pala ń gii paa bonciɛnn. Yendu g fa faaɔg palb, lann n te k t pala paa k wan bo puon g biɛ pol nyan k l g mɔg lebdu. T duo Yendu sandand k u puoni ń paan t pala k t ŋanm gii diɛ dindann nba k t mɔg i.
58006019	L dindann tie t binbem po nyan kudkpiɛgl nba tu kpaa gii diɛ ŋadunŋ nyum n ninŋ nyan i, l g mɔg begnu. Tin daan yua nba ninŋ tu kua polu po jaanddeciɛɔnŋ n, g pend cincenciɛɔnŋ nba juan nyan, g kua hal denuagn ninŋ.
58006020	L buol i, g Yiesu liid g kua t po, g tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn Mɛlkisedɛk salg-yidkadinu sɔnu n ninŋ, g baa be youg ń tuu youg.
58007001	Wano Mɛlkisedɛk bo tie Salɛm bad i, g biɛ tie Yendu Badciɛn salg-yidkua. Abraham n bo pua tɔb g paad batieb, g leb g kun, wano Mɛlkisedɛk n bo tuog’o, g yad yedŋanm u po.
58007002	K Abraham tug wan bo pua tɔb g fiel yal nba kul, g bɔgd taal piig, g tug yenn g tie Mɛlkisedɛk. Yenm, Mɛlkisedɛk sann niimn tie bad nba tie mɔnkundaan. G munle po k u tie Salɛm bad, k l niimn tie laafiɛ bad.
58007003	Sua g ban Mɛlkisedɛk naa lann i kaa u baa, lann i kaa u yaaja sua. L g diɛn siɛl buol g maad u mad daal po lann i kaa u kuum po. U tie nyan Yendu Bija nyan i, g baa tie salg-yidkua youg ń tuu youg.
58007004	I la Mɛlkisedɛk n bo tie nigbenŋl nba waa ! T yaaja cincinn Abraham mɔno bo tug wan bo pua tɔb g fiel yal nba kul, g bɔgd taal piig, g tug yenn g tie’og.
58007005	Moyis yiko bo cab Lefi yaabuona nba tie salg-yidkab nyan, k ban gii gaan Israyɛl yab buol ban la yal binn n ninŋ, l bɔgdm piig n ninŋ yenn. B ninjanm Israyɛl yab buol i, k b bo tu gaan, k b mɔ yen tie Abraham yaabuona i.
58007006	Mɛlkisedɛk nuan bo g tie Lefi yaabuonn kaa, ama u yen bo gaal Abraham n bo pua tɔb g fiel yal nba kul bɔgdm piig n ninŋ yenn, g biɛ yad yedŋanm wano Abraham nba bo gaal Yendu puoni nyan po.
58007007	L g mɔg tama tama, sua kul ban g yua nba tie ciɛn n tu yad yedŋanm big po.
58007008	Lefi yaabuona nba gaan niib n tu la yal binn n ninŋ bɔgdm piig n ninŋ yenn nyan tie niib nba tan bu kpe i. Ama Mɛlkisedɛk nba gaal Abraham buol bɔgdm piig n ninŋ yenn nyan nuan, tie yua nba fo i, nyan lan diɛn u po nand Yendu Kadaaɔg n nyan.
58007009	T bu fid g maad k Abraham n bo tie Mɛlkisedɛk bɔgdm piig n ninŋ yenn nba nyan, g Lefi mɔ bo tie u yal n nyan, wano nba k u yaabuona gaan niib n tu la yal binn n ninŋ bɔgdm piig n ninŋ yenn.
58007010	G dugn Mɛlkisedɛk n bo cend Abraham youg nba nyan, l bo sua k wano Lefi daa be Abraham sɔm n ninŋ i, k b daa g mal’o.
58007011	Yendu bo tie Israyɛl yab u yiko, k l yiko ŋɔnŋ g Lefi cugl n yab kua n baa tie salg-yidkab. Ama l bo gii tie g salg nba k b bo yid nyan te k Israyɛl yab ŋan canyiin Yendu nunŋ n, salg-yidkua nba bo bu baal kul bo baa tie nyan Aharɔn nyan i. L salg n bo kan fid g te g niib ń gii ŋan canyiin Yendu nunŋ n nyan po n bo te g salg-yidkafano baal g tie nyan Mɛlkisedɛk nyan.
58007012	Lann, l gii tie g salg-yidkadinu lebd, l tie g yiko mɔ ń lebd i.
58007013	T Yonmdaan nba g Yendu Kadaaɔg maad u po ne, u tie cugfann n ninŋ yua i. L cugl n ninŋ, baa sua g ban g sun salg binbindl tuonn.
58007014	Sua kul ban k t Yonmdaan tie Suuda cugl n jua i. Moyis kadaaɔg n ninŋ, naan buol nba k u maad salg-yidkab po, u g maad baa siɛl l cugl po.
58007015	Diid man, yal nba te k l ji ŋanm g fand t nuni po tie g salg-yidkafano baal g tie nyan Mɛlkisedɛk nyan.
58007016	Wano g te salg-yidkua nyan yab nba g yiko bo lugd b cugl nyan kaa. Wan mɔg miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn paalu po i, k u te salg-yidkua.
58007017	Yen mɔni, l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad u po k nne: « Fin n tie salg-yidkua youg ń tuu youg nyan Mɛlkisedɛk nyan. »
58007018	Nnyan i k b piin yiko nba bo kpiɛ g be, g dugn l yiko bo g mɔg paalu, l biɛ bo g mɔg nyuad.
58007019	Yen mɔni, yal l be ŋanduna n ninŋ kul, Moyis yiko bo g fid g te k l ŋan canyiin Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ. Ama Yendu n ji yuand g baal yen dindann nba t po ne ń ŋanm g mɔn. Lann n bu fid g te tin nagn Yendu nunŋ n.
58007020	Yal nba pugn tie g Yendu biɛ bo puon puoni i g pol. Lieb nuan te salg-yidkab g siɛl yaa puoni g pugn l po.
58007021	Ama Yiesu nuan, yua nba din’o salg-yidkua bo puon’o g pol g maad’o: « Min Yonmdaan n puon ne g pol, min yed yal lann n bu tien, n kan ban g lebd: “ A baa tie salg-yidkua youg ń tuu youg ”. »
58007022	Nnyan i g Yiesu po, Yendu n ji suol dɔnnu nba yen’ti ŋanm g mɔn bonciɛnn.
58007023	Yal n biɛ pugn tie g yab nba bo te salg-yidkab bo yab g dugn kuum bo te k b kan fid gii tun g be g suun b tuonn.
58007024	Ama Yiesu nuan l fo i youg kul, k u salg-yidkua tuonn g mɔg gbennu youg ń tuu youg.
58007025	L po n te k u mɔg paalu nba g mɔg gbennu g bu fid g fiel yab nba nagd Yendu g dugn u po, k l maa wano l fo i youg kul g jaand g miɛd Yendu b po.
58007026	Lann, Yiesu n tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba dagd yen’ti. Wano i g Yendu pal man u po, k u g kpiɛdl, g biɛ g mɔg siɛl yaa biid, k u paad’o yen biiddanm, g don’o polu yaa polu.
58007027	Wano g tie nyan salg-yidkab ciɛnlieb nyan kaa. L g bual g daal kul wan tu kpiɛ g yid salg u biid po o, g yuand g yid salg niib biid po. U tug u kua i g yid salg yenm kua.
58007028	Moyis yiko n bo kaand salg-yidkab ciɛnm nba nyan bo tie yab nba bu fid g tien biid i. Ama Moyis yiko puol po, Yendu maad i, g pol g kaan u Bija k u ji baa tie salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba dagd yen wan sun u tuonn youg ń tuu youg.
58008001	Tin maad yal nba ne kul, mayul tie ne i: t mɔg salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba tie nnyan g be polu po, g kal Yendu yudanddaan badkog nuujendu po.
58008002	U suun u salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tuonn Yendu ŋaag n mɔno i polu po. L buol n tie Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ yen mɔni. Nifosaal kaa caan l jounŋ, Yonmdaan Yendu mɔno n caan l jounŋ.
58008003	B gii kaan salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba, l tu tie k wan gii piin Yendu paab, g biɛ gii yid’o salg i. Lann, l bual k t salg-yidkab kul ciɛn mɔ ń gii mɔg siɛl g yid Yendu i.
58008004	L bo gii tie k u be tinŋ po ne, u bo kan te salg-yidkua mɔno, g dugn salg-yidkab be g yid Yendu salg nyan yiko n bual nand nyan o.
58008005	Ban suun b salg-yidkab tuonn naan buol tie yal nba be polu po yaa ninnaɔnŋ yen l junjunŋ u. Yen mɔni Moyis n bo bua n caan Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ, Yendu bo maad’o k nne: « Ŋanm g cenŋ ne, a bu pua l jounŋ lan gii naan nyan min ŋɔn’a k l naan nand jual po nyan i. »
58008006	Ama mɔlane Yendu n tie Yiesu salg-yidkua tuonn nba nyan mɔn g cie l salg-yidkab tuona. Yendu n suol dɔnnpaanu nba yen niib nyan, Yiesu n tie l sandindaan. L dɔnnpaanu mɔn g cie dɔnnkpelu g dugn l puoni mɔn g cie dɔnnkpelu puoni.
58008007	L bo gii sua g dɔnnu nba bo kpiɛ g be nyan bo g mɔg siɛl yaa maam, Yendu ji bo kan guan g suol dɔnnu yen niib.
58008008	G nyaan Yendu bo la nil bontitied i, g fu yen’o g maad: « Min Yonmdaan n maad, dana baad k n bu suol dɔnnpaanu yen Israyɛl buolu yen Suuda buolu.
58008009	L dɔnnpaanu ji kan gii tie nyan dɔnnu nba k n bo suol yen’m yaa youg nba k n bo diɛ b yaajanm nui g nyan’m Esipt doug n nyan kaa. Ban bo g cɔln l dɔnnu nyan, l po n te k n mɔ bo nyɔl’b. Min Yonmdaan n maad.
58008010	L dana po gii pend, dɔnnu nba k n bu suol yen Israyɛl buolu n ne: “ N bu diɛn n Mɔmaam b pala n ninŋ, g kuan l Mɔmaam b maalm n ninŋ. N baa tie b Yendu k b mɔ tie n buolu ”.
58008011	B ninŋ sua ji kan tund u lua lann i kaa u ninja g maad: “ Bann Yonmdaan ” g dugn b kul tan baa ban’n lan cil yab g tie siɛl g daan pund nigbenŋa.
58008012	B gii sun tuonkpiɛdl, n bu jie’b ninbaaɔg, n ji kan ban g tiɛd b biid po. »
58008013	Yendu gii maad dɔnnpaanu maam, l bua n maad g dɔnnu nba bo kpiɛ g be ji g mɔn n nyan. Yal nba ŋanm g wai, g g mɔn mɔ yen kan wai yen lan bod.
58009001	Yendu n bo kpiɛ g suol dɔnnu nba yen niib nyan, l dɔnnu bo mɔg yiko‑nba nba ŋɔnŋ’b ban baa dond’o nand nba yen ban baa dond’o naan nba ninŋ tinŋ po ne.
58009002	Yen mɔni, b bo pua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ u, k l mɔg gɔnn n yen denuagn. Gɔnn n ninŋ i k b bo yi ŋand buol k l mɔg ban tu son fida g tuan yal nba po, g tiebl sie k b maand l po kpanu nba k b piin Yendu paab.
58009003	G cincenciɛɔnŋ juan g paad gɔnn n yen denuagn. L cincenciɛɔnŋ linn po n tie denuagn k b yi ŋand yaa ŋand buol.
58009004	L ninŋ bo mɔg binbindl nne k b tabn wula l munn kul po, g juug ŋuba l po, g biɛ mɔg Yendu dɔnnu kpaɔg k b tabn l po mɔ wula l munn kul po. L kpaɔg n ninŋ bo mɔg sual nne k b tien yen wula, g jied nba k b yi mann nyan be l n. Aharɔn lanbann nba bo bund fapaand nyan bo kpie l n i. G tanpipaba nba k b bo diɛn Yendu Mɔmaam l po nyan mɔ kpie l kpaɔg n.
58009005	B bo naan malɛg‑nba nba k b yi’b serubɛn-nba nyan, g tuan l kpaɔg bonbiil po, k l ŋɔnŋ g Yendu mɔno be l buol. K b kpinkpana sɔnŋu yil ban tu mii sɔm naan g Yendu ń di sugl b biid po nyan. Ama youg yen g cab k tin gii maad maam bonciɛnn l po mɔlane.
58009006	Ban bo sen bona kul nand nba n nyan, g salg-yidkab kua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ gɔnn n, g suun b tuonn.
58009007	Ama denuagn ninŋ nuan, Yendu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn kua n bo kua binn n ninŋ taal yenm kua. U bo g kua l n ninŋ g g diɛ bonkobg sɔm g bu yid Yendu salg, k wan di sugl wano mɔno biid po yen niib n tud g tien biid nba po.
58009008	Nnyan i g Foŋanm ŋɔnŋ’ti g sɔnu nba saa g kua polu po Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ n daa kan luod youg nba g tinŋ n yal daa be.
58009009	L tie bonn nba tie mɔlane yaa ninnaɔnŋ u. L niimn tie g paab nba k b piin Yendu yen salg nba k b yid’o nyan kan fid g te g yua suun nnyan pal n ninŋ ń gii ŋan canyiin.
58009010	L kul ne tie bogda nba tie gbannand yal i, g nyuan jied po yen daam po yen ban baa ŋami b kua nand. L bogda bo tie yal nba g niib bo baa cɔln saa yen youg nba g Yendu bo tan bu guan g lebd bonpaann i.
58009011	Ama Kristo n baal g te Yendu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba baal yen bonŋana nba ne g tie’ti. Wan kua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ nba ninŋ, l jounŋ mɔn bonn kul n ninŋ g cie jounŋ nba bo be. Niib kaa caan l jounŋ, l jounŋ biɛ g tie tinŋ n ne yal kaa.
58009012	Kristo kua yenm kua i denuagn, wan kua u g tug ŋɔbɔa yen naatonpaani sɔm kaa g yid Yendu salg, u tug wano mɔno yaa sɔm i g yid salg g nyan’ti biid n ninŋ mɔlane yen youg nba g mɔg gbennu.
58009013	L gii tie k b tu tug ŋɔbɔa yen naatonpaani sɔm yen naasal nba k b tu kod g juu yaa fantam g pag niib nba tien biid po, k lan nyan’m jɔgnd n,
58009014	l bu tien nle i g Kristo sɔm yen ji kan ŋanm gii mɔg paalu g cie l kul ne i ? Foŋanm nba be youg ń tuu youg te k wano mɔno tug u kua g yid Yendu salg nyan bonkobg nba ŋan g dagd nyan, k u sɔm piin tuonbiid t pala n ninŋ k lan gii ŋan canyiin k tin fid gii tie Yendu nba fo tuonsunna.
58009015	L po n te g dɔnnpaanu nba g Yendu suol yen niib nyan g Kristo tie l sandindaan. U kpe k wan nyan danm nba bo tu be biid n ninŋ dɔnnkpelu youg g Yendu yiin’m nyan, k ban fid g di faal nba g mɔg gbennu g Yendu bo puon’m nyan.
58009016	Mɔni, nil gii diɛn g ŋɔn ban bu di u faal nand l gii tie k u kpe, l tie k u kuum puol po ban ŋɔn k u kpe yo g fid g di l faal.
58009017	Youg nba g yua nba diɛn u faadinu kadaaɔg daa be g mɔg miɛl, l kadaaɔg daa g tie bonmɔnn. U kuum puol po i, k l kadaaɔg ji baa tie kadaaɔg nba mɔn.
58009018	L po n te g Yendu n bo kpiɛ g suol dɔnnu nba yen u niib nyan, k l bo bual k ban kpi bonkobg g wul sɔm o, l dɔnnu ń fid g cil.
58009019	Yen mɔni, Moyis n bo ŋɔn Yendu buolu kul Yendu Mɔmaam nyan lan diɛn nand Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n nyan g gbenn, u bo tug tiig nba k b yi isɔp nyan faad i g lol yen cabmɔnn nba k b tien yen pieog kobd, g nyua ŋɔbɔa yen naatonpaani sɔm nba ŋmad yen nyum nyan ninŋ, g cind g mii Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg po, g yuand g mii mii niib po,
58009020	g maad: « Sɔm ne tie Yendu n suol dɔnnu nba yen’i g yed k i gii cɔln nyan sɔm i. »
58009021	Lann i g Moyis biɛ mii mii l sɔm Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ po yen bona nba kul k b bo diɛ g dond Yendu nyan po.
58009022	L diɛn Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n g maad k b tu tug sɔm i g ŋanm bona bonciɛnn k lan gii ŋan g daa mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd, g sɔm gii g nyiɛ, Yendu kan di sugl niib biid po.
58009023	Lann, l gii tie k b tu ŋanm bona nba tie polu po bona yaa ninnaɔnŋ nnyan, l bual g salg nba cie niib n yaan tie yal nba nyan i ń ŋanm polu po bona mɔno.
58009024	G dugn Kristo g kua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ nba ninŋ g niib caan kaa. L jounŋ bo tie polu po jounŋ mɔno yaa ninnaɔnŋ u. Ama u kua polu po Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ n mɔno i k wan gii be mɔlane Yendu nintual n g maad yen’o t po.
58009025	Kristo nuan kua l n ninŋ yenm kua i g tug u kua g yid salg t po. U g tun g kua nyan Suif‑nba Yendu salg-yidkab kul ciɛn n tun g kua binn kul denuagn ninŋ yen bonkobg sɔm nyan kaa.
58009026	L bo gii tie nnyan, man ne Kristo g luol g cagn taal fuunu munŋaa hal ŋanduna n cil o. Mɔni, dana nba k t be k l ji tie dijijuog dani n ne, Kristo ŋɔn u kua taal yenm i, g tug u kua g yid salg k wan piin niib biid.
58009027	T ban g nil kul bu kpe yenm kua i, l puol po Yendu n bu’ug.
58009028	Nnyan i g Kristo mɔ tug u kua g yid salg taal yenm kua k wan piin niib bonciɛnn biid. U tan bu guan g baal k l ji g tie k wan piin biid kaa, ama l ji baa tie k wan fiel yab nba guu u baalu i.
58010001	Moyis yiko tie bonŋana nba baad yaa junjunŋ u. L g tie yal nba be yen mɔni kaa. L po n te g salg nba k b tu yid binn ń tuu binn nyan kan fid g te niib nba nagd Yendu buol ń ji daa mɔg biid.
58010002	L bo gii tie k l salg yidu bo fid g te g niib ŋan canyiin Yendu nunŋ n, b bo bu yid yenm kua i g ji ŋaa, k lan ŋanm’b k ban ji daa mɔg biid.
58010003	Ama salg nba k b tu yid nyan tu te ban guan g tiɛd b biid po binn kul.
58010004	Yen mɔni, naatonpaani yen ŋɔbɔa sɔm kan fid g piin nil biid.
58010005	L po n te g youg nba g Kristo bo bu jiid tinŋ po ne, k u bo maad Yendu: « A g bua padg a biɛ g bua siɛl yaa paab mɔ. A yen tag gbannand g tie’n.
58010006	A g bual g sua ń kod bonkobg g juu g yid’a salg a biɛ g bual g sua ń kod bonkobg g te’a k a di sugl u po.
58010007	Lann i k n maad: “ N Yendu min n nyan, n baad tinŋ po ne k min tien a buam nyan lan diɛn a Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n ninŋ n po nand nyan i. ” »
58010008	Kristo n bo cind g maad yal n ne: « A g bua padg, a biɛ g bua siɛl yaa paab mɔ, a g bual g sua ń kod bonkobg g juu g yid’a salg, a biɛ g bual g sua ń kod bonkobg g te’a k a di sugl u po. » K b yen bo tie l salg kul nyan lan diɛn Yendu Mɔmaam kadaaɔg n nand nyan i.
58010009	K u biɛ pugn g maad: « Yendu, min n nyan, n baad tinŋ po ne k min tien a buam i. » Nnyan i g Yendu yiin salg nba bo kpiɛ g be kul fam, g te g Kristo salg ji gaal l yiɛl.
58010010	Yiesu Kristo n tien Yendu buam g tug u kua g yid salg yenm kua nyan i, k u te k t ŋan Yendu nunŋ n.
58010011	Yendu salg-yidkua kul tu sie daal ń tuu daal g suun u tuonn, g tun g yid salbuolyenu kua i, k l kan ban g fid g piin nil biid.
58010012	Ama Kristo nuan yid salg yenm kua i t biid po, k l salg dagd mɔlane yen youg nba baad, g ji kal Yendu jendu,
58010013	g guu saa yen youg nba g Yendu bu te k wan paad u ninnanda.
58010014	G dugn wano yid salg yenm kua i g te g niib nba k u nyan’m biid n ninŋ nyan ji be ŋand n ninŋ youg kul.
58010015	Foŋanm mɔ bo cind g maad lann n nyan:
58010016	« Min Yonmdaan n maad, l dana po gii pend, dɔnnu nba k n bu suol yen’m n ne: “ N bu diɛn n Mɔmaam b pala n ninŋ, g kuan l Mɔmaam b maalm n ninŋ. ” »
58010017	L puol po k u biɛ maad: « N ji kan ban g tiɛd b biid yen b tuonbiid po. »
58010018	Lann Yendu n dii sugl niib biid po nyan, l ji g bual k ban yid salg g miɛl sugl l po.
58010019	N naataani, Yiesu sɔm nba wul nyan n te k t ji bu fid g kua Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ denuagn ninŋ g siɛl kan pan’ti.
58010020	Yiesu n luod sɔnpaanu nba tien miɛl. Wan tug u kua g yid salg nyan n te g cincenciɛɔnŋ nba tu juan g lieg Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ denuagn nyan pad k t ji bu fid g kua l n ninŋ.
58010021	Mɔlane t ji mɔg salg-yidkab kul ciɛn nba mɔg nuu Yendu ŋaag yab po.
58010022	Tin nagn man Yendu yen papienn, gii dug u po yen t pal kul. Tin nagn’o man yen pal nba k t ŋuul g siɛl yaa jalgi ji g be l n, yen gbannand nba k t wul yen nyum nba ŋan k l g mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd.
58010023	Ŋaa man k t ŋanm g kub tin mɔg dindann nba g diɛ g maad niib nyan, g daa ŋaa, g dugn Yendu gii puon yal nba, u tu tien lann i.
58010024	Mɔnd man k tin gii paand t lieb pala k tin fid gii bua t lieb g biɛ gii suun tuonŋana.
58010025	Siɛb nyɔl g ji g saa Kristo‑yab tintaanu. Tinm n daa tie nyan banm nyan. Ama tin gii paand t lieb pala mandg yin ji nyuan g Yonmdaan daal nagd ne.
58010026	Yen mɔni, t gii bann mamɔni u, k l puol po k t yuand g tiɛ g tien biid, salg ji g be k t bu yid k lan nyan’ti l biid n.
58010027	L ji tenn k tin gii guu Yendu buud nba mɔg jiwaani ne, yen muu nba bu di u ninnanda i.
58010028	N tua i ban g nil gii yie g g cɔln Moyis yiko, g niib banle lann i kaa niib bantaa baal g maad k u tien nnyan, b kan jie’og ninbaaɔg a ? L tie k ban kpi’ug u.
58010029	L bu tien nle i g nil nba yiin Yendu Bija fam, g yed g sɔm nba po g Yendu guan g suol dɔnnu yen niib, g piin u biid nyan g tie siɛl, g sugl Foŋanm nba tien’ti ŋalbalg, k l daan yaa tubdadu ji kan ŋanm gii biɛ i ?
58010030	T yen ban yua nba maad k nne: « Min n bu tuu pann, min n bu guan g pa yua kul pann. » G biɛ maad: « Min Yonmdaan n bu bu n buolu. »
58010031	L baa biɛ yen nil ń kua Yendu nba fo kpatam n ninŋ.
58010032	Tiɛd man lan bo tie nand i po youg nba pend. Youg nba g Yendu yinyiem bo fand’i, l puol po i bo la fala bonciɛnn g yen juun g kɔn jad.
58010033	Yenn youg b bo tu sugd’i g cagn’i niib siign, liel youg mɔ i bo tu taan yab nba k b cagn’m nyan po i.
58010034	Yen mɔni i bo tuo g cagn yen yab nba be dansaldieog n nyan ; k ban biɛ bo fiel yin mɔg yal nba nyan, i bo tuo i k i pala biɛ man g dugn i ban k yin mɔg yal nba nyan cie tinŋ po ne yal, k l mɔgm biɛ g mɔg gbennu.
58010035	Lann, daa ŋaa man yin mɔg papaal nba, i bu la nyuad nba yab.
58010036	L bual k yin gii mɔg juun i g fid g tien u buam, nnyan i k i bu la wan puon’i yal nba.
58010037	Yen mɔni Yendu Kadaaɔg maad: « L gii yann waam g pugn, yua nba bu baal bu baal, u ji kan wai.
58010038	Yua nba tie nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n u baa fo g dugn u dindann po. Ama u gii ŋaa g g dug n po, n pal kan gii man u po. »
58010039	Tinm g tie yaa danm nba tu ŋaa g ji daa dug Yendu po g biɛl kaa, ama t tie yaa danm nba dug u po g bu la fielu i.
58011001	Gii dug Yendu po tie k a pal n gii paa k a bu la ŋan daan yal nba, g biɛ gii diɛ a pal n ninŋ g bona nba g nil g nyuan yen ninbina l be i yen mɔni.
58011002	Siɛnyoug niib bo dug Yendu po nnyan i, g Yendu pal man b po.
58011003	Tin dug Yendu po i, k t ban g Yendu bo maad maam i g tag ŋanduna. U bo tug tin kan fid g la yal nba i g tag ŋanduna nba k t nyuan ne.
58011004	Abɛl n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo yid’o salg nba ŋan g cie Kayɛn yal. U dindann po i g Yendu bo yiin’o nimɔn g tuo g gaal u paab. Abɛl nuan kpe o ama u dindann po, u biɛ daa l maad yen’ti dinne.
58011005	Enɔk n bo dug Yendu po nyan n te k u bo g kpe. Yendu bo nyan’o ŋanduna ne ninŋ g don’o u buol g sua ji g la’ɔg. Yendu Kadaaɔg maad g Yendu pal bo man wano Enɔk po g sua k u daa g nyan’o ŋanduna ne ninŋ.
58011006	Lann nil nba g dug Yendu po, Yendu pal kan fid gii man u po, g dugn yua nba nagd Yendu buol, l bual k wan gii dug g Yendu be i, g biɛ gii ban g yua nba kpaan’o kul, u bu te wan do nyuad l po.
58011007	Nowe n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo kpaa ŋadunŋ nba yab k wano yen u ŋaag yab kua l n ninŋ g ciɛl. Yendu bo tuod g maad’o bona nba bu baal k l yen daa g nyuan yen ninbina, k u tug l kul g bil u pal n ninŋ. Nnyan i k u bo ŋɔn g ŋanduna niib kul mɔg biid, k u dindann po, g Yendu yiin’o nimɔn.
58011008	Abraham mɔ n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo tuo Yendu yiinu, g fiil g saa doug nba g Yendu bo bu te wan yend. U bo fiil g saa g yen daa g ban wan saa naan nba.
58011009	Wan bo dug Yendu po nyan i, k u bo gad g tie saan g kua doug nba ninŋ g Yendu bo puon’o nyan. U bo pua jounŋ u g be l n ninŋ nyan Isaak yen Sakɔb n mɔ bo tan tien nand nyan. Banm n bo tan bu yend doug nba g Yendu bo puon Abraham nyan.
58011010	Abraham bo tien nnyan g dugn u bo guu k wan tan kua doug nba ninŋ k l fiɛgl g mɔg begnu i. Yendu mɔno n bo diɛn l doug g biɛ maa’ɔg.
58011011	Abraham n yaan bo dug Yendu po nyan n te, yen wan bo l ciɛnd g pend yen wan mal big, k u ŋaapuo Sara mɔ l tie ŋɔlg yal kul, g Yendu te k u mal big. Yen mɔni, Abraham bo diɛ u pal n ninŋ g yua nba puon’o l puoni dagd yen wan gii dug u po.
58011012	Nnyan i k wano niyend nba bo ciɛnd g nag kuum nyan tan la yaabuona k b mal mal g yab nyan polu po ŋmaabid lann i kaa mɔgl n tanbiini nyan, g g mɔg dugl.
58011013	B yaa kul ne bo tan kpe g daa l dug Yendu po i. B daa bo g gaal Yendu n bo puon’m bonŋana nba, ama b dindann po, b bo tuod g la wan bo puon’m yal nba k l daa be fagm k b pala manŋ. K b tuo k b tie saanm yen wuwaada i tinŋ po ne.
58011014	Yaa danm nba maad nnyan ŋɔnŋ yen mɔni k b kpaan b yul po doug u.
58011015	L bo gii tie k b maalm guan ban bo nyiɛ doug nba nyan ninŋ, man ne b bo lebd o.
58011016	Yen mɔni, b bo kpaan k ban kua doug nba cie ban nyiɛ naan nyan i, lann n tie Yendu ŋaag. L po n te g Yendu g jie fai yen ban gii yi’ug k b Yendu, g bobn doug nba k u bu te’b.
58011017	Abraham n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo g yie yen wan tug u bijayenml Isaak g yid’o salg youg nba g Yendu bo bign’o. U bo tuo g yen ban g Yendu bo puon’o
58011018	g biɛ maad’o k Isaak n tan bu te wan gii mɔg tennm.
58011019	Abraham bo maad u pal n ninŋ g Yendu mɔg paalu g bu fid g yied nil kpienm siign ninŋ. L po n te g Yendu bo ŋmiɛn’o u bija. L bo tie yiedu ninnaɔnŋ u.
58011020	Isaak n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo yad yedŋanm Sakɔb yen Esaayu po k l nyuan bona nba tan bu tien po.
58011021	Sakɔb n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo yad yedŋanm Sosɛf bid po youg nba k u bo bua n kpe. U bo nyii u lanbanu po i g pug Yendu.
58011022	Youg nba g Sosɛf dana ji bo g fag yen wan kpe, wan bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo maad Israyɛl yab k b tan bu nya Esipt doug n g biɛ ŋɔn’m ban tan bu tien u kpaba nand l gii tie k u kpe.
58011023	Moyis baa‑nba mɔ n bo dug Yendu po i, k b bo mal’o g wuon’o ŋmaali yintaa g dugn b bo la g big ŋan, k b biɛ bo g jie bad n bo nyan yiko nba.
58011024	Moyis n bo tan te ciɛn youg nba, wan bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo yie k ban daa yi’ug Faraaɔn bipuo bija.
58011025	U bo diid g sua k u gii taan g cagn yen Yendu buolu, lann n su yen wan gii be biid n ninŋ, g di manu g yen ban k l kan wai.
58011026	U bo diid g sua k b gii sugd’o Mɛsi po, k lann n mɔg nyuad g cie Esipt ŋalman kul, g dugn u bo nyuan nyuad nba be liig g baad k u tan bu gaal i.
58011027	Wano Moyis n bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo nyiɛ Esipt doug n g g jie bad mutuol. U bo g lebd u maalm k l maa l bo tie nyan u nyuan Yendu nba g nil g ban g la’ɔg nyan i.
58011028	Wan bo dug Yendu po i, k u bo te k Israyɛl yab cil g tie b Fielu jaanm, g te k b faan faan sɔm b dimɔi po, g malɛg nba kpi kuum nyan tan gii baal g la sɔm, wan daa kua g kpi b bijakpela.
58011029	Israyɛl yab n bo dug Yendu po i, g sɔnu bo duan mɔgl nba k b yi mɔgmɔnn nyan ninŋ k b puod tinkuonŋ. Ama Esipt yab n yaan bign k ban mɔ n puod, g nyum dii’b.
58011030	Ban biɛ bo dug Yendu po i, k b bo tu sonm g lind Seriko doug guonjal daal kul g daan biin daa nlile, k l guonjal baa.
