58011031	Puocunconn nba k b bo yi’ug Rahaab nyan, u mɔ n yaan bo dug Yendu po i, k b bo kpii yab g cɔln Yendu nyan g ŋaa’ɔg, g dugn u bo gaal Israyɛl niib nba bo baal g bua n suli doug nyan.
58011032	N biɛ bu maad bɛ i g pugn i ? N gii yed k n ŋanm g maad Sedeyɔn po yen Barak po yen Samsɔn po yen Sɛfte po yen Dafiid po yen Samiɛl po yen Yendu sogni‑nba po youg bu pɔd’n o.
58011033	Ban bo dug Yendu po i, g yenm bo pua tɔb g paad batieb g fiel b tini, g lieb tɔgn mɔnkund sɔnu, g lieb gaal Yendu n bo puon’m yal nba, g lieb mɔ mubn yanbɔla mɔi,
58011034	g lieb mɔ junn muupienu nba bo so, g lieb mɔ ciɛl k b g fid g kpii’b yen jug, g lieb mɔ bo g mɔg paalu g ji tan kpand paalb, g lieb mɔ pua tɔb g paad buolfanu sijenm g bel g yaan’m.
58011035	G puosiɛb mɔ, k b yied b niib g guan g ŋmiɛn’m. Nilieb mɔ, b bo cagn’m bonciɛnn g kpaan k ban ŋaa Yendu sɔnu i g la miɛl, k b mɔ yie. Yen mɔni, b bo yie g dugn b bo bua ban tan yied kpienm siign g ji gii be binbem nba ŋan g cie b binbekpelm i.
58011036	G lieb mɔ k b sugl’b g puab’b naapuna, g tan lol’b yen kudsiseli mɔno, g luon’m dansaldieog n.
58011037	G jaa lieb tana g kpii’b, g pod lieb yen kanpinda jug, g kpii lieb mɔ yen jug. Siɛb mɔ bo tie tali i g waa g tuan g liɛ pegband lann i kaa ŋɔgband, g niib cagn’m g ŋɔnŋ’b fala.
58011038	B bo waa tinkuoni n ninŋ yen jɔa n ninŋ, g dua tanfali n yen fali n ninŋ. L niib bo tie nimɔnm i. Ŋanduna ne niib bo g dagd yen ban gii be b siign.
58011039	Niib ne kul n bo dug Yendu po i, k b bo kun mɔni b po k l ŋan. Ama b yen bo g gaal Yendu n bo puon k u bu te’b yal,
58011040	g dugn Yendu bo tuod g bobn t po yal nba ŋanm g ŋan g cie liel‑nba i, lann n tie k ban daa liid g pund t dindann n saa yen’ti naan g ŋaa’ti.
58012001	B yaa kul ji tie sieda‑nba i g kaan g lind’ti. L yaa po, t mɔnd g feg g lu tuga nba kul te k t kan fid g sonm, yen biid nba nya kaannaa kul g jalg’ti tonm tonm nyan. Lann, tin mɔnd man g juun g san g pund ban yed k tin san g gad naan nba.
58012002	T gii siɛn, t ninbina ń gii maa Yiesu po. Wano n luod sɔnu g te k t mɔg dindann g biɛ bu te l dindann ń cie lan bual nand. U tuo k b kpaa’ɔg dapunpɔnn po, g g jie fai yen wan kpe l kubuolu. G dugn u bo tuod g ban g Yendu bu te wan gii be pamann n, g mɔlane k u ji kal Yendu badkog nuujendu po.
58012003	Diid man Yiesu n juun g gaal fala nba kul g biiddanm bo ŋɔnŋ’o. Nnyan i k i mɔ kan ŋaa k lan wad i pala k i ji nyɔl g ŋaa.
58012004	Yin yied g g bua k i tie biid nyan, i daa g ban g yie biid tienu hal k l tan baal yen i kuum.
58012005	I g tiɛn Yendu n bo maad’i yal g paan i pala nyan bibaa n tu cegi u bid nand nyan ii ? U bo maad: « N big, Yonmdaan gii cegl’a, ŋan tug g sun yenn tuonn, u gii fu yen’a, ŋan daa wad a pal,
58012006	g dugn Yonmdaan cegi yua nba k u bua’ɔg u, g yua nba kul k u tuo k u tie u big, u diɛl u yaa tubl i. »
58012007	Juun man g gaal fala gii ban k l tie cegli i. Yin tie u bid po n te k u tie’i nnyan. Bilanŋ i, k u baa kan cegl’o i ?
58012008	L gii tie k u g cegl’i nyan wan ceg’i bilei kul nand nyan, lann l ŋɔn k i tie kpiɛba i, k i g tie u bid kaa.
58012009	I tiɛn k t baa‑nba nba tie niib tu cegi’ti, k t cɔln’m ; k l ji bu tien nle i, k t kan tuo g gaal t Baa nba be polu po cegli g la miɛl i ?
58012010	Youg nba k t baa‑nba bu fid g cegl’ti nyan ban bua nand nyan, l tu g yab. Ama Yendu nuan tu cegl’ti k lan gii ŋan t po i, k tin fid gii ŋan canyiin nyan wano Yendu nyan.
58012011	B gii cegi nil youg nba, u pal tu g man l po, u pal tu wad i. Ama l puol po, yab nba juun g gaal l cegli n laad nyuad nba tie yanduanm yen binbem nba dagd.
58012012	L yaa po, ŋanm g sed man g biɛ gii diɛ man k l paa.
58012013	Ko man sɔni nba soni, nnyan diɛnŋ tital ji kan sag kaa, l bu paag i.
58012014	Mɔnd man g manu ń gii be yinm yen niib kul siign, k i biɛ gii ŋua Yendu yen i pal kul. Lann i kaa, baa sua kan la Yonmdaan.
58012015	Guul man i kua k i ninŋ sua ń daa ŋaa Yendu ŋalbalg ń ciɛl’o. Sua ń daa tie nyan tibiig nyan, g pa i siign ninŋ g baal yen ŋmadl i po.
58012016	I ninŋ, sua ń daa tie cunconm, sua ń biɛ daa juab bona nba tie Yendu yal g yiinn fam nyan Esaayu n bo kuad u nikped g gaal jied g dii taal yenm kua nyan.
58012017	I ban k l puol po, u ji bo tan kpaan k u baa ń yad yedŋanm u po ama k u baa yie g bel’o. K u buud g mɔ kua g sua g youg pend o, g dugn l ji bo g mɔg lebdu.
58012018	Yinm n yaan nagn Yendu buol, i g la yen i ninbina g biɛ gbad bona nba k Israyɛl yab bo la g biɛ gbad Sinaayi jual po. Lan tie muupienu nba bo so yen bunbɔncild yen faaciɛnu nba bo fu.
58012019	B biɛ bo gbiɛ naatunn mɔni yen niɛlu nne k l maad. Israyɛl yab n bo gbad l niɛlu, b bo miɛl sugl k b ji g bua ban guan g gbad baa lanbonyenn g pugn.
58012020	G dugn l maam bo paa g cie’b. L niɛlu bo maad k nne: « Yua nba gii sii jual ne, baa l gii tie bonkobg mɔno, b bu jaa’ɔg tana i g kpi’ug. »
58012021	Yal nba bo tien bo mɔg jiwaani bonciɛnn g Moyis maad: « Jiwaani kua’n hal k n ji tan jegl. »
58012022	Ama yinm nuan nagn jual nba buol k b yi Siyɔn i, Yendu nba fo doug. L doug n tie Serusalɛm nba be polu po. L buol i g malɛg‑nba taan lieb g g mɔg dindin g tie jaanm.
58012023	Yin baal tintaanu nba ninŋ nyan, l tintaanu niib n tie Yendu bikpeli nba k b sana diɛn Yendu ŋaag n ninŋ. I baal Yendu buol i, wano nba bu nil kul buud. Yinm baal nimɔnm nba buol g Yendu te k b dindann cie lan bual nand i.
58012024	I baal Yiesu buol i. Yendu n suol dɔnnpaanu nba yen niib nyan, wano Yiesu n tie l sandindaan. Wano n wul u sɔm g ŋanm’ti, k l sɔm laabaal man g cie Abɛl sɔm laabaal.
58012025	Lann daa yie man k i kan cenŋ yua nba maad yen’i. Yua nba bo maad yen Israyɛl yab bo be tinŋ po ne i, k b yie k b kan cenŋ, k b dad b tubl. K l ji bu tien nle i k b ji kan dad t tubl, l gii tie k t yie k t kan cenŋ yua nba be polu po g maad yen’ti ni ?
58012026	Wano nba bo maad siɛnyoug g tinŋ jeg nyan, wano n biɛ puon mɔlane g maad k nne: « N ji kan te g tinŋ kukua kaa ń jeg, n bu guan g te g tinŋ yen polu ń jeg. »
58012027	Maam nba k u maad k u bu « guan g te » nyan ŋɔnŋ’ti g bona nba kul k u tag bu jeg g fuad g ŋaa yal nba kan fid g jeg nyan lan gii be.
58012028	Lann, t tien Yendu balg g dugn wan tie’ti diem nba g mɔg k l jeg nyan po. T gii dond’o man nyan wan bua nand nba nyan, gii selm’o, gii jie’og.
58012029	Yen mɔni, t Yendu tie yaa muu nba di bonn kul i.
58013001	Nyan yin tie Kristo‑yab nyan, i bua man i lieb youg kul.
58013002	Ŋanm man gii gaan saanm, g dugn siɛb bo tie nnyan i g tan gaal saanm g g bann k b tie malɛg‑nba.
58013003	I tiɛn man dansali po nyan b taan g luon yinm yen banm kul i dansaldieog n nyan. Biɛ gii tiɛn man yaa danm nba k b cagn’m nyan po, gii ban k i mɔ mɔg gbannand nyan banm nyan i.
58013004	Nil kul ń gii cɔln puobiɛnn, g puo yen jua, baa sua ń daa nya cincann po. G dugn Yendu tan bu bu yab nba suun cuncontuona kul yen jab nba kul jaan puob lann i kaa puob nba kul jaan jab.
58013005	Daa tug man i yul g kun yen ligli, ŋaa man i pal ń gii man yin mɔg yal nba po g dugn Yendu mɔno maad: « N kan ŋaa’a, n biɛ kan ban g nyɔl’a. »
58013006	L po n te k t bu fid g pua pal g maad k nne: « Yonmdaan n tie n todkua, n ji kan gii jie siɛl. Nifosaal bu fid g tien’n bɛ i ? »
58013007	I canbaa‑nba nba bo muand’i Yendu maam nyan, i tiɛn man b po. Diid man ban bo ŋuan Yendu nand hal g tan kpe, g mɔ ń tɔgn dindann sɔnu nba k b bo tuag nyan.
58013008	Yiesu Kristo n won tie nand nyan, u biɛ l tie nnyan i dinne mɔ, g biɛ baa l tie nnyan i youg ń tuu youg.
58013009	Daa ŋaa man g tunda nba k b tund k l g tuag yen mamɔni sɔnu nyan ń te k yin tud sɔnu. L ŋan g Yendu ŋalbalg ń gii paand t pala, ama lan daa tie kɔa nba nyuan jied po kaa. Yaa danm nba cɔln l kɔa g ban g la siɛl yaa nyuad l po.
58013010	T mɔg salg binbindl. Suif‑nba salg-yidkab nba suun Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ n g mɔg yiko yen ban di salg nba yid t salg binbindl po.
58013011	Salg-yidkab kul ciɛn tu tug bonkobd nba k b kod nyan yaa sɔm i, g kua yenn Yendu-cend‑buol-jounŋ denuagn g daan yid salg g Yendu ń piin niib biid, g nyaan ban tug bonkobd nba k b kod nyan g nya yenn doug kunŋ g daan juu.
58013012	L po n te g Yiesu mɔ bo kpe doug kunŋ k u sɔm nba wul nyan ń te g niib ń gii ŋan canyiin Yendu nunŋ n.
58013013	Lann, t nya man g gad u buol doug kunŋ g tuo ban fiɛg’ti nyan wano nyan.
58013014	G dugn ŋanduna nba ninŋ k t be ne, t g mɔg doug nba baa tun g be youg kul, ama t kpaan yal nba baad i.
58013015	Tin gii dond Yendu, Yiesu sann po. L dondl tie salg i k t yid’o. Tin gii yiin g donŋ u sann youg kul.
58013016	Daa sunm man k yin gii tie ŋanm g biɛ gii tod i lieb. L salg buolu n man Yendu po.
58013017	I cɔln man i liig yab, g biɛ daa kand man b mɔi po. G dugn banm n nyuan i ninŋ g ban g daal baad k b bu dugn Yendu ban sun nand. Mɔnd man k ban gii suun b tuonn yen pamann g daa ŋaa k ban gii suun g buln. B gii suun yen bunbulmi, i kan do siɛl yaa nyuad l po.
58013018	I jaand man t po. T ban k t kan fid g jalg t kua baa siɛl yaa po, g dugn tinm kpaan youg kul k tin gii suun yal nba ŋan i.
58013019	N l miɛd’i nii, i jaand man n po g Yendu ń luod sɔnu k min guan i buol tonm.
58013020	Yendu nba tien niib yanduanm nyan n te k t Yonmdaan Yiesu yied kpienm siign. Wan yid u kua salg g wul u sɔm nyan n te k u te g Yendu suol dɔnnu nba kan ban g gbenn yen niib. Nnyan i k u te pekpaaciɛn.
58013021	Wano Yendu ń te k yin fid gii tie ŋanm bonn kul ninŋ, g biɛ fid gii tie u buam. G Yiesu Kristo paalu po wan te tin gii suun yal nba man u po. Yudand ń gii tie Yiesu Kristo yal youg ń tuu youg. Amɛnn.
58013022	N naataani, n miɛd’i k yin di sugl g cenŋ maam nba k n maad g paand i pala ne, g dugn min diɛn g maad’i yal kadaaɔg ne ninŋ g yab mɔno.
58013023	N bo bua k min tiɛd’i k b luod t naataanu Timote o. L gii tie k u pund n buol tonm, min yen wano n bu yeg g baal g la’i.
58013024	Fuond man yab nba tie i liig yab kul yen Kristo‑yab kul. Itali yab mɔ fuond’i.
58013025	Yendu ŋalbalg ń gii be yen i kul !
59001001	Min Saak, n tie Yendu yen Yonmdaan Yiesu tuonsunn i. Min n da kadaaɔg ne g tien yinm Israyɛl cuga piig yen ŋanle niib nba yad g be ŋanduna n ninŋ kul. N fuond’i.
59001002	N naataani, bigna nba baal’i kul, yin tuo k l tie pamann i po.
59001003	G dugn i ban g bigna gii baal’i k i g buon i dindann, l bu ŋanm g pugn’i juunn i.
59001004	Ama mɔnd man gii mɔg juunn saa yen juog, g fid g te niib nba cie, k b yam gagd, g siɛl g pɔd’b.
59001005	I ninŋ ne l gii tie g yanfuom pɔd sua, wan miɛl Yendu k u bu te’og. K l maa Yendu tien yua kul yen bulcind, g g jalg baa sua.
59001006	Ama l bual k l daan gii miɛl, wan gii daan k u bu la g daa mali munle-le. Yua nba mali munle-le tie nyan faalu n donŋ mɔgl nyunguonn nba g lunn nyan i.
59001007	L nibuolu ń daa mali k u bu la siɛl Yonmdaan buol.
59001008	U tie yaa daan nba kan fid g suol bonyenn i. U waa g tɔbn tɔbn i.
59001009	T naataani n ninŋ yua nba tie talg, u pal ń gii man yen Yendu n donŋ’o,
59001010	yua nba tie mɔgd mɔ yaa pal ń gii man yen Yendu n jiind’o, g dugn mɔgd tie nyan mɔpuug nyan i, u kan wai yen wan kuol.
59001011	Yendu gii siid yaa youg g cua muaɔg, u tu kuol i, u puug ń suod. U ŋanu po ń juab. L baa tie nnyan i mɔgd mɔ yaa po. Wan mali yaa youg k u tuona bu sonm nyan, l youg n tie u kuum.
59001012	Nil nba g bignn baal’o k u juun g kub u dindann, pamann tie u yal i. G dugn wan ŋɔn k u mɔg juunn nyan, u bu la nyuad nba g Yendu bo puon k u bu te yab nba bua’ɔg: lan tie miɛl.
59001013	Bignn gii baal nil, wan daa tua g Yendu n bign’o. G dugn siɛl kan fid g bign Yendu wan tien bonbiil, Yendu mɔ biɛ g bignd sua.
59001014	Ama nil maalbiid n bɔnd’o, g diɛl’o g kuand’o bigna n ninŋ.
59001015	U gii baa l bigna n ninŋ, u tu tien biid i, l biid mɔ tan gii yend u binbem, lan baal yen u kuum.
59001016	N naataani, i ji daa bɔnd i kua man.
59001017	Paab nba ŋan g dagd kul nya polu po i, t Baa buol. Wano n tag yendu, yen ŋmaalg, yen ŋmaabid k l sonm g tien yinyiem yen bunbɔnn k l lebd liel, ama wano nuan g lebd.
59001018	U buam n i, k u tug’ti g tien u bid u maam nba tie mɔni nyan po, k wan tag yal nba kul n ninŋ, tin gii tie liig yab.
59001019	N naataani, l tie k yin bann ne i. Tu cenŋ man ban maad’i yal, g mali u g fid g jiin. I pal ń biɛ daa be tonm tonm.
59001020	G dugn nil nba k u pal bie kan fid g tien yal ŋan Yendu nunŋ n.
59001021	Lann, ŋaa man tuonjɔgna kul yen bontitebiid kul, g jiin i kua g tuo g gaal Laabamann nba g Yendu bul i pal n ninŋ nyan, g dugn l Laabamann mɔg paalu g bu fid g fiel’i.
59001022	Daa tu kpi man yam gii cenŋ kukua kaa, i tu gii gbad l Laabamann yin tug g sun yen tuonn, lann i kaa i bɔnd i kua i.
59001023	Mɔni, nil gii gbad Laabamann g g tug g sun yenn tuonn, u tie nyan nil nba tu diid u kua ninnyuandg n ninŋ nyan i, g la u nunŋ po n naan nand.
59001024	U gii diid u kua g gbenn g paan g saa, wan sunm l youg mɔno wan naan nand nba.
59001025	Ama nil gii kpaan g fiid g bua k wan bann yiko nba ŋan g dagd, yal bu fid g nyan nil yabl n ninŋ, u gii ŋanm g ciib l n, g biɛ g tie nil nba tu cenŋ l yiko g sunm, ama g tie nil nba tu tug l yiko g sun yen tuonn, pamann tie u yal i, tuonn nba k u sun nyan po.
59001026	Nil gii yed k u jaand, g yen kan fid g suol u mɔb, u bɔnd u kua i. U jaad u kua i k u jaand.
59001027	Nil n baa suun yal nba t Baa Yendu nunŋ n, lan ŋɔn k u jaandi ŋan g biɛ tuag sɔnu n ne: u baa tod kpiebi yen pekɔa b cicagm n ninŋ, g biɛ daa ŋaa ŋanduna bona ń kuan’o biid n.
59002001	N naataani, yinm nba dug t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po, yua nba tie yudanddaan, daa mɔg man siɛl yaa lugdm niib siign.
59002002	L gii tie k i be tintaanu n, g nil tan baal g kua g pil nuubinyinn nba k b tien yen wula, g biɛ liɛ tiɛŋand, g talg mɔ baal g kua g liɛ tiɛpadma,
59002003	k i cɔln yua nba liɛ tiɛŋand nyan, g maad’o k wan baal g kaln kinkaanŋanu ne po. G yen ji maad talg nuan k wan gii sie l buol, lann i kaa k wan baal g kaln i taaŋmaabuol, tinŋ n ninŋ.
59002004	I gii tie nnyan i siign, i g mɔg lugdm kaa nyan ii ? L ŋɔnŋ k i tie nyan buuddanm nba bu yen mɔnkunninkpind nyan i.
59002005	Cenŋ man ne n naataani, Yendu lugd tali i, ŋanduna ne ninŋ, g te k b mɔg ŋalman u buol k l maa b dug u po. U biɛ bua k banm i ń di u bal faal nba k u puon yab nba bua’ɔg.
59002006	Ama k yinm nuan yen ji nund tali. G mɔgda mɔ n yen diɛ g cagn’i, g fuul’i g saa yen’i buuddanm buol.
59002007	Banm n biɛ maad mabiid Yiesu Kristo sanŋann po, sann nba g Yendu tie’i.
59002008	Yendu Kadaaɔg n, yiko nba cie liel‑nba kul maad: « I bua a lua nyan a kua nyan. » L gii tie k i cɔln l yiko, i tuag sɔnŋanu n nyan.
59002009	Ama l gii tie k i mɔg lugdm niib siign, i tie biid n nyan. Yendu yiko bu suol’i nii, g dugn i kpiɛd sɔnu u.
59002010	Yen mɔni, nil gii g cɔln l n ninŋ, baa bonyenn kua, u g cɔln l kul i.
59002011	G dugn yua nba maad k a kan conm, wano n biɛ maad k a kan kpi nil. L gii tie k a g tien cunconm, g yen kpii nil, a g cɔln l yiko n nyan.
59002012	Lann, i gii maad g biɛ tie bona nba kul, yin gii ban g Yendu yiko nba nyanŋ niib yonmd n ninŋ nyan, b tan bu nyii l po i g bu’i.
59002013	Yab g jie lieb ninbaaɔg, buud daal, Yendu bu bu b mɔ g kan jie’b ninbaaɔg. Ama g ninbajienu n yen cie buud.
59002014	N naataani, yua nba yed k u mɔg dindann, k u tuona yen g ŋɔnŋ k u mɔg dindann, n liɛ l nyuad i ? L dindann bu fid g fiel’o oo ?
59002015	L gii tie k i niipuo, lann i kaa k i ninja g mɔg tiɛd g biɛ g laad g di,
59002016	k i ninŋ yend maad’b: « I kun man manu, g daan liɛ tiɛd g biɛ di yin bua nand », k i yen g tie’b siɛl, n liɛ l maam niimn ninŋ i ?
59002017	L tie nnyan i dindann mɔ yaa po. A gii mɔg dindann, k a tuona yen g ŋɔnŋ k a mɔg dindann, a dindann ŋann tie dindankpienn i.
59002018	Sua bu fid g maad: « A mɔg dindann k n mɔ mɔg tuonŋana. » N mɔ bu ŋmiɛn l daan: « Ŋɔn’n a dindann nba g mɔg tuonŋana, k n tug n tuonŋana g ŋɔn’a k n mɔg dindann. »
59002019	A diɛ g Yenduyeno kua n be. L tie mɔni i. Sanpola mɔ biɛ diɛ k l tie nnyan i, g jiwaani mɔg’b k b jegl.
59002020	A g mɔg yam, a bua k a la yen a ninbinn i g bann k a gii mɔg dindann, g yen g mɔg tuonŋana, l dindann tie fam ii ?
59002021	I g tiɛn t yaaja Abraham n bo sun yal ii ? Wan bo tuo g tug u bija Isaak g maan’o salg binbindl po, g bu yid Yendu salg nyan, l tuonŋana po kaa g Yendu bo yiin’o nimɔn ii ?
59002022	N tua a la waa ? U dindann bo yeg yen u tuonŋana i. L tuonŋana n bo ŋɔn yen mɔni k u mɔg dindann.
59002023	L bo tien nnyan i, k ban bo diɛn yal Yendu Kadaaɔg n u po, ji tien yen mɔni. L bo diɛn g maad: « Abraham bo dug Yendu po, l po n bo te g Yendu tug’o k u tie nimɔn », k u biɛ yiin’o k u dɔnn.
59002024	N tua i la waa, nil tie nimɔn Yendu nunŋ n g dugn u tuonŋana po i. L g tie u dindann po kukua kaa.
59002025	Puocunconn nba k b bo yi’ug Rahaab nyan mɔ biɛ bo tien lann n nyan. U bo gaal Israyɛl sundi i, g te k b tɔgn sɔnfanu g nyiɛ doug n. L tuonŋana po i, g Yendu bo yiin’o nimɔn.
59002026	Lann, nyan fuom n tu g be nil gbanu n wan kpe nyan, dindann mɔ gii g mɔg tuonŋana u tu kpe i.
59003001	N naataani, yab nba bua ban gii tund niib, ban gii tie waam nne kua. G dugn yinm mɔno, i ban k tinm nba tund niib, t buud tan baa biɛ g cie yab g tund.
59003002	G dugn t kul paa g kpiɛd bona bonciɛnn n ninŋ. L gii tie g nil maad g g kpiɛd palb, l daan g mɔg ban bu jalg’o yal po. U tie nil nba fid g paad u gbanu kul i.
59003003	T tu kpign taani tanbiɛg k ban gii cɔln’ti nii. Nnyan i k t bu fid g paad’b gii saa yen’m tin bua naan.
59003004	Biɛ diid man ŋadnciɛnd, i la ban ja nand a, faaciɛnu n tu piend’b k b sonm nyum po. Yen l kul ne, b sitiɛ tie bonbig nne i k b diɛ g ŋmagd’b. B dɔlb‑nba n bua naan i k b saa.
59003005	Nifosaal lanm mɔ tie nnyan i. U tie bonbig nne i nil gbannand n, ama g yen pua jipaad k wan suun tuona nba yab. I la i, mubig nne n tu suol g tan yabd g di fuasiel.
59003006	Lanm mɔ tie nyan muu nyan i. Biidbuolu kul n yaan taan naan n nyan. Lanm be t gbannand n i, g jɔgnd gbanu kul, g di nifosaal binbem kul nyan muu nyan. L muu nya Sitaan buol i.
59003007	Nifosaal fid g paad muaɔg n bonkobd, yen bonyugda, yen bonbalnkaa, yen nyum n bonfuoda kul.
59003008	Ama baa sua g ban g fid g paad u lanm. U tie bonbiɛdl nba kan fid g sed suoo nii, g gbie yen lɔbd nba kpi kuum.
59003009	Lanm nba k t diɛ g pag t Yonmdaan t Baa nyan, t biɛ diɛ l lanm i g polg niib mɔb, banm nba g Yendu tag’b k b naan yen’o.
59003010	Pinpagd yen mɔpola kul nya mɔyenm n i. N naataani, l g dagd k lan gii tie nnyan.
59003011	Nyunbunbunn bu fid gii buni g nya bonyenn n ninŋ, nyunmanm yen nyuntonm ii ?
59003012	N naataani, kinkanŋ kan fid g lon sankpasaana, dimɔunŋ tiig mɔ kan fid g lon kinkana. Nyunbunbunn nba mɔg yaalm mɔ kan fid gii buni nyunmanm.
59003013	Ŋmaa n mɔg yanfuom g biɛ gbiɛ bona niimn i siign i ? L daan ń ŋɔn u binbeŋanu n ninŋ, k u jiin u kua g sun tuonŋana yen yanfuom.
59003014	Ama l gii tie k i mɔg i pal n ninŋ nankuonŋ g biɛ kpaan k i gii cie i lieb, yin daa donŋ i kua, yin biɛ daa fa k i tuag mamɔni sɔnu !
59003015	L yanfuom g nyiɛ Yendu buol kaa. L tie ŋanduna ne ninŋ yal yen nifosaal maalm i. L nyiɛ Sitaan buol i.
59003016	G dugn nanŋ gii be naan buol, g niib biɛ kpaan k ban gii cie b lieb, l buol i g ŋmadl yen tuonbibuolu kul be.
59003017	Ama yanfuom nba nya Yendu buol g mɔg jɔgnd. L yanfuom kpaan g niib yam ń gii dua i, g biɛ kuand manu b siign. G kpaan g niib ń gii taa mɔb. U jie niib ninbaaɔg bonciɛnn g biɛ suun tuonŋana. L yanfuom g paad niib g senŋ, u biɛ g mɔg ŋalaaciidug.
59003018	Yab nba kpaan g niib yam ń gii dua, banm n buul l yanduanm k l luon luana nba ŋan Yendu nunŋ n.
59004001	Kunkɔna yen mɔniɛɔg nya lɛ i, i siign i ? L nya yin tug i buam g tien bona nba ninŋ i. L bona n be i pal n ninŋ g kɔn yen’i.
59004002	I gii bua bonn g kan la, i ji tu kpaan k yin kpi kuum i. I biɛ gii niɛn bonn g kan nand, l ji tu baal yen kunkɔna yen mɔniɛɔg u, i siign. I tu g la yin kpaan yal nba, g dugn i tu g miɛl Yendu l bonn.
59004003	Lann i kaa i tu miɛl Yendu g kan la, g dugn i tu miɛd g mɔg maalbiid i: i miɛd k yin tien yin bua yal nba i.
59004004	Yinm yab waa g tɔbn tɔbn nyan cuncona nyan, i g ban k i gii buad ŋanduna, i ji kan gii bua Yendu uu ? Yua nba buad ŋanduna ji tu tie Yendu ninnand i.
59004005	Daa bii i mali g fam i, g Yendu Kadaaɔg maad: « Yendu buad fuom nba k u tien t ninŋ nyan, g kɔn l po. »
59004006	Yen l kul ne, u yen tien’ti ŋalbalg nba yab bonciɛnn. L po n te g Yendu Kadaaɔg maad: « Yendu kɔn yen jipaadanm i, g yen nyuan yen nunmanŋ yab jiind b kua u nunŋ n. »
59004007	Lann, tug man i kua g cab Yendu, g yie Sitaan k wan san g fagd yen’i.
59004008	I nagd man Yendu, k u mɔ baa nagd’i. Yinm biiddanm, nid man g nyan i biid, yinm nba waa g tɔbn tɔbn, ŋuul man i pal.
59004009	I be man pabɔnn n ninŋ ; i buud man gii fabn. Lebd man i laad k lan te bubuul, k i pamann mɔ ń te pabɔnn.
59004010	Jiin man i kua Yendu nunŋ n k u bu don’i.
59004011	N naataani, daa maad man mabiid i lieb po. Yua nba maad mabiid u ninja po, lann i kaa g bu u ninja, u maad Yendu mɔmaam i l mabiid, g biɛ bu l mɔmaam. Lann l gii tie k a bu Yendu mɔmaam, a ji g tie yua cɔln l mɔmaam kaa, a ji yiin a kua buuddaan n nyan.
59004012	Yendu kua n nyanŋ yiko g biɛ tie buuddaan. Wano kua n bu fid g fiel nil, lann i kaa g biɛn’o. K fin yua n bu a lua nyan, a mɔ yi a kua ŋmaa i ?
59004013	Cenŋ man ne, yinm nba n tua: « Dinne lann i kaa wonn, t bu gad doug ne ninŋ g tien binn, g kpend kpinkpeonŋ g la ligli bonciɛnn »,
59004014	i g ban wonn yal bu baal’i. I binbem tie bɛ i ? I tie nyan ŋunn nba tu baa l gii yann waam, lan yand nyan i.
59004015	Yin bo tu bu maad yal nba n ne: « Yendu gii bua, t baa mɔg miɛl g sun ne, lann i kaa ne ! »
59004016	Ama mɔlane, i mɔg jipaad g donŋ i kua. L jipaabuolu mɔ yen g ŋan.
59004017	Lann, yua nba kul ban yal dagd yen wan sun g yen g sun, l daan tun u kua biid i.
59005001	Mɔlane po, yinm ŋalmandanm, i buud man gii fabn man g dugn yubɔnn nba bu baal’i ne po.
59005002	I mɔgm dud o, bonfuoda mɔ biɛ mua i tiɛd o.
59005003	I ligli yen i wula kua tintontanmɔni u. L tintontanmɔni n tan bu te sieda g jalg’i, g di i gbannand nyan muu nyan. Ŋanduna nag juodu u, k yinm biɛ kpaan ŋalman g kul i kua waa !
59005004	I g pa tuonsunna nba sun i kpaand n ninŋ b paaɔg, k yin wuon b paaɔg nba ji yign, k l tuonsunna yigni duo hal Yonmdaan, Paaciɛnudaan buol.
59005005	Tinŋ po ne, i mɔg yin bua yal nba kul, g tie yin bua nand. I di g gbenŋd nyan bonkobd nba k b dinŋ’b g guu b kod daal nyan i.
59005006	I tun niib biid k b yen g biil siɛl, g kpii’b k b g jiin’i baa siɛl.
59005007	N naataani, juun man g guul saa yen Yonmdaan baalu. Diid man kpakuol, u tu mind i, gii guu u bonkukuod benu, lan cil kpanyitaag saa yen taag juodu.
59005008	I mɔ ń di mindl, i pal ń gii paa g dugn Yonmdaan baalu nag o.
59005009	N naataani, i daa buln buln man i lieb po, g Yendu ń tan daa bu’i. Buuddaan nag o, u ji be i dimɔi n i.
59005010	N naataani, n tua i la Yendu sogni‑nba nba bo maad Yonmdaan sann po, n bo cagn nand g yen juun aa ? I mɔ ń ŋmaa b taabuoug n.
59005011	T pag l danm g dugn b juunn po. Jua nba k b yi’ug Sɔb nyan, n tua i gbad ban maad k u bo juun nand aa ? I ban Yonmdaan n bo tan tien yal nba u po, g dugn Yonmdaan tie yua nba k u pal siɛd niib po, k u biɛ jie niib ninbaaɔg u.
59005012	N naataani, yal ŋanm g tie bonmɔnn n ne: daa polg man polu, biɛ daa polg man tinŋ. Daa l polg man palb. Yal tie mɔni, yin yed k l tie mɔni. Yal g tie mɔni mɔ, yin yed k l g tie mɔni g Yendu ń tan daa bu’i.
59005013	I siign ninŋ, l gii tie g niyend be fala n ninŋ, wan jaand, lua mɔ gii be pamann n ninŋ, wan yin yani g dond Yendu.
59005014	Yend gii yiɛl i siign, wan yiin Kristo tintaanu liig yab k ban tien kpam u po Yonmdaan sann po, g jaand.
59005015	B gii jaand g mɔg dindann, l jaandi bu te yiɛn ń paag. Yendu bu fiin’o ; l biɛ gii tie k l daan mɔg biid, Yendu bu di sugl u biid po.
59005016	I maad man i lieb i biid, g biɛ gii jaand i lieb po g fid g la laafiɛ. Nimɔn jaandi mɔg paalu bonciɛnn.
59005017	Eli mɔ bo tie nil nyan tinm nyan i. U bo jaand yen u pal kul g taag ń daa baa. G taag mɔ kon l g baa bina ŋantaa yen ŋmaali yinluob.
59005018	K u biɛ tan guan g jaand g miɛl taag. G taag baa g bonkukuod tien.
59005019	N naataani, l gii tie k i ninŋ g sua tud g fagd yen mamɔni sɔnu, g lua gɔgl’o g guan yen’o,
59005020	yin bann g yua nba gɔgl biiddaan nba tud sɔnu, g guan yen’o nyan, bu fiel biiddaan nalnŋ kuum fiɛl n, g biɛ te Yendu ń piin biid bonciɛnn.
60001001	Min Piɛr, n tie Yiesu Kristo sundu i. N da kadaaɔg ne g tien yinm nba g Yendu lugd’i k i tie u niib, g yad g be Pɔn yen Galasi yen Kapadɔs yen Asi yen Bitini doi n g tie saanm nyan i.
60001002	T Baa Yendu bo lugd’i, nyan wan bo liid g bobn nand nyan i, k u Foŋanm te k i tie u yab, k yin gii cɔln Yiesu Kristo, k u sɔm ń biɛ ŋuul i biid. Yendu ń yad yedŋanm bonciɛnn i po g biɛ te k i yam ń gii dua buga.
60001003	Yendu sann ń do, wano nba tie t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo Yendu g biɛ tie u Baa ! Wan yaan jie’ti ninbaaɔg bonciɛnn i, g Yiesu Kristo yiedu po k u guan g mal’ti. Nnyan i, k t ji mɔg dindann yen mɔni,
60001004	g Yendu bil ŋalman polu po g guun’ti. L ŋalman g mɔg k l biil, l g mɔg k l jɔgn, l biɛ g mɔg k l ŋanu po juab.
60001005	Yinm i g Yendu guu’i yen u paalu, k yin dug u po nyan, yin la fielu nba k u bobn g bu ŋɔn’ti yen mɔni dijijuog daal.
60001006	Lann n te k i kpanm yen pamann baa yen yin l cagn mɔlane yen bigna nba kul. L bual k lan baal’i nnyan i, l yen kan wai.
60001007	L bigna tie k ban diid g liɛ i dug Yendu po yen mɔni ii ? Diid man wula nba kan gii tund g be, niib yen tu tug g donn muu n ninŋ k ban diid g liɛ l ŋan ii ? Lann, yin dug Yendu po nyan, l tie bonmɔnn g cie wula. I gii dug g nyiɛ bigna n ninŋ, l ji bu baal yen dondl yen yudand yen sel i i po, youg nba g Yiesu Kristo tan bu legd.
60001008	I g ban g la wano Yiesu, g yen bua’ɔg, g biɛ g nyuan’o mɔlane, g yen dug u po g kpanm yen pamann nba g nil kan fid g ŋɔn yen lanbona.
60001009	G dugn i laad yin dug Yendu po g guu yal nba i: lan tie i fielu.
60001010	L fielu po i g Yendu sogni‑nba bo kpaan g bual bual k ban bann. B bo liid g maad g Yendu bu te’i l ŋalbalg.
60001011	Kristo Fuom nba bo be b ninŋ bo tuod g maad’b g Kristo bu la fala, g biɛ ŋɔn’m yudand nba bu baal l puol po, k b mɔ ji kpaan k ban bann yaa youg nba yen yal nba bo bu te k lan tien.
60001012	Yendu bo maad u sogni‑nba g maam nba k u tie’b k ban maad nyan, g tie banm mɔno yaa yal kaa, k l tie i yaa yal i. L maam i, g yab muand Laabamann nyan, ji muand’i mɔlane Foŋanm paalu po. L Foŋanm i, g Yendu bo sun’o k u nyiɛ polu g jiid. Malɛg‑nba mɔno bua k ban gbad maam nba k b muand’i nyan niimn.
60001013	L yaa po, bobn man gii guu, gii daan yen i pal kul k i tan bu la ŋalbalg daal nba g Yiesu Kristo tan bu legd.
60001014	Nyan yin tie niib nba cɔln Yendu nyan, ji daa mɔg man niɛnŋ nba k i bo tu mɔg siɛnyoug k l g ŋan nyan, niɛnŋ nba k i bo tu mɔg youg nba k i daa bo be yanbɔnm n ninŋ nyan.
60001015	Ama i binbem n ninŋ kul, yin gii tie niib nba ŋan canyiin, nyan Yendu nba yiin’i n ŋan nand nyan.
60001016	G dugn Yendu n maad yal u kadaaɔg n ninŋ n ne: « N binbem n ŋan nyan, i mɔ yaa binbem ń gii ŋan. »
60001017	I jaandi n ninŋ, i yi Yendu k i Baa i, wano yua nba bu nil kul nyan u tuona n tie nand nyan, g g mɔg lugdm. Lann, yin daa mɔg miɛl g be tinŋ n ninŋ ne, yin ŋɔn i binbem n ninŋ, k i cɔlm’o.
60001018	Yinm mɔno ban k i baa‑nba n bo luan’i binbem nba k l g mɔg niimn nyan, g Yendu nyan’i l n ninŋ o. U g tug bona nba biid nyan wula lann i kaa nyan ligli nyan kaa g pa g nyan’i,
60001019	ama u tug Kristo sɔm nba cie bonn kul i, g fiel’i, wano nba te nyan pebig nba ŋan g dagd nyan.
60001020	Yendu bo tuod g lugd’o g sua g ŋanduna daa g tag, g te k u baal dijijuog dani ne ninŋ i po.
60001021	Wano n te k i dug Yendu po, yua nba yied’o kpienm siign ninŋ, g tie’og yudand nyan. L po n te k i dug Yendu po g ji daan wan puon’i yal.
60001022	Yin cɔln mamɔni ne n te k i nyiɛ biid n, k yin fid gii bua i lieb Kristo‑yab yen mɔni. Lann, yin gii bua man i lieb yen i pal kul youg ń tuu youg.
60001023	I ban g Yendu n guan g mal’i. Nnyan, i ji tie yua nba kan ban g kpe yaa bid i. Ama yab nba kpenn nyan t baa‑nba nyan nuan, i ji g tie b yaa bid. Yendu maam nba tien miɛl g biɛ g lebd nyan paalu po i k i mal.
60001024	G dugn l diɛn g maad: « Nifosaal kul tie nyan muaɔg nyan i, k u yudand tie nyan mɔpuug nyan. Muaɔg kuod, k l puug suod g baa,
60001025	ama Yonmdaan maam nuan be i, youg kul. » L maam n tie Laabamann nba k b muand’i.
60002001	L yaa po, ŋaa man yal nba kul l tie biɛdm yen bɔndl yen ŋalaaci yen nanŋ yen sanjounŋ.
60002002	I bua man Yendu maam nyan sanpandi n bua biim nand nyan. Yendu maam n tie biim paaa. Lann n bu te k i Yendu ŋuanu ń gii saa liig, yin la fielu.
60002003	Yendu Kadaaɔg diɛn g maad lann n nyan: « Yinm mɔno la g Yonmdaan n sun tuona nba i po ŋan. »
60002004	I nagd man Yonmdaan buol. Wano n tie tann nba fo g niib bo yie g lu, ama g Yendu yen bo lugd l tann g dugn l tie bonbuakal i paaa u po.
60002005	I mɔ n yaan tie tana nba fo nyan, i nagd man u buol k wan tug’i g maa Foŋanm ŋaag. Nnyan i k i baa tie salg-yidkab nba g Yendu lugd g taan k ban gii yid’o salg nyan Foŋanm n bual nand nyan, g Yendu bu tuo l salg g dugn Yiesu Kristo po.
60002006	G dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Diid, n lugd tann n nyan k l tie bonbuakal paaa g tien’o tanjal, g bil Siyɔn doug n ninŋ, yua nba dug l tann po, l daan kan ban g fiɛg. »
60002007	Lann, l tann tie bonbuakal i paaa yinm yab nba dug u po, ama yab nba g dug u po nuan l g tie nnyan kaa b po. L diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Tann nba g tanmaala bo yie g lu, l tann n tan guan g te dieog fiɛgl tanjal. »
60002008	L biɛ diɛn g maad: « L baa tie tann nba g niib baa tuud i, tann nba baa guul niib. » B tuud l tann g dugn b yie k b kan gii dug Yendu maam po. Wan bo sen k l baa tie’b nand nba n nyan.
60002009	Ama yinm nuan, i tie buolu nba g Yendu lugd i, g taan g tie wano Yendu Badciɛn salg-yidkab, g tie buolu nba tug u munn kul g cab Yendu, g biɛ tie Yendu mɔno yaa niib. U lugd’i k i muand g ŋɔn u tuonŋana nba k u sun i. G yiin’i k yin nya bunbɔnn n ninŋ g kua u yinyiem nba g mɔg liel n ninŋ.
60002010	Siɛnyoug, i bo g tie Yendu buolu kaa, ama mɔlane i ji tie u buolu i. Siɛnyoug, Yendu bo g jie’i ninbaaɔg, ama mɔlane u ji jie’i ninbaaɔg.
60002011	N dɔnn‑nba, i tie nyan sɔnpenda yen saanm nyan i tinŋ ne po. L po n te k n maad’i, k i suol i kua yen yin tu juab i kua g cab niɛnŋ nba k i pala n ninŋ k l yen mabnd’i nyan.
60002012	I taan g be yen yab g ban Yendu i, i mɔg man tɔgu nba ŋan. Nnyan, baa b l gii jalg’i g tua k i tie nibiid mɔno, b tan bu la i tuonŋana i g ji gii dond Yendu, daal nba k u tan bu baal.
60002013	T Yonmdaan po, yin daa kand yikodanm mɔi po: lan tie Rom badciɛn nba mɔg nuu nil kul po
60002014	yen batieb nba k u sun’m k ban gii diɛl bibiɛdi tuba, g yen gii pag yab nba suun tuonŋana.
60002015	G dugn Yendu n bua yal tie k i tuonŋana nba k i suun nyan ń te g yanbɔndanm yen yukpiena ń daa fid g maad siɛl i.
60002016	I tie niib nba yal b kua i, yen daa mali man k l yal‑n‑kua cab’i k yin gii suun tuonbiid kaa. I tie Yendu tuonsunna i. Lann, i suun man wan bua nand.
60002017	I cɔln man niib kul, gii bua man i lieb Kristo‑yab, gii jie Yendu, gii cɔln Rom badciɛn.
60002018	Yinm yab nba tie tuonsunna, daa kand man i canbaa‑nba mɔi po, ŋanm man gii cɔln’m man. Daa cɔln man i canbaa‑nba nba tie nimɔnm g biɛ gbiɛ niimn kukua kaa, ama i cɔln man yab tie tondanm mɔ.
60002019	G dugn b gii ŋɔnŋ’a fala k a yen g biil siɛl, k a juun g dugn Yendu po, l tie bonŋann i.
60002020	G nyaan, l gii tie k a biil bonn, k b puag’a k a juun g gaal l puad, n liɛ l nyuad i ? Ama l gii tie ŋanm nba k a tie po i, k a juun g gaal fala, l baa tie bonŋann i Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ.
60002021	Yendu bo yiin’i k yin sun lann i. Yen mɔni Yiesu mɔno bo la fala i po. Wan la fala buolu nba tie binbiug u i po, k i mɔ ń fid g ŋmaa u taabuod n ninŋ.
60002022	U g tien biid g la, sua mɔ biɛ g ban g gbad k u fa faaɔg.
60002023	Ban bo sugd’o, u bo g sugl g ŋmiɛn sua. Ban biɛ bo tan cagn’o, u bo g gaan jad, ama u bo tu tug u kua g cab Yendu i, wano nba tie Mɔnkundaan.
60002024	Dapunpɔnn po i g Yiesu mɔno tuo g gaal t biid, g la fala, g biid ń ji daa mɔg paalu t po, ama k tin gii be binbem nba ŋan g dagd Yendu po. Wan gaal yiɛd nba u gbannand po nyan n tie i laafiɛ.
60002025	Mɔni, i bo tie nyan pei nba bund g waa g g ban ban saa naan i, ama mɔlane i ji guan i kpaatua nba guu’i nyan buol.
60003001	Yinm puob, i mɔ ń daa kand i salb mɔi po. Nnyan, siɛb gii be b ninŋ g g gaal Yendu maam, ban la yin be nand g ji gii dug Yendu po, g sua yen g maad’b siɛl,
60003002	g dugn b bu la i binbem k l ŋan g dagd g biɛ mɔg cɔlunŋ.
60003003	Puob, daa kpaan man i gbannand po ŋanu kaa: lan tie yuounŋ yupiɛnu yen laani nba k b tag yen wula liɛnu yen ligciɛnŋ tiɛliɛnu.
60003004	Ama i kpaan man i pal n ninŋ ŋanu: lan tie k i gii mɔg yam g biɛ gii tie suoo. L ŋanu n kan ban g biil, g Yendu pal kɔn l po bonciɛnn.
60003005	Siɛnyoug puob nba bo cibn g ŋua Yendu g dug u po, b bo ŋami b kua l yaa ŋanmu i, g g kand b salb mɔi po.
60003006	Nnyan i g Sara bo cɔln Abraham g yi’ug k u yonmdaan. Mɔlane i ji tie u bipuobi i, l gii tie k i tuona ŋan k i g ŋaan g siɛl ŋmad i yam.
60003007	K yinm nba mɔ tie puodanm, ŋanm man gii kub i puob yen yanfuom, gii ban g jua yen puo paalu g ja. I cɔln’m man g dugn Yendu bu pi yinm yen banm kul i miɛl. I tie man nnyan g siɛl ń daa fid g pien i jaandi.
60003008	Min bu juod g maad yal n ne: i mɔg man maalyenm g biɛ gii joi i lieb man. I bua man i lieb gii tie man ŋanm, g biɛ gii jiind man i kua.
60003009	Daa tu ŋmiɛnd man tonu yab nba tien’i tonu, biɛ daa tu sugl g ŋmiɛn man yab sugd’i. Ama tu gaal’b man mɔgaalŋani g dugn Yendu bo yiin’i k i gii tie nnyan i g fid g la u yedŋanm.
60003010	G dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Yua nba bua wan gbad manu u binbem n ninŋ g biɛ gii be pamann n l tie k wan suol u mɔb i g daa maad baa mabiiug, g biɛ daa fa faaɔg.
60003011	L tie k wan san g fagd yen tuonbiid, gii suun tuonŋana, gii kpaan yen u pal kul k wano yen u lieb ń gii be k l man.
60003012	G dugn Yonmdaan nunŋ tuol nimɔnm po i, k u tuba gbien g cenŋ b jaandi. Ama g yen kɔn yen yab tie bonbiil. »
60003013	I pal gii kɔn k i gii suun tuonŋana, ŋmaa n bu tien’i bonbiiug u ?
60003014	Baa l gii tie k i bu la fala g dugn i suun tuonŋana po, pamann baa tie i yal i. Daa jie man nifosaal baa waam nne, siɛl ń biɛ daa ŋmad i yam.
60003015	Ama i cɔln man Kristo yen i pal kul, wano n tie i Yonmdaan. Bobn man gii guu youg kul k i ŋmiɛn nil nba kul bual’i buali i dindann po.
60003016	G nyaan tu jiin man b buali yen cɔlunŋ g daa gaan siɛl yaa jad, k i pal n ninŋ yin daa jalg i kua baa siɛl po. Nnyan i, g fai bu suol yab nba maad mabiid i binbeŋanu po, binbem nba k i be g dugn yin yaan tie Kristo‑yab nyan po.
60003017	Yen mɔni l gii tie Yendu buam n i, k i laad fala i ŋanm po, lann n su yen yin gii laad fala g dugn i tuonbiid po.
60003018	Kristo mɔno, wano nba tie nimɔn, u kpe nibiid po k wan gad yen’i Yendu buol i. U kpe taal yenm kua i niib biid po. B bo kpii’ug, ama g Foŋanm te k u yied g mɔg miɛl.
60003019	L Foŋanm n biɛ bo te k u jiid tinkpiiug n, g daan muand kpienm nba bo be dansalg u Laabamann.
60003020	Banm n tie niib nba bo yie Yendu siɛnyoug, youg nba g Yendu bo nyii u pal, g guu g Nowe ń kpaa u ŋadunŋ g gbenn. L ŋadunŋ n ninŋ i, g niib banniin kukua bo kua g la miɛl nyum po.
60003021	L nyum bo tie nyunwulu ninnaɔnŋ u. L nyunwulu n ji fe i mɔ mɔlane. L nyunwulu g tie g nil ń wul g nyan u gbannand po jɔgnd kaa, ama l tie g nil ń tug u kua g cab Yendu yen papienn i. L n ninŋ i, k i laad fielu Yiesu Kristo yiedu po.
60003022	Wano n duo polu po g ji kal Yendu jendu, g mɔg nuu malɛg‑nba po yen polu po yikodanm yen paaludanm kul po.
60004001	Kristo n tuo g gaal fala u gbannand n ninŋ nyan, lann, i mɔ ń paan man i pala gii mɔg l maalm nnyan, k l maa yua nba tuo g gaal fala u gbannand n ninŋ, wano yie k u ji kan gii suun tuonbiid n nyan.
60004002	Nnyan, lan cil mɔlane gii saa, dana nba tenn k u baa mɔg miɛl g be tinŋ po ne, u ji kan gii ŋua nifosaal niɛnbiid kaa, ama u baa tie yal tie Yendu buam i.
60004003	Mɔni, siɛnyoug, i bo suun nyan yab g ban Yendu n bua ban gii suun nand nyan hal k l wai. I bo be binbebiiug n ninŋ, g suun cuncontuona, g tie dinyuula, g taand lieb g di g nyu g buog, g suun tuona nba mɔg fai g biɛ pug yennaankad, g Yendu Mɔmaam yen g cab.
60004004	G mɔlane, yab g ban Yendu n la k i ji g ŋua’b k i suun l tuonbiid nyan, k l lid’b k b ji sugd’i.
60004005	Ama b tan bu ŋɔn Yendu b tuonbiid ŋann kul, wano nba bobn g gbenn g bu bu fuodb yen kpienm.
60004006	Lann n tien k b bo muand Laabamann yab nba bo kpe mɔ. B bo jiɛl b buud nyan ban bo sun b tuona k l bual nand nyan i. L bo tien nyan ban tu jiɛl nifosaal kul buud nand nyan i. Ama k b yen muand’b Laabamann g Foŋanm po, ban mɔ ń fid gii fo nyan Yendu n fo nand nyan.
60004007	Ŋanduna juodu ji g fag. I be man binbem nba dagd, gii ceg i kua po, g fid gii jaand.
60004008	Bonn kul n ninŋ, yal nba ŋanm g tie bonmɔnn canyiin tie k yin gii bua i lieb i, g dugn buam piind biid bonciɛnn.
60004009	I gaan man i lieb i ŋai n ninŋ g daa mɔg siɛl yaa bunbulmi.
60004010	I kul n gaal paab buolu buolu nba Yendu buol nyan, yua kul ń gii ban u paab kubnu, g tug l paab gii suun u lieb po.
60004011	Yua nba k u paab tie k wan tu gaal maam g maad, l daan ń tu maad Yendu maam, yua nba suun g tod u lieb mɔ, wan gii suun l tuonn yen paalu nba g Yendu tie’og, g Yiesu Kristo po Yendu ń gaal yudand bonn kul n ninŋ ; wano nba g yudand yen paalu tie u yal youg ń tuu youg. Amɛnn.
60004012	N dɔnn‑nba, i be muupienu n ninŋ i. Yen daa ŋaa man lan lid’i nyan l tie bonsaann nyan kaa. L tie bignn i g baal’i.
60004013	Ama ŋaa man i pal ń gii man k i mɔ taan g la fala yen Kristo ; nnyan i, k i tan baa be pamanciɛnn n ninŋ youg nba k u tan bu legd yen u yudand.
60004014	B gii sugd’i Kristo sann po, pamann tie i yal i, g dugn Yendu Foŋanm nba mɔg yudand g cie bonn kul be i ninŋ.
60004015	I ninŋ ne, baa sua ń daa be fala n k l tie k u kpii nil, lann i kaa k u jan, lann i kaa k u tien siɛl yaa bonbiil, lann i kaa k u kua nil maam n ninŋ.
60004016	Ama l gii tie g nil laad fala g dugn u tie Kristo‑yua po, l daan ń daa jie fai. Wan gii tiend Yendu balg yen niib n yi’ug Kristo‑yua.
60004017	Youg ji baal n nyan g Yendu bu bu niib buud. U bu cind g bu yab nba tie u niib i. L gii tie k u cind yen tinm i, yab nba g tuo g gaal u Laabamann, banm ji bu juod nle i ?
60004018	Nnyan i k l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « L gii tie k l tu paa yo, nimɔn ń tan la fielu, yua g jie Yendu yen yua tie biiddaan ji bu tien nle i g la fielu i ? »
60004019	Lann yab nba laad fala k l tie Yendu buam po, ban gii suun tuonŋana, g tug b miɛl g cab b Tagtua nba cɔln u puoni.
60005001	Mɔla po n ji maad yen yab tie Kristo‑yab nikpela g be i siign ninŋ ne i. Min mɔno n tie Kristo‑yab nikpel i. N bo la yen n ninbinn Kristo n la fala nba kul. U gii guan yen u yudand, n mɔ ji baa be l yudand n i. Min bua n maad’i yal nba g paan i pala n ne:
60005002	Pelol nba g Yendu tug g kubn’i, ŋanm man gii kub l pelol nyan pekpaali nyan. I guu man l pelol k lan gii tie yen i yanbuam i. Yendu bua nnyan i. Daa ŋaa man lan gii tie yen niinn, g biɛ daa tie k i kpaan ligli kaa, ama lan gii tie k i yam mɔno n bua l tuonn.
60005003	Daa kpaan man k i gii kub yen paalu yab nba g Yendu tug g kubn’i. Ama mɔnd man k ban la i binbeŋanu n g bann ban baa be nand.
60005004	G daal nba g pekpaali Bad tan bu legd, i bu gaal nyuad nba ŋɔnŋ k i mɔg yudand, l nyuad ŋanu po kan ban g juab.
60005005	K yinm nipaaɔnŋ mɔ, daa kand man nikpela mɔi po, i kul ń gii jiind i kua yinm yen i lieb binbenu n ninŋ, g dugn l diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n g maad: « Yendu kɔn yen jipaadanm i, g yen nyuan yab jiind b kua yen nunmanŋ. »
60005006	Lann, i jiind man i kua Yendu paaciɛnudaan buol. Nnyan i, k u tan bu don’i youg nba k u bo sen.
60005007	Tug man yal nba kul tie i pakɔnn g kubn u nui n ninŋ, g dugn wano n kub’i.
60005008	I ceg man i kua po, gii guu i kua, g dugn i ninnand Sitaan lin nyan yanbɔl nba ŋuund nyan i, g kpaan nil nba k u bu biɛn’o.
60005009	Ŋanm man gii dug Yendu po, g daa ŋaa wan paad’i. I yen ban k i ninjanm Kristo‑yab nba yad g be ŋanduna n kaannaa kul mɔ laad l fala i.
60005010	Ama i gii cagn nnyan k l yann waam, Yendu nba bua’i bonciɛnn, bu guan g ŋanm i binbenu, g paan i pala, g pugn’i paalu g biɛ te k i kan gii mɔg begnu. Wano n yiin’i k i mɔ ń gaal yudand nba g mɔg gbennu Kristo n ninŋ.
60005011	Paaciɛnu tie u yal i, youg ń tuu youg. Amɛnn.
60005012	Silfɛn nba tie t ninja Kristo‑yua k n pal paa u po n tod’n k n da kadaaɔg ne g tien’i, g bua k min paan i pala g biɛ ŋanm g ŋɔn’i yal tie Yendu ŋalbalg yen mɔni. Ŋanm man gii diɛ l ŋalbalg k l paa.
60005013	Kristo tintaanu niib nba be Babilɔnn, g Yendu bo lugd’b nyan yinm nyan fuond’i. N big Mark mɔ fuond’i.
60005014	I fuond man i lieb gii lɔnŋ’b yen naataann. Yinm yab nba tie Kristo‑yab kul, Yendu ń te k i yam ń gii dua.
61001001	Min Simɔn Piɛr, n tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunn i g biɛ tie u sundu. N da kadaaɔg ne g tien yinm nba mɔ dug Yiesu Kristo po nyan tinm nyan i. Wano Yiesu Kristo nba tie t Yendu g biɛ tie t Fietua n te k t dug u po k l maa u tie mɔnkundaan i.
61001002	Yendu ń yad yedŋanm bonciɛnn i po g biɛ te k i yam ń gii dua buga k l maa i ban’o g biɛ ban t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo.
61001003	Yonmdaan n tie paaciɛnudaan nyan i, k u tie’ti bona nba kul tie payiɛnu t po t binbem n ninŋ, k tin gii ŋua Yendu yen t pal kul. U te k t bann yua nba yiin’ti u yudand yen u bulcind po.
61001004	L yudand yen l bulcind po i k u tie’ti wan bo puon’ti puoni nba k l gbenŋ g biɛ tie bonmɔnn t po nyan. U tien nnyan, k i gii gaal l puoni, yin ŋaa g daa bua ŋanduna ne niib n mɔg niɛnŋ nba k l g ŋan g juand b yam nyan i, k yinm yen wano ń ji gii taa binbem.
61001005	L yaa po, yin ji dug Yiesu Kristo po nyan, yin mɔnd k i binbem ń gii ŋan. I binbem gii ŋan yin bann sonml.
61001006	I gii bann sonml yin gii so i kua. I gii suol i kua yin gii mɔg juunn. I gii mɔg juunn yin gii ŋua Yendu yen i pal kul.
61001007	I gii ŋua Yendu yen i pal kul yin mɔnd g naataann ń gii be i siign. Naataann gii be i siign, yin gii bua lieb.
61001008	Yen mɔni l gii tie k i mɔg l bona, g l ŋua nnyan g saa liig, l bu te k i gbanu ń gii walb tuonn po, g biɛ te k yin ŋanm g bann t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo g pugn.
61001009	Ama yua nba g mɔg l bona, u g nyuan fagm. U tie nyan juan nyan i. U sunm g Yendu ŋuul g nyan tuonbiid nba k u bo mɔg siɛnyoug o.
61001010	Lann, n ninjanm Kristo‑yab, nyan Yendu n yaan yiin’i g lugd’i nyan, ŋmid man nunŋ g ŋɔn yen mɔni g Yendu yiin’i g biɛ lugd’i. G dugn l gii tie k i tien nnyan, i kan ban g kpiɛd Yendu sɔnu.
61001011	Nnyan i, g Yendu tan bu gaal’i nuujad tinle g kuan’i t Yonmdaan t Fietua Yiesu Kristo diem nba g mɔg gbennu nyan ninŋ.
61001012	N ban k i ban l bona kul ne g biɛ ŋanm g diɛ mamɔni nba k i gaal nyan. Ama yen l kul ne, n baa l tun g tiɛd’i l bona i.
61001013	N diid g sua k min daa be g mɔg miɛl ne, k l dagd yen min gii tun g maad’i l bona k yin gii tiɛn l po.
61001014	G dugn n ban k l kan wai yen min bul g ŋaa’i. T Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo n te k n bann.
61001015	Lann, n bu mɔnd g baa n ji tan gii g be mɔno, yin fid gii tiɛn l bona po youg kul.
61001016	Yen mɔni, t g gaal manaankam kaa g ŋɔnŋ’i t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo n bu baal yen u paaciɛnu nba, ama tinm la u yudand yen t ninbina i.
61001017	G dugn youg nba k u bo gaal sel yen yudand t Baa Yendu buol, t bo be. L youg u k u gbad Yendu paaciɛnudaan niɛlu k l maad: « U ne tie n bija i, n pal kɔn u po bonciɛnn, n tug n buam kul g tien u ninŋ. »
61001018	Tinm mɔno t bo gbad l niɛlu k l nyiɛ polu po, youg nba k t bo be yen’o Yendu jual po.
61001019	T biɛ diɛ yen t pal kul g Yendu sogni‑nba bo maad mɔni i. K l ŋan yen yin ŋanm gii cenŋ ban bo maad yal nba. G dugn l maam tie nyan fidl nyan i, g fand bunbɔnn n be naan, saa yen lan tan bu fann, g siŋaaɔg ŋmaabig ń fand i pala.
61001020	Ama lan daa bual k yin gii ban yal nba n ne: Yendu sogni‑nba n bo maad yal nba k b diɛn Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ nyan kan fid gii tie b yul po maalm.
61001021	G dugn Yendu sogni‑nba ninŋ sua g ban g maad masiɛm k l tie nifosaal buam po, ama Foŋanm n bo tu te ban maad Yendu n yaan bua ban maad yal nba.
61002001	Siɛnyoug, niib bo be Israyɛl yab siign ninŋ g yi b kua Yendu sogni‑nba, g yen fa faaɔg. I mɔ yaa siign ninŋ, niib tan baa be g wuond g tund’i faaɔg tundl nba bu kuan nil tudm n. B bu yie b Canbaa nba bo fiel’b nyan, g te g Yendu ń biɛn’m tonm.
61002002	Niib bonciɛnn bu ŋuan’m b binbem nba mɔg fai nyan ninŋ. B po bu te g niib ń gii maad mabiid Mamɔni Sɔnu po.
61002003	Ban bua ligli nyan, b baa pua mɔb i g diɛ b yul po maalm g bɔnd g di’i. Ama Yendu tuod b po k l fag g bu dad b tubl. U kon bu l biɛn’m k l ji kan wai.
61002004	G dugn Yendu g ŋaa malɛg‑nba nba bo tien biid nyan, ama u lu’b buoug nba nyua g g mɔg po nyan ninŋ i, k b luo bunbɔnn n ninŋ, g guu buud daal.
61002005	Yendu biɛ bo g ŋaa ŋanduna niib nba bo be hal siɛnyoug g g dad b tubl. U bo te g taag baa baa g biɛn niib nba bo g cɔlm’o kul. Ama u bo tan fiel Nowe yen niib banlile i. Wano Nowe bo muand g niib binbem ń gii ŋan Yendu po.
61002006	Yendu biɛ bo dad niib nba bo kua Sɔdɔm yen Gomɔr nyan tubl, g juu l doi muu k l dii g buod. Yal bo baal’b nyan tie binbiug u yab nba g cɔlm’o po, k ban la l buol g bann yal nba tan bu baal’b.
61002007	Ama u bo nyan Lɔt l n ninŋ. Lɔt bo tie nimɔn i, k l bo yiɛl’o yen l doi n ninŋ niib n bo tie ban bua nand nba, k b binbem biɛ mɔg fai.
61002008	Wano Lɔt bo be l nibiid siign ninŋ, g gbiɛ g biɛ laad bona nba k b tie, k l tuonbiid ŋmad u yam daal kul g dugn wan tie nimɔn nyan po.
61002009	Lann n ŋɔnŋ g Yonmdaan ban wan bu tien nand g nyan yab nba cɔlm’o bigna n ninŋ, g yen guu g tan bu dad nibiid tubl daal nba k u tan bu bu’b.
61002010	Yab nba suun b gbannand n bua yal nba k l kuand’b jɔgnd n ninŋ, g biɛ nund Yendu yikod nyan, banm i k u bu mand g dad b tubl. Banm nba tund niib faaɔg tundl k n maad’i ne, b tie kangbada i g biɛ ŋanm g dug b kua po k l pend. B g jie yen ban sugl yab nba be polu po g mɔg yudand.
61002011	Baa malɛg‑nba nba ŋanm g mɔg paaciɛnu g cie banm yab nba tund faaɔg tundl nyan mɔno g jalg l polu po yab, b biɛ g sugd’b Yonmdaan nunŋ n ninŋ.
61002012	L niib tie nyan bonkobd nba g mɔg siɛl yaa maalm, g be k ban tu suol’b g kpi nyan i. B sugd yal nba k banm mɔno g ban i. B tan bu kpe nyan bonkobd nyan i.
61002013	Ban sun tuonbiid nba nyan, b tan bu la l tuonbiid nyuad. Yendu n i k b suun b gbannand n bua yal nba. B biɛ gii taan yen’i g bu di jied, b bontitied tu biil i sann g biɛ kuan’i fai i. B tie nnyan i g bɔnd’i k l man b po.
61002014	Banm l kpaan puob i, g bua ban gii tie biid kukua youg kul. B bɔnd yab nba g ŋanm g dug Kristo po i, k b ŋua’b. B l sun g bonn kul ń gii tie b yal i. Banm i g Yendu pol’b mɔb.
61002015	B ŋaa sɔnŋanu i, g bod g fagd g ŋuan Bosɔr bija Balaam sɔnu. Wano Balaam bo buad jied i, g tuo g gaal ban bo tie’og yal nba g bu sun bonbiil.
61002016	Ama Yendu bo fu yen’o l bontitied po, g te g bonŋ, bonkobg nba tu g maad, maad yen’o yen nifosaal niɛlu, g bel wano Yendu sogni Balaam k u g sun u jadm tuona.
61002017	L nibuolu nba tund faaɔg tundl tie nyan caakuona nyan i. B biɛ tie nyan tawalgband nba g faalu tu pien g te lan kaad nyan i. Yendu bobn yiɛl g bil g guun’m bunbɔncild n ninŋ.
61002018	B tu sed yen maband g maad maam bonciɛnn k l yen g mɔg niimn, g tug nifosaal n niɛn yal nba k l g ŋan nyan, g diɛ diɛɔg g suol yab nba daa l gbaa gbaa g yie g ji g be yen yab nba tud Yendu sɔnu.
61002019	B tu puon’m yal‑n‑kua i, k banm mɔno yen ŋaa k b gbannand n bua bona nba yend’b g bu biɛn’m. Yal yen yend nil mɔ, l nil ji tu te l bonn yonm i.
61002020	L gii tie g niib gbaa gbaa g tan ŋmad g nyiɛ ŋanduna ne jɔgntuona n ninŋ, k l tie k ban bann t Yonmdaan t Fietua Yiesu Kristo po i, g biɛ ŋaa b kua g guan g baa l jɔgntuona n ninŋ, l ji baa biɛ l danm po g cie ban bo kpiɛ g be nand.
61002021	L danm bo gii g bann mɔnkund sɔnu lann n su yen ban bann l sɔnu u, g biɛ yie g ŋaa Yendu mɔmaam nba k b bo tund’b nyan.
61002022	B bontitied ne n ŋɔn g makpanjam ŋanle ne tie mɔni: « Sangbann gii siin u tu guan g di wan siin yal nba i », « Duol gii wul u biɛ tu guan g pagn bagd n i ».
61003001	N dɔnn‑nba, kadaaɔg munle po n nyan k n ji da g tien’i. N diɛn l kadaad tinle kul g tiɛd’i tunda nba k i gaal nyan po, g kpaan k i gii mɔg maalŋanm i.
61003002	N bua k i gii tiɛn maam nba g Yendu sogni‑nba bo tuod g maad siɛnyoug, g biɛ gii tiɛn t Yonmdaan t Fietua sundi nba bo be yen’i n bo tund’i u mɔmaam nba nyan.
61003003	Yen daa bann man g dijijuog dani n ninŋ, niib bu baal gii be g tie b gbannand buam. B baa laa’i
61003004	g tua: « U bo puon k u bu guan, u biɛ ji be lɛ i ? Hal t yaajanm n kpe saa yen mɔlane, baa siɛl g lebd ; bona kul tie nyan Yendu n bo tag ŋanduna k l tie nand nyan i. »
61003005	B tu maad nnyan g g bua k b tiɛd g siɛnyoug Yendu bo maad maam i, g polu yen tinŋ tag. U bo paad tinŋ yen nyum, g te g nyum taan yenn buol g tinŋ nyuand.
61003006	L nyum n biɛ bo tan yil ŋanduna nba bo cind g be, g biɛn yal nba l mɔg miɛl kul.
61003007	Polu yen tinŋ nba be mɔlane nuan, Yendu maad k l baa be i g guu daal nba k u tan bu bu niib buud, g biɛn yab g cɔlm’o. L daal, polu yen tinŋ bu di muu g buod.
61003008	Ama n dɔnn‑nba, bonyenn kua n be k i bo kan sunm: Yonmdaan yaa po, diyenn tie nyan bina tudl nyan i, g bina tudl tie nyan diyenn nyan.
61003009	Siɛb mali g Yonmdaan yuand yen wan tien wan bo puon yal nba i. L yen g tie nnyan kaa. U mɔg sugl i po i, k l maa u g bua g baa sua ń biɛl fam. U bua g sua kul ń lebd u pal g ŋaa biid tienu i.
61003010	Yen l yaa kul, Yonmdaan n bu baal yaa daal nba, l baa tie nyan naayig n tu baal g libl niib nand nyan i. L daal, fuug bonciɛnn bu tien, g polu ń bod, g yal nba be polu po kul ń di muu, g tinŋ yen yal nba be tinŋ po kul ń mɔ ń di muu.
61003011	Nyan bona ne kul n tan bu di muu nyan, ji bann man yin baa sonm nand k l ŋɔnŋ k i cɔln Yendu g biɛ ŋua’ɔg yen i pal kul,
61003012	gii guu daal nba g Yendu sen, g biɛ gii gbaa yen i paalu kul k l daal ń baal tonm. L daal i g polu bu di muu, g yal nba l be polu kul ń donn muuwalu n ninŋ.
61003013	Ama t guu polu yen tinŋ nba g Yendu bo puon nyan i. L kul baa tie bonpaana i. Niib nba baa be l tinpaanŋ n ninŋ baa suun tuona nba tuag mamɔni sɔnu kua i.
61003014	Lann, n dɔnn‑nba, nyan yin guu l daal nyan, mɔnd man g daa mɔg siɛl yaa jɔgnd yen siɛl yaa jalgi Yendu nunŋ n ninŋ, g manu ń gii be yinm yen wano siign.
61003015	T Yonmdaan gii dii mindl saa yen mɔlane, u bua k i la fielu i. T ninja Pɔl, wano nba k t bua’ɔg mɔ bo diɛn’i l bona po i. Yendu n bo tie’og yanfuom k u diɛn g tie’i.
61003016	Wan diɛn kadaad nba ninŋ kul, u maad l maam i. L kadaad n ninŋ, yenn‑nba buol be k l gbadu paa. L maam i g yab tie yanbɔndanm k b dindann g yab nyan kpind. B biɛ tie nnyan i Yendu Kadaaɔg n ninŋ liel‑nba buol g kuand b kua tudm n ninŋ.
61003017	Lann n dɔnn‑nba, yinm nuan ji tuod g ban l po n nyan. Suol man i kua g tan daa ŋaa g nibiid tudm ń te k i dindann ń gii lenŋ, k yin ŋaa yin daan tu sie k l paa nand.
61003018	Mɔnd man gii band t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo, t Fietua g pugd, k u ŋalbalg ń gii pugd i binbem n ninŋ. Yudand ń gii tie u yal, lan cil mɔlane saa yen youg nba g mɔg juog. Amɛnn.
62001001	T da kadaaɔg ne k tin maad’i miɛl maam nba bo be hal cilg youg nyan po i. K t gbad l maam, g la’ɔg yen t ninbina, g ŋanm g diid’o g biɛ sii’ug yen t nui.
62001002	L miɛl n bo tan dɔgd, k t la’ɔg. L po n te k t kun mɔni g biɛ muand’i miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn po. L miɛl bo be t Baa Yendu buol i, g tan dɔgd g ŋɔn’ti u kua.
62001003	Tin la yal, g biɛ gbad yal nyan, t muand i mɔ lann n nyan, g naataann ń ŋanm gii be tinm yen yinm n ninŋ. Yen mɔni, naataann nba be t ninŋ taand’ti yen t Baa Yendu yen u Bija Yiesu Kristo i.
62001004	T da kadaaɔg ne g tien’i k t kul pala ń ŋanm g manŋ g tond i.
62001005	Tin gbad maam nba Yiesu Kristo buol g muand’i n ne: Yendu tie yinyiem i, siɛl yaa bunbɔnn g be u ninŋ.
62001006	T gii maad g naataann nba be t ninŋ taand’ti yen’o g yen sonm bunbɔnn n ninŋ, t fa faaɔg u, t g suun yal nba tuag yen mamɔni sɔnu.
62001007	Ama l gii tie k t sonm yinyiem n ninŋ nyan Yendu mɔno n be yinyiem n ninŋ nand nyan, lann naataann nba be t ninŋ taand’ti yen t lieb n nyan. U Bija Yiesu sɔm bu ŋuul g nyan t biid kul i canyiin.
62001008	L gii tie k t maad k t g mɔg biid, t bɔnd t kua i, mamɔni g be t ninŋ.
62001009	Ama l gii tie k t tuo g maad Yendu nunŋ n k t biil, wan yaan g kand u mɔb po g biɛ tie mɔnkundaan nyan, u bu di sugl t biid kul po g biɛ ŋuul g nyan bonbiil kul t ninŋ.
62001010	T gii maad k t g tien biid t yi Yendu faaɔgdaan n nyan, u maam g be t ninŋ.
62002001	N bid, n da kadaaɔg ne g tien’i k yin daa tie biid i. Ama l gii tie g sua tien biid, t mɔg todkua t Baa Yendu buol, wano n tie Yiesu Kristo, mɔnkundaan.
62002002	Wano Yiesu Kristo n tug u kua g yid salg k t biid ń piin. L g tie tinm kukua yaa biid po kaa, ama l tie ŋanduna niib kul mɔ yaa biid po i.
62002003	L gii tie k t cɔln Yendu mɔmaam, lann n bu te tin bann k t ban Yendu.
62002004	Nil gii tua k u ban Yendu g yen g cɔln u mɔmaam, u tie faaɔgdaan i, mamɔni g be l daan n ninŋ.
62002005	Ama yua nba kub Yendu maam g suun yen tuonn, u tie daan nba g Yendu buam sun tuonn u pal n ninŋ i canyiin. Nnyan i k t bu fid g bann k t be yen Yendu.
62002006	Yua nba yed k u be yen Yendu, l daan binbem baa tie nyan Yiesu binbem n bo tie nand nyan i.
62002007	N bibuadi, l g tie mɔmapaanm kaa k n da g tien’i, l tie mɔmakpelm nba k i bo gaal hal cilg youg nyan i. L mɔmakpelm n tie maam nba k i bo l kpiɛ g gbad nyan.
62002008	Yen l yaa kul, l biɛ daa l tie mɔmapaanm i k n da g tien’i. Kristo n ŋanm g ŋɔn u binbem n ninŋ k l mɔmaam tie mɔmapaanm, k i mɔ biɛ ŋɔn i binbem n ninŋ k l tie nnyan. K l maa bunbɔnn nuan ji buol i, g mamɔni yinyiem ji yien.
62002009	Yua gii maad k u be yinyiem n ninŋ, g yen g bua u ninja nublu, l daan biɛ daa l be bunbɔnn n i.
62002010	Yua nba bua u ninja, wano n be yinyiem n. Siɛl g be u ninŋ g bu te k wan baa biid n.
62002011	Yua g bua u ninja nublu nuan l be bunbɔnn n i. U sonm bunbɔnn n ninŋ i. U g ban wan saa naan, k l maa bunbɔnn te k u juan o.
62002012	N bid, n da’i kadaaɔg ne k l maa Yendu piin i biid Yiesu sann po o.
62002013	Yinm bibaa‑nba, n da’i k l maa i ban yua nba bo be hal cilg youg. Yinm naasenm, n da’i k l maa i paad Bonbiildaan o.
62002014	Yinm bid, yin ban t Baa Yendu po n te k n diɛn’i kadaaɔg ne. Bibaa‑nba, yin ban yua nba bo be hal cilg youg po n te k n diɛn’i l kadaaɔg. Yinm naasenm, yin sie k l paa, g Yendu maam be i pala n ninŋ, k i biɛ paad Bonbiildaan po n te k n diɛn’i l kadaaɔg.
62002015	Lann, daa bua man ŋanduna, g bual yal nba kul l be ŋanduna n ninŋ. Nil gii buad ŋanduna, t Baa Yendu buam g be u ninŋ palb.
62002016	K l maa yal be ŋanduna n ninŋ g nya t Baa Yendu buol kaa. Nifosaal n niɛn yal nba k l g ŋan, yen u ninbina n nyuan yal k u bua, yen jigbelm u ŋalman po, l kul ne nya ŋanduna n ninŋ i.
62002017	Ŋanduna ne yen niib n niɛn yal nba k l g ŋan nyan ji pend i, ama yua nba suun Yendu n bua yal nba nuan baa l be i youg kul.
62002018	N bid, jijuog youg nag n nyan. I bo gbad k b maad’i g Kristo ninnand bu baal. To, mɔlane Kristo ninnanda bonciɛnn ji be i. L po n te k t bann g jijuog youg nag.
62002019	Kristo ninnanda ŋann nyiɛ t siign i, ama b yen bo g tie t yab. B bo gii tie t yab yen mɔni, tinm yen banm n bo baa tund g be. Ama b nyiɛ g ŋaa’ti k lan ŋɔn yen mɔni k b kul bo g tie t yab i.
62002020	Yinm nuan yen gaal Foŋanm o. Yua nba g mɔg siɛl yaa biid n tie’i l Foŋanm. L po n te k i kul ban mamɔni.
62002021	N gii da’i kadaaɔg ne, l g tie k i g ban mamɔni kaa. Yin ban mamɔni po n te k n da’i. I biɛ ban g baa siɛl yaa faaɔg kan fid g nya mamɔni n ninŋ.
62002022	Ŋmaa n tie faaɔgdaan i ? Faaɔgdaan tie yua nba yie g Yiesu g tie Kristo i. Wano n tie Kristo ninnand. U yie k u g ban t Baa Yendu, k u biɛ g ban u Bija mɔ.
62002023	Yua nba l yie Yendu Bija, u kan fid g yiin Yendu k u Baa. Ama yua nba tuo g gaal Yendu Bija, t Baa Yendu be yen’o.
62002024	Yinm nuan n bo gbad maam nba hal cilg youg nyan, ŋanm man gii diɛ l maam i pala n. L gii tie k yin bo gbad maam nba hal cilg youg be i pala n ninŋ, i taan g be yen Yendu Bija, g biɛ be yen t Baa Yendu mɔ n nyan.
62002025	Wan bo puon k u bu te’ti yal nba n ne: miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
62002026	Min da kadaaɔg nba g tien’i ne nyuan yab nba kpaan k ban bɔnd’i nii.
62002027	Ama yinm nuan, Kristo tie’i Foŋanm o. Nyan u Foŋanm n be i ninŋ nyan, l ji g bual g sua ń tund’i, Foŋanm n ŋɔnŋ’i l kul. Wan tund’i yal tie mɔni i, l g tie faaɔg kaa. Lann, i suun man Foŋanm n tund’i yal, gii be yen Kristo.
62002028	To, n bid, i be man yen Kristo k tin fid gii mɔg papaal youg nba k u tan bu dɔgd, k u guanu daal fai ń tan daa di’ti.
62002029	I ban g Kristo tie mɔnkundaan. Lann, biɛ bann man g yua nba kul l tuag mɔnkund sɔnu, Yendu n mal’o.
62003001	Diid man buam nba k t Baa Yendu ŋɔn k u buad’ti. U buaciɛnm po n te k u tug’ti k t tie u bid. Yen mɔni, t kon l tie u bid i. Lann n te g ŋanduna niib g ban’ti k l maa b g ban Yendu.
62003002	N bibuadi, mɔla po t ji tie Yendu bid i. Ama tin tan bu te yab daa duag i. T ban g Kristo n tan bu legd youg nba, t bu lebd g ji gii tie nyan wano nyan i, k l maa t tan bu l la’ɔg u ninprurr, wan naan nand.
62003003	Yua nba kul l mɔg l dindann Kristo n ninŋ, u ji kan gii mɔg jɔgnd nyan Yiesu Kristo mɔno n g mɔg jɔgnd nyan.
62003004	Yua nba kul l tie biid, u g cɔln Yendu mɔmaam. K l maa biid tienu tie Yendu mɔmaam yienu i.
62003005	I ban g Kristo bo baal k wan piin t biid i, g biɛ ban g siɛl yaa biid g be u ninŋ.
62003006	Lann, yua nba kul l taan g be yen’o ji g tie biid. Ama yua nba tie biid, u g ban g la’ɔg, u taan g ban’o mɔno.
62003007	N bid, guul man i kua g daa ŋaa g sua ń bɔnd’i. Yua nba suun yal n dagd mɔ tie mɔnkundaan i, nyan Yiesu Kristo n tie mɔnkundaan nand nyan.
62003008	Yua nba tie biid tie Sitaan yua i, k l maa hal cilg youg Sitaan bo l tie biiddaan i. Yendu Bija baal k wan biil Sitaan tuona i.
62003009	Yua nba g Yendu mal’o kul tie Yendu big i, u ji g tie biid, k l maa Yendu bul u yanfuom u ninŋ. U ji kan fid gii tie biid k l maa Yendu tie u Baa i.
62003010	Tin bu bann Yendu bid yen Sitaan bid nand nba n ne: yua nba kul l g suun yal nba ŋan Yendu buol, u g tie Yendu big. Yua nba g bua u ninja u g tie Yendu big.
62003011	Yen mɔni yin bo gbad maam nba hal cilg youg tie, k tin gii bua man t lieb i.
62003012	L g ŋan k tin gii tie nyan Kayɛn nyan. U bo tie Bonbiildaan yua i, g kpii u ninja. Bɛ po n te k u bo kpii’ug u ? U bo kpii’ug k l maa u waag tuona bo ŋan, k u yaa yal yen g ŋan.
62003013	N ninjanm, l gii tie g ŋanduna yab g bua i nublu, yin daa ŋaa lan yaa g lid’i.
62003014	Tinm nuan ban k t nyiɛ kuum n ninŋ g kua miɛl n ninŋ o, k l maa t bua t ninjanm. Yua nba g bua u ninja, u biɛ daa l be kuum n ninŋ i.
62003015	Yua nba kul l g bua u ninja nublu tie nikpiil i. I yen ban g miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn mɔ kan fid gii be nikpiil n ninŋ.
62003016	Yal nba te k t bann yal nba tie buam n ne: Yiesu n yaan lu u miɛl t po n te k t bann buam. Lann, l tie k tin mɔ ń lu t miɛl t ninjanm po i.
62003017	L gii tie g nil mɔg ŋanduna ne ŋalman, g yen nyuan k u ninja be payiɛnu n, k u g jie’og ninbaaɔg, l daan bu tien nle i gii mali k u mɔg Yendu buam u ninŋ i ?
62003018	N bid, l g tie k tin gii ŋɔnŋ buam t maam n ninŋ yen t lanbonmana n ninŋ kaa, ama l tie k tin gii ŋɔnŋ t tuona n ninŋ i, k t mɔg buam yen mɔni.
62003019	T gii tien nnyan, lann i k t bu bann k t tie yab tuag mamɔni sɔnu, k t pala biɛ paa g Yendu be yen’ti.
62003020	L gii tie k tin tien yal nba mabnd’ti t pala n ninŋ, t ban g Yendu yab g cie t pala, k u biɛ ban bonn kul.
62003021	Lann n bibuadi, l gii tie g siɛl g mabnd’ti t pala n ninŋ, t mɔg papaal Yendu buol,
62003022	k t gii miɛl yal nba kul, k t bu la k l maa t kub u mɔmaam t pala n ninŋ g biɛ tie wan bua yal.
62003023	Wan cab’ti k tin tien yal n ne: l tie k tin gii dug u Bija Yiesu Kristo sann po i, g biɛ gii bua t lieb nyan wano Kristo n ŋɔn’ti u mɔmaam n ninŋ nand nyan.
62003024	Yua nba cɔln Yendu mɔmaam, u be yen Yendu, g Yendu mɔ be yen’o. U Foŋanm nba k u tie’ti nyan po n te k t ban k u be yen’ti.
62004001	N bibuadi, l g tie yab nba kul tua k b mɔg Foŋanm kaa, k i tu bu gaal k b maam tie mɔni. Ama yin tu bign’m g liɛ ban mɔg yal nba nyan kon l tie Yendu Foŋanm yaa aa ? K l maa niib bonciɛnn ji yad g gbie ŋanduna n ninŋ, g fa k b tie Yendu sogni‑nba.
62004002	Diid man, yin bu tien nand g bann k l tie Yendu Foŋanm n ne: yua nba kul maad g Yiesu n tie Kristo, k b mal’o k u tie nifosaal, l daan n mɔg Yendu Foŋanm u ninŋ.
62004003	Ama yua nba g tuo g Yiesu te nifosaal, u g mɔg Yendu Foŋanm u ninŋ. U mɔg Yiesu Kristo ninnand maalm i u ninŋ. I tuod g gbad g Kristo ninnand bu baal, bann man g mɔlane mɔno u ji be ŋanduna n i.
62004004	N bid, yinm tie Yendu yab i, g paad l faaɔgdanm, k l maa yua nba be i ninŋ mɔg paalu g cie yua nba be ŋanduna n ninŋ.
62004005	Banm tie ŋanduna yab i, l po n te k b maad nyan ŋanduna yab n maad nand nyan, g ŋanduna yab cenŋ’b.
62004006	Ama tinm nuan tie Yendu yab i. Yua nba ban Yendu n cenŋ’ti, yua g tie Yendu yua g cenŋ’ti. Nnyan i k t bu bann yua tie mamɔnmaad yua, yen yua tie faaɔgdaan yua.
62004007	N bibuadi, tin gii bua t lieb man, k l maa buam nyiɛ Yendu buol i. Yua nba kul bua u lua, Yendu n mal’o, u ban Yendu.
62004008	Yua nba g bua u lua nuan g ban Yendu, k l maa Yendu tie buamdaan i.
62004009	Diid man Yendu n ŋɔn k u bua’ti nand nba: u sun u Bijayenml ŋanduna n ninŋ, k u yaa po tin gii mɔg miɛl.
62004010	L buam tie ne i: l g tie k tinm kaa buad Yendu, ama wano n buad’ti g sun u Bija k u tug u kua g yid salg k t biid ń piin.
62004011	N bibuadi, l gii tie g Yendu buad’ti nnyan, l bual k tin mɔ ń gii bua t lieb i.
62004012	Sua g ban g la Yendu, ama l gii tie k t bua t lieb, Yendu be yen’ti, k u buam mɔ biɛ l suun tuonn t ninŋ yen mɔni.
62004013	Diid man, lan tien nand k t ban k t be yen Yendu, g Yendu mɔ be yen’ti n ne: u tie’ti u Foŋanm.
62004014	Yendu sun u Bija k wan fiel ŋanduna niib. Tinm la’ɔg, t biɛ muand lann n nyan.
62004015	Yua nba tuo g yed g Yiesu tie Yendu Bija, Yendu be yen wano i, k u mɔ biɛ be yen Yendu.
62004016	Tinm ban Yendu n bua’ti nand, g biɛ tuo k l tie mɔni. Yendu tie buamdaan i, yua nba sonm buam sɔnu n ninŋ, u be yen Yendu, g Yendu mɔ be yen’o.
62004017	L gii tie g Yendu buam suun tuonn t ninŋ yen mɔni, t baa mɔg papaal buud daal, k l maa t binbem ŋanduna ne ninŋ naan yen Yiesu Kristo binbem i.
62004018	Buam n be naan, jijei ji g mɔg yiɛl l buol. Yua mɔg buam yen mɔni jijei g be u ninŋ. K l maa yua n guu tubdadu n mɔg jijei. Yua n mɔg jijei g mɔg buam u ninŋ yen mɔni.
62004019	Ama tinm nuan yen mɔg buam k l maa Yendu n kpiɛ g buad’ti.
62004020	Nil gii maad k u bua Yendu g yen g bua u ninja nublu, u tie faaɔgdaan i. Yen mɔni, yua nba g bua u ninja nba k u nyuan’o kan fid gii bua Yendu nba k u g nyuan’o.
62004021	T gaal mɔmaam ne i Yendu buol: yua nba bua Yendu ń gii bua u ninja mɔ.
62005001	Yua nba kul tuo g gaal g Yiesu tie Kristo, Yendu mal wano i. Yua nba kul bua bibaa, u baa bua bibaa n mal yua nba mɔ i.
62005002	Tin bu tien nand g bann k t bua Yendu bid tie k tin gii bua Yendu g biɛ cɔln u mɔmaam i.
62005003	Yen mɔni, tin bu ŋɔn nand k t bua Yendu tie k tin cɔln u mɔmaam i. L mɔmaam cɔlmu yen g paa t po,
62005004	k l maa Yendu n mal yua nba kul bu fid g paad ŋanduna. Tin mɔg dindann nba nyan po n te k t paad ŋanduna.
62005005	Ŋmaa n bu fid g paad ŋanduna i ? Yua nba tuo g gaal g Yiesu tie Yendu Bija kukua n bu fid g paad ŋanduna.
62005006	Wano Yiesu Kristo n tie yua nba bo baal k b wul’o nyum, g sɔm biɛ tan nyiɛ u po dapunpɔnn po. U bo g baal k b wul’o kukua kaa, ama sɔm mɔ bo nyiɛ u po. G Foŋanm tie sieda k l tie mɔni, k l maa Foŋanm tie mɔni i.
62005007	Sieda‑nba bantaa n be:
62005008	lan tie Foŋanm yen nyum yen sɔm. Banm bantaa ne kul tuo k l tie nnyan.
62005009	T gii gaan niib n tie kasied nba, tin bann g Yendu kasied n cie l kul, k l maa u kun mɔni u Bija po.
62005010	Yua nba dug Yendu Bija po mɔg l kasied u pal n ninŋ. Ama yua nba g dug Yendu po, u yi Yendu faaɔgdaan n nyan. K l maa u g tuo g gaal Yendu n kun mɔni nba u Bija po.
62005011	L kasied n tie g Yendu tie’ti miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn. L miɛl n be u Bija n ninŋ.
62005012	Yua nba tuo g gaal Yendu Bija, wano n mɔg l miɛl. Yua nba g tuo g gaal Yendu Bija mɔ, u g mɔg l miɛl.
62005013	N diɛn’i l bona kul ne k yin fid g bann k i mɔg miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn i, yinm nba dug Yendu Bija sann po.
62005014	Yal po te k t pala paa Yendu po n ne: t ban k t gii miɛl’o bonn nba dagd yen u buam, k u cenŋ’ti.
62005015	Nyan tin ban k u cenŋ’ti youg nba k t miɛd’o nyan, tin biɛ gii ban k t gaal tin miɛl’o yal nba o.
62005016	L gii tie g sua la k u ninja be biid n ninŋ, k l kan baal yen kuum, l tie k wan jaand u po i, Yendu bu te’og miɛl. Lann nyuan yab nba k b biid g baad yen kuum i. Ama biid be g baad yen kuum. N g maad k yin jaand l yaa biid po kaa.
62005017	Bontitied nba kul g ŋan tie biid i. Ama bisiɛd be g g baad yen kuum.
62005018	T ban g Yendu n mal yua nba kul ji g tie biid, k l maa Yendu Bija guu’ug, g Bonbiildaan kan fid g tien’o baa siɛl.
62005019	T ban k t tie Yendu yab, g biɛ ban g ŋanduna munn kul be Bonbiildaan nui n i.
62005020	T biɛ ban g Yendu Bija baal g tie’ti yanfuom k tin bann mamɔni Yendu i. Tin gaal Yiesu Kristo po n te k t be yen mamɔni Yendu. Wano n tie mamɔni Yendu, g biɛ tie miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
62005021	N bid, suol man i kua yen niib n mali g yal tie Yendu k l yen g tie.
63001001	Min nikpel n da kadaaɔg ne g tien cannaa nba g Yendu lugd’o nyan, yen u bid. N bua’i yen mɔni. Min kukua kaa bua’i, ama yab nba kul ban mamɔni mɔ bua’i.
63001002	T bua’i k l maa mamɔni be t ninŋ. L mamɔni baa l be t ninŋ i, youg kul.
63001003	T Baa Yendu yen u Bija Yiesu Kristo bu te’ti ŋalbalg yen sugl yen yanduanm, tin gii mɔg l kul ne, mamɔni n ninŋ yen buam n ninŋ.
63001004	N pal daan manŋ hal bonciɛnn yen min la k a bid siign, g yenm sonm mamɔni sɔnu n ninŋ nyan t Baa Yendu n bo ŋɔn’ti mɔmaam nba nyan.
63001005	Cannaa, mɔlane min miɛd’a yal n ne: tin gii bua man t lieb. L g tie mɔmapaanm kaa k n da’a, l tie mɔmaam nba k t bo gaal hal cilg youg u.
63001006	Buam tie k tin cɔln Yendu mɔmaam i. Lann n tie mɔmaam nba k i bo gbad hal cilg youg nyan, g buam ń gii be i binbem n ninŋ.
63001007	I ban g faaɔgdanm bonciɛnn ji yad g be ŋanduna n i. B g tuo g gaal g Yiesu Kristo te nifosaal yen mɔni. Yua nba tie l nibuolu tie faaɔgdaan i, wano n tie Kristo ninnand.
63001008	Lann guul man i kua, k i tuona nba k i suun n tan daa te fam, k yin fid g tan la l nyuad kul.
63001009	Yua nba kul g diɛ Kristo tundl kukua, g yen pugd u yul po yal nyan, Yendu g be yen’o. Ama yua nba diɛ l tundl kukua g tund niib, wano i k t Baa Yendu yen u Bija Yiesu Kristo be yen’o.
63001010	L gii tie g sua baal i buol g g diɛ Kristo tundl, yin daa gaal’o i ŋaag n ninŋ, yin biɛ daa tie’og yen sonml.
63001011	K l maa yua nba tien’o yen sonml taan l daan k b tien biid n nyan.
63001012	N mɔg maam bonciɛnn g bo bua k n maad’i, ama n yen g bua k n diɛn kadaaɔg n ninŋ kaa g te’i. N mali k n bu baal g gɔnn’i, g pag yen’i k t kul pala ń ŋanm g manŋ.
63001013	A niipuo nba g Yendu lugd’o nyan bid mɔ fuond’a.
64001001	Min nikpel n da kadaaɔg ne g tien n dɔnn Gaayus nba k n bua’ɔg yen mɔni.
64001002	N dɔnn, n bua k a gii mɔg laafiɛ, g bona kul ń gii sonm a binbem n ninŋ nyan lan sonm nand fin yen Yendu siign ninŋ nyan.
64001003	N pal daan manŋ hal bonciɛnn youg nba k t ninjanm Kristo‑yab daan baal g maad’n k a l be mamɔni sɔnu n nyan ŋan tu l be nand nyan i.
64001004	Siɛl g ŋanm g manŋd n pal g cie yen min gbad k n bid tuag mamɔni sɔnu.
64001005	N dɔnn, a ŋanm g kub t ninjanm Kristo‑yab, baa yen ban l tie saanm mɔno.
64001006	B daan kun mɔni Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ g maad ŋan ŋɔn buam nba b po. N balm’a k a mɔnd g tod’b nyan Yendu n bua nand nyan, k ban gad b sɔnu.
64001007	K l maa Yiesu po i k b daan fiil g tug sɔnu g saa, g g gaal baa siɛl yab g ban Yendu buol.
64001008	Lann, l bual k tinm Kristo‑yab ń tod l nibuolu i, k t nuu ń mɔ ń gii be mamɔni tuonn nba k b suun nyan po.
64001009	N daan diɛn siɛl g tie Kristo‑yab tintaanu, ama g Diotrɛf nba bua wan gii tie liig yua nyan g tuod n maam.
64001010	L po n te k n tan gii baal, n bu dugn’i wan tie yal, wan maad mabiid nba t po. Yen l yaa kul ne, l biɛ daa l g dagd u po. Wano n biɛ yied g g gaan t ninjanm Kristo‑yab, g biɛ tu pan danm nba bua ban gaal t ninjanm nyan mɔno, g bel g nyan’m Kristo‑yab tintaanu n ninŋ.
64001011	N dɔnn, daa togd bonbiil tienu, i tie ŋanm. Yua nba tie ŋanm tie Yendu yua i. Ama yua nba tie bonbiil g ban g la Yendu.
64001012	Niib kul pag Demetriyus, k u binbem biɛ ŋɔnŋ k u ŋua mamɔni sɔnu. Tinm mɔno pag’o, k fin mɔno ban k tin maad yal u po tie mɔni.
64001013	N biɛ mɔg maam bonciɛnn g bua k n maad’a, ama n yen g bua k n diɛn kadaaɔg n ninŋ kaa g te’a.
64001014	N mali k l kan wai yen min la’a, k tin ŋanm g pag.
64001015	Yendu ń te’a yanduanm. A dɔnn‑nba fuond’a. Ŋan fuond fuond t dɔnn‑nba o.
65001001	Min Suud, n tie Yiesu Kristo tuonsunn i, g biɛ tie Saak ninja. N da kadaaɔg ne, g tien yinm nba k t Baa Yendu yiin’i, g bua’i, g biɛ te g Yiesu Kristo guu’i.
65001002	Yendu ń jie’i ninbaaɔg, gii bua’i bonciɛnn g biɛ te k i yam ń gii dua buga.
65001003	N dɔnn‑nba, n pal daan kɔn bonciɛnn yen k n diɛn’i t kul fielu po, ama mɔlane, n la k l ji tie mabl i n po, k min diɛn’i g paan i pala, k i kɔn yin dug Laabamann nba nyan po, Laabamann nba g Yendu bo tie u niib yenm kua nyan.
65001004	G dugn nisiɛb wuon g kua i siign ninŋ g g jie Yendu, g lebd laabaal nba ŋɔnŋ t Yendu ŋalbalg niimn k ban fid gii tie b gbannand n bua yal nba. B tie nnyan i g yied Yiesu Kristo, wano kukua nba tie t Canbaa g biɛ tie t Yonmdaan. B bo tuod g diɛn l biiddanm tubdadu po Yendu Kadaaɔg n hal k l wai.
65001005	Min bua n maad’i yal nba ne, n ban k i ŋanm g ban l kul. Ama n bua k n guan g tiɛd’i g Yonmdaan n bo nyan u buolu yonmd n ninŋ Esipt doug n, l puol po u bo te g yab yie g g dug u po kul biɛl.
65001006	Tiɛd man malɛg‑nba nba bo yie g Yendu n tie’b yikod nba g dagd b po, g nyɔl b binbebuol g yaad, g Yendu suol’b g lol’b, k b baa luol youg kul bunbɔncild n ninŋ, g guu digbenŋl daal nba g Yendu bu bu buud.
65001007	Sɔdɔm yen Gomɔr doi yen doi nba kpiɛ’b nyan niib mɔ bo sun nnyan i. L doi niib bo tug b yul g kun yen cunconm i, g ŋaa k ban gii dua yen puob o g dua yen jab. L po n te g Yendu dad l doi n niib tubl, k b be muu nba so g kan ban g junn n ninŋ. Niib kul bu la l buol i g cegd.
65001008	Yen l yaa kul, l niib mɔ biɛ l suun nnyan i, g diɛ b danŋd g suun yen tuonn k l kuand b gbannand jɔgnd n ninŋ, g nund Yendu yikod, g biɛ sugd malɛg‑nba nba be polu po g mɔg yudand.
65001009	Baa malɛg‑nba kul bad Miisiɛl mɔno, youg nba k wano yen Sitaan bo kɔn Moyis gbannand po, u bo g tuo g jiɛl u buud g sugl’o. Ama u bo maad’o g Yonmdaan ń dad u tubl.
65001010	G nyaan l niib nuan sugd ban g ban yal nba i. Ban biɛ mɔg banm nba mɔ tie bonkobd banm i, maalm g be l n. Lann n biɛ kuand’b muaɔg.
65001011	Fala bu gbad’b, k l maa b ŋmaa Kayɛn taabuod n, g ligbuam po k b kua tudm n ninŋ nyan Balaam nyan, g fiil g yie Yendu po nyan Kore nyan, g mɔ biɛl.
65001012	I gii taan g bu di jied, banm n tu ŋmad i naataanjedinu. B tu mali b kua po i, g mɔ k b gbanfiɛd ń gbie, g g jie fai. B tie nyan tawalgband nba g faalu tu piend k l yen g baad yen taag nyan i. B tie nyan tiidi nba g luon b lonyoug nyan i, tiidi nba k b figd’b k b kpe canyiin nyan.
65001013	B ŋɔnŋ b tuonjɔgna nba mɔg fai naan kul, nyan mɔgl nyunguona nba paa n tu tug jɔgnd g lu bɔngbann nand nyan i. B tie nyan ŋmaabid nba ŋaa b sɔnu g bund g sonm g Yendu bobn yiɛl g guu’m bunbɔncild n ninŋ, k b ji baa be l n ninŋ youg kul nyan i.
65001014	Lan cil t yaajacincinn Adam saa yen Enɔk, tuanu tuanu yaajanm n ninŋ, Enɔk tua munlile po i. Wano n bo liid g maad l niib po k nne: « Yonmdaan n baad yen u malɛg‑nba tudbanm nyan,
65001015	g bu bu ŋanduna niib kul, buud ń di niib nba kul g cɔln Yendu, g dugn ban sun tuonbiid nba yen ban maad mabiid nba kul u po. »
65001016	L niib buln buln kua i, g fabn b kua po, g tie b yam n bua yal nba. B tie niib nba maad jipaamaam i, g biɛ tu manŋ mɔb g kpaan b yul po nyuad.
65001017	Ama yinm, n dɔnn‑nba, tiɛd man t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo sundi n bo liid g maad’i yal.
65001018	B bo maad’i: « Dijijuog dani n ninŋ niib baa laa’i nii. B baa tie b yam n bua yal nba i g yie Yendu yal. »
65001019	I la l niib ii, banm n baad yen paadu Kristo‑yab siign. B mɔg nisaal maalm i, Yendu Fuom g be b ninŋ.
65001020	Ama yinm n dɔnn‑nba, yin gaal Laabamann nba Yendu buol nyan, nyii man l po gii saa liig i dindann n ninŋ, gii jaand yen Foŋanm paalu.
65001021	Yendu n bua’i buam nba nyan, i be man l buam n ninŋ, gii guu k t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo bu te’i miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn g dugn u pasiɛdug po.
65001022	Yab nba mali munle-le yin jie’b ninbaaɔg,
65001023	siɛb mɔ be k i bu fid g fiel’b g nyan’m muu n ninŋ. Lieb mɔ, yin jie’b ninbaaɔg ama gii ban i kua po, g daa nagd’b g dugn b tuonbiid jɔgn baa b tiɛd mɔno u.
65001024	Tin gii dond man Yendu, wano nba bu fid g guul’i k i kan baa bignn n ninŋ, g biɛ te yin nagn naan k u be yen u yudand nyan yen pamanciɛnn g daa mɔg siɛl yaa biid.
65001025	Wano nba tie Yenduyeno kua g fiel’ti t Yonmdaan Yiesu Kristo po, yudand yen paaciɛnu yen yikod tie u yal i youg nba pend yen mɔlane yen youg nba baad. Amɛnn.
66001001	Bona nba bo wuo, g Yiesu Kristo bo dɔgd g ŋɔn n be kadaaɔg ne ninŋ. Yendu n bo ŋɔn’o l bona, k wan ŋɔn u tuonsunna k l kan wai yen l bona ń tien. Kristo n bo sun u malɛg u tuonsunn San buol, g malɛg ŋɔn’o l bona.
66001002	Lann i g San dugn wan la bona nba kul, g maad k l kul nyiɛ Yendu buol i, g Yiesu Kristo n dɔgd g ŋɔn’o.
66001003	Yua nba lii maam nba nyiɛ Yendu buol k b diɛn kadaaɔg ne ninŋ, pamann tie u yal i. Yab nba cenŋ l maam g biɛ tug g sun yenn tuonn, pamann tie b mɔ yaa yal i, k l maa youg nba k l bona bu tien nag o.
66001004	Min San n da kadaaɔg ne g fuond Kristo‑yab tintaancaga nba be Asi dingbana ŋanlile n ninŋ. Yendu nba bo be, g biɛ daa be g biɛ baa be, yen Yendu fuom banlile nba sie u badkog nintual n, yen Yiesu Kristo ń yad yedŋanm i po, g te k i yam ń gii dua. Wano Yiesu n tie sieda yen mɔni, g tie cincinn yua nba yied kpienm siign ninŋ, g tie bijakpel. Wano n tie tinŋ n ne batieb kul yaa Bad. U buad’ti g tuo g kpe g fiel g nyan’ti t biid n ninŋ,
66001006	g te k t tie Yendu badbijanm, g biɛ tie u Baa Yendu salg-yidkab. Yudand yen paaciɛnu ń gii tie u yal youg ń tuu youg. Amɛnn.
66001007	I la i, wano n nyiɛ tawalgband n ninŋ g baad nyan, niib kul bu la’ɔg, baa yab nba bo cɔg g lond’o mɔno. Ŋanduna ne buoli kul ji baa fabn g gbiɛnd g dugn u baalu po. Mamɔnm, l tan baa tie nnyan i.
66001008	Yonmdaan Yendu Paaciɛnudaan, yua nba bo be, g biɛ daa be g biɛ baa be, wano n maad: « Min n tie cilg g biɛ tie juog. »
66001009	Min San, n tie i ninja i. Min yen yinm kul juun g laad fala Yiesu po. T taan g tie badbijanm i Yendu diem n ninŋ. B bo suol’n g gad yen’n Patmɔs kpendegl po, g dugn n bo muand Yendu maam g ŋɔnŋ niib Yiesu n kun mɔni nba.
66001010	G Yonmdaan daal, g Foŋanm gbie n ninŋ, k n gbad niɛlu nne n puol po, k l niɛlu do nyan naatunn n tu mɔ nand nyan
66001011	g maad: « Ŋan nyuan yal nba ne, diɛn kadaaɔg n ninŋ g te Kristo‑yab tintaancaga ŋanlile nba ne: Efɛs yen Simiirn yen Pɛrgam yen Tiatiir yen Sard yen Filadɛlfi yen Lawɔdise. »
66001012	Lann i k n gbeg k n diid g liɛ ŋmaa n maad yen’n i ? Min gbeg nyan, k n la fidtuanbona ŋanlile k b tien yen wula g fida tua l po.
66001013	K l fidtuanbona ŋanlile sinsiign ninŋ k n la k l tie nyan nil nyan g liɛ liɛdfagdug, g bobn gbann u pal po k l tien yen wula.
66001014	K u yud pien pag pag nyan gungund nyan, k u ninbina so nyan muupienu nyan.
66001015	K u titala naan nyan nabnd nba k b pul muu n k l nyili nyan, k u niɛlu mɔ begl nyan mɔgl n nyunguona nyan.
66001016	G diɛ u nuujendu po ŋmaabid ŋanlile, g jugfuaɔg nne nya u mɔb n, k b luan k l mɔi yinle kul man, k u nunŋ po nyili g tuud nyan yensikpikpalg n yendu nyan.
66001017	Min la’ɔg youg nba k n baa u nintual n ninŋ nyan n kpe nyan. Lann i k u tug u nuujendu g maan n po g maad: « Daa jie. Min n tie kpinkpiɛ‑g‑liid, g biɛ tie yua juod.
66001018	Min n tie yua nba fo. N bo kpe o, ama mɔlane n ji fo g biɛ baa fo youg ń tuu youg. N mɔg yiko kuum po yen tinkpiiug po.
66001019	Diɛn ŋan la bona nba, lann n tie yal tie mɔlane yen yal bu baal kul.
66001020	Ŋan nyuan ŋmaabid ŋanlile nba k n diɛ n nuujendu ne yen fidtuanbona ŋanlile nba k a la ne niimn n ne: ŋmaabid ŋanlile ŋann tie Kristo‑yab tintaancaga ŋanlile ŋann malɛg‑nba i, g fidtuanbona ŋanlile ŋann mɔ tie Kristo‑yab tintaancaga ŋanlile ŋann. »
66002001	G yua nba k n la’ɔg nyan maad’n: « Diɛn kadaaɔg g te Efɛs Kristo‑yab tintaancagl malɛg g maad’o g yua nba diɛ ŋmaabid ŋanlile u nuujendu, g sonm fidtuanbona ŋanlile nba k b tien yen wula nyan sinsiign n maad yal nba n ne:
66002002	“ N ban ŋan suun yal nba kul. N ban a nyignn yen a juunn po. N biɛ ban k a kan fid gii be yen nibiid. A bign yab yed k b tie Yiesu sundi g yen g tie, g diid g sua k b tie faaɔgdanm i.
66002003	N ban k a mɔg juunn, k a biɛ la fala n sann po, g nyaan a g ŋaa k a pal wad.
66002004	Ama yal g manŋ n po a buol tie k a ŋaa ŋan daan kpiɛ g mɔg buam nba n po i.
66002005	Tiɛd ŋan bo tu be binbem nba g ji tan kpiɛd nyan, g mɔ kua g lebd a binbem g guan gii suun ŋan daan cind g suun yal nba. A gii g lebd a binbem, n bu baal g tug a fidtuanbonn g lie lan tu be naan.
66002006	G nyaan a suun bonyenn k l ŋan. A mɔ g tuo Nikolaayiit-nba n suun yal nba nyan min nyan.
66002007	Yua n mɔg tuba g bu gbad, wan gbad Foŋanm n maad Kristo‑yab tintaancaga yal. Yua nba kɔn jad g paad, n bu te’og Yendu gɔglug n ninŋ tiig nba tien miɛl luana wan mua ”. »
66002008	K u biɛ maad: « Diɛn kadaaɔg g te Simiirn Kristo‑yab tintaancagl malɛg g maad’o g yua tie kpinkpiɛ‑g‑liid g biɛ tie yua juod, g bo kpe g biɛ guan g fo n maad yal nba n ne:
66002009	“ N ban a fala yen a namu po, g nyaan a yen tie mɔgd i. N ban niib n maad mabiid nba a po. B yed k b tie Suif‑nba i, g yen g tie. B tie Sitaan tintaanu yab i.
66002010	Daa jie fala nba bu baal’a. Cenŋ ne, Sitaan bu bign’i g te k ban suol yenm g luon’m dansalg. B bu cagn’i daa piig. I ŋua’n yen a pal kul saa yen a kuum, k n tan bu pa’a pani, lann n tie miɛl nba kan ban g gbenn.
66002011	Yua n mɔg tuba g bu gbad, wan gbad Foŋanm n maad Kristo‑yab tintaancaga yal. Yua nba kɔn jad g paad, munle po yaa kuum ji kan fid g tien’o baa siɛl ”. »
66002012	K u biɛ maad: « Diɛn kadaaɔg g te Pɛrgam Kristo‑yab tintaancagl malɛg g maad’o g yua nba mɔg jugfuaɔg nba k b luan k l mɔi yinle kul man n maad yal nba n ne:
66002013	“ N ban k ŋan kua naan nba nyan, Sitaan badkog be l buol i. G nyaan a sie n puol po k l paa. Baa ban bo tan kpii Antipas, yua bo tie n sieda yen mɔni, i doug n ninŋ, Sitaan n kua naan nyan, a bo g yie’n, a bo l dug n po i.
66002014	Ama yal g manŋ n po a buol tie k a mɔg niyenm k b ŋua Balaam tundl. Wano Balaam n bo ŋɔn Balak wan bu tien nand g bign Israyɛl yab g te k ban ŋman padnand g biɛ sun cuncontuona.
66002015	L biɛ tie nnyan i k i ninŋ siɛb mɔ ŋua Nikolaayiit-nba tundl.
66002016	Lann, lebd a binbem, lann i kaa n bu baal a buol mɔlane yen jugfuaɔg nba nya n mɔb n, g kɔn yen l niib.
66002017	Yua n mɔg tuba g bu gbad, wan gbad Foŋanm n maad Kristo‑yab tintaancaga yal. Yua nba kɔn jad g paad, n bu te’og mann nba wuo. N biɛ bu te’og tanpienn, l tann po b diɛn sanpaann g sua g ban l sann, l gii g tie yua nba gaal l tann i kaa ”. »
66002018	K u biɛ maad: « Diɛn kadaaɔg g te Tiatiir Kristo‑yab tintaancagl malɛg g maad’o g yua nba tie Yendu Bija, k u ninbina so nyan muupienu nyan, k u titala naan nyan nabnd nba k b pul muu n k l nyili nyan n maad yal nba n ne:
66002019	“ N ban ŋan suun yal nba kul, g ban ŋan bua Yendu nand, g ban ŋan ŋua’ɔg nand yen a pal kul, g ban ŋan tod a lieb nand yen a juunn po. N ban k ŋan juod g sun tuona nba yab g cie ŋan bo cind g sun yal.
66002020	G nyaan yal g manŋ n po a buol tie k a ŋaa puo nba yed k u tie Yendu sogni, k b yi’ug Sesabɛl nyan, k u tund n tuonsunna g te k b tud Yendu sɔnu, g ŋman padnand g biɛ suun cuncontuona.
66002021	N bo bil’o dana k wan lebd u binbem, ama k u g bua k wan ŋaa u cuncontuona.
66002022	L po n te k n bu duan’o yiɛlu nba biɛ. U yegni nba taan g suun yen’o cuncontuona nyan, n bu te b mɔ ń cagn bonciɛnn l gii tie k b g lebd b binbem g ŋaa u tuonbiid sunu.
66002023	N bu te yiɛlu nba kpi g lalg ń kpi u ŋuantieb. Nnyan i g Kristo‑yab tintaancaga kul bu bann k min n tie yua nba ban nifosaal maalm yen u yanbuam. N tan bu pa yua kul nyan wan sun nand nba nyan i.
